! / /
gang+gA ya yud kA tshA ri ta gam+b+hi ra shwam ho dA ra sya sad+d+harmA NAM ba ha wa r+NA di pu sta go bi har ti sma / /
! / /
zab pa dang rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi thob yig gang+gA'i chu rgyun las glegs bam dang po bzhugs /
! / /
skal brda? rnam 'dren stong gi tog /
zas gtsang sras po don kun grub / /
@# / /
pra kr-i ti ka hi bi shud+d+ha la k+Sh+mI sa mU hA ti bi r+yaM ni mi t+to pa shA mo ni rA b+ho Sha gu Nyo ga ka lpom matrI ya shA g+j+nya da yaM dbya r+thi kaH / /
@# / /
phun shis pa brjod pa'i sgo dang po /
tshogs rang bzhin rnam dag 'dus ma byis shing 'bad rtsol mtshan ma nyer zhi'i lhun grub yon tan sgra rtog tsam gyis 'jal min mkhyen brtse nus mnga' don gnyis can / /
! / /
bstan ba'i nyi ma 'od bo che /
chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa / /
! / /
blo gros 'ang bstod bzhad pa'i nyi / /
'jam dpal rdo rje / /
na na ra ra ra sdeb sbyor mnyam pa'i brit+ta las rgyun chags drug pa shin tu klubs pa / /
ra ra ra ra ra @# / /
ta ra ka bi di sha ka rma ka kle sha no shI la mA n+ya bi ka lpyA mu pa tri r+d+h+r-i bA pai rma do ShaM ta tA su dyu dai k+p+rA ti kU laM ni ro d+hA d+h+wi kaH / /
@# / /
rtog ge'i yul bral las nyon tshul min yid byed rnam rtog nyer spangs 'dzin stangs sgrib pas bslad pa ma zhugs de nyid legs gsal mi mthun phyogs gnyen 'gog lam ldan / /
'phags yul paN grub ma lus pa'i bsrong? los sgyur rgyal? pi? rlung? pa / /
na na ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra na na ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra ra pa ris dan ka tsA r+tha saM br-i t+tid+hA rmyaM bi dA n+ta r+dz+nyA kA dr-i g+g+ha yo rA ga ne saM gi hI nA ba ra N+ye b+h+ya sA mu k+t+ya nA br-i t+ti sA p+ta dgu NaH da sha ba li ka hi d+harma saMb+he ti nA mo ya shats+tshA tra b+hA bA gra tA b+h+rA ma tshA de hi mA gA kla ma tsAr NA thA shri yA bA ta da tre b+hu dza / /
don dam kun rdzob chos lugs rig cing nang gi ye shes yongs gzigs spang bya chags thogs dman pa'i sgrib las yongs grol phyir mi ldog ste yon tan bdun mnga' ba / /
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes mtshan grags pa'i gdugs dkar srid rtser 'khor ba'i gi ba tu bsil bar 'gro kun ngal gsor spyod pa'i bkra shis dpal gyis deng 'dir skyongs / /
shis pa brjod pa'i sgo gnyis pa /
gang gi mtshan snyan dzam bu'i ljon pa snod ldan rgya mtshor lhungs pa'i mod la 'chi med chu bo'i gser du sgyur mdzad tshe mtha' yas pa'i mgon / /
thugs rje'i ka pu ra yi gzegs mas dus kyi pho nya'i tsha reg yongs bcil bskal brgya'i yun 'tsho bsil ba'i bde ster yid bzhin 'khor lo'i zhabs / /
yid 'phrog thabs kyi nyag phran gzhon nu shes rab rgyud las nye bar 'phos pas @# / /
srid zhi'i brtan pa kun 'phrog bcom ldan rig byed dbang gi rgyal / /
lha mchog rnam gsum snying gi ze'u 'brur rtag tu bzhugs la mkhyen brtsi nus pa'i chu 'dzin las 'ongs dngos grub char du 'bebs pa'i dge legs stsol / /
shis pa brjod pa'i sgo gsum pa /
zhing khams rgya mtsho'i phra rabs rdul gyi grangs bzhin pha mtha' mi mngon rgyal ba kun gyi yab tu gyur kyang gzhon nu'i tshul / /
'dzin mdzad 'tshams sprin gsar pa'i lang tsho rab rgyas mtshan dpe'i ngo mtshar ci yang dngom pa'i zur phud lnga ldan 'jam dpal dbyangs / /
gang dang gnyis med mnyam par sbyor ba'i dga' bzhi'i bde chen 'dren mdzad rgyud mangs glu las dam chos sgra 'khrol dbyangs can lha / /
yab yum zung 'jug thugs rje'i nyi mas bdag yid mi shes smag rum legs bsal ngag la ngag gi dngos grub ma lus stsol / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo dang po /
sgrib gnyis lcags khams bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen dngul chus nyer bzas dbyings rig gser bsgyur bde ba chen po chos kyi sku / /
'og min zhing khams zhing gi gtso bor nges pa lnga ldan snang stong sgyu dra'i gar mkhan longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku / /
zla ba gcig las stong phrag rdzing bur gzugs brnyan ji bzhin grangs med zhing du sna tshogs rnam rol sprul pa'i sku / /
khyab bdag kun bzang rdor sems shAkya'i rgyal sogs dus gsum sangs rgyas sras dang slob mar bcas rnams phyag gi yul / /
mchod par brjod ba'i sgo gnyis pa /
'phags bod skye rgu'i legs byas nam mkhar phan bde'i nyi ma gung nas 'char ba'i bka' drin zla bral ba / /
gnas brtan dgra bcom rig 'dzin grub chen shing rta che sogs lung dang rtogs pa'i rin chen bang mdzod can / /
mkhan slob padma'i ngang tshul chos rgyal mes dpon rim par byon dang snga phyi'i sgra bsgyur 'jig rten mig /
thub bstan rin chen do shal bshad sgrub srad bur rgyud mdzad rnams ni dngos po kun gyis btud bya'i gnas / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo gsum ba /
rje 'bangs nyer lnga so zur gnubs nyad bka' gtar gdung gsob sngags 'chang rgyal po he ru kaH / /
jo 'brom sku mched rnam gsum glang shar bya 'chad brgyud 'dzin bka' gdams pa zhes rgyal ba'i sras / /
rigs gsum gar mkhan 'khon rigs sa skya'i bla chen rjes 'brangs bcas dang shong dpang bu ston zhabs / /
gangs can bstan pa yun du srog 'tsho'i bdud rtsi'i bum bzang tshogs la snying nas dang bas bsngags / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo bzhi pa /
'khor ba'i g.yul ngo gzhom pa'i byed por bshad sgrub dpung tshogs yan lag bzhi'i mgon por / /
'jam mgon mkhyen dpyod gser 'khor nam mkhar 'phags pas rmongs pa'i dgra tshogs las rgyal pa / /
thub bstan gling bzhi yongs la dbang sgyur blo bzang grags 'bar kun mkhyen btsong kha pa / /
gang gi bzhed gzhung 'khrul med 'dzin bcas deng nas byang chub bar du gtsug na mdzes / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo lnga pa /
rang skal cha phra'i rnyog mar skyabs mchog de kun gzugs brnyan 'char min yang / /
chos kyi rgyal mtshan dkon mchog chos tshul rab 'phel smon 'gro paN chen sogs / /
gnas lnga'i gtsug @# / /
lag tshigs bcad tsam gyis mtha' rten ston mdzad yongs 'dzin tshogs / /
sras bcas rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul gar du nges rnyed dang ba'i yid kyis 'dud / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo drug pa /
khyad par tshogs gnyis sa bon yongs su smin pa'i bla med chos gzugs gzod ma nyid nas dar drag kyang / /
dman blor tha mal zol can dpal 'byor lhun grub chos dbyings rang grol 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan sde / /
rin cen bsod nams mchog tu lhun grub nyang ston rig pa'i rdo rje chos rgyal gter pa dag gling pa'i zhabs / /
bshes gnyen yongs 'du'i 'khri shing 'bras bzang ro bdas bdag yid myos las dga' spro'i bstod bsngags dbyangs su len / /
mchod par brjod pa'i sgo bdun pa /
grangs ring bgrod dka' srid pa'i lam du nye bar dub pa'i gdung skyob phyir du rgyal kun ye shes phung po'i gzugs / /
bskal bzang 'di la rnam 'dren stong gi sgyu 'phrul bsdoms pa mi lus zol can rigs brgya'i bdag po yongs 'dzin rje / /
de yang sems nyid kho na'i rnam 'phrul rang rig bla ma'i ngo bor shes la dpyad gsum dag pas nges rnyed nas / /
gcig pu nyid las du ma'i gar bzhin lam zab rnal 'byor rtag tu skyong la spro ba'i rtse dga' khong nas dgod / /
dngos po nges bstan gyi sgo thub bstan zhing sa gshin par sgrub pa tshul khrims so so thar pa'i bstan / /
lung rtogs sdong bu lo 'dab rgyas byed sgra tshad bzo gso sde snod gsum / /
zung 'jug 'bras bus yongs su dud pa nges gsang rdo rje theg pa'i lam / /
tshul bzhin gnas lnga rig pa nyan 'di sngon bsags bsod nams shing rtas drangs / /
dkar nag las 'bras 'char ba tshe 'di yi / /
snang ba me long gsar pa'i ngos yangs par / /
thar pa'i ri mo bkra ba'i cho ga mkhan / /
thos bsam sgom pa'i tshul lugs 'di rmad byung / /
tshe 'di'i mdun ma tsam gyi lha lam la / /
zhib mor rtog dpyod dgu tshigs thig 'debs na / /
gtan bde sgrub pa'i chos la ri bong gi /
cal sgrog grags rjes 'brangs na shin tu blun / /
de phyir dug 'dres zas can dam tshig nyams / /
bdag po kun rin pa dang snang sog gong gsum lha bu /
bum stong gcig nas gcig 'byo'i rnam par thar / /
karma mi bskyong pa /
brag stod lha dbang grags pa /
rtag brtan kun dga' snying po lta bu /
dbang 'khrid gzu lums 'chal spyod brgyud pa rnams / /
dwags brgyud phyogs la shin tu mod cing rang gzhan kun la mtha' ma bkag bar snang ngo /
gser dang ra gan ji bzhin so sor phye / /
sna tshogs theg pa'i go la sgang gshongs su / /
'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i dus sbyor 'phyug med par / /
yon tan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba'i 'od / /
bdag blo thar pa'i snang ba gcig tu dkar / /
rang rgyud khyab 'jug rkang pa sdig pa'i dris / /
nyer spags zhabs su bsil byed smin grol chu / /
ma nub mkhas grub tshangs pa'i ral klung nas / /
legs 'ongs sems kyi lam gsum 'bab 'di mtshar / /
las nyon shes sgrib 'khyil ba'i klong mkhar can / /
'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas las bsgral te / /
kun mkhyen yid bzhin nor 'dren ded dpon bshes / /
ma nor rang tshul 'di la /
@# / /
gcig tu mgu / /
gal chung chos su byed pa bdag 'dra la / /
gang thob rgyud la longs pa'i nyams len mthu / /
ches cher phra yang mang thos phan yon tshogs / /
thub gsung dgongs 'grel bcas phar bgrang yas gsungs / /
thos dang bsam pa'i me tog bcud kyi ro / /
blo gsal rkang pa drug pa'i khyus myangs pa'i / /
legs bshad sbrang rtsi thub bstan gzhon nu yis / /
btungs pas phan bde'i lang tsho gcig tu rgyas / /
de lta'i ngo mtshar mu tig 'phreng / /
mgrin par 'chang bas dal 'byor rten / /
don ldan dkyus ring mig zur mdangs / /
'di phyi gtan mdun 'gugs pa bzhin / /
ma pham mgon gyi gsung rab rab brgyan las bsngags gnas lnga rig /
rig pas tshig don ma lus lus pa med spyod blo gros gsal / /
gsal mdzad mkhas las deng dus dus kyis rmongs pa brin pa'i tshul / /
tshul ldan rnams kyis brtags tshe tshe 'di'i lto rgyab shugs kyis nongs / /
sems kyi khye'u dug gsum rjes rgyug thob thob mang dang gsan rgya can / /
phra zhib lta zhog grangs tsam med kyang nges nges lta bur dpe kun bklag /
rnam dag rgyun dang brgyud pa dang bral rang rang rigs mthun mgo bo bskor / /
mi gtsang dri la sbrang bu ji bzhin thibs thibs skal med tshogs rnams 'khor / /
yang yang bsams kyin sngon byon mkhas grub rtogs brjod brjod pa don dang ldan pas yid phrogs te / /
ngal ngal thos bsam sgom par byas pa mngon mtho mtho ris rtsa bar nges nas brtson pa yis / /
dka' dka'i gnas la 'jigs pa spangs te rang blo blo gros spobs mthor bteg nas legs dpyad de / /
mang mang tshig don brgyud par bcas kun phra zhib zhib mos gtan la phab 'di skal bzang dpyid / /
de phyir nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam 'gro kun phan dang bde ba'i lam po cher sbyor rtsi sman ljon pa che / /
sangs rgyas kun gyis snying stobs mchog la phul du byung bsngags pas gtsang sras kyi bstan pa dri ma med / /
lhar bcas skye rgu'i legs byas rgya mtsho'i mchod sdong dam par srid mthar gnas rgyur 'gyur snyam lhag bsam gyis / /
phongs pas nor bzhin 'bad pas bsgrubs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi thob yig gang+gA'i chu rgyun deng 'dir 'bab / /
phyi nang grub mtha' rgya mtsho'i gzhung lugs rtogs par dka' ba sgra tshad bzo gso nang don rig pa'i khog 'bub pa / /
legs bshad bye ba'i gter gyi bang mdzod sngon med nyi ma'i dngos brgya 'dzin pa snang ba dam pa'i dpal 'bar ba / /
'dzam gling yangs pa'i legs bris lam du 'char nub spangs pa'i dam bca' can de nam yang mi 'gog nyer shar bas / /
gzur gnas blo ldan snying gi 'dab brgya rnam par bzhad do dpyod ldan tshogs rnams rna ba'i dbang po blags te nyon / /
ces shis pa brjod pa'i tshig gis sdun bsus te /
ji skad du slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis /
bde gshegs lam brten 'gro ba 'dren par chas gyur cing / /
sems kyi stobs chen mi yis rnyed pa gang yin pa / /
lam de lha dang klu yis rnyed min lha min dang / /
mkha' lding rigs 'dzin mi'am ci dang lto 'phyes min / /
zhes gsungs pa ltar theg pa chen po'i lam la @# / /
brten nas mkha' mnyam gyi 'gro ba rnams bla na med pa byang chub kyi sar 'dren par nus pa'i lhag bsam rnam dag gis drangs ba'i smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems khyad par can dal 'byor gyi rten la bskyed pa de tsam 'gro ba gzhan dag gis mi rnyed cing der ma zad 'khor ba 'dir bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i zhi ba'i go 'phang ba sgrub pa'i rten gyi gtso bo'ang dal 'byor gyi lus yin pas na /
zhi ba lhas /
'di 'dra'i dal ba rnyed gyur nas / /
bdag gis dge goms ma byas pa / /
'di las bslus pa gzhan med de / /
'di las rmongs pa gzhan med do / /
zhes pa ltar shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i dal 'byor gyi rten khyad par can thob pa'i dus don du gnyer bya ni thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang yin zhing /
de yang pa shes springs las /
mgo 'am gos la glo bur me shor na / /
de dag phyir zlog bgyi ba btang nas kyang / /
yang srid med par bgyi slad 'bad 'tshal te / /
'di bas ches mchog dgos pa gzhan ma mchis / /
zhes 'di dang phyi ma'i bde 'bras cam sgrub pa'i zhar byung du mi byed par ma zad zhi ba bsgrub pa'i gegs su gyur pa'i gnas skabs kyi bde ba'i thabs kyang yal bar dor nas brtsen pa chen pos bsgrub dgos par gsungs shing /
de ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs ni /
tshul khrims dag dang shes rab bsam gtan gyis / /
ma ngan 'das zhi dul ba dri med pa'i / /
go 'phang mi rga mi 'chi zad mi 'tshal / /
sa chu me rlang nyi zla bral thob mdzod / /
ces lam bslab pa gsum la brten nas sgrub dgos shing /
de sgrub pa la'ang /
mgon po byams pas /
'di na dang por thos la brten nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa 'byung / /
chul bzhin yid la byed las yang dag don yul ye shes 'byung / /
zhes thos bsam sgom gsum gcig la gcig brten gyi go rim ma nor ba rgyu 'bras kyi tshul du gsungs pas /
mdon rtogs rgyan las /
nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i / /
lam dang sgom pa'i lam gnyis la / /
yang dang yang du sems pa dang / /
'jal dang nges rtogs sgom pa'i lam / /
zhes mngon sum du rtogs pa'i sgom byung gi lam rnams rgyud la skye ba la don yang nas yang du 'jal ba'i bsam byung gi dpyad sgom sngon du 'gro dgos shing /
tshul bzhin bsam par byed pa la de'i don ston pa'i bka' bstan bcos sogs gtsug lag rnams mang po thos dgos pas /
mkhas mchog dpa' bos /
gang zhig thos pas yid nyid dad gyur nas / /
legs par dga' la brten pa nyid du 'gyur / /
shes rab skye zhing gti mug med par 'gyur / /
rang gis shes kyang de ni nyo bar rigs / /
thos pa gti mug mun sel sgron me yin / /
rkun po la sogs mi 'khyer nor gyi mchog /
kun tu rmongs pa'i dgra 'joms mtshon cha yin / /
thabs tshul man ngag skyon pas grogs kyi mchog /
phongs par gyur kyang mi 'gyur mdza' bo yin / /
gnod pa med pa mya ngan nad kyi sman / /
nyis pa chen po'i dpung 'joms dpung gi mchog /
grags dang dpal gyi gter gyi mchog kyang yin / /
ya rabs @# / /
rnams dang 'phrad na skyes kyi mchog /
tshogs kyi nang na mkhas pa mgu bar 'gyur / /
zhes pa ltar dang por thos dgos shing /
de yang thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen pos /
bstan pa thams cad 'gal med rtogs pa dang / /
gsung rab ma lus gdams par shar ba dang / /
rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bde blag rnyed pa dang / /
nyes spyod chen po'i g.yang sa las kyang bsrung / /
zhes thub pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab thams cad 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi gtso bo dang yan lag tu 'gyur ba sha stag yin pas theg pa 'di dag blang bya dang 'di dag dor bya zhes ris su ma bcad par byang chub sgrub pa'i gogs su shes dgos shing /
chos la brten nas bsags pa'i sdig pa ni sdig pa gzhan las ches khyad par 'phags pas /
ting 'dzin rgyal po las /
gang gi 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir ni / /
mchod rten thams cad bshig byed la / /
gang gis mdo sde spong byed pa'i / /
sdig pa de ni ches khyad 'phags / /
zhes dang /
mkhas pa'i dbang po ye bzang rtse pas sgrol ma pa sangs rgyas rin cen la chos gsan tshul gyi mjug tu chos spong ba'i sgrib pas ma sbags pa tsam mo / /
zhes drin du bzo bar mdzad pa'ang tshul de 'dra la dgongs par snang ngo / /
der ma zad byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don bsgrub par rig pa'i dbang phyug gis /
brtse ldan sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir / /
thabs rnams la ni mngon sbyor mdzad / /
zabs byung de rgyu lkog gyur pas / /
de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin / /
zhes rang la lkog tu gyur nas gzhan la ston par mi nus pa'i phyir /
rgyal tshab ma pham pas rigs can gsum rjes su 'dzin par theg pa gsum gyi lam shes dgos par gsungs pa ltar yin la /
theg pa gsum gyi lam shes pa tsam gyis chog gam snyam na /
spyod 'jug las /
rgyal sras rnams kyis mi slob pa'i / /
dngos de 'ga' yang yod ma yin / /
de ltar gnas pa'i mkhas pa la / /
bsod nams mi 'gyur gang yang med / /
ces dang /
'jam mgon sa skya paN+Di tas /
rang blo shes bya kun la ma sbyangs na / /
thams cad mkhyen pa nam mkha'i mtha' ltar ring / /
de ltar dgongs nas rgyal dang de sras kyis / /
shes bya'i gnas kun sbyangs zhes legs par gsungs / /
zhes bya ltar shes bya'i gnas mtha' dag la bslab par gsungs pa'i mtha' dang tshad gzhal ba'i sbyod yul du gyur dka' na'ang /
mgon po byams pas /
rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la brtson par ma byas na / /
'phags mchog ci sems thams cad mkhyen nyid thob mi 'gyur / /
de lta bas na gzhan dag tshar gcad rjes gzung dang / /
bdag nyid kun shes bya phyir de la de brtson bya / /
zhes rig pa'i gnas lngar gsungs pa rgya bod kyi mkhas grub kun la rlung ltar grags shing /
blo dang ldan pa kun gyis thos bsam du bya ba'i gnas yin kyang bdag 'dra'i blo dang brtson pa zhan pa rnams kyis tshul bzhin bsgrub par nus pa'i yul ma yin mod /
'on kyang rig pa nang par 'chi yang slob / /
tshe 'dir mkhas par ma gyur kyang / /
nor la rang nyid dbang ba yi / /
phyi ma bcol po len dang mtshungs / /
zhes pa'i don bzhin rgyal ba'i @# / /
gsung rab la bag chags kyi sa bon bzang po bskrun pa'i ched dang sngon gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen phu chung pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
mi la bzhad pa rdo rje /
lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug la sogs kyis mtshon pa'i skyes chen 'di snang chos brgyad kyi zlos gar mtha' dag sgyu ma mkhan la rdel shing rta glang du snang ba ltar gzigs nas sgrub pa snying por mdzad pas tshe gcig la rdo rje'i sku mngon du gyur pa lta bu'i rnam par thar pa ni dus dbang gis mkhyen dpyod dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang 'dzin pa'i skal ba ches cher phra na bdag 'drar de lta bu'i re ba tsam yang ma mchis rung /
cung zad rang gis nyams su len pa dang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i go yul tsam la'ang thos bsam zhig ma byas tshe /
deng sang la la dag che ge mo dag gi skye ba dang sprul pa yin pas bslab sbyang bya mi dgos pa /
ma bslabs par rang shugs kyis mkhyen pa /
bla mas slob ma'i snying gar mdzub mo btsugs te da lta slob mi dgos ma 'ongs pa na chos thams cad rang rdol du 'byung bar lung bstan pa la brten nas byung ba /
slob dpon sogs ma bsten par rang nyid kyis dpe tsam la brten nas don khong du chud pa /
tshe 'dir ma thob kyang skye ba gzhan du thob pas 'chad nyan bya rung ba sogs mtha' klas pa zhig snang ba /
ma bslabs pa la mkhas gyur na / /
rgyu 'bras bden pa ga la srid / /
ces pa ltar ma bslabs par shes pa ni rgyu 'bras mi bslu bas bden par mi sems shing /
dpe tsam la brten nas khong du chud pa 'byung du srid kyang /
bstan pa 'di la 'o skol gyi ston pa nyid ma gtogs bla ma dang slob dpon sogs med par rang byung gi sangs rgyas 'byung bar ma bshad cing brgyud pa med pas rang gzhan gang la'ang phan par mi 'gyur la /
so thar gyi sdom rgyun ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams tshe rabs sngon mar thob pa skye ba 'di'i tshe stod la byas pa tshe smad la dran pa bzhin gsal bar yod na nyes pa mi 'byung rung /
shes bya lkog tu gyur pa de 'dra slob ma dad pa can gyis bla ma zog por gtong ba'i lo rgyus su 'dug pas tshul de dag rnams la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur pas /
bshes springs las /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten ba tshangs par spyod / /
yongs su rdzogs par thub pas gsungs de'i phyir / /
skyes bu dam pa bsten bgyi rgyal ba la / /
brten nas rab tu mang pos zhi ba thob / /
ces pa ltar bshes gnyen bsten pa legs byas kyi rtsa bar mthong ste rang nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal ring du dor /
'jig rten blun po'i ngor stobs 'byor dang go sa sogs la brten nas 'phrin las chen por grags pa'i ri bong cal rgyug kho na'i rjes su ma 'brangs par rig pa'i gnas gang dang gang la goms 'dris dang khungs btsun mi btsun sogs dpyad pa gsum gyis gtan la phab nas /
yid ches kyi gnas su gyur pa'i slob dpon 'ga' zhig mnyes pa gsum gyi sgo nas legs par bsten te tshe 'dir thos bsam cung zad bgyis pa rang nyid brjed ngas kyi 'jigs pa spang zhing dpyod ldan rnams kyi mig rkyan dang bstan pa rin po che'i rgyun la bsams pa'i yi ge'i @# / /
'phreng bar bkod pa la /
bstan par 'jug pa'i sgo so so thar pa'i sdom rgyun /
zhugs nas thos bsam bya ba gnas lnga rig pa'i skor dang gnyis /
dang po ni /
rang lo dgur slebs pa bstod 'grel ba'i lugs ltar 'phags yul ba'i skad du ke na d+ha ste khro bor 'bod cing rgya nag pa'i skad du yi tshi'u zhes pa shing mo glang gi lo nyin mor byed pa nya'i khyim du sbyod pa dbo zla ba'i dkar cha'i rgyal ba gsum pa'i nyin 'phags yul gyi d+ha n+ya ga Ta ka gnyis par gangs kyi ra bas bskor ba'i ljongs 'dir yongs su grags pa'i chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling bka' 'gyur ro cog gi tshal chen po'i gzims khang dga' ldan pho brang gi gzims chung mngon dgar /
bod dang bod chen po byang phyogs hor gyi yul gru sogs kyi dregs ldan rnams kyi ral bar zhabs sen zla ba gsar du tshes shing /
sde snod gsum 'dzin pa mkhas pa gsal ba rig pa dang lhag pa'i bslab pa gsum gyi thugs rgyud yongs su gang ba mi 'phrog pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje chen po'i mnga' bdag gnas brtan 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po dpal ldan bla ma dam pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mkhan po /
gsung rab rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pas sa'i steng na mkhas pa thams cad kyis 'gran pa'i zla dang bral ba 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu dur smrig gi gar gyis brtsen pa rje btsun dkon cog chos 'phel gyis las kyi slob dpon /
rab 'byams smra ba'i bshes gnyen gnas brtan 'dul ba 'dzin bsgo mar slob dpon sangs rgyas bkra shis pas grib tshod pa mdzad de bstan pa'i rtsa ba so so thar pa dge bsnyen dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa legs par nos /
rang lo nyer gnyis pa 'bru mang zhes pas pho stag gi lo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i dbang pos chos kyi rgyal po zla ba bzang por dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rgyud gsungs pa'i dus chen chu shel gyi dbang po nag pa'i dga' ma dang rtse ba'i dkar cha'i tshes lnga dbyangs o /
res gza' nyi ma zla skar snar ma 'dzom pa'i mchan mo'i cha rgyu skar shar ba'i dus su bod yul gyi rdo rje gdan lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por ston pa nyi ma'i gnyen dang dbyer ma mchis pa lta bu'i zhal skyin shAkya mu ni'i drung du /
tshigs snga ma dge tshul gyi mkhan po dod gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mkhan po dang gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon sbrags /
'jam dbyangs bla ma dkon cog chos 'phel gyis las kyi slob dpon /
byes pa zhal snga nas byams pa smon lam gyis grib tshod pa /
chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi grwa tshang bdun dang ser theg chen gling gi grwa tshang gsum gyi slob dpon lung sde snod gsum la rab tu sbyangs shing mngon rtegs bslab pa gsum gyis thugs rgyud yongs su gtams pa'i gnas brtan 'dul ba 'dzin pa bcu phrag gcig gis las kyi kha skong mdzad da bstan pa la zhugs la yongs su rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
yang dag par rdzogs @# / /
pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge /
'phags mchog shA ri'i bu /
sras sgra gcan 'dzin /
bram ze sgra gcan 'dzin /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon lags ldan 'byed /
dpal sbas /
ye shes snying po /
mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho /
sba rat+na /
dmar shAkya mu ni /
g.yor dge 'byung /
bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal /
spa gong ye shes g.yung drung /
grub pa ye shes rgyal mtshan /
klu mes tshul khrims shes rab /
gzus rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sne po grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'bre shes rab 'bar /
bya brtson 'grus 'bar /
mkhan po gzhon nu seng ge /
gro bdud rtsi grags /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
mkhan po grags pa shes rab /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
gro ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
dbang ston grub pa shes rab /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
gnas rnying chos rje kun dga' bde legs /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
dga' ldan khri rin po che bde ba can pa dge legs dpal bzang /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
paN chen dam chos yar 'phel /
mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
des bdag ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho la bka' drin du stsal to / /
bla chen brgyud dang paN chen brgyud gnyis kar sras sgra gcan 'dzin rang bram ze sgra gcan 'dzin gyi bar du bla ma gzhan mi 'dug pa /
de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang bcu na mi rung ba'i gzhi bcu sun dbyung ba'i bka' bsdu bar pa'i tshe thams cad 'dod dang nor can sogs kun dga' bo'i slob ma sha stag gi dgra bcom pa bdun brgya 'dus pa las sras sgra gcan 'dzin sogs dngos su bzhugs par ma bshad /
bka' bsdu bar pa nas lo nyis brgya skor na rab tu byung ba'i mtshan bram ze sgra gcan 'dzin spyod pa la gshegs nas sa ra har grags pa byon par chos 'byung mang po las bshad bas dus mi mtshungs pa'i dbang gis bar der mkhan po gcig gnyis shig chad pa 'dra /
theg pa chen po'i skabs sprul pa bstan pa dang 'ja' lus rnyed nas rjes su bzung pa sogs bshad kyang 'dul ba'i lugs la lus tha mal du gnas pa sogs nges par dgos pas dag snang dang ye shes kyi sku mjal bskad du byas na so thar gyi rang skad la chu bun gyis chos rgyag par 'dug pas mkhyen ldan rnams kyis dpyod cig /
karma pa rang byung rdo rje'i do ha'i lo rgyus su sras sgra gcan 'dzin la theg chen dpal gyi grags pas bsnyen par rdzogs /
de la sa ra has bsnyen par rdzogs par gsung ba rang byung zhabs mkhas grub chen po yin pas khungs dang 'brel ba zhig yin nam snyam gang ltar dpyad par bya'o / /
paN chen dam chos yar 'phel gyis thog mar shangs ston blo gras legs bzang la bsnyen par rdzogs /
des spos khang tshogs su bsnyen par rdzogs pa paN chen brgyud yin zhing slar thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho sog yul du thegs khar bskyar nas bsgrubs par brten so so'i blo dang mthun pa'i brgyad pa gnyis ka 'dren pa snang yang bskyar sgrub kyi dus sdom gsum rim gyis nos na dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa thob pa dang lhan du sngon ma @# / /
gtong bas paN chen brgyud kyi dogs pa'ang med /
la la skal ba bzang bzang yin zer bsnyen rdzogs khe rkyang las mi sgrub pa'i rigs yong gi 'dug pa sdom pa sngon ma ma btang bar phyi ma mi skye bas bla chen brgyud 'ong don med cing /
'di skor gyi mdzad tshul lo rgyus zhib pa mi 'dug pas brgyud pa gang yin the tshom gyi gzhir snang yang 'dir phyi ma btsan pa'i dbang du byas nas bgrangs kyi gang ltar byang sems dang sngags sdom ltar brgyud pa mang po chu bo gnyis 'dres su byed pa dpe 'dir bkab na so thar gzugs can gyi sdem pa yin pas 'dul ba'i chos skad 'jig pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro / /
'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po 'phags pa dge 'dun 'bangs kyi slob ma dgra bcom pa sa ga lhas mdzad pa'i 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod bar smra ba'i 'dul ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa me tog 'phreng rgyud kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI dang khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'i lung gi brgyud pa ni /
thub dbang /
'od srungs chen po /
kun dga' bo /
sha na'i gos can /
nyer sbas /
d+hi d+hi ka /
nag po pa /
legs mthong /
dge 'dun 'bangs /
'phags pas ga lha /
slob dpon ma ti rat+na /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI /
gnubs la tsA ba byams pa'i dpal /
seng ge zil gnon /
rin cen bsod nams seng ge /
'um phug gnas rnying pa kun dga' dbang phyug /
mkhan chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
dka' bzhi pa shes rab seng ge /
dka' bzhi pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon dge ba dpal /
mkhas btsun skal bzang pa /
mkhan chen grub pa shes rab /
'jam dbyangs chos rje /
chos rje kun dga' dbang phyug /
slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal grub /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba mdo rtsa klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
nye ba 'khor /
'od srungs /
kun dga' bo /
sha na'i gos can /
nyer sbas /
d+hi d+hi ka /
nag po pa /
legs mthong /
phyir 'ong blos mi 'bebs /
slob dpon yon tan 'ong /
chos kyi bshes gnyen /
shAkya 'od /
seng ge'i gdong can /
kha che dzi na mi tra /
dA na shI la /
g.yo dge 'byung /
bla chen mu thur ba dgongs bar ba gsal /
klu mes tshul khrims byang chub /
gzus rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sog tshul khrims bla ma /
ko khyim pa ye shes bla ma /
nyang 'tsham pa rin cen bla ma /
de gsum ga la rgya 'dul ba dbang phyug tshul khrims /
de nas rma tsho byang chub rdo rje /
bya 'dul brtson 'grus 'bar /
chos kyi dbang phyug /
chos kyi byang chub /
chos kyi brtson 'grus /
chos grags /
rin cen dpal bzang /
rin po che bsod nams grags pa /
kun mkhyen bu ston rin can grub /
dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen /
chos rje gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
slob dpon don grub shes rab /
bla ma lha mchog seng ge /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
paN chen thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang man gong dang 'dra / /
! @# / /
slob dpon shA kya 'od kyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba sum brgya ba dang /
de'i 'grel pa 'od ldan gyi brgyud ba ni /
slob dpon yon tan 'od /
chos kyi bshes gnyen /
shAkya 'od /
seng gdong can /
d+harma phal /
zhang zhung pa rgyal ba'i shes rab /
rab 'byor shes rab /
byang chub shes rab /
byang chub seng ge /
rdo rje seng ge /
smad g.yung drung /
rtsi 'dul thugs rje byang chub /
bde ba can ba shAkya byang chub /
zul phu ba yon tan grags /
slob dpon bsod blo /
slob dpon dka' bcu pa /
mkhan chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen grub bshes rab /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho man 'dra /
! thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i rab tu byung ba dang zhar byung khyim pa la phan gdags pa'i 'dul ba'i lag len gyi cho ga dri ma med pa'i 'phreng ba'i lung nos pa'i dpon bsod nams dpal grub /
mkhas pa nor bzar rin cen /
dka' bzhi dpon bsod nams dpal grub /
mkhas pa nor bzar? rin cen /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
'jig rten gyi mig gcig bu zha lu lo tsA ba rin cen chos skyong bzang po /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa 'jam dpal rdo rje /
der chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje shes rab rgyal mtshan /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! des mdzad pa'i dus go blo gsal dga' ba'i mdzes rgyan dang yar 'brog mtsho mo che'i gru nang du mdzad ba gnyis kyi lung brgyud ni /
dga' bzhi ba rin cen rgyal mtshan yan gong ltar la /
de nas rje btsun mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje /
drung ba kun dga' bkra shis /
ri lding slob dpon dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gzhi gsum gyi cho ga'i lung mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan par zhus /
brgyud pa ma byung /
'dul 'dzin pas mdzad pa'i dge slong dang dge tshul gyi bslab bya'i lung khri rin po che dkon cog chos 'phel la zhus /
grub chen phag smyon la gsan gsung /
de yan gyi brgyud pa ma byung / /
! gnyis pa zhugs nas thos bsam bya ba gnas lnga rig pa la /
thun mong ba'i rig pa'i gnas dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rig pa'i gnas te gnyis /
dang po la /
log smra tshar gcod pa sgra dang gtan tshigs rig pa /
gzhan dag rjes su 'dzin pa bzo dang gso ba rig pa gnyis /
dang po la sgra tshad gnyis /
dang po la dngos dang zhar byung rig gnas chung ba dang gnyis /
dang po sgra la /
slob dpon dbang phyug go cha la lha gzhon nu gdong drug gis gsungs pa'i legs sbyar gyi bstan bcos ka lA pa byA ka ra Na'i 'grel ba 'jig rten gyi mig gcig bu thams cad mkhyen pa zha lu lo tsA ba rin cen chos skyong bzang pos mdzad pa'i bshad sbyar gzhung don gsal ba la /
bsdus don /
mtha' dpyod /
gzhung 'bebs /
dka' ba'i gnas de bzhis brgyan pa'i @# / /
'grel pa lnga sbrags kyi lugs su legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'jig rten gyi mes po tshangs ba /
lha thams cad mkhyen ba /
lha'i dbang po brgya byin /
drang srong phur bu /
gzhon nu gdong drug / /
slob dpon dbang phyug go cha /
rgyal po bde spyod bzang po /
jo bo grags 'byor /
mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mi /
slob dpon d+harma dA sa /
mkhas pa rat+na ma ti /
paN chen pur+Na tsan+d+ra /
slob dpon 'chi med seng ge /
paN chen lak+Sh+mi kA ra /
'jig rten mig gcig shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
shong lo blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros dpung rgyan mdzes pa'i tog /
dbang lo thams cad mkhyen pa blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
sgra bsgyur nam mkha' bzang po /
skad gnyis smra ba thugs rje dpal zhabs /
lo chen lags pa rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa chos skyong bzang po /
skyogs ston karma lo tsA ba rin can bkra? shis blo gros ngo mtshar bye ba'i gter mdzod /
dpal khang lo tsA ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde /
sgang? ra lo tsA ba 'ong zer rgyal mtshan /
smon 'gro paN chen rig gnas rgya mtsho ba tshe dbang don grub /
de sras gnas lnga rig pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na lo chen thugs rje dpal nas /
dpal sdings skad gnyis smra ba grags pa'i mtshan can /
zha lu lo chen man 'dra /
yang na thugs rje dpal nas /
stag chang lo tsA ba shes rab rin can /
zha lu lo chen man 'dra /
yang na paN chen tshe dbang don grub nas /
dam ring mkhan po mang yul lo chen tshe brtan rgyal mtshan /
des bdag la'o / /
'di bsdus don dang gzhung 'bebs gtso bor sbyar ba'i brgyud pa yin la /
mtha' dpyod gtso bor sbyar ba'i brgyud pa ni /
zha lu lo chen nas /
dbon pad dkar chos skyong /
'brug pa lo tsA ba sbyang mo ngag dbang grags pa /
lo chen dbang phyug zhabs /
shong ston sprul pa'i zlos gar sangs rgyas dpal ba dang /
smon 'gro paN chen tshe dbang don grub man 'dra /
sgra mdo 'di'i rtsa ba'i 'byung khungs ni in+d+ra byA ka ra Na gtso che bas /
kun shes las /
brgya byin gyis byas en+d+ra byA ka ra / /
de la drang srong phur bus legs sbyangs pas / /
shin tu sbyangs pa'i nga rgyal mchog tu gyur / /
ces 'byung bas so / /
rgya gar shar phyogs b+haM ga lar 'khrungs pa'i slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi zhes gnas lnga rig pa mkhyen pa des mdzad pa'i lags par sbyar ba'i bstan bcos tsan+d+ra byA ka ra Na'i 'grel pa lo chen chos skyong bzang pos mdzad ba'i brda sprod rgya mtsho'i gru gzings kyi steng nas legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs /
lha phyag na padma /
lha thams cad mkhyen pa /
bram ze pA Ni /
ngo bo grags 'byor /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra go mi /
'grel byed d+harma dA sa /
mkhas pa rin cen blo gros /
paN chen pur+N+Na tsan+d+ra /
slob dpon 'chi med seng ge /
slob dpon rab 'byor zla ba /
paN chen lak+Sh+mI kA ra /
shong lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
'phags yul blo brtan gnyis pa shong blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen mchog ldan pa /
dpang lo chen po /
lo chen byang rtse /
sgra bsgyur nam mkha' bzang po /
skad gnyis smra ba thugs rje dpal /
dpal sdings lo chen grags pa'i mtshan can /
lo chen rin cen chos skyong bzang po /
dbon lo tsA @# / /
ba pad dkar chos skyong /
spyang mo lo tsA ba ngag dbang grags pa /
lo chen dbang phyug /
lo chen sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
rig gnas rgya mtsho pa smon 'gro tshe dbang don grub /
mkhan chen lo tsA ba tshe brtan rgyal mtshan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na lo chen dbang phyug pa nas /
byar po lo chen shes rab dpal bzang /
khro phu dus zhabs pa dpal rgyas dbang po /
smon 'gro paN chen 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
sgra mdo 'di'i rtsa ba pA Ni byA ka ra Na yin pas /
kun shes las /
de las tsan+d+ra go mis bsdus pa yi / /
gzhung la tsan+d+ra par grags chos 'bangs kyis / /
byas pa'i 'grel pa dang bcas bod du 'gyur / /
zhes so / /
yi ge'i skor rnams rnam pa gcig tu bzo rig pa'i khongs su bsdu rung ba zhig 'dug na'ang 'grel pa rnams bod kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos yin pas chos kyi rgyal po srong btsan sgam pos 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi rnam par sprul pa thu mi sam+b+ho Ta rgya gar du brdzangs te paN+di ta lha rig pa dang bram ze li byin sogs bsten nas legs sbyar gyi brda sprod la mkhas par gyur pas rgya yig lnga bcu bod yi gsum cu'i gtan la phab ste bstan bcos chen po brgyad mdzad pa'i nang tshan sum cu ba dang rtags 'jug gnyis kyi 'grel pa thams cad mkhyen pa chos skyong bzang pos mdzad pa'i steng nas legs par nos pa'i brgyad pa ni /
bram ze li byin /
thu mi sa m+b+ho Ta nas rim par /
thams cad mkhyen pa chos skyong bzang po /
skyogs ston karma lo tsA /
dpal khang lo tsA ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde /
sgang ra lo tsA ba 'od zer rgyal mtshan /
paN+Di ta chen po smon 'gro tshe dbang don grub /
de sras 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o /
yang na paN chen tshe dbang don grub nas /
mang yul lo tsA ba tshe brtan rgyal mtshan /
des bdag la'o / /
gnyis pa zhar byung rig gnas chung ba la /
'phags yul gyi snyan ngag mkhan kun gyi gcug gi nor bu slob dpon paN+Di'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i snyan dngags me long lam rnam dbye sgra rgyan don rgyan dang bcas pa'i dka' gnad kyi bshad pa rtsom rgyugs dang bcas shin tu zhib par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ngag gi dbang phyug lha mo dbyangs can ma /
paN chen kIrti b+hU ti /
paN+Di ta chen po dbyug pa can /
paN chen pur+Na tsan+d+ra /
dpal ldan 'chi med seng ga /
slob dpon rab 'byor zla ba /
paN chen phun tshogs byed pa /
shong ston chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
gcung blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
'jig rten mig gcig dpang lo chen po /
smra ba'i nyi ma byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /
mkhas pa shes rab dpal /
lo chen thugs rje dpal /
mkhas mchog sangs rgyas mtshan can /
mang thos legs pa rgyal mtshan /
lo chen chos skyong bzang po /
lo chen pad dkar chos skyong /
grangs chen lo tsA ba 'jam dpal rdo rje /
smon 'gro paN chen rig gnas rgya mtsho pa tshe dbang don grub /
mkhas pa'i dbang po 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na zha lu lo tsA ba nas /
karma lo tsA ba rin cen bkra shis /
dpal khang lo tsA ba mang thos chos kyi rgya mtsho /
sgang ra lo tsA ba 'od zer rgyal @# / /
mtshan /
smon 'gro paN chen man 'dra /
le'u gnyis pa don rgyan gyi bshad pa rags bsdus dang rtsom rgyugs kyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
pad dkar chos skyong nas /
spyang mo lo tsA ba /
lo chen dbang phyug /
lo chen sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
zhang mkhar paN chen 'jam dpal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
mkhas rlom la la mkhas mchog dpa' bos na len+d+ra'i kun dga' ra ba'i sgo 'gram du dbyug pa thogs te dge 'dun rnams re re nas bgrangs pa sogs kyi rgyu mtshan la brten nas slob dpon dbyug pa can dang gcig par 'dod pa ni mi rigs te /
lam rnam dbyer /
de dag dbya ba snyan ngag mkhan / /
so so la gnas brjod mi nus / /
zhes pa'i 'grel pa rnams su nag mo'i khol po dpa' bo sogs pa grangs pa mang zhing /
snar thang lo chen saM g+ha shIs /
daN+Di'i bstan bcos dri ma med / /
ji bzhin 'byed la dpa' bo dang / /
skal mnyam blo gros mig thob pa / /
ma nor lam 'di bdag gis bshad / /
ces pas kyang shes nus so / /
snyan ngag mkhan kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu chos gyi rgyal po dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam 'khri shing yal 'dab brgya dang bdun /
de'i kha skong le'u gcig sas zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i yal 'dab brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i lung rkyang gi brgyud pa ni /
chos rgyal dge ba'i dbang po /
sras zla ba'i dbang po /
paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mI kA ra /
shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
gcung blo gros brtan pa /
dbon po chos skyong dpal /
dbang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bo dong paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
stag lung zhabs drung gang dbang grags pa /
'di dbyangs can mas rjes su bzung bar grags /
kun spangs rnam rgyal grags pa /
'bum rab 'byams pa rin cen chos dbang /
rab 'byams chos rje tshul khrims dbang phyug /
dpal khang lo tsA ba mang thos chos kyi rgya mtsho /
mdo khams da yon tan rgya mtsho /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen pa'i rtse mo /
mkhyen brtse chen mo'i dbon po yon? tshe dbang kun mkhyen yang zer /
kun bzang rtse pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
gong dkar drung yig ri grong pa /
g.yu lo bkod pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
zur 'chad ba? /
dpal 'byor gling pa ngan dbang rnam rgyal / /
'phyir ru thod dkar ba /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na dpal khang lo tsA ba nas /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen pa'i rtse mo man gong ltar ro / /
'di'i dpa' ba'i gnad rnams zhib bshad du nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
gcung blo gros brtan pa nas /
lo mchog pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa dpang lo /
lo chen byang rtse /
lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /
lo chen shes rab dpal /
lo chen thugs rje dpal /
mkhas mchog bud+d+ha'i mtshan can /
gnas brtan legs pa rgyal mtshan /
lo chen chos skyong bzang po /
dbon pad dkar chos skyong /
grangs chen lo tsA ba 'jam dpal rdo rje /
smon 'gro paN chen rig gnas m+r+g+ya mtsho'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa tshe dbang don grub /
@# / /
rigs chos kyi sras mkhas mchog 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la stsal to / /
! slob dpon chen po 'chi med seng ges mdzad pa'i mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos a mar ko Sha dang de'i rgya cher 'grel paN+Di ta rab 'byor zla bas mdzad pa'i 'dod pa 'jo ba /
gzhan yang mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal ba /
sa paN gyi tshig gter sogs rgya bod kyi mkhas pa rnams kyi yi ge la brten nas dka' ba'i gnad rnams legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
paN chen mchi med seng ge /
slob dpon rab 'byor zla ba /
mkhas pa phun tshogs byed pa /
shong lo mched gnyis /
lo mchog pa /
dpang lo chen po /
lo chen byang rtse /
lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /
sgra bsgyur thugs rje dpal /
mang thos legs pa rgyal mtshan /
zha lu lo tsA ba chen po /
skyogs ston karma lo tsA ba /
dpal khang pa dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde /
de la sgang ra ba 'od zer rgyal mtshan dang grangs chen 'jam dpal rdo rje gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la paN chen tshe dbang don grub /
de nas sras 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
rtsod dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas kyi br-it+ta dzA ti ngo mtshar rtogs byed dang bcas pa nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
paN+Di ta chen po rin chen 'byung gnas /
paN chen sa dbang bzang po /
shong lo mched gnyis /
mchog ldan pa /
dpang lo chen po /
lo chen byang rtse /
lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /
skad gnyis smra ba thugs rje dpal /
dpal sdings lo chen grags pa'i mtshan can /
'gos lo gsum pa chos skyong bzang po /
skyogs ston karma lo tsA ba /
dpal khang lo tsA ba /
sgang lo 'od zer rgyal mtshan /
shes bya kun rig smon 'gro tshe dbang don grub /
de sras paN chen 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na zha lu lo chen nas /
lo chen pad dkar chos skyong /
grangs chen 'jam dpal rdo rje /
smon 'gro paN chen man 'dra /
yang na smon 'gro paN chen tshe dbang don grub nas /
stag lung dbu ma lo tsA ba su bud+d+hi /
des bdag la'o / /
zlos gar gyi bstan bcos skad rigs kyi dbang gis bod du 'jug chung bas grags chung zhing phyogs tsam mtshon pa ni /
gzugs kyi nyi ma'i bstan bcos sogs dang cha 'dra ba snyan ngag mkhan po rnams kyis mdzad srol la don gyis thon pa las zur du nos pa med do / /
dus kyi 'khor lo phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi sgo nas gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyi rol shes pa'i yan lag tu rtsis skor rnams dgos pas dus 'khor gyi cha lag tu bgrangs kyang mi 'thang ba ma yin mod /
mkhas pa la la'i bzhed pa sgra rig pa the ba'i rig gnas chung ba lngar mdzad kyang legs sbyar rig gnas che ba lnga'i khrod du 'dren dgos pas /
dkar rtsis rig gnas chung ba'i ya gyal gcig tu mdzad pa khungs dang 'brel ba nas /
padma dkar po'i zhal lung gi dgongs don gtso bor bzung /
phug pa man ngag lugs kyi phyag len gyis rnam par smras pa'i lnga bsdus /
sgra gcan lo 'pho zla 'pho /
gza' 'dzin /
gza' lnga tshes dang nyin zhag la sbyod pa de @# / /
dag gi myur rtsis /
bdun brgya nyi shur 'khor ba'i nyi ldog 'khor lo /
dus sbyor tat+kA la dang dum bu drug gzhag gsum gyi rnam par dbye ba /
g.yul rgyal gshin rje dpung gnon dang bcas pa nos pa las /
lnga bsdus sgra gcan /
myur rtsis gshin rje dpung gnon rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa chos kyi grags pa /
de la mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtsho dang phug pa lhun grub rgya mtsho gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la mkhas pa chos legs rin cen /
de nas phug nas chos rje dpal mgon 'phrin las /
bde legs gar dbang phun tshogs /
rigs 'dzin chen po gzhon nu don grub /
kun mkhyen chen po chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o /
gza' lnga dus sbyor zhag gsum rnam dbye bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bde legs gar dbang phun tshogs nas /
mkhar grong bsod nams dar rgyas /
mkhar grong chos mdzad /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
phug lugs kyi gza' lnga nyin zhag ma myur rtsis ri mig rgya mtsho /
le'u tho nang ma bzo tshul sogs phug lugs kyi phyag len che phra rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
chos rje 'phrin las pa nas /
mkhas grub dpal gyi seng ge /
mkhas dbang bkra shis mtshan can /
rtsis rig smra ba'i dbang phyug ldum bu don grub dbang rgyal /
des bdag la'o / /
yang lnga bsdus /
sgra gcan /
mkhas grub nor bzang pa'i gza' lnga nyin zhag sogs kyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
phug pa dpal seng pa nas /
sngags 'chang g.yu lo ba /
gnyags b+nan ngar ba bla mkhyen ngag dbang 'jam dpal blo gros /
des bdag la'o / /
gza' lnga tshes spyod la brten pa'i ri mig rgya mtsho'i brgyud pa ni /
chos rje 'phrin las pa nas /
chos rje 'chi med bde ba /
mkhas pa rdo rje'i mtshan can /
dus 'khor rab 'byams pa /
smon 'gro paN chen tshe dbang don grub /
de sras mkhas dbang 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la stsal to / /
yang tshes spyod mgyogs rtsis kyi brgyud lugs gcig dang rgyu mtshan rtsis kyi brgyud pa ni /
paN chen tshe dbang don grub nas /
mang thos gzug po ba gzhon nu skal bzang /
des bdag la'o / /
dpal gtsug na zla bas gsungs pa'i dbyangs 'char gyi rgyud le'u bcu pa'i dgongs 'grel mchog tu dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i lag len 'od zer brgya pa'am rin po che'i 'phreng ba /
lha chen dgongs rgyan /
de dag gi yig phran sna tshogs /
dom nag lce mdung /
shin tu sbas pa nag po'i 'khor lo'i skor sogs kyi phyag len man ngag rdzogs par thob pa'i brgyud ba ni /
thub pa chen po /
lha chen dbang phyug chen po /
dpal rta mgrin mgon po /
de'i sras dpal ldan tshangs lha nA tha /
dpal zla ba kun dga' mgon po /
dpal ut+pal bzang po /
dpal gsang ba'i mtshan can /
dpal yid dam bzang bo /
dpal a b+hi naM gup+ta ran /
dpal shang+ka ra b+ha dra /
dpal phun tshogs 'dzin bzang po /
dpal seng ge go cha /
dpal 'jam dpal dga' byed /
dpal 'od mdzad /
dpal dza ya A nan+da /
glo bo lo tsA ba shes rab rin cen /
bla ma chos rje /
slob dpon rin cen rgyal po /
slob dpon rin cen dbang phyug /
bla ma gzhon nu rin cen /
sngags 'chang lhun grub dpal /
mkhas @# / /
grub chos rje /
mkhas mchog Ar+ya de wa /
mkhas dbang sangs rgyas blo gros /
dus zhabs pa chen po dpal mgon 'phrin las /
dus ram pa 'chi med bde ba /
mkhas pa rdo rje'i mtshan can /
dus 'khor rab 'byams pa /
smon 'gro paN+Di ta rig gnas rgya mtsho pa tshe dbang don grub /
de sras shes bya kun rig 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la stsal to / /
'grel pa mchog tu dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs kyi steng nas dbyangs 'char gyi phyag len yongs su rdzogs pa /
rje 'phrin las pas mdzad pa'i gshin rje dpung gnon gyi thog nas g.yul rgyal gyi skor rnams nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal mgon 'phrin las yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de nas mkhas pa dpal gyi seng ge /
bla mkhyen g.yu lo ba /
gnyags ban ngag dbang 'jam dpal blo gros /
des bdag la'o / /
'phags pa'i yul du nag rtsis kyi tha snyad ma grags kyang bod yul du rtsis skar nag ces grags pa'i zhar byung mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi rgya nag ri bo rtse lngar gsungs pa'i skor la rtsa ba'i rde'u drug /
gcod dral gyi rde'u nyi shu rtsa gcig /

brgyad ma /

bag rtsis /
gshin rtsis /

'phags pa 'jam dpal /
kong tse 'phrul gyi rgyal po /
lo tsA ba khams pa phra mo sogs nas rim par /
khyung nag shAka dar /
phug pa ba mkhas mchog Ar+ya de wa /
mtshungs med sangs rgyas blo gros /
rtsis rig smra ba'i gtsug rgyan dpal mgon 'phrin las /
chos rje bde legs gar dbang phun tshogs /

yang na dpal mgon 'phrin las nas /
