zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
! gnyis pa tshad ma rig pa ni /
mdun legs ma las /
khyad par tshu rol mthong bas dngos po kun / /
de nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i sgo gcig pu / /
yang dag rig pa'i gzhung gi dka' gnad la / /
'bad pa du mas yang nas yang du sbyang / /
zhes dang /
tshad ma'i stobs kyis the tshom mchod na / /
'dam la btab pa'i phyur pa ji bzhin du / /
yang dag bag chags brtan po 'jog mi nus / /
zhes pa ltar rig pa'i dbang phyug chos kyi grags pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma sde bdun du grags pa'i nang nas rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi dgongs pa thal 'phreng gi 'grel pa paN chen mchog lha ba dang drung chen legs ba bzang po'i gsung rgyun gyi yig cha /
TIk+kas 'grel pa rnam bshad thar lam gsal byed dang /
chung pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i yi ge rnams kyi steng nas gnang bar thog mar sgo 'byed du cha gcad sogs kyi dus nas dar srol bzhin mtshan mtshon /
rdzas ldog / /
dgag gzhi /
drug sgra /
thal 'gyur /
rgyu 'bras sogs bsdus kra'i brtsi tshul rnams 'ol ci tsam min pa'i zhib mor gtan la phab nas rtags skor blo skor thal 'phreng TIka 'grel dang bcas legs par nos pa'i brgyun pa ni /
ston pa @# / /
tshad ma'i skyes bu /
mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs /
dgra bcom pa chos skyobs /
mkhas pa me waM ga /
rje btsun btsong kha ba'i gsan yig na me wa gzhes snang /
kun mkhyen gnyis pa dbyig gnyen /
slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po /
slob dpon dbang phyug sde /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
rig pa'i dbang phyug chos kyi grags pa /
slob dpon lha dbang blo gros /
slob dpon shAkya blo gros /
'di man nas waM gu paN+Ti ta'i par grol mchog gi gsan yig tu gong 'og 'khrugs pa dang mang nyung phran tshegs byung ba bu ston dang ngag chos pa'i gsan yig sogs dang ma mthun bas nor 'khrul byung ba 'dra'o / /
paN+Di ta shes rab 'byung gnas spas pa /
rgyan mkhan por yang grags /
slob dpon dzamA ri /
kun mkhyen bu dang rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis go ldog tu 'dug pas dpyas paN+Di ta chos mchog /
rgyal rnga bdun pa'ang zer /
slob dpon dul ba'i lha /
bram ze shang+ka ra nan+da /
mkhan ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na bde byed dga' bar bsgyur 'dug /
waM gu paN+Di ta /
bu ston rin po che'i gsan yig na waM gi paN+Di ta dang /
ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na wa lu zhas snang /
paN chen shAkya shrI /
paN+Di ta su ga ta shrA /
paN chen dA na shI la /
bal po saM g+ha shrI /
de bzhi ga la chos rjes skya paN+Di tas gsan /
de nas 'u yug pa rig pa'i seng ge /
zhang mdo sde dpal /
'jam skya nam mkha' dpal /
dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
nya dbon kun dga' dpal /
re mda' ba gzhon nu blo gros /
thams cad mkhyen pa shar btsong kha ba blo bzang grags pa'i dpal /
rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa dar ma rin cen /
mkhyen rab dbang phyug grags pa bzang po /
dmar khams pa grags bzang yang zer /
gra chung ba kun mkhyen yon tan rgya mtsho /
shengs ston dri med bshes gnyen /
paN chen mchog lha 'od zer /
'jam dbyangs legs pa bzang po /
mkhas pa chos kyi grags pa /
khri rin po che rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs smra ba'i dbang phyug stag lung brag pa blo gros rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs mi'i gzugs can dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na 'jam dbyangs mchog lta ba nas /
gling smad lha dbang dpal 'byor /
rgyal khang rtse pa man 'dra /
yang na rje re mda' pa nas /
rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa /
gra chung pa yon tan rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na nya dbon kun dga' dpal nas /
g.yag mi pham sangs rgyas dpal rong ston pa shes bya kun rig /
mkhyen rab dbang phyug grags pa bzang po man 'dra /
yang na chos rje bla ma dam pa nas /
mkhas pa brtson 'grus dpal /
kun mkhyen g.yag pa man 'dra / /
! gnyis pa gzhan dag rjes su 'dzin pa la bzo dang gso ba gnyis /
dang po bzo rig pa ni kun shes las /
bzo la lus bzo ngag bzo yid bzo gsum / /
zhes sgra yangs pa'i dbang du byas na /
rig pa'i gnas phal cher bzo rig pa'i khongs su 'du zhing /
bye brag pa shA ri'i bus zhus pa dang bde mchog sdom 'byung las gsungs pas mtshon mdo rgyud las nye bar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang sems khro bo sogs kyi sku'i thig rtsa thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston zhabs kyis mdzad pa dang /
de'i gsal byed du gyur pa dbyangs can mas @# / /
rjes su bzung ba rta nag ri mkhar ba dpal ldan blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas thig rtsa'i rim pa zhib mor nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sman bla don grub pa /
sku mdun 'jam dpal dbyangs /
sdom brtson blo bzang rgya mtsho /
mkhas mchog yon tan rgya mtsho /
dpyod ldan chu bzang sprul sku /
rigs 'dzin chen po gzhon nu don grub /
shes bya kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
rgya dkar nag gi bzo bos bskrun pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems kyi sku brnyan /
rol mo /
dkar yol /
gos dar /
go mtshon /
rta sogs dngos spyad gyi rigs rnams brtag thabs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi yi ge rnying pa'i rigs dang khyad par grum stod lha sa paN chen dang bya bkra shis dar rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i yi ge dang dngos po rnams ngo 'phrod par zhib tu bstar ba'i brgyud pa ni /
sde pa lha sa rdzong ba paN chen /
mtsho sgo pa grags pa rdo rje /
paN+Di ta chen po smon 'gro pa tshe dbang don grub /
sprul sku mdo sngags gling pa /
dpyod ldan gzug po ba gzhon nu skal bzang /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rgya dkar nag gi rten brtag pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
kun mkhyen tshe dbang don grub nas /
paN chen 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
! gnyis pa gso ba rig pa'i skor la /
mkhas mchog dpa' bos mdzad pa'i yan lag brgyad pa dang so mar tsa sogs rgya dkar nag gi gtsug lag mang du snang ba ni kho bos spyod yul du ma gyur zhing /
deng sang lag len phal cher dpal ldan rgyud bzhi dang bdud rtsi bum pa sogs rnying ma bka' gter nas byung ba shes che bas yig cha'i grangs dang lung rgyun sogs gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi so so'i skabs gang babs su bris shing rtsa bshad phyi gsum gyi bshad pa sa gcad /
rdel 'grem /
phyag len ngo sprod thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ston pa sman gyi bla /
drang srong rig pa'i ye shes /
drang srong yid las skyes /
'tsho byed gzhon nu /
mgon po klu sgrub /
dpal ldan dpa' bo /
paN chen zla ba mngon dga' /
lo chen bai ro tsa na /
rje khri srong lde btsan /
gter ston gra pa mngon shes /
dge bshes dbus pa dar grags /
rog ston dkon cog skyabs /
g.yu thog yon tan mgon po /
sum ston ye shes zung /
'tsho byed gzhon nu ye shes /
mkhas pa 'bum seng /
gtsang ston sangs rin /
mkhas pa don grub rin chen /
bstan 'dzin don grub rgyal mtshan /
brang ti dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
brang ti dpal ldan 'tsho byed /
dge slong tshal pa dbang grags /
mkhas mchog phun tshogs bzang po /
zur mkhar ba mnyam nyid rdo rje /
lag len mthar phyin tshe 'bum /
byar po paN chen /
mkhas pa zla ba'i dbang po /
sems dpa' chen po blo bzang rgya mtsho /
drang srong bstan 'dzin rgyal po /
de sras drang srong dar rgyas /
gcung mkhas mchog gzhan phan dbang po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na brang ti dpal ldan 'tsho byed nas /
zul phu sman mo che pa /
sman ston dbang phyug bzang po /
rje zur mkhar ba man 'dra /
yang na paN chen mnyam nyid rdo rje nas /
kong ston mkhas pa'i dbang po /
sman bla shAkya dbang phyug / /
mkhas pa bsod nams rgyal po /
rin chen sdings sems dpa' chen po man @# / /
'dra / /
! gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa nang rig pa la /
rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa /
'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa /
de dag kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa thub pa chen po'i bka' 'gyur ro cog dang gsum /
dang po ni /
mdun legs ma las /
blang dor gnas la kun nas 'thoms pa'i mun / /
yang dag thos pa'i sgron mes ma bsal bar / /
lam mi shes na thar pa'i grong mchog tu / /
'jug par 'gyur ba smos kyang ci zhig dgos / /
de nyid phyir na mi pham chos rje dang / /
'dzam gling rgyan drug mchog gnyis zhes grags pa'i / /
gzhung la phyogs re ba dang rags pa res / /
tshim par ma byas kun la zhib tu sbyangs / /
tshul 'di bsam zhing mdun ma legs nas gda' / /
bka' drin che 'o rje btsun mkhyen pa'i gter / /
zhes gsungs pa'i rgyan drug mchog gnyis kyi gzhung lugs kyang rje btsun re mda' pa chen pos /
'dzam gling mkhas pa'i rgyan mchog dka' chen bzhi / /
rtsa 'jug bzhi gsum theg chen rgyud bla dang / /
chos mngon mdzod dang dpal ldan 'dus pa sogs / /
rnam bshad byas pa'i gzhung lugs bcu phrag gcig /
ces pa'i mtha' dag khong du chud par dka' na'ang ji ltar thos pa las chad ma ni gong du song zin /
bstan pa'i rtsa ba dam pa'i chos 'dul ba lung sde bzhi'i dgongs pa'i don snying por bsdus nas ston pa 'dzam gling mdzes par byed pa'i mchog rnam pa gnyis las slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba mdo rtsa ba rgya cher 'grel dang bcas pa'i gzhung don gsal bar byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub kyis mdzad pa'i 'dul TIka rin cen 'phreng ba /
skyed tshal ba 'jam dbyangs kun dga' chos bzang /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
pha bong kha pa bde legs nyi ma gsum gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas spyi don dang thal 'phreng legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa zas gtsang sras bo /
dgra bcom pa nye ba 'khar /
'phags pa 'od srungs /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig dang rdo rje gdan pas stag tshang lo tsA bar gsan pa'i thor 'di mi 'dug /
'phags pa kun dga' bo /
dgra bcom pa sha na'i gos can /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug pa chad dam dbyad /
dgra bcom pa nyer sbas /
dgra bcom pad+hi d+hi ka /
dgra bcom pa nag po pa /
dgra bcom pa legs mthong /
phyir mi 'ong blos mi 'bebs /
bu ston dang grol mchog gi gsan yig na 'di gnyis so sor phral 'dug pa dpyad cing grol mchog gi dar dgra bcom phyir mi 'od zhes snang ba phyir mi 'ong rnams slar dgra bcom gyi go 'phang mngon du byad dgos pas kar 'brug tsho bcun pa thams cad la dge slong zer ba'i dpe zla yin pa 'dra'o /
kha cha 'dus bzang /
'di gnyis gsan yig gzhan tshor mi gsal yang rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig dang stag tshang lo tsA bar rdo rje gdan pas gsan ba'i brgyud par 'dug pas khungs btsun par mngon /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen /
slob dpon yon tan 'od /
slob dpon chos kyi bshes gnyen /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug /
slob dpon shAkya 'od /
dgra bcom pa seng ge'i gdong can /
kha tshe dzi na mi tra /
gsan yig la lar 'di gnyis go ldog tu 'dug pa rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na des dA na shI la dang dzi na mi tra @# / /
gnyis la zhes dang /
gong dkang ba'i gsan yig na gang rung gcig gis chog par mdzad cing /
grol mchog gi gsan yig na dzi na mi tra las mi 'dug pas gnyis ka bgrangs phyin go rim gyi nges pa mi dgos pa 'dra'o / /
paN chen dA na shI la /
cog gru klu'i rgyal mtshan /
stag tshang bar gong dkar bas gsan pa'i brgyud yig na 'dug pas yid ches su mngon /
g.yo dge 'byung /
bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal /
klu mes tshul khrims byang chub /
gzus rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sog tshul khrims bla ma /
ko khyim pa ye shes bla ma /
nyad mtshams pa 'di gnyis kyi bar du gru mar tshul khrims 'byung gnas dang skyogs shes rab 'byung gnas gnyis sa sbya'i las chen ye shes lhun grub la grol mchog gis gsan pa'i brgyud par 'dug pa dus kyi snga phyi'i dbang du byas na 'thad par mthong yang bu ston /
gong dkar pa /
ngag chos /
dwags po paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal rnams kyi gsan yig na mi 'dug pas lo rgyus chos 'byung dang bstun nas dbyad dgos long cing /
kun mkhyen bu dang mkhan ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na gzungs zhes pa snang bas brtag /
rin cen bla ma /
de gsum ga la rgya 'dul ba 'dzin pa dbang phyug tshul khrims /
de nas rma tsho byang chub rdo rje /
bya 'dul ba brtson 'grus 'bar /
bla ma chos kyi dbang phyug /
chos kyi byang chub /
na bza' 'phred gsol bar yang grags /
rje chos kyi brtson 'grus /
chos grags rin cen dpal bzang /
mkhan chen dka' bzhi pa grags pa gzhon nu /
rin po che bsod nams grags pa /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa /
kun mkhyen mus srad pa blo gros rin cen seng ge /
ser gnyal ston dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rje btsun don yod dpal ldan /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
rgyal khang rtse ba dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
'jam dpal dbyangs stag lung brag ba /
gsung rab rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na rma tsho byang chub rdo rje nas /
skyid shod pa tshul khrims 'phags /
'dar chul khrims rgyal po /
nyi steng pa tshul khrims grags /
'dul 'dzin blo gros grags /
ne'u paN chen /
'dul 'dzin rgyal mtshan dpal /
slob dpon rin cen byang chub /
dmar ston dpal ldan rin cen /
dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen /
khu dbon gnyis ka la thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub kyis gsan pa man 'dra /
yang na bya 'dul brtson 'grus 'bar nas /
thag ma'i ka ba chen po /
g.yor po'i sbas ti dgra bcom pa /
mkhas chen shes rab seng ge /
bsam yas pa tshul khrims dbang phyug /
se ba can pa yon tan tshul khrims /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
mkhan chen dka' bzhi pa blo gsal /
dmar ston dpal ldan rin cen man 'dra /
yang na dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen nas /
kun mkhyen g.yag pa /
rong ston /
dmar khams grags bzang /
gra chung pa /
shangs ston pa /
mchog lta ba? /
legs bzang pa /
chos grags pa /
dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
blo gros rgya mtsho /
rje dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
! sangs rgyas gnyis pa dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i shes bya gzhi lnga gtso bor brjod pa'i chos mngon pa mdzod rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i don gsal bar ston pa paN chen gzhung lugs brgya pa dngos grub dpal 'bar gyis mdzad pa'i TIk+ka /
paN chen bsod nams gags pa dang las chen dngos grub rgya @# / /
mtsho gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i spyi don gyi steng nas spyi TIka legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ston pa thub pa'i dbang po /
gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po /
'phags pa kun dga' bo /
dgra bcom pa dbyangs sgrog /
kha che 'dus bzang /
kun mkhyen gnyis pa dbyig gnyen /
mngon pa rang las mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa /
gang ba spal /
dA na shI la /
dzi na mi tra /
ska ba dpal brtsegs? rak+Shita /
cog gru klu'i rgyal mtshan /
zhang sna nam ye shes sda /
sna nam zla ba'i rdo rje /
kun mkhyen bu'i gsan yig na nam nad zla ba'i rdo rje zhes snang /
lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje /
'di gnyis go rim mi mthun pa 'ga' zhig byung yang phan tshun gsan res ma byung 'dra bas gang bdes thus sam snyam gong dkar ba'i gsan yig tu bsdu na dA dzi gnyis dang ska cog zhang gsum gang rung res chog par mngon gsung bar 'thad do / /
sbas rgyal ba ye shes /
bu'i gsan yig na dbas zhes pa snang /
gsum ga la cog gru rgyal ba'i ye shes kyis gsan /
de nas cog gru mchog gi ye shes /
se btsun dbang phyug gzhen nu /
'gar mi yon tan g.yung drung /
khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung /
ra khri bzang 'bar /
bu'i gsan yig nar ston khri bzang zhes snang zhing 'di dang phyi ma gnyis go ldog tu 'dug pa brtag /
rgya tshul li /
li ston chos grags /
brang ti dar ma snying po /
ko ye 'byung /
'bang dkon cog rdo rje /
tho kun dga' rdo rje /
'jad pa ston skyabs /
'jad pa gzhon byang /
zhang 'bring mtshams pa /
bo dong pa rin cen rtse mo /
brtson 'grus rdo rje yin nam dpyad /
stag sde pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa /
lo chen byang chub rtsi mo /
rje btsun re mda' pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa /
rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa dar ma rin cen /
thams cad mkhyen ba dge 'dun grub /
kun mkhyen blo gros rin cen seng ge /
gnyal ston dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rje don yod dpal ldan /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
smra ba'i nyi ma stag lung brag pa /
'jam dbyangs bla ma dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na brang ti ngar ma snying po nas /
rog chos kyi brtson 'grus /
yar nag pa /
nyang ther ma /
rdo rje gdan ba'i gsan yig na ther mgo ba zer ba 'dug /
gzang pa ring mo /
spyil bu ba stag ston shes rab 'od zer /
lho grub pa seng ge /
tshad ma'i skyes bu bsod nams mgon /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub man 'dra /
yang na blo gros brtan pa nas /
kha che dri med spas pa /
paN+Di ta sm-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti /
g.yas chen po shes rab grags /
r+wa zhags zla ba /
mchims zhang btsun /
mchims lha rje go cha /
mchims brtson 'grus seng ge /
mchims don grub rgyal mtshan /
mchims brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan /
mchims blo gros brtan pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
mkhas pa yon tan 'od zer /
bshes gnyen chos mgon pa /
skyor lung pa blo gros bzang po /
dmar ston dpal ldan rin cen /
dmar ston rgya mtsho rin cen man 'dra /
yang na slob dpon gang ba spel nas rim par /
kha che paN chen /
sa paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang mdo sde dpal /
mnyam med grags pa rgyal mtshan /
don ri grags rgyal /
bla ma dam pa @# / /
bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
nya dbon kun dga' dpal /
kun mkhyen g.yag pa /
rong ston chen po /
mkhyen rab dbang phyug grags pa bzang po /
kun mkhyen yon tan rgya mtsho /
shangs ston dri med bshes gnyen /
'jam dbyangs mchog lha 'od zer /
drung chen legs pa bzang po /
zhal snga nas chos kyi grags pa /
rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs stag lung brag pa /
smra ba'i dbang phyug dkon cog chos 'phal /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mchog lha ba nas /
lha dbang dpal 'byor /
rgyal khang rtse pa man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni rje btsun sa paN gyis mnal lam du a phyi'i mchod rten gyi drung du slob dpon dbyig gnyen la chos mngon pa zla ba gcig gi bar yongs su rdzogs par gsan pas dbyig gnyen zhabs /
sa paN /
'phags pa man 'dra / /
! sbas don mngon par rtogs pa'i don phyin ci ma log par gsal bar ston pa rgyal tshab mi pham mgon pos mdzad pa'i bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan /
de'i 'grel pa slob dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa'i don gsal rtsa 'grel gnyis kyi TIk+ka rgyal chab thams cad mkhyen bas mdzad pa'i rnam bshad snying po rgyan /
paN chen bsod nams grags pas mdzad pa'i spyi don thal 'phreng /
dwags nyag blo gros 'phel gyi spyi don /
ser rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi thal 'phrang rnams kyi steng nas spyi TIka thal 'phreng dang bcas pa legs par nos pa'i rdog lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
thub dbang zas gtsang sras po /
rje btsun byams pa mgon po /
'phags pa thogs med /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen /
'phags pa rnam grol sde /
btsun pa rnam grol sde /
mchog gi sde /
dul ba'i sde /
mkhan po rnam snang mjad /
slob dpon seng ge bzang po /
slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
slob dpon yon tan bshes gnyen /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
shar phyogs pa zla ba bzang po /
slob dpon bstan skyong /
'bum phrag gsum pa'ang zer /
lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab /
'bre shes rab 'bar /
ar byang chub ye shes /
'dul ba 'dzin pa dkar mo /
dkar chung ring mo /
zhang yab /
gnyal zhig 'jam dpal rdo rje gzad ring dar ma tshul khrims /
bo dong pa brtson 'grus rdo rje /
stag sde ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsad nams rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun re mda' pa gzhon nu blo gros /
chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po /
thams cad mkhyen pa dar ma rin cen /
gnyal rgod rin cen bsam grub /
'jam dbyangs chos rje bkra shis dpal ldan /
mus srad pa blo gros rin can seng ge /
ser chos rje gnyal ston dpal lhun pa /
se ra don yod dpal ldan /
dwags nyag rig pa'i ral gri blo gros 'phel /
gtsang ston dge legs bshes gnyen /
te'u ra pa dge 'dun bsam grub /
grom mda' ba blo bzang chos 'phel /
'jam mgon smra ba'i dbang phyug dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang phar phyin rnying ma 'brom lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon seng ge bzang po nas /
ku sA li che ba /
ku sA li chung ba /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
jo bo chen po dpal mar me mdzad /
'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung @# / /
gnas /
'brom ston tsan nam mgo bla ma /
'bre chen shes rab 'bar man 'dra /
yang khu lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
jo bo rje nas /
khu chen po lha sdings pa /
rgya rgyal ba tshul khrims seng ge /
li ston chos grags /
'bre chen po man 'dra /
yang na dge legs bshes gnyen nas /
sems dpa' chen po skal bzang rgya mtsho /
rtses dang pa sangs rgyas blo gros /
'phyong rgyas pa nam mkha' rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dge 'dun bsam grub nas /
'ol kha ba blo bzang rgya mtsho /
rje byams pa brtan pa /
rje dkon cog chos 'phel /
yang na rje don yod dpal ldan nas /
rje btsun chos gyi rgyal mtshan /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rje nam mkha' rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na bo dong pa brtson 'grus rdo rje nas /
khro phu ba bsod nams seng ge /
lha ston grub pa seng ge /
tshad ma'i skyes bu bsod nams mgon /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston /
thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal /
g.yag mi pham chos kyi bla ma /
rong ston shes bya kun rig /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
kun mkhyen blo gros rin cen seng ge man gong bzhin no / /
yang na bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa la mkhas pa lung mang po dang d+harma shrI gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la kun mkhyen g.yag pas gsan pa man 'dra / /
! mdun legs ma las /
mdo sngags gzhung la dal ba mang byas kyang / /
zab don nyams su len dang smra ba la / /
gang yang ma bslabs ci yang mi shes pa'i / /
lta ba'i tshul la ring du ma song bar / /
mthong nas lhag par klu sgrub gzhung lugs kyi / /
zab mo byed pa'i phra ba'i rig lam nas / /
yang dag lta ba 'dren pa'i gnad kun le /
legs par sbyangs nas the tshom chod par byas / /
zhes pa ltar slob dpon klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa thal 'gyur ba'i lugs srol thun mong ma yin pa zab mo dbu ma'i lta ba 'di nyid ma rtogs par 'khor ba las rnam par grol ba'i zhi ba nam yang rnyed pa'i skabs med pa la dgongs nas mnyam med re mda' pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa bcong kha pa chen po sogs dam pa du mas phyogs 'di la rtsal du bton te 'chad nyan gyis gtan la phab pa yin pas /
'phags pa yab sras gnyis kyi bzhed pa 'khrul med du ston pa slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa'i dbu ma 'jug pa rang 'grel dang bcas pa'i TIk+ka rje btsun btsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i rnam bshad dgongs pa rab gsal /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
chos rje rje btsun pa /
khyung phrug byams pa bkra shis rnams kyi yig cha'i steng nas thal 'phreng spyi don /
TIk+ka rnams legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon Ar+ya de wa /
slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa /
slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pa /
paN chen de wa tsan+d+ra /
bram ze rin chen rdo rje /
slob dpon par he ta /
paN chen ha sum to /
pa tshab lo tsA ba nyi ma grags /
rma bya byang ye /
rma bya byang brtson /
mtshur gzhon nu seng ge /
rma bya shAkya seng ge /
zhang chos kyi bla ma /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
bcom ldan ral gri /
de gnyis ka la lo tsA? ba @# / /
mchog ldan legs ba'i blo gros /
de nas dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa /
slob dpon byang seng pa /
re mda' pa chen po gzhon nu blo gros /
thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal /
kun mkhyen dar ma rin cen /
slob dpon rin cen bsam grub /
'jam dbyangs bkra shis dpal ldan /
mus sred pa blo gros rin cen seng ge /
chos rje dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rje don yod dpal ldan /
dwags nyag rig pa'i ral gri /
rje dge legs bshes gnyen /
zhal snga nas dge 'dun bsam grub /
sgrom mda' mkhan chen blo bzang chos 'phel /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la stsal to / /
yang na pha tshab lo tsA ba nas /
zhang thang sag pa ye shes 'byung gnas /
'brom dbang phyug grags /
bla ma pra dz+nya badzra /
slob dpon ston tshul ba /
bla ma bde ba'i lha /
jo btsun pa /
dbu ra ba /
pra dz+nya shrI /
d+harma shes rab /
bag ston shes rab rin cen /
rje pu N+ya sid+ha /
bag ston bsam bzang /
bag ston gzhon nu bsam gtan /
byang chub seng ge /
re mda' pa man 'dra /
yang na mchims nam mkha' grags nas /
skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims /
slob dpon dge 'bar ba /
dbu tshad pa 'od zer grub /
mkhas pa mi g.yo bzang po /
rin po che kun rgyal ba /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po man gong bzhin no / /
yang na lo tsA ba mchog ldan nas /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen pu ston /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
g.yag sangs rgyas 'phel /
rong ston rje /
mkhyen rab dbang phyug /
gra chung ba /
shangs ston pa /
'jam dbyangs mchog lha ba /
legs bzang pa /
chos grags pa /
dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
stag lung brag pa /
rje dgon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bag ston gzhon nu bsam gtan nas /
dmar ston gzhon rgyan /
rong ston man gong dang 'dra /
yang na gtsang ston dge legs pa nas /
rje skal bzang pa /
zhal snga nas sangs rgyas blo gros /
rje nam mkha' rgya mtsho /
rje dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na zhal snga nas dge 'dun bsam grub nas /
mkhan chen blo bzang rgya mtsho /
zhal snga nas byams pa brtan pa /
rje dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na gnyal ston dpal lhun nas /
ser don yod pa /
se ra rje btsun pa /
zhal snga nas sgom sde /
rje nam mkha' rgya mtsho man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen pos skyid shod dga' ba gdong du mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mjal /
bla ma dbu ma pas lo tsA mdzad nas zab mo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skor yongs su rdzogs par gsan pas /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
bla ma dbu ma pa /
kun mkhyen btsong kha pa /
rgyal tshab rje man sngar bzhin no / /
yang na zla ba grags pa nas /
ku sA li che chung /
kha che gzhon nu 'bum /
ha su ma ti man 'dra /
byams ba'i chos sde lnga'i bklags lung legs par nos pa'i thog mar mngon rtogs rgyan ni /
TIk+ka rdzogs par song bas bshad ma thag pa'i brgyud pa ltar ram /
yang na thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub yan gong ltar la /
de nas nya dbon kun dga' dpal /
re mda' pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po /
rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa /
gung ru rin cen byang chub /
chos rje dpal 'byor lhun grub /
slob dpon ne tso ba chos @# / /
dpal rgyal mtshan /
drung chen nyi ma grags pa /
drung chen chos kyi bshes gnyen /
ra tshag pa blo bzang e waM /
rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
kun mkhyen dpal 'byor 'phrin las rab rgyas /
rje chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rgyal khang rtse pa nas /
rje 'phrin las lhun grub /
bla ma zhang yang zer /
rje pha bong kha pa man 'dra /
theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan dang dbus mtha' rnam 'byed gnyis kyi brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
rgyal ba byams pa /
'phags pa thogs med /
mkhas pa dbyig gnyen /
kha che'i paN chen blo gros brtan pa /
paN chen rig pa'i khu byug /
slob dpon mche ba'i rde /
b+ha dra pA da /
mar me mdzad /
gang+gA d+ha ra /
pu N+ya shrI /
khra che dgon pa ba /
bram ze sad+h+ha pa /
kha che dz+nyA na shrI /
rdog lo chen po /
ba reg lo tsA ba rgyal mtshan /
ba reg ston skyabs /
skyes bu yon tan dga' /
bla ma bkra shis rdo rje /
bla ma 'dul ba 'dzin pa /
nyang ro kun dga' rdo rje /
'jam dbyangs dar ma 'od zer /
khro phu tshad ma'i skyes bu /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa man mngon rtogs rgyan gyi lung rgyang gi brgyud pa ltar ro / /
yang mdo sde rgyan gyi lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
sangs rgyas /
byams pa /
thogs med /
da byig gnyen /
blo gros brtan pa /
gang ba spel /
gang+gA d+ha ru /
dor chen gyi gsan yig na 'di gnyis ka mi 'dug ba dbyad /
gang+gA dzan rat+na /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
kha che sadz+dza na /
pa ra he ta /
tsan kha po che yin min brtag /
blo gros grags /
mar pa jo phan /
mchims don grub /
mchims brtson seng /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
skyi ston shAkya 'bum /
skyi ston grags rgyal /
kun mkhyen sher rgyan /
ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang gzhon blo /
ngor chen /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
rat+na shI la /
thar lam gsal sgron /
'di bla ma'i mtshan mi 'dra ba brtag /
rin cen 'byung gnas /
ngag dbang grags pa dpal bzang /
ngag dbang chos grags /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
sgom sde nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
drung chen byang ma khang gsar ba /
rdo rje 'chang pha khong kha pa man 'dra /
chos nyid rnam 'byed dang rgyud bla ma gnyis kyi brgyud pa byams chos gzhan gsum dang mthun bar mdzad pa ngor pa rdo rje 'chang dang chos rje dpa' ba sogs rang gzhan gyi bla ma mang po'i gsan yig tu snang yang ha cang ma dpyad pa'i rtsing skyon du sems te /
rgyu mtshan thogs med kyi dka' ldan nas byams chos spyan zangs pa dus ring zhig nas chos nyid rnam 'byed dang rgyud bla ma'i dpe tsam yang nub pas brgyad stong 'grel chen du de nyid nas lung 'dren sogs med pas kyang slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i dus nub zin pa rjes su dpag pa'i tshad mas kyang gzhal nus la /
rje mai tri pa chen pos mchod rten zhig gi sen kha nas 'od yang yang 'phro ba gzigs pas /
de la zhig gso dang bcas ci 'dug pa tsal bas tA la'i 'dab mar bris pa'i bstan bcos gnyis kyi dpe rnyed kyang rgyun ma rnyed par brten rje bcun byams pa la gsol ba rtse gcig tu btab pas sprin gyi gseb nas zhal dngos su bstan nas gnang ba'i lung rgyun 'phel ba yin pas /
de gnyis kyi brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
ma pham mgon po /
mnga' bdag mai tri pa @# / /
chen po /
paN+Di ta dga' ba'i grags pa /
paN+Di ta sadz+dza na /
rdog lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab /
khyung rin cen grags /
rgya dmar ba byang chub grags /
gro lung ba blo gros 'byung gnas /
cha pa chos kyi seng ge /
'dul dkar ba /
gtsang pa 'bra sgur /
sdong khrod 'dul 'dzin /
slob dpon dar ma 'od zer /
lho pa gru pa seng ge /
slob dpon rig thigs pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston man mngon rtogs rgyan gyi lung rkyang ltar ro / /
de'ang kha che'i grong khyer dpe med du paN+Di ta sadz+dza na la rdog lo chen pos gsan pa'i tshe dpe shog re la'ang 'di me la sbyangs na rgyal ba byams pa gshegs pa dang mnyam zer nas g.yang bar dka' tshegs shin tu che ba'i ngang nas bsgyur zhus mdzad pa yin no / /
! rgyal ba'i sras po thogs med bzang po dpal gyis mdzad pa'i yig cha'i steng nas theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rin po che skyed par byed pa'i thabs dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
'jam dbyangs /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
Ar+ya de wa /
zla ba grags pa /
slob pa'i rdo rje /
slob dpon dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis /
paN+Di ta pu N+ya shrI /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa /
sa paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
e pa 'jam dbyangs 'khon ston /
byang sems rin cen mgon /
'jig rten dbang phyug bzang po dpal /
chos rje tshul khrims dpal /
sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
ri pa dpal ldan grags /
mkhan chen grags pa rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen rin cen grags pa /
mkhan sangs rgyas bkra shis /
mkhan chen dbang phyug dpal bzang /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
lo pa spyan snga chos kyi spyan ldan kun dga' don grub /
dpal ldan sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dpal rdo rje ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
bka' drin mnyam med mkhan chen zha lu pa rin can bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
sgron med can pa rin cen dpal bzang /
byang sems rin cen mgon po man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
bo dong brtson 'grus rdo rje /
khro phu bsod nams seng ge /
kun mkhyen bu ston rin po che /
rgyal sras thogs med pa man 'dra /
sems tsam lugs kyi sems bskyed thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'jug pa sams bskyed ces snang /
bcom ldan 'das /
rje btsun ma pham pa /
'phags pa thogs med /
dbyig gnyen /
'phags pa grol sde /
btsun pa grol sde /
mchog gi sde /
dul ba'i sde /
dul ba'i sde /
seng ge bzang po /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
dpal mar me mdzad /
rgyal ba 'brom /
spyan snga ba /
bya yul ba /
rgyal sras char chen pa /
mus sman pa'ang zer /
gro sten bdud rtsi grags /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
mchims ston /
mkhan seng ge sgrubs /
mkhas btsun bsod nams ye shes /
byang sems bsod nams grags pa /
thogs med bzang po dpal grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
rdo rje 'chang sgo @# / /
rum pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'khor lo'i mgon po dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam dpal dbyangs ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rgyal sras thogs med pa nas /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bo dong paN chen dbyangs can dga' ba /
mkhan chen bsod rgyal /
paN chen shAka mchog /
paN chen don yod pa /
rje kun dga' grol mchog /
mkhan chen karma bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man gong bzhin no / /
! 'jig rten dbang phyug bzang po dpal gyis mdzad pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma'i 'khrid yig gi steng nas theg pa chen po'i blo sbyong nyams 'khrid du legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
rgyal tshab byams pa /
'phags pa thogs med /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen /
'phags pa rnam grol sde /
btsun pa rnam grol sde /
gu Na mi tra /
slob dpon seng ge bzang po /
bshes gnyen gang ba spel /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
dpal ldan a ti sha /
rgyal ba 'bom /
po to ba rin cen gsal /
shar ba yon tan grags /
'chad ka ye shes rdo rje /
se spyil bu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
lo pa sbyan snga'i gsan yig dang yar klungs jo bo'i chos 'byung mthun par 'di bzhin 'dug /
rje mkhyen brtse /
thar rtse pa /
mkhan ngag chos pa gsum gyi gsan yig na 'od zer gzhon nu zer ba 'drug pa brtag /
la lar+d+harma shes rab ces pa snang zhing rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di nas tshogs pa'i dbu mdzad kyi bar la dong lha ring pa khu dbon gnyis zhes pa las ma byung ba yig skyon zhe gzhugs pa 'dra'o / /
lha ston 'od zer bla ma /
jo bo'i chos 'byung na byang chub 'od zer dang lo pa sbyan snga'i gsan yig na skyes mchog lha chen zer ba snang /
lha sdings pa byang chub 'bum /
le ba sbyan snga ba'i gsan yig na shes rab 'bum zhes 'dug kyang mkhyen brtse thar rtse ngag chos gsum gyi gsan yig na 'di ltar snang /
lha sdings dbon po kun dga' rgya mtsho /
bar rtse ba dang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dag chos gsum gyi gsan yig na 'di gnyis lha sdings pa yon tam dpal zhes gcig tu bkrangs 'dug kyang ngor chan /
lo pa sbyan snga dang sgrub khang pa gsum kyi gsan yig na 'di bi zhin byung bas bla ma gnyis kyi mtshan gcig tu 'dus pa'i bris nor byung ngam snyam /
tshogs pa'i dbu mdzad yon tan dpal /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
mkhan chen dka' bzhi pa grags pa gzhon nu /
byang sems bsod nams grags pa /
rgyal sras thogs med bzang po dpal /
rgya ma ba yon tan 'od /
'phags pa blo 'phel ba /
sbyan snga tshul khrims dar ma /
spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
rgyal sras bsod nams legs mchog /
paN chen ngag dbang grags pa dpal bzang /
gnyug la paN chen /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /

kha che blo gros brtan pa /

yang na rgyal sras rin po che nas /
mkhan chen @# / /
grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen grags pa bshes gnyen /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun blo ba /
gnyug la paN chen ngag gi dbang po /
ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra /
yang na rgyal sras rin po che nas /
mang mkhar tshul khrims dpal /
sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
chos rje shes rab bzang po /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa| spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra /
yang na sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
rje mi g.yo gru bzhi /
de la paN chen don grub rgyal mtshan dang mkhan chen sangs rgyas dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas rje btsun ngag dbang grags pa /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra /
yang na gzhon nu rgyal mchog nas /
byams chen sku skye /
chen po kun dga' bkra shis /
'phags mchog yon tan rgya mtsho /
paN chen ngag dbang grags pa spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra /
yang na lo pa spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags nas /
bla ma dpal ldan chos 'byor /
lo sa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhan chen kun blo ba nas /
mkhan chen kun dga' dpal 'byor /
grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
mkhan chen kun dga' legs pa /
mkhan chen dkon cog rin cen /
mkhan chen rnam sras bzang po /
mkhan chen shes rab rin cen /
sbyan snga kun dga' don grub man 'dra /
yang na sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan nas /
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phel /
'jam dbyangs kun dga' chos bzang /
mkhas pa lha dbang blo gros /
rje byams pa phun tshogs /
ras chen dpal 'byor shes rab /
ngor sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
bka' drin mnyam med gnas gsar ba rdo rje 'tshang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal mchog nas /
ri pa dpal ldan grags /
mkhan chen grags pa rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen rin grags pa /
mkhan sangs rgyas bkra shis /
mkhan chen dbang phyug dpal bzang /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la' / /
! 'jig rten dbang phyug bzang po dpal gyi dngos slob rje dpal ldan ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i blo sbyong snyan brgyud chen mo'am 'khrid yig gsung sgros mar grags pa'i lo rgyus gdams pa dngos dang bcas pa'i lung brgyud ni /
bshad ma thag pa'i dpal ldan chos 'byor la lo pa spyan sngas gsan pa dang /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags brgyud par bzhugs pa ser gnas la sbyan snga rin po che dang mkhan chen gnyis ga la khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
de la rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na gzhon nu rgyal mchog nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen pe /
mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'phel /
rje btsun kun dga' chos bzang /
lha dbang blo gros /
byams pa phun tshogs /
dpal 'byor shes @# / /
rab /
sgrub khang ba dpal ldan don gub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o /
brgyad pa 'di skor la rtsom pa po dngos su mi gsal ba rgyal sras rin po che'i gsung ji lta ba zin bris su mdzad pa'i dbang gis rgyal sras pas rgya ma ba dang mang mkhar ba sogs la gnang ba yin 'dug /
yang na rgyal sras rin po che nas 'gro mgon dpal ldan ye shes /
mkhas pa gzhon nu rgyal mchog man 'dra /
mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan la'ang nos pa slar gyi rten 'brel du mjug nas shog bu sum cu tsam zhig 'jog pa gnang song ba 'phro can du lus /
rje de nyid kyis dben sa bla ma sangs rgyas ye shes la gsan /
de yan gyi brgyud pa ma rnyed / /
! sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog gis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po'i blo sbyong gi lus yan lag dang bcas pa'i don cung zad bshad pa blo sbyong don gsal shes rab gsal sgron nam legs bshad kun 'dus su grags pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog yan don bdun ma ltar la /
de nas byams chen sku skye /
rje kun dga' bkra shis /
'phags mchog yon tan rgya mtsho /
paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha ba dpal 'byor lhun grub /
bka' drin mnyam med zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! sum pa lo tsA ba dpal mchog dang bo'i rdo rjes rgya gar du byon dus mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i chag bzhi pa rje btsun sgrol mas gsungs pa la brten nas thugs rgyud la 'khrungs pa'i sum pa lo tsA ba'i blo sbyong snyan brgyud du grags pa thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi zin bris kyi steng nas nyams 'khrid du legs par nas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje phag mo /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
sum pa lo tsA ba /
chos rjes paN /
'gro mgon 'phags pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
brag phug ba bsod nams dpal /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun kun spangs chos rje /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags mchog byams pa skal bzang /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' drin mnyam med sems dpa' chen po gnas gsar ba mgon po bsod nams mchod ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+del stsal to / /
yang na bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan nas /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje bsod nams sangs rgyas /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po man 'dra /
yang na rje rdo ring pa nas /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang nas paN nas grub thob mtsho 'phrad pa rin cen bzang po /
'dar phyar yin /
mkhas grub chos rje /
ri khrod ras chen /
pradz+nya bo d+hi /
don zhags pa sangs rgyas rin cen /
'khrul zhig grags pa tshul khrims /
mkhan chen rgyal ba bzang po /
mkhan chen bsod nams rin cen /
@# / /
chos rje gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
drin can mkhyen rab chos rje /
drin can rdo ring ba man 'dra /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gi lung yang thob / /
! mkhas pa chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog dang mus chen sems dpa' chan po dkon cog rgyal mtshan dpon slob gnyis kyis theg pa chen po blo sbyong gi rgya gzhung bod gzhung shin tu gces pa rnams phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'i skor la /
mus chen sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa'i glegs bam ka? dkar chag /
jo bo chen po lha gcig gis rgyal srid spangs nas thar bar byon pa'i rnam par ka? thar pa bla ma'i yon tan chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa /
jo bo rjes mnyam med gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa'i drung du byang chub kyi sems 'tshol ba'i slang du dka' ba spyad nas byon pa'i rnam ka? thar jo bo chen po nyid kyis gsungs pa /
jo bo chen po a ti shas mdzad pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma'i ka? gzhung rgyas pa mtshan bcas /
rtsa ba 'di gnyis la mang nyung yod pas lung so sor gnang ba de ka dngos gtsang /
de las btus pa'i rtsa ka? ba mtshan med gcig /
'gor bde legs kun 'byung rin thang med pa'i sku zhes yod pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma'i 'grel pa bka' gdams ka? yang snying ngo mchar cha'a'i mtha' can /
'jigs pa'i gcan gzan sna chogs rgyu ba'i nags khrod du lung rigs dang rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po d+harma rak+Shi tas bla ma dam pa'i gsung ltar bsdebs nas jo po a ti sha la gnang ba'i dgra bo gnad la dbab pa'i blo sbyong mtshon cha kha? 'khor lo /
rin ga po'i khong gseng na gnas pa'i bla ma dam pa bshad ma thag pas mdzad pa'i blo sbyong rma bya dug kha? 'joms /
bla ma byams pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gyer sgom rdo rje'i glu ga? blangs pas chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du byams pa lha'i rgyal bo'i cha byad kyis gsungs pa jo bo chen pos bod du lkog khrid du mdzad pa /
byams pa'i rnal 'byor pa lugs kyi blo sbyong sems dpa'i rim pa las nyon mongs ga? pa gtan la dbab pa'i chos /
blo sbyong sems dpa'i rim pa las bzlog phyogs ka? gnyen po'i chos /
blo sbyong sems dpa'i rim pa las rang rgyud ngan sma dbab ga? pa'i chos /
blo sbyong sems dpa'i rim pa las zag bcas dge ba'i stobs bskyed ga? pa'i chos /
gser gling pas jo bo la mtha' 'khol 'dul ba'i ched du gnang ba'i nga? blo sbyong gi rtsa ba /
'di dang 'og gi 'grel ba'i nang gi rtsa ba gnyis zhus ngag mi pher ba 'dug /
nyon mongs lam du blang ba'i man ca? ngag nyon mongs pa thams cad la sbyar bar shes par bya ba /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor sbyor dngos mjug ca? gsum gyis bstan pa spyil bu pa'i zhal nas nga'i snying phyung nas bstan kyang sha dmar lhog lhog pa kham gcig las mi gda' zhes bsngags par mdzad pa /
yi ge gsum la ca? brten nas sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyong pa /
'dis lung rgyun snang bas dkar chag dang gsan yig na mi gsal ba chad dam snyam /
rdo rje sems dpa' la brten nas sha 'khon sbyong pa'i man ca? ngag /
rdo rje gdan gyi shar phyogs nas rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyi dri ba dris lan gyi tshul gyis jo bo chen po la sems @# / /
sbyong cha? bar bskul nas gnang ba'i blo sbyong /
'di la lo rgyus las blo sbyong dngos gzhi ma byung ba gsang sngags lcags 'di gsungs zhes pa lhar ba 'di kha'i gong 'og gnyis po su rigs shig yin nas snyam /
jo bo chen pos gsungs pa'i phan yon brgyad dang ldan pa'i ku su lu'i tshogs cha? gsog kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shI sa khro phu lo tsA bar gnang ba'i blo sbyong sgyid ja? sdug lam 'khyer gyi man ngag go'i mtha' can /
'jam dbyangs los zur chag tu 'di ltar grags dbyang dge ba can te ku sA lir bzhed la lo chen byang rtses ma bcos pa'am lhug bzhes pa'i skad dod yin gsungs /
grub thob sum pa lo tsA ba la mkha' 'gro ma dmar ldo gnyis kyi dri ba dris lan gyi chul gyis gnang ba'i snyan brgyud nya? blo sbyong 'chi rgyu med pa lags so'i mtha' can /
rigs gsum mgon po las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mdzad pa rlabs che bar bstan pa'i kun tu bzang po'i blo sbyong ta? 'khor ba ma stongs par du 'byung gsung ba'i mtha' can /
jo bo chen po la byang chub kyi sems ston pa'i bla ma gsum gyi nang nas gser gling pa lhag pa'i lo rgyus dang bcas pa'i blo sbyong thun brgyad tha? ma zho sha mi bsri bar phan 'dogs gsung ba'i mtha' can /
thun brgyad ma lag len du byed tshul dge bshes ston pa'i tha? man ngag la zas la brten pa'i blo sbyong le'u dang po /
dbugs la brten pa'i blo sbyong le'u gnyis pa /
lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sprul nas rigs drug gi sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i blo sbyong le'u gsum pa /
sha khrag gtang ba'i blo sbyong le'u bzhi pa /
gtor ma la brten pa'i blo sbyong le'u lnga pa /
'byung ba la brten pa'i blo sbyong le'u drug pa /
lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher sprul ba'i blo sbyong le'u bdun pa /
'chi kha ma'i blo sbyong gi man ngag le'u brgyad pa rnams /
ltas ngan g.yang du len pa sogs man ngag bzhi la brten pa'i blo sbyong gegs sel tha? 'dod thog tu byed pa yin gyi mtha' can /
brjed pa'i gnas bzhi dang 'chor ba'i gnas bzhi la brten pa'i ma'ongs pa'i 'gal rkyen spong ba'i blo sbyong tha? dpal mar me mdzad nas brgyud pa'i gdams pa /
'gor dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lam gyi mchog ces yod pa'i jo bo'i blo sbyong nga? don bdun ma mdo dang bstan bcos rnams la legs par blta'o'i mtha' can /
blo sbyong yid bzhin nor bu dang lhan thabs bzhi pa che bar yang grags /
blo sbyong thun gcig na? ma zhas pa dpal snar thang gi mkhan po mchims nam mkha' grags pas mdzad pa /
mnyam med jo bo chen po bod du 'byon khar rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu la spyi chos su pa? gdams pa /
dpal ldan bir+wa ba'i blo sbyong dar paN gyi gsung glo bo lo tsA ba'i 'khrid yig mnyam med snying rje'i pha? man ngag /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen glang thang pa chen pos mdzad pa'i blo sbyong tshig rkar brgyad ma'i rtsa ba? ba la 'chad ga ngas? 'grel pa mdzad pa smon lam yang yang gdab par bya'o'i mtha' can /
de'i zhar byung du a tsar gzugs ngan gyi gtam rgyud yod pa /
mgon pho a ti sha la gser gling pa chos kyi grags pas gsungs pa'i gong gi mtha' 'kho ba 'dul ba'i nga? rtsa ba /
'dra men la 'grel pa dang bcas pa gsung bar gda' 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor byams pa thogs med la sogs dang zhes yod pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma sde snong thams cad kyi bcud tig pa'i @# / /
nying nga? khu'o'i mtha' can /
'gro kun mkhyen thugs ni brtse ba'i dbang sgyur cing zhes yod pa'i snar thang pa sangs rgyas sgom pas mdzad pa'i blo sbyong tshogs cha? bshad chen mo /
zhang rat+na gu ru'i tshogs chos kyang zer /
'dus byas la rtag pa med kyi zhes sogs rgyal ba yang dgon pas mdzad pa'i blo sbyong nyams lan gnad thog ma? tu skyong ngo'i mtha' can /
jo bo rje lha gcig gi blo sbyong byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas na rten 'brel tsa? snying po zhes bya'o'i mtha' can rnams /
rten 'brel snying po'i 'khrid kyang zer /
dkar chag tu mi gsal ba blo sbyong ka? gsung sgros ma'i kha skong du mus chen sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas sgom pa'i tshogs bshad nas btus te mdzad pa rnams legs par thob pa'i /
ka'i rtags yod pa rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /

gu Na mi tra /

dbu mdzad yon tan dpal /
mkhan bad pa dpal /
dka' bzhi ba grags gzhon /
byang sems bsod nams grags pa /
rgyal sras thogs med pa /
mang mkhar tshul khrims dpal /
sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal mchog /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
rje btsun sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
mus pa grub pa'i dbang phyug /
'jam dbyangs ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'khon ston bsod nams dbang phyug /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
rnam thar chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
mus chen sems dpa' chen pa nas /
rgyal ba byams chen rab 'byams pa /
rje kun dga' chos bzang /
mnga' ris pa lha dbang blo gros /
bla ma byams pa phun tshogs /
rje dpal 'byor shes rab /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /

lha 'gro ba'i mgon po /
'od 'jo ba /
lo pa spyan snga'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis gcig tu byas nas smra ston zhes snang bsad byad /
mkhan po dmar ston /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
don zhags pa sangs rgyas rin cen /
bla ma grags pa tshul khrims /
chos rje rgyal ba bzang po /
gnubs chos lung pa bsod nams rin cen /
mkhan chen gzhon nu rgyal mchog man 'dra /
yang na don zhags pa nas /
'chad ka ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan kun dga' blo gros /
gnyug la paN chen /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags /
lo gzims 'og pa byams pa chos 'byor dpal bzang /
yangs can spyan sda rnam rgyal dpal bzang /
stag lung pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'ol ba pa ngag dbang chos grags /

ge dang sha bo sgang pa gnyis la gnang /
de gnyis gyis slob dpon zhang zhung pa dang tam tang bu khur gnyis la gnang /
de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas jo bo la gnang /
lung nang mkhan po /

chos kyi g.yung drung /
snye phu rgya sgom /
brag ram pa /

shes rab 'bum /
thogs med bzang po dpal /
mang mkhar tshul khrims dpal /
sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal mchog man mtshon cha 'khor lo dang 'dra / /
! byang sems r+wa bsgreng pas mdzad pa'i blo sbyong byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyi brgyud pa ni /
lha ston pa yan blo sbyong don bdun ma dang 'dra ba la /
de nas lha brag kha ba /
lha zur khang pa /
lha chos sku blo gros 'od /
de la byang sems seng ge rgyal mtshan /
lha shAkya bsod nams rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la byang sems r+wa bsgreng ba /
bar 'dir bla ma gsum tsam zhig ma rnyed /
rim bzhin lha btsun bsod nams dpal bzang /
brag dgon spyan snga /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /
kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! rje btsun sa skya pa chen pos zla ba drug @# / /
gi par du 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jam dbyangs gtso 'khor gsum ba zhal gzigs pa'i gtso bos dngos su gsungs pa'i blo sbyong zhen pa bzhi bral /
de'i 'grel pa rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
sa skya paN+Di tas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa /
'gor rje btsun chen pos skya pa'i zhal nas zhes yod ba'i zhen pa bzhi bral gyi gdams pa nub pa rig 'dzin grags gyis mdzad pa /
zhen pa bzhi bral gyi dmigs 'khrid byang chub sems dpa' ra lod rdo rjes bskul ba la brten nas kun ma? byen bsod nams seng ges mdzad pa /
'khrid yig bla ma kun dga' legs pa'i gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas dge slong kun dga' legs pa'i rin chen gyis zin bris su bkod de chos rje rdo rje 'chang la gzigs su phul nas dag par byas pa rnams legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin chen /
paN chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
rje bkra shis brtan pa /
spyan snga dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgya mtsho /
mus ba grub pa'i dbang po /
khri chen kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na kun mkhyen go bo nas /
paN chen kong ston /
rje bkra shis brtan pa man 'dra /
yang na dor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
rje dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
mus pa dkon cog rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
kun dga' mchog ldan /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN chen /
r+wa ston yon tan dpal bzang /
glo bo mkhan chen /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
sa chen la gnang ba'i rtsa tshig gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos rgyal /
lung rig rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal bzang /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa nas rim par nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o /
po ta ba chen po'i dpe chos rin chen spungs pa dan de'i 'grel pa btsun pa shes rab rdo rjes mdzad pa'i lung gi brgyud pa ni /
po to ba /
dge bshes grab pa /
'di gnyis gcig mi gcig brtag /
dge bshes brag dkar pa /
lce sgom 'dul ba rdo rje /
shes rab rdo rje'ang? zer /
rje smon lam mgon po /
bla ma rin chen ye shes /
rgyal ba'i sras po thogs med pa /
rgya ma ba yon tan 'od /
hor dga' bzhi ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
rje dpal ldan bzang po /
byang sems sbyin pa ba /
bla ma nam mkha'i mtshan can /
r+wa ston yon tan dpal bzang /
mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
dor chen lha mchog seng ge /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal @# / /
mtshan /
paN chen thar rtse pa /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
sems dpa' chen po zha lu pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rgyal sras thogs med pa nas /
dpal ldan ye shes /
hor dka' bzhi pa man 'dra / /
! dpe chos la nye bar mkho ba'i gtam rgyud rin chen 'phreng mdzes rje dpal yes mdzad pa dang /
lce sgom shes rab rdo rjes mdzad pa'i man ngag rin chen spungs pa le'u bcu gsum ma gnyis kyi lung brgyud ni /
dpal ldan ye shes bzhugs pa'i dpe chos kyi brgyud pa dang gcig go /
gtam rgyud rin cen 'phreng mdzes kyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rgya ma ba yon tan 'od nas /
'phags pa blo 'phel /
tshul khrims dar /
bsod nams lha dbang /
ngag dbang chos grags /
brag dgon spyan snga /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
ji skad du /
'dzam gling mkhas pa yongs kyi gtsug gi rgyan / /
snyan pa'i ba dang 'gro na lhang de ba / /
klu sgrub thogs med gnyis las rim bzhin du / /
legs brgyud byang chub lam gyi rim pa ni / /
skye rgu'i 'dod don ma lus skong bas na / /
gdams pa rin chen dbang gi rgyal po ste / /
gzhung bzang stong gi chu bo 'du ba'i phyir / /
dpal ldan legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho'ang yin / /
zhes shing rta chen bo rnam pa gnyis kyi bzhed gzhung dpal mar me mdzad nas chu bo gcig tu 'dres pa byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i dgongs pa bka' gdams rin po che bstan rim rnams su bkral ba mkhan chen phyag rdor ba dang /
mkhan chen chos skyob bzang po gnyis la thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen pos legs par gsan te byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bstan bcos che chung gnyis mdzad pa nyams 'khrid du nos pa la rgya chen spyod pa'i brgyud dang zab mo lta brgyud gnyis las /
dang po ni /
sangs rgyas zas gtsang sras po /
rgyal ba ma pham pa /
shing rta chen po thogs med /
mkhas mchog dbyig gnyen /
'phags pa rnam grol sde /
btsun pa rnam grol sde /
slob dpon mchog gi sde /
rgyal sras dul ba'i sde /
mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho /
rnam rnang? 'dzad /
slob dpon seng ge bzang po /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
paN+Di ta chen po mar me mdzad /
'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
'dzeng dgon pa ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
sne'u zur ba ye shes 'bar? /
thag ma pa ka ba dar seng /
shud bu nam mkha' seng ge /
slob dpon nam mkha' rgyal po /
rgyal sras seng ge bzang po /
slob dpon rgyal sras bzang po /
gsang pa dag nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rgyal ba gnyis pa btsong kha pa slo bzang grags ba'i dpal /
mkhas grub shes rab seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa /
nges par zung 'jug brnyes pa'i mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
khri rin po che bde ba can ba dge legs dpal bzang /
lha'i btsun pa mkhas grub bsod nams dpal 'thang /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
brag dgon spyan snga ga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong @# / /
kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
bka' drin mnyam med kun mkhyen dpal 'byor 'phrin las rab rgyas /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na rgyal ba 'brom nas /
spyan snga tshul khrims 'bar /
bya yul pa gzhon nu 'od /
sgyer sgom pa gzhon nu grags /
sangs rgyas dbon ston gzhon nu 'byung gnas /
shud bu ba nam mkha' rgyal po man gong bzhin no / /
yang na 'brom chos kyi rgyal po /
po to ba rin cen gsal /
sha ra ba yon tan grags /
'chang ka ba ye shes rdo rje /
spyil bu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
lha lung gi dbang phyug byang chub rin cen /
'gro mgon dbang phyug 'od /
zangs chen pa ngar ma bsod nams /
mtsho sna pa shes rab bzang po /
mon grab pa tshul khrims bkra shis gnyal mkhan chen chos skyob bzang po /
rje btsun btsong kha pa man gong bzhin no / /
zab mo lta brgyud ni /
thub dbang nyi ma'i gnyen /
mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa /
rig ba'i khu byug /
khu byug gnyis pa /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
'brom chos kyi rgyal po /
dgon pa ba man rgya chen spyod brgyud bzhin no / /
yang na 'brom nas /
spyan snga tshul khrims 'bar man 'dra /
yang na 'brom nas /
po to ba man 'da /
deng sang rang phyogs kyi brgyud 'dzin phal chen lam rim gsol 'debs su tshig nyung ba gtsor bton gyi sbubs 'dren mdzad pa ma dgongs bar rgya chen spyod pa dgon pa ba dang /
zab mo lta ba po to ba nas brgyud pa lta bu mdzad pa ni zhib mor ma dpyad pa'i rtsing chos kho nar snang ste de ltar na brgyud pa gnyis ka la lam gyi rim pa phyogs re ba las lus yongs su ma rdzog pa'i skyon 'dug pa dgongs 'tshal lo / /
! lam sgron gyi brgyud pa ni /
jo bo rje nas /
mtsho snang? shes rab bzang po yan gong ltar la /
de nas slob dpon dga' ba bzang po /
mkhan chen chos skyob bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa man 'dra /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i byang chub lam rim gyi 'khrid yig bdud rtsi gser gyi yang zhan gyi lung gi brgyud pa'ang bshad ma thag pa ltar ro / /
! byang chub lam rim chen mo'i dka' ba'i gnas mtha' dag zhi ba mor 'grol ba'i rgyas bshad dang rtogs sla bltar snang ba la tshig gi lo mas don bsgribs nas d+ph+yang dka' ba rnams snying por bsgril nas don 'bru mdzad pa'i bshad lung yongs su rdzogs pa lan gnyis kyi bar nan tan du nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rgyal ba btsong kha ba chen po yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de nas rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pa dar ma rin cen /
bla chen nyan po shAkya rgyal mtshan /
se ra mkhas btsun don yod dpal ldan /
se ra rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
khri rin po che dge 'dun rgyal mtshan /
gsung rab rgya mtsho'i ded dpon stag lung brag pa blo gros rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs sma ba'i nyi ma dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! lam rim chung ba'i lhag mthong gi dka' gnad kyi zhib bshad nos pa'i brgyud pa'ang brjod ma thag pa bzhin no / /
! bka' gdams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gong ma rnams kyi gsung sgres sems 'dul ba'i rim pa gtso bor mdzad pa 'ga' zhig phyogs gcig @# / /
tu lcer sgom gyis bsdoms pa da lta bka' gdams thor bur grags pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
grub thob lcer sgom pa /
'jam ston rnal 'byor zhig po brtson 'grus seng ge /
mkhas pa brtson 'grus shes rab /
'brom ston /
?'di 'khrom rgyal ba'i byung gnas dang mi gcig /
lha rin ba /
'dul ba rdo rje /
'jad pa jo sras /
mkhas btsun bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
bla ma dkon cog rdo rje /
bla ma byang chub pa /
bla ma shA ka 'od pa /
chos rje blo gros bzang po /
chos rje bka' gyur ba /
lo pa spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa dpal 'byor 'phrin las rab rgyas /
des bdag za ho ra ben+de la'o / /
yang na spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags nas /
mus chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
chos rje kun dga' legs grub /
rje byams pa phun tshogs /
rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor shes rab /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
mkhan chen dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zhul ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! dpal mar me mdzad la shing rta chen po gnyis kyi gdams pa ma lus pa mnga' ba'i bstan bcos mtha' klas na'ang de'i nang nas thogs med sku mched kyi dgongs pa phyin ci ma log pa'i lta spyod ston pas rgyan gnyis /
klu sgrub yab sras kyi dgongs pa phyin ci ma log pa'i lta spyod rdzogs par ston pa bslab spyod gnyis /
de thams cad kyi yan lag 'chad pa skyes rabs dang brjod bya sna tshogs pa ston pas nye bar mkho ba ched du brjod pa'i tshom gnyis te bka' gdams gzhung drug tu grags pa las byang sa dang mdo sde rgyan gyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ston pa thub pa'i dbang po /
rgyal tshab byams pa /
'phags pa thogs med /
slod dpon dbyig gnyen /
mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa /
pu N+ya shId+ha /
gang ba spel /
gang+gA d+ha ra /
lo ba'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis 'dug kyang rje mkhyen brtse'i der mi snang bas brtag /
gang+gA dzi na rat+na /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
kha che sadz+dza na /
paN+Di ta par he ta /
'di lo pa spyan snga'i gsan yig na tsam ba po che dang gcig bar mdzad 'dug pa dbyad /
bla ma blo gros grags pa /
mar pa jo ban /
mchims ston don grub /
mchims brtson 'grus seng ge /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
skyi ston shAkya 'bum /
skyi ston grags rgyal /
'jam dbyangs kang zer /
kun mkhyen jo nang pa /
sa bzang ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang gzhon nu blo gros /
rje kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
thar lam gsal sgron /
lo ba'i gsan yig na 'di bzhin byung 'tshom sogs gzhan gyi skabs dkon cog tshul khrims dang rat+na A kA ri'i bar du bla ma'i rigs mi 'dug cing mi'i mang mi 'dra 'dug pas dpang /
mkhan chen rat+na A ka ra /
rje btsun ngag dbang grags pa dpal bzang /
gnyug la paN chen yang zer /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rtses dang drung chen dpal 'byor bsod nams lhun grub /
shes bya kun mkhyen pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur chen chos kyi rgyal po @# / /
chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na brgyud pa 'di mdo sde rgyan khe rkyang du mdzad kyang lo phyogs kyi gsan yig la sa rgyan gnyis ka'i brgyud par mdzad 'dug pa bka' gdams kyi 'byung khrungs yin pas khungs dang 'brel ba yod dam snyam /
yang mdo sde rgyan gyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
kha che blo brtan nas /
rig pa'i khu byug /
mche ba'i sda /
bzang po'i zhabs /
mar me mdzad /
gang+gA d+ha ra /
bsod nams dpal /
kha che dgon pa pa /
bram ze saM g+ha /
kha che ye shes dpal /
rdog lo /
ba reg lo tsA ba rgyal mtshan /
ba reg ston skyabs /
skyes bu yon tan dga' /
bkra shis rdo rje /
'dul 'dzin pa /
nyang ro kun rdor /
dar ma 'od zer /
tshad ma'i skyes bu /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
nya dban /
re mdA pa /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa /
rgyal tshab rje /
gung ru rin byang /
slob dpon gnyal ston pa /
rje chos dpal rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma grags pa /
chos kyi bshes gnyen /
blo bzang e waM /
rgyal khang rtse pa /
rje pha bong kha pa man 'dra /
slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i byang sa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
de bzhin gshegs pa /
mgon po byams pa /
slob dpon thogs med /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen /
kha che blo gros brtan pa /
slob dpon gang ba spel /
de la dzi na mi tra /
dA na shI la /
in+d+ra b+hU ti gsum gyis gsan /
de gsum la ska ba dpal brtsegs /
cog gru klu'i rgyal mtshan /
zhang ye shes sde gsum gyis gsan /
de gsum la lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje /
nas nad zla ba'i rdo rje /
dbas rgyal ba ye shes gsum gyis gsan /
de gsum la grus rgyal ba ye shes kyis gsan /
kun mkhyen bu dang mkhan dag chos ba sogs kyi gsan yig na 'di rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du gnang ba las sdebs su gsan pa'i gsal kha ma byung yang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang ba nye brgyud ring brgyud kyi khyad yin nam yig sbyon bzhin yan sogs dpyad par bya'o / /
de nas gru mchog gi ye shes /
se btsun dbang phyug gzhon nu /
'brom gyi bla ma de yin nam snyam /
'gar mi yon tan g.yung drung /
khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung /
ra khri bzang 'od /
rgya rgyal tshul /
li ston chos grags /
da gnyis la brang ti dar ma snying po dang ko ye 'byung gnyis kyis gsan /
de gnyis la rog chos brtson /
de nas mchims brtson seng /
mchims don ne /
mchims blo brtan /
zhang ston bsod nams rin cen /
po dong rin rtse /
brtson 'grus rdo rje dang gcig 'dra ba dpyad /
stag sde ba seng ge rgyal mtshan drang lung pa thugs rje shes rab /
rin cen ye shes /
rgyal sras thogs med pa /
rgya ma yon tan 'od /
chos rje bsod nams blo gros /
dka' bcu pa dar ma bzang /
mkhan chen shes rab rgya mtsho /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje man gong ltar ro / /
! slob dpon shan+ta de was mdzad pa'i bslab pa kun las btus kyi lung brgyud ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
'jam dbyangs A tsar+ya shan+ta de wa pA da /
slob dpon e la d+ha ri /
slob dpon shu raM ga se na /
dba' bo rdo rje zer /
slob dpon d+harma kIrti /
gser gling pa /
@# / /
jo bo dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na /
'brom chos kyi rgyal po /
bo to ba rin cen gsal /
sha ra ba yon tan grags /
chos lung ba shes rab grags /
gtum ston blo gros grags /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu 'di ltar snang la lo pa sbyan snga'i gsan yig na 'di dang gong ma gcig tu mdzad 'dug pas brtag /
gro mo che pa bdud rtsi grags /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na gro'i rjes su mchims byas pa'ang snang zer ba'i mtshan bu zhig 'dug /
zhang btsun pa /
zhang ston pa /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
bcom ldan ral gi /
skyi ston shAka 'bum /
skyi ston 'jam dbyangs /
grags pa rgyal mtshan yang zer /
kun mkhyen dol po ba /
mkhan chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
rtogs ldan ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rje grags don pa /
chos rje bka' 'gyur ba shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims /
mkhan chen rat+na A kA ra man sa rgyan thun mong gi brgyud pa dang 'dra /
yang na zhi ba lha /
dze tA ri /
shes rab blo gros 'byung gnas /
d+ha na shrI /
su ma ti kIrti /
rngog lo blo ldan shes rab /
khyung rin cen grags /
zhang tshe spong ba chos kyi bla ma /
nyang bran chos seng /
gtsang nag pa /
rma bya shAka seng /
mkhan chen bde ldan grub pa /
mkhan chen rdog ye /
bla ma shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bla ma shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
rje grags don pa man 'dra /
rgyal ba'i sras po zhi ba lhas mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i lung brgyud ni /
ston mchog shAkya'i rgyal po /
lha mchog 'jam dpal dbyangs /
slob dpon zhi ba lha /
paN+Di ta mi brjed gzungs thob /
grub chen dze tA ri /
paN chen tsan+d+ra kIrti ki tsu /
zla ba grags pa chung ba zer /
paN chen puN+ya shrI /
bal po kan ka pa /
paN+Di ta sum ti kIrti /
blo gros legs pa grags /
rdog lo blo ldan shes rab /
zhang tshe spong ba chos kyi bla ma /
nyang bran pa chos kyi seng ge /
gtsang nag pa brtson 'grus seng ge /
dpal ldan gro /
mchims chen po /
skyi ston shAka 'bum /
skyi ston 'jam dbyangs /
kun mkhyen dol po ba /
ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge /
rgyal sras sangs rgyas rin cen /
gnyug la ngag dbang grags pa man sa rgyan thun mong gi brgyud pa dang gcig /
yang na rngog yo nas /
khyung rin cen grags /
stod lung rgya dmar ba /
cha pa chos kyi seng ge /
'jad pa ston skyabs /
mus srad pa chen po /
gtsang po ba bsod nams mdzes /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
dka' bzhi pa grags gzhon /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
kar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po man gong dang 'dra /
yang na rngog lo nas /
gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas /
cha pa chos kyi seng ge man gong ltar ro / /
yang na cha pa chos kyi seng ge nas /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs sa paN /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal man 'dra /
yang na rgyal sras zhi ba lha nas /
thams cad brtsegs /
shAkya ma ti /
gu Na pu N+ya /
su ma ti kIrti /
rngog lo man 'dra /
slob dpon chen @# / /
po dpa' bos mdzad pa'i skyes rabs so bzhi pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rgyal ba zas gtsang sras po /
mgon po 'jam dbyangs /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
mkhas mchog dpa' bo /
'jam dpal grags pa /
shin+ti pa /
se'u ri pa /
'jigs med grags pa /
dge 'byung sbas pa /
rdo rje gdan pa che 'bring chung gsum /
chos kyi bshes gnyen /
pu N+ya shrI /
steng pa lo tsA ba /
so 'dzam gling rgyan /
lho pa kun mkhyen /
bla ma rgya /
karma pa rang byung rdo rje /
sngags 'chang g.yung ston rdo rje dpal /
rnga rol ba'i rdo rje /
lho rin po che grags pa yon tan /
chos rje grags pa 'byung gnas /
mi pham gnyis pa tshul khrims dar /
spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan man sa rgyan thun mong gi brgyud pa dang gcig /
yang na slob dpon dpa' bo nas legs ldan 'byed /
zla ba grags pa /
rig pa'i khu byug /
ku mA ra lak+Sha /
ha su ma ti /
dza ya A nan+da /
khu lo tsA ba /
legs ldan pa /
gtsang nag pa /
gshen chu skor ba /
gtsang pa jo nag pa /
'od zer mgon po /
'jam dbyangs shAkya gzhon nu /
rje rang byung rdo rje man 'dra /
slob dpon 'dis thog ma stag mo lus sbyin gyi rtogs brjod mdzad pa'i rten 'brel gyis 'khrungs rabs so bzhi song mtshams stag gis skyon nas rtsom 'phror lus pa dang la la dag brgya rtsa rdzogs par mdzad kyang slob dpon stag gis zos nas yun ring po'i bar ma tshor bas 'khrungs rabs so lnga man thigs pas chud zos pas so bzhi yan las ma byung ba'i lo rgyus snang bas gang ltar kyang slob dpon 'dis dngos su gzhan la bklag lung ma gnang ba 'dra zhig 'dug mod /
'on kyang mkhas grub thams cad kyi gsan yig na lung rgyun yod par mdzad pas med pa ni ci la srid /
yang lo tsA ba'i 'gyur lung tsam la ngos bzung ba yin na ni brgyud pa gong ma rnams 'dren don mi 'dug pa rnam dpyod kyi khur dang ldan pa rnams kyis ljags ring du rkyong bar rigs so / /
! dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa'i ched du brjod pa'i tshom gyi brgyud pa ni /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
kun dga' bo /
dgra bcom pa rak+Shi ta /
dgra bcom pa chos skyob /
dgra bcom pa kr-iSh+Na'i gos can /
dgra bcom pa sha na'i gos can /
dgra bcom pa nyi ma gung pa /
rgyal rigs thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
Ar+ya de wa /
'jam dpal grags pa rat+na A ka ra shan+ti /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba /
bar ba /
chung ba /
paN chen shAkya shrI /
dbyal chos bzang /
dbyal padmo can /
mkhan po gzhon nu ye shes /
rong pa sher seng /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma mgon po 'bum /
spus ston bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma chos dpal shes rab /
slob dpon bsod nams seng ge /
rin po che grags pa don grub /
dgra bcom pa rin cen grags pa /
bka' 'gyur ba shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims mkhan chen rat+na A kA ra man sa rgyan thun mong gi brgyud pa dang gcig go /
'khrungs rabs so bzhi pa'i bshad lung rdzogs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho yan khungs ma chod /
de nas zhal snga @# / /
nas bde ba can pa /
khri rin po che rgyal khang rtse pa /
'jam dbyangs stag lung brag pa /
rje btsun bla ma dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! dpal mnyam med dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na'i thugs dam du mdzad pa'i chos chung brgya rtsar grags pa /
byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rgya gar gyi baN+Di ta dI paM kA ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur /
spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma jo bos ne pA la'i yul du grogs po'i don du mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang nag tsho lo tsA'i 'gyur /
bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa gser gling rgyal pos dge slong de wa ma ti btang ba'i ngor jo bos mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA brgya brtson seng gi 'gyur /
dbu ma'i man ngag jo bo dang nag tsho lo tsA ba'i 'gyur /
snying po bsdu ba jo bo dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims 'byung gnas de brtsa'i 'gyur /
snying po nges par bsdu ba jo bos snye thang du mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang nag tsho lo tsA'i 'gyur /
byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i 'phreng ba jo bo nyid kyis sgra rang bsgyur du mdzad pa /
chos rje dpa' bo'i gsan yig na 'di bka' gdams kyi rtsa ba yin pas 'brom gyis gsungs pa'i phyogs mdzad pa ni cung zad ma dgongs par mngon te pha 'gro ma ston gyis zhus nas jo bos gsungs pa la pha chos dang bu khu rdog gis zhus nas gsungs par bu chos zhes grags pas so / /
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdo tsam gdams ngag tu byas pa 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung par byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu jo bo dang lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur ba la slar yang nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas 'gyur bcos mdzad pa /
tshul khrims kyi spyod pa'i glu paN+Di ta badzra bA Ni dang chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
chos kyi dbyings su blta ba'i glu jo bo dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur /
dran pa gcig pa'i man ngag jo bos lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i dor mdzad pa lo paN de gnyis kyi 'gyur /
byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i lam la 'jug par bstan pa jo bos lha bla ma byang chub 'od kyi don du mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur /
skyabs su 'gro ba bstan pa 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
theg pa chen po'i lam gyi sgrub thabs yi ge bsdus pa jo bo dang lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur /
theg pa chen po'i lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa 'gyur byang gong 'dra /
rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa 'gyur byang gong dang 'dra ba /
mdo sde'i don kun las btus pa'i man ngag jo bo dang nag tsho lo tsA'i 'gyur /
mi dge ba bcu'i las lam bstan pa 'gyur gong 'dra /
las rnam par 'byed pa 'gyur gong dang 'dra /
ting nge 'dzin tshogs kyi le'u jo bo dang dge slong shAkya blo gros kyi 'gyur /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga /
kha ton dang glegs bam bklag pa'i sngon du bya ba'i cho ga /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na kha ton dang glegs bam gnyis chos tshan so sor phral 'dug cing thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na gcig tu mdzad /
pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga /
bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa gong gsal bzhi po de la 'gyur byang mi gsal /
sems bskyed @# / /
pa dang sdom pa'i tshe ga'i rim pa jo bo dang dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur slar yang paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa /
chos tshan nyer drug po 'di rnams dpal dI paM kA ra nyid kyis mdzad pa yin /
slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta pu N+ya shra'i mi tra dang lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyi 'gyur /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang ban+de ye shes sde'i 'gyur /
slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang yid dam blang ba'i cho ga mkhan po chen po su ma ti kIrti dang lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na sems bskyed dang yid dam blang ba kha phral te adki yang so sor snang ngo / /
slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam rgyal gsang ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i las dang po ba'i sa sbyang ba slob dpon kr-iSh+Na pa dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i sems rin po che rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i springs yig A tsar+y+ya du lo pa dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
dpe rnying pa 'dra na dgra las rgyal zhes pa las rnam mi 'dug pa rgya skad sor bzhag bsgyur ba 'dra ste slob dpon dze tA ri yin par mjug tu /
'jam dpal rdo rjes byin brlabs pa'i / /
dze tA ris mdzad gzhung 'di la / /
brten nas rang sems sbyang ba la / /
mkhas pa rnams kyis brtson par rigs / /
zhes snang bas bod skad la rnam bsnan pa legs par mngon no / /
slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bshes pa'i sbrings yig slob dpon sarba dz+nya de wa dang lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i slob ma la spring pa'i yi ge lo paN bshad ma thag pa'i 'gyur /
slob dpon ma tr-i tsi tras mdzad pa'i rgyal po ka ni ka la springs pa'i yi ge paN+Di ta bi hya kA ra pra b+ha dang lo tsA ba rin cen mchog gis bsgyur ba slar yang A tsar+y+ya dpal brtsegs kyis bcos pa /
slob dpon don yod 'char gyis rgyal po snyan ngag mkhan la gdams pa'i ma khol /
dri ma med pa'i dris lan rin cen 'phreng ba zhes bya ba paN+Di ta ka ma la gup+ta dang lo chen rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa sarba dz+nya de wa dang lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i shes rab brgya pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa lo paN bshad ma thag pa'i 'gyur /
slob dpon btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon d+harma kA ra dang lo tsA ba gtsang de ben+d+ra rak+Shi ta'i 'gyur /
slob dpon mkhas mchog rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa slob dpon a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa paN chen bud+d+ha kA ra wa rma dang lo tsA ba @# / /
chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i mya ngan bsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon gsang ba byin gyis mdzad pa'i gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa 'gyur byad med pa /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i yon tan bdun yongs su brjod pa'i gtam paN+Di ta gang+gA d+ha ra dang lo chen rin bzang gi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam slob dpon dza lan d+ha ra dang lo tsA ba rin bzang gi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i tshogs kyi gtam paN+Di ta gang+gA d+ha ra dang lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur /
slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i mi khom pa brgyad kyi gtam slob dpon a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa'i legs par bshad pa rin po che za ma tog lta bu'i gtam le'u brgyad pa slob dpon ru tra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
la las 'di'i nang gi maN+Dal zur du phyud nas dpa' bos mdzad pa'i maN+Dal zhes ngos 'dzin pa'ang snang ngo / /
slob dpon ma tr-i tsi tras mdzad pa'i phyin ci log bzhi spong ba'i gtam paN+Di ta bud+d+ha b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba rin bzang gi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i rtsod pa'i dus kyi gtam slob dpon a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon sa 'tsho byin gyis mdzad pa'i dben pa'i gtam paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra dang lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyi 'gyur /
thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na chos byin zer ba 'dug kyang dpe rnying ba 'ga' dang /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang /
slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i rin cen 'phreng ba las byung ba'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa /
des ba tshwa can gyi chu klung gi mdo las byung ba'i sems can mgu bar bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig pa slob dpon bud+d+ha kA ra wa rma dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon btsun pa gzhan la phan ba'i dbyangs dgon pa pas mdzad pa'i smon lam bdun cu pa zhes bya pa'i tshigs su bcad pa paN+Di ta d+harma shrI b+ha tha dad lo tsA ba dpal gyi lhun po'i sde'i 'gyur /
mkhas mchog dpa' bo stag gis mngon par gtses ta nags khrod du snying rje chen pos kun nas blangs te smon lam 'di mdzad do / /
slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i don dam byang chub sems sgom pa'i rim pa rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba paN+Di ta padmA ka ra warma dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i kun rdzob byang chub sems sgom pa'i man ngag padma spungs pa zhes bya ba lo paN bshad ma thag pa'i 'gyur /
sems ni ras yug dkar po 'ang zhes sogs sh+lo ka bzhi pa zhig 'dug pa bstan bcos rtsom pa po dang lo paN gang gi gsung yin the tshom du snang /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdo las phyung ba'i 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa /
chos rjes su dran pa /
dge 'dun rjes su dran pa /
'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga'i nye sa dmigs bshad pa dang bcas pa'i bzhi slob dpon d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
'phags pa rtog pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde las byung ba'i sdig pa bshags pa'i @# / /
cho ga /
'di gnyis kyi bar na sgrub pa'i cho ga logs shig tu phyung ba zhes ba'i chos tshan gcig gong dgar ba'i gsan yig na 'dug kyang bshags pa sgrub pa zhes gcig tu byas pa las dpe so sor med /
bslab pa kun las btus las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga slob dpon zhi ba lhas mdzad pa /
thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig tu bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa adki so sor brgyab pa'i skyon gyis chos tshan brgya dang gsum yin khul la rtsi rgyu adgi brgya dang bzhi yong gi 'dug cing gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na'ang so sor phral 'dug rung chos tshan gcig yin /
slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i mdo sngags gnyis thun mong ba'i maN+Dal gyi chog 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
slob dpon dgra las rnam rgyal gsang bas mdzad pa'i maN+Dal 'bul ba'i cho ga a du lo pa dang chos kyi shes rab gyi 'gyur /
dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin cen 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyi 'gyur /
mtshan yongs grags slob dpon rdo rje gdan ba zer /
slob dpon rnyog pa med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga slob dpon a du lo pa dang lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon kaM ma las mdzad pa'i sngags kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga 'gyur rnying /
dpel las ka ma la shI las mjad zer ba snang ba mtshan la 'khrul gzhi byung ba 'dra yang ka ma la ni chu skyes kyi rigs dang kaM ma la ni zla bar 'jug go /
