slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u zhes bya ba slob dpon bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon nag po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u zhes bya ba paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pas mdzad pa'i bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par gzhag pa slob dpon d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba rin bzang gi 'gyur /
de'i 'grel pa slob dpon dA na shI las mdzad pa 'gyur byang gong dang 'dra ba /
sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa'i mdo las byung ba'i gnas dang spyad par mi bya ba ste ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gzhag ba rgya nag gi mkhan po hwa shang zab mo dang lo tsA ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'gyur /
dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor rtog pa'i gegs sel zhes bya ba 'gyur rnying yin zhing 'di gsang sngags yo ga'i rgyud la brten nas bshad pa 'dra zer ba snang ngo / /
mkhas pa chen po byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bden pa 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
slob dpon kA ma la shI las mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la 'jug pa slob dpon pradz+nya warma dang lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur /
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs kyi padma'i ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pa'i sde snod gsum pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i lam 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa slob dpon d+harma @# / /
shri dang lo tsA ba rin can bzang bo'i 'gyur /
slob dpon dge ba'i go chas mdzad pa'i mi sdug pa sgom pa'i rim pa 'gyur rnying /
mi gtsang ba sgom pa'i thabs bshad pa'ang zer /
slob dpon nag po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i lus yongs su dpyad pa'i sgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon de nyid dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
gsan yig rnams su sa mgo can bris 'dug kyang brjod don lus kyi phyi nang rnams la dpyad byed pa snang /
slob dpon chen po dpal ye shes grags pas mdzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa sgom pa'i rim pa'i man ngag slob dpon padmA ka ra warma dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon ma hA ma tis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bla na med par sgom pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes pa A tsar+y+ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyi 'gyur /
'di'i mjug tu mi mchog gang zhig gis ni zhes sogs tshig 'bru bcu gcig snang ba sus mdzad ma nges /
slob dpon chos kyi dbang pos mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag slob dpon ja lan d+ha ra dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
phyogs glang gis mdzad pa dang 'di gnyis bstan bcos rgya chen po ni thos nas kyang zhes pa nas bzung ste mang po rnams ni yang dag rdzogs par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar zhus dag phar yang 'go mjug mi gcig /
slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin cen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i man ngag slob dpon shan+ti b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba 'gos lhas bcas kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon ye shes zla bas mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor dbyod pa'i sgom pa'i don mdor bsdus ta bstan pa slob dpon pradz+nyA warma dang lo tsA ba ye shes sde'i 'gyur /
'di'i rtsa ba slob dpon klu'i bshas gnyen gyis mdzad /
mkhas pa chen po dze tA ris mdzad pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byad pa'i tshigs le'ur byas pa slob dpon shan+ti b+ha dra dang dge slong shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i yon tan bdun bstan pa'i gtam paN+Di ta ka ma la gup+ta dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po'i 'gyur /
mkhan po zhi ba lhas mdzad pa'i bslab pa kun las btus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
de'i mngon par rtogs pa dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur /
gser gling rgyal po dpal ldan chos skyong gis / /
bcom ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje mnyas byas pas / /
bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs / /
ka ma la dang mar me mdzad la gsungs / /
zhes gser gling pas mar me mdzad la bshad pa jo bos bla ma'i bka' bsdus nas mdzad pas mdzad pa po jo bo min nam snyam pa'i som nyi mi dgos so / /
'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po nyi shu pa kha che A nan+da dang lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur /
nges mdzad pa'i 'phags pa sa lu ljang pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa paN+Di ta d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba legs pa'i blo gros dang dz+nyA na ku mA ra'i 'gyur slad kyi dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta sa bcos pa /
des mdzad pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
des @# / /
mdzad pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i rnam par bshad pa /
de gnyis la 'gyur byang mi gsal /
des mdzad pa'i rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam zhes pa kha che shrI rA tha dang lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi rnam par bshad pa chos 'di'i mdzad pa po'i che ba dang brjod bya bzang ba dang rjod byed dbyings su gyur pa'i stobs kyis rtsal phyung zhing bsgyur ba mang du snang ba las lo tsA ba rab zhi chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur ba la gzhi byas gu rub chos kyi shes rab /
seng dkar shAkya 'od /
shes rab grags pa /
mar pa chos dbang /
pa tshab nyi ma grags /
mang na da grags 'byor shes rab bdun gyi 'gyur las don gang bzang phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa /
des mdzad pa'i bla na med par bstod pa paN+Di ta lo tra dang lo tsA ba shAkya 'od kyi 'gyur /
des mdzad pa'i srid pa las 'das par bstod pa kha che shrI rA tha dang lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyi 'gyur /
slob dpon dkon cog 'bangs kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa paN+Di ta sar+b+ba dz+nya de wa dang lo tsA ba rin can mchog gi 'gyur la ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bcos pa /
de'i 'grel pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa lo paN bshad ma thag pa'i 'gyur /
yang des mdzad pa'i yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas pa lo paN bshad ma thag pa'i 'gyur /
slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa'i khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa sgyur byed gong dang 'dra ba /
slob dpon bde byed bdag pos mdzad pa'i lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa sgyur byed gong dang 'dra ba /
slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa jo bo rje dang lo tsA ba rin bzang gi 'gyur /
slob dpon bi mA las mdzad pa'i skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa 'gyur byang mi gsal ba /
jo bo chen po a ti shas rgyal po na ra la pha la la brdzangs pa'i dri ma med pa rin po che'i 'phrin yig de nyid dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur rnams /
'di dang byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i 'phreng ba gnyis phal cher gcig pas dpe sna thur du mi 'dren zhes chos rje dpa' bo gsung yang sh+lo ka gsum bzhi tsam gyi bar zhus dag pher ba la bar bar du mi pher ba /
rang skyon rtog la mig bzhin bya / /
gzhan skyon rtog la long ba bzhin / /
zhes dang /
tshe 'di 'ba' zhig dran pa dang / /
gzhan la dad pa chung ba dang / /
zhag gsum 'das par gnas mi bya / /
zhes dang /
mchod pa bdun du rab grags pa'i / /
phung po gsum pa gdon par mdzod / /
ces pas mtshon pa'i nor bu'i 'phreng bar med pa'i tshig shin tu mang bas dpe lung gnyis ka zur du nges par dgos phyogs 'bra tsam gyis cho ga na sher phyogs kyi mdo sde yang la dor rung bar sems so / /
de ltar chos tshan brgya dang gsum gyi lung legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
gnas lnga rig pa'i paN chen dI paM kA ra /
'brom ston chos kyi rgyal po /
po to ba rin cen gsal /
sha ra a yon tan grags /
chu mig pa shes rab grags /
gro ston bdud rtsi grags /
sangs rgyas sgom pa seng ge skyabs /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
rgyang ra byang chub @# / /
'bum /
thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na gsan yig gzhan du 'di gnyis go ldog tu 'dug kyang mchims kyi rnam thar ltar na 'di ltar yin gsung ba khungs btsun par mngon no / /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
yol ston bsod nams lhun grub /
slob dpon grags pa rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen grub pa shes rab /
rgya ston tsan+d+ra de wa /
ri khrod pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
'gar ston shes rab rgya mtsho /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
yongs 'dzin dkon chos 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar pa byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
sgrub khang pa mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
rgyal kun ngo bo bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rdo rje 'chang dngos zur chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
khyad par 'phags bstod dang lha las phul byung gi bstod pa gnyis kyi lung mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan la'ang thos /
brgyud pa ma byung / /
! bka' gdams kyi bstan pa'i gsal byed chen po rtses dang las chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i 'grel pa'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
las chen kun rgyal ba /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
bar 'dir bla ma gcig gnyis shig ma rnyed /
de nas sgom sde shar pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
zhal snga nas nam mkha' rgya mtsho /
'jam r+d+b+yangs smra ba'i dbang phyug dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! gnyis pa 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa la /
gsang sngags phyi 'gyur /
snga 'gyur gnyis /
dang po la zur bka' /
spyi bka' /
zhar byung bla ma'i gsung 'bum sogs mdo sngags tha snyad so sor dbye dka' ba'i skor dang gsum /
dang po la /
bya ba /
spyod pa rnal 'byor /
rnal 'byor bla med dang bzhi /
dang po bya rgyud ni /
mdun legs ma las /
rgyud sde 'og ma gsum gyi lam gyi tshul / /
mi shes de yis rnal 'byor bla med rgyud / /
rgyud sde kun gyi mchog tu thag bcad kyang / /
dam bca' tsam du zad par legs mthong nas / /
gsang ba spyi rgyud legs par grub pa dang / /
dpung bzang gis zhus bsam gtan phyi ma sogs / /
bya rgyud rigs gsum spyi dang bya brag gi / /
rgyud sde rnams la ring du 'dris par byas / /
zhes gsungs pa ltar bya ba'i rgyud la mtha' klas pa'i nang nas nyung zang tsam nos pa'i rim pa la /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pas mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga phan bde'i 'byung gnas kyi steng nas ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin bshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bor gtogs pa'i sman gyi bla ma lha bzhi bcu rtsa bdun gyi dbang lags par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
mgon po 'jam dbyangs /
mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa bo d+hi sa twa /
chos rgyal khri srong sde btsan /
sang na legs mjing yon /
mnga' bdag khri ral /
lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje /
mnga' bdag 'od srungs /
mnga' bdag dpal 'khor bcan /
khri skyi lde nyi ma mgon /
mnga' bdag bkra shis lde /
lha bla ma ye shes 'od /
mnga' bdag lha lde /
@# / /
mnga' bdag 'od lde /
mnga' bdag rtse lnga /
mnga' ris dgra bcom /
blo ldan shes rab grags /
brtse ldan dar ma rgyal mtshan /
dpal ldan gro /
sangs rgyas sgom pa seng ge skyabs /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
gra bcom gzhon nu'i mtshan can /
rje 'dul mdzad pa /
bla ma 'jam dbyangs chen po /
dbang ston rgyal mtshan dpal /
'dul nag pa dpal ldan bzang bo /
'jam dbyangs dge 'dun 'phel /
rgyud chen bkra shis 'phags /
rgyud chen brtson 'grus 'phags /
sras khang sngags ram pa bzang po rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang 'khon rigs grub pa'i dpa' bo dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bde bar gshegs pa brgyad mtho brtsegs su bzhugs pa'i rjes gnang legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mnga' ris dgra bcom yan gong ltar la /
sgrub khang ba'i gsan yig na 'di tshab snar byang chub tshul khrims zer ba zhig 'dug pa mtshan gyi rnam grangs yin nam mi gcig pa yan brtag /
de nas dge bshes zhu ldan pa shes rab grags /
ra sa chu las pa dar ma rgyal mtshan /
sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na zar ba dar ma rgyal mtshan zer ba'ang 'dug pa dbyang /
dpal ldan gro mo che /
sangs rgyas sgom pa seng ge skyabs /
gnyag snying bo rgyal mtshan /
spre lud pa kun smon /
spangs sgang pa grags pa dpal /
mkhas batsan+d+ra'i gsan yig na chu lhad pa zer ba'ang snang /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen grags pa rgyal mtshan 'jam dbyangs rin chen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
mkhan chen tshul khrims dpal 'phyor /
chos lung shar gling pa 'khrul zhig kun bzang mthu stobs dpal 'bar /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho nas /
bo d+hi sa twa chung ba /
rgyal po dge ba'i dpal /
jo bo rje /
lha bcun byang chub bad /
te seb chen po /
byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
kong po lo tsA ba /
ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na dbang po lo tsA ba zer ba 'dug pa brtag /
dgra bcom rgyal mtshan /
gya ba dbang mdzes /
gya ba dpal mdzes /
yon tan dbang phyug /
shangs pa 'dul 'dzin /
'di kong du bla ma jo ston zer ba zhig mkhan ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na 'dug pa lhag chad gang yin brtag /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa man 'dra / /
! 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs kyi yi ge dang gong ma'i phyag len ltar sangs rgyas klu dbang gi rgyal po gtso 'khor lnga pa'i rjes gnang dang /
de'i sgrub skor klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa la sgrub thabs dbul ba dang bral ba /
sad ser dang lca 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa zhi ba /
phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba /
klu'i gnod pa dang bral ba /
skyes pa bud med thams cad 'phel ba /
char dbab gcod /
sa'i gter 'byin pa rnams /
bcom ldan ral gris mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs /
rong ston @# / /
shAkya rgya mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa thabs mkhas thugs rje ma dang bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas klu dbang gi rgyal po /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
jo bo a ti sha /
'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
bshes gnyen po to ba /
dge bshes shar ba /
gtum ston blo gros grags /
zhang ston rdo rje 'od zer /
gro ston shes rab grags /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
bcom ldan rig pa'i ral gri /
dpal sdings pa /
shar pa'i gsan yig na dkyus ltar byung la sngags 'chang dkon legs pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis bo ldog tu snang ba brtag /
'dul 'dzin grags pa dpal /
mnga' ris byang chub bla ma /
shar pa'i gsan yig na 'di bzhin 'dug cing lo pa spyan lnga'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis sbrel 'dug pa dpyad /
rgya gar rgyal mtshan /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
rong ston shes bya kun rig /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
paN chen bzang po bkra shis /
rje stobs ldan pa /
paN chen na bza' pa /
gnas pa paN chen /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon bud+d+ha ba /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /
bka' drin mnyam med chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rong ston nas /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
brag dkar ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs pa /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin chen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
! sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dang ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge'i steng nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po 'jam dbyangs ar pa tsa na'i rjes gnang dang /
yig cha gnyis kyi lung thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs /
dze tA ri dgra las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis /
pa ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
chos rje sa paN /
rgwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
sras a ka ra skye med grub pa /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig tu a kA ra sid+d+hi zhes snang /
sbrag kha ba grags pa seng ge /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
chos rje kun dga' bzang po /
gu ge paN+Di ta grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' drin mnyam med rigs brgya'i bdag po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na sa paN nas /
chos rgyal 'phags pa /
rgwa lo rnal rgyal rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
tshogs sgom kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
bla ma bsod nams skyabs /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan chen nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo @# / /
rje /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse nas /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
dze tA ri man gong bzhin no / /
yig cha gnyis kyi lung brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug nas /
mchod dpon dkon cog pa /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man gong dbang 'dra / /
! gang blo ma'i rgya gzhung la brten nas 'jam dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po'i rjes su gnang ba bya rgyud rang skad kyi phyag len ji lta ba bzhin dang /
rtsa ba rgya gzhung gang blo ma /
de la brten pa'i rjes gang gi yi ge tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa rnams thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun 'jam dbyangs /
paN chen d+hi ra pA la /
ngor chen thar rtse shar pa mkhan ngag chos pa bzhi'i gsan yig na paN chen 'bum phrag gsum pa zer ba snang ba mtshan gyi rnam grangs yin min brtag /
rngog lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab /
khyung rin cen grags /
rgya dmar ba byang chub grags / /
cha pa chos kyi seng ge /
gtsang nag pa thugs rje seng ge /
ngan 'bag pa dar ma seng ge /
gnyal zhig 'jam dpal rdo rje /
gzang ring nam mkha' dpal /
ngor chen thar rtse shar pa dag chos bzhi'i gsan yig na dar ma tshul khrims zer ba 'dug pa dpyad /
brag steng pa bsod nams rgyal ba /
gsan yig gzhan bzhi bor 'di'i gong du gra thang ba zer ba zhig 'dug pa brag steng pa dang nor ba'i yig skyon gyis zur du byas pa yin nam brtag /
yang rtse ba rin chen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
rje bkra shis rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang bo /
gu ge paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams legs 'byung /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' 'gyur ba chen po 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
lung gi brgyud pa ni /
sgo rum pa nas /
tshar chen /
rje mkhyen brtse /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rag khyab bdag zha lu pa /
nges bdag la'o / /
! slob dpon dze hA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba'i bzhed srol gyi 'jam dkar kha chen paN chen gyi thugs dam bzhi'i nang tshan gyi ya rgyal gcig tu brtsi ba'i rjes gnang /
khro phu lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i yig cha ltar dang lung la /
slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs zab pa las kyang ches bab pa kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI dang khro phu la tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba /
'jam dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs bskyed rim dang mthun par bstong pa paN+Di ta chen po ma tis mdzad pa gnyan los bsgyur pa /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyis mdzad pa'i lo rgyus /
paN chen shAkya shI'i phyag len ltar lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsdebs pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge /
rgya ston pas mdzad pa'i sgrub skor la /
rtsa ba'i @# / /
sgrub pa /
nyes byas 'joms pa /
yon tan sgrub pa /
rtsod pa bya thabs /
ma sha la brten pa'i las sbyor /
mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i rtsa ba'i sgrub thabs /
shes rab sgrub pa /
ral gri'i dngos grub /
mig sman /
rgas nad las grol ba /
tshe'i rig pa 'dzin pa /
'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i yi ge /
'jam dbyangs dkar po'i sgrub thabs stag tshang lo tsA ba'i gsung bzhin A nan+da ra smis mdzad pa rnams legs par thob pa las bsod snyoms pa rin cen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa ma gtogs pa'i rjes gnang dang lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs /
dze tA ri dgra las rnam rgyal /
paN+Di ta ma ti /
slob dpon nor bu gling pa chung ba /
bu ston dang sa lugs kyi gsan yig phal cher na 'di gnyis mi yong 'dug pa nye brgyud yin nam snyam /
paN+Di ta 'byung gnas spas pa /
paN chen shAkya shrI /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal /
mkhan chen bde ba sgeg pa'i rdo rje /
dpal /
mkhan chen grags pa gzhon nu /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
lo chen skyabs mchog dpal /
sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' 'od zer /
bcom ldan grags 'phel ba /
stag tshang lo tsA ba shes rab rin cen /
gnas brtan 'od 'pho ba /
'jam dbyangs sku skye shes rab rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
brgyud pa 'di zhal gzigs brgyud pa ngo mtshar can no / / /
nga na stag tshang pa'i gsung rgyun A nan+das mdzad pa ma gtogs pa'i rjes gnang lung dang bcas pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
kha chen paN chen yan gong ltar la /
de nas khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal /
mkhan po dbang phyug grags /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus /
mkhan chen dangs ma ba /
rin po che shes rab grags /
lung pa dkon cog rdo rje /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal /
chos rje dge ba rgyal mtshan /
byang sems 'phags pa blo 'phel /
spyan snga tshul khrims dang /
lo pa spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
gur rdzong chos 'byor dpal bzang /
rigs 'dzin chen po gzhon nu don grub /
drin can bla ma 'jam dbyangs chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o /
yang na mkhan chen bde ba dpal nas /
rje sangs rgyas gzhon nu /
mkhan chen bsod nams shes rab /
mkhan chen shes rab mgon po /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
chos rje rnam rgyal bkra shis /
spyan snga bsod nams lha dbang man 'gre /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN+Di ta grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams legs 'byung /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na @# / /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
zur chen gzhon nu don grub man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phel /
chos rje sangs rgyas lhun grub /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na gu ge paN chen nas /
gro bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis /
de dbon shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus nas /
mkhan chen brtson 'grus byang chub /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
'jam dbyangs grags pa phyogs las rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs tshe dbang kun mkhyen /
kun bzang rtse pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa nas /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
grub chen dpal bzang ba /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mtshams 'dir bla ma gnyis tsam zhig ma rnyed /
de nas sku zhang bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
lha bo bla ma rin cen rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'jam dbyangs /
rdo rje gdan pa chung ba /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
bu ston dangs lugs kyi gsan yig phal cher na brgyud pa 'di mi gsal yang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig dang mthun /
brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun grags pa /
sa paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
brag kha ba grags pa seng ge /
bla ma mang mkhar ba /
bla ma byang seng ba /
chos rje kun dga' bkra shis /
gnas rnying 'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
gnas rnying kun dga' bde legs /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
sa ra rje btsun pa /
pha bong kha ba bde legs nyi ma /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang bo /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na kha che paN chen nas /
paN+Di ta dA na shI la /
g.yag sde lo tsA ba bsod nams seng ge /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal man 'dra /
A nan+das mdzad pa ma gtogs pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
ngor chen yan 'dra ba la /
de nas rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
spyan snga dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dpal rdo rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhan chen zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'a / /
yang gnyan lo lugs kyi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
paN+Di ta chen po ma ti nas /
gnyan @# / /
lo tsA ba dar ma grags /
gnam kha'u pa dar ma rgyal mtshan /
sgang ston grub pa /
jo sras rgyal mtshan /
'bre sgur d+harma /
'jam dbyangs gsar ma /
byang chub 'od /
mkhan chen grags pa tshul khrims /
lo chen skyabs mchog dpal bzang man sngar bzhin no / /
! paN+Di ta gser gdugs can gyi bzhed srol rje btsun 'jam dbyangs dkar po shes rab 'khor lo'i rjes gnang gong ma'i phyag len bzhin dang /
khro phu lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs gsal byed me long gi lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs /
paN+Di ta gser gdugs can /
mtshan zla ba'i 'byung gnas sbas pa /
rA hu la shrI /
bi ma la shrI /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na bi na ya shI zer /
bik+Sha ta de wa /
god dkar ba'i gsan yig na bi khya ta zer ba snang /
kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra /
khro phu lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal /
chos rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu rin cen dbang phyug /
mkhan chen chos rgyal dpal bzang /
kun spangs chos grags dpal bzang /
khro phu rin cen 'bum /
gnyag dbon bsod nams bzang po /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal ba /
mkhan chen rin cen bzang po /
mkhan chen chos grub seng ge /
lo chen rat+na b+ha dra /
lo chen 'gyur med bde chen /
chos gter dkon cog legs pa /
e waM sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! ngor mkhan chen sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub kyi yig cha'i steng nas rgya gar mkhas grub dam pa sangs rgyas lugs kyi 'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng ge yum dbyangs can ma sngon mo bya rgyud kyi lugs ltar mdun du bskyed pa'i lha gnyis kyi rjes su gnang ba nos nas /
rgyab rten lung la /
'phags pa 'jam dpal dmar po'i gsung gi sgrub thabs mkhas pa kA ma sha'i las mdzad pa /
'jam dpal dmar po'i sgrub pa'i rim pa dam pa rgya gar gyis mdzad pa /
'jam dpal gyi bstod pa chos dbyings rnam dag ma /
dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa dus gsum bde gshegs ma /
shes rab 'phel ba'i gdams pa 'jam dpal dmar po gsung gi rdzogs rim /
'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong ba'i thabs /
ril sgrub kyi tshigs bcad blo 'phel sgron mi /
rdzas dang 'khor lo la brten nas shes rab 'phel ba /
rgyal po dbang du bsdu ba blon po sogs la'ang de dang 'dra ba /
mu dra dbang du bya ba mdzes ma rgyan 'khor /
gzhan gyi ngag rku ba /
pha rol gyi shes rab 'phrog pa /
mngon par shes pa sgrub pa /
rkang mgyogs /
mig rno ba /
sman gyi thun tshang /
ral gri'i rgyu /
'khor lo /
ril bu'i dbyibs dang kha dog gza' skar dang bcas bstan pa /
ril bu'i gdan gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed chog /
rjes su gnang ba'i chog thun mong ma yin pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang gi maN+Dal bstan pa /
sgrub pa'i tshad dang blang dor bstan pa /
sAts+tsha dkar nag gi sbyor ba la brten nas gnod byed gnon zhing bar gcod bsrung ba /
dbang sdud 'khor lo 'dri tshul gyi gsal byed dang bcas pa /
'di yan phal cher yig rnying dam pa'i gsung /
gdams pa'i byung tshul khyab bdag sman lung pa ma ti'i mtshan can gyi zin bris /
@# / /
'khor lo /
gtor ma /
sbyin sreg /
spogs chog /
rdzas kyi bya ba dang bcas pa 'jam dbyangs smra seng sgrub pa'i man ngag zab pa las kyang ches zab pa rigs 'dzin karma ku rus kong po rtse lha sgang du mdzad pa /
de'i gsung rgyun gyi sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyi gegs sel gnad kyi man ngag /
sgab 'dre dkyil 'khor nyal 'og sgo them zhabs su gnon thabs /
dpe ris las /
ril bu'i gdan dang khebs kyi 'khor lo /
yum gyi 'khor lo /
mdzes ma rgyan 'khor /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs nyin byed mi shes smag rum sel ba /
des mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi chog bklags pas don grub /
des mdzad pa'i ril sgrub kyi gdams pa rgya gzhung gi gsal byed nyin byed snang ba dang bcas pa rnams legs par thob pa las ril sgrub blo 'phel sgron me dang /
sgrub khang pas mdzad pa'i yig cha gsum ma gtogs rjes gnang dang lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta /
bram ze rig byed gzhon nu /
dbyangs chen bzang po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar 'dug kyang lo rgyus su dam pas rig byed gzhon nu la gsan par bshad pas dpyad /
rgya gar dam pa sangs rgyas /
dar+pan A tsar+ya /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
dbus pa gzhon nu byang chub /
nyang stod pa tshul khrims gzungs /
mkhas btsun don grub rin cen /
de wa rA dza /
slob dpon gnyan /
mkhan po tshul khrims dga' /
bla ma bkra shis dpal /
bla brang pa bzang po dpal /
chos rje nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
rong ston shAkya rgyal mtshan /
paN chen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
sems dpa' chen po bsod nams lha dbang /
mthu stobs dbang phyug kun dga' bkra shis /
paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
karma 'phrin las che ba'ang zer /
gyer gyi sngags 'chang bsod nams dge legs /
rigs 'dzin chen po bsod nams rnam rgyal /
dpal ayon bstan 'dzin chos kyi sgron me /
rigs 'dzin chen po karma gu ru /
chos brgyad rang grol nam mkha' chos dbang /
khyab bdag khra tshang pa chen po blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
pha dam pa nas /
kha che gu hya pa /
glan sgom yab sras /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na 'di'i sngon du lo btsun chung zer ba zhig 'dug pa chad dam dpyad /
bla ma 'od zer shAkya /
shar pa sher 'byung ba'i gsan yig na shAkya 'od zer ba 'dug pa phal cher dang ma mthun bas nor ba bdu /
slob dpon 'od zer mgon po /
slob dpon shAkya gzhon nu /
spyan snga bkra shis rnam rgyal man 'dra /
yang na spyan snga bkra shis rnam rgyal nas /
mkhan po bzod pa dpal /
mkhan po bsod nams 'od zer /
mkhan po shes rab mgon po /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
dor chen kun dga' bzang po /
paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo tho mkhan chen bsod nams legs 'byung /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
shar khang ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa mkhas mchog dpal ldan don grub /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang @# / /
mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bla ma 'od zer shAkya nas /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen del po ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
sa bzang ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
ngor chen man 'dra /
yang na pha dam pa nas /
dam pa sa /
lkugs ring /
lde ston dge ba /
glo chen sangs rgyas /
gar thig pa bsod rgyal /
bla ma mgon po 'bum /
sa bzang 'phags pa man 'dra /
yang nye brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs /
pha dam ba man 'dra /
ril sgrub blo 'phel sgron me dang sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha le tshan gsum gyi lung ni /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
brang ti nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
'jam dpal dba' bo gcig sgrub kyi rgyud la brten nas 'khor los thog bsrung ba'i lag len kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
thugs sras lo tsA ba /
rje nam mkha'i mtshan can /
bla ma don grub legs pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab rje /
byang gling rin cen rgyal po /
bla ma don grub rgyal mtshan /
rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma kun dga' bkra shis /
rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
thugs sras lo tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog bde dga' rgya mtsho'i steng nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum du gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das ma bsrung ba lha lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
gtso mo lnga /
phyogs skyong bcu /
gza' dgu /
rgyu skar nyer brgyad /
rgyal chen bzhi dang bcas lha lnga bcu rtsa drug byung bas gtso mo lnga po gcig tu bgrangs na ma gtogs ma 'grig bas dbyang /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
dpal phyag na rdo rje /
dze tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba /
chung ba /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rjes skya paN+Di ta /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che /
dga' ldan pa bkra shis dpal /
gong dmar ba'i gsan yig na kun bsod 'dug bas brtag /
kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
lce chos rgyal nam mkha' mchog grub /
zha lu dka' bzhi pa chen po /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje rin cen mchog grub /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen 'jam dpal ngag dbang chos grags /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ba ri lo tsA ba nas /
gnyan ston grags pa /
gnyan rin cen grags /
lha sa'i gnas brtan dkon cog /
mkhan ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na dkon rgyal zer ba 'dug pas brtag /
de'i sras rdog ston kha'u rgyal /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug /
rong pa shes rab seng ge /
'phags 'od yon tan rgyal mtsho /
kun mkhyen bu ston man 'dra /
yang na bu ston rin po che nas /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma a mo g+ha /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams @# / /
rin cen /
chos lung mkhan chen don yod rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros rgyal mtshan /
chos rje bshes gnyen bkra shis /
grub mchog ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab chos rje nas /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
gung pa mgon po rgyal mtshan /
dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal man 'dra /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs dang lung gsum gyi chings phyag len ltar 'od zer can ma gtso rkyang gi rjes su gnang ba dang /
des mdzad pa'i 'od zer can ma'i sgrub thabs dgra bo 'dul ba'i las tshogs thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
rje btsun sa chen /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
bla ma bsod nams skyabs /
rje gzungs kyi dpal ba /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen pa /
ngor chen kun dga' bzang po /
rje dpal ldan rdo rje /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims /
rje btsun sgo rum pa /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! so'i sngags 'chang chen po snye mdo ba shAkya dpal gyis mdzad pa'i yig cha la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtsug tor gdugs dkar lha bcu bdun ma'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang dam rig gtad legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po /
gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo /
gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon bsam gtan bcu pa /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra go mi /
slob dpon gi ra wa ti /
slob dpon rdo rje rnon po /
slob dpon padma lcags kyu /
bram ze rin cen rdo rje /
slob dpon dze tA ri pa /
rdo rje gdan ba che chung gnyis /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
ldan ma kyur a sbyabs /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
de la stod lung gad ser ba dang pho rog mdo sde mgon gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas khams pa rgan mo lhas pa byang chub dpal /
bla ma ye shes rin cen /
rje rin cen rgyal mtshan /
bla ma cha rgan pa /
bla ma grags chen pa /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
sngags 'chang shAkya dpal ba /
rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
chos rje rgyal mtshan bkra shis /
slob dpon dbang chen rgyal po /
bla ma byang chub bzang po /
mkhan chen rin cen kun ldan /
rigs 'dzin kun dga' don grub /
dge steng bla ma byams pa kun dga' 'byung gnas /
rigs 'dzin chen po khra tshang pa blo mchog rdo rje /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na khams pa rgan lhas pa nas /
'jam dbyangs bzhi thog pa /
rong pa a ka ra /
slob dpon dkon cog tshul khrims /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul rgyal ba /
kun mkhyen shes rab dpal bzang /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston sems dpa' chen po /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun kun dga' bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon @# / /
nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bod kha pa /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
de yang snye mdo shAkya dpal ba'i 'og tu mkhan chen bkra shis pa dang mkhan chen nam chos pa gnyis dge steng pa tshos mos gus brgyud par bgrangs ba las chos brgyud du med 'dug pas 'dir dkyus su ma bris /
chos rje rgyal mtshan bkra shis shin tu mkhas pas bskul gyi zhing rer dkyil 'khor re bris kyang 'theb pa 'dug gsung /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pas chos gsan bar bzhed de gdan drangs pas glang po che'i mche ba byi ba'i khar mi shong gsung ba sogs thugs nga rgyal chos skyon tsam byung bar grags / /
! mkhas grub grags pa rin cen gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog 'jug bde rab gsal gyi steng nas 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa lha lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du rig gtang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa'i dbang po /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba /
rong pa phyag sor ba /
bshas gnyen bya yul ba /
skar chung sbyin pa /
gze ba don grub ye shes /
khams pa shAkya rdo rje /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
bang? ba can pa ye shes mgon po /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
thog ston shes rab rdo rje /
meg ston grags pa 'od zer /
bla chen grags pa rin can /
kun mkhyen nam mkha' 'od zer /
chos rje nam mkha' tshul khrims /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring ba chen po /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
'jam dpal dbyangs chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub kyis mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri med lha lnga'i chog khrigs rin cen bsam 'phel gyi lud ni mkhan chen nyid la bdag gis nos so / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i dkyil chog 'chi med grub pa lhan thabs dang bcas pa'i steng nas 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa'i gzungs las gsungs pa'i thub pa'i dbang po lha bdun gyi rig gtad thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na dirtsis satwas mdzad pa'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa gdab pa'i rjes gnang dang lung zhes pa snang /
thub pa'i dbang po /
'jam dbyangs /
mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho /
chos rgyal khri srong lde btsan /
lha sras mu ne btsan po /
sad na legs mjing yon /
lha sras gtsang ma /
lha sras 'od srungs /
mnga' bdag dpal 'khor btsan /
skyi lde nyi ma mgon /
khri bkra shis mgon /
lha bla ma ye shes 'od /
lha btsun byang chub 'od /
lha bla ma zhi ba 'od /
mnga' bdag 'od lde /
rtse lde /
mnga' ris dgra bcom pa tshul khrims byang chub /
zhu ldan pa /
ras chu las pa gro mo che ba /
sangs rgyas sgom pa skyabs /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
tshad ma'i skyes bu bsod nams mgon /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
sku zhang nam mkha' mchog grub /
bla ma rin cen don grub legs pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
drin can mkhyen rab chos rje /
byang gling rin po che rin cen rgyal po /
zha @# / /
lu pa rin cen bkra shis /
gnubs sgom spas pa'i rnal 'byor smon lam rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to /
yang na mchims nas /
mkhan zi /
grags chen pa /
'phags 'od /
bu ston man 'dra /
yang na jo bo rje /
nag tsho lo tsA ba /
rong pa phyag sor ba /
'phan yul gu kha ba /
shangs kyi rgya phug pa can /
g.yag sde'i zhang ye shes rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon dbang phyug rin cen /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa man 'dra /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na dbang rgyun 'di chad par nye ba'i tshe byang gling rje la dbang thob cing lag len kyang bslabs nas chog dpon yun ring mdzad pa'i bgres par gyur ba'i zha lu pa rin cen bkra shis zer ba khungs chod nas /
de la gnubs sgom gsan du bcug nas dbang rgyun 'phel bar byas gsung ba 'dug pa bstan pa rin po che kho na thugs la gcags pa'i rnam par thar pa la rjes su yi rang zhing dad pa'i gsos su gyur ba'o / /
dri med kyi dkyil chog kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i 'chi med grub pa dang thugs sras lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs bklag cing mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam lnga gdab pa'i chog mdo sde las btus pa mchod 'bum gyi lung brgyud ni /
bu rin po che /
thugs sras lo tsA ba /
lce btsun chos kyi rgyal po /
bla ma don grub legs pa /
mchod 'bum gyi skabs 'di tshab tu mkhas patsan+da shrI 'jug pa ma gtogs gzhan 'dra'o / /
kun mkhyen tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab chos rje /
chos rje dpon rgyal ba /
rin cen rgyal po yang zer /
chos rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
drung kun dga' bkra shis /
bla ma dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
dbang gi skabs 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi lung gnang srol 'dug pa ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa'ang dbang dang gcig cing brgyud srol gzhan ni bka' 'gyur gyi skabs su gsal lo / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa 'od zer dri med kyi gzungs nas gsungs pa'i srog shing 'dzugs pa'i cho ga lag len bklags chog ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi bzhad pa ltar bkod pa'i lung gi brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug nas /
'dar chos 'khor yang rtse ba dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
dge slong chen mo'ang zer /
dge slong mkhas grub pa /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! mkhan chen zha lu pas mdzad pa'i 'od zer dri med kyi dkyil chog gi lhan thabs dbang chog dang bcas pa mun sel nyin byed snang ba /
des mdzad pa'i 'phags pa gtsug tor dri med kyi dkyil 'khor mchod rten du gzhug pa'i cho ga 'chi med bdud rtsi'i dpal ster zhes bya ba dang de'i cha mthun gyi rgyud 'od zer dri med kyi dkyil 'khor mchod rten du bzhugs su gsol nas srog shing 'dzugs pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa'i 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba thams @# / /
cad mkhyen pa bu'i bzhed pa ltar gsal bar bkod pa gnyis yig cha gcig tu dril ba'i lung yang rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub la bdag gis nos so / /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bstod mchod rjes gnang gi cho ga dang bcas pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi steng nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
grub chen dze tA ri /
paN dkar /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis /
don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
rje sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sa skya paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa /
mya ngan med /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rgyal ba lha mchog seng ga /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang ba dpal ldan don grub /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na lha mchog seng ge nas /
sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse ba man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
kun mkhyen go bo /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
sa lo /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na mus chan nas /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen man 'dra /
yang na dkon chog lhun grub nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
thar rtse pa man 'dra /
yang na chos rjes paN nas /
shar pa shes rab 'byung gnas /
shar pa rdo rje 'od zer /
rin cen ye shes /
glo chen sangs rgyas sras /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bsam gtan lhun grub /
glo bo lo tsA ba shrI mAM bo d+hi /
'bri khung lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrIdz+nyA na /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
ngor ba rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
shar pa rdo rje 'od zer /
bla ma bkra shis 'od /
'khon ston thugs rje rin cen /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
byang sems rgyal ba ye shes /
spang khang pa grags pa dpal /
spro lung pa kun smon /
na bza' brag phug pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
dpal ldan tshul khrims man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis nas /
jo bo a ti sha /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
gong ma lnga /
snur ye shes rgyal mtshan /
snur chos 'phags /
gar thig pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
thel grags pa rdo rje /
drung byang chub rdo rje /
'jam dbyangs rin cen /
mkhan chen zla ba blo gros /
mkhan chen nyi ma ba /
mkhan chen kun blo ba /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra @# / /
shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
brag dgon spyan snga ba gzhon nu chos dpal bzang bo /
rdo rje 'chab pha bong kha pa /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
ring brgyud ni /
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa /
'di gsan yig gzhan na mi 'dug rung rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na snang ngo / /
byams pa /
thogs med /
dbyig gnyen /
skal ldan grags pa /
shI la kA ra ma ti /
paN+Di ta ba ro tsa na rak+Shi ta /
ba ri lo tsA ba man 'dra / /
dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi lung brgyud ni /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
dbon dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
mkhan chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu ba /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
rje zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i rnam par rgyal ma'i bstod pa 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs kyi lung brgyud ni /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
sgra tshad pa rin rnam /
lce nam mkha'i mtshan can /
bla ma don grub legs pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab rje /
dpon po rgyal po /
rje don grub rgyal po /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bkra shis /
rin po che dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa 'chi med dpal sbyin gyi lung gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal chab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
mtshungs med sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang /
mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa /
dpal ldan don grub /
dpon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! slob dpon chen po a b+ha yA ka ra'i bzhed srol chag lo gsum pas mdzad pa'i sreg byed me'i mtshon cha'i yi ge'i steng nas dam pa'i phyag lan ltar khra bo'i rgyal po gtsug tor 'bar ba'i rjes gnang dang /
lung la lo rgyus /
sgrub thabs dngos /
phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag /
byang chu bor bsgyur ba dang bcas pa man ngag tu bsdebs pa'i sreg byed me'i mtshon cha chag lo gsum pa rin cen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i bstod pa dpal mgon sangs rgyas ma dang bcas thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po /
sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge /
paN grub a b+ha yA ka ra /
b+haM ba /
la'i paN chen shu b+haM ka ra gup+ta /
de la kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang grub chen Anan+da gu p+ta gnyis kyis zhus /
gnyis ka la chag la dag bcom? /
de nas chag lo chos rje dpal /
gtsang nag spug pa mkhan chen dbang phyug shes rab /
chos rje dpal pa'i gdams pa yin /
chag dpon bstan 'dzin dpal bzang /
'jig mon mkhas pa grub chen mang+ga la shrI /
te'u ra'i zur khang du bzhugs dgung lo brgya bzhes /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po /
chos rje ye shes dpal bzang /
de la rgyal sras blo bzang dpal @# / /
'byor dang rdo rje 'dzin pa chos skyong bzang po gnyis kyis gsan /
yab sras gsum ga nas chag lo gsum pa rin cen chos rgyal /
bla ma rin cen rgyal mchog /
chos rdzong ba dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
lung gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
! mkhas pa yon tan khris mdzad pa'i byin rlabs rjes su gnang ba'i yi ge la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi pho nya khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba dkar po'i rjes su gnang ba dang lung la /
'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa /
mkhas pa yon tan khris mdzad pa'i mi g.yo ba dkar po la brten pa'i shes rab blo 'phel gyi sgrub thabs bcud kyi snying por bkod pa /
des mdzad pa'i spro bsdu /
bogs 'byin /
leb rgan te zhal gyi gdams pa gsum /
des mdzad pa'i byin rlabs rjes gnang gi yi ge /
skyor mo lung gi chos grwar mkhas pa yon tan khris sgrub pa mdzad skabs byin gyis brlabs pa'i snang ba byung tshul rnams brjed byang du mdzad pa /
des yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yan lag bdun ldan ma rnams thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
khro bo'i dbang bo mi g.yo ba /
paN grub a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta /
A nan+da ka ra gup+ta /
slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa /
paN chen dA na shI la /
rje btsun paN /
'u yug pa bsod nams seng ge /
bcom ldan ral gri /
slob dpon bsod nams bzang bo /
mkhan chen puN+ya b+ha dra /
bla ma dar ma bzang po /
mkhan chen bsod nams shes rab /
mkhan po shes rab mgon /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
chos rje yon tan dpal /
rong ston blo bzang grags pa /
skyid shod 'bras spungs kyi mkhan po /
mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa chen po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rje btsun dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na paN chen dA na shI la nas /
bcom ldan ral gri /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
dge bshes gra ring pa /
mtshur ston rin cen ye shes /
karma dkon gzhon /
'dis 'bri khung dpal 'dzin rtsod pa'i sgo nas rmeg med du bcom ste dpal 'dzin la klog go chod cig las mi 'dug gsung skad /
chos rje yon tan dpal /
rje rong po blo bzang pa man 'dra /
yang na paN+Di ta dA na shI la nas /
'dul 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' /
mkhas pa lung gi dbang phyug /
rgyal cha lung mang po /
rgyal sras gzhon nu grags pa /
jo nang chos kyi rgyal po /
g.yag mi pham chos kyi bla ma /
rong ston shAkya rgyal mtshan /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na khro bo'i dbang po /
grub chen 'od byed 'byung gnas /
paN chen shAkya shrI b+ha dra /
paN+Di ta dA na shI la man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
khro bo'i dbang po /
paN+Di ta dA na shI la /
de la sa paN dang @# / /
bcom ral gnyis kyis gsan pa man 'dra /
yang rjes gnang nye brgyud ni /
khro bo'i dbang po /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
mkhan chen seng ge bzang po /
yar klungs pa mkhas grub seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba mchog /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs chen po /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
rdo rje 'chang char pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
lung rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs nas /
mchod dpon drung pa dkon cog /
rje dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
yang lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
kun mkhyen g.yag pa yan gong ltar la /
de nas slob dpon dpal ldan bzang po /
paN chen shAka mchog man yang 'dra ba las rje mkhyen brtse'i rjes su drung pa dkon cog pa yod do / /
yang na kun mkhyen g.yag pa nas /
rong ston shes bya kun rig /
rgyu 'gul paN chen grags ba rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
shrI ba blo gros rgyal mtshan /
sdom brtson sbyin pa grags pa /
khri chen kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
shin tu nye brgyud ni /
mi g.yo ba /
g.yag mi pham chos kyi bla ma man 'dra / /
mig tho ba'i sgrub pa mdzad pa'i zhag bdun thog zhal dkar nang du mi g.yo ba'i sku mtheb sor tsam pa mang po byung ba bgegs kyi sprul? ngar mkhyen nas lhag med gsol bas thul zhing bcom ldan 'das zhal gzigs pa'i lo rgyas snang ngo / /
? ! mi g.yo ba sngon po'i rjes gnang dam pa'i phyag len 'khrul med ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
de bzhin gshegs pa /
phyag na rdo rje /
grub chen dze tA ri pa /
rdo rje gdan pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
paN+Da ta don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags ba rgyal mtshan /
chos rje sa skya paN+Di ta /
'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
grub chen bsod nams seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' lags pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin mnyam med zur rdo rje 'chang /
des bdag za hor pan+de la'o / /
dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs dang rjes gnang gi cho ga'i lung brgyud ni /
rtsom pa po /
brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
mkhan dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu ba /
des bdag la'o / /
! mi g.yo ba sngon po pus bcugs sam chu bsrung gi rjes su gnang ba dam pa'i phyag len 'khrul ba med pa bzhin dang /
de'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtse mos mdzad pa'i lung dang bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
dze tA ri dgra @# / /
las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje gdan pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
rje btsun kun dga' snying po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
chos rgyal 'phags pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
gu ge paN+Di ta /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
gong dkar paN chen kun bzang rtse pa dpal ldan tshul khrims /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phal /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
ngor pa sangs rgyas seng ge /
rje kun dga' lung rig /
sdom brtson sbyin pa grags pa /
sa skya khri chen man 'dra / /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chi med grub pa'i lam bzang gi steng nas dze tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba lugs kyi padma'i rigs kyi gtso bo tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang de'i sgrub thabs dbang chog bstod pa dze tA ris mdzad pa /
rje dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil gyi lung dang bcas legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag med /
slob dpon snying po'i zhabs /
grub chen dze tA ri /
slob dpon byang chub bzang po /
slob dpon ting 'dzin bzang po /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba a mo g+ha badzra /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
brtse chen snying po'i zhabs /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
paN chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
shar pa rdo rje 'od zer /
bla ma bkra shis 'od /
e pa 'khon ston thugs rje rin cen /
'jam dbyangs chen po rin cen rgyal mtshan /
byang sems rgyal ba ye shes /
spang khang pa grags pa dpal /
shar pa'i gsan yig na don ri grags pa dpal zhes 'dug /
spro lung pa kun dga' smon lam /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
de la bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang brag phug pa chung ba blo gros brtan pa gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag gnas gsar ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
dkon cog 'phel man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ga paN chen /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' brtan pa /
sangs rgyas seng ge man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
rje dkon cog 'phel man 'dra /
yang na yongs 'dzin dkon @# / /
cog 'phel nas /
'jam dbyangs sa lo /
rje kun dga' dpal ldan /
nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na mus chen nas /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo man gong bzhin no / /
yang na lha mchog seng ge nas /
rkyang dur rab 'byams pa dge legs bshes gnyen /
rje shes rab rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na ba ri lo tsA ba nas /
mchims brtson 'grus seng ge /
rgya zhang phug pa /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
gzhon nu 'bum /
'di gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na 'dug kyang gzhan tshor mi snang ba chad 'dra /
bla ma cha gan pa /
grags pa dpal man 'dra /
yang na rgya zhang phug pa nas /
'jad pa rin cen ye shes /
rje btsun btsong kha pa dang gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na sher rin zer ba 'dug /
e pa 'khon ston man 'dra /
yang na grags pa dpal nas /
chos 'phags rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen seng ge /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
lo tsA ba byang chub rtse mo /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan man gong bzhin no / /
yang na gzhon nu 'bum nas /
gsal la ba /
grags chen pa /
'phags 'od /
kun mkhyen bu ston man 'dra /
yang na mchims brtson 'grus seng ge nas /
spug thams cad mkhyen pa /
bde ba'i rdo rje /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen bu ston man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dpal ldan sang ge nas /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan man 'dra / /
! thugs sras sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa'i dkyil chog tshe dpal ye shes bsam grub kyi steng nas mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa 'chi med rnga sgra lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang 'chi blu dang bcas pa zha lu pa'i phyag len ltar legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag med /
slob dpon snying po'i zhabs /
dze tA ri dgra las rnam rgyal /
bo d+hi b+ha dra /
sa ma ti b+ha dra /
rdo rje gdan pa /
ba ri lo chen /
mchims brtson 'grus seng ge /
rgya zhang phug pa /
'jad pa shes rab rin cen /
e pa 'khon ston /
shar pa 'jam dbyangs pa /
bzhi thog pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
byang sems rgyal ba ye shes /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
snur chos 'phags rgyal mtshan /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
yab sras gnyis ka la sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can /
de nas chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug kyang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig brgyud lugs gnyis kar 'dug pas chad 'dra /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
sku zhang bsod nams mchog grub /
'jam dbyangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen rgya mtsho /
zha lu mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rje rin cen rgya mtsho nas /
bla ma bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhyen rab rje /
de la 'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan dang sgog lung pa bkra shis dpal 'byor gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis gsan pa man 'dra /
'chi blu ma sbyar ba'i dbang rkyang gi brgyud lugs gcig @# / /
ni| byang gling pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan nas /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can nas /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen mchog grub dpal 'bar /
rgyal yum grub pa'i dbang po tshul khrims bzang mo /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na thugs sras nas /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na ba ri lo tsA ba nas /
brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sa paN 'phags pa rin po che /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
mkhan po bkra shis rin cen /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
mkhas grub rnam rgyal rin cen /
'jam dbyangs dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
kun bzang rtse pa paN chen bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dbang phyug rgyal mtshan nas /
mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
'chi med rnga sgra'i mngon dkyil dze tA ri'i rgya gzhung gi brgyud pa ni /
byang gling rje nas /
brang ti khu dbon /
mkhan chen zha lu ba /
des bdag la'o / /
dze tA ris mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
brgyud pa gong ma rnams slar 'chel /
sa skya khri chen yab sras /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! dkyil chog tshe dpal ye shes bsam grub kyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
dpon rgyal ba /
'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
drung pa kun dga' bkra shis /
bla ma dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! gzungs las gsungs pa'i tshe dpag med dkar po grub chen mi tra dzo gi'i bzhed srol ltar chag lo gsum pas mdzad pa'i las dang pa ba'i bya ba las byung ba'i yi ge'i steng nas rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag med /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs /
grub chen mi tA dzo gi /
bud+d+ha shrI /
chag lo tsA ba dar ma dgra bcom /
grum ston dar ma shes rab /
skrag phug pa shes rab dpal /
grub thob legs ldan 'od /
chos rje dpal chen bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug ye shes dpal bzang po /
rgyal sras blo bzang dpal 'byor /
chag lo gsum pa rin cen chos rgyal /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub brnyes dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! bya ba'i rgyud kyi bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran pa'i gzungs sngags yig 'bru lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa byang sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe'i rang gzugs su grags pa thams cad mkhyen pa zha lu lo tsA @# / /
ba chen pos bslab pa kun las btus pa'i lus bsrung ba'i sngags su bshad pa nyid /
drug cu rtsa bdun yin nam brtag /
de'i rgya dpe las dngos su phyung ste dag par mdzad cing /
lo rgyus yongs grags su lha'i dge bsnyen zhig gis sgra mi snyan nas dngos su blangs te dgra bcom pa blo gros dpal la gtad pa'i sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe gzungs la yig cha mi mthun pa sna tshogs 'dug pa las tshe dpag med lhung bzed bsnams pa'i mngon rtogs dang 'brel ba'i tshe dbang la bsdus pa paN chen nags rin nas brgyud pa dang rgyas ba ayon chen pos 'bri khung dbur smyon la rmi lam du stsal pa gnyis las /
phyi ma ni rnying ma'i sdebs su yod la /
bsdus pa'i dbang dang sgrub thabs zab mo'i yang snying gi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag med /
dgra bcom pa blo gros 'phel /
paN chen nags rin /
'brug pa rgyal dbang rje /
bla ma sangs rgyas dpal ba /
mi 'gyur kun dga' dpal bzang /
'bri khung pa chos rgyal rin cen phun tshogs /
de sras chos rgyal phun tshogs /
de sras chos kyi grags pa /
rigs 'dzin dkon cog lhun grub /
khyab bdag blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
das bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
paN chen nags rin la tshe dbang shin tu zab pa zhig yod ces khrims khang lo tsA ba sogs kyi rnam thar du snang ba 'di nyid yin par mngon la /
'di'i sku sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe dpag med ces kha byang btab cing /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub dang shar pa kun dga' bkra shis yod pa'i bris thang mthong bas ngor phyogs la'ang rgyun zhig byung ba 'dra /
sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe sgrub de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sgom bzlas dang bcas yod pa'i sgom lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag med /
lha'i dge bsnyen /
dgra bcom pa blo gros dpal /
lo stong bzhugs /
bal po ha du tsan+d+ra /
lo lnga brgya bzhugs /
slob dpon dar ma grags /
la nyis brgya thub /
mnga' ris pa dpal chen rgyal ba grub /
lo brgyad cur slebs nas kyang lus stobs chung du ma song zer /
slob dpon ye shes rgyal po /
lo sum brgya thub nyis brgya lon nas lha sa lan gsum bskor /
slob dpon shes rab grags /
bsod nams mgon pa /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
bar 'dir bla ma 'ga' zhig ma rnyed /
de nas dge steng pa kun dga' dpal bzang /
nyi ma gling ma tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! lus bsrung ba'i man ngag ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thugs sras rin po che yan gong ltar la /
de nas rje bkra shis rin cen /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
'jam dbyangs sa lo /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub la thar rtse pas gsan pa man 'dra / /
! mngon rtogs kyi dmigs skar dang sngags kyi dag bya sogs shin tu zhib pa'i brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon shes @# / /
rab grags nas /
dz+nyA na sid+d+hi /
slob dpon tshang ma'i skyes bu'i gcen yin /
bla ma sangs rgyas grags /
rdo rje rin cen /
dka' bzhi pa dpal ldan grags pa /
spyang lung pa gzhon nu blo gros /
paN chen shAkya mchog /
sbyang lung gzhon nu chos grub /
rje btsun grol mchog /
rje kun dga' dpal bzang /
paN chen tshe dbang don grub /
'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
! phyi sgrub shAkya thub pa /
nang sgrub tshe dpag med dmar po /
gsang sgrub dkar po yum bcas la brten pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa /
sngags kyang 'dra min gnyis tsam yod pa zhig mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan las nos /
brgyud pa bu ston rin po che yan 'dra /
de man ma rnyed /
la la dag gsang sgrub yum bcas sogs bla med lta bu nas bskangs pa'i lhad can yin nam zhes dpyad gzhir mdzad / /
! rang lus lcags kyi rdo rjer sgom pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa'i gdams pa dpe lag tu gtad pa'i gtad lung zhig rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha par thob /
dkar chen lan bu a mir gsan gsung ba las brgyud pa gong ma ma byung /
sgra mi snyan nas lha'i dge bsnyen gyis blangs te dgra bcom par gtad pa las dag thog nas lung ma mdzad pas gtad lung las 'chad nyan gyi rgyun med 'dra gnang ba rnam pa gcig tu 'thad par mthong ngo / /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyi sgrub thabs rjes gnang gi yi ge'i steng nas padma'i rigs kyi bdag po dpal mo lugs kyi 'phags pa bcu gcig zhal gyi rjes su gnang ba dang /
de'i yig cha rje dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i lung dang bcas thob pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa thugs rje chen po /
dge slong ma dpal mo /
paN+Di ta tsan+d+ra ku mA ra /
paN+Di ta shrI dz+nyA na b+ha dra /
bal po paN+Di ta pe nya ba /
byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
grub thob nyi phug pa chos grags /
spru pa rdo rje rgyal po /
ngor chen dang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na sru pa zhes snang /
zhang ston dgra 'jigs /
mkhan chen rtsa 'dul ba thugs rje byang chub /
mkhan chen bde ba can pa /
byang sems chu bzang pa byang chub 'bar /
rin po che shes rab 'bum /
rgyal sras thogs med bzang po dpal /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dgon cog 'phel /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
mus chen dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge nas /
bya btang kun dga' mchog ldan /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
lung brgyud ni /
dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
! yig rnying gi steng nas bcu gcig zhal mkha' 'gro lnga dang bcas pa'i rjes gnang nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs /
dge slong ma dpal mo /
@# / /
paN+Di ta ye shes bzang po /
paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nu /
jo bo a ti sha /
lha btsun byang chub 'od /
bal po pe nya ba /
byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
grub thob nyi phug pa /
bshes gnyen grags pa ba /
klu sgrub mtshan can /
dka' bzhi pa shes rab /
bla ma sangs rgyas rin cen /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
rje rin cen rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen grub /
rje rgyal mtshan rin cen /
gnas rnying pa kun dga' bde legs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
tsheg pa blo bzang e waM /
sras khang sngags ram pa bzang po rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rtsa ba'i bla ma rje btsun chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na spyan ras gzigs /
bik+Shu NI lak+Sh+mI ka ra /
tsan+d+ra ku mA ra /
su dz+nyA na /
bal po pe nya ba /
byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
nyin phug pa /
sru pa rdo rje rgyal po /
zhang ston dgra 'jigs /
'jad pa rtsi 'dul ba chen po /
mkhan chen ldog lhod pa /
mkhan chen chu bzang pa /
bla ma shes rab 'bum /
rgyal sras thogs med pa /
rin po che bsod nams bzang po /
rje bsod dar ba /
dmar ston pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
gnas rnying chos rje kun dga' bde legs man 'dra / /
tshal min mkhan chen gnyag dbon bsod nams bzang pos smyung gnas la nan tan du byed pa 'phags pa bsod nams dar gyis bskul ba'i ngor mdzad pa'i smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga'i lung brgyud ni /
gnyag dpon pa bzhugs pa'i brgyud pa bshad ma thag pa bzhin no / /
! thugs rje chen po skyer sgang lugs lha gsum ma'i rig gtang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs /
grub chen rA hul gup+ta badzra /
jo bo chen po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na /
nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba /
rong pa phyag sor ba shes rab 'bar /
wa yu ba shes rab tshul khrims /
lce sgom shes rab rdo rje /
dbon ston skyer sgang pa chos kyi seng ge /
gnyan ston chos kyi shes rab /
sbas pa'i rnal 'byor yang zar /
chos rje ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge /
mkhas grub shangs ston yang zer /
'gro mgon shangs ston tshul khrims 'bum /
gnyan sten rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
mus chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang yang zer /
sngags 'chang rdo rje gzhon nu /
mus chen nam mkha'i rnal 'byor /
sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
rdo rje 'chad tshar pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
yangs can mkhan po ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
dpal sa skya pa ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na shangs ston nas /
mkhas btsun rgyal mtshan 'bum /
'jag chen byams pa dpal bzang /
'jag pa blo gros dpal bzang /
'jag chen kun dga' /
rje chos rgyal dpal bzang /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rdo ring rin po che man 'dra /
yang na mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan nas /
chos rje zur khang pa dpal ldan rin cen /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa kun @# / /
mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan nas /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
ngor sgrub khang pa mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mus chen nas /
kun mkhyen go bo rab 'byams pa /
dkon cog 'phel man 'dra /
yang na mus chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang nas /
bla ma nam mkha' dbang phyug /
mus chen nam mkha'i rnal 'byor man 'dra / /
! spyan ras gzigs kyis mus chen sems dpa' chen po la dngos su gnang ba'i nye brgyud ltar na /
'phags pa thugs rje chen po /
sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan man gong bzhin no / /
yang na grub thob skyer sgang pa nas /
mkhan po gsang ba shes rab /
bkra shis bsod nams /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
dka' bzhi pa grags gzhon /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
rgyal sras thogs med pa /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
ngor chen kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
rje dkon cog 'phel man gong ltar ro / /
yang na shangs ston tshul khrims 'bum nas /
khyung po tshul khrims mgon po /
ras chen sangs rgyas seng ge /
shangs dkar ba rin cen /
rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
grub chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rgya sgom legs rgyal /
rje btsun kun dga' grol mchog /
rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs pa /
sgrub khang pa man 'dra / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho la chos rgyal srong btsan sgam pos dngos su gnang ba'i thugs rje chen po phyag bzhi pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
chos sku snang ba mtha' yas /
longs sku thugs rje chen po /
sprul sku srong btsan sgam po /
yang sprul bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rigs kun khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! padma'i rigs kyi yum seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma gtso rkyang gi rjes gnang lung gsum gyis 'ching ba thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
dze tA ri dgra las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN+Di ta /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
bla ma bsod nams skyabs /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
chos rje dpal ldan rin cen /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rje btsun bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rje btsun ma sgrol ma /
jo bo chen po dpal mar me mdzad /
'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
bshes gnyen po to ba /
dge bshes sha ra ba /
bya 'chad ka ba /
skyer sgang pa /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
ze'u sku mched /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
gro ston kun dga' @# / /
rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen grub pa shes rab /
kun mkhyen rong ston chen po /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
brag dkar sems dpa' chen po bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla ma bsod nams dpal 'byor /
gnubs sgom spas pa'i rnal 'byor /
smon lam rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man gong bzhin no / /
! mnyam med jo bo chen po bod du 'byon pa'i dus phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gi zhal 'don dang bcas rdo rje gdan du skor ba mdzad pa'i tshe rje btsun sgrol ma dngos su zhal mjal te bod du bzhud cig par lung bstan /
'di la yi dam byas na bar chad mi 'byung zhes sh+lo ka re dang las tshogs re sbyar nas gnang ba'i sgrol ma nyer gcig la thog mar thams cad kyi gzhi seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma /
dgra bgegs log 'dren gyi 'tshe ba zhi bar byed pa myur zhing dpa' ba'i sgrol ma /
nad gdon bgegs sdig pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhi bar byed pa ston ka'i zla ltar dkar ba'i sgrol ma /
tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa gser mdog can gyi sgrol ma /
tshe lo bcu yang brgyar 'phel bar byed pa tshe 'phel sgrol ma ser mo /
bud med sogs dmigs bya dbang du bya ba hUM sgra sgrog pa'i sgrol ma /
dbang phyug lha dang sa bdag sogs dbang chen thams cad bran du byas nas 'byung po 'dul ba 'jig rten gsum rgyal sgol ma /
rig sngags kyi gnod pa dang rbod zor zlog par byed pa gzhan gyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa'i sgrol ma /
bdud dang dgra bgegs sgrol bar byed pa bdud dgra rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrol ma /
'di phyi'i gnod pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba phyag rgya dkon cog gsum mtshon sgrol ma /
bdud dang mu stegs log lta can rnams dbang du bsdus nas bar gcod 'dul bar byed pa 'jig rten dbang mdzad sgrol ma /
mkho dgu'i 'byor ba thams cad spel te phongs pa las rnam par skyob pa 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ba'i sgrol ma /
bkra shis shing dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byed pa bkra shis thams cad 'byin pa'i sgrol ma /
bar gcod dgra bgegs rnams 'joms shing bsrung ba dang rengs par byed pa me ltar 'bar ba'i sgrol ma /
bgegs la rnam par bsnun pas bar gcod sel bar byed pa sgrol ma khro gnyer can ma /
sdig sgrib bag chags mi gtsang ba rnams zhi bar byed pa sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo /
gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi nus pa 'joms shing rang gi shes rab 'phel bar byed pa rig pa hUM las sgrol ma /
gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gnon cing dag dang chom rkun zhi bar byed pa 'jig rten gsum g.yo'i sgrol ma /
klu'i dug dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa dug rnams rab tu zhi byed sgrol ma /
'thab rtsod dang brtson du chud pa dang rmi lam ngan pa sogs duH kha las thar bar byed pa sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i sgrol ma /
rims nad dang yams thams cad zhi bar byad pa rims nad sel ba'i sgrol ma /
zhi rgyas dbang drag gi dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed pa 'phrin las yongs rdzogs sgol ma rnams kyi rjes gnang legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun ma @# / /
sgrol ma /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
rgyal sras po to ba /
bshes gnyen sha ra ba /
gtum ston dbang phyug grags /
bang ston shAkya gzhon nu /
zla grags gsar ma ba /
chos rje shes rab dpal rong ston blo bzang grags pa /
mkhas btsun yon tan rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
slob dpon skal bzang rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
drin can bla ma 'jam dbyangs chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na sha ra ba nas /
bya 'chad ka ba ye shes rdo rje /
skyer sgang pa /
sangs rgyas dgon pa ba /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
ze'u sku mched /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
gro ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen grub pa shes rab /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
gnas rnying chos rje kun dga' bde legs /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho man gong bzhin no / /
yang na 'brom ston nas /
spyan snga tshul khrims 'bar /
bya yul ba gzhon nu 'od /
'chang ka pa man gong ltar ro / /
nye brgyud ni rje btsun sgrol ma /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho man 'dra'o / /
! dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i rje btsun sgrol ma'i bstod sgrub maN+Dal bzhi pa'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
jo bo rje /
dgon pa ba /
zhang ka ma ba /
lum pa /
chu mig pa chen po /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
slob dpon dkon cog grags /
mkhan po bde ba dpal /
mkhan po dka' bzhi pa /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa /
bar 'dir bla ma gsum tsam zhig ma rnyed /
de nas bla ma chos nyid pho brang pa /
bla ma bsod nams rgyal po /
mkhas btsun nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! jo bo chen pos 'brom ston pa la gtsigs can du byas nas gnang ba'i sgrol ma'i mdos byin rlabs shin tu che ba'i yig cha'i lung phyag len dang bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgol ma /
slob dpon mthar byed /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
rgyal ba 'brom /
spyan snga tshul khrims 'bar /
dge bshes bya yul ba sogs nas rim par brgyud de /
rtse chen pa grub chen kun dga' blo gros /
slob dpon 'brom /
brag dkar sems dpa' chen po bsod nams rin cen /
brag dkar ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla ma bsod nams dpal 'byor /
gnubs sgom spas pa'i rnal 'byor smon lam rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rje btsun bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
gur rdzong pa chos 'byor dpal bzang /
zur rigs 'dzin chen po gzhon nu don grub /
drin can rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! bka' gdams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bya mang po klu pa brtson 'grus grags pa la rje btsun ma sgrol mas dngos su gnang ba'i dgra jag chom rkun thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i gdams pa zab khyad can gyi lo rgyus /
gdams pa dngos /
rdzas kyi zhal gdams /
lag len zhal gdams /
gsang ba'i zhal gdams /
zhal shes phyag len dmar 'khrid bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
bya @# / /
mang pa brtson 'grus grags pa nas rim par brgyud de /
rigs 'dzin chen po legs ldan rdo rje /
mnyam med rab 'byams chos rje /
