sa skyong yug nor bu dbang rgyal /
chos rje dang ma ba bstan 'dzin 'gyur med /
yug rab brtan dbang po /
gung ru dbyangs dpon pa mthu stobs gsang ba'i dbang phyug /
zur rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! sgrol ma'i sgo nas brtson las thon pa'i man ngag nyi ma sbas pa'i gzhung la brten nas thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i lung brgyud ni /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa nas rim par /
mkhyen rab rje /
dbon rgyal ba /
'brog khang pa /
byang gling rje /
rje kun bkras pa /
rin po che dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'jigs chen bcu drug las skyob pa'i ched du sgrol ma la gsol ba 'debs pa mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i lung brgyud ni /
mdzad pa po /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i tshe khrid zla ba'i chu rgyun gyi nyams len snying po bsdus pa dang rjes gnang gi yi ge kun mkhyen mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i steng nas rje btsun bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma dkar mo spyan bdun yid bzhin 'khor lo tshe sbyin ma'i 'od zer drug sprags kyi rjes su gnang ba thun mong ma yin pa legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma dkar mo /
paN grub ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa /
bla ma rdo rje gdan pa /
rje btsun pa ri lo tsA ba /
grub chen sle nag pa /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen sgre pa /
mnyam med sgam pho ba /
dwags sgom tshul khrims snying po /
sgom chung shes rab byang chub /
dwags po 'dul 'dzin pa /
rje 'bri khung gling pa /
rje dam chos gling pa /
bla ma chos kyi tshul khrims /
mnyam med lha lung pa /
thog gnas pa chen po /
lo pa spyan snga'i gsan yig tu yon gnas pa zer ba snang /
bla ma chos kyi dbang phyug /
'dren mchog byang chub bzang po /
kun mkhyen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
lo pa spyan snga bsod nams lha dbang /
spang gshongs ha ri kha pa dpal ldan rgyal mtshan /
dwags po paN chen phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha / /
Na chen bkras rnam pa'i sku tsha 'bras yul gyi dag bshes yin zhing gnyug la legs bshad gling gi bla mar bsgos nas karma 'phrin las su grags /
rdo rje 'chang tshar chen blo gsal rgya mtsho grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhyen brtse'i zhabs la /
mkhan chen bslab gsum pa /
dgon gsar ba bsod nams chos 'phel /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje gsum gyis gsan /
yab sras bzhig la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis gsan no / /
yang na tshar chen nas /
bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen thar pa rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag @# / /
la'o / /
yang yig cha de ga'i steng nas thun mong ba'i rjes gnang thob pa'ang bshad ma thag pa bzhin no / /
tshe khrid zla ba'i chu rgyun gyi nyams len snying po bsdus pa'i steng nas nyams khrid zab mo smin rgyas dang de nyid kyi yig cha'i lung dang bcas nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan nas /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
rigs kun bdag po chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge /
des mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog khrigs ngag 'don bklags ka? chog tu bkod pa tshe dang bsod nams kyi nyi ma bdun 'bar /
des mdzad pa'i tshe khrid skyabs ga? yul zhing khams ma /
rje dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi'i dpal ster /
bla ma ka? brgyud pa'i lo rgyus sha dum 'thor gyi song yang 'gal ba med gsung ba'i mtha' can /
paN+Di ta ngag dbang grags pas mdzad pa'i sgrol dkar ka? gyi sgo nas 'chi ba blu ba'i rtogs pa bsdus pa /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub ki? thabs paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang lo tsA ba ba ris bsgyur ba /
yang sgrub thabs /
bum chog /
gtor chog /
sgom pa'i ki? bsrung 'khor rnams chos tshan gcig tu byas pa /
bris pa'i bsrung ki? 'khor gyi gdams ngag yon tan dpag tu med pa /
bar chad zhi byed ltas ki? ngan g.yang du len pa /
slob dpon padma nag pos mdzad pa'i byad ki? 'grol ba ri'i 'gyur /
klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i ki? gnas dang chom rkun bsrung ba /
ci sbyang sngon ki? mo'i lam bsrung las rtags med pa rnams kyi lung brgyud ni /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
bslab gsum rje /
khyab bdag dbang rab /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
ka'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
mchod dpon drud pa dkon cog /
rje dbang rab man 'dra /
ki'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje dbang rab nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
mkhan dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
ltas ngan g.yang len lugs gcig pa /
dbang rab nas /
bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
zha lu pa /
des bdag go /
sgrol ma'i man ngag lha mo shra ma Na'i sgrub thabs kun mkhyen bkra shis rnam rgyal gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
dza tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
sa chen /
rtse mo /
grags pa /
sa paN /
'phags pa /
shar pa ya 'byung /
shar pa kun dga' seng ge /
seng ge rgyal mtshan /
gar thig pa bsod rgyal /
shes rab rdo rje /
grags pa rdo rje /
grags pa don grub /
grub chen ri khrod pa shar drags po'i paN chen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
yongs 'dzin bde legs bzang po /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgyal mtshan /
rje bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang sangs rgyas rin cen /
bco brgyad chos rje mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
mkhas grub byams pa dag dbang lhun grub /
mkhas dbang 'phrin las rnam rgyal /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo bka' @# / /
babs dgu dang ldan pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa la bka' babs dang po jo bo lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
ngag gi dbang phyug /
mgon po gser gling pa /
jo bo rje a ti sha /
'brom ston pa /
spyan snga ba /
bya yul ba gzhon nu 'od /
dwags po lha rje /
bsod nams rin cen /
zhang gsum thog pa /
zhang bka' stsal ba /
bla ma lha /
slob dpon rin cen bzang po /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
byang sems bsod nams grags pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
kun bzang rtsa ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chag lo rin cen chos kyi rgyal po /
khra ri ba rin cen rgyal mchog /
kun mkhyen rdzong dkar ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
'jam dpal dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' drin mnyam med mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na mkhan chen bde ba dpal nas /
dka' bzhi pa grags pa gzhon nu /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na spyan snga ba chen po nas /
dge bshes sgre pa /
skam po bsod nams rin cen /
phag mo grub pa /
nye gnas stag lung thang pa /
bla ma ba lam pa /
slob dpon tshal ba /
slob dpon shAkya gzhon nu /
don zhags pa sangs rgyas rin cen /
rtsegs pa bsod nams rdo rje /
ma hi phal /
gtsang ba blo bzang ba zer yang skang do dal dpags na blo gros bzang po thob pa 'dra /
bla ma rang grol lhun grub /
mchungs med nam mkha' blo gros /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal man 'dra /
yang na sgam po pa nas /
lho la yag pa /
slob dpon brtan pa /
slob dpon tshal pa ba /
slob dpon shAkya gzhon nu man 'dra /
yang na slob dpon shAkya gzhon nas shangs pa grags pa seng ge /
bla ma mgon rgyal ba /
mkha' spyod dbang po /
'khrul zhing bsod nams 'bum /
bla ma rgyal mtshan /
zhwa dmang bzhi pa spyan snga thams cad mkhyen pa /
chag lo man 'dra /
yang na sbyan snga ba nas /
bya yul ba gzhon nu 'od /
dge bshes sle nag pa /
bshes gnyen sgre pa /
dwags po zla 'od gzhon nu man 'dra /
yang na zla 'od gzhon nu nas /
dus gsum mkhyen pa chos kyi grags pa /
khams pa dbus /
khams pa dbang phyug rdo rje /
bla ma dbang phyug seng ge /
khams pa bya bral ba /
bla ma shes rab gzhon nu /
spyan snga chos kyi rgyal po /
de gnyis ka la ri khrod pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
de nas ras chen gzhon nu dpal /
grub chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
de la sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan dang kun dga' rgya mtsho gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na chos rje bla ma dam pa yan gong ltar la /
de nas ri khrod pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan man gong bzhin no / /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
chos rje sangs rgyas dpal /
rje btsun sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas /
rje btsun @# / /
rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan nas /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bo dong paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
stag lung ngag dbang grags pa /
chos rje 'chi med dpal bzang /
mkhas mchog sangs rgyas lhun grub /
bo dong sngags ram pa yon tan rgya mtsho /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na chag lo rin cen chos rgyal nas /
rje bshes gnyen bkra shis /
grub pa'i khyu mchog dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar pa ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
rje kun dga' grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man gong bzhin no / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
paN chen chos rin dpal ba /
rje blo gros rgya mtsho /
thugs rje can rin cen bzang po /
sngags 'chang kun dga' bsod nams /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs 'dzin /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
shar pa shes rab 'byung gnas /
zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ba yul ba gzhon nu 'od nas /
dge bshes 'chad ka ba /
sgyer sgang pa chos kyi seng ge /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims /
rgyang ro byang chub 'bum /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
gro ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
dbang ston grub pa shes rab /
sbyad lung pa gzhon nu blo gros /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
sbyang lung pa gzhan nu mchog grub /
rje btsun kun dga' grol mchog /
rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs 'dzin man 'dra /
yang na bo dong phyogs las rnam rgyal nas /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'bun grub /
paN chen ye shes rtse mo /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
de nas bla ma gsum tsam zhig ma rnyed /
de nas mkhan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang 'jam dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel /
de gnyis ka la bdag gis zhus /
nye brgyud ni /
rje btsun sgrol mas mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtshol dngos su gnang zhing bstod pa sh+lo ka gang mang rtsoms shig de'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i tshe'i dngos grub ster bar zhal gyis 'ches pa bzhin rje btsun mar bstod pa brtsams pas dgung lo brgyar nye ba bzhugs /
de la thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gsan no / /
! bka' babs gnyis pa la lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
paN grub wA gI shwa ra /
rdo rje gdan pa /
pa ri lo tsA ba /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rjes skya paN+Di ta /
'gro ba'i mgon po 'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po /
chos rje ye shes dpal bzang /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba rin cen rgyal @# / /
mchog /
rdzong dkar ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man sngar ltar ro / /
gzhan yang jo bo lugs kyi skabs smos pa'i bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan brgyud par bzhugs kyi phyin de man chad 'dir yang bgangs chog go /
! bka' babs gsum pa paN chen lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
byang sems bsod nams grags pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba man gong bzhin no / /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
dmar ston rgyal mtshan 'od zer /
mtshungs med nam mkha' blo gros /
chag lo khra ri ba man 'dra /
yang na paN chen shAkya shrI nas /
paN chen dA na shI la /
tsang thang pa /
bla ma ka pa ba /
rtogs ldan grags pa de /
g.ya' bzang pa bsod nams 'od /
bsod nams rdo rje /
gtsang pa blo bzang pa /
rang grol lhun grub /
nam mkha' blo gros /
chag lo /
khra ri ba man 'dra /
'dir ma zad mkhan chen byang chub dpal brgyud par bzhugs phyin de man chad 'dir yang bgrangs chog go /
! bka' babs bzhi pa a b+ha yA kar lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
slob dpon a b+ha yA ka ra /
shu b+haM ka ra gup+ta /
legs spyod 'byung gnas /
rat+na rak+Shi ta /
gau taM shrI /
kIrti tsan+d+ra /
lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan /
rong pa shes rab seng ge /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
mkhan chen rin cen 'phel /
bla ma ye shes 'phel /
rje kun dga' bsod nams /
bla ma byang seng ba /
rgyam ba yon tan 'od /
shangs dkar ba rin cen rgyal mtshan /
skungs lung ba sangs rgyas dpal /
rje 'phags pa rin cen /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba man 'dra / /
! bka' babs lnga pa gnyan lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
paN+Di ta ma ti /
gnyan lo tsA ba dar ma grags /
gnam kha'u pa dar ma rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun sa chen man 'dra /
sa chen brgyud par bzhugs phyin de man gyi brgyud pa rnams tshang ma ded chog /
! bka' babs drug pa dpyal gyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
rdo rje gdan pa ni ska laM ka /
dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po /
dbyal a mo g+ha /
mkhan chen gzhon nu dpal ye shes /
thar lo nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po /
rje ye shes dpal bzang /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba rin cen rgyal mchog man 'dra /
bu ston rin po che brgyud bar bzhugs phyin de man gyi brgyud pa gong ma rnams kyang bgrang chog /
! bka' babs bdun pa rngog lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
ngag dbang grags pa /
mar pa lo tsA ba chos kyi blo gros /
rngog chos sku rdo rje /
rngog mdo sde /
rngog kun dga' /
rngog gzi brjid grags pa /
rngog rin cen bzang po /
rngog chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
gnag ra bsangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
@# / /
rngog byang chub dpal /
byams pa gling pa bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba /
lo chen bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde /
zhwa dmar bzhi pa sbyan snga chos kyi grags pa /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba man 'dra / /
! bka' babs brgyad pa skad lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
karma pa rol pa'i rdo rje /
rje mkha' spyod dbang po /
karma pa de bzhin gshegs pa /
mkhas grub bsod nams 'bum /
slob dpon rin po che bla ma rgyal mtshan /
zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang pa /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba man 'dra / /
! bka' babs dgu pa nags rin lugs ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
paN+Di ta ngag dbang grags pa /
paN chen nags kyi rin cen /
chos rje kun dga' mchog grub /
rje btsun kun dga' grol mchog /
chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs 'dzin /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams ma chag grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! gang dkar lugs kyi sgrol dkar kyi tshe 'khrid rgyun khyer nyams khrid thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
slob dpon ngag dbang grags pa /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
dpal ldan mar me mdzad /
rgyal ba 'brom /
spyan snga ba /
dge bshes sle nag pa /
dge bshes sgre pa /
sgam po ba bsod nams rin cen /
dbus dus mkhyen /
khams pa dbang rdor /
dbang phyug seng ge /
khams pa bya bral ba /
bla ma shes rab gzhon nu /
spyan snga chos kyi rgyal po /
de gnyis la ri khrod gzhon nu rgyal mtshan dang ras chen gzhon nu dpal ldan gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas rje grags pa rgyal mtshan /
rje rnam rgyal mgon po /
mkhas grub rnam rgyal rin cen /
bla ma shAkya kun dga' /
rje dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
mkhas grub nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgyal mtsho /
rigs kun khyab bdag blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! 'phan yul lan pa'i spyil bur dpal mar ma mdzad la dran kha dpal yon gyis mtho 'tshams pa'i tshe padma'i rigs kyi khro bor gtogs pa rta mgrin shwan bzhi skor gyi sgo nas btul ba sogs byin rlabs kyi chan kha shin tu che bar grags pa'i rjes su gnang ba gzhan ma'i rgyas bkab ma yin pa'i gong ma'i yig rnying steng nas phyag len 'khrul med du nas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal rta mgrin /
yum gsang ba ye shes DA ki ma /
slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi ba /
slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
jo bo chen po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na /
yol grub thob chos dbang /
mtha' bzhi grub thob /
rin cen smon lam pa /
rin po che lam pa /
bla ma ye shes 'od /
slob dpon legs pa shes rab /
bla ma byang chub rin cen /
slob dpon byang chub /
gzhon nu 'od /
mkhan chen byams pa rin cen /
mkhas btsun byang seng ba /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
chos rje rnam rgyal bkra shis /
spyan snga bsod nams lha dbang rje btsun ngag dbang chos grags /
bla ma dpal ldan chos 'byor /
lo @# / /
pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
bdag chen ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na dang po'i sangs rgyas /
dge slong ma dpal mo /
dge slong ma dpal gyi bzang mo /
slob dpon ye shes bzang po /
jo bo chen po man 'dra / /
! byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan gyi zhal gzigs ma'i dpal rta mgrin nag po lcags ral can zla rgyal lugs su grags pa'i yig rnying dang phyag len la brten nas rjes gnang dang /
lung la /
sgrub thabs /
nad pa gso ba /
steng gdon gzir ba /
lus bsrung ba /
ser ba bsrung ba /
phyir bzlog pa rjes gnang gi yi ge dang bcas pa legs par thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
dpal rta mgrin /
byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
zhang skyi tsha 'od chen /
zhang dbu dkar ba /
zhang lo tsA ba /
zhang byang chub rin cen /
dpal rgyal ba grub /
'dzims pa rgyal mtshan dpal /
spang sgang pa grags pa dpal /
sgrub pa po bla ma rin cen brtson 'grus chen po /
mkhas btsun byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
ngor ba rdo rje 'chang /
kho phyar mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen go bo rab 'byams pa /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin mnyam med 'jam dbyangs chos dbyings rab grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na zhang byang chub rin cen nas /
lce ston sangs rgyas dpal /
brag ston tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
byang sems shes rab rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dge legs dpal bzang /
ba so chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dpal ldan don grub /
'jam dbyangs shes rab dar rgyas /
rje chos grags bzang po /
brag dgon spyan snga ba gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rje chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
lung gi brgyud pa ni /
mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan yan rjes gnang ltar las /
khyab bdag khra tshang ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen yan gong ltar la /
de nas rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
mus chen dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dpal rdo rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! thar rtse ba nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas dpal jo bo dI paM kA ras yol chos dbang la gnang ba'i rta mgrin zhal gsum phyag drug pa gshog pa can jo lugs su grags pa'i rjes gnang nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
spyan ras gzigs /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
yol grub thob chos dbang /
mtha' bzhi grub thob /
rin cen smon lam /
rin cen lam pa /
lha ye shes 'od /
slob dpon legs pa shes rab /
byang chub rin cen /
byang chub gzhon nu /
mkhan byams pa rin cen /
@# / /
mkhas btsun byang seng ba /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
gu ge paN+Di ta grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtsa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtse gdong bdag chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
lo pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
de sa bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rje lha mchog seng ge nas /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse ba man 'dra /
thar rtse pas mdzad pa'i yig ge'i lung ni /
thar rtse khu dpon /
mkhan dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! padma'i rigs kyi khro mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma'i rjes gnang lung gsum gyi chings ldan thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
grub chen dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba a mo g+ha badzra /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
chos rje paN chen /
shar pa shes rab 'byung gnas /
shar pa rdo rje 'od zer /
rin can ye shes /
glo chen sangs rgyas sras /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma bsam gtan lhun grub /
lo tsA ba dpal ldan byang chub /
'bri gung lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur pa bsod nams seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' lags pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyag /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang byug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
e waM pha dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chon byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen lags 'byung /
'jam dbyangs sa lo /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel man 'dra /
yang na yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel nas /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
shar pa sher 'byung man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra / /
! 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba rnams phyi rol pa'i lha'i gzugs dang rtags dang mtshan mas 'dul bar dgongs nas lha thams cad mkhyen ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'don la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang phyug sogs phyi rol pa'i lha rnams sku'i cha shas nas phyung ba'i skabs dbyangs can ma mche ba las phyung bar bshad cing nges pa'i don du dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yum @# / /
gcig ma yin la /
de yang rigs mang du yod pa'i nang nas shes rab bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i lha padma'i rigs kyi pho nya mo ngag dbang lha mo dbyangs can ma dkar mo'i rjes su gnang ba slob dpon dpe med rgya mtsho chen po dang sum pa lo tsA ba'i bzhed srol dam pa'i phyag len 'khrul med bzhin legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sgra dbyangs lha mo dbyangs can ma /
bram ze phur bu /
bram ze tsaN+Da ka /
thar rtse pa dang shar pa'i gsan yig na gtum po bde chen zhes 'di gnyis gcig tu mdzad 'dug kyang ngor chen dang mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na so song snang ngo / /
bram ze bde chen /
bram ze mchod sdong /
thar rtse pa dang shar pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis gcig tu 'dug kyang ngor chen dang mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang ngo / /
slob dpon seng ge /
nye ba'i seng ge /
ngor chan gyi gsan yig na 'di bzhin byung zhing 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na u pa sid+ha zhes rgya sgad sor bzhag bris 'dug thar rtse dang shar pa sogs gsan yig mang por nyi ma seng ge zer ba 'dug pa yig skyon shor ram snyam /
dpe med 'tsho chen po /
ngor chen gyi gsan yig na 'di bzhin byung zhing mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na dpe med rgya mtsho chen po zhes snang bdon gcig pa 'dra /
thar rtse ba dang shar pa'i gsan yig na dpe med rgya mtsho chen po so sor phral 'dug pa yig nor byung ngam snyam /
sum pa lo tsA ba dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje /
kun dga' bla ma /
spyi bo lhas pa byang chub 'od /
dam pa shes rab /
gru rdo rje seng ge /
bu ston seng ge 'od /
lha gzhon nu 'bum /
la tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal /
thar rtse pa dang shar pa'i gsan yig na byang chub bde zer ba 'dug kyang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan thor 'di bzhin snang ba lo rgyus sogs dang mthun /
bla ma rol pa'i rdo rje /
karma pa dang mi gcig /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa lo chen chos skyong bzang po /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
drin can bla ma rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la bka' drin du stsal to / /
rgya gar nub phyogs kyi paN+Di ta sa man+ta shrI thugs sras lo tsA ba la gnang ba'i rgya gar paN chen gyi phyag len 'khrul ba med pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ngag dbang dbyangs can ma /
des rjes su bzung ba'i rgya gar nub phyogs kyi paN+Di ta shrI dz+nyA na b+ha dra mu nIn+d+ra /
paN+Di ta chen po sa man ta shrI /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
bla ma rol pa'i rdo rje man gong dang 'dra / /
thugs sras lo tsA bas paN+Di ta'i gsung bzhin bkod pa'i rjes gnang gi yig cha'i lung ni /
thugs sras lo tsA ba /
lce nam mkha' chos kyi rgyal po /
gsang mtshan rol pa'i rdo rje /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
chos rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling 'jam dpal dbyangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bkra shes /
rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang sum pa lo tsA ba nas brgyud pa'i dbyangs can ma'i rjes gnang dang /
sgrub skor la /
sgrub thabs dngos /
zhar byung rmi ltas /
gtor ma'i cho ga dang bcas pa /
@# / /
thun mong ba'i gegs sel la /
'phrin las 'chol ba /
grib sel ba /
ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dod chags sel ba /
smyo 'bog sel ba /
'di las zab ba med pa'i gegs sel /
rtags med na spogs chog /
rdzas kyi chags gegs sel ba /
nor rgyun ma'i phrag dog sel ba rigs gsum /
lha mo dpal mo'i phrag dog sel ba rigs gsum dang bcas pa /
thun mong ma yin pa'i gegs sel la /
ting nge 'dzin la brten nas shes rab 'phel zhing mi 'grib pa /
phongs pa sel ba /
chags pa sel ba /
snying rlung sel ba rnams sbyin sreg gi cho ga /
rtsod pa las rgyal ba /
bsgrub bya dbang du bya ba /
byis pa blo rno bar byed pa /
ril bu'i sbyor ba /
dam tshig ma long la brten pa'i zhal shes dang bcas pa bram ze phur bus mdzad pa'i yi ge sogs gzhung man ngag las 'jam dbyangs smon lam dpal ba dang paN+Di ta phyogs las rnam rgyal gyi gsung bzhin bkod pa'i lung dang bcas legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
lo tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal yan ring brgyud ltar la /
de nas bla ma gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
rje tshul khrims rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs chos rje bkra shis dpal ldan /
chos rje dpal ldan seng ge /
'jam dbyangs legs pa chos 'byor /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
rje thub bstan pa /
rje phyogs las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
lha'i btsun pa bsod nams dpal bzang /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa snang mdzad rdo rje /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zur 'jam dbyangs chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor byan+da? la'o / /

sgrogs? chog /
rtags /
rtsod pa rgyal ba /
dbang sdud /
dug sel /
byis pa blo rno bar byed pa /
khams 'dus sel ba rnams man ngag tshigs bcad du bsdebs pa bo dong pa bi dza yas mdzad pa / /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs lhug /
man ngag bying ba /
rgod pa /
'dad chags /
zhe sdang /
mi dga' ba /
sdug bsngal sogs gegs sel sbyin sreg dang bcas pa /
des mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pa rgyan gyi 'phreng ba dang bcas pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
spyi bo lhas pa byang chub 'od yan sngar ltar la /
de nas 'dzims pa mgon po zla ba'i 'od /
lho pa rin cen grags /
'dzims mkhan chen bde gshegs /
'dzims brgyal mtshan dpal /
kun spangs chos grags dpal /
sa bzang ma ti paN chen /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
stag lung ngag dbang grags pa /
paN chen shAkyu mchog ldan /
glang thang spyan snga shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang tsha ra pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /

rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dbyangs can ma /
paN+Di ta shI la A kA ra /
tsan+d+ra shI /
gau taM shI /
thar lo nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan man 'dra / /
! thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i dbyangs can ma dkar mo'i @# / /
sgrub thabs rjes gnang gi kha skong dang bcas pa'i lung brgyud ni /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan yan gong ltar la /
de nas paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
sgrub khang dbon po dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! bram ze phur bus mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs ngag gi 'od zer /
drang srong mngon shes can gyis mdzad pa'i las sbyor gyi rtsa ba /
dpal ldan bsam yas pa tshul khrims blo gros kyis mdzad pa'i rjes gnang sgrub thabs gegs sel las sbyor dang bcas pa le'u bzhi pa 'od kyi dra ba /
bstod pa gzhon nu rol dga' dang bcas pa rnams kyi lung brgyud ni /
sum pa lo tsA ba yan gong ltar la /
de nas bla brang ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen klong chen pa /
mkhas grub chos rje /
sangs rgyas dbon po /
kun spangs sems dpa' chen po /
bla ma sangs rgyas ye shes /
rje sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
rdzas yig ba tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rtse le bsod nams rnam rgyal /
rtse le yon bstan 'dzin /
rigs 'dzin mthu stobs rnam rgyal /
rje padma dbang chen /
sdom brtson rin cen dar rgyas /
rigs 'dzin 'phrin las lhun grub /
sprul pa'i sku mchog gter bdag gling pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog las sgrib rnam sbyong gi steng nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
dz+nyA na gar+b+ha /
dz+nyA na shAn+ta /
bud+d+ha shAn+ta /
ngor chen gong dkar ba mkhyen brtse gsum gyi gsan yig na 'dug rung? thar rtse ba dang shar ba'i gsan yig tu mi snang ba tshad ba 'dra /
bud+d+ha gu hya /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
su war+Na dwi pa d+harma kIrti /
dpal dI paM kA ra /
go mi sgom chen /
kyi nor dz+nyA na /
gnyag ldom bu ba /
sdug thams cad mkhyen pa /
chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na chos kyi tog be rab? 'dug pa tog gi skad dong ke tu rgyal mtshan la'ang 'jug ngar dgongs sam snyam /
bya rin cen 'od /
bla ma bya nag chen po /
glo chen sangs rgyas sras /
mnga' ris glo bo pa yin /
bde ba can pa ye shes mgon po /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
bya btang kun dga' mchog ldan /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /

rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rigs kun bdag po chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /

mkhan chen @# / /
shes rab rdo rje /

thel mkhan po grags rdor ba /
drung byang chub rdo rje /
'jam dbyangs rin rgyal ba /
mkhan chen zla blo ba /
mkhan chen nyi ma /
mkhan chen kun blo ba /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston sems dpa' chen po /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
brag dgon sbyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang 'khon ston dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
dze tA ri pa /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
je bo rje man 'dra / /
! rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyis mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil gyi steng nas rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po grub chen sa wa ri pa lugs kyi rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dkar po lha bcu dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong can /
grub chen sa wa ri pa /
ja wa ri pa /
de wa pur+Na ma ti /
'gar lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po /
gshen ston rin cen dngos grub /
dmar chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
sgang ston shes rab bla ma /
sgang ston shes rab 'bum /
grags pa rdo rje /
dar ma byang chub /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhas pa bsod nams 'phel /
byang sems rin cen chos dpal /
mkhan chen rin cen rgyal po /
bla chen chos rig rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
'jam dbyangs byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
bco brgyad chos rje mchog legs rdo rje /
rje mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
bco brgyad pa mkhyen rab dbang phyug lhun grub /
dge slong 'phrin las rnam rgyal /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas ba ri lugs kyi rnam 'joms ljang sngon lha gcig pa'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
rje sa paN /
'phags pa rin po che /
bla ma bsod nams dbang phyug /
bla ma rin can dpal /
bla ma byang chub gzhon nu /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun ngor chen /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
drin can bla ma zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang bkru bya ba bsrung gsum dang bcas pa'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba nas /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rjes gnang rkyang pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
'u yug pa bsod nams seng ge /
ba ri phug pa shAkya seng ge /
bla ma sdings pa dbang rgyal /
sa bzang paN che @# / /
rin po che rgyal dbang pa /
bla ma yon tan dpal /
rong ston blo bzang grags pa /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
bar 'dir bla ma gcig gnyis shig hor khongs su lus /
'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan yin nam brtag /
de nas sku zhang rin cen bkra shis /
rdze rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
snur ye shes rgyal mtshan /
snur chos 'phags /
gar thig pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan shes rab rdo rje /
thel chos sgo ba /
thel grags rdor ba /
byang rdor ba /
'jam dbyangs rin cen /
mkhan chen zla blo /
mkhan chen nyi ma /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
'khon ston rdo rje 'chang dpal 'byor lhun grub /
rtsa ba'i bla ma chos dbyings rang grol des bdag la'o / /
yang rdzas gnang dang rje dkon cog lhan grub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bu mchog rjes gnang bcas tshang ba'i yi ge'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
lung 'phags mchog byams pa skal bzang la gsan 'dug kyang /
des dkon cog lhun grub la gsan nam gzhan la gsan khungs ma chod /
khyab bdag zha lung chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! zha lu pa shar chen ye shes rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i dkyil chog gsang ba nor bu'i gter mdzod kyi steng nas ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du slob dpon 'gro bzang snyang po'i lugs kyi dpal phyag na rdo rje lha bcu bdun gyi dbang legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rje /
dpal ldan kun tu bzang po /
slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
bram ze sadz+dza na /
jo bo te dza de wa /
zangs bkar lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab /
g.yor po jo ston /
pur bsod nams rin cen /
gra dol gyi mtshams na bcur zer ba zhig 'dug pa de nas yin pa chog khrigs dngos grub 'don 'jor gsal /
'byed phu ba padma bkra shis /
lha rje stag pa jo bzang /
gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal /
bla chen bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu rin cen bsod nams seng ge /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen ba bu ston chos rje /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
chos rgyal nam mkha'i mtshan can /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' drin mnyam med khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na mkhyen rab rje /
de la lcags sgos lung pa bkra shis dpal 'byor dang 'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas 'jam dbyangs byad gring pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
char chen kyi lam yig na ku su lu'i bla ma lam du mjal gsungs pa de yin /
yang na kha che rin cen rdo rje nas /
kha che dgon pa ba /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba /
zhu ston sa skya pa /
rje btsun grags pa seng ge /
rgya @# / /
ston sgrub pa po /
rgya ston grub mchog /
bla ma rdo rje dpal /
khro phu ba sems dpa' chen po man 'dra /
yang na khro phu ba nas /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
kun mkhyen bu man 'dra /
yang na grub mchog pa nas /
dpal sang pa /
sbrul sku rgyal tsha /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge man gong ltar ro / /
yang na rdo rje dpal nas /
gzhon nu seng ge /
brag ston bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
de sras kun mkhyen bu ston man 'dra /
spyir /
chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan rab / /
bya ba'i rgyud la rab tu grags / /
zhes gsungs kyang dmigs kyis bsal ba bya rgyud kyi cho ga chung ba rgya gar nas 'gyur ba 'ga' dang 'di nyid kyi dkyil chog bzhir slob ma'i dbang lnga phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang dang bcas mdzad mod rnal 'byor rgyud du 'khrul bar mi bya'o / /
! paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi rnam sras rjes gnang gi yi ge'i steng nas gong gnon phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi rjes gnang dang /
lung la /
phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po te dza de wa dang lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba /
thun 'tshams su gtor ma btang nas theg ma dang mtha' mar mchod par bya ba rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
sreg pa'i sgo nas tshar gcod pa slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa mkhan po te dza de wa dang lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi 'gyur /
'khrul 'khor bcing ba zhes pa rdzas dang sngags dang sman gyi 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
chu bo'i gzhung la gtong ba bskrad pa'i 'khrul 'khor /
bgegs la bsnun pa'i 'khrul 'khor /
bum pa la brten nas khro bo'i rgyal bo'i khrus kyi cho ga rnams /
sgrub thabs dang sbyin sreg ma gtogs par 'gyur byang mi 'dug rung thams cad 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa yin la /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na sgrub thabs kyi spyi don /
sgrub thabs /
bum chog /
'khrul 'khor /
gtor chog /
sbyin sreg rnams kyi TIk+ka 'dug kyang dpe ma 'byor bas lung ma thog rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de la rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po dang sgos lung pa bkra shis dpal 'byor gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la tshar chen rdo rje 'chang /
de nas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
yang na mkhyen rab rje nas /
da dbon sku zhang rin cen bsod nams mcho ga grub dpal bzang /
byang gling 'jam dpal rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
de la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
de nas zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
yab sras gnyis ka la khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
de la rtsa ba'i bla ma 'jam dbyangs chos dbyings rang grol gyis gsan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
a wad+hu tI pa /
jo bo rje /
lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ge /
rong pa 'gar dge /
'jad gyang phu ba /
mal lo tsA ba /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sa paN+Di ta /
rgyal tsha chos kyi dbang phyug /
rong pa shes rab seng ge /
bla ma gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma mgon po 'bum /
bram nam mkha' @# / /
rgyal mtshan /
ma ti baN chen /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
gu ge paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' brtan pa /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
grub chen dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
rje sa chen man 'dra /
lung gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje nas /
rje btsun bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
gnas lnga rig pa'i paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya ba chen po ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
! rje sgo rum pas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs dang brgyud pa'i phyag len la brten nas phyag na rdo rje u tsar+ya'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
'jam dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa /
slob dpon padma badzra /
slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra go mi /
rgyal po d+harma phal /
bla ma zangs gling pa /
khams pa a seng /
jo sras gnyal pa rin cen 'ong /
bla ma bya nag yin pa 'dra /
bla chen dkon cog rgya mtsho /
jo sras me 'bar /
bla ma don zhags pa /
rje mkhyen brtses sgo rum par gsan pa'i thor ston phrags zho ra bzhes 'dug pa 'di dang gcig mi gcig brtag /
bla ma lha rje /
byams pa che ba /
mkhan po rin cen rdo rje /
zur phug pa rin cen dpal bzang /
ri khrod pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
ras chen gzhon nu dpal ldan /
grub chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
de la sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' rgya mtsho /
zur khang pa dpal ldan rin cen gsum gyis zhus /
gsum gnas rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
kun mkhyen mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin mnyam med zur chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na bla ma lha rje nas /
slob dpon chos grags /
e pa 'jam dbyangs 'khon ston /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen jo nang ba /
bya sder ba byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
chos rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun rdo ring ba chen po nas /
rje btsun sgo rum pa /
tshar chen man 'dra /
yang na khams pa a seng nas /
zhang ston dkon cog /
ru smon mkhar ba /
skyi ston ru zhang /
rje dkon cog blo gros /
rje chos grags pa man 'dra /
yang na lo tsA ba mchog ldan nas /
bla ma rgyal 'od /
slob dpon smra ba'i seng ge /
bya sder ba byang chub seng ge man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN chen /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
sprul ba'i sku mchog mnga' ris paN chen padma dbang rgyal rdo rje /
gcung mchog sprul legs ldan rdo rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dkon cog rgya mtsho nas /
bla ma chos ldan rgya mtsho /
bla ma shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bla ma @# / /
gzhon nu bkra shis /
chos rje gzi brjid pa /
bla ma shAkya shrI /
bla ma dka' bzhi ba /
bla ma ras pa chen po /
be thug pa bde legs rgyal mtshan /
glo bo dzar pa rigs 'dzin chos rgyal bsod nams /
gos sngon zhal gzigs sngags 'chang chos skyong bsod nams /
rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ba mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man gong bzhin no / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
de dpon shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
dkon cog rgya mtsho /
shar chen man 'dra / /
! rdo /
rje 'chang sgo rum pas mdzad pa'i u tsar+ya'i sgrub thabs kyi lung ni /
rje sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
rje dbang rab /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zin bris kyi steng nas rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa dud kha'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud ba ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis /
ba ri rin cen grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa /
chos rje sa paN /
bla ma gra thang pa /
bla ma kun dga' bsod nams /
bla ma blo gros dpal /
dge bshes seng ge /
mkhan po bsod nams shes rab /
mkhan po shes rab mgon /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
rje bsod nams seng ge /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra / /
yang na mkhas btsun dge stag par khro bo'i dbang po zhal dngos su gzigs pa'i zhal gzigs brgyud pa ni /
mkhas btsun dge stag pa /
dran bu rin cen grub /
mkhan chen shes rab gzhon nu /
slob dpon dkon cog mkhar /
ri lung sbug pa chos kyi mgon po /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
lce btsun bsod dams dbal /
sprul sku dbang phyug rdo rje /
dka' bzhi ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang yon tan dpal /
bla ma blo bzang dpal /
mkhyen rab rin po che mchog grub /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa man 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab rje nas /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims /
'gos ston rdo rje seng ge /
mnga' ris ru thog pa rdo rje gzi brjid /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra / /
! rje btsun sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i sme brtsegs kyi sgrub thabs /
smyo 'bog 'don pa /
ser pa bzlog pa /
rims gso ba /
phyugs kyi god ka gcod pa /
phyugs nang gso ba /
mi nad bsrung ba /
ra lugs la sbyang gi bsrung ba /
'bras phol lhog pa gso ba /
nad pa'i sngas bsrung /
zhing gi 'bu bsrung /
sris rme ba /
'god po srag pa dang @# / /
bcas pa'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje bsod nams seng ge yan gong ltar las /
rje sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
rje dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na chos rdza khu dbon /
zhang ston khu dbon /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon 'dul 'dzin pa /
mkhan chen byang seng ba /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
sangs dpal ba /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
'gos ston rdo rje seng ge /
ru thog pa rdo rje gzi brjid /
rje mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon 'phrel /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang ba sher rgyan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
de dbon nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa man 'dra / /
! 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yig cha'i lung ni /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab /
mkhan chen zha lu ba /
des bdag la'o / /
! spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas jo bo lugs kyi sme brtsegs ljang nag gi rdzes gnang dang /
yig cha de nyid kyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bcom ldan 'das /
jo bo mar me mdzad /
nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba /
rong pa phyag sor ba /
bya 'dul 'dzin brtson 'grus 'bar /
mkhan po chos kyi dbang phyug /
rje bka' 'gyur ba'i gsan yig na 'di ltar 'dug cing lo pa dang shar pa'i gsan yig na byang chub zer ba snang ba gang rung zhig la yig nor byung 'dra sa skya'i gsan yig na 'di med par zul phu ba dang dkon cog seng ge zhes pa'i bla ma gnyis byung 'dug pa dpyad /
mkhas btsun tshul khrims rin cen /
bla ma dar ma bzang bo /
rje gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rgyal mtshan don grub /
rje gtsang pa rin rgyal /
bya btang bo d+hi satwa /
'jam dbyangs rin cen grags pa /
spyan snga bsod nams lha dbang /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen dkon cog rgya mtsho /
ngor chen dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan| rigs kun bdag po mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na bya 'dul 'dzin nas /
na bza' 'phreng gsol ba chos kyi byang chub /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses 'bum ram par gsan pa'i thor 'di thol la byung ba gong du mi mthun pa 'di gnyis gang dung re ma bgrangs pa'i nges pa mi 'dug /
mkhan chen chos kyi dbang phyug /
mkhan chen chos kyi brtson 'grus /
lo ba mchog ldan /
bcom ldan lho mdzes pa /
'di gnyal gung thang chos rje'i zhal ngo yin 'phags pa rin po ches lho rgyud mdzes par byed pa zhes btags pa'i lo rgyus snang ngo / /
rje dpal chen bzang bo /
chos rje ye shes dpal bzang /
rgyal sras blo bzang dpal 'byor /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
khra ri ba rin cen rgyal mchog /
mkhan chen 'bum rab 'byams pa dge 'dun nyi ma /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na 'jam dbyangs dkon cog rgya mtsho nas /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des @# / /
bdag la'o / /
! khro mo sme brtsegs kyi rjes gnang dang /
de'i sgrub thabs 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i lung dang bcas nos pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
DA ki seng ge gdong can /
gru spang rtsa ba rdo rje seng ge /
chos rje brag nag pa /
byang sems chen po /
bla ma dngos grub rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon bsod nams dar /
be bug bde legs rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang chos rgyal bsod nams /
de sras chos skyong bsod nams bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon bstan pa'i nyi ma bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin mnyam med zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rje dbang rab nas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje sgo rum pa yan gyi brgyud pa ma rnyad /
de la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses gsan no / /
lung brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags mchog byams pa skal bzang /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na rje dbang rab nas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! she'u lo tsA ba'i yi ge'i steng nas nor can gyi rigs jo bo lugs kyi dzam la dkar po 'brug zhon lha lnga pa'i rjes gnang /
lung la /
phyi chu sbyin la brten nas bsgrub pa /
nang gtor ma la brten nas bsgrub pa /
gsang ba ga'u la brten nas bsgrub pa /
thugs rje chen pos spyan nas dzam la sprul te jo bo la gnang ba'i lo rgyus /
rjes gnang gi yi ge /
bstod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ma /
she'u lo tsA ba kun dga' chos dbang gis mdzad pa'i sgom bzlas rjes gnang byed tshul bcas rdzogs bar nos pa'i brgyud pha ni /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
rgya brtson 'grus seng ge /
nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba /
'brom ston chos kyi rgyal po /
bshes gnyen po to ba /
dge bshes shar ba /
skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims /
spyan snga bsod nams 'phel /
dka' bcu pa gzhon nu seng ge /
sribs ri ba gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
lha gug pa rin cen 'od zer /
bla ma dpal ldan grub pa /
rin po che sangs rgyas 'od zer /
sa skya'i gsan yig na mi gsal yang los? spyan snga'i gsan yig tu bar 'dir bla ma kha shas ma rnyed tshul 'dug /
spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
she'u lo tsA ba byams pa kun dga' chos grags /
bla ma nam mkha' chos dar /
chos kyi spyan ldan lo ba spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dpal rdo rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! yang she'u pa'i yig cha ma gtogs pa'i rjes gnang dang lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'brom ston chos kyi rgyal po yan gong ltar la /
de nas bla ma blo ldan pa /
gro lung ba blo gros 'byung gnas /
gdan sa pa gru mi /
bla ma bsod nams 'byung gnas /
rje zangs chen pa /
bla ma chos sgang ba /
grub chen ri khrod pa /
dwags po paN chen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
rje sangs rgyas @# / /
bsam grub /
chos rje phyogs las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
rje chos dpal bzang /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs pa /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse pa nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bla ma 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag khra tshang pa chen po blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la ser bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rjes gnang dam pa'i phyag bzhes ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
badzra pA Ni /
dze tA ri /
a shwa ka shrI /
a mo g+ha badza /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
chos rje paN+Di ta /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa /
cho gas sgom kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
bla ma bsod nams skyabs /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar pa ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
go ram bsod nams seng ge /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub mchog dbang phyug rab brtan /
bstan pa'i mnga' bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
bla ma bsod nams dbang phyug /
bla ma rin cen dpal /
bla ma gzhon nu /
mkhan chen byang seng ba /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan man 'dra / /
! dzam+b+ha la nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa'ang bshad ma thag pa bzhin no / /
! 'dul ba lung las /
rgyal chen sde bzhi po mkha' lding sgra snyan dang sgra chung /
klu dbugs dang dbugs chen du gyur pa na bzhi gas sangs rgyas 'od srungs la yon tan shes nas dang da bslab pa'i gzhi bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la 'jig rten skyong bar smon lam btab pa'i mthu btsan pos bstan pa rin po che skyong ba la 'phags pa'i yul dang gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir yongs su grags shing mkhas grub mang bos chos skyong gi gtso bor mdzad pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam mang thos pa'i sras 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid ma bzod par lha min gyi dpung phyir log par brten lha rnams ngal bsos pas ngal bsos po dang /
lha min gyis g.yul bshams pa'i tshe seng ge khros ba la zhon nas bsrungs pas gnas srung bo dang /
dug sbral chen por sprul nas lha min dbang por rgod kyi dmag rnams myos par byas pas lus ngan po zhes sogs mtshan gyi rnam grangs mang por grags shing /
mu stegs kyi sprang pho nyi ma'i dngos grub sogs bsgral bar dka' ba mang po tshar bcad pas mthu rtsal che ba /
tshe dang dpal 'byor sogs 'dod dgu'i char chen po 'bad med du stsol ba'i lha mchog 'di nyid kyi chos skor bstan pa snga dar dang phyi dar gyi lo paN rnams las brgyud pa mtha' klas na'ang dus dbang gis chos par rlom pa phal cher mi chos kyi zhan la lha chos 'grub tu re ba'i le lo dang rnam par g.yeng ba'i dbang gis nub tu nye ba na rdo rje 'chang tshar chen chos kyi rgyal @# / /
pos byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du'i rnam par thar pa bzhin rnam thos sras bka' mi 'dra ba bco lnga tsam gyi chos skor gsan zhing phyogs gcig tu bsgigs pa'i rgyun ma nyams pa legs par thob pa la /
'di nyid kyi gong gnon du phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi rjes gnang mdzad pa'i srol ltar mnos pa ni gong du smos zin cing /
slob dpon 'gro bzang snying bos rgyud dang man ngag la brten nas rgyal po ngal bsos po zhi ba nor du bsgrub pa dang drag byed mthu ru bsgrub pa'i chog sogs mdzad pa las thog mar zhi ba bang byed ser po lha dgu zangs dkar nas brgyud pa stod lugs smad lugs kyi brgyud pa chu bo gnyis 'dres las /
phyag lan gyi rim pa smad lugs chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che'i bzhed srol ba /
tshe che bar mdzad la /
der ma zad rjes gnang lnga phrag gsum gyi cho ga so so'i lugs srol nyams pa med pa rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyi phyag len bzhin mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis chog khrigs su mdzad pa'i nor 'dzin dang la mo'i rgyan 'phreng gi steng nas thos pa yin zhing /
bsgrig rim mkhan chen pa'i 'dir rten 'brel gyi dbang gis rnam sras dkar po thog mar mdzad la /
kho bos rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur pa chen po la gsol ba btab par brten phyag len phra mo rnams kyang gab sbas med pa'i chog sgrigs dngos grub 'dod 'jo phyogs sdebs skabs su gang babs la rnam sras dkar po rten 'brel gyis rjes su gnang ba sogs go rim mi mthun tsam snang ba'i lugs gnyis gang byas kyang 'gal ba cher mi 'dug cing /
rjes gnang sogs kyi dus gang bde byas chog na'ang /
'dir dbang lung gnyis po ngo 'phrod sla ba'i khyad dang bcas thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi gsan yig gi go rim ltar bkod pa la /
rnam sras kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa zhi ba bde brad ser po lha dgu'i rjes su gnang ba /
'di dang 'brel bar shin tu gnyan pa slob ma dam ldan bsnyen song ra re tsam las mang par mi gnang ba'i drag po'i rjes gnang shin tu gnyan cing bka' rgya dam pa /
zangs dkar ba'i gong khug sro ma can las byung ba'i gsang sgrub ljang ser be con can yum padma gtsug phud ma ste yab yum gnyis kyi rjes gnang stod lugs las 'ongs pa /
slob dpon klu sgrub kyis sprang po nyi ma'i dngos grub bsgral ba'i drag byed rta sngon bdud mo bzhi skor lha lnga'i rjes gnang /
rnam sras dmar bo'i skor dang rnying ma bka' gter nas bshad pa rnams bla med du gtogs kyang 'dir sde tshan gyi dbang gis phyogs gcig tu bkod do / /
de nyid la cung zad kha bsgyur cing rgyal chen bzhi bsnan pa'i nang ma mo ltar bsgrub pa lha dgu'i rjes gnang gnubs kyis bs+b+yar? ba'i bai shra wa Na kha rag khram thogs nag po'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i drag po mthu ru bsgrub pa'i nang nas drag byed seng zhon klu brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rjes gnang /
de nyid la cung zad kha bsgyur ba bzhon pa med pa'i drag byed rkang thang lha brgyad kyi rjos gnang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na mi gsal yang /
chog sgrigs gnyis ka na 'dug cing phyag len la'ang mdzad /
gsang ba gshin rje ltar bsgrub pa mdung dmar can lha bcu gsum gyi rjes gnang /
kha rag khram thogs kyi rgyud na mu stegs nyi ma sgrub @# / /
pa dang b+ha ri ha'i grong khyer gzhom pa'i ched du slob dpon nA gArdzu na'i thugs nas rgyud gton par bshad pas sbrang po nyi ma'i dngos grub bsgral ba'i chos skyong yang 'di yin nam snyam /
bram ze su pa tos zhag gsum la mu stegs pa bco lta bsgral ba'i yang gsang drag po srin po bzhi skor gtso 'khor lnga'i rjes gnang /
shu raM ka warma'i lugs kyi rnam sras mthing kha zhal gsum phyag drug pa yum gyis 'khril ba gtso 'khor bco lnga pa'i rjes gnang /
rnam sras dmar ser las mkhan mdung dmar can dang bcas pa'i gtso 'khor gnyis kyi rjes gnang /
gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud nas sras gar mkhan mchog gur kun gzhon nu'i mdangs can zhal bzhi phyag bcu drug pa bstan pa'i shugs la slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po dang kha che rin cen rdo rje sogs kyis bkral ba'i gar mkhan mchog ljang gu zhal gsum phyag bco brgyad lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang /
'di la rjes gnang med /
de la cung zad kha bsgyur ba gar mkhan mchog dmar smug zhal gsum phyag bco brgyad pa yum bcas kyi rjes gnang /
rnam sras dkar po tshe 'phel lha dgu'i rjes gnang /
lha sras mu tig btsan po dang blon po zhang lha bzang klu dpal gnyis b+ha da hor gyi sgem gra bcom pa'i dmag la 'byon skabs dpal pa yon chen pos gnang ba'i rnam sras zhi drag gnyis las zhi ba ljang yul ma'am sprin gseb mar grags pa sar chen lha dgu'i rjes gnang /
drag po yang gsang mdung dmar can phyag mtshan bzhi pa las mkhan dang bcas pa'i gtso 'khor gnyis kyi rjes gnang rnams no sangs rgyab rten lung gi skor la /
mkhan chen dag chos pa'i chog sgrigs na las mkhan ma byung yang mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan dang khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba'i yig cha mthun par byung ngo / /
gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po gar mkhan mchog gi rtog pa dbang? brtag pa gnyis dang le'u bcu drug pa kha che'i mkhas pa chen po d+ha na gup+ta dang rab zhi lo tsA bas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang mtho gling 'dzam gling rgyan du bsgyur ba /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di'i gong du gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las byung ba'i gtam rgyud /
sgya rgyud bla ma gtum gyi gsung sgros /
brgyud pa'i rnam thar o po zha nang ba nas brgyad pa gsum 'dug kyang dpe ma 'byor bas lung ma byang /
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sna tshogs sgrub pa le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi rgyud rin cen 'byung ba le'u bcu dgu pa rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta kha che dgon pa ba dang lo tsA ba mnga' ris pa ye shes sdes bsgyur ba /
sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud le'u sum cu pa slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa zangs dkar lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
'di gleng gzhi'i skabs slob dpon kang gis mdzad na 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad ces dang rgyud kyi rdzogs mtshams su mdzad pa po bshad pa mthun par byung yang skye rgyud kyi le'u'i skabs slob dpon 'gro bzang snying bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la zhus par bshad pa cung zad 'gal ba ltar snang yang gsung ba po phyag na rdo rje dang 'gro bzang snying pos de'i bka' bsdus par mdzad pa'i sgra bshad pa 'dra'o / /
ce mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis kyi bar du sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud le'u nyer dgu pa dang 'gro bzang gis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs gsar 'od 'bar @# / /
ba gnyis 'dug kyang dpe ma 'byor pas mthob /
'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i zhib bde byed lha dgu'i sgrub thabs gser 'od 'bar ba'i TIk+ka sems can dbul ba rnams kyi don du zhi ba nor sgrub las sbyor dang bcas pa bshad zin to'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras drag byed seng zhon khros pa'i 'phrin las sgrub chul bstan ba la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig gi mtha' can /
'khor klu brgyad kyis ma bskor bar sgrol byed nag po /
khyab 'jug /
lha mo dpal chul gnad sbyin gyi dmag dpung dang bcas pa snang ngo / /
des mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras bde byed kyi rtog pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can baN+Di ta te ca de wa dang lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba /
rnam sras ser chen phyag mtshan rin po che'i be con dang ne'u le 'dzin pa zhig snang /
'gor bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo dngos grub kyi 'byung gnas zhes yod pa shu raM ka warma mdzad pa'i zhi ba bde byed ser po lha dgu'i man ngag yid bzhin dbang? nor bu'i sgrub thabs zhes pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
de'i TIk+ka slob dpon shu raM ka warmas mdzad pa'i sgrub yig 'di la gnyis te zhes pa 'gor yod pa la zab mo yin pas gsang bar zhu'i mtha' can /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis kyi bar du bde byed kyi chog sna tshogs pa'i mdzad dang dba' po rdo rjes mdzad pa'i lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs thar lo'i 'gyur gnyis 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor pas ma thog shag dril drug pa zhes pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub thabs la nang gses kyi sku gdung kong? rgyal mtshan gyi sgrub thabs te bsnyen pa'i chog /
gsung chos kyi dung sgrub kong? pa'i cho ga /
tsit+ta rin po che thugs (gong? sgrub pa'i chog /
'chi med yon tan )kong? sgrub pa'i chog /
sbu gri gsad kong? pa 'phrin las sgrub pa'i chog /
bum pa bzang po'i dngos grub mthar thug bang mdzod sgrub gong? pa'i chog rnams rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta te ca da was mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba /
de'i gsal byad zangs dkar lo tsA bas mdzad pa la sgu gzugs kyi rgyal mtshan gong? la brten nas rgyal po zhal dngos su blta ba'i shog dril /
gsung dbyangs chos kyi dung la brten kong? nas snyan grags kyi rgyun sgrub pa'i shog dril /
tsit+ta rin po che thugs kyi sgrub pa la brten nas kong? rgyal po dang tshangs pa'i bu mo'ang 'gugs pa'i shog dril /
yon tan shel gyi bum par brten nas 'chi med kong? kyi tshe sgrub pa'i shog dril /
'phrin las drag po gnam lcags kyi spu gri la brten nas kong? dgra srog myur du gcod pa'i shog dril /
te tsa de wa'i man ngag mu 'thud du snang bas gsan yig na chad pa 'dra /
mthar thug gter gyi bum pa la brten nas dgos kong? 'dod kun 'byung nam mkha' mdzod bsgrub pa'i shog dril /
mjug tu gang las brgyud kong? kyi lo rgyus nyung du dang 'khor lo bri tshul gyi yig chung dang bcas pa /
'di gnyis kyi bar du kho los kong bu ri pa la zhus pa'i shog dril drug gi yi ge zur pa zhig rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu thabs kyang dbam 'byor pas ma thab /
bsnyen pa'i gnad snying du dril ba /
sgrub pa'i gnad snying du dril ba /
srag gnad la dbab pa ste don gsum gyi man ngag rnams sras snying dril lam snying dang 'dra ba'i gnad kyi yi ge khra rgya gar du gtsigs po cher @# / /
byas te rin po che sna lnga'i khu bas bris pas khra bo zhes pa'i ming thog sgang /
bo / /
'di gnyis kyi bar na rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na gnod sbyin bel phongs kyi mnan thabs gur ga de was mdzad pa 'dug kyang dpe lha 'byor pas mthob /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba'i mgul khug sro ma can la rnam sras gser chen gyi gsang sgrub rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
rnam sras ljang ser be con ma'i thugs dbang? sgrub gsang sgrub rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang ba'i man ngag mgul khug blo ma can gyi kha gsal ma byung yang dpe dang gsan yig zhus dag pher bas yid ches su byas so / /
ces par nang gses kyi dngos grub kyi gzhi bzung ba /
rten gzug pa /
gsham bu bdun gyis dngos grub bsdu ba /
tshe sgrub pa /
bse rag kha 'ching ba dang bcas pa 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa yin gyi mtha' can /
sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud las gang la dmigs pa'i ling+ga yi zhes sogs mnan pa /
rmi ltas /
'khor lo'i kha chings /
sngags kyi kha chings dang bcas pa'i bse rag 'ching ba shin tu rgyas pa 'gro bzang snying po de skad gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
rgyun du 'grogs bar 'dod na rten gsum gzug pa'i man ngag thams cad 'grub par the tshom med do'i mtha' can /
rten gsum gzug pa'i man ngag 'khor lo 'dri tshul khyi dmar po'i snying la brten pa'i man ngag gsham bu'i tshul du bzlas so'i mtha' can /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na tshar gnyis ma byung yang phyi ma 'di gsal byed du 'dug pas kha phran nas bris pa yin /
bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi rtags ma byung na spogs pa'i chog sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtha' can /
spyir gces pa'i man ngag gsum /
bye brag tu gces pa'i man ngag dgu /
sgos su gces pa'i man ngag gcig rnams ston pa zhal gdams rin po che'i 'phreng ba /
'gor bsam pa bzhin du bsgrub pa srid pas nyer blangs na zhes yod pa'i rnam sras ser chen gsang sgrub ces pa rten bca' ba /
sgrub thabs bsnyen pa rtags dang bcas ston pa kha cha dgon pa pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams pa zab mo yin no'i mtha' can /
'gor gnod sbyin dbang po'i tshe sgrub ni zhes yod pa'i rnam sras dkar po'i tshe sgrub shin tu zab p-i athi'i mtha' can /
rnam thos sras kyi srog 'khor dgos 'dod kun 'byung ngam man ngag dgos 'dod kun 'byung du grags pa la gzhi sgrub rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na nang gses rnams gsal kha mi 'dug kyang chos sde'i ming dang gsan yig mthun pas the tshom ma dgos pas zhib par bkod do / /
rten /
gsham bu bdun pa /
tshe sgrub /
bse rag kha 'ching rnams gong ma dang zhus dag cung zad mi pher pa'i 'dra min gcig /
rnam thos sras kyi gsad gso gnyis las gnad kyi man ngag shin tu gab pa ma grub na gnad la dbab pa dngos grub ci 'dod ster ro rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi rtags med na spogs chog gong dang 'dra min cung zad rgyas pa gsang brgya ru /

gyi ma shang 'phrul gyi rgyal po /

zangs ma khyud gang pa /
gser gyi byi ba /
