rgya ru stong sngon smad dmar /
rkun ma'i lag pa /
rgya'i pags pa rnams la brten nas nor sgrub pa /
phyi gri rgod kyi lag pa /
nang gser gyi byi ba /
gsang ba @# / /
rgya ru /
yang gsang bse'i ga'u la brten nas nor sgrub pa /
skul bar ba /
gsung gtor ma /
thugs tsit+ta /
yon tan rin cen /
'phrin las phur pa la brten nas nor sgrub pa /
rnam sras sre thod ma zhar byung spogs chog dang bcas pa /
ri dags rgya'i bags pa /
rkun ma byi ba 'dra ba'i lag pa /
rgya lcags la brten nas sgrub pa /
gzhan gyi nor 'gugs pa'i man ngag rnams lhas nas zangs dkar lo tsA bas spyan drangs pa /
ma hA rA dza'i phyag mchan gnyis kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa'i dang po rgyal mtshan la dbang? brten nas rgyal po'i 'khor gyi ma rungs pa rnams kyi bar gcod dang 'khu ldog sel ba /
snyigs dus skye bo dbul zhing phongs pa'i don du ne'u le la brten nas dbang? nor tshul bzhin du sgrub pa gnyis kha che paN chen gyi man ngag /
rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i man ngag /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di lhar snang ba dpe zur pa ma rnyed gong gi mjug na gnod sbyin ku pa ra'i las mkhan spre'u sdig gzhon la gtor ma 'bul ba zhig 'dug pa yin nam snyam pa dpyad /
sgrub ba'i cha rkyen bsad nams bskyed pa'i thabs jo bo rjes zangs dkar lo tsA bar gnang ba the tshom med do'i mtha' can /
'gor lo rgyus dang bcas pa'i shes pa dkar po'i srog 'khor mnan thabs bar gcod med par myur du 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
gnod sbyin se gdong can mnan thabs srog dang 'dra bas shin tu zab kyi mtha' can /
'gor rgyab 'dre bkar ba'i thabs bstan pa zhes yod pa'i gnod sbyin shes pa dkar po gnon thabs gal che gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na dam sri kha chings dang bral phangs mnan pa gnyis 'dug lngar song zin pad las thur ba ma rnyed pas lung ma thob /
gsang rtan bca' zhing dkyil 'khor 'dri ba /
rdzas gsag sa /
lha bsgom sngags bzla /
dngos grub blang pa /
gnad la bor ba ste don lnga'i sgo nas bstan pa'i gsang sgrub kyang| con ma'i yi ge zangs dkar lo tsA bas mdzad pa mgul khug sro tshung ma /
'di rnam sras rang gis tshur gsungs pa'i gdams pa thugs zin snying gi bu la'ang gser srad phyag kyi 'bul ba med par mi sbyin pa /
rnam sras ljang nag sbu gri dang tsit+ta 'dzin pa seng ge la chibs pa rgyal po chen po nang lugs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba zangs dkar gyi thugs dam ma /
'gor sangs rgyas stong gi gsang ba'i mdzod ces yod pa'i gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas 'da'i las mkhan dmar ba zhung can bse mdung dang sbu gri 'dzin pa bya khral chibs pa zhig snang ngo / /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan la gnad yig chung zangs dkar lugs /
bstod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ma /
dngos grub gyi rdzas nyi shu rtsa bdun 'bul ba tshigs bcad ma khro los mdzad pa /
bram ze nag pos mdzad pa'i bstod pa thugs rje'i ba 'jo ma bzhi dbam 'byor bas lung ma byung /
ba kun mkhyen bu'i gsung rgyun /
des blo gros seng ge'i don du mdzad dbang? pa'i sgrub thabs dgos 'dod 'byung ba /
des mdzad pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bstod pa rgyal po thugs ma nyes par byed pa zhes ba ba /
dags 'dod 'byung ba'i zhal shes bshes gnyen dbang? 'brom ston bkra shis seng ge'i ngor thugs sras lo tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal gyis mdzad pa /
dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i srog 'khor gyi zhal shes char lugs kyi khyad chos 'jam @# / /
dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i phyag bris las bshus pa /
'di la phyag len dmar 'bring kyi brgyud pa las khung rgyun med do / /
thugs sras lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i zhi ba bde byed ser po'i bstod pa dbang? yi ge ma mo la spel ba rnam dag chos dbyings ma /
des mdzad pa'i drag byed nag po la bstod pa /
dbang? yi ge ma mo la spel ba gang thugs gnyis med ma /
sbos khang pa rin cen rgyal mtshan gyis mngad pa'i chos ra? skyong rnam thos sras kyi sngon byung lo rgyus /
des mdzad pa'i gtor ma'i chog chen ra? mo /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang gsham du mtshan ma smos par rgyal po chen po'i gtor chen 'dis /
bdag gis legs par sbyar ba yi / /
dge bas sems can thams cad la / /
'byor pa phun sum tshogs par shag cas yod pa /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu 'di gnyis kyi bar na phyag rdor gsang ba'i mtshan brgyad kyi bstod pa zhes pa 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor pas ma thob /
des mdzad pa'i man ngag gi skor la gsang ra? rten ga'ul brten nas chos skyong khyi ltar 'khrid pa'i man ngag /
khang bzang dang skul brten nas (ra? zhi ba nor du bsgrub pa /
srog gi )ra? 'khor lo'i bri yig /
phyag mchan ne'u le'i las sbyor ra? thun mong ma yin pa /
btsun mo me tog gtsug phung ra? kyi las sbyor /
skyes dar ma'i rus pa /
bud med kyi phang lo /
skyer phur /
kham phong rnams la (ra? brten nas dbang du bsdu ba /
ltas ngan sna tshogs )ra? gtong ba /
gdan seng ge'i las ra? tshogs zab mo /
chos skyong gi phyir ra? 'brang shes pa dkar po bkar ba rnams /
des mdzad pa'i rang ngam 'khor la mi /
ra? ma yin gyi gnod pa bsrung ba'i man ngag /
'brom sde nyi ma'i lugs kyi rnam sras skor gyi nor sgrub la /
rgyal po chen po ser chen lha dgu'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa /
'brong /
bsdus pa /
shin tu bsdus pa rnams gcig tu bsngos pa gnod sbyin 'brom? nor gnas kyi sgrub thabs rin po che'i khrims zhes bya ba /
rdza'i ga'u la brten nas rnam sras tshig sgrub man 'brom? ngag nor gnas kyi sgrub par grags pa /
rdza'i ga'u la brten nas rgyal po chen 'brom? po rnam sras gser chen gnod sbyin brgyad kyis bskor ba'i sgrub thabs /
g.yon ne'u le'i rgyal pa dang mchan khung na be con bsnams ba zhig 'dug /
lag pa la brten nas sgrub pa 'brom? lag sgrub srin po'i nor len /
rkyal pa la brten nas sgrub 'brom? pa ne'u le rdzas kyi nor bu /
snying la brten nas bsgrub pa snying sgrub 'brom? rig pa'i nor len rnams /
sre'u gso ba'i skor la /
dang po ma chags pa chags par byed 'brom? pa'i srid pa skye gnas kyi srog shing /
lte ba bur bsgyur cing dgos pa 'brom? srid bsgyur gyi man ngag /
mo 'dre 'dul ba bsen mo /
'brom? 'dre 'dul gyi gdams pa /
log 'dren 'dul ba rgyal 'gong 'brom? 'dul byed kyi gdams pa rnams /
dbang du bsdu ba la /
pho mo gnyis ka dbang du 'brom? bya ba nor sgrub gsang ba'i man ngag /
pho rigs mo rigs so sor dbang ('brom? du bya ba /
skyes pa dang 'bral )'brom? mi phod par byed pa /
mo gsham la bu skye ba /
bu dang 'brom? sha ma 'byin pa rnams /
zhi byed kyi skor la /
ma bzhu ba /
'go nad /
mig nad /
rgyu nad /
lhog pa'i chings dang gsan yig la 'di ltar snang yang man ngag la pho dbang du bya ba zur du mi 'dug /
nad 'brom? rnams zhi 'di gsum gsan yig na zur du mi gsal yang ma cha ngag gi dkyus su snang /
@# / /
bar byed pa /
yan lag bcu drug pa /
yan lag drug pa /
yan lag bzhi pa /
yan lag brgyad pa /
yan lag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams kyi dud pa la 'brom? brten nas bgegs thams cad bsrung zhing bgegs las rgyal bar byed pa rnams /
drag po mthu'i skor la /
chos sde gcig la don rnam pa lngar 'brom? bstan pa'i khyi dkar thod pa la brten pa'i srog mthu gnod sbyin lag ring /
bya pha waM gi mgo la brten 'brom? pa'i ltas ngan pho nya bya mgo /
sha g.yag gtsod kyi r+wa la brten pa'i 'brom? zlog pa lha 'dre'i kha chings /
mdzo'i r+wa co dang mdzo'i lag pa sogs la brten 'brom? pa'i khang sel r+wa bzhi lag bzhi /
phag thod la brten /
'brom? pa'i gtad 'phung byed kyi skor dang bcas pa /
de dag spyil 'jug pa'i las byang don brgyad ma rnams slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang /
'brom? bas mdzad pa /
yid ches pa brgyud pa'i lo rgyus man 'brom? ngag gi chings dang bcas pa /
'di skor gyi man ngag mang por bud+d+ha gup+tas mdzad zer ba 'dug pa sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs las slob dpon gzhan du yid 'khrul par mi bya'o / /
gsang sgrub kyi man ngag gong khug sro ma can du gtogs pa gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang ba? sgrub don drug gis bstan pa le'u gsum bzhar byung rgyal po'i man ngag dang bcas pa thugs sgrub gsang ba ma nor ba rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rnam thos sras srog gi sgrub pa zhes pa dkyil 'khor bi? dang rdzas bsham sgrub pa dngos dang bcas pa rin chen gsar 'dra'i nor sgrub tu grags pa zangs dkar lo tsA ba'i gser chos bslabs na lan tshwa chu shor nga'i mtha' can /
gsang sgrub kyi lag len bum ba? pa longs spyod kyis gang ba'i steng du lha sgom pa'i mtha' can /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na mgul lug srom can zhes pa las chos tshan gyi ming dang gsal kha mi 'dug kyang gsum po 'di gong khug ma yin nges dang gzhan ma ma rnyed cing kha che dgon ba pa'i be byam bse khab ma zer ba dpem 'byor pas lung ma thob /
bai shra ma Na kha rag khram thogs nag po'i rgyud le'u klu? sum cu so lnga pa 'phung byed shin+taM gar+b+ha dang bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs sangs rgyas rin po ches bsgyur ba /
rgyal po las ngan po srog gi gshed ma 'di la spyi don drug gis bstan pa klu? slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bdud mo bzhi skor gyi gdams pa /
mgon po gar mkhan mchog dmar smug zhal gsum phyag bco brgyad pa'i sgrub kha? thabs slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa zangs dkar gyi 'gyur /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na bar 'dir 'grel pa 'dug pa dpe ma byung bas lung mthob /
de'i ngag 'don 'gor skad shan sbyar gyi gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub kha? thabs zhes pa yod pa'i rin cen char pa rgyun chad med 'bab shog gi mtha' can /
spyan 'dren dad pa dam tshig kam? sgrub thabs dang mthun par rtags (kha? kyi bstod pa /
sgrub thabs dang mthun pa'i bskul )kha? sngon gyi bskal pa ma dang bcas pa /
rnam sras dkar po lha dgu'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang gi chog shA? dang bcas pa paN chen shAkya mchog ldan gyis mdzad pa /
ayon chen pos lha sras dang zhang gnyis la gnang ba'i rnam sras sbrin gseb mar grags pa'i skor la /
lo rgyus 'dan ma rtse mang ljang? gis yi ger @# / /
btab pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rjes gnang gi cho ga dam tshig rnams bsrung ba ljang? la brtson par gyis shig gi mtha' can /
klong yangs rin cen gter gyi rgyud las bstan pa'i sgrub ljang? thabs las kyi dngos grub stsal tu gsol gyi mtha' can /
rdo rje srid rgyal gyi sgo nas ljang? nyams grib nad dang bar chad thams cad sel ba'i cho ga /
'joms byed khyi mgo can gyi sgo nas srid ljang? pa gsum gyi mtshon kha 'ching ba'i mtshon bsrung /
klu mo padma 'dzin gyi (ljang? sgo nas nor sgrub pa /
kun tu rgyu nor )ljang? 'dzin gyi sgo nas zas nor longs spyod sgrub pa /
rdo rje drag po rtsa la ljang? gyi sgo nas dgra gsad pa /
mche chug dred mgo can gyi sgo ljang? nas mnan pa bya ba /
'phrog byed sprel mgo can ljang? gyi sgo nas dbye ba /
gar dbang khyung mgo can ljang? gyi sgo nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba /
thog chen spang dred ljang? mgo'i sgo nas ser ba dbab pa /
dpa' bo rgyal 'ug pa'i ljang? mgo can gyi sgo nas bsgad pa /
de dag gi dam tshig bstan ljang? pa dang bcas pa /
'di'i mjug na rnam sras sbrin gseb ma gter ma rdzogs so zer ba 'dug kyang deng sang 'di rnying ma bka' mar ngos 'dzin mdzad pa yin /
mdung dmar can phyag mtshan bzhi pa'i skor la gnod sbyin bzhi? dbyug to can gyi rgyud le'u bdun pa /
'di la slob dpon padma'i rgya dpe las gnyags dz+nyA na ku m+ba ras bsgyur ba /
li yul du slob dbon bi mA la mi tra dang lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba dang /
rgya nag tshe spong klu bzang dang rgyal mo g.yu sgras bsgyur ba sogs 'gyur mang /
de'i le'u mtha' ma'i tshe sgrub bzhi? gyi gsal byed slob dpon bi mA la mi tras mdzad pa /
'di gnyis khro phu lo tsA bas bya rgod gshongs nas gter nas spyan drangs pa yin /
rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dmar po'i sgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung bzhi? mthar thug 'dzad med mdzod la spyod par shog gi mtha' can /
gsang yum ma trag bzhi'i zhal gdams la nang gses kyi 'gor don grub bzhi? thugs sras rgyal po rnam thos sras zhes yong ba'i yi ge /
rnam sras srog len gyi yig sna las sbyar dmar po'i zhal bzhi? gdams su grags pa /
yang rnam thos sras dmar po srog len gyi yig sna bzhi? snying la spos shig gi mtha' can /
gsang yum bzhi'i zhal bzhi? gdams snying gar zangs kyi rtsibs bzhi zhes yod pa /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na gsang yum gyi zhal gdams zhes ba las so so'i gsal kha mi 'dug /
mdung dmar can gyi sgrub thabs bzhi? mkhan chen chos 'phags bzang pos rol 'bum gyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba /
'gor rnam thos sras dmar po snang ba mtha' yas bzhi? gsung gi sprul pa zhes yod pa'i che sgrub /
rnam thos sras srog rtsa yid bzhin nor bu'i bzhi? sgrub thabs yig chung /
gnad la dbab pa 'gor ma trag bzhi'i yig sna las zhes yod pa'i bzhi? zhal shes bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo'i mtha' can /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu 'di gnyis khyi bar na sngags kyi thems yig 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor pas ma thob /
bsgrub bya'i rtsa gsum 'dus bzhi? pa zhes yod pa'i gnad yig gsang ba /
'gor rnam sras dmar po'i srog sgrub ces yod pa'i rten bzhi? gtor ri rab ma bca' ba'i zhal @# / /
gdams dangs grub blang ba dang bcas pa /
bar 'dir gsan yig na zas nor sgrub pa zhig 'dug pa dpe ma rnyed pas lung ma byung /
sga ba 'dre shes pa dkar po bse byang bzhi? la brten nas gnon thabs /
gsan yig na stag mda'i sgrub thabs dang nor rten 'dzugs pa 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor bas mthob /
ma 'grub na ha ya grI wa'i sgo nas bzhi? dbang du bsdus te gnad la dbab pa /
ma 'chun na 'jun (bzhi? pa'i man ngag /
gud na gso )bzhi? bar byed pa /
gsan yag na 'di gsum so sor mi gsal 'dug kyang don du sde tshan gcig /
'gor rnam thos sras snying gi ze'u 'bru zhes yod pa'i bsnyen pa bzhi? dang las sbyor gyi zhal gdams nam grags pas mdzad pa /
dbang nar bas mdzad zer ba yig nor byung ba 'dra /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad bo? pa'i gtor chog dgos 'dod 'byung ba /
des mdzad bo? pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge /
rgyal chen mdud dmar can gyi las tshogs 'khor lo'i bri yig la /
gri snying (bzhi? 'khor lo /
snang ba dbang sdud kyi )bzhi? tsakra mu khyud drug pa /
gtor ma rin cen spungs bzhi? pa'i 'khor lo /
bla rdo'i (bzhi? 'khor lo /
ga'u'i )bzhi? 'khor lo /

bse rag gi ltas dang )bzhi? gnon thabs /
sngar song ba de dang 'dra min zhig snang yang chos sde 'di kha'i dkyus su 'dug /
kha bzhi? chings /
bse rag kha chings bzhi? kyi man ngag lhan thabs /
srog 'khor dang dbang sdud bzhi? 'khor lo 'dri tshul bsdus pa /
snang ba dbang sdud bzhi? kyi tsakra mu khyud lnga pa dang bcas pa /
mdud dmar can gyi sgrub yig bzhi? nag po 'gro shes 'phags dpon gzhung lugs rab 'byams pas mdzad pa rnams yon tan rin cen 'byung ba'i rgyud gnubs? le'u bcu gnyis pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po kun skyong gis gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes la gtad pa /
rgyud de la brten nas phyi dkar gnubs? po ging du bsgrub pa /
nang nag pa bdud gnubs? du bsgrub pa /
gsang ba yid bzhin nor bur bsgrub gnubs? pa rnams mkhan po kun skyong gis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub gnubs? thabs gsum gyi rtags yig /
des mdzad pa'i las byad gnubs? ri rgyal lhun po ma rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rnam thos sras seng ge bu bdun du grags pa'i skor la /
'gor rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi man ngag 'di la don rnam pa bdun las zhas yod pa'i drag po spyi sgrub drag snags kyi sgrub rgyud /
seng ge bu bdun dregs pa'i spyi sgrub kyi bskul ri rgyal lhun po ma /
rnam sras seng ge bu bdun gyi las byang gcig tu dril ba sgos bskul shes par bya'o'i mtha' can /
dregs pa yongs dril gyi man ngag don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
ngan sngags drag po yongs dril gyi ngan sngags la brten nas dgra gsad pa /
de'i bskul mi mngon dbyings bzhugs ma rnams gnod sbyin shing rta'i rgyud la brten nas slob dpon spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa /
'khor gyi las tshogs la yang dag shes la brten nas dbang? mngon shes dang dbang phyug bsgrub pa /
gang ba bzang po la brten nas dbang? dmag pa zlog pa /
nor bu bzang po la brten nas dbang? zas nor bsgrub pa /
ku be ra la brtan nas (dbang? chom rkun 'ching ba /
lnga rtsen la brten nas )dbang? tshe @# / /
bsgrub pa /
dzam+b+ha la'i dzam bi ral brten nas dbang? skye bo dbang du byed pa /
ne'u le la brten nas dbang? zas nor bsgrub pa /
ba dan la brten nas dbang? dmag drang ba dang bzlog pa /
'brog gnas la brten nas dbang? dgra gsad pa /
'jam po 'khyil pa la brten nas dbang? ser ba bsrung ba rnams khro phu lo tsA ba'i zhal gyi gdams pa /
ku be ra'i byin rlabs la brten nas rta'i god ba bsrung ba /
gnod sbyin stag mda' gdong dang de'i khol mo lha mo nor dpal ma ming sring gi sgrub thabs paN chen shAkya shrIs mdzad pa bsod nams la rku bas 'di gal che'o'i mtha' can /
'gor gnod sbyin stag mda'i sgrub thabs zhes yod pa'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i gdams pa /
gnod sbyin stag mda' gdong gi sgrub thabs zhes pa bla rdo dmigs pa sngags gsum gyi sgo nas bstan pa shAkya shrI la mi bskyod rdo rjes zhus pa /
yang de dang stod 'dra ba la smad cung zad nyung ba 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa -ithi'i mtha' can /
yang de dang cung zad 'dra min rgyas pa 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na stag mda'i sgrub thabs mi 'dra ba bzhi zer ba las kham phral ba 'jug /
'gor de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen mang la phyag 'tshal lo zhes yod pa'i gnod sbyin ging ka ra la brten nas mi nor zas gsum bsgrub pa zang zang g.yur rtse'i gter ma zangs dkar gyi khyad chos /
byang phyogs rgyal po'i bka' nyan a pa ritsit+ta rin cen bzang po'am nor bu bzang po dreng zhon gyi sgrub thabs in+d+ra b+hU ti sa mdzad pa rdzogs /
so'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs chung ba lag len gyi rim pa rin cen bzang po'i nang du sgrub pa yin gyi mtha' can /
'gor phyag na rdo rje'i sku la 'dud ces yod pa'i nor bu bzang po a pa ra dkar po dreng zhon gyi sgrub thabs tshigs bcad ma gsang sgrub gnad kyi zhal gdams rdzogs so'i mtha' can /

a pa ri tsat+ta'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la bar du gcod pa'i gnod sbyin lag spun mnan pa /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di'i rjes su 'khor lo sogs kyi zhal gdams a par gsum gyi dbye ba /
sgrub thabs mchal min ngag dbang dbyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa gsum 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor bas lung mthob /
cho ga phyag len gyi skor la /
'gor bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes yod pa'i zhi drag spel ba'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrIs mdzad pa mjug tu thugs sras lo tsA ba'i ka bstod le tshan gnyis btags pa /
'di rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na gsham gyi bstod pa'i mdzad byang la brten nas thugs sras lo tsA bas mdzad gsung pa 'dug kyang 'di tsan+d+ra shrIs mdzad nges yin pa khyab bdag zha lu pa gsung /
rnam sras zhi drag sbrel ba'i cho ga bklags chog dbang? mkhyen rab rje'i phyag len ltar chos rje bco brgyad pa 'jam dbyangs kyis mdzad pa /
rnam sras rigs mi gcig pa lnga'i sgrub thabs dbang? gsal bar bstan pa'i dogs pa kun tshang gnyags dbon rin @# / /
po chos mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i rnam sras zhi drag rnams mchod dbang? pa'i cho ga rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba /
rnam sras zhi drag rnams kyi mchod chog rjes gnang dang bcas pa skyor mo lung pa mkhan chen chos rgyal dpal bzang gi mchod g.yog nam mkha' seng ges mdzad pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na nam mkha' grags zhes snang ba yig skyon shor ram snyam /
rnam sras gser chen gyi gtor chog mchod 'phreng bstod pa dang bcas pa stag tshang lo chen shes rab rin cen gyis mdzad pa /
'gor dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i dus zhes yod pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi gsang mdos kha che dgon pa bas mdzad pa /
rnam thos sras kyi gsang mdos rgyas pa kha che'i rigs kyi mkhan po gzi brjid lha dang paN+Di ta te tsa de wa dang bod kyi lo tsA ba zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis kha che khri brtan du bsgyur ba /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na bar 'dir gsang mdos chung ba zhig 'dug pa dpe ma 'byor bas ma thob /
ayon chen po padmas khram thogs nag po'i rgyud dang yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa'i gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang mdos sam stong mdos rgyal po'i dpung bzlog chen mo bal bo ba su d+ha ra la gnang /
des gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes la gnang ba nyug gi rdo rje sgrom bu la gter du sbas pa /
phyogs bzhir drag po'i g.yul bzlog dmag dpon gyi mdos rnams /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di'i rjes su lus ngan po'i zlog mdos ayon chen pos mdzad pa dang dge slong dkon cog ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i mdos rgyas pa zer ba bdug pa dpe ma 'byor bas ma thob /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i bkra shis khyab bdag rdor 'dzin ma /
sa skya khri chen kun dga' bsod nams kyis mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sgrub thabs gtso bor ston pa'i be bum dkar chag zab don nor bu'i me long /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig phyag tu ma 'byor ba'i stabs zhi drag gi dbye ba tsam las so so'i brgyud tshul dang mthun pa'i sde tshan med cing dpe sna tshogs 'gres nyams kyi 'ga' zhig 'dabs pa dang rgyun med pa 'ga' re'ang chung ba bcas byung 'dug kyang 'go mjug gi tshigs bcad sogs mkhas pa dgyes pa'i legs bshad du snang ngo /
des mdzad pa'i rnam sras dbang drag gi yi ge'i skor gtso bor ston pa'i dkar chag snyan brgyud gser gyi za ma tog /
x mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i dpal chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnam thos rigs mi 'dra ba lnga phrag gsum gyi rjes gnang gi chog nor 'dzin dpal mo'i rgyan 'phreng /
rigs kun khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan gyis mdzad pa'i rnam sras lnga phrag gsum gyi rjes gnang gi chog khrigs dngos grub 'dod 'jo dang bcas pa rnams legs par nos pa las zangs dkar lo tsA bas stod kyi phyogs su thog mar gnang zhing gtum ston blo gros grags nas brgyud pa'i rnam sras stod lugs sam bya sder lugs su grags pa'i zhi ba bde byed ser chen lha dgu'i rjes gnang thob ba'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rje /
kun tu bzang po /
slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
kha che dgon pa pa /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab /
gtum ston blo gros gags /
gtum mgon po yon tan /
lung khu dgon @# / /
pa /
mkhan pa lung ston /
slob dpon legs pa'i shes rab /
bya sder ba byang chub rin cen /
bya sder ba byang chub gzhon nu /
mang mkhar ba blo bzang dkar mo /
mang mkhar ba blo bzang grags pa /
bzang ldan mkhan chen shAkya blo gros /
'bul dpon rdo rje rgyal po /
rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa kun dga' lags pa /
char chen rdo rje 'chang blo gsal rgya mtsho /
'jam dpal dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rigs kun khyab bdag zur chen chos dbyings rang grel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga rin po che mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
rje btsun bka' 'gyur ba man 'dra / /
zangs dkar lo tsA bas smad kyi char g.yor po jo ston la gnang bas smad lugs su grags pa'i rgyal po chen po ngal bsos po zha be bde byed ser chen lha dgu dang drag byed bzhon pa med pa klu brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rjes gnang bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyag len ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba yan gong ltar la /
de nas g.yor po jo ston /
btsur bsod nams rin cen /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig nam 'dug ba chad pa 'dra /
'byed phu ba padma bkra shis /
rtag pa lha rje jo bzang /
khro phu lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal /
bla chen bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu sems dpa' chen po /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
sku zhang nam mkha' mchog grub dpal bzang /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
sku zhang rin po che mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub dpal bzang /
de la rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po dang chos rje bkra shis dpal 'byor gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
de nas brgyud tshul le tshan rnams gong dang 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab rin po che nas /
sku zhang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
'jam dbyangs byang gling chos rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na byang gling rje nas /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brten man 'dra /
yang na sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje nas /
bco brgyad pa 'jam dbyangs chos rje /
gnas brtan bstan pa bzang po /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje man 'dra /
yang na thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal nas /
mkhas grub rin cen bsod nams 'phel /
stag tshang lo tsA ba shes rab rin cen /
rje btsun yab chos rgyal rin cen dpal bzang po /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
yang na khro phu lo tsA ba nas /
mkhan chen byang chub r+d+pal /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
mkhan chen dka' bzhi pa /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon ka ma ru pa /
slob dpon kah+na pa /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di @# / /
ltar snang la rdo rje 'chang sngags dam pa dge 'dun bkra shis kyi gsan yig dang chog khrigs dngos grub 'dod 'dzin karna zhes pa 'dug /
slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
kha che sadz+dza na /
kha che te dza de wa /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba /
zhu sa skya pa /
jo btsun grags pa seng ge /
rgya ston grub pa po / /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus zhes snang /
rgya ston grub mchog /
bla ma rdo rje dpal /
khro phu sems dpa' chen po man 'dra /
yang skyor mo lung ba'i phyag len ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po nas /
grub chen briM ka ra wa ti /
kha che dgon pa pa /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba /
g.yor bo ngo ston rdo rje rtse mo /
sbas ti dgra bcom pa sems dpa' rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab seng ge /
gsam yas pa tshul khrims dbang phyug /
seb can pa yon tan tshul khrims /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
mkhan chen dka' bzhi pa /
dga' ldan phug ba blo bzang grags pa /
de gnyis gal mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
de nas paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
brag dmar ba kun dga' tshe 'phel /
spyan snga shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje man 'dra / /
rnam sras kyi rjes gnang lnga phrag gsum pa dngos grub 'dod 'jom gtogs pa'i rtags med pa'i lung yongs rdzogs dang dbang gi rtags yod pa rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po yan gong du smos pa'i smad lugs kyi brgyud pa'i rnam grangs ltar la /
de nas mkhas btsun grub pa'i dbang phyug mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
bstan pa'i sog shing spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya pa chen po ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dpal rdo rje kun dga' bsod nams dbang phyug /
rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
dbang gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
khyab bdag zha lu ba /
das bdag la'o / /
chog sgrigs dngos grub 'dod 'jo'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba nas /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
kong gi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
kha che te dza de wa nas /
kaM ba dzi /
su ma ti kI rti /
kong bu ri ba /
khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal man 'dra /
ra'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros yan gong ltar la /
de nas paN chen bsod nams blo gros /
sham+b+har rin po che kun dga' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang char ba chos rje man 'dra /
'brom gyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
gsang ba'i bdag po /
slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba /
lo tsA ba dabs many+dzu shrI la gsum rgyal ba byang chub /
de la paN+Di ta kha che dkar bos bod du zhus /
de nas zangs dkar lo tsA ba /
mchims yul smad kyi 'brom sde nyi ma /
dge bshad lo tsA ba /
sle'u mtshur ston /
sle'u ston pa /
dge bshes dbu gru ston smon lam /
'phrin las jo sras nas rim par brgyud de /
shab+b+ha ra rin po che kun dga' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje man 'dra / /
zhi ba bde byed ser po 'di dang 'brel ba'i drag po'i rjes gnang shin tu bka' gnyan pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhyen rab chos rje nas /
sku zhang rin can @# / /
mchog grub /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
'di thob pa'i gang zag de rnam sras la mchod gtor mi gcag cing rjes gnang zhu dus ting nge 'dzin gsal ba dang mjug tu rnam sras kyi tshe sgrub nyams su len dgos tshul snang ngo / /
yang drag po dang ma 'brel ba'i rnam sras ser chen smad lugs kyi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros yan gong ltar la /
de nas mkhan chen ngag dbang lhun grub bkra shis /
mkhan chen kun dga' dpal 'byor /
chos lung mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun grub rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal yan gong ltar la de nas rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub /
paN chen ye shes rtse mo /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
ser rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
pha bong kha pa bde legs nyi ma /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na thugs sras lo tsA ba nas /
rje grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rje ye shes rgya mtsho /
bla ma grags pa bsam grub /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
sngags ram pa bzang po rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa man 'dra / /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba'i gong khug sro ma can gyi zab chos gsang sgrub ljang ser be con gyi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal yan rnam sras /
ser chen ltar la /
de nas mkhan chen gtsang ba dbang phyug grags /
mkhas pa byang chub grags /
mkhan chen dang ba ma brtson 'grus byang chub /
thog ston shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma rin cen rgya mtsho /
bla ma rin cen dpal /

bla ma shAkya ye shes /
mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
chos rje kun dga' tshe 'phel /
glang thang spyan snga shAkya rgyal mtshan /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
de la rje mkhyen brtse dang rin po che bod mkhar bas gsan pa'i lugs gnyis gser chen ltar la rje dbang rab khu dbon gyi bar du mkhan chen zha lu pa nges par dgos so / /
be'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
spyan snga chos kyi rgya mtsho nas /
rje dbang rab /
mkhan ngag chos pa man gong gi lung brgyud bzhin no / /

gsang ba gshin rje ltar sgrub pa mdung dmar can lha bcu gsum /
yang gsang srin po bzhi skor /
shu raM ga warma lugs kyi rnam sras mthing kha lha bco lnga /

'di gsan yig na mi gsal @# / /
yang chog khrigs gnyis ka na byung zhing spas tis zangs dkar ba la cung ma thug pa 'dra'o / /

mkhan chen dang ma brtson 'grus dbang phyug /

se ba can pa yon tan tshul khrims /

mi pham skra'i la bcan /
slob dpon a b+ha yA ka ra /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba /
thugs sras mang ston /
sog byang chub yon tan /
dpal rgwa lo /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen bu ston rin po che /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
gnyag phub bsod nams bzang bo man gong bzhin no / /
sprin gsab ma dang phyag mtshan bzhi pa gnyis lnga 'gyur bka' gter gyi thob yig tu lam tsam yod kyang 'dir char lugs rjes gnang bka' bco lnga zhes grags pa'i rjes su 'brangs te bris pa yin no / /
bzhi'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
spyan snga chos kyi rgya mtsho yan phyag mtshan bzhi pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ltar la /
de nas rje dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen 'ag dbang chos grags man sngar bzhin no / /
po'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
mkhan chen bslab gsum pa /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
gnubs kyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed /
rgyal po kun skyong /
bal po bsu d+ha ra /
gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes /
gnubs rdo rje 'bar /
gnubs byang chub snying po /
gnubs spyi bo dong ring /
gnubs gtsug tor bgying ba /
gnubs bya pho brtsegs pa /

gnubs ser po dpal sras /
gnubs klus 'byin /
gnubs ra thung /
gnubs gtso bo lha ba /

gnubs nag po jo phan /

rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje /
mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rje btsun dbang phyug rab brtan /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags man lung brgyud spyi 'gro bzhin na / /
! mnga' ris rab 'byams pa tshul khrims 'od zer gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog 'phrin las lhun grub kyi steng nas bya rgyud rigs gsum spyi'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
badzra d+ha ra /
badzra pA Ni /
ma hA in+d+ra b+hU ti /
ma d+nyam /
mrityu /
nA gArdzu na /
nA ga bo d+hi /
kha che ye shes rdo rje /
lo chung grags 'byor shes rab /
rje btsun @# / /
brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rjes paN /
de gnyis gal do ba dkar ston shAkya grags byis gsan /
de nas pan+de lung pa kun bzang dpal /
gung pa dar ma ye shes /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul rgyal /
bla ma ngag dbang /
gnyag ston byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
e waM sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
nges bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i rigs gsum spyi'i dbang gi tho chung gi brgyud pa ni /
rje dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
drin can zha lung chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
slob dpon chen po rtsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i rigs gsum mgon po'i mchod rten bzheng thabs kyi yig cha'i lung brgyud ni /
thub pa'i dbang bo /
rigs gsum mgon po /
slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi nas rim par brgyud de sngags 'chang dpal ldan bkra shis /
se ston legs grub tshe ring /
khyab bdag khra chad pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge go bde bklags chog gi steng nas ston pa thub pa'i dbang go gtso 'khor gsum /
thugs rje chen po sbyan ras gzigs gtso 'khor gsum /
rje btsun mi g.yo mgon po /
rje btson sgrol ma ldang gu gtso 'khor gsum dang bcas te bka' gdams lha bzhir grags pa'i rjes gang dang /
sa skya khri chen 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams kyis mdzad pa'i bga' gdams lha bzhi'i 'khrid yig bka' gdams bstan pa'i sgron me /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i lha bzhi'i mngon rtogs rjes gnang gi yi ge go bde bklags chog dang bcas pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
nag tsho lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba /
rong pa phyag sor ba /
bya 'dul 'dzin pa /
mkhan po chos kyi byang chub /
mkhan po zul phub /
slob dpon dkon cog seng ge /
de gnyis ka la mkhas brtsun tshul khrims rin cen /
de nas bla ma dar ma bzang po /
chos rje gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rgyal mtshan don grub /
chos rje gcang pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
bya btang bo d+hisatwa /
'jam dbyangs rin cen grags pa /
spyan usnga bsod nams lha'i dbang bo /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
lcags thang rab 'byams pa bsod nams dpal ldan /
thams cad mkhyen pa klu sgrub rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
bka' gdams lha bzhi'i nang gi thub pa'i dbang bo'i lha khrid nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
thub pa chen po /
spyan ras gzigs /
byams pa mgon po /
thogs @# / /
med /
dbyig gnyen /
'phags pa grol sde /
btsun pa grol sde /
mkhan po rnam snang mdzad /
slob dpon seng ge bzang po /
ku sA li che chung gnyis /
gser gling pa chos kyi grags pa /
dpal ldan a ti sha /
'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
po to ba rin cen gsal /
glang ri thang pa rdo rje seng ge /
rgya ston lcags ri ba /
dwags po lha rje /
rnal 'byor pa chos kyi 'byung gnas /
gyer sgom chen po /
rgya sgom ri pa /
bo dong rin po che brtson 'grus rdo rje /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
rin po che shes rab 'bum /
'jig rten dbang phyug thogs med bzang po dpal /
mkhan chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen grags pa bshes gnyan /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhen chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
lo pa spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
paN chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
thub pa'i rjes gnang dang lha 'khrid kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
lo pa spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de nas mus chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
chos rje kun dga' legs grub /
rje byams pa phun tshogs /
rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor shes rab /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
spyan ras gzigs gtso 'khor gsum pa'i lha 'khrid dmar khring skyer sgang lugs su grags pa thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas /
'phags pa thugs rje chen po /
rA hu la gup+ta badzra /
jo bo chen po lha gcig /
nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba /
dong pa phyag sor ba /
ba yu ba shes rab tshul khrims /
de la mnga' ris pa shes rab rgyal mtshan dang lce sgom shes rab rdo rje gnyis kyis gsan /
de gnyis la grub thob skyer sgang pa /
de nas sangs rgyas gnyen ston /
sangs rgyas ston pa /
mkhas grub shangs ston /
mkhas btsun rkyal mtshan 'bum /
'jag chen byams pa dpal /
gser gling byams pa smon lam dbang phyug /
grub chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rin po che shes rab bzang po /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa man thub pa'i lha 'khrid bzhin no / /
yang rjes gnang dang 'khrid kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig la gsham nas 'byung ba'i sgrol ma'i 'khrid brgyud ji lta ba mdzad srol yang yod do / /
rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i lha 'khrid bka' gdams rjes dran lnga'i 'khrid thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrob ma /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
rdog legs pa'i shes rab /
mnga' ris pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bu chung pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
ka ma ba rin cen rgyal mtshan /
zhang ston dar ma rgyal mtshan /
'brom byang chub bzang po /
stabs ka ba nam mkha' rin cen /
'brom gzhon nu blo gros /
lho pa zug /
bla ma brab phu ba /
mkhan chen @# / /
dga' lung pa dbon po bsod nams 'od /
bla ma bsod nams bzang po /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
chos rje gtsang pa blo bzang grags pa /
chos rje bka' 'gyur ba shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rin po che bsod nams lha dbang /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
paN chen nam mkha' dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na 'brom gzhon nu blo gros nas /
snar thang mkhan chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
gling kha ba rin cen byang chub /
rigs kyi bdag po'i dpal /
sgang lung pa byang chub dpal /
bsod nams 'od zer /
sangs rgyas bzang po /
sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zer ba 'dug pa brtag /
bsod nams bzang po /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
stag tshang nam mkha' 'od zer /
gnas brtan ye shes tshul khrims /
mkhan chen rat+na A ka ra /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra / /
rje btsun mi g.yo ba sngon po'i lha 'khrid mi g.yo chos drug tu grags pa'i shin tu zab pa thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti /
klu'i rnal 'byor ma /
bi su kalpa /
bram ze sa ra ha /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
tsan+d+ra kIrti /
birla mi tra /
rol pa'i rdo rje /
sgeg pa'i zhabs /
shAn+ti pa /
jo bo chen po a ti sha /
sgom pa ba dbang phyug 'bar /
sne'u zur pa /
gyer sgom chen po /
sangs rgyas dbon ston /
rtogs ldan bzang mo ba /
lha 'phrang po ba /
slob dpon lcags ri ba /
sangs rgyas gzhon nu 'od /
rgyam bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
mkhan chen grags pa tshul khrims /
mkhan chen rgyal ba bzang po /
bya bral ba bsod nams rin cen /
bla ma chos grags bzang po /
'jam dbyangs rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rgyal ba phyag na /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
ti'u ra pa rin cen chos kyi rgyal po /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa man gong bzhin no / /
yang na rtogs ldan bzang mo ba nas /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal /
mkhan chen bde ba dpal /
mkhan chen grags pa gzhon nu /
rin po che bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen grags pha tshul khrims man 'dra / /
! btsun pa shes rab rgyal mtshan kyis mdzad pa'i gnas brtan phyag mchod dang rjes gnang gi yi ge'i steng nas thub pa'i dbang po 'phags pa'i gnas brtan bcu drug gis bskor ba rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
jo bo chen po dI paM ka ra /
sems tsam rnam brdzun pa'i paN+Di ta /
rdog byang chub 'byung gnas /
bshes gnyen po to ba /
sha ra ba yon tan grags /
dag bshes 'chad ka ba /
se spyil bu ba /
rgan mo lhas pa chen po /
dpal ldan gro mo che pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
mchims blo bzang grags pa /
slob dpon sbas pa ston gzhon /
chos sku blo gros 'od /
mkhan chen seng ge rgyal mtshan /
byang sems chen po shAkya bsod nams /
spyan snga bsod nams lha'i dbang po /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
gzims 'og pa dpal ldan chos 'byor /
lo pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin mnyam @# / /
med zur chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
mchims nam mkha' grags kyis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa'i gnas brtan bcu drug gi sgrub yig rgyas pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
jo bo chen po /
d+ha na shrI /
rdog byang chub 'byung gnas /
po to ba /
sha ra ba /
'chad ka ba /
spyil bu ba gnyis /
'bre lhas pa rdo rje dpal /
sangs rgyas sgom pa /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
slob dpon bsod yi /
bsod grags pa /
bar 'dir bla ma gsum bzhi zhig ma rnyed /
spyan snga lha bsod nams lha dbang /
spyan snga ngag dbang chos grags /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! gnyis pa spyod pa'i rgyud ni /
mdun legs ma las /
rgyud sde gnyis pa spyod pa'i rgyud rnams kyi / /
gtso bor gyur pa rnam snang mngon byang gi / /
rgyud la sbyangs pas spyod pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs / /
gang yin de yang legs par nges par byas / /
zhes gsungs pa ltar 'phags pa'i yul du rnam grangs mang na'ang ljongs 'dir mkhas pa thams cad zhal mthun pa rnam snang mngon byang ste /
de yang zha lu pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i khrigs bzhin rdo rje 'chang mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub kyis zin bris su mdzad pa'i sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil chog rab gsal nor bu'i 'phreng ba'i steng nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das thar rtse dang sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang bu ston dor chen gong dkar ba mkhyen brtse bzhi'i gsan yig na 'dug /
rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa snying rje chen po ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
'jam dpal /
grub chen dze tA ri pa /
a shwa ka shrI /
la li ta badzra /
a mo g+ha badzra /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
mchims brtson seng /
mchims don grub rgyal ba /
bu ston rje btsun btsong kha pa dor chen gong dkar ba thar rtse sgrub khang pa drug gi gsan yig na mchims don ne zer bsnang /
mchims chos seng /
rdo rje gdan pa che 'bring chung gsum gyi mtshan yin /
mchims blo brtan /
'di bu ngor gong dkar ba mkhyen brtse bzhi'i gsan yig na snang bas thar rtse sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na chag pa 'dra /
mchims nam mkha' grags /
slob dpon dar ma rgyal mtshan /
byang chen pa bsod nams 'phel /
rje btsun btsong kha ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam brtag /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
thar rtse dang sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis mi 'dug cing gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mkhan chen grags gzhon pas bu ston la thug 'dug pa dpyad /
mkhan chen grags pa gzhon nu /
zha lu mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan /
dbur stong pa yon tan dpal /
'bras spungs mkhan chen rong po blo bzang pa /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
slob dpon sang+ga shrI /
slob dpon tshul khrims 'od zer /
slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
'jam dpal @# / /
dbyangs byang gling pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rdo rje bzang po /
bla ma rin cen rgya mtsho /
zha lu mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
rigs kun khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
thams cad mkhyen pa zur chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! gu ge paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rin cen dbang rgyal gyi steng nas grub chen ma Ni ka badzra lugs su grags pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo rnam par 'joms pa lha bcu dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
dpal phyag na rdo rje /
ngor chen dang thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang rje mkhyen brtse dang mkhan ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na snang ngo / /
rje btsun byams pa /
skal ldan gang gA d+ha ra /
bram ze'i slob dpon ma Ni badzra /
paN+Di ta dza ya warma /
paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shrI /
lo tsA ba tsog gru rab zhi /
bla ma yon tan legs pa /
rje bsam gtan dbang phyug /
bla ma don grub ye shes /
rje chos kyi blo gros /
bla ma rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog rdo rje /
bla ma shes rab 'bum /
rong pa chos kyi mgon po /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
ngor chen dang thar rtse'i gsan yig tu 'dug pas rje mkhyen brtse dang ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na chad dam snyam /
spur bsod nams dbang phyug /
ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na 'di chad /
bya sder ba byang chub rin cen /
bya sder ba byang chub gzhon nu /
bya sder ba byams pa rin cen /
bya sder ba byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
gu ge paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' brtan pa /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
rdo rje 'chang sko rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! gsum pa rnal 'byor rgyud ni /
dun legs ma las /
rgyud sde gsum pa rnal 'byor rgyad rnams kyi / /
gtso bo dpal ldan de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud / /
bshad rgyud rdo rje rtse mol sogs la / /
sbyangs pas rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dga' ston myong / /
zhes pa ltar rnal 'byor rgyud la thabs gtso bor ston pa dang shes rab gtso bor ston pa gnyis las dum bu dang po rdor dbyings dang gnyis pa khams gsum rnam rgyal /
de las 'phros pa'i rim pa sogs rnam grangs mang na'ang yul dus kyi bskal bas chu thigs tsam nos pa la kun mkhyen bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rin cen bsam 'phel la byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po'i lhan thabs dang rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje'i dbang chog sbyar ba'i steng nas dum bu dang bo 'dod chags can gtso bor 'dul ba rtsa rgyud rdo rje dbyings kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dkyil chog lugs kyi dbang legs par nos pa'i yog smad lugs kyi brgyud ba ni /
brgyud tshul 'di la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dang sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na rgya gar dbus nas brgyud pa'i lugs zhes ngos 'dzin mdzad /
khyab bdag rnam snang chen po /
'khor @# / /
los sgyur ba rdo rje sems dpa' /
dpal phyag na rdo rje /
rgyal po rab gsal zla ba /
rgyal bu sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po /
paN ser /
dpa' bo rta pa la /
dz+nyA na badzra /
pradz+nya sid+d+hi /
de bzhi la slob dpon kun dga' snying pos gsan /
de nas pradz+nya wa li ta /
paN ser /
rab 'byor bskyangs /
paN sar / /
shrAd+d+ha ka ra warma /
paN ser /
sangs rgyas zhi ba /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug /
lo chen rin cen bzang paN sad /
po /
byar phu ba /
lo chung legs pa'i shes paN ser /
rab /
bod btsun /
de gnyis la rgyang ro spel dmar gyi rkyang po chos blo /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
lo chung dang rkyang po gnyis paN ser /
ka la sum ston ye shes 'bar dang lce ston chos grags gnyis kyis gsan /
lce zhar ba'ang zer sngags dkar co breg can /
de gnyis ka la stag tshal gdong sngon gyi spu ston 'bar thog /
sngags dkar co breg can /
de nas rong lha steng gi 'dir rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu mkhan rin po che'i gsan yig sor gnas bris pa yin rdo rje gdan pa sgrub khar pa mkhyen brtse gsum gyi gsan yig na bla ma 'di rnams rim par brgyud pa lta bu zhig 'dug /
gtsang pa yang dag rdo rje /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
gtsang ston smra ba'i seng ge /
lce ston mdo sde seng ge /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
mag dge sdings pa kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
lce mdo seng gi sras dkon chog seng ge'i sras sngags dkar lcang lo can /
de gnyis ka la 'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
de nas thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
lce btsun nam mkha' mchog grub /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab mchog grub dpal bzang /
mkhan chen rig 'dzin rgyal po /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
de gsum ga la sku zhang bsod nams mchog grub /
de nas byang gling pa rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na byang gling rje nas /
rje bsod nams dpal 'byor /
rje rin cen rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab rje nas /
chos rje bkra shis dpal 'byor /
byang gling rje man 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab rje nas rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling rje man 'dra /
yang na byang gling rin cen rgyal po nas /
chos rje bkra shis dpal 'byor /
byang gling rje man 'dra /
yang na thugs sras lo tsA ba nas /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon ye shes rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa /
bla ma yon tan rgya mtsho /
rje ayon rgyal po /

nyi ma gling pa mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
brgyud pa 'di la kun mkhyen bu /
rje btsun btsong kha pa /
rje mkhyan brtse gsum gyi gsan yig na zangs dkar lugs kyi brgyud par ngos 'dzin mdzad 'dug cing sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na smad lugs su bzhed do / /
phyag na rdo rje /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti che ba /
bar ba /
chung ba /
slob dpon glu sgrub /
klu'i byang chub /
dz+nyA na badzra /
au Di yA n+na'i smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bu kun dga' snying po /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di zur du snang /
rab dbyings bshes gnyen /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di la shrAd+d+ha ka ra /
padma ka ra /
d+harma ka ra gsum gyis gsan /
@# / /
yig bar pa la lo chen gyis gsan zhes snang /
padma ka ra warma /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
lo chung legs she /
zangs dkar lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab /
phyar bu ba /
klog skya seng ge rgyal ba /
de la spyang tshang ston pa rtsa mo dang jo she gnyis kyis gsan /
de gnyis nas gtsang yang dag rdo rje /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
gtsang smra seng man gong ltar ro / /
kha che lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen bu /
rje btsun btsong kha pa /
sgrub khang pa gsum gyi gsan yig na'ang kha che'i brgyud par mdzad 'dug /
pradz+nya wa li ta nas /
pradz+nya bo d+hi /
muk+ti ko Sha /
shrAd+d+ha ka ra /
lo chen rin bzang /
rkyang po chos blo /
sum ston ye 'bar /
lce zhar ba /
spu ston man gong dang 'dra / /
dbus 'gyur 'chang ba'i lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
'di gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na smad lugs dang rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na kha che'i lugs kyi brgyud par bzhed cing rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig tu'ang dbus brgyud du bzhed do / /
muk+ti ko Sha yan gong ltar la /
de nas sangs rgyas zhi ba /
lo chen /
lo chung /
gnyis ka la rkyang po chos blo man gong bzhin no / /
yo ga stod lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na'ang stod lugs su bgrangs 'dug cing rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na smad lugs zer ba 'dug pa phyag bris nor ram snyam ba dbyad /
thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na rdor dbyings rtsa lugs kyi brgyud par ngos bzung /
rab 'byor bskyangs yan gong ltar la /
de nas kha che d+harma pA la /
lo chen rin chen bzang po /
gung shing pa brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan /
lo chen gyi bla chen che ba bzhi'i la rgyal gcig yin zhing bor btsun? chas /
gnyal pa nyi ma shes rab /
sngags pa gos dkar lcang lo can /
snur nyi ma 'od zer /
rtsa skya ston pa dkon cog grags /
sngags pa gos dkar lcang lo can /
rtsa skya shAkya 'bum /
'des yab chos gags par chos lung thob pa tsam byas nas glan la gtugs sngags pa gos dkar co breg can /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
bod btsun /
bla ma chos sku 'od zer /
bod btsun /
chos rje 'phags 'od man gong dang 'dra /
yang na snur nyi ma 'od zer nas /
'di thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na rdor dbyings 'brel lugs kyi brgyud bar ngos bzung 'dug /
snur rdo rje seng ge /
sngags dkar lcang lo tsan /
glan chos 'byung /
rtsa skya ston pa shAka 'bum /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
rtsa skya khri brtan /
snur ye shes rgyal mtshan /
bod btsun /
snur chos 'phags rgyal mtshan /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho man gong bzhin no / /
! chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i lag len rin chen bsam 'phel /
des mdzad pa'i yo ga'i mchod 'phreng bla med mchod sprin /
des mdzad pa'i rab gnas bkra shis rgyas byed rnams kyi lung brgyud ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub /
thugs sras lo tsA ba /
lce ston nam mkha'i mtshan can /
mkhas mchog tsan+d+ra shrI| kun mkhyen tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan byang gling pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma kun dga' bkra shis /
byang gling pa rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
rab gnas bkra shis rgyas byed kyi lhan thabs rdo rje 'chang rin @# / /
cen bsod nams mchog grub kyis mdzad pa'i rab gnas phun tshogs dpal 'bar /
des mdzad pa'i rab gnas rgyas pa'i yon bdag bsgo ba'i bshad pa /
des mdzad pa'i rdul tshon spyan drang ba'i cho ga rdo rje dbyings la sbyar ba dpal 'byor dbyar mtsho ltar 'phel rnams kyi lung yang rtsom pa po nyid la legs par nos so / /
! dum bu gnyis pa zhe sdang can gtso bor 'dul ba dpal khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sdig pa bral ba'i skabs las 'phros pas 'phros pa'i rgyud ngan sang thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa las gsungs pa'i kun rig rtsa ba'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du chos rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi yig cha'i steng nas dbang lags par nos pa'i stod lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
phyag na rdo rje /
rab gsal zla ba /
sgra gcan 'dzin /
slob dpon kun dga' snying po /
pradz+nya wa li ta /
pradz+nya bo d+hi /
muk+ti ko Sha /
d+harma pA la jo bo a ti sha /
do pa sgom chen /
skyi nor dz+nyA na /
gnyal pa nyi ma shes rab /
snur nyi 'od /
de sras snur rdo rje seng ge /
snur byang chub 'od /
snur nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
rin cen shes rab /
bla ma yang rtsa ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
'dul 'dzin grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'brong rtse lha ras rje /
grub chen ngag dbang blo gros /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
shar pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
chos rje rin cen bshes gnyen /
rdo rje 'chang pha bod kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o /
yang na snur nyi 'od nas /
gshen rdor seng /
glan chos 'byung /
gtum ston shAka 'bum /
bla ma 'dzims pa rin chen shes rab /
yang rtse ba rin chen seng ge man 'dra /
yang na pran+dz+nya wa li ta nas /
go mi dge bsnyen /
shAkya dzanyA na /
jo bo rje man 'dra /
yang na pradz+nya wa li ta nas /
d+harma pA la /
rab 'byor bskyangs /
jo bo rje man gong ltar ro / /
yang na snur nyi 'od nas /
rtsa skya ston grags /
slob dpon ston 'bum /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
dge sdings pa chos sku 'od zer /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od /
ba ston rin po che man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
rab gsal zla ba /
ye shes rdo rje /
kun dga' snying po man gong dang 'dra /
yang na rnam par snang mdzad /
dze tA ri pa /
kun dga' snying po /
rab 'byor bskyangs /
nA ya ka pa /
me tri pa /
rdo rje gdan pa /
ni ska li ka /
de wen+da /
chag lo chos rje dpal /
g.yag sde lo tsA ba bsod nams seng dge /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje sems dpa' /
a nu sa ma rak+Shi ta /
rin cen 'byung gnas zhi ba /
b+haska ra de wa /
rdo rje gdan pa man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje gdan pa nas /
bi b+kh+yA ta de wa /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI /
bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra /
g.yag sde lo tsA ba man 'dra /
yang na rtsa skya ston grags @# / /
nas /
rtsa skya shAka 'bum /
'dzims pa rin chen shes rab /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan man 'dra / /
smad lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon kun dga' snying po yan gong ltar la /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje /
shrAd+d+haka ra warma /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
lo chung legs pa'i shes rab /
sum ston ye 'bar /
gnyal ston tshul 'bar /
thod pa dben rtsa grags /
thod pa 'od zer /
ri lung phug pa chos mgon /
bla ma blo ldan seng ge /
bla ma 'phags 'od /
kun mkhyen bu ston man sngar bzhin no / /
! chos rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa gags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i kun rig TIka chen gyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
chos rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa /
bar 'dir bla ma 'ga' zhig gsan yig bde gzar dus 'thor ba'i khrod du song nas ma rnyed /
rim bzhin rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
chos rje rin cen bshes gnyen /
khyab bdag dpal 'byor lhun grub /
kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! dpal phyag na rdo rje 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa'i brgyud ba ni /
bcom ldan 'das kun rig /
phyag na rdo rje /

gnyal pa nyi she /

snur ye shes rgyal mtshan /
