ba ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
chos rgyal nam mkha'i mtshan can /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
dge slong chos legs pa /
gnas brtan bstan pa bzang po /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje /
lha bo dbu mdzad rin cen rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na thugs sras nas /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
shar chen ye shes rgya mtsho /
gong dkar rdo rje gdan pa /
'di nas bla ma gcig gnyis 'tshol /
kun bzang rtse ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha bcu gsum ma'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pas bskul nas thams cad mkhyen pa bus phya rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i gtso bo 'pho bar mdzad pa khungs shin tu che /
bya rgyud yin khul gyi lha bcu gsum ma 'dra 'od 'dug pa ni rgya nag mdo rtsom pa dang bod rgyud rtsom pa dang 'dra'o / /
thub pa'i dbang po /
kun dga' bo /
klu sgrub /
Ar+ya de wa /
a ba d+hU ti pa /
a b+h+ya ka ra gup+ta /
gser gling pa /
ja bo rje /
'brom ston pa /
po to ba /
sha ra ba /
rgya ye sgom /
grub thob hUM 'bar /
zhang dge slong /
ngag slong dkon cog ye shes /
bla ma 'khun ston /
rong pa dkon cog 'bar /
mkhan po dbang phyug rin cen /
khams pa sa phug pa /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
kun mkhyen chos 'od /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
chos rgyal nam @# / /
mkha'i mtshan can /
chos rje rin cen dpal grub /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
chu mig kha pa dkon cog dpal bzang /
'brog sgang pa don grub rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs byang gling chos rje /
de la rje sangs rgyas tshe dpal dang bla ma bsod nams dpal 'byor gnyis kyis zhus /
gnyis ka la rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na dge slong dkon ye nas /
mkhan po 'phrom /
g.ya' lung dgon gsar ba rin bla /
'od chung pa gzhon nu 'od /
grags chen pa /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na kha che ye shes rdo rje /
lo chung grags 'byor shes rab /
rje btsun sa chen /
rje btsun rin po che /
nub pa rigs 'dzin grags /
bo dong ra lung pa /
shab lung phu ba nam mkha' bsod nams /
nub gog pa /
dge bshes dar gzhon /
mdo stod pa ston pa don yod /
slob dpon rin rgyan /
bla ma grags chen pa /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od man gong bzhin no / /
yang na sangs rgyas /
dze tA ri gser gling pa /
jo bo rje /
lo chen rin bzang /
rkyang po chos blo /
rkyang po zhang khri /
gnyal pa sgog ston /
'khun ston gzhon /
rong pa dkon cog 'bar /
mkhan po dbang rin /
sa phug pa shAkya rdo rje /
sangs rgyas 'bum /
lo mchog pa /
'ong chung pa gzhon 'od /
grags chen pa man 'dra'o / /
! kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i phyag na rdo rje 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chi med grub pa'i brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
rje dpal mchog pa /
mkhas pa zla ba dpal rin /
'khrul zhig rin po che /
mkhyen rab rje /
rje rin cen rgyal po /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje /
bla ma kun dga' bkra shis /
rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang des mdzad pa'i mi 'khrugs pa lha bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las sgrib rnam sbyong dang /
ro'i sbyin sreg gi chogs sdig pa sbyong ba gnyis kyi brgyud ba ni /
bu ston rje /
thugs sras rin po che /
sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can /
zla ba dpal rin man gong bzhin no / /
rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams kyi cho ga byed pa'i skabs su gtor ma cha gsum mdor bsdus te gtong tshul ngor chen gyis slob dpon dad byed go cha'i gzhung dang mthun par mdzad pa'i lung brgyud ni /
ngor chen /
sems dpa' chen po /
mkhyen rab rin po che /
rje shAkya don grub /
dpon kun dga' legs grub /
bla ma kun dga' chos grags /
bco brgyad pa bstan 'dzin bzang po /
dbon bstan 'dzin lhun grub /
byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po las kyang thos pa yin rung brgyud pa zhu ba ma byung / /
! bzhi pa rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni /
mdun legs ma las /
bzhi ba rnal 'byor bla na med pa la / /
'phags yul mkhas pa rnams la nyi zla ltar / /
yongs su gags pa'i brgyud 'dus pa dang / /
rnal 'byor ma rgyud kye rdor bde mchog gi / /
rtsa rgyud bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa dang / /
bsdus rgyud gzhan yang bshad srol mi 'dra ba'i / /
shing rta'i srol 'byed dus kyi @# / /
'khor lo'i rgyud / /
gsal byed dri ma med pa'i 'od la sbyangs / /
zhes pa ltar rnal 'byor bla na med pa rgya mtsho chen po bzhin bzhugs pa las cung zad nos par /
de yang pha bla na med pa /
ma bla ma med pa /
gnyis su med pa bla na med pa gsum du grags pa'i rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras rnams kye rdo rje gnyis med du bzhed cing /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston dus kyi 'khor lo gnyis med du bzhed /
rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po bla med kyi rgyud thams cad gnyis med du bzhed pa sogs rnam grangs mang ba gang gi rjes su 'brangs kyang tshad ldan mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i gsung las ma 'das na'ang thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen po'i dgongs pa ltar pha rgyud /
ma rgyud /
de dag dang bshad srol mi 'dra ba'i rgyud dang gsum /
dang po la /
rigs drug yod pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rigs su gtogs pa 'dod chags can gtso bor 'dul bar byed pa 'dus pa'i skor la /
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs shing rgyal ba gnyis pa dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis legs par bkral ba'i bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod rdo rje lha so gnyis kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zha lu pa ye shes rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs dngos grub char 'bebs /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i dkyil chog ye shes char 'bebs /
de'i lhan thabs 'phrin las bde 'jug gsum la brten nas dbang bzhi yongs rdzogs dang /
thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i dkyil chog dbang don de nyid rab tu gsal ba'i steng nas dbang bzhi rdzogs pa tshar gcig ste lan gnyis su legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa la bka' babs bdun ldan du bzhugs pa'i thog mar 'gos lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis kyi gsan yig na nag po'i dkyil chog dang mthun pa'i brgyud pa zhes gtso bo bla ma'i nang nas nag por mdzad /
sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang /
phya na rdo je /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti /
klu las gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma /
mkha' 'gor mga gri theng can /
rgyal po bi su kalpa /
rgya gar shar phyogs o de'i sha /
bram ze chen po sa ra ha /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
de la slob ma'i mchog Ar+ya de wa /
shAkya bshes gnyen /
klu'i byang chub /
zla ba grags pa ste bzhis zhus /
bzhi ka la slob pa'i rdo rje /
paN ser /
de nas nag po sprod pa /
sa 'dres pa chen po /
paN grub rab byung /
de la mar me mdzad /
de wa a ka ra tsan+d+ra /
paN dkar khyim pa'i rten can /
bi dyA b+ha dra gsum gyis gsan /
mngon shes can zer paN+Di ta yin /
gsum ga la 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis gsan zhing /
sngags pa gos dkar co breg can yin deng sang rab byung gi chas 'dri ba ni rnam par ma brtags pa'i gya tshom mo / /
der ma zad za hor gyi mkhas pa btsun mo can /
paN dkar /
bal yul ljongs kyi nA ga ko Ti /
bi kra ma la shI la'i thams cad mkhyen par grags pa dI paM ka ra /
paN ser /
rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po nag po pa /
paN ser /
kong+ka la'i mkhas pa chen po rgyal bu sprin paN dkar /
gyi shugs can /
zur gyis 'gos lam thu byung bar de'i gnyen per gshin rje 'char ka zhus nas bsgyur ba'i 'char ka sprin shugs mar grags pa 'di la gsan pa yin no / /
rgyal po'i khab kyi mkhas pa chen @# / /
po dza hUM zhes pa zhi ba bzang po /
paN dkar /
kha che grib brtan gyi mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra ha ri sogs paN+Di ta bdun cu /
mkha' 'gro'i bla ma gnyis dang bcas pa la 'dus pa gsan /
'gos lo tsA ba nas /
'jad pa so rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na dza tu zhes snang /
rong gi mngar ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
rab byang /
'jad brag ltag gi rdog ye shes paN dkar /
seng ge /
rab byung /
de'i dpon po rdog nyi ma seng ge /
rdog mu ne rab tu byung ba'i mtshan /
bres chu dbor gyi glan rtsad tsha nyi ma lcam /
sngags pa gos dkar co breg /
de gnyis ka la rdog rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'jad bo dong gi zhes snang /
Ar+ya de wa /
rdog mu ni rab tu ma byung gong gi sras /
sngags dkar /
de'i zhar chos pa skyi mkhar 'jug /
bres kha dben tsha'i stag pa rin cen grags /
rab byung /
kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras lo tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal /
mkhan chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhan chen rigs 'dzin rgyal po /
mtshan nyid kyi thugs gnyer skyid shod 'bras spungs su mdzad skyo'i rigs dgon pa sgyid lung pa'i zhal ngo / /
bla chen chos rig rgyal mtshan /
lha 'o grwa tshang gi slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
mtshungs med byang gling rje /
grong gsar lo tsA ba blo gros dpal bzang /
chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+da la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston nas /
khyung po lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na khyung po lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams nas /
zha lu'i ri phug gi phyang nags phug gong gi dgon pa chos phug pa de yang tshong 'dus kyi nub dgon pa khyung po lhas kyi gdan sa thog gcig mdzad pas khyung lhas par grags gdung rus skyo /
thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen po /
rgyal sras bzang skyong ba /
shar pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rnam thar che chung tshor 'di nyid kyi dbang bka' yongs grags su ma gnang ba'i phyogs yod pas dbu ma pa dang bzang skyong ba brgyud par mi bzhugs par rje bla ma 'dren pa ri khungs ma dpyad pa'i skyon te /
de rigs kyi brgyud pa phal cher la bu ston nas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa /
lo chen skyabs mchog dpal /
de la rje'i dngos slob phal cher gyis gsan pas brgyud pa de ltar du 'dren dgos shing /
mkhas grub rjer 'jigs byed dpa' bo rdo rje dang bzang skyong bar gsang 'dus ni byings la ma grags par gsang ba'i tshul du gnang bar 'dug cing rang phyogs kyi dbang lung gi phyag len dang brgyud pa rnam par dag pa sngags ram pa yin pas de'i gsan yig na'ang bzang skyong bas rje la gsan par mdzad snang ngo / /
mkhas grub sher 'byung blo gros /
mkhas grub dpal ldan seng ge /
mkhas btsun yon tan rgya mtsho /
thon pa dge legs dpal @# / /
bzang /
chos rje 'od zer bzang po /
rje chos grags 'od zer /
mtshungs med nam mkha' bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na rdog ye shes seng ge dang glan rtsang tsha ba gnyis la snye mo'i phug ka ba 'bum skyabs /
sngags dkar /
de nas rong lha steng gi gtsang ston smra seng /
nyang stong srebs chung gi lce mdo sde seng ge /
sngags dkar /
kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer man gong ltar ro / /
yang na brag ltag pa ye shes seng ge la /
bod btsun /
cha gar mon mo brag gi mi nyag rdo rje grags /
sngags pa gos dkar co breg can /
de nas lce mdo sde seng ge /
gos dkar co breg can /
dge sdings pa chos sku 'od zer man 'dra /
yang na glan rtsad tsha nas /
thang sbe ba /
grub thob se sdings pa /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na dge sdings pa chos sku 'od zer nas /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
bla ma 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na 'gos lo tsA ba nas /
dbus pa dge ser /
gnam kha'u pa /
rjes chen /
kha'u pa rdo rje bdud 'joms /
rje btsun grags pa /
chos rje sa paN /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
dor chen rdo rje 'chang man sngar dang 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
'jig rten mig gcig shong blo gros brtan pa /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal /
mkhas grub rig pa'i glog 'phreng /
'od gsal rtse pa bla ma ma Ni badzra /
dam chos gling pa bla chen ye shes dbang po /
nyi ma gling pa mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! bka' babs gnyis pa mar lugs kyi brgyud par nang gses kyi sgro 'dogs nang nas chod pa grub thob nyams kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po'i gsan yig na 'di 'phags lugs min gsung /
rdo rje 'chang /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
DA ki bde ba'i zhabs /
Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
rdo rje dril bu pa /
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje /
kam+ba la pa /
nag po spyod pa /
tai lo pa /
ma tog dkar po'i thod can /
nA ro pa /
nag po mi lpags gsol ba rgyan drug phyag DA thong /
mar lo chos kyi blo gros /
gos dkar lcang lo can /
mtshur sten dbang gi rdo rje /
sngags dkar /
'khon gad pa kIrti /
bod btsun /
'khon bya khang pa bsod nams rin cen /
'khon thur lha kun tu bzang po /
nam mkha'i snying po /
ye shes dngos grub /
rtsa bshad pa /
snyan grags bzang po rnams mtshan gyi rnam grangs /
ba tshul khrims skyabs /
bod btsun /
thang spe ba 'phags pa skyabs /
se sdings pa gzhon nu 'od /
bod btsun /
dge sdings pa chos sku 'od zer man 'gos lugs dang 'dra /
yang na 'khon gad pa kIrti nas /
'gar ston shes rab rgya mtsho /
yar klungs zur ri dgon pa sngags dkar /
grang po khra bo la rtsar adku pa rin cen seng ge /
la stod pa bod btsun /
rong pa shes gsang mtshan mi bskyod rdo rje zer /
@# / /
rab seng ge /
rab byung /
ston mo lung pa ye shes 'bar /
bod btsun /
kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer man sngar bzhin no / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na grub thob dang paN+Di ta gnyis ka'i brgyud par ma bye ba'i mar lugs spyi tsam pa zhig tu mdzad 'dug pa dpyad /
byang sems blo gros rin cen /
lha bu ser po chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
gsang mtshan ma tang+gi pa /
grub thob dmar smug ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya me tog gi thod can /
tai lo pa man 'dra / /
! bka' babs gsum pa mar lugs mkhas pa paN+Di ta'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po klu sgrub yan 'gos lugs ltar la /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dren pa 'dra zhig 'dug kyang chu bo gnyis 'dres yin pas sngon du mi 'gyur /
de nas 'jam dpal zhal mthong shAkya mi tra /
sgrol ma zhal gzigs nA ga bo d+hi /
sa brgyad non pa Ar+ya de wa /
spyan ras gzigs zhal mthong ma tadgi pa ste klu sgrub kyi thugs sras bzhi /
sangs rgyas bskyangs /
legs ldan 'byed /
mkhas mchog dpa' po ste nye ba'i sras gsum /
bdun po de'i nang nas ma tadgi pa nas /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
mar pa /
yang na ma tadgi pa nas /
zla ba grags pa /
rig pa'i khu byug /
a wa d+hU ti pa /
spyod pa'i rdo rje /
nag po'i zhabs /
dri med blo gros /
nub lak+She tra'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i dpal ye shes snying po lho brag mar pa lo tsA /
spyir rgya gar na 'grel pa dang rgyud rkyang bshad rgyud lnga gzhung phran dang bcas pa dang ye shes zhabs lugs sogs 'grel pa nyer gsum /
jo bos nyer lnga tsam yang gsan par grags /
bod na 'grel pa bdun zer yang mang du snam mar pa la /
dza ya na /
thag na /
snying tog gsum yod /
lo tsA ba 'dis rgya gar du gsum /
bal por bzhi ste lan bdun byon /
shar nub lho byang kha che bal po'i paN+Di ta dang ku sA lir grags chad la bla ma brgya rtsa /
brgyud pa 'dzin nges lnga bcu rtsa brgyad /
snang ba 'gyur nges bcu gsum /
bdus pa la mkhas pa'i bla ma bdun dang bcas yod pa'i nang gi ye shes snying po 'di dbang brgyud man ngag gdams pa'i bka' thams cad babs pa'i gtso bor 'dzin no / /
bu bzhi'i nang tshan mtshur dbang gi rdo rje /
gzhung gi rngog ston chos rdor /
dol gyi mtshur ston dbang nge /
gtsang rong gi mo sten tshon po /
gung thang gi mi la ras pa /
'khon ston gad pa kIrti /
de la mi nyag thur la ba tshul khrims skyabs /
dbus pa 'gar dge /
grub thob zhang zhung pa ste thugs sras gsum gyis gsan /
gsum ga la gang bar sar kha'i rin cen gling pa tshul khrims mdzes /
rje btsun btsong kha pa /
mkhyen brtse /
thar rtse /
sgrub khang pa bzhi'i gsan yig na 'di bzhin byung yang kun mkhyen bu'i gsan yig na gling pa tshul khrims mdzes zur du mdzad 'dug pa brtag /
bla ma rgya rnal 'byor pho ba lung pa /
dge slong chos grags bzang po /
bla ma shAkya gzhon nu /
bla ma blo ldan pa /
bla ma 'phags 'od man sngar ltar ro / /
yang na 'khon gad pa kIrti nas /
'gar ston pa /
gnyan rtse ba /
go lung pa ye rgyal /
rong ston mkhan po /
phug ri pa byang chub gzungs /
shong blo brtan /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na lo mchog pa nas /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
rje thog ston pa /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab man 'dra / /
! bka' babs bzhi pa jo bo lugs kyi brgyud @# / /
pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti che ba /
slob dpon nA ga dzo gi /
bram ze sa ra ha /
slob dpon klu sgrub /
zla ba grags pa /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na bar 'dir rig pa'i khu byug 'dug pa chang dam dpyad /
ku sA li che chung /
jo bo chen po dI pa kAr /
rong pa 'gar dge /
lha rje stod pa tshul khrims dpal /
sngags pa gos dkar lcang lo can /
de sras che ba shes rab rgyal po /
sras chung ba shes rab gtsug tor /
lha rje chen po d+harma tsakra /
thang stod chos kyi 'od /
bla chen klog skya grags pa bzang po /
bla ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen bu dang sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang ba thar rtse sgrub khang pa'i gsan yig na shes rab rgyal mchen zer ba 'dug pa nor ram dpyad /
bla ma kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
dpal ldan grags pa dpal /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtshos gsan pa man 'dra /
bu thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa bzhi'i gsan yig na bla ma sgom ye zer ba zhig 'dug kyang de'i brgyud pa gong ma tshigs bcad kyi stabs nas mi gsal zhing /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pas slar zhib dpyod /
! bka' babs lnga pa chag lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
klu sgrub yan sngar ltar la /
de la slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen /
slob dpon Ar+ya da wa /
klu byang /
zla ba grags pa ste sras kyi thu bo bzhis gsan /
Ar+ya de wa nas /
'phags pa rta dbyangs /
rol pa'i rdo rje /
dril bu pa /
dza lan+d+ha ri pa /
dpe med dpal /
gam+b+hi ra ma ti pa /
ni ska lang+ka pa de wa /
paN dkar /
re wen+d+ra pa de wa /
chag lo tsA ba chos rje dpal /
phod ka dkar po phyar bu dang zhwa rtse ring ser po /
'u yug kung ra ba bla ma dpal /
phyar bu bse bo /
bla ma grags chen /
don mo ri pa kun mkhyen 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na slob dpon klu'i byang chub nas /
Dom+b+hi pa /
bI ra Di pa /
ma ti gar+b+ha /
rdo rje gdan pa /
paN dkar /
re wen+d+ra /
chag lo tsA ba man 'dra /
yang na slob dpon zla ba grags pa nas /
rol pa'i rdo rje /
skal ldan grags pa /
'od zer 'byung gnas grags pa /
'od mdzad lha /
chos kyi 'byung gnas zhi ba /
rnam par grags pa'i lha /
rnyog med lha /
paN dkar /
gong gi ni ska ladra? pa de wa /
rdo rje gdan pa /
'di gsum don gcig ming gi rnam grangs re wan+d+ra /
chag lo man 'dra / /
! bka' babs drug pa sa lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na klu byang gi dkyil chog dang mthun pa'i brgyud par ngos bzung /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon klu sgrub Ar+ya de wa /
shAkya bshas gnyen /
zla ba grags pa /
rol ba'i rdo rje /
skal ldan grags pa /
'od zer 'byung gnas grags pa /
'od mdzad lha /
chos kyi 'byung gnas zhi ba /
bi khyA ta de wa /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI b+ha dra /
sa skya paN+Di ta /
'od zer shAkya /
kha'u pa dar ma shes rab /
se mo ra pa rin cen dpal /
bla ma ra gnyis pa rgyal mtshan rin cen /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na ba ri gnyis pa zer ba 'dug /
spro lung nags phug pa kun smon /
bla ma grags chen pa /
chos rje 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na sgra gcan 'dzin dpal bshes gnyen dang mthun pa'i brgyud par mdzad /
shar ba'i gsan yig na dbang bka' gsar ma'i nye brgyud du ngos 'dzin /
phyag na rdo rje /
klu sgrub /
'phags pa lha /
ma tadgi pa /
sgra gcan @# / /
'dzin dpal bshes gnyen /
bi khyA ta de wa /
kha che paN chen /
sa paN+Di ta man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
'phags pa rin po che /
shong blo gros brtan pa /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal seng /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab man sngar bzhin no / /
! bka' babs bdun pa dpyal lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
kha che paN chen yan sa lugs dang 'dra ba la /
da nas dpyal chos kyi bzang po /
rje btsun rgwa lo /
bla ma dpal gyi rgyal mtshan /
bla ma don ri grags chen /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na 'gos lo tsA ba nas /
mngar ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mgo ba d+harma tsakra /
stag pa jo bzang /
dpyal chos bzang man 'dra /
yang na dpyal chos bzang nas /
bod btsun /
klog skya ba grags pa dpal /
klog skya bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla ma kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na 'di klu byang gi cha ga nyi shu pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i brgyud par bzhed gsan yig gzhan rnams na rgyud kyi brgyud pa las dbang brgyud mi gsal bas dpyang /
phyag na rdo rje /
rdo rje chos /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
padma zhabs /
rta mchog /
sa ra ha /
klu sgrub /
klu byang /
bal po phyag rdor /
rat+na A ka ra shAn+ti pa shrI kIrti /
shrI legs smin /
shrI ku mA ra sha na /
bi nA ya ka /
rat+na badzra /
zha lu lo tsA ba chos kyi brtson 'grus /
she ston mar lam /
jo stan dkon seng /
kun mkhyen chos 'od /
sre chung pa lce blo ldan /
'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na she ston nas /
la stod tshul bzang /
dpyal nyi ma /
chos sku 'od zer man 'dra / /
! rang lo dgu pa'i steng mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan la tshar gcig nos kyang na tshod phras pas dbang rdzas sogs la rtsed mo'i 'du shes las brda 'phrod pa zhig ma byung bas brgyud yig gi rtsol ba ma byas / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i za ma tog dang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i za ma tog kha 'byed pa'i lde mig ma bu sbyar ba'i steng nas bla na med pa'i snying po las kyang snying por gyur pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad rgyud thun mong ma yin pa bzhis gsal bar byas pa'i don sangs rgyas gnyis pa klu sgrub thabs kyis thugs nyams su bzhes nas tai lo nA ro sogs paN grub las nye bar 'ongs pa'i gdams pa zab pa las kyang ches zab pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim rim pa lnga'i dmar khrid zab mo nyams 'khrid du legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rin cen /
lha'i bu /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
mtshan gsang ba ma tang+gi pa /
tai lo pa shes rab bzang po /
paN chen nA ro ta pa /
mnga' bdag mar pa lo tsA chos kyi blo gros /
mtshur dbang gi rdo rje /
'khon gad pa kIrti /
bya khang pa bsod nams rin cen /
mi nyag thur lha ba tshul khrims skyabs /
rgya mkhar thang spe ba 'phags pa skyabs /
se sdings pa gzhon nu 'od /
mag dge @# / /
sdings pa kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer /
chos rje 'phags 'od /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen tshul khrims /
mkhas grub tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
drin can mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs kun bdag po bka' 'gyur ba chen po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
rje mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa'ang bshad ma thag pa bzhin na / /
kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gi lung ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
zha lu pa mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
rje bka' 'gyur ba chen po man 'dra / /
kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i bshad sbyar mtha' drug rab gsal /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi rgya cher bshad pa skyed rim gsal byed /
des mdzad pa'i gsang 'dus kyi mngon par rtogs pa dngos grub char 'bebs /
'dus pa'i lha tshogs la bstod pa byin rlabs char 'bebs rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen yab sras /
dbal mchog don grug mkhas pa tsan+d+ra /
'khrul zhig rje /
mkhyen rab rje /
byang gling rin rgyal /
'brog sgar pa /
rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
gro bo lung pa /
rin lding dkon rgyan /
drin can zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i gsang 'dus chos 'byung mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan las thos /
bla ma sangs rgyas ye shes la gsan gsung /
brgyud pa gong ma rnams ma rnyed / /
! mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po nor bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim yang gsal sgron me'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
drung pa lha'i btsun pa bsod nams dpal bzang /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
byang ma khang gsar ba dpal 'byor bsod nams lhun grub /
rdo rje 'chang dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! paN chen bsod nams grags pas mdzad pa'i gsang pa 'dus pa'i bskyed rdzogs /
rgyud sde spyi rnam gsum gyi steng nas 'dzin chos /
rtsa rgyud le'u bcu bdun pa yan gyi TIk+ka /
rtsa rgyud dang 'grel chen sgron ma gsal ba gnyis kyi thog /
rje btsun btsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i sa gcad /
mtshan mtha' dpyod rin po che'i rgyud rnams sbyar te 'grel pa bzhi sbrags su legs par thob pa'i 'gos lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
klu las gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma /
mnga' bdag bi su kalpa /
sa ra ha /
@# / /
nA gArdzu na /
des slob ma'i mchog bzhi la gnang /
'phags pa lha /
shAkya bshes gnyen /
zlu byang /
zla grags /
bzhi ka la slob pa'i rdo rje /
nag po spyod pa /
sa 'dres pa /
de la dI paM kA ra /
de wa A ka ra /
bir+ya b+ha dra gsum gyis gsan /
gsum ka la 'gos khug pa lhas btsas /
de nas mngar ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
rdog ye shes seng ge /
rdog mu ne /
glan rtsad tsha /
de gnyis ka la rdog Ar+ya de wa /
de nas brtag pa rin cen grags /
lce mdo sde seng ge /
dge sdings pa chos sku 'od zer /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
sgra bsgyur nam mkha' bzang po /
rje btsun re mda' pa chen po gzhon nu blo gros /
thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen po /
mkhas grub shes rab seng ge /
rje sbyin pa dpal ba /
rje kun dga' don grub /
zhal snga nas lha rin cen /
chos rje chos ldan blo gros /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
'jam dpal dbyangs dge legs dpal bzang /
khri rin po che rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho /
khri rin po che 'jam dbyangs sma ba'i nyi ma dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na glan rtsad tsha nas /
thang spe ba 'phags pa skyabs /
se sdings pa gzhon nu 'od /

yang na glan rtsad tsha nas /
phug pa 'bum skyabs /
gtsang pa smra seng /
lce mdo sde seng ge man 'dra /
yang na stag pa rin grags nas dge sdings pa /
'phags 'od /
bu ston man 'dra / /

a nadga badzra /

de gsum gas rin cen gling pa tshul mdzes la gnad /
de nas rgya pho ba lung pa /
dge slong chos grags /
bla ma shAka gzhon /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
'phags 'od man 'dra / /
paN+Di ta'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
blo gros rin cen /
klu sgrub /

klu sgrub /

rta dbyangs rol pa'i rdo rje /

rus sbal zhabs /

yang na klu sgrub nas /

@# / /

skal ldan grags pa /
'od 'byung grags pa /
'od mdzad lha /
chos 'byung zhi ba /
rnam grags lha /
rnyog med lha /
re wen+d+ra /
chag lo man 'dra /
rtsa rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma gnyis kyi lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'khon gang ba kIrti nas /
'gar ston jo sras /
ang phug ri ston /
seng ge rdzong pa /
khyung ston zhig po /
mkhan tshul khrims snying po /
mkhan rdo rje snying po /
chos sdings 'og ma zur phug dar ma bzang po /
mkhan bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
ma ti paN chen /
'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rje 'jam dbyangs grags pa /
byang chen bsod nams rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje dge legs bshes gnyen /
paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
brang ti nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i rim lnga gsal ba'i sgron me'i lung zab bshad legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel yan gong ltar la /
de nas shar chen mkhas pa'i dbang po byams pa rnam rgyal /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
gsang 'dus rim lnga'i 'khrid yig zin bris stong rgyud lugs kyi lung brgyud ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel yan gong ltar la /
shar pa chos rje sangs rgyas bkra shis /
stong rgyud slob dpon bzang grong rab 'byams pa ngag dbang chos 'phel /
shar chen byams pa rnam rgyal /
des bdag la'o / /
slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis legs par bkral ba'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam dpal rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil chog rje mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i dbang chog nag po 'gro shes rnams la brten nas brgyud pa'i bka' dang ldan pa'i dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i lo chen lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs dang gnyis su med pa'i a wa d+hU ti pa /
slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
mar me mdzad bzang po /
kun dga' snying po /
thag na /
shAn+ti pa /
shrAd+d+ha ka ra warma /
padma ka ra warma /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam brtag /
de gnyis ka la lo tsA ba chen po rin cen bzang po /
de nas rkyang po chos kyi blo gros /
dge bshes skyabs seng /
rje btsong kha pa'i gsan yig nang mtha' mi 'dug pa brtag /
rdo rje sra brtan /
dkon cog 'bar /
dge bshes dbang rin /
khams pa sa phug ba shAkya rdo rje /
rong pa chos mgon /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen bo /
sku zhang chos rje nam mkha' mchog grub /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhan chen rigs 'dzin rgyal po /
bla chen chos rig rgyal mtshan /
bla ma @# / /
bsod nams dpal 'byor /
'jam dbyangs byang gling chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
nges bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na 'jam dpal /
ye shes zhabs /
mar me mdzad /
tha ga na /
b+hu sha na ba /
ngag dbang grags pa /
b+hi ma shAn+ti /
b+hi ga ra pA da /
shrAd+d+ha ka ra warma /
lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po /
rkyang po chos blo /
gcung po zhang khri /
gnyal pa skyogs ston /
khun tsi gzhon nu rin cen /
gtsang rong pa shes rab gzhon nu /
slob dpon dkon cog 'bar /
g.yag sde pa dbang phyug rin cen /
khams ston shAkya rdo rje man 'dra / /
! bka' babs gnyis pa jo lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs /
ye shes zhabs /
mar me mdzad /
A nanra gar+b+ha /
tha ga na /
rin cen 'byung gnas zhi ba /
jo bo rje mar me mdzad /
lcags ri gong kha ba /
rdzi'u kha pa /
spen phug pa /
zhang ye shes /
gze pa don grub /
bar thang pa yab sras /
ngar ma shAkya /
bsod nams dbang phyug /
lo mchog pa man 'dra / /
! bka' babs gsum pa sa lugs kyi brgyud pa na /
'jam dpal rdo rje /
slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
paN grub mar me mdzad bzang po /
dpal bde ba'i zhabs /
bi mA la gup+ta /
rat+na badzra /
rat+na kIrti /
ra sul gyi rnal 'byor ma /
mkhan ngag chos pa thar rtsa ba shar ba gsum gyi gnas yig na ma byung yang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dang sngags ram pa dag 'dun bkra shis gnyis kyi gsan yig na 'dug pas chad dam snyam /
bla ma ben+da pa /
sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chang 'dra /
gnyan lo dar ma grags /
gnam kha'u pa dar ma rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun chen po /
sa baN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
dam pa kun dga' grags /
dga' ldan pa kun dga' bsod nams /
kham pa rdo rje dpal /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa /
paN chen ma ti /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra / /
! bka' babs bzhe pa r+wa lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
mar me mdzad /
'jam dpal grags pa /
dpal bde ba /
dri med sbas pa /
rin cen rdo rje /
rin cen grags pa /
sa man+ta pra b+ha /
dz+nyA na shrI mi tra /
rat+na kIrti /
puN+ya shrI /
r+wa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags /
rdo rje sa brtan man lo chen lugs dang 'dra / /
! bka' babs lnga pa gnyos lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
bi mA la gup+ta yan r+wa lugs ltar la /
de nas yi ge'i rnal 'byor pa /
kah+na pa /
badzra shrI /
ba lid+ta A tsar+ya /
gnyos lo tsA ba yon tan grags /
gnyos rdo rje bla ma /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
gnyos dpal le /
gnyos grags pa dpal /
gnyos gzi brjid /
'di gsum sngags ram pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
dpal /
sangs rgyas ras chen /
rgyal ba lha snang /
tsa ri ras chan /
dpyal kha chos rje zhes pa rnams @# / /
mtshan gyi rnam grangs so / /
ston mo lung pa ye shes mkhar /
kun mkhyen chos sku 'od zer /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa man sngar dang 'dra /
yang na gnyos rdo rje bla ma nas /
gnyos ston grags pa dpal /
gnyos lha snang pa /
rin cen do pa /
mdog stod ser ma /
gla sa pa dpon rdo rje tshul khrims /
g.yas ru ba rdos ston rin cen rgyal mtshan /
don ri pa grags pa dpal bzang /
ma ti paN chen man sa lugs dang 'dra / /
! bka' babs drug pa kha che lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs /
sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
ma rme mdzad nas rim par brgyud de /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI /
kha che'i paN+Di ta g+ha ya d+ha ra /
paN+Di ta bi na shrI /
de la go pa la'i pho brang du khams pa rdo rje dpal gyis zhus /
de nas kIrti shrI /
kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa man sa lugs bzhin no / /
! slob dpon chen po jo bo mar me mdzad ye shes kyis legs par bkral ba'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha bcu dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du byang gling chos rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las rim cho ga'i ngag 'don khrigs chags lhan thabs thugs rje'i 'od zer gyi steng nas dbang nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang /
'phags mchog spyan ras gzigs /
jo bo dpal ldan a ti sha /
lha btsun byang chub 'od /
'al pa byang chub rdo rje /
rgya lcags ri gong pa /
rdzing bu kha pa shAkya grags /
spen phug pa dar ma grags /
zhang ye pa shes rab rdo rje /
gze pa don grub mgon po /
khams pa shAkya rdo rje /
sras chos grags /
dar ma shAkya /
bsod nams dbang po /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
thugs sras lo tsA ba rin cen rnam rgyal /
snye mo sku zhang bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhan chen skyo ston rigs 'dzin rgyal po /
ri sbug dbu mdzad chos rig rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
byang gling pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma shAkya seng ge /
chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
rigs kun khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdzing bu kha pa nas /
thang stong pa chos 'od /
zhang ye pa man 'dra /
yang na gze pa don grub mgon po nas /
bar thang pa yab sras /
dar ma shAkya man 'dra /
yang na lo tsA ba mchog ldan nas /
gzhon nu 'od /
grags pa dpal /
'phags 'od yon tan rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston man 'dra / /
! gsang phu gling stong du kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge bzhugs pa'i dus dpal ldan sha ba ri dbang phyug chos sgo skyel gyi tshul du byon te gnang ba'i dpal mgon gdong bzhi ba'i chos skor nas cung zad nos pa la /
bsnyen sgrub las gsum gsang pa'i mgon po dang bcas 'bras spungs kyi mkhan thog gnyis pa /
pa'i rjes gnang /
lung la /
las mgon gyi mngon rtogs /
mus srad pa blo gros rin cen gyis mdzad pa'i gtor chen gyi zhal shes /
ltas ngan gtong thabs /
mgon po gri lag ma'i sgrub thabs /
@# / /
g.yab dar gyi sgo nas khams gsum dbang du sdud pa /
dpal mgon dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
rje chos bzang nyi mas mdzad pa'i dpal mgon dkar ser ljang nag gi gtor 'bul /
gnyan lo'i mgul khug ma'i shog dril nas bsdus pa'i man ngag /
mus srad pa blo gros rin cen gyis mdzad pa'i mchod gtor 'bul tshul /
gtor chen bca' ba kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge'i zhal gdams /
gtor ma nang du bsgrubs nas nus mthu 'don thabs /
phyir 'phen tshul /
rnam shes spar ba /
mon pa dang dam tshig bsre tshul /
mnan pa sogs drag las kyi 'khor lo /
phyi nang gi nyams rtags 'byung tshul /
gtor ma'i bkra rtags /
chos skyong 'grub rtags /
bskang mdos /
rten mdos /
zlog mdos /
rbad mdos /
gsang mdos rnams kyi zhal gdams /
bshan pa'i sngags dang rbad tshul ha la nag po'i shog dril /
zhing skyong brgyad kyi lha ngo sprod lugs dang sngags byang /
mus srad pa blo gros rin cen gyis gtor chen dang gtor zor gyi yi ge dang bcas pa rnams nos pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
dpal ldan sha ba ri'i dbang phyug /
kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge /
mus srad pa blo gros rin cen seng ge /
se ba mkhan po chos bzang nyi ma /
se ba dgon pa'i dbu mdzad chos rje /
rje drung rin po che dge 'dun bstan pa rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
nye brgyud ni /
dpal ldan sha ba ri /
grub chen dpal ldan rdo rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rje drung rin po che dge 'bun bstan pa rgya mtsho man gong bzhin no / /
lung gi brgyud pa ni /
se ba mkhan po chos bzang nyi ma /
drung pa lha'i btsun pa bsod nams dpal bzang /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho man 'dra / /
! rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyi zin bris kyi steng nas rgya gar ka ma ru pa nas brgyud pa'i zhal bram nag bshan pa drug bskor gyi rjes gnang dang zin bris kyi lung dang bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
slob dpon klu sgrub /
rgya gar gyi grub thob ka ma ru pa /
zhang mdo sde dpal /
rje 'jam skya nam mkha' dpal ldan /
bla ma grang mo che pa /
dpe la lar 'di gnyis sbre tha ba'i grang mo che pa re gzengs snang ba ma dag pa 'dra'o / /
rje re ta zla ba /
grub pa'i dbang phyug thang stong rgyal po /
ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa 'jigs med dpa' bo /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
rje btsun kun dga' grol mchog /
bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
'khor lo'i mgon po chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+da la'o / /
mnyam med lha rje chen pos sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'i gdong bzhi pa'i gsang sgrub nag po dom mchongs /
des mdzad pa'i gsang sgrub kyi las mtha' nor sgrub rgyal brgyad ma gnyis kyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
tsa turmu kha /
dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dra /
mgon pos mnyam med lha rje la dngos su gnang zer ba 'dug pa 'di mtshan dngos @# / /
yin pa 'dra zhing /
rin po che kun bzang rtse pa'i phyag len du gnyan los mdzad pa'i zhal gyi bskang thung gi skabs mnyam med lha rje chen po'i thugs dam bskang /
las mkhan pha jo tshan po'i thugs dam bskang zer ba 'jug srol kyang 'dug cing /
'di dwags po lha rje dang mi gcig go /
su ma ti shrI b+hU ti /
chag lo rin cen chos kyi rgyal po /
khra ri ba rin cen chos rgyal /
de la 'u yug dgon pa dkar por rje btsun grol mchog gis gsan /
de nas bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
'jam mgon grub pa'i dpa' bo bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang gsang sgrub kyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rje btsun mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan nas /
zur chen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
nag po dom mchongs kyi lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po yan rjes gnang ltar la /
de nas chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
ljang ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan bla chen yon tan rgya mtsho /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man lung brgyud gong ma bzhin no / /
rgyal brgyad ma'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rje dbang rab nas /
rje zha lu pa /
khra tshang pa chen po /
des bdag go /
! rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs drag po brtsegs pa dang dkyil chog dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i steng nas mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi khro bo dpal phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo chen po lha bco brgyad kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dmar gyis ma rgyud du bshad kyang rgyud 'bum dkar chag dang rje btsun kun dga' bzang po'i bzhed pa ltar bkod do / /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
gsan yig gzhan rnams na mi gsal yang gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na snang ngo / /
mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can /
grub chen sA wa ri pa /
bu ngor mkhyen brtse thar rtse sgrub khang pa rnams kyi gsan yig na 'di ltar snang la /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa'i gsan yig tu sha ba ri pa zhes 'dug /
paN grub dzA wa ri pa /
bal po'i paN+Di ta de wa pUr+Na ma ti /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig tu pu rgya? ma ti zhes snang /
'gar lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po /
yul pu rangs pa /
phyar bu ba lto bi zhwa can phyis rgya nag tu gshags /
gshen ston rin cen dngos grub /
dmar sgang bu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
paN dkar /
dmar shes rab rdo rje /
dmar thub pa shes rab /
dmar brtson 'grus rdo rje /
bu dang thar rtse sgrub khang pa gsum gyi gsan yig tu brtson 'grus seng ge zhas snang ba brtag /
dmar chos kyi rgyal po /
yar klungs smon gro pa bod btsun /
dmar shAkya grub pa /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
bla ma tshul rgyal ba /
kun mkhyen shes rab dpal bzang /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang /
grub chen bzang po rgyal mtshan /
rje ngag dbang blo gros /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
drung pa lha'i btsun pa bsod nams dpal bzang /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
@# / /
byang mkhang gsar ba dpal 'byor bsod nams lhun grub /
bla ma zhang 'phrin las lhun grub /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor gyi ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na dmar chos kyi rgyal mtshan nas /
sgang ston rin cen bla ma /
sgang ston shes rab 'bum /
gru ston shes rab 'bum /
rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po'i gsan yig na shes rab grub ces snang /
gru rdo rje seng ge /
sngags pa /
gru chos kyi mgon po /
rong ri lung phug pa /
khams ston lho tshang ba /
bla ma bsod nams dbang phyug /
bla ma byang chub rin cen /
rje phyogs las rnam rgyal /
rje byams pa mgon po /
mkhas grub dge legs pa man 'dra /
yang na dmar shAkya grub nas /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
bla ma 'jam dbyangs dkar po /
rje rin cen legs pa /
chos rje blo gros chos skyong /
grub chen bzang po rgyal mtshan man sngar bzhin no / /
mkhyen rab rin po ches mdzad pa'i 'khor chan la brten nas gshin po rdzas 'dzin gyi cho ga thar pa'i lam ston gyi brgyud pa ni /
mkhyen rab rje /
stong rab shAkya don grub /
de dpon kun dga' lags grub /
lum pa ba kun dga' chos grags /
bco brgyad pa mchog legs rdo rje /
mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub /
sdom brtson 'phrin las rnam rgyal /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'ba' rab rgyal mtshan dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas gsang ba'i bdag po drag sngags kyi che ba dang ldan pa u tsar+ya'i rjes gnang me dbang phyag mtshan gyi dbang dang bcas pa legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsang bdag phyag rdor /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon padma badzra /
gong dkar ba /
thar rtse /
shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na 'di gnyis go ldog tu 'dug kyang 'jam dbyangs mkhyan brtse'i gsan yig ltar bris pa yin padma badzra 'di slob dpon mcho skyes dang gcig gam snyam ayon chen po ni min no / /
slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi /
rgyal po d+harma pha la /
bla ma zangs gling pa /
khams pa a sang /
ja sras gnyal pa /
bla ma dkon cog rgya mtsho /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yag na dkon cog rgyal po dang shar pa'i der rgya mcha zar ba snang zhing /
rje mkhyain? brtse'i brgyud yag gcig la rgyal po dang gcig la rgya mtsho zhes 'jug pas dpyad do / /
jo sras me 'bar /
bla ma don zhags pa /
bla ma lha rje chos grags /
mkhan po chos sdengs pa /
bla ma zur phug pa /
'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal /
bla chen yon tan rgya mtsho /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
bla ma ayon rgyal po /
gra thang mkhan po bsod nams rgyal po /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdo rje gdan pa nas /
rje rnam rgyal rin cen /
rgya ston byang dbang /
bla ma shAkya kun dga' /
nam mkha' mdzod pa rdo rje blo @# / /
gras /
mkhas grub nyi ma gling pa /
rab 'byams chos rje man 'dra /
yang na jo sras gnyal pa nas /
bla ma dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
ston dbyangs /
bya ston bsod nams 'od /
grags pa seng ge /
gar thig pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab man 'dra /
yang na khams pa a sang nas /
zhad dkon cog dpal /
ru smon mkhar ba skyi ston grags rgyan /
ru zhang dkon cog blo gros /
bla ma chos grags man 'dra /
yang na lha rje chos grags nas /
e pa 'khon ston /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma sangs 'od /
slob dpon smra seng /
mkhas btsun byang seng /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po man 'dra /
yang na mchog ldan pa nas /
skyi ston pa /
ngo nang kun mkhyen /
byang seng pa man gong ltar ro / /
yang na brag thog pa nas /
'tshal min ngag gi dbang po /
rdo rje gdan pa man gong bzhin no / /
! rnam snang gi rigs su gtogs pa zhe sdang can gtso bor 'dul ba gshed skor la rdo rje 'chang sga rum pa kun dga' legs pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs khro bo rnam rol dang dkyil chog gzhon nu rnam rol gyi steng nas r+wa lugs kyi dpal gshin rje gshed dgra nag lha bcu gsum ma ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
pradz+nya rak+Shi ta /
bal po meny+dza gling pa thugs rje chen po /
sa dge'i mkhas grub mang po bal po b+ha ro dang gcig par mdzad kyang 'di ye rangs pa dang b+ha ro yam bu ba yin zhang thugs rje chen po ni dus 'khor phag mo sogs la shin tu mkhas /
b+ha ro ni gshin rje gshed kyi grub pa thob pa tsam las mkhas par ma grags pas so sor ma 'dres par dgos par mngon no / /
r+wa chen lo tsA ba rdo rje grags /
rab byung /
r+wa chos rab /
r+wa ye shes seng ge /
sngags pa dkar chas lcang lo ba r+wa 'bum seng /
rgwa? lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
thar rtse sgrub khang pa shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig 'don yang rdo rje yin tshul 'dug pa gsang mtshan dang 'khrul lam dpyad /
de sras rong pa shes rab seng ge /
'di man rab byung /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
sngags dkar co brig can /
thugs sras lo tsA ba rin can rnam rgyal /
sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can /
bla ma rin can dpal grub /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyan rab chos rje /
mkhan chen rigs 'dzin rgyal bo /
bla chen chos rig rgyal mtshan /
bla ma bsod nams dpal 'byor /
rje byang gling ba bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! thugs sras lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i gshin rje dgra nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa gsod byed rngams pa 'jigs rungs kyi brgyud pa ni /
sgra tshad pa rin can rnam rgyal /
rje sku zhang nam mkha' /
zla ba dpal rin /
'khrul zhig tshul rgyan /
rin cen mchog grub /
rin cen rgyal po /
'brog sgang pa /
'jam dbyangs byang gling rje /
gro bo lung pa /
slob dpon dkon rgyan /
khyab @# / /
bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i sa la'i pho nya'am dbyangs can lha mo dmar mo gsang sgrub kyi rjes su gnang ba shin tu zab pa dang /
lung la /
sgrub thabs /
lo rgyus /
gtor 'bul /
bstod pa gang srid ma /
rjes gnang gi yi ge dang bcas thob pa'i sa lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
sgra dbyangs lha mo /
des yang nas yang du rjes su bzung ba'i paN+Di ta bik+Sha pA ram /
paN+Di ta shIta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta /
kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya ka /
paN+Di ta b+ha ska ra de wa /
'od byed 'byung gnas yin zhing thar rtse shar ba gnyis kyi gsan yig na 'di dang dza la ka go ldog tu snang la /
'dir rdo rje gdan pa dang rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig btsan par byas te bkong /
kha cha'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI /
paN+Di ta dA na shI la /
'jam mgon sa skya paN chen /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
drin can seng ge bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams rgyal mchog /
bsam gtan gling pa nam mkha' bsod nams /
bla ma chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
rje btsun bong mkhar ba mai ti don grub rgyal mtshan /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na bsam gtan gling pa nam mkha' bsod nams nas /
lha ri ba dpal ldan rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga shAkya rgyal mtshan /
tshar chen man 'dra /
yang na yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan nas /
klu pa mkhan po bsod nams dar /
bla ma dmar ston pa /
rin po che kun bzang rtse pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal /
thugs sras kun dga' rgyal po /
rigs 'dzin tshe dbang bkra shis /
tshar chen man gong dang 'dra / /
rdog lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
paN+Di ta dza ya ka nas /
rngog lo chen po /
'bre shes rab 'bar /
la stod dkon cog mkhar /
slob dpon blo gros 'byung gnas /
don mo ri pa blo gsal /
jo btsun lcags thang pa /
dpe dmar ba chos kyi shes rab /
chos rje 'jam dpal gsar ma /
rgyal cha lung mang po man gong ltar ro / /
yang na 'bre shes rab 'bar nas /
cha pa chos kyi seng ge /
gtsang nag mi'i seng ge /
lha sa'i bla ma rdog khu dbon gnyis /
rgyal cha lung mang po man 'dra / /
mar do lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
ku su lu pa /
dpal 'dzin /
rgyal po rA dza kA ya /
de'i yig mkhan paN+Di ta /
paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa /
bal po d+ha ma ta la /
de gnyis ka la mar do lo tsA ba chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhus /
de nas gze pa blo ldan /
khams pa shAkya rdo rje /
sras d+harma kIrti /
bla ma sangs rgyas 'bum /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa man sngar @# / /
bzhin no / /
! gshin rje nag po'i mngon rtogs rgyud don rab gsal dang thugs sras rin po che'i gtum chen rol ba dkyil chog dgra nag dang cha mthun pa'i phyag len ltar r+wa lugs kyi 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po zhal drug pa lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
nag po pa /
b+ha da pa /
d+ha ma pa /
de wa pa /
dze tA ri pa /
a naM ga badzra /
d+harma ka ra shAn+ti /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar 'dug kyang kun mkhyen bu'i gsan yig na d+harma ka ra ma ti dang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na a ka ra ma ti zhes snang /
thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na d+harma AkA sha ma ti zhes 'dug pa brtag /
bal po thugs rje chen po nas /
zha lu pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyi bar dgra nag sor bzhag la /
de nas brang ti pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
de dbon thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
gnas gsar ba rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
dgra gdong gnyis thun mong gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'jam dpal dbyangs /
ye shes zhabs /
mar me mdzad bzang po /
bu'i gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug pas brtag /
dpal bde ba /
bi mA la gup+ta /
kar+Na pa /
sa man+ta b+ha dra /
shrI d+ha ra /
ka ya d+ha pa /
gang dkar ba'i gsan yig na ka yas+tha pa zer ba snang /
dz+nyA na mi tra /
rat+na kIrti /
'di gnyis kyi bar du bu dang gong dkar ba'i gsan yig tu pen+ta pa zer ba 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
so na shrI /
bal po thugs rje chen po man sngar bzhin no / /
! mngon rtogs gtum chen rol pa'i brgyud pa ni /
gsod byed rngams pa 'jigs rungs dang gcig go /
! ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rab gsal zla ba'i steng nas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ro langs brgyad skor lha dgu pa r+wa lugs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed /
rdo rje ro langs ma /
grub chen la lI ta badzra /
a mo g+ha badzra /
ye shes 'byung gnas sbas pa /
padma badzra /
dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta /
bal po b+ha ro phyag rdum yang zer /
r+wa chen lo tsA ba rdo rje grags /
r+wa chos rab /
r+wa ye shes seng ge /
r+wa 'bum seng /
klog skya dbang phyug grags /
ldong ston shes rab dpal /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal bzang /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
gu ge paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
e waM sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
gnas gsar ba rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na glo bo mkhan chen nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
gnyan chen grags pa blo gros /
chos rje shes rab rgyal mtshan /
paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na r+wa 'bum seng yan gong ltar la /
de nas rong @# / /
ba rgwa lo /
de sras shes rab seng ge /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po man 'dra /
yang na rong pa shes rab seng ge nas /
rong pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen bu ston man gong ltar ro / /
yang na r+wa 'bum seng nas /
r+wa pa'i zhal ro bzhi po ni sngags ba gos dkar lcang lo can /
r+wa d+harma seng ge /
r+wa dkon cog seng ge /
r+wa chen shes rab rgyal mtshan /
zhang dkon cog dpal man 'dra /
yang na rong pa shes rab seng ge nas /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen shes rab dpal /
r+wa lo gnyis pa dge ba rgyal mtshan /
gra thang pa shes rab zla ba /
sngags 'chang rin cen rnam rgyal /
mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
rje lha mchog seng ge man sngar bzhin no / /
! mthu stobs kyi dbang phyug r+wa chen lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yid bzhin gter mdzod dang dbang gi chu bo gnyis la rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rjes mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil gsal byed lhan thabs nyi gzhon gsar ba'i dga' ston dang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i dag 'don breng chags nag po 'gro shes rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i steng nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed r+wa lugs thun mong ma yin pa lha bcu gsum gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i 'jam dpal khros pa'i zhal lung snying gi zungs khrag mkha' 'gro'i kha rlang can gyi steng nas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa r+wa 'khrid mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud kyi nyams 'khrid zab mo smin rgyas /
grub pa'i dbang phyug la lI ta badzra gyis mdzad pa'i 'khrid don gsal byed rgyal khams lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor bzhi'i nyams 'khrid zab mo /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i zin bris la brten nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba'i rjes gnang /
phyag mtshan mda' gzhu la brten pa'i bi Sha gsad pa'i las tshogs dug dbang rma bya rgyas pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i tho yig la brten nas las gshin dpa' bo gcig pa'i rjes gnang /
thar gling pa Ar+ya de was mdzad pa'i yi ge dang tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mthong brgyud ltar phyogs gcig tu mdzad pa'i las gshin gsum gyi rjes gnang gi yi ge la brten nas 'che bdag gshin rje'i dbang phyug lha bcu gsum gyi rjes su gnang ba /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i yi ge la brten nas las kyi gshin rje dmar po bse bya bzhi bskor gyi rjes gnang /
gtor chog rjes gnang dang bcas pa'i yi ge'i steng nas gshin rje dman po khrag mdog yab yum kyi rjes gnang rnams nos nas /
rgyab rten lang la /
r+wa chen shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dkar chag na gsal ba'i chos skor /
der ma 'khod pa'i rgya bod kyi yig sna'i skor /
bod kyi mkhas ba 'bri khung dpal 'dzin @# / /
gyis mdzad pa'i skor dang gsum /
dang po la /
r+wa lugs kyi gshin rje gshed nag po skor gsum du grags pa'i dkar chag r+wa chen gyis mdzad pa'i tshigs bcad dang de'i rgyas bshad r+wa dbon shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
der gsal ba'i yig sna la /
rgyud 'bum pa las la lI ta badzra gyis phyung ba'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa'i rgyal po'am rtsa (r+wa?)kun? ba'i rgyud rtog pa bdun pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA kA ru Ni ka dang bod kyi lo tsA ba r+wa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
'di'i 'gyur ye rang pa thugs rje chen po dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i a mo gzhas mdzad pa'i dkyil chog 'gyur du b+ha ro'i mtshan smos pas kyang 'di gnyis tha dad par tshad mas grub bo / /
slob dpon chen po a mo g+ha badzra gyis mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu bdun ma'i dkyil 'khor (r+wa?)kun? gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa'i bla ma b+ha ro dang r+wa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdzad pa po dang sgyur byed gong 'dra /
des mdzad pa'i rdo rje'i rigs byed lha bcu bdun ma'i sgrub thabs las su bya ba'i cho ga sems dpa' bsdus pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang bod kyi lo tsA ba rong sgom chos bzang rong zom chos bzang yin min brtag /
gis bsgyur cing 'gos lhas btsas dbang phyug rgya mtshos zhus te gtan la phab pa /
slob 'di r+was 'gyur bcos mdzad pa'i gsal kha ma byung yang r+wa chen gyi gsung la kha cig gsar 'gyur kha cig bcos zhes pa ltar na 'gyur bcos mdzad par mdon /
dpon rat+na a ka ra shAn+ti pas mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi (r+wa?)kun? tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
rgyud 'bum pa nas phyung ba'i las mkhan te'u lo pa'i rtog pa dang te'u lo pa'i cho ga'am rtog pa zhib mo dI paM ka ra dang r+wa lo rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
slob dpon shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa'i b+ha ro phyag rdum /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs dkar chag na rtog pa zhes pa las mi gsal ba gcig tu bsdoms pa 'dra'o / /
mdor bsdus pa /
'gyur byang mi gsal yang r+wa'i 'gyur yin nam snyam /
'di'i rjes su b+ha ros mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs gsum zhes pa dpe ma 'byor bas ma thob /
r+wa chen rdo rje grags kyis mdzad pa'i rtog bdun gyi (r+wa?)rdo rje?kun? nag 'grel dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshig don rnam par bshad pa /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyis dbang phyug chen po 'dul ba'i ched du 'jigs byed sprul tshul gsungs par mkhas grub rjes ma dag ces gsungs pa ni /
r+wa chen gyis /
rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog bdun la / /
nag 'grel mun pa'i mda' 'phen tsam / /
zhes pa'i 'grel pa 'dir gsal bar gsungs pa ma gzigs pa 'dra zhing /
gal te gzigs na mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi la brgal bar sems so / /
des mdzad pa'i dkar (r+wa?)rdo rje?kun? 'grel rtog pa bdun pa'i man ngag gi gnad du grags pa /
dpe la lar dka' gnad kyi 'grel ba'i brda dag bris yong 'dug kyang dkar 'grel phyogs mthong 'bem la gtad /
bcud kyi thigs pas phog par bsnun zhes pas shes so / /
des mdzad pa'i rtog bdun (r+wa?)rdo rje?kun? gnad kyi gdams ngag bcud kyi thigs pa /
de'i gsung ha la'i shog dril (r+wa?)nub?kun? dang po'i rtsa ba gcig las mang na khyod snying khos kyi mtha' can /
gnyis pa'i @# / /
rtsa ba (r+wa?)nub?kun? khong pa'i nang nas snying drongs shig gi mtha' can /
gsum pa'i rtsa ba (r+wa?)nub?kun? rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i rtog pa dang po bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang rtog pa gnyis pa sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis la brten pa'i bsnyen sgrub dgra srog dbang sdud dam bsnyen sgrub las gshin sbrel ba /
des mdzad pa'i lha bcu gsum ma'i mngon (r+wa?)kun?mkhan? par rtogs pa yid bzhin gter mdzod /
des rgyal ba bkra shis kyi ngor mdzad pa'i gtso rkyang (r+wa?)kun? zhal dgu phyag so bzhi ma'i mngon rtogs dri med snang ba /
des mdzad pa'i zhal gsum phyag drug (r+wa?)kun? pa'i mngon rtogs khams gsum za byed des ston pa a gro'i don du mdzad pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi (r+wa?)kun? pa'i mngon rtogs dri med chu rgyun /
des mdzad pa'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis (r+wa?)kun? pa'i mngon rtogs rin cen don bsdus /
des r+wa chos rab kyi don du (r+wa?)kun? mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg mi mthun kun sel /
rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg (r+wa?)kun? 'dod pa kun 'phel /
dbang gi sbyin sreg (r+wa?)kun? gnad kyi lcags kyu /
des sngags 'chang khro rgyal dang blo ldan gnyis kyi don du mdzad (r+wa?)kun? pa'i drag po'i sbyin sreg dgra bgegs kun 'dul zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i dug dbang lo rgyus dang sher? bcas pa dbang bskur zhal gdams so'i mtha' can /
dbang dang zas tshad phan sher? yon gsum bstan pa /
bstan pa 'dzin skyong spel zhing nad gso ba sher? la gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba /
rdo rje 'jigs byed dmar po'i mngon rtogs sngon por bsgyur yod do'i mtha' can /
gu lang (r+wa?)legs? gi mgo can la brten nas bzlas pa /
sngags kyi gnas pa /
dug brtag pa /
bsrung bya /
gso thabs rnams bstan pa (r+wa?)legs? b+hi sha bzhi skor /
bshal (r+wa?)legs? bya ba /
sngags kyis b+hi sha phyogs med (r+wa?)legs? thub pa kha ri su /
rdzas dgus (r+wa?)legs? b+hi sha phyogs med thub pa /
ser po (r+wa?)legs? gsum sbyor /
rna ba mig sogs lus kyi cha gang la babs pa (r+wa?)legs? sngags rdzas gtar kha sman la brten nas 'chos pa /
phyag mtshan mda' gzhu la brten nas b+hi sha gsad pa'i las bstan pa (r+wa?)legs? lcags rtse zlum po 'ji ba pa gnad yin gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
dug khyer yod pa'i mi dang nang pa'i brtag (r+wa?)legs? thabs nag por song na b+hi sha yin gyi mtha' can /
'jigs byed glang mgo can gyi b+hi sha (r+wa?)legs? gso bsrung badzra rak+Sha kIrtis A tsar+ya la zhus pa badzra b+hai ra'i rak+Sha'i mtha' can /
sngags thams u pa (r+wa?)legs? tadya thA /
bya ra bsrung bya /
khyab 'jug kat+ko tra'i 'jug pa la (r+wa?)legs? brten nas brtag thabs /
tho rangs kyi dri chur (r+wa?)legs? brtag cing bsrung ba /
dug (r+wa?)legs? 'bred /
sngags (r+wa?)legs? bshal /
khyi smyon gyis rmugs (r+wa?)legs? par dug yod med blta ba /
be bum kha pa'i nang gi (r+wa?)legs? shog dril gyi gdams pa shin tu gces pa'i skor dpe la dam par mdzod kyi mtha' can /
dmar po mda' gzhu? 'geng ba la brten pa'i dbang sdud skal med rnams la sba ba shis kyi mtha' can /
rdo rje 'jigs byed dmar po phyag gnyis pa bsgom thabs /
@# / /
rgyal po /
btsun mo /
blon 'bangs /
grong khyer sde brgyad sogs dbang du bya ba /
nag po mda' gzhu 'geng ba'i dug sngags 'di las lhag pa yod ri skan gyi mtha' can /
r+wa chen gyis mkhan? mdzad pa'i dbang gi chu bo rnams gnyis pa dkar chag na ma 'khod pa'i rgya bod kyi yig sna'i skor la /
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud rtog pa gsum pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
'di la dngos grub kyi rtog pa dang 'gyur gcig pa zhig dang a DA ya shrI dang rong zom gyi 'gyur yang snang /
rgyud kyi rgyal po'i las dngos grub kyi rtog pa zhes pa rtog pa bzhi par grags pa a mo g+ha dang mar do'i 'gyur /
gtam rgyus kyi rtog pa dang las mkhan te'u lo la chu byi'i rtog pa gnyis b+ha ros rgyud 'bum pa la gtugs te rgya dpe las phyis bsgyur ba /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yon tan dpal bzang gi ngor mdzad shar? pa'i rgya bal gyi paN+Di ta lnga'i rnam par thar pa /
des mdzad pa'i la lI ta badzra gyis shar? nag po skor gsum gyi rgyud ayon nas gdan drangs tshul /
rgyud dang bla ma brgyud pa byon tshul gyi lo rgyus don gsum pa rgya ston gyi slob shar? ma zhig gis mdzad pa /
rdzong lugs za ba don bdud rtsi'i bcud nub? kyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs sku bzhi'i ngo bo /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs nub? rab tu gsang ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi ngor mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs dngos grub rin po che'i snye ma /
des mdzad pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs mkhan? bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i bzhad sgra /
des mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum gyi bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim r+wa 'khrid mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi lam rim dang sbyar ba'i smon lam gyi rab byad lam zab sgrub pa'i dga' ston /
des mdzad pa'i 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma'i shis brjod 'chi mad sprin gyi rnga dbyangs /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad sa? pa'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad bdud rtsi'i bum bzang /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po ches shing kun tu mdzad pa'i ldong? dpal chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i bcu gsum ma'i mkhan? sgrub dkyil gsal byed lhan thabs nyi gzhon gsar pa'a dga' ston /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis (mkhan?)?? mdzad pa'i ngag 'don breng chags nag po 'gro shes /
mthu stobs dbang phyug sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyis mdzad pa'i pu? r+wa lugs lha bcu gsum gyi dbang gi chu bo ma nub par bskur ba'i 'tshams sbyor gyi yi ge mthong ba don ldan /
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bzlas lung bsnyan (r+wa?)rdo rje? pa'i man ngag bla ma snya nam pa'i gsung lhag chad med par r+wa chos rab kyis gzhon nu 'od kyi ngor mdzad pa /
badzra b+hai ra wa e ka mu kha b+hU dza dwi pa'i rjes sgo? gnang gi zin bris rdo rje 'chang sgo rum pa'i gsung bzhin 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa /
dor shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i 'jigs byed dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub A? thabs @# / /
dang dug dbang bskur chul gyi man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po r+wa lugs kyi dbang gi chog las sa? brtsams pa'i dri ba rtog dpyod sprin gyi rnga gsang gi rang lan dpyid kyi rgyal mo'i dga' ston legs bshad khu byug gi sgra dbyangs gsar pa /
des mdzad pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i dka' gnad las sa? brtsams te dris pa'i rang lan snying po mdzub tshugs /
rtog pa bdun gyi gnad bstan pa r+wa d+harma (rgya?)shar? seng ges mdzad pa'i man ngag gnang bdun ma /
rdo rje 'bum dang rdo rje seng ge sogs kyi ngor rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyis (rgya?)rigs? mdzad pa'i rtog bdun gyi rnam bshad rdo rje'i tshig gi mdud 'grol /
des mdzad pa'i rtog gsum gyi TIk+ka /
shar? dri med snang ba /
r+wa d+harma seng ges mdzad pa'i te'u lo shar? pa'i rtog pa'i gsal byed /
rdzogs pa'i rim pa rgya che ba zab pa gnyis su med pa dang bcas par sems 'dzin pa'i man ngag r+wa chen gyi gsung sgros /
de'i gsung sgros mtshan ma gyen bsgreng gi man ngag /
de'i gsung sgros r+wa la sems 'dzin pa'i man ngag /
rje btsun rdo rje bai ta lis la lI ta badzra la dngos su gnang rgya? ba'i r+wa 'khrid mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang /
de'i gsal byed kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad rgya? pa'i 'khrid yig 'jam dpal khros pa'i zhal lung snying gi zungs khrag mkha' 'gro'i kha rlang can /
grub pa'i dbang phyug la lI ta badzra gyis mdzad pa'i 'khrid don ma? gsal byed rgyal khams lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrIs mdzad pa /
phyag mtshan so gnyis kyi las tshogs zhes pa gri gug gis dgra gsad pa /
shabtis 'phung bar byed pa /
gtun shing gis rims dbab cing 'dre brdung ba /
chu gris grir 'gum pa /
rdo rje rtse gcig bas gdon bsrung ba /
dgra stas dgra bo tshar gcod pa /
mdung gis cho 'phrul gtong ba /
mda' gzhus sgrub thabs phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa gong du song zin /
lcags kyus mtshan ma 'gugs pa /
dbyug tos nor bsgrub pa /
kha T+'+waM gas nyams chags sel ba /
'khor los bgegs bsrung ba /
rdo rjes klu bsrung ba /
tho bas bar chad bsrung ba /
ral gris dmag dpung bzlog pa /
cang te'us DA ki las la 'gyed pa /
thod pas nor bsgrub pa /
mgo bos 'gal ba cham la 'bebs pa /
phub kyis phyir zlog pa /
rkang pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis skrod pa /
zhags pas lha dang mi'i ba mo 'gugs pa /
r+wa'i mda' gzhus bi Sha gsad pa /
rgyu zhags kyis rims nad zlog pa /
dril bus nyams chags bskang ba /
lag pas 'phrin las bsgrub pa /
ro ras kyi 'khor los las kun bsgrub pa /
gsal sher gi ros ro langs bsgrub pa /
me thab kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub pa /
thod tshal gyis dgra bo gnad la dbab pa /
sdigs mdzub kyis 'gal ba cham la dbab pa /
'phan rtse gsum pas 'gro ba dbang du sdud pa /
'phyar dar gyis phyogs skyong bsdu ba rnams /
shar du 'khrul 'khor /
lhor sbyin sreg /
nub tu tshogs 'khor /
byang du gtor ma la brten nas shar? dgra bo sgrol ba'i man ngag /
bsnyen pa sngags btu ba sgrub pa las sbyor gcig tu bstan pa r+wa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis mdzad shar? pa'i @# / /
'jigs byed chen po'i man ngag mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa lag len du bris pa /
bsod snyoms pa bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad pa'i gshin rje nag po'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed rgya gar gyi mkhan po jo bo dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba la r+wa chen gyis 'gyur bcos mdzad pa /
'gor rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma cung zad skyes pas zhas yod pa'i r+wa los mdzad pa'i kha sbyor dbye ba bzhi'i yi ge snya nam pa chen po'i thugs dam thun mong ma yin pa 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i ling tshe bcu drug pa zhes yod pa'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed r+wa chen gyi gsung sgros bla ma snya nam pa chen po'i thugs dam thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams pa 'o'i mtha' can /
rtsa sngags /
snying po /
nye snying /
rtsa sngags dang snying po spel ba /
rtsa sngags dang nye snying spel ba /
snying po dang nye snying sprel ba /
sngags gsum ga sprel ba ste 'khrul 'khor bdun gyi yi ge gzugs brnyan spel tshig shog dril man ngag dang bcas p-i aTHi'i mtha' can /
'gor yan lag bcu gnyis dpe chung 'di zhes yod pa'i 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis kyi spel tshig lte ba tshul sogs kyi yig chung zhes pa'i tshul gyis dri ba 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor zhi ba brgyad la dbus su k+She zhes yod pa'i 'jigs pa brgyad skyob dang sems myos par byed pa chu rba klong gi 'khrul 'khor gyi bar 'khor lo'i kha bsgyur bstan pa /
r+wa pa'i man ngag 'di la mkhas grub rjes zur za mdzad pa ni shing gi rtse mor bsdad nas rtsa ba ste'us bsnun pa lta bu'o / /
'gor thog mar nye snying gi 'khrul 'khor la zhes yod pa'i rtog bdun nas gsungs pa'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba'i dpe chung bri yig logs su shes par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs byed par 'dod pa zhes yod pa'i nyi ma bzhi pa'i gdams pa snyan ma r+wa lo'i gsung sgros lo tsA ba phyi mas yi ger btab pa r+wa chos rab /
des mdzad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi man ngag ni zhes 'gor yod pa'i yig chung des nges par 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor yang dbus na sor brgyad ces yod pa'i 'khor lo'i yig chung bshad lam nas snying gi dkyil lo'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i gtor ma'i phyag len de la gshags su gsol lo'i mtha' can /
gsad pa las bcu'i gsal byad snya nam r+wa'i gdams pa bstan pa bsrung ba ma gtogs gzhan su la'ang bstan par mi bya ba las mthar thug r+wa 'bum seng gis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor sku gsum dbyer med bla ma thugs rje can zhes yod pa'i gshin rje nyi ma bzhi pa'i man ngag bla ma chen po r+wa ye shes seng ge'i gsung la brten pa /
'gor 'jigs byed kyi 'khrul 'khor byed thabs chos rje rin po che'i zhal nas zhes yod pa'i zhi rgyas dbang gi 'khrul 'khor gyi lag len grangs su brtsi yi zlar mi bgrang gzhung ba'i mtha' can /
rgya ston gyis mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis gsad pa mtshon cha lta bu'i (r+wa?)rgya?rum? man ngag shog dril dang po'i gsal byed /
des mdzad pa'i shog dril gnyis (r+wa?)rgya?rum? pa'i gsal byed /
des mdzad pa'i shog dril (r+wa?)rgya?rum? gsum pa'i gsal byed /
des mdzad pa'i ra chen gyi gsad pa'i mtshon cha snying la gab pa'i bsrung bzlog gsang rgya? gsum gyi las tshogs man ngag snying po'i don @# / /
'di la bcos bslad mi bya 'o'i mtha' can /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pas rgyal bu byang chub sems dpa' go pe la'i ched du bskul ba la brten nas (ldong?)rigs? ldong shes rab dpal gyis mdzad pa'i zhi rgyas dbang drag gi 'khrul 'khor las tshogs drag po'i sngags gter /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi lag bu? len gsal bar byed pa gnad kyi man ngag /
'khrul 'khor ltab pa'i zhal shes yig chung gsang ba'i gnad yig kun gup? la med pa'i khyad chos rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyi gsung rgyun 'di ni gshin rje mkhan po phal cher la ming tsam yang ma grags pa'i zab gnad can yin pas mjug tu /
e ma r+wa lo'i thugs bcud mkha' 'gro'i gtam / /
snyan brgyud zab mo'i yang snying padmo'i gnyen / /
snod min kun da'i 'phreng ba zum byed pa / /
skal bzang blo mtshor rol cig sa mA ya zhes so / /
thugs sras lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i bu? sbyin sreg gi cho ga nyon mongs sreg byed /
r+wa chen lo tsA ba'i bzhed pa thun mong ma yin pa dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi lcags mkhar zur dgu pa'i chog gzung? dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis rat+na lak+Sha'i ngor mdzad pa bdud sde 'joms pa zhes bya ba /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i 'jigs byed kha? drug cu ba'i gtor chog dgra po'i srog 'phrog /
rdzong chung pa A nan+da ma tis rgya ston gyi yi ge la brten nas mdzad pa'i r+wa pa'i man ngag shar? thun mong ma yin pa lcags mkhar zur dgu pa'i 'jigs byad drug cu pa /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa'i phyag len dang mi gcig par snang /
bzlas pa'i man ngag dang gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i phyag len shar? rgya ston dang 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i khyad bcos /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i /
dbang? gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi zhal bsgyur ba'i man ngag /
yi ge bzhi pa la brten pa'i bsrung pa'i man dag 'gor rang nyid 'jigs byed dmar po shin tu khros pa zhes yod pa gsol bgad ba bo'i mthab can /
yi ge bzhi pa la brten nas 'god po gdug pa can gnod na gsad pa rta shi'i kha bzhin sdoms kyi mtha' can /
'gor rang nyid skad cig dran rdzogs la 'jam dpal khros pa zhes yod pa'i bsrung bzlog gsad pa gsum gyi man ngag zab mo -iaTHi'i mtha' can /
'gor bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni lte bar hUM zhes yod pa /
'gor mu khyud rdo rje phyed pa nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ces yod pa'i zlog 'khor /
'gor yang lte bar hUM gsham nas g.yon skor du zhes yod pa'i bsrung 'khor bri yig 'gor rang nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsgom zhes yod pa'i yi ge bzhi pa'i bsrung zlog gsad gsum gyi man ngag /
'gor oM swasti sems bskyed pa ni bdag dang sems can thams cad mi dang mi ma yin zhes yod pa'i yi ge bzhi pa'i bsrung (r+wa?)nub? bzlog rbad ba zhal gdams dang bcas pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'o'i mtha' can /
yig bzhi pa'i bsrung bzlog gsad mnan bsam gtan nyal /
nub? chog gi gdams pa thag mchog zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa /
r+wa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags kyis bal po thugs rje chen po la gser srang lnga brgya phul (r+wa?)nub?rum? bar zhal gyis bzhes nas gnang ba'i dag po bzhi'i gsang bzlog yi ger @# / /
mi 'dri ba'i bka' rgya can /
'gor bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes yod pa'i yi ge nub? bzhi pa'i man ngag nyi ma dang sprad do'i mtha' can /
'gor rang nyid skad cig dran rdzogs la zhes yod pa'i yi ge bzhi pa'i (r+wa?)nub? bsrung bzlog gsad gsum gyi man ngag zab mo'i mtha' can /
b+ha ya sa la brten pa'i byad bzlog thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro'i mtha' can /
btsan po'i mkhar du gzhug pa /
rno gsum mtshon la ngar btags pa /
gdos dang sha ba 'thab pa /
sgyogs rdo bar snang la gcag pa ste r+wa rgan shar? lo tsA'i khyad chos uSh+NI Sha'i bsrung zlog mnan gsad rgya ston gyis bsgrigs pa /
des mdzad pa'i uSh+NI Sha'i shar? gdams pa don lnga pa /
des mdzad pa'i man ngag thugs kyi nyid khu shar? zhes par nang gses bsam gtan sgra'i bzlas pa /
'phrin las rnam bzhi'i bzlas pa /
ting 'dzin gnad kyi man ngag /
gdug byad phur pas ngag bcing ba /
rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa /
mthu byad gsad pa ngag mnan dang bcas pa r+wa lo'i man ngag /
byad ma phye mar 'thag pa shar? r+wa'i man ngag /

'khor lo /
rang gshed la brten nas gsad pa'i dus man ngag /
nyams su len pa'i shar? rim pa zhes pa sgom pa /
