yungs kar /
khrag /
phur bus gsad pa gza' rgyu ba dang bstun no'i mtha' can /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus kyi dngos slob bod log dang star ma bye bzang gnyis kha mthun du byung ba'i man ngag shar? dbal ldan grags pas tshigs bcad du bsdebs pa'i don gsal bar bstan pa /
rdzas la brten pa'i gtad (shar? rul /
ting nge 'dzin la )shar? brten pa'i gtad rul /
dag shar? 'gro la /
'gor dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kho bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes /
ma? yod pa'i uSh+NI Sha'i bsrung bzlog man dag lag len dmar khrid phyogs med lo tsA bas gsal bar bkod pa /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor dpal khro bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo 'dir bdag gzhan thams cad kyi lus ma? srung bar byed pa zhes yod pa'i bsrung 'khor gyi bri yig /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor gnyis pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ni lnga ma lta bu la ma? ming spel gyi mthar zhes yod pa'i bzlog 'khor bri yig /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor N-iH dpal ldan khro bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo ming dang rnam shes sba ba la zhes yod ma? pa'i uSh+NI Sha'i bsrung 'khor rmi lam ngan pa zlog pa byad ma mkhan gyi bsod nams nyams thabs byas pas mi tshugs pa dang bcas pa /
des mdzad pa'i zlog pa'i rnal 'byor khyad ma? par can rngon pa nyi ma lde zhi gdos dang sha ba 'thab pa lta bu'i man ngag /
des mdzad pa'i uSh+NI Sha'i sgo /
ma? nas dam nyams gsod pa'i mtshon cha /
des brag dkar chos sdings su bkod pa'i bsrung bzlog ma? gnyis kyi man ngag sngags pa nang 'gras dang gsad pa gzhan du gsal ba'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i uSh+Na'i Sha'i bskul ma? rnam dag zhi ba ma /
des mdzad pa'i bstod pa ma? thugs rje'i dbang khros ma /
las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs la lI ta badzra gyis mdzad pa bal po thugs rje chen po dang r+wa lo rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba /
ro ras dang thod pa la brten nas las gshin sgrub cing bsnyen sgrub gsad pa'i man dag lo tsA ba @# / /
phyi mas yi ger btab pa /
las kyi gshin rje srid pa'i 'khro lo'i man ngag r+wa chen gyis lcags sgom ras pa la gnang ba srid pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
dge 'dun gtsug lag khang bsrung ba'i gshin rje srid pa'i 'khor lo bka' rgya dam po yod do -iTHi'i mtha' can /
las kyi gshin rje gnam lcags ur chung gi gdams pa zhes ba bsrung bzlog gsad pa'i sngags zlog pa yin na sngags bzla zhing gsad pa lham mthu ma dang bcas pa sus kyang mi shigs pa'i man ngag lags so'i mtha' can /
las kyi gshin rje'i yig chung drag sngags hur thum srog len dmar po snya nam pa'i man ngag yig chung zab mo rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
dkon cog gi bstan dgra ya ma rnams kyis 'dul bar khas blangs tshul /
'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje gnad la phab nas dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i yi ge drag sngags kyi rgyan du dgos pa'i yig chung -iTHi'i mtha' can /
'chi bdag sgrub rgya? thabs bshes gnyen tshul khrims bla mas bskul ba'i dor rgya ston gyis mdzad pa /
chos kyi rgyal po lha bcu gsum gyi mchod pa'i cho ga (rtse?)bik+Shu? khrom yon nam mkha' lhun bzang gis mdzad pa /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal bos las dang po pa'i rigs 'dzin rnams la phan pa'i ched du mdzad pa'i mkhan? las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i cho ga /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i dam can gshin rje'i rgyal po'i mngon rtogs spyan 'dren dbang? gtor 'bul bstod pa dang bcas pa'i chog sgrigs /
des mdo khams pa sbyin pa dpal bzang gi ngor mdzad pa'i 'chi bdag (mkhan?)?? gshin rje'i dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal po'i thugs dam bskad ba mi bzad 'jam dpal ma /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad dbang? pa'i las gshin gyi bskang rdzas byin rlabs /
de'i rjes gnang gi yi ge r+wa shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bkod pa /
las gshin bcu gsum ma'i rjes gnang gi yi ge thar gling bik+Shu? Ar+ya de was bkod pa /
las gshin dpa' bo gcig pa'i rjes gnang gi tho dbang? kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa /
gshin rje dmar nag gsum gyi rjes gnang gi sa? cho ga'i lag len shin tu gsal ba rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes mdzad pa /
gshin rje dmar po ma ru rtse bzhi skor du dz+nyA? grags pa snying la brten pa'i phyi sgrub /
sbyang thod la brten pa'i nang sgrub /
nal gri'i thod par brten pa'i gsang sgrub /
ra sbyang gi thod par brten pa'i gsang chen chig dril /
gtor chog bstod pa dang bcas pa rda rje dpal ba'i don du rgya ston gyis mdzad pa /
las kyi gshin rje khrag mdog yab yum gyi bsnyen sgrub dpal? las gsum gyi man ngag r+wa dbon shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa dge bas bstan pa bsrung bar shog gi mtha' can /
de'i gtor chog rjes gnang ngang bcas dpal? pa'i cho ga rnams /
gsum pa bod kyi mkhas pa 'bri gung dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i skor la /
kun dga' dbang phyug gis bskul ba'i ngor mdzad ba'i rtog pa gsum pa'i rgyas 'grel rin po che'i snye ma /
rtog pa gsum pa'i tshig gi sa mtshams bcad cing don gyi go rim bsdu ba /
dpal rtog pa gsum pa'i @# / /
'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga khams gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba khrag skyugs kyi lo chos dkar nam mkha'i rdzong du mdzad pa /
de las drag shul sbyod pa'i cho ga zhib mo gud du bstan pa zad ba'i lo nag pa zla ba'i dkar chos bzhi la mdzad pa /
rtog pa gsum ba'i man ngag gi zhal shes lnga pa zhes pa snyan brgyud yi ge med pa'i zin bris mdangs dkar snying rje'i rdzong du mdzad pa /
rtog pa gsum pa'i 'khrul 'khor rdzong ri rtse dgu'i mgul du mdzad pa /
thar pa'i rgyal srid la gnas pa'i dge sbyong chen po'i bkas bskul ba la brten nas 'khrul 'khor gyi lung sbyor rin cen 'od kyi sgron ma /
dpal rtog pa bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi chog 'khor lo rin po che'i bang mdzod chos dkar nam mkha'i rdzong du mdzad pa /
de la mkho ba'i zin bris 'gor rtog bdun gyi rgyas 'grel slob dpon mi skyod pas mdzad ces yod pa rang bzo med par 'gyur ro'i mtha' can /
bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen sgrub lag tu blang ba'i rim pa snying gtam glen pa'i tshig tu btsun pa kun dga' dbang phyug la gdams pa /
rtags kyi yi ge zhib mo khrag skyug gi lo lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzong du mdzad pa /
rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa'i tshul nges pa seng ge'i nga ro me byi mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
drag po'i las kyi bzlas pa rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon cha me byi mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
'di sngags bsdebs yin 'dug pa gsar ma phyogs la grags chung bas dpal 'dzin rtsa ba gsang sngags rnying ma bar song gshis snga 'gyur bka' gter gyi man ngag zab mo nas rku thabs kyi tshul du bris par mngon no / /
mdo khams tre shod pa rtogs ldan bsod nams dpal gyis bskul ba la brten nas thang skya'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa'i las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg dngos grub kyi gzi brjid rab snang /
zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg nyes pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa sreg par nus pa bsod nams kyi nyi ma bdun 'bar mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
rgyud rtog pa bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs su khyim du bzhag na zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i man ngag zhi ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
de'i yan lag 'jigs pa zhi ba'i bsrung 'khor /
mtshon bsrung ba /
tshe sgrub dang bcas pa /
gtsang rong dmu lha sham+b+har gyi gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
yang gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i rgyas pa'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba yan lag dang bcas pa /
dbang du bya ba'i cho ga don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par g.yo ba /
de'i yan lag 'gugs pa'i cho ga lcags kyu 'bar ba /
bskyed rdzogs kyi rim pa gang rung gi lam gyi grogs su rig pa'i skyes bu 'gugs ba zhu ba'i bsam gtan rig ma mi bsrun pa 'dul thabs bu mo rengs pa'i sbyor ba rnams me byi sham+b+ha ra dpal gyi yang dgon du mdzad pa /
dbang dang 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
drag po'i cho ga gshin rje'i gzugs la brten nas dgra sde 'phung bar bya ba'i man ngag 'jig rten gsum gyi bshan pa chen po rnam par rol bskal ldan sbyin pa rin cen gyi ched du mdzad pa /
'jig rten @# / /
gsum gyi bshan pa chen po rnam par rol pa ma grub na sbogs pa'i cho ga 'jig rten gsum za ba me pho byi ba'i lor mdzad pa /
gsad pa'i 'phrin las ga'u bsro ba'i man ngags gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i 'khrul /
'khor me byi mtshur phu'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
yang gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i sdig pa sbyang ba'i cho ga sbyin sreg dang 'khrul 'khor sbrags pa 'jig rten gsum 'phung bar byed pa /
mdza' ba dbye bar byed pa sham+b+har du mdzad pa /
yang gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i sdang ba yul nas dbyung ba bskrad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i g.yam pa la brten nas rengs pa'i cho ga 'jig rten gsum rnam par g.yo ba /
gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i te'u lo pa'i pags pa la brten nas rengs pa'i cho ga 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'ching ba /
gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i yan lag mtshon gyis 'bugs pa'i man ngag 'jig rten gsum pham par byed pa /
srin pos 'dzin pa'i cho ga las kyi srin po zhes bya ba mtshur phur mdzad pa /
yang de nyid du mdzad pa'i rims nad gtong ba'i man ngag rims nad chen po 'khrug pa /
yang gnas de nyid du mdzad pa'i smyo bar byed pa'i cho ga drag po'i bzhad gad chen po /
drag shul spyod pa'i gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i chog sdig can sgral ba'i mtshon cha ngar ma mdangs dkar snying rje rdzong du mdzad pa /
lugs srol 'di la lcags mkhar mi rtsig pa'i phyogs su mdzad nas /
lcags mkhar zur dgu pa dang zur bcu drug pa sogs spron byar rung gi 'on kyang rnying ma ba ltar blos btags nas byas pa yin pas rgyud rgya gzhung gi khungs ni med la zhes zur za ba ni sbyir kun rdzob kyi chos thams cad blos btags nas byas pa kho na yin pas gzhung lugs dang 'gal zhing rgyud rgya gzhung gi khungs med bzhin du gsar ma ba rnams spro na byar rung ba'i dam bcar song bas ba ma thob pa'i gzhu cig 'dir shor bar gda'o / /
ma 'grub na gnad la dbab ba'i cho ga sa gsum nges par 'joms pa me byi mtshur phur mdzad pa /
yang de nyid du mdzad pa'i gsang pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dus kyi me lce 'bar ba chen po'i 'phreng pa /
rtsa sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bri ba'i zin bris bris pas chog go'i mtha' can /
rtog bdun 'khrul 'khor mchog gi man ngag rdzong ri rtse dgu'i mgul du brjed byad du mdzad pa /
las kyi gshin rje yab yum sbrags te bsgrub pa'i man ngag dug hal hal chen po zhes pa lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzong du sbyar ba rnams /
'jigs byed kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga'i lag len bsod nams kyi 'od zer rnam par spel ba'i nyi ma zhes bya ba gnyis kyi lung rgyun deng sang mi 'dug /
gtor ma'i cho ga 'di la zhi rgyas dbang drag gi drug cu pa'i khyad par sogs legs bshad ngo mtshar ba snang /
'di nyid gshed skor la shin tu mkhas pas rgya gar gyi slob dpon dpal 'dzin dang 'ang zhes gleng bar brten mtshan de ltar thogs /

gsang sngags rnying ma ba rnams sngags klog sun 'byin gyi rtsod pa 'khon du bzung nas yal bar 'dor nga'i mched bor paN chen gser mdog can pas sdom gsum la dri ba mdzad pa dang /
chos rje thams cad mkhyen pas rab gnas dang bde mchog nag po'i skor la zhus dag par sa lugs rnams rje btsun gong ma la 'khrul pa med ces log par rtog /
stag tshang lo tsA bas rnam bshad dgongs pa rab gsal sogs la rtsod pa mdzad par rang phyogs dge lugs rnams chos rje sher rin pa'i legs bshad rnams 'dor /
sdom gsum dang lhag bsam rab dkar sogs mtshang du phog pa'i dwags brgyud pa rnams rje btsun sa paN dang rgyal ba btsong kha par ma gus pa'i rnam 'gyur ston pas mtshon te a pha'i gsol zhal ma gtsang dogs pa'i sbubs 'thum gyir bar thugs blo tsab tsub tu gyur pa cig tu thugs bden na'ang /
shes bya'i mtha' la tshad gzung med bas thugs sems rang mal du phab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jog pa zhu /
de ltar gong du smos pa'i smin grol rnams legs par thob pa las dbang brgyud dang po kha'u pa'i lugs dang /
sa gcad dang po dang gnyis pa'i rna'i rtags yod pa dang rtags gang yang med pa'i lung rnams dang bcas pa'i brgyud ba ni /

phug pa chos kyi grags pa /

bla ma tshul khrims shes rab /
rin po che bsod nams seng ge /
dpal ri ba blo gros mchog ldan /
rje sangs rgyas dbon /
gnyag phu ba bsod nams bzang po /
rin po che bsod nams dpal ba /
slob dpon grags pa dpal mgon /
chos rje nam mkha'i mtshan can /
rje rin cen rnam rgyal man 'dra / /
rdo rje'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
r+wa shar pa ltar na r+wa chos rab nas /
rdzong chung pa'i gsan yig na d+harma seng ge /
r+wa dkon cog seng ge /
shes rab rgyal mtshan gsum la r+wa nub pa /
r+wa tsho shar pa yin zer pa 'dug / /
sras d+harma seng ge /
r+wa dkon cog seng ge /
r+wa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
rgya ston dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus /
bla ma khams pa yon tan 'bum /
bsam yas mchod rten dkar po ba sangs rgyas skyabs /
lha rin po che bsod nams rin cen /
mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun bzang /
mnyam med dpal 'dzin bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
bla ma bsod nams mchog ldan /
rje tshe dbang bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje man 'dra /
r+wa nub pa ltar na r+wa chos rab nas /
rdzong pa'i gsan yig na ye shes seng ge dang 'bum seng gnyis la r+wa shar pa r+wa tsho nub pa zer ba 'dug /
sras ye shes seng ge /
r+wa 'bum seng /
rje btsun rgwa lo /
mang mkhar lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ga /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
zhang ston rgya bo bsod nams grags /
'bri gung dpal 'dzin gyi bla ma chos lung mkhan chen yin /
gnyan ston rdo rje grags /
khrom yon nam mkha' lhun bzang man sngar dang 'dra / /
nub kyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
r+wa chos rab nas /
r+wa ye shes seng ge /
rong pa rgra? lo /
bla ma shes rab seng ge /
rje grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang gzungs pa /
rje dge legs dpal bzang /
rdzong pa A nan+da ma ti /
grub chen byams pa chos rin /
rje sangs rgyas mgon po /
rje byams pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bla ma sangs rgyas 'od zer /
byams pa ye shes 'byung gnas /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas bkra shis /
sgye chu mkhan po byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
shar gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
r+wa chos rab nas /
r+wa d+harma seng ge /
r+wa dkon cog seng ge /
r+wa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
rgya ston dbang phyug rgyal mtsha /
rkya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus /
mkhan chen dang ma ba brtson 'grus byang chub /
rje bsod nams yon tan /
rje dge legs dpal bzang @# / /
man bshad ma thag pa ltar ro / /
yang na byams pa chos rin nas /
rje shAkya ye shes /
'bum chen blo gros dpal ldan /
byams pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na byams pa chos rin nas /
dbon chen brtson 'grus rgya mtsho /
'bum chen blo gros dpal ldan man 'dra / /
bu'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston chos rje /
thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal /
lce ston chos rgyal nam mkha'i mtshan can /
mkhas mchog zla ba dpal rin /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling 'jam dbyangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma kun dga' bkra shis /
chos rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
gzungs kyi rtags can gyi lung brgyud ni /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan nas /
rje gzungs pa /
dge legs bzang po /
A nan+da pa /
chos kyi rin cen /
sangs rgyas mgon po /
nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
sangs rgyas 'od zer /
ye shes 'byung gnas /
sangs rgyas bkra shis /
byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
kha'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
kun spangs rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po man 'dra / /
rum gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
r+wa 'bum seng nas /
r+wa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bla ma sngags dkar ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
khro che ba gzhon nu skyabs /
sprul sku shes rab bzang po /
bla ma rgyal ba dpal /
khams pa rgyal mtshan dpal /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje sangs rgyas dpal /
rje btsun sgo rum pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man dbang brgyud dang po sor bzhag go /
gub kyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse yan dbang brgyud dang po ltar la /
de nas drin can sbas pa'i rnal 'byor /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
pu'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
dbang gi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
dgon gsar ba bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
sa'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya khri chen yab sras nas /
rje zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
las gshin dpa' bo gcig pa'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug yan dbang brgyud dang po /
kha'u pa'i lugs ji lta ba la /
de la mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan dang dgon gsar ba bsod nams chos 'phel gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka nas rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
las gshin lha bcu gsum ma'i rjes gnang @# / /
dang bik+Shu'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
gshin rje gshed /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
slob dpon gzhon nu zla pa /
nA ga bo d+hi /
la lI ta badzra /
dz+nyA na kIrti /
mi nyag ston sgom /
lo sgom zhig po /
zhang ston bsod nams rin cen /
thang stod shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rdo rje bzang po /
thar gling pa Ar+ya de wa /
grub chen kun dga' blo gros /
slob dpon don ri ba /
de gnyis ka la mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun bzang /
de nas drung btsun rin cen rnam rgyal /
rje bshes gnyen bkra shis /
grub mchog ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man las gshin dpa' gcig dang 'dra /
yang na thar gling pa Ar+ya de wa nas /
gnas rnying mkhan chen lo tsA ba chos bzang /
bla ma rin cen dpal /
chos rje chos grags pa /
rong ri lung sbug pa rgyal ba thugs rje /
bshes gnyen bkra shis man 'dra /
yang na drung btsun rin can rnam rgyal nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
r+wa chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na rong pa shes rab seng ge yan dbang brgyud kha'u pa'i lugs ltar la /
de nas rong pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
thugs sras lo tsA ba /
'jam dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan /
gu ru rig pa'i ral gri /
chos rje rin cen dpal /
ras chen zla ba rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
sku zhang bsod nams mchog grub /
sku zhang bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rje rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rong pa rgwa lo yan dbang brgyud kha'u pa'i lugs ltar la /
de nas lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
zhang ston bsod nams grags pa /
gnyan ston rdo rje grags pa /
jo stan nam mkha' lhun bzang /
sngags 'chang rin cen rnam rgyal /
mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
rtse'i rtags can gyi lung brgyud ni /
mkhan chen dang ma? ba? yan r+wa 'khrid mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud ltar la /
de nas mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma Ar+ya de wa /
rtse chen grub chen kun blo /
khom yon nam mkha' lhun bzang /
rje dpal 'dzin bzang po /
mthu chen 'jigs med dpa' bo /
bla ma bsod nams mchog ldan /
sngags 'chang che dbang bkra shis /
char chen man 'dra / /
las gshin dmar po bse bya bzhi skor gyi rjes gnang dang dz+nyA'i rtags can gyi lung brgyud na /
rgya ston kun dga' brtson 'grus yan r+wa 'khrid mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud dang 'dra ba la mkhan chen dang ma ba nas rim par brgyud de rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel /
grub dbang shAkya seng ge /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel nas /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba /
rigs @# / /
'dzin chen po blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
las gshin dmar po khrag mdog yab yum gyi rdzes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
mkhan chen dang ma yan bse bya bzhi skor ltar la /
de nas thog ston shes rab rdo rje /
rin po che shes rab grags /
khur ba dkon cog rdo rje /
khrom yon nam mkha' lhun bzang /
brag thog dpal 'dzin bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa /
thugs sras kun dga' rgyal po /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mthu stobs dbang phyug bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
dpal sa skya pa bsod nams dbang phyug rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhan chen zha lu pa des bdag la'o /
dpal gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rje dbang rab yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de nas khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
sag cad gsum pa dpal 'dzin nyi 'od bzang pos mdzad pa'i glegs bam gyi lung brgyud ni /
gwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje yan dbang brgyud dang po ltar la /
de nas mang mkhar lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa zhang ston bsod nams grags pa /
gangs ri'i khrod kyi dpal 'dzin nyi 'od bzang po /
rgya mtsho sprin gyi 'brug sgra glog gi 'phreng ba can yang zer /
bla ma stag lung pa /
zha lu pa chen po /
stag lung ngag dbang grags pa /
mi nyag paN chen grags pa rdo rje /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
'gos ston rdo rje seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mthu chen bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rje btsun bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+del bka' drin du stsal to / /
! bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dgra nag zhang lugs lha bcu gsum gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs /
grub chen sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs /
paN grub 'di paM ka ra b+ha dra /
grub chen la lI ta badzra /
sau su ra pa /
she na pa /
a wa li na pa gu Na b+ha dra /
wa gI shwa ra kI rti /
de wa A ka ra tsan+d+ra /
slob dpon a mo g+ha badzra /
zhang lo tsA ba shes rab bla ma /
'di man gyi bla ma bzhi dmag zor ma'i bla brgyud kyi zhang gi zhal ngo bzhi po sngags pa gos dkar lcang lo can /
sras saM g+ha b+ha dra /
gcen rin cen gtsang 'od /
sras 'od po che yang zer /
gcung rdo rje rtse mo /
dpal ga ta mug rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje /
zhang nyi ma 'od yin min brtag /
dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes /
bstan bzang pa rin cen rnam rgyal ming min brtag /
bsam brling pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba /
kun mkhyen 'dzims pa rin cen shes rab /
shar pa kun dga' seng ge /
'dzims pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
kun spangs chos grags dpal /
ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rje btsun kun dga' bzang pa /
sngags 'chang chos dar dpal /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen @# / /
po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor gyi ban+de la'o / /
! sgrub thabs za ma tog dang bcu gsum ma gsum gyi dkyil chog rin cin 'phreng ba la brten nas dge lugs kyi dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'jigs byed /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
la lI ta badzra /
a mo g+ha badzra /
ye shes 'byung gnas sbas pa /
padma badzra /
dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta /
r+wa lo tsA ba rdo rje grags /
rab byung /
ra lo chos rab /
r+wa ye shes seng ge /
sngags pa gos dkar lcang lo can /
r+wa 'bum seng /
r+wa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
gos dkar co breg can /
de sras rong pa shes rab seng ge /
bod btsun /
sman dge ba ye shes dpal /
chos rje don grub rin cen /
chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang /
mkhas grub shes rab seng ge /
rgyud pa sbyin pa dpal ba /
rtse ba shes rab bzang po /
rje ches skyong rgya mtsho /
dwags po nam mkha' grags /
rje nyi ma bkra shis /
chos rje bde legs nyi ma /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+da la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na mkhas grub rje nas /
'phags mchog don grub rin cen /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rje nam mkha' bzang po /
rje pha bong kha pa mkhan 'dra /
yang na rong pa sher seng nas /
bla ma bsod nams lhun grub /
chos rje don grub rin cen man 'dra /
yang na rong pa shes rab seng ge nas /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
sgra ched pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
mkhan chen lcags ri ba /
mkhan chen grags pa shes rab /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho man gong bzhin no /
rang lo drug pa'i dus na tshod kyi dbang brda 'phrod pa sogs ma byung yang brgyud pa'i rnam gangs tsam la /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal ba nas /
gcung chos rgyal ba /
bla ma chos rdo rje /
rje blo bzang don grub /
dbang sa pa sangs rgyas ye shes /
mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
des bdag la'o / /
rang lo brgyad pa'i dus 'jam dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel la zhus pa dbang brda sogs ni ye ma 'phrod /
rje nyid kyis rgyal ri khrod kyi dge slong khyung po la gsan /
des rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa la gsan 'dra gsung ba las nges 'drong ma byung ngo / /
! rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sngags btu'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sman dge ba ye shes dpal yan gong ltar la /
de nas chos rje don grub rin cen /
thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha pa chen po /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang /
lha btsun rin cen blo gros rgya mtsho /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
slob dpon chos grags 'od zer /
chos rje nam mkha' bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pa bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
kun mkhyen chos @# / /
dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i nyi 'od /
de la mdo smad pa tsha kho dbon po ngag dbang grags pas thog drangs dge slong bzhi sdes gser gyi maN+Dal bla gos dang bcas nas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor drang srong srin po ri'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbas don yig chung gi 'phreng ba ha la'i lo 'dab /
tsha kho dbon po dang bon po thug pa'i dus phyag len mdzad pa rnams nyams su myong ba'i man ngag yang chung zin bris su bkod pa /
des sngags 'chang rdo rje dbang phyug gi ngor mdzad pa'i gshin rje nag po'i 'khor lo blta ba tshul gyi man ngag zin bris dang bcas pa rnams kyi lung phyag len zhib rgyas dmar khrid du legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sman dge ba ye shes dpal yan sngar ltar la /
de nas rje don grub rin cen /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang /
rje don grub rin cen /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
ba so sprul sku lha dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho /
gung ru dbyangs dpon pa mthu stobs gsang ba'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
des bdag la bka' drin du stsal to / /
zha lu pa legs pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i drug cu pa'i rtsa chig la brtan nas paN chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i drug cu pa'i rnam gzhag dam nyams kyi srog gcod mtshon cha 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor /
bka' sdod dam can rnam gsum gyi 'phrin las bskul ba myur mgyogs drag po'i pho nya'i yig cha'i lung dang sa 'khor 'dri lugs dang gnam 'khor rtsig lugs kyi phyag 'khrid dang bcas pa thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
zha lu pa legs pa rgyal mtshan nas /
bla ma gnyis gsum zhig ma rnyed /
de nas dben sa rab 'byams pa sangs rgyas ye shes /
mkhan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
des bdag la'o / /
las gshin phyi nang gsang gsum ni 'jam dbyangs chos skor gyi chos tshan du bzhugs shing brgyud pa'ang r+wa pa sogs nas mi 'dren 'dug pas 'dir ma smos /
gong gi dbang brgyud deng sang r+wa lugs nas 'dren pa kun la grags shing 'jigs byed r+wa lugs yin par zhal gyis kyang 'chos r+wa lugs min par byas na 'jigs byed de ngan par song dogs pa'i ngan rtog mdzad mkhan yang mang mod /
za ma tog dang bcu gsum ma gsum gyi dkyil chog r+wa los mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs rim pa lnga dbang gi chu bo rnams dang mi mthun pas r+wa lugs su gtan tshigs lung rig gang gis kyang mi 'grub pas kho bo ni de ltar yin zhes khas blang bar mi nus /
gong du dbang brgyud de ltar 'dran pa ni kun dang mthun na mi chos rtsa ba yin zhes pa ltar smos la /
kho bo'i blo gros kyi mig chung ngu zhig gis brtags tshe rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgon po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad par rje btsun nyid kyi zhal gyis kyang 'ches shing don la'ang gnas pas chos rje don grub rin cen yan @# / /
brgyud mi dgos par bla ma 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis rjes su gnang ba thob pa la brten nas mngon dkyil mdzad pa las r+wa skyo zhang mal gnyos sogs bod kyi 'jigs byed mkhan po'i rjes su 'brangs pa min par sems /
lcags mkhar zur bcu drug pa'i drug cu pa 'di r+wa lo'i thugs lag pa pa'i mtshon cha sngon chad gzhan la ma grags pa'i phyogs shig 'dug kyang bod snga rags pa'i r+wa lugs pa rnams la grags shing rgya ldong sogs zung drug phyi'i dur la brten nas bur thug? bar ngos?? yod mod ngon phyi nang gnyis ba? dris ba'i thur dgu pa 'di r+wa lugs kyi phyag lan thun mong ma yin pa'o / /
pa dang dgu pa las 'di la thugs gtsigs kyang mi mdzad /
mkhas pa dpal 'dzin zur dgu pa dang bcu drug pa gnyis ka rgyud rgya gzhung gi zin so med par mdzad cing gong dkar rdo rje gdan pas dpe'u ris na'ang brir mdzad pas snyan brgyud min 'dra zhing /
'di la phyag len kyang rigs mi gcig pa 'ga' zhig 'dug pa dang /
deng sang gtsang phyogs su dar ba'i lugs dang rab 'byams pa bsod nams grags pa'i lag len thun mong ma yin par grags pa'i zin bris 'dra yong 'dug pa rnams kyang mi mthun pa mang zhing spyir rA hu la'i pha srin por bshad pa sogs rnam pa srin po la ngo bo sde brgyad du gtogs pa yod na'ang lang+ka mgrin bcu chos mngon pa nas gcig na srin po dag gnas so zhes 'dzam bu gling gi gling phran gcig srin po yin par bshad pa'i rgyal po yin pas mi dang rjes su mthun par stobs dang rdzu 'phrul cung zad yod pa las bstan pa bsrung nus pa'i sde brgyad lta bu'i mthu stobs med pa rA ma Na'i gtam rgyud kyis kyang rtogs nus /
drangs nges kyi bshad pa la mtha' gcig tu ma nges rung /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po'i gsang ba'i rnam thar du khyab 'jug /

sha za /
rgyal po ste nag po'i ris kyi sde bzhis mtho 'tshams par mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi mthus btul bar bshad pas 'di'i bka' srung thun mong ma yin pa yin tshe lha bdud du babs pa lta bu'i khungs dang ma 'brel ba sogs nas dpyad dka' bar snang ngo / /

'jaM dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na klog skya grags chen pa zhes gcig tu bris 'dug pa yig skyon byung ngam brtag cing thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa gsum gyi gsan yig na bla ma grags chen pa'i tshab tu spang khang pa grags po dpal zer ba 'dug pa dbyad /

'jam dbyangs bsod nams lhun grub /

! pha bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi snying po'i yang snying rgyud dang man ngag gi dgongs pa bzhin grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal ldan chos skyong gis lags par bkral ba'i gdams pa snyigs dus kyi tshe thung gcig la dbang po yang rab kyi skal ldan rnams grol bar byed pa shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi sngon 'gro smin byed gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon rtogs bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang dkyil chog bdud rtsi'i chu irgyun /
lhan thabs kun mkhyen mkhyen brtses mdzad pa gsum la brten nas dbang bzhi /
yig rnying gi thog nas spros med kyi byin rlabs /
kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i 'jug bde gsal @# / /
ba'i steng nas 'od gsal 'char ba'i byin rlabs /
theg chen rin po ches mdzad pa'i gsal byed sgon ma'i steng nas bdud rtsi'i byin rlabs /
grol byed kyi lam la shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid glo bo lo tsA ba chen po'i 'khrid yig man ngag snyan brgyud kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje'i gsung la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su mjad pa'i steng nas nyams 'khrid smin rgyas rnams nos nas /
rgyab rten lung la /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug birbas mdzad pa'i shin tu spras pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rgya gar gyi mkhan po dar+pan A tsar+ya dang glo bo lo tsA ba shes rab rin cen gyis bsgyur ba /
nges mdzad pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po re wan+d+ra dang chag lo tsA ba chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba /
glo bo lo tsA'i 'gyur zhig kyang yod snad /
des mdzad pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa a? dar+pa na A tsar+ya dang lo tsA la zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur ba /
shin tu spros pa med kyi rnal 'byor nyams su blang ba'i rim pa sa skyong ba'i mnga' bdag ngo jo dge slong gi ched du glo bo lo tsA bas mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i bir+wa pa'i rnam rtog 'od gsal gyi lam 'khrid dar+pan A tsar+ya'i zhabs kyi man ngag /
des mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa'i thabs drug po 'di ni rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi man ngag slob dpon bir+wa ba'i thugs kyi dgongs pa shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag /
des mdzad pa'i sems bskyed drug po de rim gyis sam cig car nyams su len tshul /
des mdzad pa'o bskyod rdzogs gnyis bsgom pa'i bar gcod sel thabs /
des mdzad pa'i gzhan yang bdud la sogs pa'i bar gcod dngos grub tu blang thabs bla ma'i man ngag /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi gsung bzhin rgyud gsum pas sde snod 'dzin thar? pa chos rgyal dpal bzang gis bskul ba'i ngor mdzad pa'i spros med mdzes rgyan /
zhal gdams thor bu'i skor la /
bir+wa pas mdzad pa'i shin tu spros med de kho na nyid man ngag gi don 'grel btsun pa shes rab ming ngor chen can gyis mdzad pa /
bla ma rgyal mtshan dpal gyis rang gi slob ma rnams la zhal ta mdzad pa /
shes rab ming can gyis mdzad pa'i me thabs drug 'chings /
des mdzad pa'i gegs sel /
mang mkhar bas bkod pa'i the rtse /
'gor bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das yab yum zhes yod pa'i sngon 'gro'i man ngag /
bdag byin brlab kyi lag len gud na yod gsung ba /
rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba bla mas bstan pa de 'di yin no gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
rten 'brel rdzas kyi zhal shes mkha' 'gro rnams la gsol ba btab nas lo mchog pas yi ger bkod pa /
nges bkod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i gegs sel ba'i gzhung gi thems yig /
rnal 'byor bzhi'i gzhung gi thems yig dbang phyug brtson 'grus kyis yi ger bkod pa /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ges mdzad pa'i 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim ba'i gdams ngag ces pa byin rlabs kyi yi ge /
theg chen rin po chos mdzad pa'i rten 'brel rdzas kyi rnal 'byor ram byin rlabs gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me /
des mdzad pa'i bcud len gyi man @# / /
ngag /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen bas mdzad pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mngon par ra? rtogs pa gshin rje kun 'joms /

tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i spros med /

de'i zhal byang du /
gsang chen thabs rgyud gshin rje thar byed lam / /
grub chen bir+wa'i bzhed gzhung zab mo'i don / /
brtse chen bla ma dam pa'i gsung gi bcud / /
don chen tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i zhal lung 'di / /
'di dang phyi ma'i don chen dran gyis la / /

na rga 'chi skye'i sdug bsngal bzod dam ci / /
ci ltar song yang nyams lan gnad du thong / /
bden gsung gsung gi gsang ba bla na med / /
gang zin zin bris bgyis pa'i lags bshad 'di / /
brjed ngas mun pa'i smag rum dbyis 'byin phyir / /
nyams rtogs pad dkar bzhad pa'i nyi ma lags / /
zhes pa snang ngo / /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis zin bris mdzad dbang? pa'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad 'khrul pa zab la mthun gcig gis dbyings su sbyong ba bla ma'i thugs bcud /
'di skor shin tu zab pa'i slob bshad yin pas ji skad du /
rang gi nga bo gang du ma grub kyang / /
du mar 'char ba'i sems nyid yid bzhin nor / /
lam byed rnam bzhis mngon du byed pa 'di / /
sa skya'i bla chen kho na'i khyad chos yin / /
de gsung 'dzin pa phal cher tshogs bshad sbun pas g.yangs / /
la la smras tshad gtam du song ba'i mu cor mkhan / /
slob bshad snyan brgyud lhug par stsol ba'i drin can rje / /
blo gsal zhabs la snying nas 'dud do ring du skyongs / /

paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
sems dpa' chen po bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bkra shis rnam rgyal /
rje btsun kun dga' grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra yang na ngor chen nas /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
r+wa ston yon tan dpal bzang /
glo bo mkhan chen legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
rje grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
go ram pa /
sangs rin pa /
lha mchog seng ge /
grol mchog man 'dra / /
rje grol mchog gi gsan yig na glo bo lo tsA ba nas brgyud pa'i dbang kun dga' mchog grub la gsan tshul 'dug pa /
glo bo lo tsA ba nas grol byed las smin byed kyi rgyun ma 'phel tshul mkhas pa rnams la yongs su grags pas paN chen shAkya shrI nas brgyud pa'i gur @# / /
gyi rjes gnang ltar gzhan las khyad thon ma zhig mdzad bzhed pa'i sgyu ma'i rol gar yin nam snyam /
yang chag lo tsA ba nas bla brang pa chen po gzhan nu rgyal mtshan /
de dbon bla brang pa shAkya dpal /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug ye shes dpal bzang po /
rgyal sras mi bskyod rdo rje /
de gnyis ka la chag lo tsA ba rin cen chos kyi rgyal po /
de nas chos rje rin cen rgyal mchog /
rdzong dkar ba kun mkhyen shes rab dpal bzang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man sngar ltar ro / /
yang na bla brang pa gzhon nu rgyal mtshan nas /
bla brang pa blo gros dpal /
bla brang pa bzang po dpal /
bla brang pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
bla brang pa bsod nams dpal 'byor /
bla brang pa chos dpal bzang po /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal man 'dra /
yang na bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa nas mkhan chen d+harma shrI /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po man 'dra /
bka' babs gsum pa dA na shI la lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
gshin rje gshed /
bir+wa pa /
shar phyogs nag po pa /
sA li pa /
shI la tsan+d+ra /
paN chen dA na shI la /
'jam gsar shes rab 'od /
rgwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na rgwa lo yab sras gnyis nas /
skyi ston grags rgyal /
kun mkhyen shes rab rgyal mtshan /
jo nang phyogs las rnam rgyal /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
rje sangs rgyas 'phel /
rje kun dga' chos bzang man 'dra / /
byin rlabs gsum gyi brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na byin rlabs kyi lung brgyud las brgyud pa mi gcig tsam 'dren pa gnad 'dug pa rnam grangs zhig yin pa 'dra /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan yan 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'khrid brgyud le chan gsum po ltar la /
de nas khyab bdag zha lung chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
'od gsal 'char ba'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
byang gling ba bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
sku drung shAkya seng ge /
rtse chen dus 'khor ba'i bla ma bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
nyams 'khrid kyi brgyud pa dang po ni /
bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed /
grub chen bir+wa pa /
grub chen Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dpal 'dzin /
grub chen gam+b+hi ra ma ti /
paN grub dar+pan A tsar+ya /
kri? ya sa muny+tsa mdzad pa po yin dgung lo stong dang nyis brgya bzhugs /
glo bo lo tsA ba shes rab rin cen /
sras bla ma sa pa /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gras /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu sten rin cen grub /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
dza nang pa phyogs las rnam rgyal /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po nas rje tshar chen yan dbang brgyud bka' babs dang po ltar la /
de nas rje bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug dpal rtan /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
brgyud pa gnyis pa ni /
bla ma dam pa yan bshad ma thag pa ltar la /
de nas theg chen chos kyi rgyal po 'jam @# / /
dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang man bshad ma thag pa bzhin no / /
brgyud pa gsum pa ni /
bu ston rin po che nas /
thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal /
sku zhang nam mkha' mchog grub /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI rat+na /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring pa man bshad ma thag pa bzhin no / /
yang na thugs sras sems dpa' chen po nas /
drin can bsod nams don grub /
'jam dbyangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab rje man bshad ma thag pa ltar ro / /
nye brgyud du byed na shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis man la lam bzung nas so ma bu rir rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa dang dngos su mjal nas gsan pa yin pas rdo rje 'chang /
bir+wa pa /
shar chen man gong ltar ro / /
rtags med pa'i lung rnams kyi brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa yan 'khrid brgyud dang po ltar la /
de nas theg chen rin po che kun dga' bkra shis /
yab 'jam dbyangs chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
kun mkhyen klu sgrub rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
rje phyogs las rnam rgyal /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
I rtags can gyi lung brgyud ni /
bi rU pa /
ma taM gi /
dpal 'dzin /
wI la badzra /
shAn+ta rak+Shi ta /
d+harma badzra /
rat+na badzra /
dar+pan A tsar+ya /
glo bo lo tsA ba yab sras gnyis /
lo mchog pa /
dpal seng ba /
kun mkhyen bu ston /
bla ma dam pa /
theg chen pa man 'dra / /
thar gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
ngor chen nas /
mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon mkhan chen dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mus chen nas /
kun mkhyen go bo /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa man 'dra /
yang na dor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
'dren mchog / /
lha mchog seng ge /
dkon cog lhun grub sangs rgyas seng ge man gong bzhin no / /
ra'i rtags can gyi lung ni /
shes bya kun mkhyen bu ston rin cen grub /
sgra tshang pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
lce nam mkha'i mtshan can /
mkhas pa zla ba dpal rin /
mkhan chen 'khrul zhig chen po /
mkhyen rab rje /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
'brog khang pa don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang ging pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
bla ma kun dga' bkra shis /
chos rje dkog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
da'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses 'khrid kyi zin bris tshar chen la spyan 'bebs zhus pas ded kyis gang dbod de ga tshig zur ma nyams par byung 'dug /
blo khogs byas pa rnams ma thebs 'dug gsung kyal ka mdzad skad /
tshar chen nas /
skyed tshal @# / /
'og mkhan chen blo gros chos 'phags /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
bar skabs kyi tshigs bcad rnams kyang snyan po 'dug pas glog gtong gsungs nas lung dang lhan du gnang ngo / /
d+hI'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
dbang gi rtags can gyi lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
g.yung drung gi rtags can ni rje bla ma nyid la thos so / /
! chos rje khro phu lo tsA bas dkyil chog bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig dang lnga gsum bco lnga gnyis bsres nas mdzad pa ltar thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston yab sras dang khyud po lhas pa rnams kyis mdzad pa ji lta ba blo dman gyi don du brjed tho khrigs chags su bris pa'i steng nas padma'i rigs bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po ral pa gcig pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang chog nyis bsres bsdus pa'i lugs kyi dbang bzhi /
rdo rje gdan pa dang mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI sogs ma rgyud du bzhed kyang pha rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs te bkod pa yin /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su mdzad pa'i sems kyi gdung sel gyi steng nas sems nyid ngal gso'i nyams 'khrid smin rgyas /
bar skabs nas smin grol ya bral ba'i dbang lung legs ldan rje nas brgyud dgos kyang nyams 'khrid rje blo gsal rgya mtshe nas byung bas ji skad du /
mnyam rjes bral ba'i dge sbyor khor yug gi / /
snang srid bde chen chos skur shar ba'i dang / /
dngos dang brgyud pas drin can ma rnams la / /
phan bde rab 'byams stsol dus nam 'ong na / /
de skad rgyal ba kun dngos tshar pa rje'i / /
zhabs sen nor bu'i cod pan spyi bo'i gtsug /
'bral med bcings pas chos kyi rgyal srid la / /
dbang thob mkhyen brtse'i ming des yi ger bkod ces so / /
rgyab rten lung la /
thun mong du dgos pa /
smin byed /
bskyed rim /
rdzogs rim /
yum gyi skor /
chos skyong skor dang drug /
dang po la /
bcom ldan 'das dpal ral pa gcig pa'i brtag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bla na med pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da'i thugs sras rgya gar nub phyogs kyi paN+Di ta shrI kha la ru tra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba /
gnubs lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus don bcas dang po'o / /
'di'i rjes su rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na khro los mdzad pa'i spyi chings nang chings gnyis 'dug pa ma thob /
gnyis pa smin byed la /
dam pa'i bkas bskul nas shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da'i zhal gyi gdams pa thun mong ma yin pa ltar khro phu lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bdan gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig pa /
des mdzad pa'i rgyas par byed na zur 'debs su byed pa'i cho ga lnga gsum bco lnga'i sgo nas dpal ral pa gcig pa'i dbang chog mdor bsdus man ngag gi sgo nas lag len khrigs su bsgrigs pa /
@# / /
grol lam gtso bor byed pa'i dbang gong ma bsdus pa ngo sprod dmar 'khrid du byas pa gsang ba dam pa yang dag rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
pho nya'i lam gtso bor byed pa'i dbang gong ma rgyas pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur mai tri ba'i zhal gyi gdams pa mthar thug /
rgyud dang gdams ngag rdzogs par thob pas gzhan don byed pa'i dbang bcu gnyis rdo rje slob dpon bdag po'i dbang chog /
'di'i rjes su yab gtso bor byas pa'i 'pho ba'i byin rlabs gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma byung /
yum gtso bor byas pa'i ye shes 'pho ba'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga bsdus pa rnams /
gsum pa bskyed rim la /
dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa grub chen mi tra dzo ki dang lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul 'phags pa shing kun tu bsgyur ba /
de'i don 'grel gyi sgrub thabs rgyas bsngags 'chang dpal gyi ming can gyis bkod pa /
slob dpon shrI badzra kIrtis mi pham sbas ba'i bshes gnyen /
mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes sgrub /
slob dpon rol ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i yum khro phu lo tsA ba /
yang mi pham bshes gnyan gyis mdzad pa'i lha bcu bdun ma'i sgrub thabs dang lus dkyil mngon rtogs gnyis gsan yig na 'dug pa rgyun ma byung /
rkyang gi sgrub thabs mi tra dzo ki dang gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
khro phu lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs jo bo e ka dza Ti'i gdams ngag sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyis bstan pa /
gsan yig na mngon rtogs che chung gsum 'dug kyang gnyis kyi rgyun ma rnyed /
mi tras rjes bzung bstan pa'i srog shing dam pa'i gsung zas gos spyod lam ste ral gcig ma'i rnal 'byor gsum gyi gdams ngag rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
tshogs mchod bla na med pa'i lag len rdo rje me dpung zhes bya ba gnubs lo tsA ba dpal gyi ming can gyis sbyar ba /
'di'i rjes su gsan yig tu mi pham zla ba'i bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma 'dug kyang rgyun ma byung /
rA dza ga A nan+das mdzad pa'i bstad pa paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI b+ha dra dang lo chung gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba rnams /
bzhi pa rdzogs rim /
rje btsun spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'i sems nyid ngal gso'i skor la ngal gso'i rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig d+hI? rgyud kyi lung dang sbyar ba bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa /
khro bu lo tsA ba'i rnam thar dpag bsam 'khri shing /
do ha rdo rje'i tshigs bcad nyer lnga pa /
don 'grel gnad kyi sgon me khro los mdzad pa /
ngo sprod kyi man ngag /
ma yengs ma bcos rang ga'i gnad kyi zhal gdams /
sngon 'gro khro lo'i reg zig /
'khrid yig bsod nams seng ges mdzad pa rnams kun mkhyen mkhyen brtses tshar chen la gsan pa'i gsan yig na snang yang rgyun ma rnyed /
mkhyen rab chos rjes mdzad pa'i d+hI? brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs gnas sbyar ma /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i d+hI? 'khrid yig sems kyi gdung sel /
mkha' 'gro ma gsum gyis gsungs ba'i rdo rje sbas pa'i gsang lam la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ral gcig mas gsungs pa'i brtag pa dang po /
rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje 'phreng ba can gyis gsungs pa'i brtag pa gnyis pa /
rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thod pa'i 'phreng ba can gyis gsungs pa'i brtag pa gsum pa ste brtag pa gsum gyi rgyud rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen kun dga' dang lo tsA ba gnubs mi @# / /
bskyod rdo rjes dpal swa ya b+hu di bi hA rar bsgyur ba /
rgyud dal brten nas dbang po rab tshe 'di la 'tshang rgya ba gser bzo mkhan mkhas pas gser la rgyan bkod pa lta bu'i man ngag la gsum yod pa'i dang po rdo rje'i lam la thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa /
khyad par gyi sngon 'gro gsum khro phu lo tsA bas mdzad pa /
'di'i rjes su dngos gzhi dang dbang byad gnyis gsan yig bu dug kyang rgyun ma rnyad /
sbas pa'i lam zhes pa rang sems thabs ldan rang dbang rang gis bsgyur ba 'khor los sgyur ba lta bu la thabs gtso bor byed pa'i bsre ba bzhi snying byang rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'di'i rjes su phyag rgya bzhi zung 'jug bzhi /
sku gsum ngo sbrod thig le gsum /
thogs pa gsum 'brud bu zhas pa rnams gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma byung /
thabs shes zung 'jug gtso bor byas pa'i rin cen 'bru gsum zhes pa gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis yi ger bkod pa /
'di'i rjes su mchog gi gdams pa gsum zhes pa gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma rnyed /
gsang ba'i lam la rang lus thabs ldan dpa'i bo'i lus la dgos dgu tshang ba lta bur thabs lam rgyas pa rdo rje sbas pa'i gsang lam zhes par byin rlabs /
lus sbyang /
sa sbyang gsum gyi sngon 'gro /
rtsa thig rlung gsum yig dang 'brel bas dngos gzhi bstan pa /
'di'i rjes su thabs lam 'bring bo gsang rnying rdo rje'i tshig bzhi bsdus pa rgyad tshig la sbyar ba /
gzhan lus shes ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba mo'i gzhan lus kyi rten rnal 'byor ba'i brtag thabs /
dngos gzhir byang sems kyi dkar 'khrid nyams myong gi dga' 'khrid lcags kyu'i dul 'khrid /
ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal 'khrid rnams gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma rnyed /
sgra gcan gyi gza' 'khrid nyi zla bcon 'dzin rnams /
'di'i rjes su bsdus skyob sba ba'i man ngag /
dbang po 'bring ba che khar grol ba khyud sgong rgyal sa gral ba lta bu'i man ngag gi gnad drug ba /
'bo ba srid zhi'i dkyil 'khor ma rnams gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma byung /
dbang po 'bring po gnad dgu'i 'pho ba dang mtha' ma bar dor grol ba'i skor rnams gsan yig na'ang rgyun med tshul 'dug pas ring mo zhi gnas chang ba 'dra'o /
lnga pa yum gyi skor la /
brgyud pa'i lo rgyus /
byin rlabs gnad /
'bo ba'i gdams ngag gi slob bu smin byed /
zab bar yig chung gi lus bskyed ba'i rim pa /
gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi man ngag gis sems rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub thabs rdo rje'i tshig gis kun gyi gzhi gzung ba /
phyag mtshan gyi sgrub thabs bzhi las tshogs kyi mtha' bsdu ba rnams gsan yig da 'dug kyang rgyun ma rnyed /
dmigs pa me'i 'khor los bar gcod kyi bgegs bsrung ba /
'bru bzhi sngags kyi bzlas pas snang ba 'ur bslang ba 'di'i rjes su 'bar ba me'i mchod pas gzhan gyi snang ba bsgul ba gsan yig na 'dug kyang rgyun ma rnyed /
rlung yi ga'i ris kyis rang bzhin gyi rtsa sbyang ba /
thug phrad thog 'gel gyis byed rgu chos su gtang ba /
khams dangs snyigs kyi dag pa dang 'khrul pa shan dbye ba /
'da' kha 'chi brod kyi rlung rig gnad du bsnun pa /
bar do 'od gsal gyi gdams ngag gis rlung rig ya dral ba /
sku gsum rang chos kyi man ngag gis 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du 'gro don byed pa /
rgyun yod med bsdoms pa'i bco lnga ngo de snye ba lo tsA ba'i snyan brgyud gser chos so / /
drug pa chos skyong skor la /
gnod sbyin kA la dang bi kA la gnyis te gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi rjes gnang gi yi ge rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi lung nong pa'i yi ge /
@# / /
phyi dud 'gro'i rdzas sdig pa dang sdre'u'i gzugs la brten nas nor sgrub pa /
'brug gzugs kyis snyan grags sgrub pa /
nang mi'i rdzas bum ba la brten nas 'chi ba blu zhing tshe sgrub pa /
gzan gyi rkun po'i gzugs brnyan la brten nas chom rkun 'ching ba /
kA la'i gzugs la brten nas mngon shes sgrub ba /
shel la brten nas dbang phyug sgrub pa /
gser gyi mdud thung la brten nas dgra bo gsad pa ste kA la'i las lnga /
ro ras la brten nas btson 'grol ba /
lci ba'i me la brten nas stor ba btsal ba /
gri rgyus la brten nas gnod sbyin mo 'gugs pa /
rus sbal bo mo la brten nas gter 'don pa /
gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la brten nas tshe brtag pa ste bi kA la'i las lnga gsang ba lha min gyi rdzas badzra tri shu la la brten nas las la sbyor ba rnams de ltar legs bar nos pa'i dbang gi brgyud ba ni /
khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po /
jo go bar+sa pA Ni /
byang sems blo gros rin cen /
grub chen tai lo pa /
grub chen ni ska laM ka shrI /
grub chen mi tra dzo ki /
khro yab yum zung 'jug gi ye shes 'pho ba'i dbang chog /
gza' tshogs gtor lung /
lha bcu bdun phyi mngon rtogs don gsal sgron me /
khar+sa bA Ni'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad bzhi pa /
longs spyod myur du 'byung ba'i thabs /
gsol 'debs stong nyid thugs rje ma /
rgyud kyis gcang kun spangs zhang gis mdzad pa /
yum skor gyi gdams ba bco lnga'i dkar chag rnams dang sang lung mdzad 'dug kyang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa mnga' dis rigs 'dzin chen por mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis gsan pa'i zhabs phyir bla ma ayon rgyal pos gsan 'dug pas gsan yig na med bzhig 'ong don med 'dra snyam mo / /
phu lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal /
bla ma dbon sten pa /
yang rtse rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
khyung po lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams /
bla ma rin cen don grub legs pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
'khrul zhig dka' bzhi pa rin cen mchog grub dpal 'bar /
rgyal yum tshul khrims bzang mo /
mnga' ris gter chen chos kyi rgyal po legs ldan rdo rje /
bla ma ayon rgyal po /
paN chen kun dga' bkra shis /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag khra tshang pa chen po blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
sems nyid ngal bso'i nyams 'khrid dang d+hI'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
'phags pa thugs rje chen po /
byang sems blo gros rin cen /
tai lo shes rab bzang po /
grub chen rol pa'i rdo rje /
grub chen mi tra dzo ki /
khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal /
bla chen bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu sems dpa' chen po bsod nams seng ge /
de la bla ma tshang ma'i skyes bu bsod nams mgon po dang yang rtse pa rin cen seng ge gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
de nas thugs sas sems dpa' chen po /
sku zhang nam mkha'i mtshan can /
mkhas grub zla ba dpal rin /
mkhas pa tsan+da pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhas grub mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring ba chen po /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags mchog byams pa skal bzang /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des @# / /
bdag la'o / /
d+hI'i rtags ma gtogs pa'i sa gcad bzhi pa yan gyi lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
khro phu lo tsA ba nas /
bla ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
khro phu sems dpa' chen po /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge man dbang brgyud ltar ro / /
sa gcad lnga pa'i lung brgyud ni /
khro phu lo tsA ba nas /
snye ba lo tsA ba rdo rje las rab rtsal /
bla ma dbon ston pa man dbang gi brgyud pa bzhin no / /
sa gcad drag ba'i lung gi brgyud pa ni /
khro phu lo tsA ba nas /
bla ma dbon ston pa /
zhang thugs rje brtson 'grus /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge man dbang brgyud dang gcig go /
! grub chen mi tra dzo ki'i thugs kyi bcud 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i bskyed rdzogs kyi rnal 'byor shin tu zab pa snying po don gsum du grags pa thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'khrid yig dga' ldan du bgrod pa'i tham skas la zhal shes snyan brgyud kyis brgyan pa'i nyams 'khrid dang /
lung la /
grub chen mi tra dzo kyis mdzad pa'i rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang /
'khrid yig dga' ldan du bgrod pa'i them skas dang bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa thugs rje chen po /
byang sems blo gros rin cen /
grub chen tai lo pa /
grub chen rol pa'i rdo rje /
grub chen mi tra dzo ki /
khro phu lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal /
bla chen bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu bsod nams seng ge /
de la bla ma yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge dang tshad ma'i skyes bu bsod nams mgon po gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
de nas khyud po lhas ba gzhon nu bsod nams /
thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa /
lcang rab mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang /
rje drung ba so chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs legs pa chos 'byor /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
lha btsun bsod nams dpal bzang /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha ba dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung ngag 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis zin bris su mdzad pa'i snying po don gsum gyi 'khrid yig gi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa yan gong ltar la /
de nas lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bo dong paN chen 'jigs med grags pa /
sngags rab 'byams 'jam dbyangs grags pa /
mon rdzong ras pa zla ba rgyal mtshan /
drin can mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags pa mchog byams pa skal bzang /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'khrid yig 'di la yi dam dang 'pho ba'i skor gnyis la gzhan du ma grags pa'i za ba gnad kyang 'ga' zhig snang bas de la dgongs te /
gzhan du yun ring lo zlar bsgoms pa bas / /
gang gsung cha shas thob pa'ang don che ba'i / /
yab gcig thugs rje can de'i gsung rnams kyi / /
snying po yid la gang zin bris pa yin / /
zhes pa @# / /
snang ngo / /
! gnyis ba lam rgyud dngos kyi skor /
slo ba bshad gser chos kyi skor ta gnyis /
pa rgyud dang bya rgyud sogs 'dres cung zad yod kyang ma rgyud shes che ba dang sde tshan gcig tu dgos pa'i dbang gis bkod do / /
dang po la /
shes rab kyi rgyud la sgo drug tu bzhugs pa las rigs drug cha mnyam bar ston pa dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog lha brgya dang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dpang phyug gis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'phrin las mtha' yas /
dkyil chog dga' don rtogs par sla zhing dngos grub 'byung ba /
zha lu pa nam mkha' 'od zer gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog mthong ba don ldan rnams la brten nas dbang bzhi rdzogs bar nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal kun tu bzang po /
rgyal ba rigs lnga /
gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje /
li tsA bI dri ma med pa /
rgyal po dza /
u pa rA dza /
grub chen ku ku rA dza /
mu ti ta nyi zla rdo rje /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig tu mu ti ta dang nyi zla rdo rje zhes so so dang /
ba hu ta dang mus to pa zhes so sor 'dug cing /
mkhyen brtse thar rtse sgrub bang pa shar ba gzhi'i gsan yig na dkyus bzhin snang ba brtag /
ba hu ta pu ti /
slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba /
bi mA la mi tra /
rma lo tsA ba rin cen mchog /
gye re mkhyen brtse thar rtse shar pa sgrub khang ba rnams kyi gsan yig tu chos skyong zer ba bdug kyang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig tu dkyus ltar byung ba gsang sngags rnying ma'i gsan yig tsho dang mthun /
mchog skyong /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis gas rmal thug cing 'ga 'om gyis gnyis gam zhus tshul 'dug pa rnying ma dang mthun /
tsu ru rin cen gzhon nu /
'go 'om tshul khrims byang chub /
de la cog ro rgyal ba'i yon tan /
stag rtse 'jam dpal /
la gsum gzhon nu mchog gsum gyis zhus /
gsum gal khu byang chub 'od /
de nas blo gros rgyal mtshan /
rog ban rin cen tshul khrims /
rong zom chos bzang /
yam shud blo chen mgo zla ba 'bar /
mgo zla 'bum grags /
mgo dngos grub rgyal mtshan /
mgo dge slong chos rdor /
mgo dngos grub mgon /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
se sdings pa chos sku 'od zer /
gru mi bskyod rdo rje /
byang chen mkhan po bsod nams 'phel /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul rgyal ba /
lam 'bras pa bsod nams dpal /
grub chen kun dga' blo gros /
chos rje nam mkha' tshul khrims /
rong ston blo bzang grags pa /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
slob dpon saM g+ha shrI /
slob dpon tshul khrims 'od zer /
slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
'jam dbyangs byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub pa mchog gi ded dpon dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mgon bo khra tshad pa blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rma lo tsA ba nas /
gnyag dz+nyA na ku mA ra /
khyung po dbyig 'od /
cog ro rgyal 'bum /
dam pa khu phro dpal gzhon /
de gsum la cog ro rgyal ba'i yon tan /
de nas yon tan bzang po /
cog ro byang chub 'byung gnas /
za ring 'phags pa /
rmugs byang chub snying po /
dmar sgom chen /
yon tan tshul khrims /
lce bsod nams bzang po /
'gar @# / /
ston tshul bzang /
yam shud blo chen man 'dra / /
! rnal 'byor dbang phyug lU ha pas sbyang gzhi sgong skyes sbyong byed ltar legs par bkal ba'i he ru ka'i rigs dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges mdzad? pa'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil chog rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis gsal byed khyad par bzhi ldan gsum la brten nas brgyud pa'i bka' babs dgu ldan gyi dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i bka' babs dang po sa lugs gyi brgyud pa ni /
ngor chen dang mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na bka' babs bdun las mi 'dug kyang jo bo lugs gnyis so sor ba grangs gnyos lugs bsnan pas dgu byung ngo / /
khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang /
dpal phyag na rdo rje /
bram ze chen po sa ra ha /
mda' bsnun /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
grub chen sha wa ri pa /
bag ro khur /
slob dpon lU hi pa /
d+ha ri ka pa /
bud med can /
rdo rje dril bu pa /
rus sbal zhabs /
kurma bA da /
shrI dzA lan d+ha ra /
nag po spyod pa /
gu hya pa /
rnam rgyal zhabs /
tai lo pa /
nA ro ta pa /
kun tu bzang po /
nam mkha'i snying po /
snyan grags bzang po /
ye shes dngos grub /
rtsa bshad pa rnams mtshan gyi rnam grangs su grags /
pham thing pa gcen 'jigs med grags pa /
gcung ngag gi dbang phyug /
klog skya shes rab brtsegs /
pradz+nya ku Da /
mal lo tsA ba blo gros grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
'u yug pa bsod nams seng ge /
dbus pa sangs rgyas 'bum /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
khyung po lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de nas khyab bdag he ru ga dpal mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na mus chen yan gong ltar la /
de la kun mkhyen go bor ba 'byams pa dang grub chen dkon cog blo gros gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen gyis gsan pa man gong ltar ro / /
yang na rje sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
'jam dbyangs dgon cog lhun grub /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse pa man 'dra /
yang na rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
'jam dbyangs sa lo /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
dmar chos rgyal /
mi nyag chos rgyal /
mi nyag rdor grags /
lce mdo sde seng ge /
ston shA ka /
lce blo ldan /
'phags 'od /
bu ston man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
bo dong rin po che /
khro phu rin po che /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
kun mkhyen bu man gong bzhin no / /
yang na sa paN nas /
bo dong rin po che /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan chul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan man gong bzhin no / /
yang na sa paN nas /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhad @# / /
dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa /
ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen man 'dra / /
bka' babs gnyis pa bskyed rim gtso bor ston pa'i bshad rgyud a b+hi d+ha na'i le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa nas gsungs pa'i mar do lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
bde mchog lU hi pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan lha bcu gsum ma'am bde mchog la ba pa'ang zer /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
lU hi pa /
D+heM ki pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu lU hi ba da 'di gnyis gcig bar mdzad 'dug /
paN grub dbang po la wa pa /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti /
ka tsa Ta pa /
bu ston dang rje btsun btsong ba pa'i gsan yig na ka ca pa rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na ka tsatra pa zhes snang /
grub chen dril bu pa /
rus sbal zhabs /
bu rje btsong kha pa ngor gong dkar thar rtse shar pa rnams kyi gsan yig na mi gsal yang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na snang ba brtag /
dzA lan+d+ha ri ba /
nag po spyod pa /
ku sha la nA tha /
bu dang gong dkar ba'i gsan yig tu 'di dang dge ba'i mgon po so sor 'dug pa rgya skad bod skad kyi khyad par las don gcig pas yig skyon shor ba 'dra ngor mkhyen brtse thar rtse shar ba sogs kyi gsan yig dang dkyus mthun /
tai lo pa nA ro pa /
man ka shrI dz+nyA na /
bu'i gsan yig nam na ka dang shrIdz+nyA na zhes 'dug pa yig skyon byung ngam snyam /
bal po b+ha dan+d+ha /
su ma ti kIrti dang gcig yin skad /
bu'i gsan yig na b+ha ran dang /
ngor chen gyi gsan yig tu b+ha tan zhes snang ba gcig la yig skyon byung 'dra /
lo tsA ba mar pa do pa chos kyi dbang phyug /
gze pa blo ldan seng ge /
gze pa bde mchog rdo rje /
rje btsun btsong kha pa rdo rje gdan pa thar rtse pa gsum gyi gsan yig tu jo bde zhes snang /
slob dpon khu pa /
khams pa lho tshad pa kun dga' rin cen /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
khyung lhas pa /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
rje sangs rin pa /
sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la thar rtse pa dang mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang dpal don pa /
de nas rtsa ba'i bla ma bka' 'gyur ba /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
grub chen la wa pa /
la ki mi pa /
'bar pa'i gtso bo /
dge ba'i gtso bo /
ku shal nA tha man gong ltar ro / /
yang na khyung lhas pa nas /
chos rje bkra shis rin cen /
ngor chen man 'dra /
yang na gze pa blo ldan nas /
gze pa don grub ye shes /
sa phug pa shAkya rdo rje /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan man 'dra / /
bka' babs gsum pa jo bo lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chad /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
grub chen lU hi pa /
slob dpon d+ha ri ka pa /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
rat+na A ka ra shAn+ti /
thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na 'di jo bo'i rjes su 'dug pa yig nor byung 'dra /
jo bo rje dpal ldan a ti sha /
rong pa 'gar dge /
dge bsnyen yin /
lha rje stod pa tshul khrims dpal /
sngags dkar /
steng pa thugs rje zla gsal /
rje btsun btsong kha pa dang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na steng shod zhal gnyis snang /
shod nyi ma kha dro /
gcen shes rab rgyal po /
'di gnyis kyi tshab tu rje btsun btsong kha pa dang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig tu rje che ba dang chung ba zhes pa 'dug cing zha lu tsan+d+ra ba'i gsan yig tu rje che chung gi 'og tu so so'i mtshan brgya ba bdug pa don la gcig pa 'dra /
gcung shes rab gtsug tor /
lha rje chen po d+harma tsakra /
sngags pa se bo /
thang @# / /
stod pa chos 'od /
rab byung se bo /
zhing chen pa grags pa dpal /
bod btsun grwa thar se bo /
bde gshegs dpal /
bod btsun /
bla ma sgom pa ye shes /
gyer bug pa sgom ye dang gcig pa 'dra /
bla ma grags chen /
btsun pa phyar bu ba /
bla ma 'phags 'od /
bu ston rin po che /
khyung lhas pa /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
sems dpa' chen po /
sangs rin pa /
sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la btsun ba /
thar rtse pa dang mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang ba /
rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
bka' babs bzhi pa kha che lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
tsakra saM wa ra /
badzra wa ra hI /
grub chen lU hi pa /
ri khrod zhabs /
'di gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chang dam dpyad /
kan+ta pa /
'dren mdzad zhabs /
bik+Sha ta de wa /
kha che paN chen shAkya shrI /
bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra /
g.yag sde lo tsA ba bsod nams bzang po /
mnga' ris ze dmar ba sangs rgyas ye shes /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa yan jo lugs dang 'dra /
yang na bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra nas /
mnga' ris pa sangs rgyas ye shes man 'dra /
yang na kha che paN chen nas /
spyi bo lhas pa seng ge dpal /
zhang phya ru pa /
'bro lung pa /
rin po che khro phu ba /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
bu ston man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
slob dpon dril bu pa /
d+ha ri ka pa /
dga' ba rdo rje /
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje /
a b+ha ya /
de wa pU r+Na /
kha che paN chen man 'dra / /
yang nye brgyud ni 'khor lo sdom pa /
paN tshan shAkya shrI man gong bzhin no / /
bka' babs lnga pa pu rang lo chung lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
grub chen lU hi pa /

d+ha ri ka pa /

gu hya pa /

rnam rgyal zhabs /
tai la pa /
nA ro ta pa /
man ka shrI pradz+nya rak+Shi ta /
pham thing pa gsum /
'jigs med grags pa /
ngag dbang grags pa /
b+ha ngan+ta /
pu rang lo chung grags mchog shes rab /
'di lus ma spangs pa mkha' spyod du byon pa yin /
dmar chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
mnga' ris kyi ston pa dkon cog 'bar /
thur la ba tshul khrims skyabs /
thang spe ba 'phags pa skyabs /
se sdings pa gzhon nu 'od /
bla ma chos sku 'od zer /
kun mkhyen 'phags 'od /
bu ston rin po che man jo bo lugs bzhin no / /
yang na dmar chos rgyal nas /
me nyag chos rgyal /
me nyag rdor grags /
lce mdo seng /
bla ma ston shAka /
blo ldan seng ge /
'phags 'od man 'dra /
yang na man ka dang pradz+nya rak+Shi ta gnyis la ka na ka shrIsa gsan /
de dang pham thing pa gnyis ka la b+ha dan+ta /
de nas pu rang lo chung man bshad ma thag pa ltar ro / /
bka' babs drug pa mar lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
gsan yig tshor 'di bzhin 'dug kyang mar lo sogs ma byung bas dmar lugs zer rgya yin nam dpyad /
pham thing pa yan sa lugs dang 'dra ba la /
de nas bal po b+ha dan+ta /
lo chung gags mchog shes rab /
dmar chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
dbon po shes rab rdo rje /
thub pa shes rab /
brtson 'grus rdo rje /
dmar chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
bla ma shAkya gzhon nu /
lce blo ldan seng ge /
bla ma 'phags 'od /
kun mkhyen bu ston @# / /
man jo lugs dang 'dra / /
bka' babs bdun pa dpyal lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
grub chen lU hi pa /
rgyal po d+ha ri ka pa /
mnga' bdag mai tri pa /
n+ya ka pa /
kan+d+ha pa /
bik+Sha ta de wa /
paN chen shAkya shrI /
grub thob rdo rje gdan pa /
paN+Di ta k+Shi ti gar+b+ha /
dpyal lo tsA ba chos bzang /
rgwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
de sras shes rab seng ge /
gru ma chos skyong dpal /
khyung po lhas pa man jo bo lugs bzhin no / /
bka' babs brgyad pa spal? slang sna lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na 'di jo lugs brgyud pa'i rnam grangs su mdzad 'dug cing thar rtse shar ba'i gsan yig na dkyus bzhin du so sor snang /
sangs rgyas /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
slob dpon chen po tsaN+Di ka pa /
bram ze chen po me ko pa /
slob dpon lU hi pa /
d+ha ri ka pa /
bram ze sdom pa bzang po /
jo bo rje a ti sha /
de la lo chen rin cen bzang po dang nag tsho lo tsA ba gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la 'phan yul 'al pa ston mgon dang 'al pa jo btsun gnyis kyis gsan /
de gnyis la sgom pa mang sgom /
'phan yul rgyal pa /
spal spang sna pa /
'di gnyis sku mched yin /
me reg dar ma byang chub /
spong zho brag nag pa /
de dpon rin cen rgyal po /
bla ma don ri ba grags pa dpal /
bong btsun phyar bu ga bla ma 'phags /
'od /
kun mkhyen bu ston man jo lugs sngags dkar lcang lo can /
bzhin no / /
bka' drang srong srin po ri pa /
babs dgu pa gnyis lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig tu 'da'i rjes su nag po ba 'dug /
gu hya pa /
rnam rgyal zhabs /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
de la rak+Shi ta /
nag po lha las dad pa /
pham thing pa ste gsum gyis gsan /
gsum ka la bal po b+ha dan+ta /
de nas nag po lha las dad pa'i slob ma /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na'ang mtshan gsal mi 'dug /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na b+ha dan+ta dang lha las dang pa gnyis ka la gnyos lo tsA bas gsan tshul snang ba dag par mngon /
gnyos lo tsA ba /
gnyos bla ma /
gnyos dpal le /
phug ka ba dza tho 'bum /
gtsang pa lha steng pa /
lce mdo sde seng ge /
bla ma ston shAka /
bod btsun /
bla ma blo ldan /
sngags dkar lcang lo can /
bla ma 'phags 'od man jo lugs dang 'dra / /
kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lU hi pa'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bzhi ldan gyi sngags dkar lcang lo can /
brgyud pa ni /
chos rje yab sras /
nam mkha'i mtshan can /
tsan+d+ra shrI /
tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab rje /
byang gling rin rgyan /
don grub rgyal mtshan /
bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
kun dga' bkra shis /
slob dpon dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma zha lu pa chen po /
nges bdag la'o / /
! dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi zab don grub pa'i khyu mchog dpal ldan spyod pa'i rdo rje brtul zhugs pa'i zhabs kyis spyang gzhi mngal skyes ltar sbyong byed du bkral ba'i bde mchog lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge dang zha lu pa sangs rgyas dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs /
rje btsun rin po che'i dkyil chog /
de'i gsal byed ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa rnams la brten nas dbang bzhi legs par no sa pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan mig na phyag rdor /
sa ra ha /
klu sgrub /
sha wa ri /
lU hi la /
d+ha ri ka pa /
dril bu pa zhes byung ba ring brgyud yin 'dra /
grub chen dril @# / /
bu pa /
rus sbal zhabs /
shrI dzA lan+d+ha ra /
grub chen spyod pa'i rdo rje /
nag po par grags pa gsum byon te /
nag po spyod pa ba /
nag po dam tshig rdo rje /
nag po lha las pa dad pa gsum gyi dang po gnyis la nag po pa che ba dang chung bar grags pa las 'di nag po pa che ba kah+na pa ste spyad pa bar grags so / /
slob dpon gu hya pa /
rnam par rgyal ba'i zhabs /
tai lo pa /
paN chen nA ro pa /
pha mthing pa gcen 'jigs med grags pa /
gcung ngag gi dbang phyug /
klog skya shes rab brtsegs /
mal lo tsA ba blo gros grags /
sngags pa gos dkar can /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
chos rje paN chen /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
rgyal ba brag phug pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
chos rje gzhon nu seng ge /
rdul tshon gyi brgyud pa 'di man nas byung skad /
rje sangs rgyas dpal grub /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
de nas rtsa ba'i bla ma rigs kun khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
khwa char ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rje sangs rgyas dpal grub man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus pa grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
rje btsun sangs rgyas rin cen /
rje lha mchog seng ge man gong ltar ro / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros man 'dra /
yang na rje sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
chos rje dge legs bshes gnyen /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
stag ston shes rab gzhon nu /
bla ma brag dkar ba /
mkhas grub gzhon nu bsod nams /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan man 'dra / /
bu ston rin po che'i gsan yig dang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses tshar chen dang grol mchog la gsan pa tshang mar rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su grub chen dril bu pa 'dug na'ang /
ngor chen rdo rje gdan pa thar rtse sgrub khang shar pa khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba rnams kyi gsan yig ltar na /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
sa ra ha /
klu sgrub /
sha wa ri pa /
lU hi pa /
d+ha ri ka pa /
dril bu pa man mthun pa 'di bzhin no / /
! grub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje dril bu pas legs par bkral ba'i 'khor lo sdom pa zab don dril bu pa phyi'i dkyil ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zha lu pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i dkyil chog gi steng nas dbang bzhi legs par nos pa'i bka' babs dang po sa lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pa /
rus sbal zhabs /
'bar ba 'dzin /
kah+na pa /
gu hya pa /
