tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
pha mthing pa sku mched /
klog skya shes rab brtsegs /
mal gyo lo tsA ba blo gros grags /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun chen po /
sa paN+Di ta /
@# / /
'phags pa rin po che /
khro pu rin po che /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
khyud lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams /
mkhas pa nor bzang rin cen /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
ljil mig pa bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
lha bo pa kun dga' don grub /
slob dpon bsod nams dpal 'byor /
byang gling rje bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
grang chen pa dpal ldan chos bzang /
chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na bu ston rin po che nas /
thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal /
rje kun dga' rin cen /
gzad rin pa /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
bla ma yon tan rgya mtsho /
bla ma shAkya kun dga' /
kun bzang rtse pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
paN chen bsod nams mchog ldan /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na thugs sras rin cen rnam rgyal nas /
shangs pa shes rab dpal bzang /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
gnas rnying pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
gnas rnying pa grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rje blo gros mtha' yas /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na shes rab dpal bzang nas /
dge legs dpal bzang /
mthu chen legs rgyan /
rgya ma ba rin cen rgyal mtshan /
nyan shAka pa /
chen po yon tan bshes gnyan /
chen po blo gros rnam rgyal /
shar pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
bo dong rin cen brtson 'grus /
khro phu rin po che man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
tshogs sgom pa /
khro phu ba man 'dra / /
bka' babs gnyis pa mar do lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
dril bu pa /
lang+ka ling pa /
nag po spyod pa /
dge ba'i mgon po /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
ma Na ka shrI /
ka Na ka shrI /
pham thing pa 'jigs med grags pa /
bal po b+ha dan+ta /
sum ti kIrti yang zer /
mar do lo tsA ba chos kyi dbang phyug /
sngags pa gos dkar can /
gze pa blo ldan seng ge /
gze pa bde mchog rdo rje /
shAkya rdo rje /
rong pa chos mgon /
lo mchog pa /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa man 'dra / /
thugs sras rin po ches mdzad pa'i dril bu lha lnga'i sgrub thabs yid kyi mun sel dang dkyil chog gnyis kyi brgyud pa ni /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
dbang rnon /
tsan+d+ra shrI /
'khrul zhig rje /
rin cen mchog grub /
byang gling rin rgyal /
'brog sgang pa /
'jam dbyangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
gro bo lung pa /
slob dpon dkon rgyan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
sgrub dkyil gnyis kyi lhan thabs byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
byang gling rje man gong bzhin no / /
! slob dpen dril bu ba'i bzhed srol dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lus kyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i dkyil chog zab don gsal ba la brten nas dbang bzhi legs par nos pa'i bka' babs gnyis ldan gyi dang po @# / /
sa lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
yum rdo rje phag mo /
grub chen rdo rje dril bu ba /
rab byung gi mtshan blo gros snying po /
kurma pA da /
'bar ba 'dzin pa /
kar+Na pa /
gu hya pa /
rnam rgyal zhabs /
te lo pa /
paN chen nA ro pa /
gcen 'jigs med grags pa /
gcung ngag gi dbang phyug /
klog skya shes rab brtsegs /
mal lo tsA ba blo gros grags /
rje btsun kun dga' snying po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
bla ma rje btsun chen po /
chos rje paN+Di ta /
'gro ba'i mgon po chos rgyal 'phags pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
bag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
de la thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
de nas rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na rje sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
ngor chen sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN chen /
glo bo mkhan chen legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
'jam dbyangs sa skya lo tsA ba /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge man 'dra /
yang na sa paN la /
'phags pa rin po che /
tshogs sgom rin po che /
bo dong rin po che gsum gyis gsan /
de gsum ka la khro phu rin po che bsod nams seng ges gsan /
de la bla ma dpal ldan seng ge dang yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge gnyis kyis gsan /
de gsum ga la thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin cen grub /
de nas khyung po lhas gzhon nu bsod nams /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na khyud lhas pa la /
mkhas grub nar bzang rin cen /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhan chen rigs 'dzin rgyal po /
lcags sgag lung pa bkra shis dpal 'byor /
tshar chen gyi ku su lu'i bla ma lam du mjal gsung ba de yin /
byang gling pa rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na byang gling rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan nas /
grang chen slob dpon dpal ldan chos bzang /
rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
bka' babs gnyis pa kha che lugs kyi brgyud pa ni /
badzra d+ha ra /
badzra wA ra hI /
badzra g+haN+Da pa /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na bar 'dir d+ha ri ka pa snang bas chad dam brtag /
dga' ba'i rdo rje /
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje /
a b+ha yA kA ra gup+ta /
de wa pUr+Na /
paN chen shAkya shrI /
sbyi bo lhas pa seng ge dpal /
zhang phya ru ba /
byang sems 'bre lung pa /
thar rtse pa dang shar pa'i gsan yig na zhang 'bre lung pa zhas 'di dang gong ma gnyis bla ma gcig tu mdzad 'dug kyang bu ston dang mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig tu dkyus ltar so sor snang ngo /
khro phu rin po che /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston man 'dra / /
thung brgyud ni /
rdo rje dril bu pa /
de wa pUr+Na /
kha che paN chen man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
'khor @# / /
lo sdom pa /
kha che paN chen man gong bzhin no / /
! kun mkhyen bus mdzad pa'i lus dkyil dbang chag gi lung ni /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
sgra tshad pa rin cen rnam rgyal /
mkhas pa nor bzang rin cen /
dka' bzhi 'dzin pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
mkhyen rab chos rje /
bla ma dbon rgyal ba /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling ba bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
drung kun dka' bkra shis /
bla ma dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo dang mthun par bshad pa mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho lha stong dang lnga brgya zhe lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub rin po che'i mdzod /
des mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan rin po che'i mdzod /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na lha stong phrag gcig brgya phrag dgu brgyad kyi lhag pa'i bcu phrag gcig yod par bshad cing /
lo ba'i gsan yig na stong dang bdun brgya zhes snang ngo / /
zha lu byang gling pa rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs gsang ba'i mdzod kyi sgo 'byed lnga mig /
sngags 'phreng ngor chen gyis zhus dag mdzad pa rnams la brten nas dbang bzhi legs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang /
yum rdo rje phag mo /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs /
byang sems blo gros rin cen /
grub chen sha wa ri pa /
mnga' bdag mai tri gup+ta /
rgya gar phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon ka mA la badzra /
paN grub dza ya se na /
sum pa lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan /
rje btsun chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sa paN+Di ta /
rin po che skyob pa dpal /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
bag ston gzhon nu chul khrims /
bla ma tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
bla ma ngag gi dbang phyug /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub gung ru sher bzang /
kun mkhyen go ram pa bsod nams seng ge /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
zha lu dang dpal 'khor chos sde'i gdan sa pa /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa jo nang mkhan po /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
zha lu'i mkhan po /
rgyud sde'i mnga' bdag zha lu pa rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
mnga' ris pa rin 'byung /
tshul khrims rin cen /
rang byung rdo rje /
'dzam gling paN+Di ta /
bla ma a mo g+ha pa /
gzad pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
blag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
rje rnam rgyal rin cen /
bla ma shAkya kun dga' /
bla chen ye shes dbang po /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
rtsa ba'i bla ma bka' 'gyur ba /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
rdo rje gdan pa /
d+ha byang chub sems dpa' /
a b+h+ya ka ra /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na a b+h+ya rak+Shi ta zhes gcig tu bsdoms 'dug kyang gong dkar ba dang thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na dkyus ltar snang ngo / /
rat+na rak+Shi @# / /
ta /
paN grub dza la sen /
sum pa lo tsA ba man gong ltar ro / /
yang na sum la lo tsA ba nas /
mkhas pa sa mu dra /
seng ge rgyal mtshan /
lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan /
dor chen dang thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na grags pa dpal zhes pa dkyus su bris par rdo rje yin nam 'di ma dag zer ba'i mtshan 'dug kyang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang ngo /
bag ston gzhon tshul man 'dra /
yang na bag ston nas /
bla ma tshul rgyal ba /
bla ma bde legs pa /
de la tshal min bsod nams bzang bo dang gnas rnying rin cen rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la mkhan chen seng ge dpal /
de nas brag thog pa man 'dra /
yang na su ma pa lo tsA ba nas /
rgya thams cad mkhyen pa /
srin po ri pa /
bsgrad ston rdo rje dpal /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na sgrag ston zhes snang /
mtshur bu ba tshul khrims rin cen /
rje rang byung rdo rje /
snye mdo kun dga' don grub /
bsod nams 'od zer /
ga ston gzhon tshul man gong bzhin no / /
yang na rang byung rdo rje nas /
yor pa ye shes dpal /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
padma badzra che chung gnyis /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
lcam lak+Sh+mA ka ra /
tai lo pa /
nA ro ba /
rdo rje gdan pa /
a b+h+ya ka ra /
rat+na shrI /
rgyal ba'i sde /
sum pa lo tsA ba /
rje btsun grags pa /
sa paN /
skyob pa dpal man 'dra /
yang na sum pa lo tsA ba /
sgang dar snying /
gnyan ras /
ak+Sho b+h+ya badzra /
sgom pa shes rab /
bde ba can ye shes mgon po /
bsam gtan grub /
bla ma gzhon nu rgyal mtshan /
'dzam gling paN+Di ta man 'dra / /
! gu ge paN chen gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'phrin las mtha' yas dang dbang chog bdud rtsi gang+gA'i klung rgyun gnyis kyi steng nas dpal 'khor lo sdom pa bong zhal can lha so bdun gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi legs par nos pa'i ring brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
mkha' 'gro ma /
'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa /
a nus mar k+Shi ta /
dar+pa Na Atsar+ya /
kun tu bzang po /
ye shes kyi klog /
dpal yid kyi 'gram pa /
'jam dbal bzang po /
dpal bzang /
chos kyi klog bzang po /
yid 'tsho ba bzang po /
ngag gi dpal bzang /
dpal rnam rgyal bzang bo /
dpal myos byed bzang po'i zhabs /
dpal phun tshogs bzang bo'i zhabs /
nam mkha' bzang po /
rgyal ba'i 'tshab bzang po /
dpal 'phrog byed bzang po'i zhabs /
ye rang paN+Di ta skal ldan bzang po /
skye rgu kun dga'i 'tsho ba bzang po /
de sras bal po ma hA bo d+hi /
bla ma bsam gtan 'od zer /
paN+Di ta grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan chen legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
'jam dbyangs sa lo kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
ngor chen sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+da la stsal to / /
nye brgyud ni /
grub chen bsam gtan 'od zer gyis dbang gsan pa'i tshe brgyud pa zhus pas ngas a pa /
de'i a pas tsakra saM wa ra dang yo gi gnyis la thob gsung ba ltar /
bde mchog yab yum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa sha stag gi nya brgyud ni /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa /
yum rdo rje @# / /
phag mo /
pal? bo ye rang gi paN+Di ta skal ldan bzang po man gong /
zhin no / /
ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dang byin rlabs kyi yi ge'i steng nas kha che paN chen gyi thugs dam bzhi'i nang tshan bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sngom pa dkar po lhan cig skyes pa'i byin rlabs /
bde mchog dkar po la brten nas byang chub bsgrub ba /
'jam dkar la brten nas shes rab bsgrub pa /
yang dag me gcig thod gcig la brten nas ngas thub pa /
dzam+b+ha la nag po la brten nas nor bsgrub pa'o / /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brten gyis mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig byang chub sgrub pa'i nye lam grub pa'i zhal lung la brten nas bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid zab mo smin rgyas /
zhar byung tshe sgrub kyi 'khrid dang bcas pa rnams thob pa'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang rdo rje phag mo /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug lU hi pa /
da ri ka pa /
mai tri pa /
na ya ka pa /
kan+d+ha pa /
kha che'i paN chen shAkya shrI /
dpyal chos kyi bzang po /
dbyal a mo g+ha /
rje btsun rgwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
de sras shes rab seng ge /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims bla ma tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
thugs sras klu dbang gling pa /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na kha che paN chen nas /
sa paN+Di ta /
g.yag sde lo tsA ba bsod nams bzang po /
grub chen ze dmar ba sangs rgyas ye shes /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen grags pa tshul khrims /
bya sder bya byang chub seng ge /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
dpal ldan kun dga' grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN+Di ta /
glo bo mkhan chen legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
rje grol mchog man gong bzhin no / /
byang chub sgrub pa dang tshe sgrub pa'i nyams 'khrid rje dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gi lung dang bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ngor chen nas /
mus chen 'khor lo sngom pa /
chos rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
rje byams pa chos legs /
'khrul zhig byams ba shes rab bzang po /
khrag 'thung tshogs kyi dbang phyug tshar ba chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
bo dong mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rigs kun bdag po dbang phyug rab brtan /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la stsal to / /
nye brgyud ni /
rdo rje phag mo /
kha che paN chen man dbang 'khrid thams cad la 'dra / /
! rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug byang pa ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po la gser chos gsum gyi bka' babs ba'i tshe dpag med ni ayon chen pos dngos su gnang bas gsang sngags rnying ma bka' mar gtogs la /
'dir zhor ras pas @# / /
mdzad pa'i dbang chog snying mo bsdus pa'i steng nas bde mchog lha lnga'i byin rlabs dang /
'bri gung mkhan chen rnam mgon dri med sdes mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig grub pa'i mchog sbyin gyi steng nas zab mo ni gu chos drug gi thabs lam bde drod rang 'bar gyi nyams 'khrid mjug tu rlung la dor ba dang gser chos gsum pa 'pho ba 'jag tshugs ma dang bcas pa smin rgyas su nor pa'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ni gu ma /
mkhas grub khyud po rnal 'byor /
rmog cog pa rin cen brtson 'grus /
skyer sgang pa chos kyi seng ge /
gnyan ston chos kyi shes rab /
sangs rgyas ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge /
bsam sdings pa gzhon nu grub /
zhang ston pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug pa brtag mkhas bcun lho pa /
nyang stod bsam sdings kyi bla ma sku mched gsum /
sbrul sku blo gros dpal ba /
'di gong dkar lugs kyi brgyud yin na mi 'dug kyang mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na bla ma sku mched gsum mi 'dug pa de'i gras shig yin nam brtag /
'jam dbyangs chos dpal bzang po /
mus chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rgyal sras byams mgon pa /
bo dong paN chen phyogs las rnam rgyal /
ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa /
'jam dbyangs byang chub dbang rgyal /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje /
bla ma lha dbang 'phrin las /
mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
'jam dbyangs dge ba'i dbang po /
rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ras chen pa nas /
'jam dbyangs byang chub dbang rgyal man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ni gu mas spo ba la kong lung du ras chen dpal 'bor bzang po la dngos su gnang /
de man gong bzhin no / /
! 'pho ba 'jag tshugs ma'i nyams 'khrid kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
mkha' 'gro ma ni gu /
ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po /
mkhas grub pa bral chos rje /
mtshungs med bsam gtan gling pa /
mkhan chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
ras chung rnam sprul bkra shis rgya mtsho /
rigs 'dzin kun dga' tshe mchog /
mtshungs med ngag dbang ye shes grub pa /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o /
rigs 'dzin rat+na gling pa'i gter lung du / /
rdo rje rgyal mtshan gsung gi sprul pa gcigH. bsod nams rgyal mtshan phag gru'i nang nas 'byungH bka' brgyud bstan 'dzin bod 'bangs yongs kyi phaH. zhes lung gis zin pa'i spyan snga chos kyi rgyal po lha gzigs ras pas mdzad pa'i nA ro chos drug gi 'khrid yig chen mo'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
spyan snga bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'brog shar smad pa rat+na b+ha dra /
mkhan chen shar smad pa bsod nams bkra shis /
brag thog thams cad mkhyen ba /
grub chen g.yang hril rgyal mtshan don grub /
mkhan chen dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan /
mnga' ris drud pa rin po che lha btsun bsod nams dpal bzang /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
gye re lha btsun lha dbang rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha ba dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! @# / /
tshar pa chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga pad dkar bzhad pa'i 'phreng ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga'i steng nas dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las gsungs pa'i tshe dang ga med lha gcig bum gcig tshe gzan la brten pa'i dbang bzhi byin rlabs kyi tshul du thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mgon po tshe dpag mad /
ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo /
ti phu gsang sngags sdong po /
rdze ras chud rdo rje grags pa /
mi la bzhad pa rdo rje /
mnyam med zla 'od gzhon nu /
bde gshegs khams pa rdor rgyal /
'bri gung 'jig rten gsum mgon /
spyan snga chos kyi rgyal po grags pa 'byung gnas /
yang dgon pa thugs kyi rdo rje /
thugs sras spyan snga rigs ldan /
zur phug pa rin cen dpal bzang /
'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
grub chen rin cen 'phel /
zha lu mkhan chen 'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dpal dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs kun khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug la /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chad bsod nams chos 'phal /
zha lu byang gling pa rin cen bkra shis rgyal mtshan gsum gyis gsan /
tshar chen sogs yab sras lnga ga la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis gsan pa man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen nas /
gnyan ston sprul ba'i zlos gar mkhan chen gzhon nu blo gros /
rje dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na char chen nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
skyed chal mkhan chen thar pa rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang rab nas /
zha lu pa dge 'dun dpal bzang /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
'jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal po /
shangs dkar ba rin cen rgyal mtshan /
pha rgod bsod nams bzang po /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po man 'dra /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
chos rje bde legs rin cen /
lha ? rtogs ldan yang zer /
gnas rnying pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa kun dga' dpal bzang /
chos rje rin cen rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje man 'dra /
yang na rdo ring rin po che /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
yab sras gnyis ka la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses gsan pa man gong ltar ro / /
yang na sgo rum pa nas /
de dbon sgo rum pa ngag dbang bstan pa'i rdo rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na mkhyen rab rje nas /
sku zhang bsod nams mchog grub /
byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na rje sgo rum pa dang tshar chen gnyis la mnga' ris ru thog @# / /
pa nam mkha' gzi brjid /
de nas kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na ras chung ba nas /
sum pa seng ge dpal /
lo ston kun dga' dar /
gling ras pa padma rdo rje na rim par brgyud de /
rtses dang sman tshul khang ba slob dpon bkra shis dar /
dgung lo brgya lhag bzhes pa yin /
rje btsun rdo ring pa man 'dra /
yang na skyas mchag 'ba' ra ba nas /
g.yag sde kha rag ri ba sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
'bri gung lo tsA ba nam mkha' grags /
mnyam med sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rje rin cen rnam rgyal /
paN chen gzhung lugs 'bum phrag brgya pa dngos grub dpal 'bar /
chos 'khor lhun po'i mkhan bo /
bla chen nam mkha' gzi brjid man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po nas /
rje kun dga' grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen pa rtse man 'dra /
yang na lha do rtogs ldan bde legs rin cen nas /
dbum chos shes bzang po /
dge slong dpal mgon pa /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor pa lha mchog seng ge /
grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na 'ba' rab nas /
gnyan ras nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
karma pa chos grags rgya mtsho /
tre bo chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rje bcun kun dga' grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun grol mchog nas /
gser mdog can gyi mkhan po 'bum ram pa dge 'dun nyi ma /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa kun dga' dpal yan gong ltar la /
dbu ma pa dpal ldan bzang po /
drin can dpal ldan mgon po /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
bdag chen 'jam dpal dbyangs ngag gi dbang phyug /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na 'ba' ri ba nas /
mus chen nam mkha'i rnal 'byor /
gal ga mi pham chos kyi bla ma /
rong ston shes bya kun rig /
lha 'bri shes rab rdo rje /
mi nyag grags pa rdo rje /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug man gong ltar ro / /
yang na 'ba' rab na /
grub chen rin cen bzang pa /
lung mang po chos grags dpal bzang /
mkhan chen zla ba blo gros /
skyes mchog tshangs pa rgyal mtshan /
mal gro grub chen blo gros dpal ldan /
chos lung mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun grub rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
klong mkhar ba kun dga' shes rab /
mon rtse pa kun dga' dpal /
gri byang chub sdings pa kun dga' dpal /
de'i gdan sa nga byang chub dpal /
mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun grub man gong bzhin no / /
yang na ras chud pa nas /
gru ston rdo rje 'od /
chag dgra bcom /
chag lo chos rje dpal /
bla brang steng pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po /
rgyal sras blo bzang dpal 'byor /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na ras chung pa nas /
sum pa seng ge dpal /
lo ston kun dga' dar /
gling ras padma rdo rje /
grum ston dar ma shes rab /
sprag phug pa shes rab dpal /
grub thob legs ldan 'od /
rje btsun dpal chen bzang po man 'dra /
yang na gangs khrod pa kun dga' dpal bzang nas /
mus chen dpal ldan mgon po /
chos rje nyi zla seng ge /
yol mo sprul sku shAkya bzang po /
bkra bzang @# / /
sngags 'chang chos skyong bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse min 'dra /
yang na chag lo gsum pa nas /
thugs sras don yod dpal /
rin po che bshes gnyen bkra shis /
grub brnyes sdom brtson chos kyi 'byung gnas ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra / /
yang nye brgyud ni /
che dpag med /
rje btsun mi la ras pa /
chos rje ye shes dpal bzang man gong bzhin no / /
yang na ras chud pa nas /
mnga' ris pa byang chub rdo rje /
bla ma kun dga' shes rab /
bzang yul ba rin cen ldan /
'gro mgon ston pa /
mkhas grub gzhon nu grub /
bla ma byang chub shes rab /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'khrul zhig grags pa tshul khrims /
mnyam med rgyal ba bzang po /
rje bkra shis ye shes /
bla ma tshul khrims dbang phyug /
rje bshes gnyen bkra shis /
bla ma ngag dbang rnam rgyal man 'dra /
yang na ras chung pa nas /
dgung lo bya gnyis pa /
'gos ri khrod dbang phyug /
dgung lo gya brgyad /
gnyan sgom rgyal pa seng ge /
dgung lo go drug byang chub gling pa /
dgung lo go gnyis /
slob dpon dge'u pa /
dgung lo gya drug /
'don pa ba dbang phyug brtson 'grus /
dgung lo gong gu /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa /
mkhan chen mchims /
mkhas grub gzhon nu grub man 'dra /
yang na 'gos ri khrod dang nga phyug nas /
yar klungs kyi gnya ga dmar po /
rje btsun yon tan bzang po /
rig pa 'dzin pa gnyes a seng /
gan pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
bla ma rnam rgyal dpal bzang mkhan chen dpal 'byor ba /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
phun tshogs gling pa rnam rgyal rin cen /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang char pa chos rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na gan pa rin rgyal nas /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
brag thog pa man 'dra /
yang na ras chung pa nas /
mnga' ris ba byang chub rdo rje /
gru 'thob rgyal tsha mgon po /
bla ma bzang yal ba /
sangs rgyas ston pa /
rin cen seng ge /
slob dpon lha gzhon /
mkhan chen dang ma ba /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa man 'dra /
yang na kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa nas /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
bla ma shAkya kun dga' /
kun bzang rtse ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na nyi ma gling pa nas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
de la kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol dang khyab bdag zha lu pa gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la bdag gis zhus so / /
yang na 'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang yan gong ltar la /
de nas skyes mchog Anan+da pa /
chos rje dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan /
yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
chos rje yon tan mchog /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
gye re lha btsun lha dbang rgya mtsho /
de gnyis ka la 'khon ston rdo rje 'chang dpal 'byor lhun grub /
de nas zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag la stsal to / /
yang na thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho nas /
@# / /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho man gong ltar ro / /
yang na thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho nas /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa man 'dra /
yang na gangs can pa kun dga' dpal bzang yan gong ltar la /
de nas 'brong rtse lha btsun rin cen rgya mtsho blo gros /
grub chen ngag dbang blo gros /
mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na yang dgon pa thugs kyi rdo rje nas /
mkhan po rin cen rdo rje /
sprul sku bsod nams rin cen /
byang sems khyung dkar ba chen po /
ri pa dkon chog 'byung gnas /
bla ma smon lam snying po /
mkhas bcun chos dpal mgon po /
ri khrod pa seng ge dpal bzang /
paN chen ngo mtshar rgya mtsho /
mar ston sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rin cen man gong ltar ro /
yang na 'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang nas /
chos rje shes rab dpal /
bla ma tshul khrims dpal bzang /
rje rin cen bshes gnyen /
mtshungs med sangs rgyas rgya mtsho /
rje skyabs mchog dpal /
rje blo bzang don grub /
dben sa bla ma sangs rgyas ye shes /
mkhan rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje bsod nams rgya mtsho nas /
khri rin po che rgyal khang rtse pa /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog chos 'phel /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dbu ma pa dpal ldan bzang po nas /
rje dpal ldan mgon po /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtse gdong khri chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang nas /
de dpon nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang nas /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar pa shes rab 'byung gnas /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje sangs rgyas seng ge nas /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis man 'dra /
yang na rje sangs rgya rin cen nas /
'jam dbyangs sa skya lo tsA ba /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje dkon chog dpal ldan /
shar chen man 'dra /
yang na mi nyag grags pa rdo rje yan sngar ltar la /
de nas 'jam dbyangs sa lo man 'dra /
yang na sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje nas /
sku zhang bsod nams mchog grub /
sku zhang rin cen bkra shis bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang tshang ldan 'dis rdzogs /
ri sbug dbu mdzad rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
brgyud lugs gcig la /
chos sku snang ba mtha' yas /
longs sku thugs rje chen po /
sprul sku padma 'byung gnas /
ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo man 'dra / /
! byin rlabs kyi cho ga pad dkar bzhad pa'i 'phreng ba'i lung ni /
'di spyan gzhwa dmar ba thams cad mkhyen pa chos kyi grags pa dang rdo rje 'chang rdzogs ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis gyi gsan yig na 'dug cing /
lha lcam mnad rab la rgya gar du dus ring mo zhig nas ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mor grags zhes gsung ngo / /
tshar chen nas /
mkhyen brtse'i @# / /
zhabs /
mkhan chen bslab gsum pa / /
rje dbang rab man 'dra / /
char chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung rgyun 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis zin bris su mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig bdud rtsi zil dngar gyi steng nas bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la brten nas che bsrid ba'i nyams 'khrid zab mo smin rgyas dang 'khrid yig gi lung bcas nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang yan sngar ltar la /
de nas grub chen rin cen 'phal /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhas grub rdo ring pa kun bzang chos kyi nyi ma /
rdo rje 'chang char chen blo gsal rgya mtsho /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags mchog byams bskal ldan bzang bo /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
bka' drin mnyam med gnas gsar ba 'khor lo'i mgon pa bsod nams mchog ldan gyis bdag za hor ban+de la rgyal khab chen po po ta la'i rang byung 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gcug lag khang du zab chos kun gyi thog mar stsal to / /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
bya bral ri khrod ras chen /
'jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal bo /
shangs dkar ba rin cen rgyal mtshan /
pha rgod bsod nams bzang po /
rdo ring rin pa che man 'dra / /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'khrid kyi brgyud pa 'di la thugs gcigs che ba 'dra zhig snang yang /
deng sangs brgyud pa gang ma rang shas cher 'dren par mdzad do / /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
g.yag sde sangs rgya rgyal mtshan /
'bri gung lo tsA ba nam mkha' grags pa /
rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
bla ma nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med rin cen rnam rgyal /
paN chen dngos grub dpal 'bar /
bla chen nam mkha' gzi brjid /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra / /
grub chen 'ba' ra bas mdzad pa'i tshe 'khrid rin cen gter mdzod kyi lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan yan nyams 'khrid kyi brgyud pa ltar la /
de nas khyab bdag rin chen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang des mdzad pa'i che dbang gi cho ga'i lung brgyud ni /
kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa kun dga' dpal bzang yan sngar ltar la /
de nas rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas bkra shis /
grub chen byams pa chos kyi rin cen /
dran chog sangs rgyas mgan pa /
mtshungs med nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
dar rgyas rdzong pa byams pa ye shes 'byung gnas /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas bkra shis /
sgye chu mkhan chen byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin chen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje nas /
'jig rten mig gcig zha lu lo tsA ba chos skyong bzang po /
bzang ldan mkhan chen byams pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na spyan snga rags ldan pa nas /
chos rje brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan /
gnyags ston dkon cog byang chub /
byang sems smon lam snying po /
mkhan chen gzhon nu grub /
mtsho bo brag kha ba blo gros brtan pa /
bzang ldan mkhan chen sangs rgyas bzang pa /
mkhan pa byams pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas man 'dra /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
g.yag ston sangs rgyas dpal /
mkhas grub gzhon nu @# / /
seng ge /
brag dkar sems dpa' chen po kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
de dbon A nan+da d+h+wa dza /
rgyud gsum smra ba shes rab rin cen /
sa lung chos sde'i mkhan po /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na grub chen byams pa chos rin nas /
dpon chen brtson 'grus rgya mtsho /
grub chen chos rgyal dpal 'byor /
mkhas grub bzang po rgyal mtshan /
grub dbang byams pa sangs rgyas don grub /
sngon gyi skye ba dran pa'i mngon shes dang mkha' la 'phur ba /
brag la 'dam ltar zhabs rjes 'jog ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' bar grags /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas bkra shis man 'dra /
yang na byams pa sangs rgyas don grub la /
ngar rgyas rdzong ba byams pa ye 'byung /
thugs sras brtson 'grus 'od zer gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas bkra shis kyis gsan pa man 'dra / /
! mkhyen rab rjes mdzad pa'i tshe 'khrid rin cen gter mdzod kyi rgyun khyer nyams len bde chen gter mdzod kyi lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
bla ma dpon rgyal ba /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
dbu mdzad rgyal mtshan bzang po /
dbu mdzad rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! rong ston chen po la ti phu pas dngos su gnang ba'i tshe sgrub zhag bdun ma'i nyams len zab mo'i gdams pa tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos gsal bar bkod pa'i 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bcud len dang brgyud 'debs dngos grub mchog stsol gyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med /
ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo /
ti phu gsang sngags sdong po /
kun mkhyen rong ston shAkya rgyal mtshan thugs sras nam mkha' dpal ldan /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
drin can bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
rtsa ba'i bla ma chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas phag dkar shes rab gsal byed kyi byin rlabs thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
grub thob kong+ka dat+ta /
a b+ha yA ka ra /
su tsa ri pA da /
rat+na rak+Shi ta /
mA na ka shrI dz+nyA na /
chag lo chos rje dpal /
go lung pa mdo sde dpal rgyal mtshan /
shong lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros /
dpang lo blo gros brtan pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
rje sangs rgyas lhun grub /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
rje sangs rgyas dpal /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
'jam mgon grub pa'i dpa' bo bsod nams mchog ldan /
shes bya kun mkhyen zur chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na kong+ka dat+ta nas /
a nu sa ma rak+Shi ta /
ku mA r+wa de wa /
re wen+d+ra pra b+ha wa /
chag lo chos rje dpal man 'dra /
yang na lo tsA ba mchog ldan legs pa'i blo gros nas /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan man gong ltar ro / /
yang na dbang lo tsA ba nas /
sa bzang ti paN chen /
sa bzang @# / /
'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
ngor chen man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
dbang rnon rgyal ba mchog grub /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra / /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i phag dkar shes rab gsal byed kyi sgrub thabs dang byin rlabs kyi chog gnyis kyi lung brgyud ni /
ngor chen yan gong ltar la /
de nas gu ge paN chen /
r+wa ston yon tan dpal bzang /
mnga' ris pa dpal ldan tshul khrims /
rje grol mchog /
rngo ring kun dga' rgyal mtsha /
sngags 'chang dkon cog legs pa /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! rgya gar gyi paN chen A tsar+ya dmar pos rje btsun sa skya pa chen po la gnang ba'i rdo rje nam mkha' lding gser mig 'khyil pa 'byung po 'ur 'ded ces shin tu thugs gtsigs che ba'i zab chos kyi skor la zin bris dang phyag len la brten nas rjes gnang /
gdams pa shar 'bun cu pa dpal ldan grags kyis mdzad pa'i lo rgyus /
bsnyen pa /
sgrub pa /
las sbyor gyi nang gses khyad par gyi las sbyor ser ba dang char gcod pa /
mid 'byar 'chos pa /
dug bsrung /
dug 'breng /
sri'u gso ba /
gdon bgegs bskrad pa /
smyo ba 'dul ba /
bcud len /
mdze gso ba /
spyi 'gro'i la sbyor dang bcas pa legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bla ma A tsar+ya? dmar po /
gsang bshes rab kyang zer bod du lan gsum byon pa'i dang po khri srong lde'u bcan gyi dus /
bar pa bstan pa phyi dar gyi 'og /
rjes mas chen dang mjal ba ste sgu tshe'i rigs 'dzin brnyes pa dmag zor ma'i bla brgyud na yod pa de dang gcig go /
rje btsun sa skya ba chen po /
slob dpon rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa /
rong mi grags pa dpal /
rong mi wa ba can sangs rgyas /
rong mi dar ma grags /
rong mi sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
rong ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
shar 'bun cu ba dpal ldan grags /
spu chu zer ba'ang snang /
grags pa dpal mgon /
jo stan khrom yon nam mkha' lhun bzang /
bla ma dpal ldan grags pa /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog rgya mtsho /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis /
rgyal tshab shes rab 'byung gnas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
ngor chen dkon cog rgya mche nas /
bla ma bsod nams lhun grub /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
rje sangs rgya rin cen gyis mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi zin bris dang zin bris zur pa gnyis kyi steng nas bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa'i bka' srung dpal dur khrod bdag po yab yum gyi rjes gnang /
lung la /
dpal dur khrod bdag po'i rgyud gsang ba snying gyi 'khor lo le'u brgyad pa paN+Di ta bai ro can rak+Shi ta las brgyud cing 'jim lo tsA ba'i 'gyur /
dur khrod bdag po'i sgrub thabs bla ma bai ro tsa nas mdzad pa 'jim lo'i 'gyur /
'gor gang dag rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis zhes yod sgo? pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad ma bla ma bai ro'i man ngag /
'gor dpal dur khrod bdag po'i rjes gnang @# / /
bya ba zhes yod sgo? pa'i rjes gnang gi yig rnying rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rjes gnang gi yi ge rje sangs rgyas rin cen (sgo? gyis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i bsnyen pa )sgo? dang mchod gtor bsdus pa bya tshul /
dam tshig dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis dur khrod bdag pI bsnyen sgrub las sbyor gyi man ngag tshogs so so'i skabs su shes par bya'o'i mtha' can /
sku rten sba ba'i man ngag kun gyi sgo? gcug gi nor bur 'gyur /
'di ni rten gyi man ngag go'i mtha' can /
rdzas dang sngags la brten nas smya ba 'dul ba sgo? gzhan zhig 'drir bcug pas thul lo'i mtha' can /
dam nyams bsgral ba'i las tshogs drag po'i las so'i mtha' can /
spos khang pa rin cen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i bskang gso dang bstod bskul gyi yi ge /
chos rgyal dbang po'i sdes mdzad pa'i skor la /
lo rgyus dung sgra chen po srid gsum gang ba don ldan nyid du sgrog pa /
bsnyen sgrub kyi rtsa ba 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub /
dkyil 'khor gyi rnam bshad nyin byed 'khor lo /
srog tig bla rdo bcang ba nyi zla skar gsum /
yon tan rtan gyi 'khor lo'i gnad gdams tshig brgyud la /
rten bzhed rab gnas de dang 'brel ba'i zlog gsang bstan pa sna tshogs byed po'i nyams yig /
gtor ma'i yig chung 'dod yon sprin phung /
'bru 'phel ma rmos lo tog /
dkar 'phel dngos grub 'dod 'jo /
lo legs 'byor ba'i bad mdzod /
thab gter rin cen 'bar ba /
rkun 'ching don yod zhags pa /
bzlas pas 'bral med 'grogs pa ngo mtshar spro ba'i rba rlabs /
gtor chog gsal byed 'dod yon gang+gA'i chu rgyun /
rims bsrung dpa' bo'i sgo srungs / /
chog yid bzhin tshe 'khor /
srid spel zla ba'i chu rgyun /
sde dang chos 'phel ba 'du byed chos kyi dung sgra /
gcan gzan kha 'ching gser gyi 'khor la rnams thobs pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
grub chen padma badzra /
shrI badzra /
rA hu la badzra /
sgeg pa'i rdo rje /
dz+nyA na sid+d+hi /
dpal dam tshig rdo rje /
'chi mad blo gros bzang po /
grub chen bai ro tsa na badzra khams pa rgwa lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal /
rje btsun pa brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun chen po /
bla chen yang sgom se bo /
do pa ston tshul /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
drin can seng ge bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mchog /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs chen po bdag chen rdo rje 'chang chen po /
rje btsun rdo ring pa kun bzang chos kyi nyi ma /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub pa mchog gi ded dpon bsod nams chos 'phel /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rigs kun khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /

yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
@# / /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas /
chos rje sbyin pa dpal ba /
'phags chen dpal ldan bkra shis /
zhe dgon pa bsod nams rtse mo /
chos rgyal bkra shis stobs rgyal /
rigs 'dzin ngag gi dbang po /
sprul sku gter ston bstan 'dzin nor bu /
sprul sku phyag rdor nor bu /
khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
sangs rgyas rin cen gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge gnyis dang chos rgyal bkra shis stobs rgyal gyis mdzad pa'i yig cha rnams ma gtogs pa'i rtags yod med tshang ma'i lung brgyud ni /
rjes gnang gi dang po dbang rab yan sor gnas la /
de nas zha lu pa /
des bdag go /
sgo'i rtags ... can lugs gcig ni /
rjes gnang phyi ma gnyis ltar la /
dbang rab nas /
zha lu pa'o / /
.... !byang pa rigs 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa'i yi ge rnams kyi lung brgyud ni /
rigs 'dzin ngag gi dbang po nas /
sha gzug pa ngag dbang bkra shis rnam rgyal /
gling stod chos rje dkon cog dpal 'byor /
khyab bdag khra tshang pa blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
sprul sku phyag rdor nor bu man 'dra /
yang na zhe dgon pa bsod nams rtse mo nas /
rje rin cen chos 'phel /
mkhan chen shes rab nor bu /
sprul sku phyag rdor nor bu man 'dra / /
! rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras la kye rdor bka' babs bzhi bzhugs pa las rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa dang ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro gnyis kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i grub chen Dom+b+hi he ru kas legs par bkral ba'i kye rdor Dom+b+hi lugs su grags pa lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du theg chen rin po ches mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa las dang po pa 'jug bde dang dkyil chog kye rdor rnam par rol pa la brten nas dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag med ma /
bir+wa pa /
Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
a na la badzra /
nags khrod pa /
gar+b+ha ri pa /
dza ya shrIdz+nyA na /
'di gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na snang bas chad dam snyam /
mi thub zla ba /
dpa' bo rdo rje /
'brog mi lo chen /
mnga' ris pa gsal ba'i snying po /
'khon sgye chu ba dgra lha 'bar /
sa chen /
rtse mo /
rje btsun pa /
sa paN /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang mdo snga dpal /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
mkhas grub rin cen rnam rgyal /
yongs 'dzin shAkya kun dga' /
kun spangs rin cen dbang sgrol /
bla ma ye shes dbang po /

mtshungs med dge ba'i dbang bo /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
! slob dpon a naM ga'i rjes su 'brangs pa ayon gyi slob dpon dpal padma badzra gyis legs par bkral ba'i kye rdor mtsho skyes lugs nas gling ma lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du theg @# / /
chen rin po ches mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs zung 'jug rnam rol dang rje btsun rtse mos mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las rim bla ma'i phyag bzhes ltar bkod pa la dbang gong ma man ngag lugs nas kha bskangs te dbang bzhi nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bi lA sa badzra /
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje /
slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rje /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
lcam lak+Sh+lI ka ra /
nag po spyod pa /
bram ze dpal 'dzin /
g+ha ya d+ha ra /
bla chen 'brog mi /
se ston kun rig /
zhang ston chos 'bar /
rje btsun sa chen /
rta stag po ba /
de dbon chos kyi shes rab dang la kha ba rgyal mtshan grags pa /
dpal chu bo ri pa /
thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na snang bas gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
bla ma kun bsong ba /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa /
mkhas grub rin cen rnam rgyal /
sngags 'chang tshe dbang bkra shis /
bla ma mkhyen rab rnam rgyal /
bla ma ye shes dbang bo /
bla ma shAkya bsam grub /
rdo rje 'dzin pa dge ba'i dbang po /
bka' drin mnyam med zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! slob dpon nag po dam tshig rdo rjes legs par bkral ba'i sku gsung thugs snying bo kye rdo rje lha dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal gyis rdo rje gdan pa chen pos mdzad pa'i stod cha dang gsung mtshan la brten nas bsgrigs pa'i mngon rtogs de kho na nyid rab tu gsal ba dang dbang gi cho ga la brten nas dbang bzhi rdzogs par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag med ma /
nag po dam tshig rdo rje /
bram ze nag po pa /
thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na nag po zhi ba bzang po zer ba snang /
'gos khug pa lhas bcas /
mnga' ris pa gsal ba'i snying bo /
'khon sgye chu ba dgra lha 'bar /
brtse ba chen po? /
slob dpon chen po /
rje btsun rin po che /
dkar shAkya grags /
ba da lung ba kun bzang dpal /
dkar gyi dpon po yin /
bla ma dar ma ye shes /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgo ba chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
rdo rje gdan pa 'jigs med dpa' bo /
mkhas grub rin cen rnam rgyal /
bla ma ayon rgyal po /
ga thang mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal po /
rdo rje 'dzin pa dge ba'i dbang bo /
bka' drin mnyam med khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na 'gos lo tsA ba nas /
rgyal tsha rta phug pa /
de'i gdan sa pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
e pa 'khon ston /
'jam dbyangs bzhi thog pa /
bla ma kun dga' seng ge /
bla ma seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man 'dra / /
dpal kye rdo rje lha dgu'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
sa ra ha /
klu sgrub /
DA ki ma skal ba bzang mo /
lA wa pa /
de bzhi la tai lo pas nos /
nA ro pa /
mnga' bdag mar pa chos kyi blo gros /
rdog ston chen po chos sku rdo rje /
rngog mdo sde /
rngog kun dga' rdo rje /
rdog dge slong gzi brjid grags pa /
rngog rin cen bzang po /
rngog chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
rngog don grub dpal bzang /
rngog byang chub dpal ba /
rngog rin cen dpal bzang /
rngog @# / /
byang chub dpal grub /
rngog byang chub grags pa /
rngog blo gros dpal bzang /
rngog dpal 'byor don grub /
rngog 'jam dbyangs 'od zer /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to /
bdag med lha mo bco lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du rngog lugs kyi dbang thob pa'i brgyud pa'ang yab bka' dang gcig go /
! kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub rgya mtsho dang dkyil chog bde chen rgya mtsho /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil gyi gsal byad rab gsal snang ba rnams la brten nas dpal kye rdo rje'i bshad rgyud thun mong ma yin pa gur rigs bsdus pa mkha' 'gro lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du man ngag lugs dang 'grel ba lugs gnyis las 'grel ba lugs kyi dbang bzhi legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag med ma /
grub chen bir+wa pa /
slob dpon Do m+b+hi he ru ka /
a la la badzra /
bA na pi ba /
gar+b+ha ri pa /
bsod snyoms pa dza ya shrI dz+nyA na /
slob dpon mi thub zla ga grub chen pradz+nya in+d+ra ru tse /
'brog mi lo tsA ba shAkya ye shes /
mnga' ris pa gsal ba'i snying bo /
rje btsun btsong kha pa'i gsan yig na 'di gnyis kyi chab tu 'khon dkon cog rgyal po snang zhing phyi ma 'di mkhyen brtse dang thar rtse'i gsan yig na dkyus ltar 'dug pa dgra lha 'bar min nam dbyad /
'khon sgya chu ba shAkya 'bar /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
ne tse sbas ston /
rta stag so ba rin cen don grub /
gan pa ston dar /
gan pa so ston /
gan pa chos rgyal /
gan pa chos rin /
gan pa rin rgyal /
thar rtse ba'i gsan yig tu mi 'dug kyang mkhyan brtse'i der snang bas chad dam snyam /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
chos rje sangs rgyas dpal grub /
mnga' ris pa nam mkha' brtan pa /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub /
ngor shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
dal a wa thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de nas rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
khwa char ba /
kun mkhyen seng ge'i mtshan can /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse ba nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
kye rdo rje rigs bsdus pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur lha bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rngog mdo sde yan kye rdor lha dgu ltar la /
de nas ram rdo rje grags /
bka' lung gnyan sgom /
mnga' ris pa byang chub tshul khrims /
rgya pho ba lung ba /
bla ma rgyal po dga' /
rngog seng ge grags /
rngog chos kyi rgyal mtshan man lha dgu bzhin no / /
! bde dgyes gnyis kyi bshad rgyud thun mong ba sam+bu Ti nas gsungs pa'i rdor dbyings lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub snye ma dang dkyil chog tshogs gnyis snye ma /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog @# / /
dbang gi snye ma /
paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i zin bris pad ma kha 'byed rnams la brten nas dbang bzhi legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag mad ma /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug dpal ldan chos skyong /
Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
a la la badzra /
dpal ldan nags khrod pa /
gar+b+ha ri ba /
bsod snyoms pa /
rgyal ba dpal /
mkhyen brtsed 'bar rtse ba'i gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang shar ba'i der snang ba chad dam snyam /
slob dpon mi thub zla ba /
dge slong dpa' bo rdo rje /
bla chen 'brog mi /
mnga' ris pa gsal ngo mtshar rdo rje /
ba'i snying bo /
'khon sgye chu ba dgra lha 'bar /
rje btsun sa chen /
rje btsun grags pa /
chos rjes paN /
tshogs sgom pa /
gnyags snying bo rgyal mtshan /
zhang bkra shis dpal /
spangs khang ba grags pa dpal /
paN chen ma ti /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang bo /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge /
mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse ba nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar ba shes rab 'byung gnas /
sgrub khang pa dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
dkon cog lhun sgrub man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
chos rje dge legs bshes gnyen /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra / /
! sam+bu Ti nas gsungs pa'i 'da' kha ma'i nyams len rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen pos legs par bkral ba'i 'pho 'khrid gser gyi sgo 'byed kyi nyams 'khrid thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po nas rim par brgyud de /
brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal bzang po /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po ches sam+bu Ti'i rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa'i thog bsrung gi lung brgyud ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa rin cen grub /
thugs sras sems dpa' chen po /
rje dngos grub dpal /
mkhas pa zla ba dpal rin /
mkhan chen tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyan rab chos rje /
byang gling pa rin cen rgyal po /
rje don grub rgyal mtshan /
byang gling bkra shis rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bkra shis /
mtshungs med dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
! 'jam dbyangs dkon cog lhun grub kyi yi ge'i steng nas mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi rgyud nas legs par gsungs pa'i phyag na rdo rje 'byung bo 'dul byed kyi rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
DA ki ma dri med gzi brjid /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
bla ma sa skya pa chen po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mchims ston chos kyi seng ge /
'jam gsar shes rab 'od zer /
rong ba rgwa lo rnam rgyal rdo rje /
de sras shes rab seng ge /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang /
@# / /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na rgyal tshab kun dbang nas /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rgyal ba lha mchog seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la thar rtse ba nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de nas khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rjes gnang dang /
mngon rtogs rdzas gnang gi yi ge rje dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje lha mchog seng ge nas /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse ba man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rje shes rab rgya mtsho /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog 'phal nas /
mnga' ris pa nam mkha' brtan pa /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
rjes gnang gi brgyud pa /
yang na rdzogs pA sangs rgyas /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
a b+ha yA ka ra /
shu b+hA ka ra gup+ta /
pU dza ti gup+ta /
rat+na rak+Shi ta /
go taM shrI /
kIrti paN+Di ta /
lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan /
dgung lo brgya dang bdun bzhugs /
rgyal mtshan rin cen /
gar thig pa bsod rgyal /
dka' bcu pa gzhon nu seng ge /
bla ma mgon po 'bum /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims man 'dra / /
sgrub khang pas mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs rgyal ba kun dngos ma'i lung ni /
sgrub khang ba dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! rab 'byams pa rin cen dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas so'i sngags 'chang snye mdo shAkya dpal la gsang ba'i bdag pos dngos su gnang ba'i gur nas gsungs pa dang 'brel ba phyag na rdo rje 'byung bo 'dul byed kyi rjes gnang me'i dbang dang bcas pa'i nye brgyud ni /
phyag na rdo rje /
so'i sngags 'chang shAkya dpal /
bla chen chos dpal ba /
chos rje rin cen dpal bzang /
bla ma lha dbang blo gros /
rje chos grags pa /
zha lu mkhan chen bsod nams dbang po /
bla ma dam pa shAkya seng ge /
rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje rin cen dpal bzang nas /
mkhas grub kun dga' dpal 'byor /
rje chos grags pa man 'dra / /
! 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i yig ltar rdo rje gur nas gsungs pa'i las rgyas pa'i lha so sor 'brang ma'i rjes gnang dang /
de'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pas mdzad pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyan brtses mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge'i lung dang bcas chos pa'i brgyud pa ni /

bla ma mgon po 'bum /

dze tA ri /
paN chen mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA pa rin cen grags /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po man 'dra / /
grub pa'i dbang phyug thang stong rgyal pos 'jigs byed mun pa tshal gyi dur khrod du bram ze mchog sred la mgon po'i rgyud man ngag rnams gsan zhing khyad par rdo rje gur nas bshad pa'i mgon po 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang gsan pa'i tshe nam srod kyi char sprin nag du ba'i mdog can gyi dbus na zhabs pus man chad nub pa'i sku'i snang ba gsal bar bstan pas gur mgon sprin gseb mar grags pa'i rjes gnang bstan 'dzin nyi zla ba bzang gis mdzad pa'i dgra bgegs tshar gcod kyi yi ge bzhin nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon bram ze mchog sred /
grub chen thang stong rgyal po /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
rje btsun grol mchog /
bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang po /
rje ngag dbang nyi ma bzang po /
sprul sku bsod nams dbang phyug /
gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
dbyug gu spun gsum rgyud sde phyogs gang du gtogs gsal bar ma byung yang /
gong gnon 'byung 'dul gyis mdzad pa sogs dang bcas de'i sdebs su 'brel mtshungs par mngon la /
'di nyid kyi chos skor mgon po klu sgrub dang bla ma rdo rje gdan pa sogs las nye bar brgyud de dpal ldan sa skya pa'i yab chos nor gyi lha mo thugs gtsigs can gyi chos skor la /
slob dpon klu sgrub kyis sha za'i gnod sbyin mo mkha' 'gro kun nas 'khyil ba'i rtog pa las phyung pa'i sgrub q?? thabs bla ma rdo rje gdan pa dang ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa'i gnod sbyin mo kun nas 'khyil ba'i don q?? 'dus 'grel pa ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba la slar pa tshab lo tsA bas 'gyur bcos mdzad pa /
de'i snying pos chen gyis mdzad pa bla ma ba ri brgya gar du bzhugs dus shin tu bkren par rdo rje gdan pas gnang nas zas gos nor gsum tshegs med du 'od gsungs pa'i lo rgyus dang bcas pa'i man ngag /
lo @# / /
tsA ba bod du 'byon dus rdo rje gdan pas skyel thung mdzad nas gnang ba'i thugs dam mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub lag bcangs /
spun gsum gyi mngon rtogs gsal byed btsal sla ba yin no'i mtha' can rten bca' ba dang gtor ma gtang thabs phun sum tshogs par byed do'i mtha' can /
chang bu bsngo lugs dang tshigs bcad mkha' 'gro chen mo ma /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams kyis dge tshul byams pa bzang po'i don du mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bsam don kun 'grub /
shAkya'i dge slong rat+na'i mtha' can gyis bskul ba'i tsakra la brten nas dbang sdud zab mo'i lag len gsal bar bkod pa bsam 'phel nor bu rnams thob pa las g.yung drung gi rtags kyi brgyud pa ni /

rje nor bu phun tshogs /

thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtseg dang khri chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
