! rjes gnang gi yi ge yid bzhin nor bu rin po che'i steng nas me long dgon pa ba bo dong paN chen padma gar dbang la ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro sid+ha mu khas dngos su gnang ba'i phyir sgrub seng gdong lha dgu'i rjes @# / /
gnang nas nas /
lung la /
padma gar dbang gis mdzad pa'i phyi sgrub lha dgu'i mngon rtogs /
rgyun khyer gtso rkyang gi nyams len bya tshul /
gtso rkyang gi rjes gnang yid bzhin nor bu rnams legs par thob pa'i ring brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
DA ki sid+ha mu kha /
par lo tsA ba /
sa chen /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
'phags pa /
nye gnas rong po rdo rje /
rong po sangs rgyas ye shes /
rong po bla ma rin po che /
g.yag sde paN chen /
rje btsun ma tsi mu baM /
gnas rnying pa mkhas mchog rin cen bsam gtan dpal bzang /
rtogs ldan nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
thugs sras ras chen kun dga' dar po /
thugs sras kun dga' bzang po /
paN chen byams ba chos kyi nyi ma /
paN chen padma gar dbang /
dka' bzhin tshul khrims 'gyur med /
ras chen kun dga' lha dbang /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
sda 'gyur ltar na kun bzang yab yum /
seng ge'i gdong can /
ayon chen po /
mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal /
rtogs ldan nam mkha' sangs rgyas man 'dra / /
sangs rgyas mgon po zer ba'ang snang /
nye brgyud ni /
seng ge'i gdong can /
padma gar dbang man gong bzhin no / /
lha dgu so so'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa'ang gong dang 'dra / /
! bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs mi brjed pa'i dran byed dang rngog gzhung ba rin cen dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil bcas par brten nas rgyud gsar gyi char pa sogs nas bstan pa'i rnam snang gi rigs dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' lam rdo rje gdan bzhi yab bka' lha dgu bcu rtsa bdun gyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bzhi lags par nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
bu ston rngog pa bka' 'gyur pa gsum gyi gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang rje btsun btsong kha pa dang ngor chen gyi nger snang ngo / /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon Ar+ya de wa /
tai lo pa /
nA ro pa /
dge ba'i go cha /
'di man gyi rgya gar ba bzhi po bu ston rje btsong kha pa ngor chen gsum gyi gsan yig na mi gsal yang rngog pa'i rgyun bzhin rtsa ba'i bla ma'i gsan yig na snang ngo / /
bde ba'i go cha /
rnam rgyal dbang po'i sda /
thang chung pa /
rje mar pa lo tsA /
rngog chos sku rdo rje /
rngog mdo sde /
rngog kun dga' rdo rje /
rngog gzi brjid grags /
rngog rin cen bzang po /
rngog chos kyi rgyal po /
rngog don grub dpal bzang /
rngog byang chub dpal /
rdog rin cen dpal bzang po /
rdog byang chub dpal grub /
rdog byang chub grags /
rngog blo gros dpal bzang /
rngog dpal 'byor don grub /
rdog ston chen po 'jam dbyangs 'od zer /
rtsa ba'i bla ma gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
yang na Ar+ya de wa nas /
a su ra'i brag phug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma mi rus kyi 'phreng ba can /
bal po rnam par rgyal ba dbang po'i sde /
bal po spyi sder ba yang zer btsun ba yin /
mar pa lo tsA ba man 'dra / /
! rje ras pa badzra kI rti nas brgyud pa'i padma gar dbang gi rigs su gtogs pa rta mgrin dmar po pad dbyug can gyi rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dpal rta mgrin /
ayon rin po che /
mkhyen brtses tshar chen @# / /
lags na pa tshor mi gsal yang sgo rum par gsan pa der snang ngo / /
ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal ma /
grub chen ti phu pa /
rje ras chung pa /
dbang phyug mi la ras pa /
skam po zla 'od gzhon nu /
dpal phag mo gru pa /
'bri gung skyur rin cen dpal /
sbyan snga grags pa 'byung gnas /
yang dgan pa thugs kyi rdo rje /
thugs sras spyan snga rigs ldan /
zur phug pa rin cen bzang po /
'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang /
chos rje rin cen 'phel /
mkhan chen tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
grub mchog rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
mkhan chen gzhon nu blo gros /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang bka' 'gyur ba chen pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor pan+de la'o / /
yang na 'ba' ra ba nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
'jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal po /
sprul sku rdo rje rgyal pa /
pha rgod bsod nams bzang po /
rdo ring pa chen po man 'dra /
! rje btsun sa skya pa'i zab chos dbang gis grol ma dmar mo'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba don yod rdo rje /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
sa chen /
rtse mo /
rje btsun pa /
sa paN /
slob dpon shAkya 'od zer /
rgyal tsha lung mang po /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
mkhan chen seng ge bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
klu pa mkhan chen bsod nams dar /
dmar ston rgyal mtshan 'od zer /
gong ma grags pa 'byung gnas /
sre pa lo tsA ba /
sa skyong thams cad mkhyen pa /
chos lda rin po che rnams su'ang grags /
dpal ldan kun bzang rol pa /
bu na bzang rtse pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan yang zer /
chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
bla ma ngan yod dpal /
grub brnyes dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
bstan pa'i nyi ma mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub pa mchog gi ded dpon dbang phyug rab brtan /
bstan po'a mnga' bdag mgan po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bka' drin 'khor med zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang gi cha ga khams gsum 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu /
gsol ba 'debs pa thugs dam gnad nas bskul ba'i sgra dbyangs gnyis kyi lung nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
chag la nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
mtshungs med dkon cog lhun grub /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
rje btsun brang ti pa /
mkhas grub dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag gzha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! rta mchog gi rigs kyi sgrol ma mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud la brten nas slob dpon klu sgrub kyis legs par bkal zhing lo chen dar ma grags kyis sbyan drangs pa'i gnyan sgrol yan lag drug pa rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa yan lag drug ldan ngad rjes gnang gi cho ga ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i steng nas rjes @# / /
gnang dang /
de dang 'brel bar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i mdo'i lung rjes gnang gi skabs nges par mdzad dgos pa'i phyag bzhes ltar thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
slob dpon klu sgrub /
ba ling ta pa /
thar rtse dang shar pa'i gsan yig na mi gsal yang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i der snang ba chad dam snyam /
sangs rgyas ye shes /
dI paM ka ra b+ha dra /
dpal bde ba'i zhabs /
dri med sbas pa /
kha che rin cen rdo rje /
rin cen grags pa /
pen+da pa chen po /
thar rtse dang shar pa'i gsan yig na 'di'i tshab tu ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma 'dug bzhal gyi brgyud pa dkyus shor byung 'dra /
gnyan lo tsA ba dar ma grags /
gnam kha'u pa dar ma rgyal mtshan /
brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun grags pa /
chos rjes paN /
mkhan chen byang chub dpal /
bde ba dpal /
dka' bzhi ba grags pa gzhon nu /
mkhan chen bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen grags pa tshul khrims /
thar rtse dang shar pa'i gsan yig na mi 'dug pa chad dam snyam /
thog ston shes rab rdo rje /
mkhan chen rgyal bzang dpal /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
rigs kun bdag po mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel nas /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyu 'gul paN chen /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
'jam dbyangs sa lo /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na lha mchog seng ge nas /
ngor chen sangs rgyas seng ge thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra / /
rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa'i sgrub skor la /
lo rgyus /
bsnyen pa /
sgrub pa /
thun 'tshams su bya ba gtor ma /
'khrul 'khor /
chom rkun 'ching ba /
mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang gzungs kyi lung blang ba dang bcad pa rnams thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
kha'u ba yan gong ltar la /
de nas gong ma lnga /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
ma ti paN chen /
theg chen rin po che /
bla ma lung rig rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen seng ga dpal bzang /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
btsun pa rnam mgon dri med sde /
rje byang chub dbang rgyal /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
bla ma rnam rgyal bkra shis /
thu btsun kun dga' bsod nams /
dpal 'byor gling pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
rab 'byams pa chos rje rin cen rgyal mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
tshogs nyan gnyis /
brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags @# / /
pa nas /
zhang ston khu dbon /
bla ma dam pa man gong ltar ro / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
shar pa sku mched /
'jam dbyangs chen po /
bla ma gzhon tshul ba /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
chos sgob chos dpal shes rab /
brag thog pa man 'dra / /
dkon cog lhun grub gyis mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge'i lung ni /
rje dkon cog lhun grub nas /
brang ti pha nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
rje kun dga' lung rig /
nags dgon pa sbyin pa grags pa /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! rtsod dus kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa bu ston rjes the tshom gyi gzhir mdzad kyang phyag bzhi drug gi brgyud pa'i bla ma phal cher chad mar mdzad pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bcu bzhi par /
mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni / /
zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa / /
dang po gri gug thod khrag 'dzin / /
spyan gsum mthing nag rngam pa yi / /
g.yas g.yon bar pa 'phreng ba dang / /
DA ma ru ni 'dzin cing brdung / /
mtha' ma gnyis kyis kha TwAM dang / /
sdigs mdzub zhags pas 'ching bar mdzad / /
ces pa dang /
shangs pa rnams kyi rang skad la rgyud tshad ldan du grags shing thams cad mkhyen pa bus som nyir mdzad pa rta mgrin gyis gsungs pa'i rgyud le'u brgyad ma'i le'u gnyis par /
nag pho zhal gcig phyag drug pa / /
gri gug bgrang 'phreng DA ma ru / /
thod pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams / /
zhes gsal bar bstan cing rtsod med yongs grags kyi rgyud r+wa chos rab kyis bsgyur ba'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud le'u lnga bcu pa las /
zhal gsum phyag drug pa lha mo bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas zur tsam bstan pa 'di rgyud kyi zin zo che bar mngon zhing /
de ltar lo paN mkhas grub rnams kyis legs par bkral ba'i ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa'i chos skor la /
mkhas grub khyung po gdub bu pas kos li bik+Sha'i dur khrod du rje btsun maitri pa chen po la gser srang bdun phul nas nor sgrub mthu myur ltag tshan che pa'i chos skyong zhig zhus pa la brten nas gnang ba'i yid bzhin mgon po /
mgon po shing phung can /
tsan dan mgon po /
thugs rje chen po nag po /
ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa sogs gzhi gcig la mtshan du mar grags pa /
mi nor zas gsum dbang du sdud pa /
dgra po brlag cing zlog pas mi tshugs pa /
bar do'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing mchog thun dngos grub thams cad 'bad med du stsol ba'i chos skyang ba'i srung ma 'di nyid kyi rjes su gnang ba'i skor dang mkhas grub khyud po 'phan yul 'jog po'i ri la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe grub chen rA hu las chos sgo skyel gyi tshul du gnang ba'i rjes gnang gi skor rnams bsdoms pas mgon po bcu gsum du grags pa rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun @# / /
bkra shis kyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas nos par /
gtor dbang bar gcod kun sel /
rjes gnang bar gcod kun sel /
dbang bzhi byin rlabs kyi chul du bskur ba /
bla mgon dbyer med kyi skor la zhi ba gri bsel /
rgyas pa bla ma mgon po dbyer med /
mkha' 'gro dbang sdud dang gnad dbab gcig tu byas pa /
gsang sgrub mgon po mchin kha /
nang sgrub rgyan can /
mgon po dbang rgyal /
mgon po tshe bdag /
sa ra hI mgon po khrag 'thung /
lha bzhi dril sgrub /
mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu ste dpal mnyam med ri bo dga' ldan pa la grags pa'i bka' bcu gsum /
de'i grangs su mi the ba'i phyag mtshan drug chas gos sin+d+hu ra rnams kyi rjes gnad mgon po snying zhugs thun mong ba'i rjes gnang tshar chen dang mkhan ngag dbang chos grags pa'i yi ge'i sten gnas dbang bzhi byin rlabs su bskur ba shangs pa'i phyag len gtsang ma shin tu rgyas pa rnams nos nas /
rgya ba rten lung la /
be bum thun mong ba dang thun mong ma yin pa shog dril gyi skor dang gnyis /
dang po la /
rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la zhus pa'i nag po chen po'i rgyud le'u brgyad pa /
'di la mkhas grub rjes rgyud 'di nyid yid ches su 'dod pa rnams kyi zhes the chom gyi gzhir mdzad nas rang lugs kyi rtsa ba'i khungs su be bum gyi thog mar bris pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i man ngag mtha' dag som nyi'i yul du 'bad pas bsgrubs pa la dgos pa lhag po ma mthong /
mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung pa'i rgyud le'u nyer lnga pa tshad ldan du mdzad 'dug kyang thams cad mkhyen pa bu sogs tshad mar mi bzhed pa rgyud 'bum dkar chag na gsal bas dur khrod nag po'i rgyud bu ston gyis brdzus mar bzhed pa bzhin kho bo 'dod gsung ba dur khrod nag po rnam par ma dag cing dngos grub 'byung ba rnam par dag pa rang gi zhen 'dod gtso bor ston pa las rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i gsung du mi sems so / /
ye shes kyi mgon po thugs bskyed pa'i lo rgyus mai tri pas khyud po rnal 'byor la kos la bik+Sha'i dur khrod du gsungs pa /
'di'i mjug tu mkhas grub rjes gsung las /
'di gtso bor yid ches kyi gnas su gzung zhes bla ma dam pa dag bzhed la bdag kyang de ltar smra'o zhes snang ba'i 'di kho na'i tshig gis rgyud le brgyad mar rta mgrin gyis nag po chen po btul ba'i lo rgyus sogs tshad ma ma yin pa shugs la bstan nas sgos rgyud dmigs pa med pa'i dbyings su rgyas 'debs par nye ba'o / /
rang byin gyis brlab pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs dpal shawa ris mdzad pa /
'dri'i mjug tu mkhas grub rjes sgrub thabs rgya gzhung 'di la yi ge rnying pa na mtshan chung nyag nyog mang po btab 'dug na'ang dgos pa lhag po ci yang mi snang bas ma bris so / /
zhes gsungs 'dug go /
tsa la na ni zhes sogs bstod pa rgya skad ma 'di'i mjug tu mkhas grub rjes 'di la yang yi ge ma dag pa rim par brgyud pa'i 'dra min mang du snang ngo zhes gsung ba las dag ther ma gnang 'dug pa 'og gi man ngag mang por lhad zhugs bsal nas dag par @# / /
byas zhes zhal gyis 'ches pa bzhin 'dir yang zhus dag cig dgos pa 'dra yang lo tsA ba zhig ma rnyed pa'i rang btsan du lus pa 'dra'o / /
byin gyis brlab pa'i nag po chen po 'di nyams su len tshul dpal phyag drug pa'i sgrub yig mngon par rtogs pa rgyas pa'i yi ge /
lag tu len pa'i man ngag mngon par rtogs pa sgrub pa'i thabs 'bring po'i yig /
rnam pa gcig tu mngon par rtogs pa bsdus pa'i yi ge /
sgrub thabs rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi mjug tu mkhas grub rjes sgrub yig gsum po 'di la mdzad byang med shangs pa'i yig rnying yin bla ma shangs pa'i gsung sgros zin bris su byas pa gda'o zhes dang gtor ma dang ma 'brel ba'i skabs mdon rtogs bsdus pa 'di mkho tshul dang dam tshig pa mi bskyed gsung ba zhig 'dug pa gong du dam tshig pa bskyed par bshad pa dang ma mthun pas yig nor byung 'dra ba dpyad do / /
srog sngags dang shA sa na'i sngags don bshad pa mdzad pa po'i gsal kha mi 'dug kyang bar 'chams shig tu bdag gi bla ma rje bcun nam mkha'i rnal 'byor gyi zhal nas k+ShaiM k+She tra zhes gsung bal ma dag pa'i dpyad pa 'dug pas mkhas grub rje'i gsung yin 'dra /
'gor legs ldan 'di'i lugs kyis zhes yod pa'i bla ma des kyang bdag mang du thos pa'i btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang po la mchog tu dgyes pa chen pes gnang tshul dang bcas pa'i lo rgyus nyung du /
'gor da de la gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i bsnyen pa'i tshul du sgrub pa yin gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
'gor dpal mgon po'i gtor sgrub byed par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i gtor sgrub bya thabs so'i mtha' can /
mkhas grub rjes gtor sgrub 'di shangs pa'i yig rnying zhig yin 'dug kyang mdzad pa po bla ma rnams gsung rgyu mi snad gtor sgrub dang gton chen 'dres pas mi mkhas pa zhig gis byas 'dra snyam pa'i rtog pa skyes gsung ba 'dug /
'gor gtor chen byed par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i yig rnying bla ma'i zhal gyi gdams pa yin no'i mtha' can /
'gor ye shes kyi mgon po 'di nyid nyams su len pa la bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang las spyor gsum mo zhes yod pa'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi gdams pa man ngag bzhin las la sbyor ba lags so'i mtha' can /
'di mkhas grub rjes shangs pa'i yig rnying yin tshul mdzad 'dug /
'gor sangs rgyas gnyan ston la sogs pa'i rje grub thob rnams la skyabs su mchi zhes yod pa'i rang nyid la dbang dmigs pas len pa dang gzhan la gtor dbang bya ba'i yi ge mgon po la gtad rag gi tshul du 'bul lo'i mtha' can /
mgon po'i slob ma rjes su bzung ba gzhan phan gyi blo kho nas chos rje sangs rgyas ston pas yi ger bkod pa sbyor dngos rjes gsum ma /
'gor gtor ma mgon po la phul zin pa'i rjes la zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang gi zur 'debs dpon slob gnyis kas bsgom par bya ba'i mtha' can /
mdun du mgon po bskyed nas rang kha dbang blang ba'i gnad mchog khyad 'phags mgon pos sangs rgyas gnyan ston la dngos su gsungs nas @# / /
mkha' la gshegs pa /
'gor slob ma'i snying na chos kyi 'khor lo zhes yod pa'i mgon po snying zhugs kyi rjes gnang zur 'debs /
'di'i gsham du mkhas grub rjes rje nam mkha'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag dpen mchan bur yod pa ma gtogs gzhan la med tshul mgon po rigs lnga'i rjes gnang stod lugs par yod pa ma dag pa dang /
gtor snod padmar bskyed pa mi 'thad tshul gsung ngo / /
phyag mtshan rjes gnang gi tshigs bcad ma /
'gor grib phog dam tshig 'gal gyur na zhes yod pa'i grib sal khyad par can gyi man ngag /
grib sel gyi dbang bka'i tho yig /
bla ma mgon po dbyer med kyi sgrub thabs mgon pos sha wa ri pa la lan gsum gsungs nas bka' rgyas btab pa tshig brgyud ma /
de'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga bla ma mgon po dbyer med kyi slob ma rjes gzung rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
mgon po mchin kha'i rjes gnad bla ma'i gsung bzhin lo tsA ba chul khrims mgon gyis bkod pa /
mgon po mchin khar sgrub pa'i man ngag dpral ba'i sin+d+hu ra la brten nas mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud pA zhal gdams /
deng sang 'di la gsang sgrub tu 'dogs /
mgon po mchin kha'i 'khor gyi mngon rtogs ye shes pa bstims te gtor ma phul la gsol ba gdab bo'i mtha' can /
sa ra hI lugs kyi ye shes mgon po zhal gcig phyag drug 'di dang 'og gi rgyan can gnyis yum gyi mchan dang phyag mtshan rnams mi 'dra ba mai tri pa dang rA hu la'i lugs gyi khyad par yin nam dbyad lo rgyus tshor mai tri par zhus pa'i gras su snang /
pa'i dbang chog rgya gar mkhas grub kyi gzhung bzhin khyung po bdag gis yi ger bkod pa rA hu la la gser srang brgya phul nas zhus te rmog lcog pa la gtad pa'i chig brgyud ma /
de'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya gzhung shawa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
dpal mgon po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs thun mong ma yin pa mgon po rgyan can du grags pa rA hu las rdo rje 'chang la dngos su gsan nas grub pa brnyes pa /
de'i dbang chog 'gor rdo rje nag pa chen po'i dbang gi cho ga zhes yod pa'i khyung po rnal 'byor pas nyams su myong bar byas pa'i bka' rgya ma /
'gor 'di'i byin rlabs byed par deng sang 'di la nang sgrub zer 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i mgon po dbang rgyal gyi rjes gnang gi yi ge chig brgyud bka' rgya ma rin cen brtson 'grus la gdams pa /
mgon po nang sgrub bam dbang rgyal gyi sgrub thabs mai tri pa la khyung po rnal 'byor gyis zhus pa /
mgon po dbang rgyal gyi sgo nas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsdu ba dam pa'i mgon la bshags par bgyi'i mtha' can /
mgon po tshe bde deng sang 'di la nang sgrub kyi tha snyad mi mdzad /
mkha' 'gro bzhi skor yum bcas kyi sgrub thabs khyung pos rA hu la la gser srang lnga brgya phul nas zhus pa /
lo rgyu mtshor mai tri par zhus pa'i gras su snang /
de'i sgo nas tshe'i dbang byed pa tshig brgyud bka' rgya ma rin cen brtson 'grus la gdams pa'i gser chos /
byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po zhal gsum phyag drug pa khrag 'thung gi sgrub thabs dpal ldan sa ra has mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tha ya badzra dang lo tsA ba khyung pos bsgyur ba /
de'i sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang 'gor 'di'i rnal 'byor nyams su len par 'dod pas zhes 'di yum yod kyang rgyan can du ngos mi 'dzin /
@# / /
yod pa sngags gsum ga'i rjes zlos bya 'o'i mtha' can /
gu Na a ka ra dang a tha yan badzra gnyis las brgyud pa'i lha bzhi dril sgrub kyi lam gyi rim pa rje btsun mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor rdo rje phag mo'i byin gyis brlab pa zhes yod pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs a tha ya badzra gyis mdzad pa /
lha bzhi'i zhal dang mas mchog dad thun mong gi dngos grub 'grub pa'i mtha' can /
lha bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan la dbang bskur ba snod ldan re tsam la ster na rang la dbang bskur ba ltar bya 'o'i mtha' can /
lha bzhi dril sgrub kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang rgyun du blang ba'i man ngag /
lha bzhi bla ma dang lnga'i bstod pa chos dbyings ma /
mgon po yid bzhin nor bu'i rjes gnang gi yi ge bkra shis smon lam sogs bya'o'i mtha' can /
sgrub thabs dgos pa kun 'byung ba'i gdams ngag gi rgyal po lo rgyus sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes bzhis bstan pa /
zhi ba nor du sgrub pa'i gdams pa phyi ma'i gnam stong gi bar du bya'o'i mtha' tsan /
mgon po gzi ldan gyi sgrub thabs shangs pa rnams 'di le rjes gnang mdzad par mkhas grub rjes mi 'thad pa'i phyogs gsung yang sku'i rnam 'gyur la khyad par yod phyin rjes gnang mi rigs pa'i sgrub byed yang dag med pa 'da'o / /
shin tu gsang bar bya zhing nga pa su la'ang mi bstan no'i mtha' can /
dbang sdud kyi 'khor lo'i bri yig /
gtor ma'i man ngag /
sbyin sreg bum pa bca' thabs gzhan la mi bstan par ches dam par bya'o'i mtha' can /
mgon po dbang gi rgyal po'i sgo nas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i 'di dang gong gi 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsdu ba gnyis mi 'dra yang mgon dkar dang dbang rgyal gyi kyang yod pas mi gcig go /
man ngag dngos grub thams cad mod la 'grub par shog gi mtha' can /
bstod pa rgyal kun ma| mkhas grub chos rjes phyag drug pa'i skor rtsad bcad cing dag ther mdzad pa'i thems yig kho bos yi ger bkod pa 'di la bla ma mgon po 'khor bcas bzod par mdzad nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol gyi mtha' can /
nges mdzad pa'i lo rgyus dag ma dag gi dogs sel rgyas par yod pa'i las gsum rnam gzhag gsal bar phye ba khrigs su bsdebs pa /
des mdzad pa'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi man ngag thun mong ma yin pa gsal zhing rgyas lam sbas par thams cad tshang ba phyogs gcig tu bkod pa /
des mdzad pa'i gtor chog bskang pa dang bcas pa /
rten bzhi gnad gsum gyi man ngag thun mong ba'i skor /
sbos sbyor gyi man ngag bsdus pa ril bu dbul bar bya 'o'i mtha' can /
spos sbyor rgyas pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags snga mar ma tshad ba mang bar yod do'i mtha' can /
mdze thod dang mon gyi thod pa la brten pa'i mnan gtad ka ma la ra ga ras zla ba gcig la phyi rol pa 'bum tsho stongs su ba cug pa'i man ngag /
phyi dar nag nang nal bu'i rgyal mtshan /
gsang ba nal bu'i snying la brten pa'i dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i rten bca' thabs gnyan ston re gong pas sangs rgyas ston pa la gnang ba'i zhal gdams chig brgyud ma /
gdon gyi bu dang sha ma ma thon pa 'don thabs /
@# / /
dpal ldan lha mo nag mo phyag bzhi ma'i bsnyen sgrub las sbyor rten bca' thabs dang bcas pa shin tu gnyan pa las la sbyar ba sa mA ya gu hya'i mtha' can /
mai tri ba'i lugs kyi lha mo phyag gnyis ma'i srog sgrub chung ba rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
de'i lugs kyi srog sgrub rgyas pa la la bla ma re gong bas mdzad zer /
'ga' zhig skyer sgang bas mdzad nas lcags pho ri'i brag la sbas pa re gong pas bton zer ro /
sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyis bstan pa /
slob dpon d+ha na saMskr-i tas rnying ma phyogs ma gtogs gsar mar grags chung /
gnod sbyin bzhi dam la btags nas mgon po dang gtso 'khor gyi tshul du lhan cig tu bsgrubs pa'i sgrags sgrub dug lta bu'i man ngag su rung rung la ster zhing dpe cha ston na k+She tra pA las de'i snying phyung zhing gi mtha' can /
bdud mgon trag shad la brten pa'i dpal ldan mgon po nag po'i ngan sngags chig sgrub spu gri me dpal /
mgon po'i sbyin sreg gsal ba gsum ldan sangs rgyas gnyan ston gyis mdzad pa /
mkhas grub khyung pos mdzad pa'i spyan 'dren bzhengs shig ma /
gtor bsngo'i dus kyi ma g.yel ma /
gtor rdzong gtsang zhing gtsang sbyar ma /
bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa rngam pa sgra sgrog ma /
nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can gyis yan lag bdun pa'i sgo nas dpal ldan lha mo la bstod pa dpag dka' ma /
lha mo'i bstod pa bskal me ma /
mai tri pas lha mo zhal gzigs dus mdzad pa'i bstod pa dka' ba ngang blangs ma /
bskul steng gi tshangs pa ma /
mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i mgon po'i bstod pa gang thugs ma /
des mdzad pa'i lha mo'i bstod pa dpal ldan ma mo ma /
khyung pos mdzad pa'i bkra shis bka' rgya ma rnams /
gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa shog drel skor la /
shog dril dang po la bsrung 'khor 'dri thabs rdo rje'i go cha bla ma shangs pa lo tsA ga la nag po chen pos bstan pa /
mkhas grub rje'i zhus dag ma yin pas mjug tu /
mang thos dge legs dpal bzang gis / /
mkhas grub gong ma'i man ngag la / /
lhad zhugs bsal nas dag par byas /

phyi rten lug sogs srog chags /
nang rten mda' /
gsang rten gri snying /
de kho na nying de rten bzhi /
dpral ba'i sin+d+hur la brten nas mkha' 'gro dbang du sdung pa /
spyi bo'i mi bskyod pa la brten nas rgyud 'jam du gtong ba /
gshin rje gshed la brten nas mgon po'i nus pa bskyed pa ste gnad gsum dang bcas pa rgya gar mkhas grub kyi man ngag bla ma'i gdams pa shangs ston gyis yi ger bkod pa /
gnas khang bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod ltar bya ba'i man ngag thun mong ma yin pa'i rten bca' thabs chig brgyud ma /
mgon po'i 'phyar dar ram bris sku bzhang ba'i man ngag rnams /
shog dril gnyis pa la mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug par brten pa'i bsrung ba rdo rje'i char 'bebs /
zlog pa stobs chen shugs zlog /
gsang pa gnam lcags dug mda' nag po /
yang zlog bsrung ba stobs bskyed /
slar zlog nyams @# / /
pa kun gso / /
gdams pa lnga po 'di grub chen rA hu las mkhas grub khyung po rnal 'byor la gsungs pa'i snyan brgyud bla ma'i zhal shes ma /
yang zlog gi zhal shes yig chung rnams /
shog dril gsum pa la mgon po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyis bstan pa /
'brub khung ling ga 'khor lo sogs bstan pa las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rA hu las khyung po rnal 'byor la gnang ba'i gsang ba'i nor /
drag po'i ser ba 'bebs pa gnam stongs la ni las la sbyor zhes gsung ba'i mtha' can /
shog dril bzhi pa la /
slob dpon mtsho las 'di ayon chen por bzhed ba yod 'dra yang kye rdor mtsho skyes kyi skabs kyi slob dpon de dang slob dpon chen po padma 'byung gnas gang yin the tshom gyi gzhir snang ngo /
skyes kyis mdzad pa'i gnad lngas chos skyong bran du bskul ba'i man ngag /
gdams pa 'di gur zhal sogs chos skyong mang po'i be'u bum du'ang yod do /
mnan pa 'don pa /
bcings pa 'grol ba /
bsngams pa bcad pa /
ngag la dbang bskur ba /

bzlas pa'i dbal gso ba /

mchu la dug bsku ba /

'di'i mjug na gu ru padma 'byung gnas sogs bla ma drug las brgyud tshul 'dug cing /
bla ma dgongs 'dus su /
sngags kyi dbal gso lce la spu gri gdags / /
kun la ngar 'dogs gsad pa'i tha ram ste / /
'di dang ldan na yid bzhin nor bu ltar / /
ci 'dod 'byung ngo las can thugs kyi sras / /

rdzas sngags la brten pa'i mtshon srung mi tshugs so'i mtha' can /
mchod rten phur pa la brten pa'i shwa zlag 'phral du zlog par 'gyur ro'i mtha' can /

rmi lam ngan pa zlog thabs gtor chung bsham par bya'o'i mtha' can /
de'i zhal shes mkhas grub pa'i gsung rgyun rnams /
shog dril lnga pa la rgyud kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa nas gsungs pa'i mgon po rgyan can la brten pa'i rlung sgrub shin tu zab pa mchog sgrub pa'i man ngag /
'di khyung po rnal 'byor gyis gser srang brgya phul nas rA hu la la zhus pa rmog lcog par chig brgyud du gnang ba'o / /
gur zhal gyi gsang khrid phyag bzhi pa'i sku rags ma sogs dang dbyibs mtshungs pa'i dmar 'khrid du byed ba zhig shangs pa'i gong ma rnams la yod tshod du snang /
rdor bzlas kyi shog dril gzhan du gsal zhes kha 'phangs 'dug kyang dpe zur pa ma rnyed /
dgra bo tshar gcod pa'i rlung sgrub la gtso bo dang 'khor gyi las tshogs gnyis kyi dang po la @# / /
sha wa ri dbang phyug gos rgyud nas phyung ste gup+ta badzra la gnang /
des 'jog po'i ring khyung po la gnang ba'i skye rags them khug nas phyung bar rdzas sngags ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i mgon po'i rlung sgrub kyis lo tog 'joms shing thog dbab pa /
mi'i rlid bu la brten pa'i mgon po'i rlung sgrub kyis sbos te gsad pa'o / /
'khor gyi rlung sgrub la /
mi dbang snying shun la brten pa'i lha mo rlung sgrub kyis pha rol khrag nad kyis phung ba /
dom gyi chu 'dzin la brten pa'i k+She tra pA la'i rlung sgrub kyis rab zhag bdun /
'bring brgyad /
tha ma dgu la dgra bo 'gum pa /
lug nag gcan gzan gyis bsad pa'i rgyu mar brten pa'i dzi na mi tra'i rlung sgrub kyis nyin mtshan go ldog ste cha gang nad kyis gsad pa /
lte khung nag po dang zangs khab kyi sbyor bar brten pa'i TAk+ki rA? dza'i rlung sgrub kyis zhag gsum na gsod pa /
nag po rta'i chu 'dzin la brten nas bdud kyi skyes bu trag shad kyi rlung sgrub zhag gsum nas gsod pa /
man ngag 'di rnams chig brgyud las mang por bstan na snying khrag 'thung zhig pa'i bka' rgya can /
gtso 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi rlung sgrub kyi sngags gab spas phyogs gcig tu mkhas grub chos rjes bsgrigs pa /
'di'i sngags byang du gzer gzer zhug zhug snying khrag la rbad sogs 'dug pa rgya gar gyi skad la zha dang la sogs mi yong zhing rgya men bod min du 'dug kyang a mas bcag pa'i rdzas skam snod nyan pa'i dpe ltar skyon med dam snyam /
shog dril drug pa la grib sel gnad dbab kyi gdams pa sangs rgyas gnyan ston yan la chig brgyud ma gnad yig yid bzhin nor bur grags pa sangs rgyas ston pas ri gong dpal gyi ri khrod du yi ger bkod pa /

bgegs kyi rgyal po la brten nas pra 'bebs pa'i gdams pa rnams /
shog dril bdun pa la dpal ldan lha mo'i phyag g.yon gyi thod pa la brten nas dgra bo phung du 'jug pa /

dzi na mi tra'i DA ma ru la brten nas smyo ru 'jug pa /

rje rgyal mtshan 'bum /
'jag chen byams pa dpal /
rje bsod nams blo gros /
bla ma kun dga' bzang po /
dran mchog don yod rgyal mtshan /
yab chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
chos rje rin po che thub bstan pa /
rje phyogs las rnam rgyal man gong bzhin no / /
@# / /
yang na mtshungs med bzang po rgyal mtshan nas /
rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na mkhas grub rje nas /
ba so chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
gnas rnying pa kun dga' bde legs /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho man gong ltar ro / /
yang na mtshungs med bzang po rgyal mtshan nas /
'jam dbyangs dge 'dun 'phel /
rgyud pa bkra shis 'phags /
rgyud chen brtson 'grus 'phags /
sras khang sngags ram pa bzang po rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa man 'dra /
mgon po rgyan can /
tshe bdag /
lha bzhi'i dril sgrub /
mgon dkar bzhi'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
slob dpon d+ha na saM skr-i ta /
grub chen rA hu la gup+ta /
jo bo a ti sha'i bla ma ri nag po'i gtsug lag khang du bzhugs pa'i tshe'i rigs 'dzin brnyes pa de yin /
mkhas grub khyung po rnal 'byor man brgyud tshul gong ma mtha' dag dang 'dra /
sa ra ha'i mgon po khrag 'thung gi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
sa ra ha /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon chen po padma thod 'phrad /
grub chen sha ba ri pa /
mnga' bdag mai tri pa /
khyung po rnal 'byor man gong ma rnams dang 'dra /
shangs lugs gtsang ma'i dbang bzhi byin rlabs kyi tshul du thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhas grub rgyal mtshan 'bum yan gong ltar la /
khyung po tshul khrims mgon /
bya btang ri khrod ras chen /
sprul sku sangs rgyas rdo rje /
pha rgod thar pa dpal bzang /
drin can sangs rgyas rnam rgyal /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
gnyan ston rnam sprul gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na tshar chen nas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rje dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen nas /
bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag dbang rab man 'dra /
gtor chog dang rjes gnang gi yi ge bar chad kun sel gyi lung gi brgyud pa ni /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
gzims shag chos rje ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dpal rdo rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
be'u bum gyi lung yongs su rdzogs pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'jag chen byams pa dpal yan gong ltar la /
de la 'jag pa blo gros dpal dang bla ma kun dga' dpal gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la grub chen ngag dbang blo gros /
de nas mar ston tshul khrims rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis /
spo bo bla ma rin cen bzang po /
nyang po bla ma sangs rgyas bsam grub /
chos rje dpon dar ba dpal 'byor dar rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na mkhas grub rje nas /
grub chen bzang po rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
rje thub bstan pa /
rje phyogs las rnam rgyal /
nges phyag dpe dang bcas rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa la gnang ba man gong ltar ro / /
yang na mkhas grub rje nas /
ba so chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
rgyud pa shes rab @# / /
seng ge /
rgyud 'dzin skyin pa dpal ba /
se ra rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen bzang po man 'dra /
mkhas grub rjes mdzad pa'i las gsum rnam gzhag /
rten bzhi gnad gsum dang bcas pa'i lung brgyud gcig ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
chos rje se ra rje btsun pa /
pha bong kha pa bde legs nyi ma /
lha rin po che lha dbang rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
des bdag la'o / /
rgyud dang las gsum rnam gzhag gi lung ni /
chos rje rnam rgyal dpal bzang la rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pas gsan 'dug kyang khong la mtshan nyid pa'i rtags kyi gsan yig sogs med 'dug pas brgyud pa 'dri ba'i blo 'tshab 'tshub mi dgos par rang mal du gnas chog pa'o / /
gnas rnying la lugs kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo / /
trag shad kyi thal mo brdab pa'i cho ga'i lung ni mkhan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan la gsan 'dug kyang gnas rnying pa phyogs nas brgyud gsung ba las brgyud yig mi snang ngo / /
shog dril bcu gsum gyi lung brgyud lugs gcig dang rten bzhi gnad gsum /
gtor chen 'khor lo sogs shog dril du gsal ba'i man ngag rnams phyag len dmar 'khrid du legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa nas /
rtsa ba'i bla ma drin can chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang phyag len dmar 'khrid chos rje dpon dar ba dpal 'byor dar rgyas rang la nos so / /
sgo mang slob dpon sangs rgyas bkra shis dang lam pa rab 'byams pa bsod nams grags pa sogs kyis gtor chen nub re bzhin sked pa nas phral te ling+ga 'don 'jug byed pas mtshon phyag len rnams dpe tsam la brtin nas 'ol tshod du gyur pa'i dus rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pas chos rje dpon dar pa thugs rtsol chen pos nyang po bla mar zhu ru bcug pas chos sgor 'di nyid kyi bstan pa'i srog 'thud pa lta bu'o / /
mgon po phyag bzhi pa lha mang phyi sgrub kyi rjes gnang dang mngon rtogs rjes gnang gi yi ge thar rtse pas mdzad pa'i lung dang bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mgon po /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
Ar+ya de wa /
mar me mdzad bzang po /
dus zhabs pa /
rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags /
mi nyag rtsa shing gi rgyal rigs /
dpal chen rgwa lo /
phag mo gru pa /
'bri khung 'jig rten mgon po /
skyi shod pa bkra shis 'bum /
skyid shod pa grags pa seng ge /
slob dpon sangs rgyas gzhon nu /
lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shrI /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang /
gu ge paN chen /
glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
gnyan grags pa blo gros /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
paN chen thar rtse pa /
mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
e waM pa dpal ldan don grub /
nge dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ma Ni ka shrI nas /
sprul sku nam mkha' rgyal po /
mkhas btsun nam mkha' rtse mo /
gu ge paN chen man 'dra /
'di mgon po rang gi rgyud nas bshad pa'i lha mang mtshan nyid dang ldan pa las sngags gsar rnying gi mgon po yin no cog bsdus pa ni ma yin no / /
! thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang gyi @# / /
mdzad pa'i gtor chog rjes gnang bya tshul bklags pa'i don grub mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan gyi steng nas bdud mgon trag shad lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa'i rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon bram ze mchog sred /
rnal 'byor pa ro can de wa /
rnal 'byor ma bde ster ma /
bla ma ba liM ta A tsar+ya /
kha reg gi gnyos lo tsA ba yon tan grags /
de sras gnyos rdo rje bla ma /
gnyos dpal 'byung /
gnyos dpal /
gyi seng ge /
yab gnyos nag grags pa dpal /
sangs rgyas ras chen /
rgyal ba lha nang ba'ang zer /
bla ma rin cen rgyal po /
bla ma byang chub dar rgyas /
'jam dbyangs rin cen 'byung gnas /
mkhas pa ye shes rin cen /
kun spangs chos kyi rin cen /
dbu ma ba dpal ldan rin cen /
byang sems bsod nams rin cen /
brag dkar ba sems dpa' chen po bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang tshar chen blo gsal rgya mtsho /
thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtse gdong khri chen 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
sa chen 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dpal rdo rje ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na sangs rgyas ras chen nas /
rgyal sras stag tshang pa /
'gro mgon sangs rgyas phyar chen /
'jam dbyangs rin cen 'byung gnas /
drin can mkhas btsun sangs rgyas /
kun mkhyen saM g+ha b+ha dra /
brgyud 'dzin sangs rgyas bzang po /
dbu ma pa dpal ldan rin cen man 'dra /
yang na brang ti nam mkha' dpal bzang nas /
de dbon nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang gnas gsar ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
bla ma 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan /
nyang ston khyab bdag blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
thar rtse pas mdzad pa'i yig cha'i lung brgyud ni /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
de dbon nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
dor mkhan chen dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
rigs 'dzin sprul pa'i sku padma 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs dang rtsa ba'i yig rnying gi steng nas dpal jo bo bka' gdams pa'i bka'i srung ma mgon po lho nub ma /
mi thung gsod byed /
zhal dmar ba /
mthar skyes ma zhes mtshan gyi rnam grangs bzhi dang ldan pa de'i rjes su gnang ba nos pa'i brgyud ba ni /
bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
grub chen klu'i byang chub /
grub chen dz+nyA na bad+hi /
brang srong bidya ma ti /
rA hu la gup+ta badzra /
'di phyag drug pa'i brgyud pa'i rA hu la dang gcig /
jo bo chen po dpal ldan a ti sha /
'brom ston pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas /
po to ba rin cen gsal /
'dam shod kyi gru gu zha chen /
klog skya lha'i dbang phyug /
zhang ston rdo rje 'bar /
dbon po blo gros rgyal mtshan /
rma ston pradz+nya rat+na /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
'dul 'dzin dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen dkon cog dar po /
mkhan chen bsam grub rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon rin po che bi dya dzA la /
mkhan chen 'od 'dze ba nam mkha' bsam grub /
gnyug la paN chen ngag dbang grags pa /
lo pa spyan snga ngag @# / /
dbang chos grags rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dpal ldan chos 'byor /
lo pa spyan snga byams pa kun dga' don grub /
gling stod chos rje dkon cog dpal 'byor /
rigs 'dzin sprul pa'i sku mchog blo bzang padma 'phrin las /
nyang ston khyab bdag blo gros mchog gi rdo rje /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
! rdo rje 'chang dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan beng dmar gtso 'khor gnyis pa'i rjes gnang /
de'i gtor chog 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gas mdzad pa /
rjes gnang gi yi ge rje dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i lung dang bcas nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
kha sang+pA Ni /
grub chen mi tra dzo ki /
khro phu lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal /
bla chen bsod nams dbang phyug /
khro phu sems dpa' chen po /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa /
sgra tshang ba rin cen rnam rgyal /
sku zhang nam mkha'i mchan can /
sku zhang nam mkha' 'bum /
mkhas pa tsan+d+ra shrI /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
dka' bzhi pa rin cen mchog grub dpal 'bar /
rgyal yum tshul khrims bzang mo /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
'phags mchog byams pa skal bzang /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+da la'o / /
yang na 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse nas /
sku zhang rin cen bkra shis bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
grub dbang shAkya seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! gdugs dkar lha zhe gcig ma'i dkyil chog nas zur du bkol ba'i yi ge'i steng nas gtsug tor gdugs dkar nas gsungs pa'i mgon po legs ldan mched gsum a g+ho ra'i sgra 'jug kyang zhi byed pa'i de dang mi gcig /
gyi rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sangs rgyas /
gsang ba'i bdag po /
grub chen dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal /
chung ba a mo g+ha badzra /
ba rai lo tsA ba /
skyu ra a skyabs /
rje btsun sa chen /
slob dpon rtse lo /
rje btsun grags pa /
pho rog mdo sde mgon /
rgan mo lhas pa /
'jam dbyangs bzhi thog pa /
rong pa a ka ra /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
chos rje tshul rgyal ba /
bya bral ba bsod nams rin cen /
nyug pa chos grags dpal /
chos rje bsod nams rin cen /
rje don yod rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen kun dga' blo gros /
mkhas grub bshes gnyen bkra shis /
dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rigs kun bdag po mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
jo bo rje /
'brom ston pa /
bo to ba /
mus sman pa /
dpal ldan go /
zhang ston pa /
mtshams chen po /
spyi ston /
byang chen pa /
bsod nams 'phel /
bag ston man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas /
phyag na rdo rje /
mkha' 'gro ma bde ba sbyin /
bram ze rin cen rdo rje /
ma hA dza na /
gnyal pa ston pa ye shes dbang phyug /
dge bshes @# / /
bla ston /
gdong ston pa /
pho rog mdo sde mgon man 'dra /
yang na pho rog mdo sde mgon nas /
thod pa jo phur /
jo bo gnyan ston /
dbang phyug rin cen /
khams pa shAkya rdo rje /
sras chos grags /
ston pa dar ma shAkya /
bcur bsod nams dbang phyug /
lo tsA ba mchog ldan /
bla ma kun bsod /
bla ma chul rgyal /
rje chos grags pa /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams rin cen /
ri lung sbug pa rgyal ba thugs rje /
rje bshes gnyen bkra shis man 'dra /
legs ldan mchod gsum gyi gtor chog dang rjes gnang gi yi ge sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub kyis mjad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rtsom pa po /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
! bka' ma phyi 'gyur gyi dpal mgon stag zhon nag po'i gtor ma /
bzlas lung /
phyag mtshan gtod pa sogs phyag len 'khrul med du sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
phyag na rdo rje /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
ayon gyi slob dpon b+he ha ra /
paN+Di ta rdo rje grags pa /
jo bo a ti sha| dge bshes 'bangs /
dpon po rig 'bar /
lca mdo sde seng ge /
rong pa rga lo /
sras shar seng /
gcung a ka ra /
bag ston gzhon tshul /
kun mkhyen grags 'od /
dpyal ba na rgya mtsho /
bla ma chos grags pa /
dpal ri ba chos rgyal dpal bzang /
rin cen chos rje /
rin cen seng ge /
rong pa bsod nams blo gros /
sham+b+har kun dga' sangs rgyas /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mthu chen bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan| khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na jo bo rje nas /
rgya lcags ri gong pa /
yol chos dbang /
dpe dkar rdo rje thog 'bebs rong pa sher seng man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje rnal 'byor ma /
kha che paN chen /
dpyal chos bzang /
dpyal padmo can /
slob dpon dpal 'dzin /
gnubs kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
bla ma 'dzam gling pa /
kun mkhyen grags 'od man 'dra /
! /
gnyis pa slob bshad gser chos skor la /
dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa byon dang 'byon 'gyur 'byon bzhin pa mtha' dag gi lam po che mdo rgyud man ngag thams cad kyi bcud phyung ba 'phags yul paN grub dbang po dpal ldan chos skyong ngam grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bir+wa pa chan po la rje btsun rdo rje bdag med mas dngos su gnang ba'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa /
'bras bu lam dang bcas pa /
gcig shes pas mang po shes pa /
skyon yon tan du blang ba /
bar gcod dngos grub tu blang ba /
ltas ngan g.yang du 'gugs pa /
ting nge 'dzin ngo shes pas bsam gtan gyi gegs sel ba /
bar gcod ngo shes pas bdud kyi gegs sel ba /
sde snod gsum gyi de nyid shes pa gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu /
mchog thun gyi dngos grub kun gyi 'dod pa 'jo ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu gsung ngag rin po che zhes grub pa'i dpa' phyug mtha' dag zung 'jug tu gshegs pa'i them skas chen po 'di nyid /
lo tsA ba rnams kyi nang nas nyi zla ltar grags pa 'brog mi shAkya ye shes @# / /
kyis 'phags yul paN grub kun gyi gcug rgyan tu gyur pa'i paN+Di ta g+ha ya d+ha ra mnyes pa gsum gyi sgo nas bsten te zhus shing gtan la phab /
de la slob ma nam mkha'i skar tshogs lta bu'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa gzhung rdzogs pa /
gdams ngag rdzogs pa /
grub pa thob pa'i slob ma gsum du byung bar grags pa'i gdams pa rdzogs pa'i slob ma'i nang nas rab tu thob pa se mkhar chung pa /
de'i slob ma zhang ston chos 'bar nas bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras la bka' babs /
de'i srol 'dzin ngor rdzong gong dkar ba sogs tshogs bshad 'dzin pa'i mkhas grub sa chen po'i rdul ltar grangs su mi chod pa'i nang nas /
yongs 'du'i 'jon pa lta bur mchog tu gyur pa kha'u brag rdzong pa'am char lugs su grags pa zab pa las kyang ches zab pa'i gsang chen slob bshad kyi smin grol zab mo legs par nos pa la /
de yang sam+bu Ta las /
bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang / /
lung gi rjes 'brang de nyid rig /
gsang ston de nyid dngos po yang / /
gcig nas gcig brgyud shes par bya / /
bla ma rab kyi zhal las blangs /
zhes dang /
tshad ma snyan brgyud bzhi yis spros pa bcad /
ces pa ltar lugs srol 'di la tshad ma bzhi dang /
snyan brgyud bzhi zhes gsungs pa'i dang po rje btsun chen pos /
chos kun chad ma bzhi yis gtan la dbab /
ces gsungs pa ltar /
bla ma tshad ma /
nyams myong tshad ma /
bstan bcos tshad ma /
lung tshad ma bzhi'i sgo nas gtan la 'bebs par mdzad pa las /
dang po bla ma chang ma ni /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho zur? ga dngos grub rin cen gter mdzod /
rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs nyi? bum rdor 'dzin ma /
'phags pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i phyag mchod nyi? sangs rgyas kun ngo ma /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad nyi? pa'i brgyud 'debs dus gsum bde gshegs ma /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs rnam dag dkyil 'khor ma /
tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud zur? 'debs dngos grub char 'bebs /
mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i slob bshad brgyud 'debs byin rlabs kyi pho klu? nya /
bla ma sa skya pa chen po'i rnam thar glegs bam nang gi rgya bod kyi bla ma'i lo rgyus kyang chos sde 'di'i dbur don gyis thob bo / /
stag sde ri phug pa dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub shes rab kyis gsol ba btab pa ltar rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa /
slob dpon rin po che'i rnam thar gsol zha? 'debs 'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo / /
khyod nyid dam pa rnams kyi rigs 'khrungs nas /
zhes dang /
mjug tu /
yang dag rtogs pa'i blo gros skyed du gsol zhes yod pa /
de'i 'phros las yang smras pa /
tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen tshul 'dzin pa zhes sogs kyi mjug na /
bde ba can du gshegs la gus phyag 'tshal /
zhes yod pa rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis dag par gtugs pa'i mtha' can /
rje btsun chen po'i rnam zha? thar thun mong du grags pha sa skya paN+Di tas mdzad pa /
rje btsun chen po'i rnam thar mnal lam ma mjug na slob dpon rin po che dang mjal nas lan mang du chos zhus pa rmis gsungs rje btsun pa'i mnal lam bris pa'o @# / /
zhes pa sna ro ban+de ba shin rje grags kyis mdzad pa /
rje btsun sa skya paN+Di ta'i rnam thar bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i dus su lung bstan pa'i rtogs brjod cha 'ga' zhig brjod pa chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po ches mdzad pa /
chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar rin po che'i 'phreng pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
gnyags snying po rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i tshogs sgom rin po che'i rnam thar me mo lug gi dpyid zla tha chung yar ngo'i tshes dgu'i snga dro gza' zla ba dang skar ma rta pa rgyu pa'i dus su sku gshegs tshul bstan to zhes pa'i mtha' can /
nyan chen bsod nams bstan pa'i rnam thar dkar po brag pa rat+na sid+ha sa bkod pa /
dkar po brag pa rin cen seng ge'i rnam thar zha? skro skur gyi skyon gyis dben pa dbus gtsang khams gsum gyi dad ldan slob mas bskul bar brten rang nyid kyis mdzad pa /
zhang dkon cog dpal ba'i rnam thar dge slong dpal ldan gyis dben gnas tsha mo rong byang chub chos rdzod du mdzad pa /
rgyal ba brag phug pa'i rnam thar dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas lcags mo yes kyi lo ston zla ba chung smin drug zla ba'i tshes gcig la sbyar ba /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa dge slong dpal ldan tshul khrims kyi rang gis cung zad thos pa bris pa /
ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa'i rnam thar dge slong dpal ldan tshul khrims kyis dad cing gus pa'i slob ma'i ngor tsha mo rong gi byang chub chos rdzong du mdzad pa /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims kyi rnam thar grub chen bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad pa'i nang nas mdor bsdus te mus chen sems dpa' chen pos gsung ngag bla ma brgyud pa'i kha skong du mdzad pa /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI'i rnam thar rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos dpal ldan sa skya'i chos grwar mdzad pa /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po'i dgung lo don bzhi yan gyi rnam thar sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa slar yang de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi kha skong dang bcas pa /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po'i dgung lo gya gnyis yan gyi rnam thar rtse? mtshungs med gung ru shes rab bzang pos mdzad pa /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi rnam thar yid 'phag ut+pa la'i de shal zur? tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po'i rnam thar zur? ngo mtshar dad pa'i spu long g.yo ba /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i rje btsun sgo rum pa'i rnam thar zur? ngo mtshar yid bzhin gyi chu gter bzhad pa /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po dgung lo so brgyad pa'i dus dbus su zur? phebs pa'i rtogs brjod rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i lam glu dpyid kyi rgyal mo'i dga' ston /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i rnam thar zur? rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar snya ma /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis mdzad pa'i mkhan zha? chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad (nyi?)'a? pa'i brgyud pa'i rnam thar ngo mtshar snang pa /
rdo rje 'chang tshar ma chos rje'i gsung rgyun 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su btab pa'i gsung ngag rin po che las 'bras bu @# / /
dang bcas pa'i gdams pa'i byung tshul gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed ces bya ba zur? kha'u brag rdzong ba'i bzhed pa ma nor ba /
tshar chen gyi gsung rgyun 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su btab pa'i khog 'bubs las byung ba'i chos la bshad sgrub bya tshul sogs kyi zin bris /
mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i spyi don khog 'bubs bu?? kyi legs bshad gnad kyi be bum zab mo / /
tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i 'brog mi lo tsA ba'i bstod pa zur? snyan brgyud pad mchog bzhad pa /
slob dpon rin po ches mdzad pa'i rje btsun sa skya pa zha? chen po'i bstod pa tshang dbang ma /
tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi bstod pa zur? rab dkar blo gros ma /
des mdzad pa'i rje btsun rdo ring pa'i bstod pa zur? mtha' yas ma /
des mdzad pa'i bdag bstod blo gsal mang thos ma /
de'i bstod pa thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad dbang? pa'i bkra shis mtshan bzang ma /
tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i bstod pa dbang? rab yangs ma /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs dus gsum rgyal ba ma rang nyid kyis mdzad pa /
rje btsun sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i maN+Dal zhing khams rnam dag ma /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i bla ma lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa zur? dngos grub sgo 'byed /
des mdzad pa'i gsung ngag brgyud pa'i zur? bkra shis rdo rje 'chang dbang ma rnams / /
! gnyis pa nyams myong tshad ma rgyud la skyed par byed pa'i thabs glegs bam du bzhugs pa'i 'khrid kyi gzhung shing chen mo bzhi las /
gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkri ba'i nyams 'khrid kyi dgongs ba rdo rje 'chang tshar chen po'i gsung thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis zin bris su mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor pa la gzhi byas /
bla ma dam pa'i sbras don gsal ba dar /
tshar chen gyi gsung mang ?sa klu sgrub rgya mtshos reg zig tu mdzad pa'i snang gsum gsal byed zla ba bdud rtsi'i thigs 'phreng dang /
sngags lam gyi 'khrid yig nyi gzhon gsar pa'i thigs 'phrad skal bzang ut+pal gzhon nu'i kha 'byed nas rgyas bshad kha bskangs te nyams 'khrid zla ba phyed bzhi'i bar nos pa la /
snyan brgyud bzhi'i sgre? 'dogs gcod pa'i skabs dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa /
byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa /
gdams pa'i sarga ma log pa /
mos gus kyi bsam pa tshim pa ste bzhi ldan 'di tshogs slob gnyis ka la dgos shing /
slob bshad par thun mong ma yin pa'i 'chad tshul yang yod la /
de yang rgyu lam 'bras gsum gyi dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa /
nyams su blangs pa myong ba byin gyis brlabs pa grub pa'i mtha' ste brgyud bam? nyams pa /
sarga zhes pa go rim ma 'chol ba /
bsam pa tshim pa rtogs pa rgyud la skyes pas bla ma lha dang gdams ngag la gzhan rkyen gyis mi 'phrog pa'i mos gus te tshar chen gyis rje btsun rdo ring pa la gsung ngag rin po che thob nas bla ma gzhan dang gdams ngag gzhan la sangs rgyas re bsam pa med gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnad yin zhing /
de yang snyan brgyud gsum pa'i go rim ma @# / /
'chol ba dpon slob kyi 'grel pa ma brtags par dbang mi bskur /
dam bskur bar gdams pa mi 'chad /
dam bshad par gzhung mi 'chad /
de ma bshad par sgrub pa'i lung mi sbyin /
de ma byin par gsang bcu'i rgyas mi gdab pa sogs 'khrul pa'i dri ma phra mo tsam yang med pa'i phyag len rnam par dag pa yin la /
spyir 'khrid tshul ni /
brtag gnyis las /
dang por gso spyong sbyin par bya / /
de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin / /
de la bye brag smra ba bstan / /
mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no / /
de nas rnal 'byor dpyod pa nyid / /
de yi rjes su dbu ma bstan / /
sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas / /
de rjes kye'i rdo rje brtsams / /
zhes brgyud kyi dgongs pa dang /
de dang cha 'dra pa /
ljong shing las /
thun mong gi gdams pas bkral ba /
thun mong ma yin pa gzhung chung rdo rje'i tshig rkang nas gsungs pa sogs mtha' dag la lam thun mong ba'i rgyud sbyangs sngon du song nas sngags lam la 'jug dgos pa yin zhing /
de yang gang zag rab 'bring tha gsum gyi rab rnams dbang bzhi tshad ldan thob nas de bskur ba'i bla ma sku bzhi ye shes lnga ldan du thag chod nas gsol ba 'debs pa ni lam zab kho nas grol ba /
'bring po som nyi cung zad yod pa dam tshig bsrungs pas gol ba /
tha ma bskyed rdzogs kyi rnal 'byor tshul bzhin nyams su blangs pas grol ba las /
deng sang pi ma nyid gtso che ba'i phyag len du mdzad kyi /
dwags brgyud pa sogs phag mo'i byin rlabs tsam gyis dbang gi go bcad /
dal 'byor rnyed dka' tshul tsam yang ma thos par phyag chen du ming btags pa'i chad lta hang po dang chos drug gi rtsa rlung sogs la btsan thabs su 'khrid de /
chos sgor zhugs ma thag pa ras grub pa'i dbang phyug tu rlom pa'i lugs dang 'di ye mi 'dra bas tshar chen gyis /
gdams ngag mkha' 'gro yi snyan brgyud / /
gsung ngag yid bzhin gyi nor bu / /
nyams len phyogs re tsam ma yin / /
bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi nyams len / /
zhes lam thun mong ba'i rgyud sbyangs nas dbang bzhi pa'i bar gyi gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i nyams len cha tshang ba dgos pas thog mar theg chan thun mong ba'i lam sems can la nyon mongs pa la ma ngag pa'i snang ba /
rnal 'byor pa la ting nge 'dzin la nyams kyi snang ba /
bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la dag pa'i snang ba ste lam snang ba gsum gyi 'khrid /
de rjes maN+Dal tshom bu lnga ma la brtan nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa brgyud ba khyad par gnyis ldan gyi phyag len ltar nos /
slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i sdom pa nyi shu pa'i lung /
sems bskyed kyi cho ga rje btsun gong ma rnams kyi gsung rab kyi don snying por bsdus pa dor chen dkon cog lhun grub (tha? )b+ho? kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha'i lung /
slob ma rjes 'dzin song nas slob dpon bsnyen pa kha gso ba dang de'i bar bsag sbyang gi 'khrid nos pa ltar nyams len thun bzhir bcad de nan tan du bstar /
tshar chen gyis /
rgyal yum bdag med mkha' 'gro la / /
paN grub dbang pa bi ru bas / /
nos pa nas bzung da lta'i bar / /
rtsa ba'i bla ma yan chad du / /
dbang bzhi'i chu bo ma nub pa'i / /
bla ma'i gsung ngag bdud rtsi'i rgyun / /
tshad ma bzhi ldan dbang bzhi'i lam / /
rdo @# / /
rje theg pa'i snying po yin / /
zhes pa ltar bla med rdo rje theg pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i smin grol gnyis gyi thog mar kye rdo rje lha dgu'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor chen por mus chen gyis mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil dang tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i lhan thabs zung du 'jug par zhal shes phyag len gyis brgyan te dbang gi mngon par rtogs pa brgyad tshang ba'i sgo nas rgyu dus kyi dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa bshad pas mtha' dpyad de sbyang gzhi sbyong byed legs par ngo 'phrod pa smin rgyas su nos /
aSh+Ta'i bzlas q?? lung /
rje btsun yum bka' rdo rje bdag med lha mo bco lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil gyi yi ge'i steng nas rgyu dus kyi dbang phyin ci ma log pa thog de ltar nos pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa rnams mi nyams par bsrung ba gsal bar ston pa'i rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel nyi? pa 'khrul pa spong las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi nang tshan /
ba zhes bya ba rje btsun chen po grags pas mdzad pa /
rtsa ba yan lag gi lhung ba'i rnam bshad 'khrul spong rab gsal bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i dam tshig gi tshogs rnam ngag? par bshad pa'i zin bris bag yod gtam gyi bdud rtsi /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i rgyun gyi bza' ba'i dam tshig bdud rtsi ril bu'a sgrub pa rje btsun chen po'i yi ge'i gsal byed /
khyad par gyi bza' ba'i dam tshig gi tshogs 'khor nyi? 'bring po las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi nang chan /
rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa /
sa paN gyis mdo smad ling chu tser khab kyi gtsug lag khang du mdzad brang? pa'i tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas ba rtsod spong ma /
rgyal sras jing king gi gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas 'phags e? pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor bdud rtsi'i bum pa /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen pos mdzad pa'i tshogs mchod chog khrigs ma /
dkar shAkya grags kyis gsol ba btab pa la brten nas rje btsun gyis mdzad /
shI? pa'i lam gyi yan lag dpal he ru ka'i chas drug gi yi ge /
slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mos mdzad pu? pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes nyan pa'i kun spod sogs ston pa /
mngon rtogs rgyas pa yan lag bzhi pa nyi? slob dpon rin po che rtse mos mdzad pa /
las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi nang tshan rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs 'bring po yan lag drug a? pa tshig sna ring thung gnyis yod pa'i thung ba /
des mdzad pa'i rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma'i rim pa gnyis nyi? 'khor dang bcas pa'i mngon rtogs las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi nang tshan rje btsun rtse mos mdzad pa'i dbang gi chu bo chen a? po ma nub pa'i phyag len /
des mdzad pa'i zhi ba 'ba' zhig gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga nyi? zhib tu bstan cing rnam gzhag mdor bsdus pa /
las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi nang tshan /
de'i 'phros las las bzhi ga'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga nyi? mdor bstan zhing rnam gzhag rgyas par bstan pa rje btsun chen po gags pas mdzad pa /
des dge slong kun dga' tshul khrims kyi ngor cog? mdzad pa'i dus mtha' ma'i chog gzhan phan bdud rtsi /
slob dpon rin po ches mdzad pa'i @# / /
rab gnas ku? bzang po drug pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses sgo rum par gsan pa'i gsan yig na tshogs 'khor gyi tshab tu 'di las dang po pa dang thun mong gi chos bdun gyi gras su 'dug pa dkar chag dang ma mthun na'ang /
ngas mdzad pa'i khog 'bubs su dkar chag dang mthun par 'dug pa tha tshom mi bya'o? / /
rje btsun chen po grags pas mdzad shI? pa'i rab gnas don gsal rnams /
dbang gi ye shes la log par rtog pa dgag cing 'og nas 'byung ba'i lam thams cad skyon med par sgrub pa'i slad du kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi lta ba'i 'khrid sa gzhung spel ba'i bshad yam tsam min par 'khor 'das dbyer med rtsa 'grel la brten nas sems 'tshol sogs rig thog tu brdar sha dpyad /
lus thabs rgyud la dbang bzhi dang 'brel ba'i lam gyi thog mar bum dbang dang 'brel ba phyi bskyod pa'i rim pa slob dpon mtsho skyes kyi bzhed pa'i zab pa'i tshul dgu'i sems 'dzin gyis kha bskangs te gsal snang ma mthong bar bsgom pa'i mos blor byas /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad nyi? ba'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa /
mus chen sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa bya bral mar grags pa /
des mdzad pa'i dbang chu gsal ba'i me long /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs nor bu'i 'phreng ba /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos mdzad pa'i kye rdor sgrub thabs /
lca? kyi rgya cher bshad pa bskyed rim gnad kyi zla zer /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa'i dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs kyi legs su? par bshad pa las dang po pa la phan pa sgrub pa nyin mor byed pa'i snang ba /
tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i bskyed rim kyi rnam zur? bshad legs par bshad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i bsnyen chen ra? gyi yi ge dpyid kyi dga' ston /
des mdzad pa'i bsnyen pa kha skong gi sbyin sreg rnams kyis rang gzhan gyi don gang sgrub kyang phyin ci ma log par shes pa'i rdo rje slob dpon du bsgrubs nas /
phyi rol tu zhen pa'i gdon gyi gnyen por nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi don dam lus kyi dkyil 'khor du rgyang 'dur ba dkon cog dpal dang mkhan chen bsod blo sogs kyis bskul nas bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas lam dus kyi dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa /
bla ma dam pa'i lus dkyil dbang chog zhabs na tho tsam yod pa'i steng nas lus dkyil lam q? dus kyi lam 'bring po dang bsdus pa'i dbang /
yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas q? lung bcas pa stsal nas /
nang bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom bya'i don la thos bsam gyis sgro 'dogs dpyad de dpyad don nyams su len pa bskyed rim sems 'dzin gyi nyams 'khrid lam dus kyi nyams len gyi yi ge mus chen 'khor lo sdom bas mdzad pa /
lam dus kyi dbang gi cho ga bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i lung rnams /
gsang dbang gi lam bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i 'khrid kyi thog mar nang gi bdag med ma gtum mo drod bskyed pa'i slad du rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga'i sid+huM? ra'i dkyil 'khor du byin rlabs kyi brgyad pa ma nyams par thob nas /
bdag byin gyis brlab pa khams 'dus pa dang po rlung gtum mo drod rtags kyi 'khrid ces pa @# / /
gtum mo'i dmigs rkang bco brgyad kyi rim pa /
pho nya'i lam mam shes rab ye shes kyi lam zhes bya ba khams 'dus pa bar ma dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dod pa'i lcags kyu dga' bzhi lugs 'byung lugs ldog tu nyams su blang ba'i 'khrid /
khams 'dus pa mtha' ma skyon med gnyug ma ye shes kyi lam 'khrid dam dbang bzhi pa'i lam rba rlabs gsum gyi 'khrid dang bcas pa'i dbang bzhi re re la'ang /

rgya lus dang bcas pa'i dbang bo rab 'bring tha ma'i lam cha tshang ba re re 'khrid rim du tshang bar stsal /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pas rje btsun brtse ba chen po pa la dngos su gnang ba'i man ngag sa skya'i lcags ri'i khongs las mi 'da' ba bzhi'i nang chen lam zab phyi nang gsang gsum las lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi phyi ma'i q? 'khrid kyi byin rlabs /
de'i yi ge bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzed pa /
lam zab nang ma'i 'khrid q? kyi byin rlabs /
de'i yi ge khri chen kun dga' bsod nams kyis khri? mdzad pa'i don gnyis mthar phyin bla ma rin cen 'byung ldan gyi byin rlabs /
de'i yi ge tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis brtse chen zhabs la dngos su gnang ba'i phyi'i bar gcod bsrung ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi bsrung q? ba thun mong ba'i byin rlabs /
de'i yig rnying /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi bsrung q? ba nang ma'i byin rlabs /
de dang 'brel ba'i bir bsrung q? gi bsrung nyi? ba'i dmigs rim /
sngon chad zhal shes kho nar bzhugs pa'i bir bsrung q? gi cha lag zab mo'i dmigs 'khrid /
bla ma don grub kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor bye brag pa mtshar gsum khug (q? pa'i byin rlabs /
de'i yi ge )nya? rje btsun chen po grags pas mdzad pa /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi yi ge ltar brda don (q? gsal ba'i byin rlabs /
lam sbas )q? bshad kyi byin rlabs /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa'i zin bris ltar dbang bzhi q? ngo sprod kyi byin rlabs /
man ngag gces bsdus kyi rten 'brel q? gyi byin rlabs /
lum pa ba byams pa kun dga' chos grags kyi yi ge ltar rnam 'joms q? bir lugs kyi byin rlabs /
man ngag rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar brda tshig q? rgyud kyi byin rlabs /
gsung ngag stan thog gcig tu nyams su blang ba'i tshul ston pa lam bsdus te sgrub pa'i lung sbyin pa /
lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar gsang ba q? bcus rgyas gdab pa /
bstan ba gtad cing bka' bsgo ba'i tshul du lam 'bras pa'i mgon rkyang gi rjes gnang dang bzhi 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i reg zig la brten pa dang bcas pha rnams /
