gnyis pa de rnams kyi rgyab rten du bstan bcos tshad ma dang 'brel pa'i lung thob pa la /
thog mar gsung ngag glegs bam du grags par /
gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas ba'i glegs bam gyi dkar chag rje btsun 'di glegs bam gyi dbur bzhugs kyang chos sna drug cur mi gtogs so / /
chen pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa /
gsung ngag rin po ches rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rgang 'di rje btsun chen po'i glegs bam dkar chag na mi gsal bar brten rjes 'brang mang po zhig glegs bam gyi gangs su mi 'dren pa'i log rtog gi 'khrul gtam smra'o / /
gzhung chung yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gnyag bzhi rab pa @# / /
dbang phyug rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa'i ngor dpal ldan sa skya pa chen pos mdzad pa'i rnam 'grel gnyag ma /
rnam 'grel bcu gcig tsam yod pa'i nang nas 'di gzhung nyung la don rgyas pa'i khyad du 'phags zhes dkar chag tu snang ngo / /
dkar chag las mi gsal ba gsal bar byed pa la zhal las shes so zhes smos pa dgu las med kyang gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod de zhes gsal byed kyi yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis don bsdus ma dang bcas pa las kun gzhi'i yi ge don bsdus pa /
gdan sogs kyi yi ge /
lus kyi dkyil 'khor phyi yig chung /
bum dbang gi 'da' kha ma'i skabs su 'chi ltas 'khrul 'khor 'chi blu dang bcas pa snang ba bsgyur ba'i 'da' kha ma ste bum dbang gi yig chung chos sde gcig tu 'dren pa /
gsang dbang gi thig le'i rnal 'byor /
shes rab ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid /
bzhi pa'i 'da' kha ma bum dbang dang thun mong du yi ges sgo dgag pa dang bcas pa'i yig chung 'di ni bum dbang dang thun mong yin no'i mtha' can /
bar do bzhi'i yig chung /
lam dus kyi dbang rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi yig chung /
tshad ma bzhi'i yig chung /
gdams ngag drug gi yig chung /
rten 'brel lngar bstan pa'i lam gyi yig chung /
sgrib sel dang gnas sbyong 'byams gcod kyi za byed mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg klu sgrub pa'i kho babs su 'di sAts+tsha'i mjug tu 'dug /
ge yig chung /
gdon gyi grib khrus kyis sel ba'i yig chung /
grib ma sAts+tshas sel ba'i yig chung /
thig le 'dzag pa bsrung ba'i yig chung /
yi ge brgya pa gdon thabs kyi yig chung ste 'khor 'das thun mong gi skabs dgos pa bcu bdun /
rlung gi sbyor ba bdun /
b+ha ga'i yi ge bcu bzhi ste 'khor lo 'cham pa la gnyis /
gsang dbang gi skabs su 'khor bzhi'i rgya /
bzhi ba'i dbang phyug gi don brgyad /
mthar phyin pa'i sa bcu gsum phyed 'og ma'i mngon rtogs te 'das lam gyi skabs su gsum gyi gsal byed nyi shu rtsa gnyis so / /
byang chub sems dpa' a seng gis zhus pa'i ngor sa skya pa chen pos gnang ba'i 'grel pa thams cad kyi don bsdus kyi tshigs bcad rnam 'grel a seng mar grags pa ste nyi shu rtsa gsum glegs bam 'di nyid chad ma bzhi dang sbyar na 'di yan gyi chas chen nyi shu rtsa lnga po bstan bcos tshad ma /
ni bstan bcos 'di nyid kyi steng du bshad par bya ba yin no /
de dag las 'phros pa'i gud du gsungs pa'i chos skor la /
kun gzhi rgyu rgyud las 'phros nas snying po'i don lta ba 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi rtsa ba tshig le'ur byas pa rin po che'i snang ba sh+lo ka nyi shu ma 'grel pa dang bcas pa /
thabs rgyud gdan sogs las 'phros pa dbang bzhi'i cho ga mtha' dag mdor bsdus pa'i man ngag gi yi ge'am rgyu dus su dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa'i man ngag gi gnad /
gdan sogs las 'phros pa mchog dbang gsum grol lam la brten nas bskur ba'i man ngag /
lam sogs nyi shu las 'phros nas phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa'i gnang ces pa rgyas 'bring mi 'dra ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i mjug tu bsdus pa la bsod nams tshogs gsog sogs gsal bar bstan pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse dang rje klu sgrub pa'i khog 'bubs su gong du smos zin pa'i las dang po ba dang thun mong du dgos pa'i chos sna bdun po 'dir bgrangs 'dug cing /
dkar chag na 'phrin las so gnyis kyi mjug na 'dug pa dngos gzhi dkar chag gtso che na'ang bskyed rim mdor bsdus sogs dang sde chen bstun na khog 'bubs 'thad par mngon zhing bdag chen rdo rje 'chang @# / /
ga bzhed pa'ang re ba? yin nam snyam mo /
dam tshog las 'phros ba bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub tshul /
gsang sngags snyan brgyud sogs ma char pa las 'phros nas rdo rje bdag med ma'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa'i tho yig brtse chen snying bo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa /
dkar chag tu byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa ni logs su rtogs par bya'o gsung ba 'di yin la phra mo'i chos sde ba yang gtogs so / /
bsrung ba sum cu dang man ngag gi gnad bdun cu las 'phros nas gegs sel gyi yi ge bzhi byung ba las thog mar bsam gtan 'dor ba'i 'phrang bdun gyi gegs sel thabs /
klu sgrub ba'i khog 'bubs na 'di gnyis go? ldog 'dug na'ang dkar chag dang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i khog 'bubs na 'di ltar byung ngo / /
byung rgyal du mi gtang ba'i gnad bzhi /
lus 'khrugs rlung dang spyod lam gyis sel ba /
rnal 'byor gyi 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis te dgu po 'di glegs bam du dngos su bzhugs shing /
las dang po ba dang thun mong du dgos pa'i chos bdun po deng sang glegs bam 'dir mi bzhugs pas gong du smos zin na'ang don du de dag thams cad rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang las 'bros pa'i skor yin /
dkar chag tu glegs bam 'don gnas kyang 'gal ba med la sa dang po pa dang thun mong du dgos pa'i phyir logs su 'dug kyang nyes pa med do zhes so / /
lam rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi rgyas pa gong du bshad ma thag pa ltar dang /
'bring po tsa ba med pa'i lam 'bras 'bring du bsdus nas gang zag gcig gis lam 'bras bu dang bcas ma tshang ba med par ston pa /
rang gi gzhung cung zad yod pa sgrub pa'i lung sbyin pa'am 'bogs pa lam bsdus pa /
de ltar lam rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum mtha' dag rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang pa'i phyir gzhung shing chen po bzhi las thog mar gzhung ji lta bar bkri ba'i 'khrid yig jo lcags mar grags pa lho brag pa dkar ston jo sras lcags kyi rdo rjes lan mang du gsol ba btab pa la brten nas mdzad pa /
dkar chag dang rin po che klu sgrub ba'i khog 'bubs su 'di ltar 'dug cing rje mkhyen brtse'i khog 'bubs na gzhung shing dang rtogs pa bskyed pa bsdoms pa'i chos tshan dgu bo gegs sel gyi 'gor 'dug pa tshad ma bzhi dang sbyor ba'i dbang du byas na don la gnas so / /
man ngag gi gnad drug gis bkri ba'i 'khrid yig khyad par can /
brtson 'grus can man ngag gi gnad bcu gcig gis bkri ba'i 'khrid yig /
gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gsum bkri ba'i 'khrid yig dang bzhi /
de ltar nyams su blangs pa las byung ba'i rtogs pa bogs dbyung ba'i phyir rtogs pa bskyed pa'i chos lnga la thog mar lam 'jug ldog mgyogs byed pho nya'i lam phyag rgya 'jug ldog /
shes pas phan 'dogs pa'i man ngag bdun /
'khor 'das kyi lam thun mong du bsre ba dang /
'gros bzhi bcas pa'i yi ge /
phyi nang gi mdzad pa bcu gnyis /
rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir dkar chag dang klu sgrub pa'i khog 'bub ma kyi dngos bstan las bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi phyag dpe'i dpe ris rnams cung zad mar bar snang ngo / /
'chi ltas brtag ba rgyas pa'i dpe chung /
ma nges pa'i 'chi ltas kyi dpe chung /
de gnyis dang 'dra min re /
rtsa'i dpe ris rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum /
gsung ngag dkyus dang sras den ma'i lugs kyi b+ha ga'i yi ge bcu bzhi'i dpe chung so so /
yang b+ha ga'i dpe chung lugs gcig nyams skye chul dang bcas pa /
rnal 'byor gyi 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis dpe ris /
gegs sel gzhan gyi dpe chung gnyis /
lam sbas @# / /
bshad kyi rigs drug skye ba brtag pa'i dpe chung rnams rnam grangs gcig tu 'dren no / /
gang zag dbang po rab bla mas grol bas lam gzhan la ltos mi dgos pas de'i cha rkyen lam zab 'bring gsum las lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor bla ma chen po'i dbu bsnyung ma /
'di yan la rtog pa bsal ba'i skor ma gtogs dngos bstan gyi yi ge rnams kyi steng dbang chu /
sgrub thabs yan lag bzhi? drug /
bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs /
sbyin sreg rnams bsnan pa'i chos sna sum cu bo nyams myong tshad ma yin no / /
tshad ma bzhi pa bka' yang dag pa'i lung tshad ma dang sbyor bar lung tshad ma gsung ngag rin po che 'di nyid dang mdor bsdus te sbyar ba lam phyi ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o'i mtha' can /
gsung ngag rin po che lung mtha' dag dang mdor bsdus te sbyar ba gsung ngag? chad ma lung dang sbyar ba'i gdams ngag go'i mtha' can /
rje btsun brtse ba chen pos mdzad pa'i gsung ngag rin po che lung 'di nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba dkar chag tu lung 'di nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba ni logs su shes par bya'o gsung ba 'di yin pas /
dpe le lar dmar gyis mdzad tshul 'dug pa ni mchan bu lta bu dmar gyis mdzad pa yod srid pa la 'khrul lam snyam mo /
phra mo'i chos sder? yang snang ngo /
gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba dang rgyud kyi yan lag rgyas par dbye ba dang sbyar ba gsum gyi sgo nas bstan pa lung sbyor gsum po 'di lung tshad ma /
mtshon gyis bsrung la mkha' 'gros bzod par gsol gyi mtha' can /
bla ma tshad mar sbyar ba'i skabs kyi bla ma brgyud pa rgya gar ba'i lo rgyus zhes pa rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi rnam thar /
'di gnyis bla ma tshad ma'o / /
bla ma brgyud pa bod kyi lo rgyus zhes pa 'brog mi lo chen nas sa skya pa chen po'i bar gyi rtogs brjod mdor bsdus /
'di yan gyis lam 'bras glegs bam chos sna drug cu zhes pa tshang ba yin la /
rjes 'bang la la dag rdo rje'i tshig rkang dang rtog bsal dor nas yi ge med pa'i lung sbyor rgyas ba dang phra mo'i dkar chag gnyis 'dren pa dang /
ngor lugs pa 'ga' zhig rdo rje'i tshig rkang gi tshab tu man ngag phra mo gzhan rnams gcig tu 'dren par dkar chag tu man ngag phra mo gzhan gyi dkar chag ni bri bar ma nus zhes pa dang dngos su 'gal /
rdzong pa'i bzhed par rdo rje'i tshig rkang gi tshab tu g.yag drug cu'i grangs su rdzi'u brtsi ba ltar dkar chag 'dren pa 'dug na'ang rang re kha'u brag rdzong pa'i brgyud 'dzin gsang chen slob bshad pa rnams kyi lugs la mi bzhed cing /
deng sang yongs grags la glegs bam du nges par bzhugs dgos pa bzhi bcu zhe dgu dkar chag la snga rtsom phyi rtsom gyi khyad nas la lar 'khor 'das dbyer med rtsa 'grel med 'dug pa de'i dbang gis zhe dgung? ngos bzung ngam snyam /
zhes grags na'ang dkar chag gi tshig gis zin pa lnga bcu nga gcig /
logs su bzhugs pa byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa dang lung 'di nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba gnyis /
glegs bam 'dir bzhugs kyang rung zhing ma bzhugs kyang rung ba'i yig sna bdun dang bcas pas chos sde drug cu tham pa /
yang chos sde drug cur dngos su mi gtogs par glegs bam du bzhugs pa /
bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' zha? yang dag pa lung gi tshad ma lung 'di nyid dang sbyar na mthar thug rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi bka'i dbang du byas te gleng gzhi'i mdo dang gleng bslang gi mdo rgyud don rgyas pa dang sbyar ba slob dpon rin po ches mdzad pa phra mo'i chos sder yang the /
mjug na 'di ni @# / /
bdag cag spun gnyis dang bka' lung pa dang rmog ston dang bzhis zhus pa lags zhes sogs yod pa /
rnam 'grel gnyag ma'i mjug tu rje btsun sa skya pa'i phyag dpe la gtugs te dag par byas so zhes bris pa'i dkar shAkya grags kyi phyag dpe la dpe phyi byas pas shin tu yid ches pa'i gnas su rig par bya'o / /
'khon bya bral ba ma ti'i ming can gyi yi dam du bya ba'i chos athii zhes pa mjug tu bris pa'i bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan dbal bzang po'i phyag dpe dngos rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen ba rtse'i dbang phyug khu dbon gsum dang bcas pa'i phyag dpe'i steng nas ma chan rnying par ma zad bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi gsung mchan phyag bris ma dang bcas legs par nos /
de yang rjes 'brang gi mkhas pa mang dag 'da' kha ma yan las rmi lam man gyi 'khrid lam 'bras glegs bam tshor gsal bar med pas gsung ngag slob bshad ces bya ba rje btsun gong ma'i dus med snyam pa'i log rtog gi mun pa gti bas pa mang na'ang /
glegs bam dkar chag tu yi ge med pa'i snyan brgyud kyi man ngag mang du thos mod /
yi ge la thun mong dang gang zag so so la gnang nas da dag kyang thun mong du gnang bar gsal ba 'ad dag las rje bla mas gzhan su la yang ma gnang ba'i yi ge kho bo cag kho na la bye brag tu sbas nas snang ba yod na dkon cog gsum dbang ngo /
zhes gsungs bas glegs bam du ma grags pa'i yi ge med pa'i snyan brgyud yod pa dngos su bstan zhing /
rje btsun sa paN gyis /
'on kyang rten 'brel zab mo'i gnad / /
da dung kun gyis shes pa med / /
glegs bam tsam la brten pa yi / /
lam 'bras pas kyang 'di mi shes /
zhes glegs bam la ma brten pa'i snyan nas snyan zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i slob bshad zab mo yod par gsungs shing /
bla mas skya pa chen po'i dus nas slob ma byings la mi ston pa'i man ngag zab mo zur pa zhig yod pa phyogs tsam rig nas skur pa btab par brten rje btsun chen pos /
'gro la bu gcig ltar ba rtse yang / /
bye brag bu la brtse ba yis / /
yi ge sbas pa snang ngo zhes / /
bla ma mchog la skur mi bya /
zhes gsungs pa sogs kyis log rtog gi mdud pa thams cad rang grol du 'gro'o / /
chul de dag la dgongs nas /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis /
yab gcig snyan brgyud bdud rtsi'i zil dngar can / /
thugs rje'i ge sar bzhad ldan zhabs padmor / /
gus btud bung ba bdag kyang slob bshad kyi / /
sbrang rtsi gsar pa'i bde bas ci yang myos / /
zhes dang /
rnam thar las /
'khrul med chos kyi snying po 'di thos tshe / /
rab 'byams shes bya'i rang zhal tshur ston byung / /
yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i nyams len brgyud la khel / /
zab zab phal cher ming rkyang tsam du song / /
zhes dang /
mkhas ba'i dbang po klu sgrub pas /
tshogs par bshad pa'i drang don za zi'i gtam / /
rnam par spangs nas slob bu mchog ngag la / /
gces par gdams pa nges don snying po'i bcud / /
zab mo slob bshad 'khyongs par byin gyis rlobs / /
zhes gsungs pa rang bzhin brjod kyi snyan ngag kho nar yid ches pa'o / /
rgyud gsum mdzes rgyan du /
dam pa'i drin las chos 'di'i zab pa'i gnad / /
mang po'i don la kho bo blo gsal yang / /
thun mong ngag tu brjod @# / /
rung 'ga' zhig tsam / /
'chad par 'gyur gyis mkha' 'gros skabs phye zhig /
cas tshogs bshad pa phal cher kyis mgrin pa bteg nas 'chad pa'i 'khrid yig 'di nyid thun mong tsam du bstan pas kyang de las zab ba zhig med cas smra ba'i lce 'chad par snang ngo / /
rje sa skya pa chen pos gsung ngag 'di la zhub po so so'i don du mdzad pa'i rnam 'grel bcu gcig tsam yod pa'i nang nas shin tu zab cing rgyas ba rigs kyi sras slob dpon rin po che sku mched gnyis kyi don du mdzad pa'i rnam 'grel sras ngon mar sa? grags pa rdo rje'i tshig rkang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i bshad pa zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i gdams ngag rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i glegs bam pod nag tu grags nyi? pa'i skor la /
bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar ngo mtshar snang ba /
phyi dkyil gyi mdon rtogs yan lag drug pa /
lam dus kyi smin byad mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i chul zab pa las kyang ches zab pa /
kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs lam dus dbang gi nyams len dge bshes kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyi ngor mdzad pa /
bla ma la brten nas dngos grub rnam gnyis sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan dang bla ma sras pa'i don du mdzad pa /
lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi yan lag mdo stod pa chos rgyal 'od zer gyi ngor mdzad pa /
lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkri pa'i 'khrid yig sbas don gsal ba /
gnad drug gis bkri ba'i 'khrid kyi gsal byed gnad kyi lde mig /
gnad bcu gcig gis bkri ba'i 'khrid kyi gsal byed gnad kyi sgo 'byed /
dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum bkri ba'i 'khrid kyi gsal byed nyung du rnam gsal /
lam 'bras 'bring du bsdus nas snang ba gsum du gang zag gcig la dgos pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs nas rjod byed kyi sgral ma ltos par brjod bya'i don gtso bo'i dbang du byas nas mtshang ba med par bstan pa'i snyan brgyud /
lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi mdzod rnams /
lam 'bras skor lhag ma dang bcas pa'i tho yig man ngag phra mor grags nyi? pa'i skor la /
rdzong chung ba rtsad rus kyi ming /
byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dkar chag /
de las byung ba'i gdams skor la /
sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
slob dpon rin po ches mdzad pa /
rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa /
sa paN gyis mdzad pa /
'phags pas mdzad pa /
rjes 'brang gi yi ge da drug /
dang po la /
byin rlabs /
gegs sel /
spyi 'gro'i yi ge dang gsum /
dang po la /
lam dus kyi dbang chog gam lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin rlabs mdor bsdus kyi chog bla mas skya pa chen pos mdzad pa dbang tshig tsam gyis thob pa'i gdams ngag sam pa ta mi'i mtha' can /
das mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams par bskur ba'i phyag len tho yig /
'di glegs bam du'ang gtogs /
bod dmar na grags pas mdzad zer /
des mdzad pa'i bir bsrung bod dmar na 'phags pas mdzad bar bshad 'di'i lung len par 'dod pa la bir+wa ba'i byin rlabs sa skya pa la gnang ste rim par brgyud pa'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i aSh+Ta la brten nas dpal kye rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i lung sbyin pa nus pa /
par 'gyur gsung ba'i mtha' can rnams /
bod @# / /
dmar gyi de 'di dang tshig mi mthun /
gnyis pa gegs sel la /
gegs sel nyams chen mo zhes pod dmar na'ang yod /
pa dbu na bir+wa nA tha ya dang ri klung la sogs su cung zad bcags pas spyir gces pa yin gsung ba'i mtha' can /
'di la yi ge 'dra min 'ga' re yod par grags na'ang deng sang glegs bam du gcig pu 'di las mi bzhugs shing yi ge chan pa brgyad kyi bsgrigs rim tsam las tshig don la khyad med tshul dkar chag tu gsal /
gegs sel nyams len chud ba bla ma chen po'i gdams pa dmar 'khrid thugs kyi nyid khu yi ge'i ris su bkod pa 'o'i mtha' can /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
lho brag dkar ston la gnang ba'i gegs sel bar gcod rnam gsum sel ba /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
dpal sa skya pa chen po'i gegs sel bka' rgya ma /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
'di'i mchod brjod du /
'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhabs rdul gus len pa / /
chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya dmar gyis zhus /
zhes pa'i tshig rigs la 'khrul nas dmar gyis mdzad par bzhed pa byung na'ang des zhus ngag mdzad nas tshig rigs de rnams bsnan pa ma gtogs mjug gi mchan bur dzad dza ne /
gtsang bzher /
rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pa khams pa lnga ste bdun la gnang /
bka' rgyas kyang btab bo / /
dzang gis bla chen la zhus nas rje ba sku mched gnyis sbran pas /
rje pa'i zhal nas /
dzang 'di nged la drin che gsung lo / /
zhes pa'i tshig gi nus pas kyang brtse ba chen po'i gsung yin par nges nus so / /
gegs sel gces bsdus zhes pa rten 'brel zab mo'i gnad gzhan gyis nges par bsrung ngo'i mtha' can /
dkar chag tu yi ge tshan ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod gsungs kyang ka thor ya yan gyi nyer bzhi 'dug pa dpyad /
gegs sel gsang bdun ma zhes pa sgom la 'phrang gegs byung na zhal gdams gdab ces pa'i mtha' can /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
gegs sel ha dmigs ma rags btsam lags kyi mtha' can /
lung sbyor nyi shu pa rnams /
gsum pa spyi 'gro'i yi ge la /
dbang bzhi ngo sprod kyi tshigs bcad ma rtsa 'grel /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
lam bsdus pa ngo bo nyid gsum zhes pa lam dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad mdor bsdus te bstan pa /
gsang bcu spyod pa'i rnal 'byor mthar bskyal ba'i spyong pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
gsung ngag rin po che lung 'di nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba rnams /
'di glegs bam du'ang gtogs /
'di tshor sbyar byang med pa 'ga' zhig 'dug cing dkar chag tu 'ga' zhig dngos kyi slob mas gsungs las zin ba bris pa'ang 'dra'o zhes byung bas kyang shes so / /
gnyis pa slob dpon rin po ches mdzad pa ni /
lung 'di nyid dang zhib tu sbyar ba mchan bu ma mjug tu /
'di glegs bam gyi chos sder mi gtogs kyang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang dang lo pa spyan snga sogs kyi phyag dpe khungs thab tshor glegs bam gyi mjug tu bris 'dug /
'di ni bdag cag spun gnyis dang bka' lung pa dang rmog ston pa bzhis zhus tshul yod pa /
gsum pa rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa la /
gsol 'debs /
zhal gdams /
rnam thar dang gsum /
dang po la /
lam 'bras brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs che ba bla ma rdor 'dzin ma /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
chung ba rdo rje 'chang gtso ma /
gnyis pa zhal gdams la /
bra ston blo gros la gdams pa /
mjug na sh+lo ka gcig thol du yod pa zhig bod dmar na'ang yod /
dga' ston rdo rje grags par springs pa /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
@# / /
gsum pa rnam thar la /
bla ma chen po'i ngo mtshar ba'i gtam mang du yod pa'i nang nas dang po gung thang du bzhugs pa dang gnyis pa bzang rgyud 'brog gseb tu byon tshul skor /
bzhi pa sa paN gyis mdzad pa la /
'khrid kha bshad pa| lam zab /
bir bsrung dang bzhi /
dang po la /
lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i 'khrid kyi dkar chag /
'di gsung yin min la rtsod pa byung na'ang bka' bsgrub bstan pa'i skabs bsgrubs zin zhes pa dkar chag tu 'dug go /
lam spas Na? bod dmar na'ang yod /
bshad /
'di la 'dra min 'ga' zhig byung bar brten /
ji skad du /
bdag ni gsang sngags zab mo'i don / /
yi ger byed la cung zad skrag /
'on kyang gzhan gyis sbyar ba la / /
bla ma'i gsung dang 'gal bar mthong / /
des na gsung dang mthun par bkod / /
ces ched du gnyer nas mdzad pa yin no / /
de'i yan lag rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi zhal gyi gdams pa thun mong gi dngos grub chen po bcu zhes pa /
tshe sgrub /
rdo rje chu 'thung /
thig le 'dzag med /
lte bsgyur /
rlung gi bcud len /
'chi blu /
dbang sdud /
gdon 'grol /
nor sgrub /
skye ba brtag pa dang /
phra mo brgyad ces pa gza' bsrung /
bgegs bsrung /
rkyal pa kha gcu /
mig gi rab rib /
lce rig /
snying rlung rnams sel ba /
drod skye ba /
rten 'brel brtag pa'i gdams pa rtsa 'grel /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
rje btsun chen po dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa drug bzhes dus brtse ba chen pos gnang ba'i brda don gsal ba'i rtsa 'grel rdo rje 'dzin thob shog gi mtha' can /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
de'i yan lag 'khrid kyi lung sbyor rgyas bsdus rnams la blta par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
lam bsdus te sgrub pa'i lung sbyin pa'i yi ge rnams /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
gnyis pa bshad pa la /
rtsa sngags kyi rnam par bshad pa snying po'i don gsal /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
phyag rgya chen po'i rab tu dbye ba /
bod dmar na mjug tu skye ba skye ba med pa sogs kyi sh+lo ka gcig thol du yod pa zhig snang /
rdo rje'i tshig rkang las rten 'brel lngas lam yongs su rdzogs par gsungs pa'i dgongs pa phyogs cam bstan pa /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
rlung ltas rten 'brel brtag pa /
sa bdun pa yan chad 'khor bzhi'i rgya zhes pa'i dgongs pa ston pa /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
'gor bla ma'i zhal nas zhes pa dang dbu ma la dbang phyug gi ming btags pa ni dbu ma'i yon tan brgyad do'i mtha' can rnams /
dkar chag nas paN zin bris zer /
gsum pa lam zab ni /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong ma yin pa ling chu rtse bab ma /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor gu shrI jo 'bum la bsrings pa nad 'od na mar brags pa /
bzhi ba bir bsrung la /
bir bsrung thun mong ma yin pa chu la brten pa'i rgyun bsrung dang mi bskyod pa la brten nas nam dgos su bsrung ba /
sngags byang zhu dag ma| rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya /
tsakra'i bsrung ba /
thabs shes kyi bsrung bste bsrung ba gsum /
ril bu bcud len sgrub pa rnams /
lnga pa 'phags pas mdzad pa la /
phyag mchod /
'khrid /
lus dkyil /
lam zab /
thor bu dang lnga /
dang po ni /
chu mo glang ga lo'i nag pa zla bal mdzad pa'i las 'bras brgyud pa'i phyag mchod sangs rgyas kun ngo ma /
gnyis pa 'khrid la /
ngag pa rnam gsum gyi sgo nas rnal 'byor bas nyams su blang ba'i 'khrid yig /
rgyal po la phul ba'i dbang gsum pa'i lam rgyas bsdus @# / /
gnyis so / /
gsum pa lus dkyil la /
kye rdo rje'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba bla ma nyis thog par gnang ba /
dpal kye rdo rje'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i thabs lcags pho rta'i lo gsar shar ba'i tshe mdzad nas dzin gyi ma la phul ba /
lam dus kyi dbang rgyas par len pa'i lag len dpon mo go go can gyi don du shing pho khyi lor mdzad pa /
bzhi pa lam zab la /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag la'u shu ma /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor shod dgon spyan snga ma me phyo byi ba'i lo la mdzad pa rnams /
lnga pa thor bu la /
bir bsrung thun mong bar grags pa zhar byung chu bsrung /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
rdo rje rtse gsum /
phyag rgya /
sngags rgya /
dmigs pa /
lam bsrung /
nyal bsrung dang bcas bstan pa /
bdud rtsi ril bu'i sgrub ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
za byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg /
tshogs sbyor mngon rtogs rnams /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
drug pa gsal byed rjes mai? 'brang gi yi ge la /
sa chen gyi yi ge'i gsal byed /
sa paN gyi yi ge'i gsal byed /
'phags pa'i yi ge'i gsal byed /
gnyag ma cha lag dang bcas pa'i yi ge'i gsal byed dang bzhi /
dang po la /
lus dkyil dbang chog gi gsal byed dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas lcags yos sa ga zla ba'i tshes bcu la mdzad pa'i yus dkyil cho ga gsal ba'i sgron me /
nyams chen mo sogs kyi gsal byed 'gor gegs sel dkar ston ma zhes yod pa'i brda 'gro la chen mo ka nas pa'i bar te man ngag bco lnga yod pa /
sa rgya rkang pas chod kyis srin bu'i zhal dgag pa sogs brda 'grol chung ba gcig nas brgyad kyi bar gyi man ngag /
dkar? ston ma'i gsal byed nang 'byung ba phyi rol gdon gsang ba ting 'dzin sems kyi bar chad rnam gsum gsal ba sbrub? thabs ltar ro sa ma pa tha mi thi'i mtha' can /
bka' rgya ma'i gsal byed na bza' pa'i dbyug bcos tshegs chung la don cheb gsal byed sgron me /
dbang bzhi ngo sprod kyi gsal byed ngo sprod byin rlabs kyi lag len bar ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa rnams /
gnyis pas paN gyi yi ge'i gsal byed la /
'khrid kyi dmigs pa'i thun gyi dkar chag gi gsal byed zangs tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi zin bris /
chos rje gzungs pas bla ma klu pa la gnang ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong ma yin pa sid+ha d+h+wa dza'i dri lan /
lam sbas bshad kyi gsal byed 'gor 'di la rdza'i 'khor lo sor bzhi pa zhes yod pa'i sbas bshad lag len zin bris 'khrul 'khor bdun po ston gyin gda' 'o'i mtha' can /
phra grub kyi gsal byed 'gor dpal ldan mthu stobs dbang phyug dang zhes yod pa'i grub chen dang phra mo'i zhal shes zin bris che ba kun la ston par mi bya'o'i mtha' can /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
'gor mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs zhes yod pa'i phra grub kyi zhal shes chung ba snying gar bcer ba 'o'i mtha' can /
che ba 'di la brda don gsal ba'i 'grel ba'i gsal byed lho pa rin chen dpal gyi zin bris rnams /
dkar chag tu 'di bud+d+ha shrIs byas pa'i sbyar byang bris pa snang mong yi ge rnying pa yin bas phyis su byas pa ma yin no gsungs pa 'thad pa 'dra ste 'god lho bas nan tan gyis bzung rab tu bris zhes pas kyang shes nus so / /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
gsum pa 'phags pa'i yi ge'i gsal byed ni /
'gor rdo rje'i tshig rkang nas bsrung ba'i 'khor @# / /
lo zhes yod pa'i bir bsrung gi gsal byed bsrung ba gsum dang sbyar ba swa d+hEM swA hA'i mtha' can /
dkar chag na 'di nges pa mi 'dug kyang 'phags pa'i der sbyar bde tshul 'dug pas gcig gi nges bzung dka' ba 'dra'o / /
pod dmar na'ang bzhugs /
bzhi pa gnyag ma cha lag dang bcas pa'i gsal byed yi ge la /
gnyag ma gsal byed kyi yi ge /
'phros don gsal byed kyi yi ge /
lam 'bring po gsal byed kyi yi ge /
gzhung shing gsal byed kyi yi ge dang bzhi /
dang po la /
'gor rgyud dang man ngag la sogs pa nyan pa'i dus su zhes yod pa'i gzhung bshad bar? gsal byed par ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rang gi blo nus dang sbyar ba'i zin bris /
'gor lus zungs skyed pa'i skabs su bcud len ni zhes yod pa'i bdud rtsi la brten pa'i gsal byed bcud len zhal shes ting nge 'dzin shugs chung du 'gro bas 'dzags par btags te 'o'i mtha' can /
gnyis pa 'phros don gsal byed kyi yi ge la /
'khor 'das dbyer med kyi zin bris par sdings pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
'dir kha phral ba ma gtogs lam skor gyi zin bris rnams 'di'i 'gor bris nas mdzad byang gcig gis thus pa thog ma'i rtsom gzhir yod 'dug /
rlung bcu sogs kyi gegs sel la nang gses kyi srog 'dzin nas rtsa dang ba spu'i tshogs thams cad la rgyu ba'i bar gyi rlung bcu'i gegs sel sdom dang bcas pa /
gzugs brnyan bsgom pa'i sbyor ba nas er po che'i bar gyi gegs sel /
lus mtha' dag na ba nas gsang rlung sems la rengs pa'i bar gyi gegs sel /
khyab byed rengs pa nas shes rab kyi ar snod bcud yul gyi stong pa mthong yul 'gags pa'i bar gyi gegs sel /
thur sal nas shin tu rgyu ba'i bar rlung bcu'i gegs sal zhar byung zas dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bcos pa dang thig le 'chor ba bsrung ba'i zhal shes dang bcas pa rlung bcu'i 'phrin las so gnyis kyi zhal shes zhes pa lam 'bras 'khrul 'khor gyi zhal shes bdun par grags pa rnams /
pod dmar na gsham du rlung zas sman gyis bsal ba dang grib gtor ba sna khrag gcod pa zhu'i 'khrul 'khor rnams btags pa zhig 'dug /
gsum pa lam 'bring po gsal byed kyi yi ge la /
'gor lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad bsdus na lnga ste zhes yod pa'i lam 'bring po'i zin bris che ba rje'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin bris pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
'gor rje yi gsung ngag rin chen 'di zhes yod pa'i lam 'bring po'i zin bris chung ba bla ma'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin bris pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
bzhi pa gzhung shing gsal byed kyi yi ge la /
gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bgri ba'i gzhung shing gsal byed gnyag snying po rgyal mtshan gyis bla ma rin po che'i gsung bzhin dben glan mkhan du bris pa /
gnyag gis mdzad ces pa'i gsal kha mi 'dug kyang dkar chag tu nges mdzad par ngos bzung zhing nyan chen pa'i gsung min pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bcas snang ngo / /
gsung ngag lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gzhung 'khrid mkhyen rab dang thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa bla ma nyan po'i gsung dang bcas pa rnams /
dkar chags gcad kyis ma zin yang zhar byung du gsal ba la /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dbang phyug 'od zer gyi don du gtsang kha dgon par zha? mdzad pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor tshar gsum khug pa /
pod dmar na'ang yod /
aSh+Ta la brten nas gzhan gyi byad bzlog pa gar thod thod du mi bya gsung pa'i mtha' @# / /
can /
go cha lnga'i bsrung bas skya'i lcags ri mi 'da' ba'i zab chos /
rten 'brel la mnga' brnyes pa rnal 'byor dbang dkar? phyug bir+wa pa'i man ngag rten 'brel gyi bsrung ba'i byin rlabs /
rmi lam dang nad dang dgra zhi ba bcal lo zhes snang yang deng sang dpe rgyun dang chos rgyun gnyis ka med 'dra /
lam skor lhag ma brgyad kyi chos tshan kha shas bgrangs 'dug pa ni phal cher glegs bam du bzhugs pa shas che /
de thams cad la nye bar mkho ba'i gnad drug ces pa bskyed rim /
pod dmar na lam 'bras kyi chos sder bgrangs 'dug /
rlung /
mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs /
phyag rgya ma /
phyag rgya chen po /
rten 'brel te drug ston pa /
lam skor byung tshul zhes pa'i yig chung lam dgu po bla ma bzhi la gsan gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lo rgyus bla ma sa skya pa chen po'i gsung sgros ji lta ba bzhin rang gi slob ma'i ngor dkar ston chos 'od kyis dbri bsnan med par bris pa /
bslam gyis mi khyab pa'i byin rlabs bla chen 'brog mi la rang gis thob pa ltar brjed byang du bris pa 'di ni yab yum dbang rdzogs thob par gdams te byin pa /
'di 'brog mi'i dngos slob gcig gi yin tshul dkar chag na 'dug /
bar ston gyi lam skor zin bris la /
mchod rten drung thob /
bsam mi khyab /
padma badzra gyi lam /
lhan cig skyes grub /
gtum mo lam rdzogs rnams kyi zin bris chos chan gcig tu bsdebs pa /
thog mar rtsom nga'i dus 'di rnams 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi 'gor bris yod 'dug /
gnyag snying po rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa nyams su len pa'i 'khrid /
mdzad byang na hri da d+h+wa ja zhes rgya skad du bris 'dug /
'gor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gdams ngag 'di la zhes yod pa'i zin bris chen mo lta ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lngas rgyu dus su gtan la phab ste lam dus su lus ngag yid gsum sbyangs nas 'bras bu lung bstan pa'i phyag rgyas 'tshams sbyar bas gnas 'gyur gyi sku gsum yan lag bdun ldan 'grub par byed pa 'o'i mtha' can /
sgo drug chos 'brel zhes ba rje 'brog ni /
sa bla ma shan+ti pa la slob gnyer tshar nas mkhas pa gzhan lnga la'ang gzhung dang man ngag re gsan pa'i shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa'i phyi rol gyi gdon bsrung ba dz+nyA na shrI'i 'byung 'khrugs sel ba /
rin chen rdo rje'i ting 'dzin sems kyi bar chad bsrung ba dang gsum dz+nyA? chos sde gcig tu byas pa'i yi ge /
pod dmar na'ang yod /
nA ro pa'i phyag rgya chen po sdug bsngal gsum sel gyi gsal nA? phyed rje btsun grags pas mdzad pa zhar byung bzhi pa man chad rlung dang bstun tshul /
bod dmar na'ang yod /
ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i gnyug ma dran gsal lam dbang wA? bzhi'i lam zhes bya ba /
pod dmar na 'di'i mjug tu brtag gnyis kyi lung sogs 'ga' zhig drangs pa'i mthar zhang 'phags pa lhas bskul nas rje btsun gyis mdzad tshul 'dug /
des mdzad pa'i dbang bzhi'i cha wA? lag zab don dang bcas pa /
pod dmar na gnyug ma dran gsal dngos 'di la ngos bzung 'dug /
rje 'brog mi bod du 'byon khar shan+ti pas gnang ba'i mdo sha? rgyud bsre ba'i nyams len dang bcas pa rnams /
phra mo na'ang yod /
glegs bam phra mor mi gtogs pa'i rdzong lugs kyi yig cha'i skor la /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i lam dus kyi dbang gu? rgyas 'bring bsdus pa len pa'i lag len bdud rtsi'i snying po /
rje btsun gong @# / /
ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i chos skor gyi dkar chag gi yi ge mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes byed gyi lo smin drug zla bar dpal ldan sa skyar mdzad pa /
des me pho spre'u'i lo khrums kyi zla ba'i tshes lnga la dpal ldan sa skyar mjad pa'i gegs sel bzhi'i yi ge'i gsal byed /
rig pa 'dzin pa byams pa nam mkha' rgyal mtshan gyis me 'brug dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bcu gcig la lo bur mdzad pa'i rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang gi sa gcad zhib tu sbyar ba rnams / /
! po ti dmar chung du grags pa'i lam 'bras sgrub? kyi yi ge'i skor la /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i dkar chag rin po che'i 'phreng ba /
bla ma tshad ma'i skabs su /
rje btsun rin po che grags pas mdzad pa'i bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bla ma rdor 'dzin ma| phra mo na'ang yod /
de'i kha skong shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gsangs khrod ma /
de'i zhar byung kha skong du ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i shar chen dang bud+d+ha shrI'i gsol 'debs /
sa chen yab sras dang bir+wa pa mjal ba'i lo rgyus sga theng la bskur ba /
nyams myong tshad ma'i skabs su /
bra ston blo gros kyis zhus pa'i gzhung ji lta ba bzhin tu bkri ba'i 'khrid yig tshigs bcad ma rje btsun grags pas mdzad pa /
phra mor ma mjug na sh+lo ka gcig med pa zhig 'dug /
brtse ba chen pos mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rnal 'byor dbang dus su rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa dang thun mong 'chi ba thub pa yod ngo'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i aSh+Ta'i bzlas lung bla ma'i phyag len mdzad pa bzhin bris pa 'o'i mtha' can /
phra mo'i de 'di dang mi gcig pa 'dug /
sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rnam par bshad phra mo na'ang yod /
pa snying po don gsal /
bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub pa'i phyag len bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes pa 'phags pas mdzad pa /
phra mo na'ang yod /
dbang gi rab dbye rje btsun grags pa'i gsung bzhin zhang btsun gyis bris pa /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis byi lo nag zla'i tshes bcu la /
sga ston rdo rje grags la springs yig /
phra mor yang yod /
skyu ra'i dbon po dpon g.yog gis gsol ba btab pa la brten nas sa paN gyis bsam yas su mdzad pa'i phyi nang gsang gsum gyi maN+Dal /
de'i kha skong shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i pags pa gser gyis gzhi ma /
'gor dang po lag bkru lta bu ste zhes yod pa'i lus sbyong nyi shu'i gsal byed mdud 'grol zin bris nor bzang pas mdzad pa /
lus gnad la dbab pa'i gdams pa tshigs bcad mas paN gyi zhabs la spyi bos rab tu btud pa'i dpal ldan phug pa dmar gyis zin bris kun dang thun mong ma yin pa /
bdag med ma'i byin rlabs brgyud pa ma nyams pa'i lag len gyi tho yig rje btsun grags pas mdzad pa /
phra mor 'dug pas chen gyis mdzad par bzhed /
'gor shangs skor yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes yod pa'i 'khor lo bzhi brgya pa sa chen gyis mdzad pa thugs kyi nying khu lags so'i mtha' can /
dpal yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las byung ba'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i dmigs pa nyi shu si?? rtsa dgu pa zhar byung rlung gi rnal 'byor gtso bor bzhed pa bla ma'i zhal shes zhes pa'i gegs sel dang bcas pa /
rje sa skya pa chen pos lho brag dkar ston la gnang ba'i phyi nang gsad pa'i bar gcod @# / /
gsum sel /
phra mo na'ang yod cing gsham na sna khrag gcod pa'i gdams pa de yang bris 'dug /
'gor rtsa dag par bya ba ni zhes yod pa'i bla ma sa chen gyi nyams chung ba par ba dang mtha' ma la sogs pa 'o'i mtha' can /
phra mor yang yod /
'gor spyir srog 'dzin pa snying gar rengs pa'i tshul bzhi zhes yod pa'i bla ma sa chen gyi nyams chen mo /
phra mor kun gzhi byin rlabs dang me mnyam gyi rlung rengs tshul sogs kyang chos tshan gcig tu bzhed /
mthar dri chen rdo lta bu skam po 'byung gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
khyad par gyi rlung rengs pa lnga 'chos pa sogs kyi thabs bla ma'i zhal la ltos pa khrag de nyid bskol te spod kyis span? nas gtang ngo'i mtha' can /
phra mor thig le bsrung pa yan las mi 'dug /
lho pa dkar ston gyis zhus pa'i gzhan la med pa'i gegs sel gsad bdun ma /
phra mor yang yod /
'gor 'khar 'das kyi chos thams cad bskyed pa'i sa bon zhes yad pa'i gegs sel gling bzhi ma ri bong gi ril ma 'dra ba chu dang bcas nas stan thog tu byung bas sel lo'i mtha' can /
phra mo na nyams chan mo dang sbrel nas 'dug cing sgom chen rdo rje 'bar lus ma bde ba man mi 'dug /
'byung ba lus 'khrugs sogs sel ba'i thabs gags sel gces gnad du grags pa 'di dag thams cad nyams myong rjes su dran pa'i tshad ma las shes par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
dmar chos kyi rgyal pes zhus pa'i gegs sel bka' rgya ma /
phra mor yang yod /
'di khams pa lnga dang rje btsun sku mched gnyis la gnang zhing dzang gis rje btsun sku mched spran pas dzad 'di nged la shin tu drin che gsung ba mjug na snang /
'gor gzhan dbang rten 'brel zhes byas ting nge 'dzin gyi gegs se la ston zhes yod pa'i gegs sel bzhi'i zhal shes 'di la goms nas mchan sum cu so gnyis thob gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
'gor dza lan+d+ha ra zhes yod pa'i 'phrin las pa? so gnyis kyi sdom tshig zhal shes bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad pa /
de'i zhal shes 'khor lag gnyis bsnol ba zhes yod pa re mos rdeg gi mtha' can /
sa skya pa chen pos mdzad pa'i dbang bzhi ngo sprod /
phra mo na'ang yod /
de'i 'grel ba /
'gor rje btsun thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes yod pa'i brda don gsal ba'i rtsa ba sa paN gyis mdzad pa /
phra mor yang yod /
de'i rang 'grel rtsom pa dam bcar /
rdo rje'i tshig 'byed brda don gsal ba 'di /
dbus gtsang mtshams su bla ma rje la gnang zhes yod pa /
de'i gsal byed lho pas gsung bzhin zin bris su mdzad pa /
phra mo na'ang yod /
bstan bcos tshad ma'i skabs su bskyed rim /
rlung /
byin rlabs /
phyag rgya ma /
phyag rgya chen po /
rten 'brel te gnad du che ba drug gi gdams pa sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
'di phra mor lam skor khrod du bgrangs 'dug /
sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i rten 'brel lngas lam yongs su rdzogs pa /
'di phra mo na'ang bzhugs glegs bam tsam lam brten pa'i lam 'bras slob bshad kyi khungs gsal bo yod /
'gor g.yas pa'i khu tshur brkyangs byas te yod pa'i dmar gyis mdzad pa'i lam bsdus 'dod pa'i lcags kyu lam 'bring po bya ba yin gsung ba'i mtha' can /
phyag rgya chen po'i dbye ba dpal ldan sa skya paN+Di ta'i mnal lam bcal? yas su byung ba /
mjug gi sh+lo ka gcig ma tshang ba zhig phra mo na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i rgya /
'di gnyis phra mor yang yod /
bla ma chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pas mdzad pa'i tshogs @# / /
sbyor gnyis kyi mngon rtogs /
lam bsdus pa'i bshad pa mdo tsam du bstan pa bla ma rin po che'i gsung la brten nas sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
lam bsdus te sgrub pa'i lung sbyin pa sa paN gyis mdzad pa /
phra mor yang yod /
rjes chen gyis mdzad pa'i gsang bcu'i rgyas gdab nyam nga'i 'phrad la yid bzhin nor bu ltar gsang bcud ldan pa'i spyod pa mtha' ru bskyal gyi mtha' can /
lam zab bla ma'i 'khrid yig sa paN gyis dpal ling chu rtse'i khab gyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba /
phra mo na'ang yod /
bla ma rin chen 'byung gnas kyi rnal 'byor sa skya paN chen gyi gsung bzhin chos rgyal dmar gyis yi ger bkod pa /
lam sbas bshad kyi yi ge Na? sa skya paN+Di tas mdo smad du sbyar ba /
phra mo na'ang yod /
'gor lam sbas te 'khrid na zhes yod pa'i pho brang lnga la brten pa'i spas bshad 'bras bu rim par rgyas pa gzhung du gsal lo'i mtha' can /
'gor mkhal 'degs rigs gsum spyi chugs dang zhes yod pa'i lam sbas bshad kyi 'khrul 'khor rtsa ba rje dpal ldan tshul khrims kyis mdzad pa /
de'i rang 'grel chos rdzong du yi ger bkod pa /
'gor rdo rje rtse yi sbyor ba dang zhes yod pa'i sgrub chan bcu dang phra mo brgyad kyi rtsa ba /
'di gnyis phra mo na'ang yod /
de'i 'grel ba 'gor dpal ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa'i zhal gyi gdams pa zhes yod pa sa skya paN+Di ta'i thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams pa /
de'i gsal byed snyoms las pa bud+d+ha shrIs brjed byang du bris pa /
phra mor la lar bud+d+ha shrIs mdzad zer ba mi 'phrad tshul dang bcas snang ngo / /
'gor rdo rje'i tshig rkang las bsrung ba'i 'khor lo zhes yod pa'i bir bsrung swa d+heM swA hA'i mtha' can /
phra mor 'phags pa'i yi ge'i gsal byed du bgrangs 'dug go /
'gor dpal ldan mthu stobs dbang phyug ces yod pa'i bir bsrung spyan sngar dpe 'di gtugs so'i mtha' can /
'gor ra ga ta dza phaT ces yod pa'i bir bsrung mi chugs so'i mtha' can /
'phags pas shin tu zhib par bkod pa'i bir bsrung dang 'di phra mor yang yod /
byin rlabs bya tshul /
phra mor byin rlabs 'dis chen gyis mdzad par bzhed /
'gor rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa nas byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma chad pa zhes yod pa'i rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs bya tshul bar ma chad pa 'o'i mtha' can /
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs la sa paN gyis mtshan mdzad pa /
de'i gsal byed sa paN gyis mdzad pa'i rnam par bshad pa bdud rtsi spel ba /
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud don nyams su blang ba'i cho ga nub pa rig 'dzin grags kyis mdzad pa /
rje btsun chen pos dbang phyug 'od zer gyi ngor gtsang kha dgon par mdzad pa'i mtshar gsum khug pa'i man ngag /
phra mor dkar chag gis ma zin pa'i khrod du yod /
'gor spyir yi ge brgya pa phyir bzlog tu 'gro ba dang zhes yod pa'i yig brgya'i man ngag sa chen gyis mdzad pa 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi zhes brjod do'i mtha' can /
'brog mis paN+Di ta drug la chos gsan pa'i sgo drug chos 'brel du grags pa la shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pas gdon /
dz+nyA na shrIs lus 'khrugs /
rin chen rdo rjes sems kyi bar chad bsrung ba gsum dz+nyA? chos tshan gcig tu byas pa /
phra mor yang yod /
nA ro pa'i phyag rgya chen po sdug bsngal gsum na? sel gyi gsal byed rje btsun @# / /
gyis mdzad pa zhar byung bzhi ba man chad rlung dang bstun tshul /
phra mor yang yod /
ngag dbang grags pa'i gnyug wA? ma dran gsal /
phra mor yang yod /
de'i dbang bzhi stan thog gcig tu blang wA? ba zhang 'phags pa lhas yang yang bskul nas rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa /
phra mor bla ma brgyud pa yan las de man gyi zhang 'phags pa lhas bskul chul sogs mi 'dug gzhung rnams legs par char nas shan+ti pas gnang ba'i mdo sha? rgyud bsre ba snying po'i don rang grol du grags pa /
phra mor yang yod /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos mdzad pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa bshad thabs kyi gdams ngag gsang ba'i sgo 'byed /
des mdzad pa'i rgyud gsum lam gyi rim pa'i bsdus don /
des mdzad pa'i lam zab nang ma'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor /
des mdzad pa'i rgyu dus kyi dbang gi rtogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa /
bir bsrung gi man ngag bar chad kun sel /
des mdzad pa'i bir+wa ba'i sku'i rnam 'gyur drug gi dbye ba /
des mdzad pa'i bir bsrung gi thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul tshigs bcad ma /
des mdzad pa'i thun mong min pa'i bir bsrung nyams su blang tshul /
dkar chag tu mi gsal ba des mdzad pa'i bir bsrung gsar ma bsrung bi? bzlog gi gdams pa khyad par can rnams /
gsung ngag slob bshad 'dzin pa rnams kyi glegs bam dang yig sna thor bu'i skor la /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje'i gsung thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis zin bris su mdzad pa'i gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i 'khrid kyi zin bris gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed ces bya ba kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor ba'i skor la /
khog 'bub rnam bshad las byung ba'i byung tshul lo rgyus /
khog 'bub las chos la bshad sgrub bya tshul sogs bsnyan pa /
snang gsum bstan pa'i lam gyi zin bris /
rgyud gsum bstan pa'i lam gyi zin bris /
bskyed rim bstan pa'i lam gyi zin bris bar do yan gyi 'khrid rnams / /
! thams cad mkhyen pa klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i gsung ngag rin po che'i zin bris yid bzhin klu? nor bu'i skor la /
slob bshad lam rim gsol 'debs byin rlabs kyi pho nya /
spyi don khog 'bub kyi legs bshad /
snang gsum gsal byed zla ba'i thigs 'phreng /
sngags lam gyi 'khrid yig nyi gzhon gsar pa'i thigs 'phreng skal bzang ut+pal gzhon nu'i kha 'byed la nang gsas kyi lta ba 'khor 'das dbyer med /
phyi bskyed rim kyi 'khrid /
nad bskyed rim nyams myong lta ba phyag chen ngo sprod kyi bogs 'byin spyod pa dang bcas pa /
bum dbang gi 'da' kham /
bar do /
rmi lam /
sgyu lus kyi 'khrid /
lam gtum mo /
tsaN+Da li khams 'dus pa dang po'i 'khrid /
thig le bde stong gi nyams mtha' ru phyin byed khams 'dus pa bar ma'i 'khrid /
skyon gnyug ma ye shes la brten nas khams 'dus pa mtha' ba 'khrid kyi lung dang bcas pa / /
! paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i gsung ngag gi yi ge'i skor ngag? la /
slob ma rjes 'dzin gyi phyag len nyams su blang bde ba /
aSh+Ta'i bzlas lung byed tshul lugs gnyis /
brgyud pa khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed kyi cho ga dam pa'i @# / /
bzhed srol sems nyid ngal bso'i bdud rtsi /
mtshar gsum khug pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul gsang chen chos kyi rnga chen /
lam dbang gi mtha' dpyod zur 'debs kyi gnad /
rdo rje bdag med ma'i byin rlabs bya tshul legs byas gtam gyi bdud rtsi /
lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi byin rlabs bya tshul mkhas la nye bar mkho ba /
bla ma rin 'byung gi nyams len byin rlabs dang bcas pa'i yi ge 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor ma lus pa 'byung ba'i gnas legs byas kyi rnga bo che /
lam zab nang gi rnal 'byor gyi byin rlabs bya tshul mkhas la nyer mkho /
bir bsrung thun mong gi byin rlabs rje rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa la zur 'debs cung zad dang bcas pa /
bir bsrung thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul zur 'debs dang bcas pa /
brda don gsal ba'i byin rlabs bya tshul la gnyis las gsum byung gi go don dang bcas pa /
lam sbas bshad kyi byin rlabs bya tshul bklags chog tu bkod pa /
brda tshig brgyud kyi byin rlabs bya tshul lag len go bde bklags chog tu bkod pa /
sgrub pa lung sbyin dang gsang bcu rgyas gdab kyi phyag len go bde bklags chog tu bkod pa mtha' dpyod dang bcas pa /
rnam 'joms bir lugs lha bdun cu rtsa lnga'i sgrub thabs nub pa rigs 'dzin grags kyis mdzad pa'i dbu'i phyogs nas phyud ba rnams rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i g+ha ya d+ha ra nas brgyud pa'i gur mgon gyi rjes gnang bya tshul /
mkhyen rab rjes mdzad pa'i gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i 'khrid kyi bsdus stong? don 'bras bu la don ma lus pa mngon du gyur pa ni ngo bo nyid sku thob pa'o'i mtha' can /
mdzad byang med /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung ji lta ba bzhin du bkri ba'i lam gyi sngon b+ho? 'gro'i 'khrid yig snang gsum mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan /
des mdzad pa'i lam gyi dngos gzhi'i 'khrid b+ho? yig rgyud gsum mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan /
des mdzad pa'i dpal gyi rdo rje'i dbang gi tshig don rnams b+ho? legs par bshad pa lung dang man ngag gi gter mdzod /
des mdzad pa'i dbang gi 'tshams b+ho? sbyor snying po bsdus pa /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pas mdzad ba'i sbyin sreg b+ho? gi chog me shel 'phreng ba /
rje dpal ldan don grub kyis mdzad pa'i kye rdo rje'i las waM? bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi rnam bshad ye shes me dpung / /
! sa skya khri chen 'jam dbyangs kun dka' bsod nams kyis phyogs gcig tu (pa?)A? bsgrigs pa'i lam sbas bshad kyi nyams len /
'di la bla ma gong ma rnams kyi yig cha mi nub pa'i phyir sa gcad kyi khongs nas thon pa mdzad pa la /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang gis slob ma dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi yi ge /
ngor chen gyi slob ma kun dga' blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge /
ngor pa lha mchog seng ge'i slob ma rje kun dga' lhun grub kyis mdzad pa rnams phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa gong ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsi man ngag gi rgya mtsho /
sa skya khri chen gyis mdzad A? pa'i byin rlabs kyi skor la /
brda don gsal ba'i byin rlabs /
brda chig brgyud kyi byin rlabs /
mgon rkyang gi rjes gnang /
@# / /
sgrub pa lung sbyin gyi byin rlabs rnams kyi yi ge phyogs gcig tu bkod pa don gnyis lhun grub rnams thob pa las rtags med pa'i dbang byin rlabs 'khrid dang lung bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
samyak+saM bud+d+ha badzra d+ha raH yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang /
b+haT+Ta rA ka badzra nai rat+ma /
rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma /
slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal ldan bir+wa pa Atsar+ya yo ge shwar shrI madbi r+wa dmar ser zhes pa me sbrul la so ma pu'a ring bltams nas rnam byungs 'brug la grub pa brnyes /
sa drug gi dbang phyug grub chen shar phyogs nag po pa ShaSh+b+hU mI shwa ra mahA sAd+d+ha purba dik+kah+NaH rgya gar shar phyogs su sku 'khrungs /
yul dbus su bltams rA dz+nyaH ku'a la DA ma ruH rgyal rigs DA ma ru pa /
wa ra NA sir 'khrungs b+haT+Ta rA ka awad+hU tiH rje btsun gnyis sbangs pa /
mkhas ba chen po sbrin 'dzin mahA paN+Di ta g+ha yad+ha raH b+haM ga lar 'khrungs /
'jig rten gyi mig chen po 'brog mi shAkya ye shes mahA lo ka tsak+Shu 'brog mi shAkyadz+nyAnaH mang mkhar du 'khrungs /
mdog sma che 'grum du 'khrungs gu ru sekuTyawa? sar+b+ba pA shyaH bla ma se mkhar chud pa kun rig /
bla ma zhang dgon pa ba chos 'ban gu ru ka kA raN+ya kad+har+m+ma dz+ba laH sag thang sdings su 'khrungs /
rje btsun sa skya ba chen po kun dga' snying po b+haT+Ta rA ka mahA b+hU mi paN+Du rAnan+da grar+b+haH adgir zhes pa chu sbrel la grum stod kha'ur 'khrungs /
slob dpon rin po che bsod rnams rtse mo /
A tsar+ya rat+na puN+ya graH rnga chen zhes pa chu khyil gzims spyil dkar por 'khrungs /
rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan /
b+haT+Ta rA karat+na kIrti d+h+wa dzaH rab byung zhes pa me yos la sgo rum mgon khang mdor 'khrungs /
sa paN+Di ta chen po kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
mahA paN+Di ta b+hU myA nan+da d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH dge byed ces pa chu rtag la sgo rum tshogs khang phur 'khrungs /
'gro ba'i mgon po chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che blo gros rgyal mtshan /
dza ga nA tha d+har+m+ma rA dza rat+nA r+ya ma ti d+h+wa dzaH myos byed ces pa shing lug la stag sde rlung khung du 'khrungs /
bla ma zhad dkon cog dbal gu ru ka ka rat+na shrI /
kun ldan lcags byi la ra sa mtshal khung du 'khrungs /
grub chen brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
mahA sAd+d+ha sha la kauTya ka puN+ya shri /
dbang phyug me mo glang ya ras mtshal khung du 'khrungs /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
sarba dz+nyA puN+ya d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH yongs 'dzin zhes pa chu bo byi ba'i lo la zha lu khang gsar du 'khrungs /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
d+har+m+ma swA mi shrI ma tsh+hI laH dpal gdong zhes pa chu bya'i lo dbras khung sgang sgyar 'khrungs /
grub chen sangs rgyas dpal /
ma hA sadb+ha bud+d+ha shrI /
myos ldan zhes pa sa yos la mdog gi phur 'khrungs /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mahA ngor badzra d+ha rA nan+da b+ha draH rnga chen zhes pa chu pho khyi la sa skya'i gyi khrung sgor 'khrungs /
sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan mahA satwa rat+na d+h+wa dzaH rnam byung zhes pa sa 'brug la mus stong gling skyar 'khrungs /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
mahA pa ti badzra d+har ma tid+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH mig dmar zhes pa shing byi la shab lcam mo g.yang grong du 'khrungs /
rje btsun rje rang pa chen po kun bzang chos kyi nyi ma blo ldan shes rab kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
b+haT+Ta rA ka mahA shel dIr+g+ha saman+ta b+ha dra d+harma su'ar+ya d+hI ma h+p+ra dz+nyA nan+da d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH dkar po zhes pa sa sbrul la sna thar rdo ring du 'khrungs /
rnga chen zhes pa chu pho khyil la stod smug shongs su 'khrungs /
mahA tshar d+har+m+ma ra dzAd+hI kA shas mu dra kI rti d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po blo gsal rgya mtsho grags pa rgya mtshan dpal bzang po /
'jam pa'i dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang go many+dzu @# / /
g+ho Shadz+nyA da ye shwa ra shA sa na d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH nyi sgrol byed ces pa shing sprel la bo dong du 'khrungs /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan ma to pad+h+yA ya tri she Sh+ya d+h+wa dzaH mi zad pa zhes pa me khyi la ram sdings ma dang nye ba'i gnas log ri khrod kyi mdun ngos su 'khrungs pa /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brten bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
badzra d+ha re shwa ra pr-i dra D+ha shA sa na d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH dus kyi pho nya zhes pa sa rta la nyug bkra shis rgyal khang du 'khrungs /
rigs kun khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
sarba ku'a la pra b+hu nA tha puN+yot+ta ma batsh+hA sa na d+h+wa dza shI b+ha draH mdzes byed ces pa chu yos la nub khu lung du 'khrungs /
des bdag gsang chen slob bshad 'dzin pa za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
te nA dma dma hA gu hya shi Sh+ya b+hA Sha d+hAr kas hor go mau sma re ya ts+tshaH yang brgyud pa gnyis pa yab chos rje nas brgyud pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i lags gcig ni /
a pi dwi tI ya ta n+t+ra ka pi tr-i d+harma swA mi twa tan+ta syA nu b+ha Sh+ye kA ga me /
nyi sgrol byad ces pa shing sprel la zha lu khang gsar du 'khrungs /
sadgu ru twa rat+na pu'a ta kar+ya sya na p+ti ka mahA gu r+wA nan+da d+h+wa dzaH bla ma dam pa nas rin cen sgang sgos kyi dpon po bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
yab chos rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
pi tri d+harmA swA mi many+dzu g+ho Sha ga gan d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha draH dbang phyug ces pa me glang la 'khrungs /
rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
badzra d+ha ra ma ti d+h+wa dzet+ta re baM /
brgyud pa gsum pa ni /
chos rje bla ma dam pa nas /
nya dbon kun dga' dpal /
grub chen kun dga' blo gros /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang chen po man gong ltar ro / /
de yang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang la gsung ngag gi brgyud pa gsum bka' babs pas klu sgrub rjes /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'jam mgon sa skya pa'i / /
brgyud pa gsum ldan snyan brgyud spas pa'i gter / /
snying po'i bcud bsdus zab mo slob bshad kyi / /
bka' drin dran nas blo gsal rgya mtsho la / /
gsol ba 'debs so snying dbus padmar byon / /
zhes brgyud pa gsum gyi man ngag gi snying po bsdus pa zab mo slob bshad du sgra yangs pa'i dbang du byas na bstan la /
zhib tu dpyad na slob bshad thun mong ma yin pa'i brgyud pa gong ma gnyis yin zhing /
de'i rgyu mtshan yang /
ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis sems dpa' chen po gcig pu la slob bshad chig brgyud du gnang /
sems dpa'i chen pos tshogs bshad gsung pa'i dus gnad 'gag ches 'gar slebs tshe zhal mdangs dmar por 'gyur zhing phyag se gol mdzad nas de tsam du ma song na zhes gsung ba'i dus su slob bshad kyi gnang 'gag rnams yod tshod du 'dug ces zha lu pa sangs rgyas dpal bzang sogs gsung la /
ngor chen yab sras gnyis la mi bzhugs pa'i zab gnang 'ga' zhig dang bcas pa'i slob bshad shin tu rgyas pa ni bla ma dam pa nas rin cen sgang sgos kyi zhal ngo 'ba' zhig la brgyud pa'i khyad par can no / /
thun mong ba tshogs bshad tsam gyi brgyud pa ni brgyud pa bar ma'i bla chen kun rgyal ba nas /
theg chen chos rje kun dga' bkra shis rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
yab 'jam dbyangs chen po man gong ltar du brgyud pa dang /
brgyud pa gsum pa lugs 'di la grags che zhing /
gzhan yang brgyud pa'i rnam grangs chos rje bla ma nas /
ri khrod pa blo @# / /
gros brtan pa /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims man gong bzhin no / /
yang na brag phug pa nas ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa /
dpal tshul ba man 'dra /
yang tshogs bshad brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na sa paN nas /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
dkar po brag pa /
ri khrod pa /
chos rje dpal tshul ba man 'dra /
yang na zhang ston pa nas /
dga' ldan pa /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
'jam skya pa /
bla ma dpal seng pa man gong ltar /
yang na ngor chen rdo rje 'chang la /
'khor lo sdom pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje bzhes gsan /
bzhig la bya 'gyur ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsod nams seng ge /
de nas sgo rum pa man gong ltar /
yang na bya 'gyur bas gsan pa'i bla ma bzhi'i steng du kun mkhyen go bo ste lnga la /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rim bzhin sa lo /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog 'phel nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
de gnyis la sa lo man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams /
rje sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge nas /
paN chen dbang phyug grub pa /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs ngag gi dbang po /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen la| mus chen /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
kun mkhyen go bo gsum gas gsan /
gsum ga la yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang bo man gong ltar /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung /
sa lo /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang po man 'dra /
yang na ngag gi dbang pos glo bo mkhan chen rang la rdzogs par gsan no / /
yang nye brgyud ni /
brtse ba chen po mnga' ris gung thang du bzhugs skabs dug byung ba'i ro ma g.yas ru'i grong chu dgon par bzhugs dus langs pa'i skyon gyis chos rnams mnyel bas 'jam dbyangs phug tu sku mtshams bsngams te gsol ba btab pas /
zhang dgon pa ba mnal lam dang dngos su byon nas gdams pa rnams gsungs /
de rjes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chos 'khor gyi phyag rgya can sa skya'i 'bam grog mon grog gi bar skyil krung gcig gis khebs pa gtso 'khor lnga pa zhig zhal gzigs nas gsungs pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug nas rje btsun brtse ba chen po man gong bzhin no / /
de rnams ni gsung ngag gi brgyud pa'i rnam grangs yin la /
rgyu dbang gi brgyud pa'i rnam grangs la /
yang na dkar bo brag pa rin cen seng ge nas /
chos rje gung thang pa seng ge dpal ldan /
rje 'od mdzes bzang po /
chos rje paN+Di ta chen po /
rtses dang dge 'phel ba bsod nams blo gros /
rje rdo ring pa man 'dra /
yang na brag phug pa nas /
lam 'bras pa ye shes dpal /
sa skya pa rin chen dpal /
chos rje paN+Di ta man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
'di brgyud pa 'gangs che ba gcig tu 'dug /
yar klungs pas ngag rgyal @# / /
mtshan /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mchog /
rtses dang pa bsod nams blo gros man 'dra /
yang na chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims la /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan dang /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI sa gsan /
de gnyis la rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
de nas rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje yab sras bzhugs pa'i bar gong bzhin no /
yang na rje btsun kun spang chen po nas /
rje sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
tshar chen man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun grags pa nas /
gcung dpal chen 'od po /
sa paN /
zangs tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
'phags pa /
'di gnyis kyi bar na bla ma zhig dgos nges su 'dug pa dam pa kun dga' grags yin min dpyad /
bdag nyid chen po bzang po dpal /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
ngor chen man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
tshogs sgom pa kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
dkar po brag pa rin chen seng ge /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
rje rdo rje 'chang /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge /
zha lu mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
de gnyis la rje btsun sgo rum pa /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang /
gnyis ka la thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis gsan pa man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
brag phug pa bsod nams dpal man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
paN+Di ta rdo rje shes rab /
bla ma 'phags rgyal ba /
bla ma rin cen dpal bzang /
'gro mgon bsod nams rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na zhang dkon mchog dpal nas /
dga' ldan pa kun dga' bsod nams /
rgyal ba brag phug pa man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
bang mo zhu pa gzhon nu dpal /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na brag phug pa nas /
ri khrod pa blo brtan bla ma dpal tshul man 'dra /
yang na rjes paN nas /
tshogs sgom rin po che /
gnyag snying po rgyal mtshan /
bar ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen rdo rje tshul khrims /
bla ma dkon mchog rgyal mtshan /
bu ston dbang phyug dar /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
sgo rum pa rin cen bzang po /
sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa man gong ltar /
yang na brag phug pa bsod nams dpal nas /
brag phug pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
bu ston dbang phyug dar man 'dra /
yang na dkar po brag pa nas /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI man 'dra /
yang na dpal ldan bla ma dam pa nas /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
chos rje bzang po rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
rdzong chung ba byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen gnag gi dbang po man sngar bzhin no /
yang na sgo rum pa chen po nas /
mnga' ris bla chen nam mkha' gzi brjid /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na sgo rum pa nas /
de dbon gang dbang bstan pa'i rdo rje /
rje mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun rdo ring pa nas /
rje grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
sbyang lung pa gzhon nu chos grub /
rje grol mchog man 'dra /
yang nas bzang @# / /
ma ti nas /
theg chen chos rgyal /
spang lung gzhon nu blo gros /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan man 'dra /
yang na mus chen 'khor lo sdom pa nas /
rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos rje /
sbyang lung pa gzhon nu chos grub /
rje grol mchog man gong ltar /
yang na mus chen la bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje shes rab rgya mtsho /
r+wa ston yon tan dpal bzang /
rgyal tshab kun dbang bzhi /
bzhi ga la 'jam dbyangs bsod nams lhung grub /
grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na 'dam dbyangs bsod lhun la /
rje kun dga' mchog grub /
grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen la /
gu ge paN+di ta /
rje ri ti skyog pa /
rje dpal ldan pa /
rje nam dpal ba /
rje yon tan chos rgyal /
rje legs pa'i shes rab drug gis gsan /
drug ga la glo bo mkhan pos gsan pa man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
kun dga' mchog grub man 'dra /
yang na mus chen la /
go ram pa /
dkon cog 'phel /
sangs rin pa gsum gyis gsan /
de gsum la lha mchog seng ge /
grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na mus chen nas /
zha lus pa sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
chos rje byams pa chos legs /
'phags chen dpal ldan bkra shis /
rje grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na dor chen nas /
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phel /
de ya rin po che nor bu phun tshogs dang mkhas grub bshes gnyen bkra shis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la rdzong dkar ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
de nas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man sngar bzhin no / /
yang na mus chen nas /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen /
chos rje bshes gnyen bkra shis man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga ma mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
spos khang tshogs pa mkhan chen thar pa rgyal mtshan /
zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
das bdag la'o / /
yang na tshar chen nas /
nyan thos klu sgrub rgya mtsho /
mkhan rin po che ngag dbang chos grags /
'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na grel mchog nas /
kun mkhyen klu sgrub rgya mtsho man 'dra /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon mchog 'phel nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
rgyal ba lha mchog seng ge /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na dkon mchog lhung grub nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti pa man gong bzhin no /
yang na sangs rgyas seng ge nas /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen dang sems dpa' chen po gnyis la /
shes rab rgya mtsho / /
kun dga' dbang phyug /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge bzhis gsan /
mus chen man gyi bla ma lnga ga la rat+na war+d+ha sa gsan pa man 'dra /
yang na sems dpa' chen po la /
kun mkhyen go bo /
grub chen dkon cog blo gros /
rje dkon cog 'phel gsum gas gsan /
gsum ga la rje sangs rgyas rin chen gyis gsan /
dkon @# / /
cog lhun grub man gong ltar ro / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
rje dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mkhan ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog rgya mtsho nas /
'phyong rgyas 'phags sde mkhan chen dbang phyug dpal bzang /
ngag chos pa man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog rgya mtsho nas /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
khri chen kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
kun mkhyen gangs pa grags pa dpal /
spang khang pa yang zer /
ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos rje /
nyi lde ba gu shrI nam mkha' bzang po /
dpal ldan rdo rje man gong ltar /
yang nas paN nas /
grub thob yon tan dpal /
la ru pa bsod nams seng ge /
kun mkhyen gangs pa man gong bzhin /
yang na bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims nas /
de dpon nam mkha' dpal bzang /
gu shrI nam mkha' bzang po man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan po bsod nams lhun grub nas /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man sngar ltar /
yang na 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na rgyal tshab kun dbang nas /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo kun dga' bsod nams /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man gong bzhin no / /
yang na rje dkon cog 'phel /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan chen legs 'byung gnas /
sa lo man gang ltar /
yang na mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje nas /
mi nyag paN chen grags pa rdo rje /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang nar do rje chen nas /
mkhas pa gzhon nu seng ge /
de gnyis la lha 'bri ston pa she rab rdo rje /
mi nyag paN chen mang song bzhin /
yang na ngor chen dang mus chen gnyis la /
spyan snga kun dga' rdo rje dang /
mkhas grub gung ru sher bzang gis gsan /
gnyis ka la mi nyag paN chen gyis gsan na / /
yang na gu shrI nam mkha' bzang po nas /
rje ngag dbang grags pa /
bdag chen rgya dkar bshes rab rgyal mtshan /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na 'jam dbyangs dkon cog bzang po nas /
bdag chan rgya dkar ba man sngar bzhin /
yang na sangs rgyas seng ge dang /
brang ti pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis la /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
de dpon rje btsun shes rab 'byung gnas /
rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba dang rdo rje 'chang zha lu mkhan chen gnyis kas gsan /
gnyis kas bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
de dbon dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen pa man 'dra /
yang na sangs rgyas seng ge nas /
dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen pa man gong ltar /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
shar pa kun bkris pa man 'dra /
yang na thar rtse pa nas /
rtse gdong khri chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
shar pa shes rab 'byung gnas man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
dkon cog dpal ldan /
rtse gdong khri chen man 'dra /
yang na bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug nas /
mkhan byams pa rab brtan /
rtse gdong khri chen man 'dra /
yang na shar pa kun dga' bkra shis nas /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
yang na 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan nas /
zha lu mkhyen chen rin cen bsod @# / /
nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
gong dkar ba lugs ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
'di nas bla ma dam pa'i bar gyi brgyud pa rnams ngor pa dang mthun pa don gyis thob kyang 'dir rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig sor gnas bzhin bris pa yin /
paN+Di ta jo rje shes rab /
bla ma 'phags pa rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen dpal bzang /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma chos sgo ba /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal dpal bzang po /
mkhas grub rnam rgyal rin cen /
yongs 'dzin shAkya mun kun dga' /
bla ma dam chos gling pa ye shes dbang po /
bla ma nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bla ma tshul khrims bkra shis nas /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin chen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje gdan pa nas /
'jam dbyangs byang chub dbang rgyal /
yongs 'dzin shAkya kun dga' man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje gdan pa la /
'bri gung mkhan chen /
mkhas grub rig pa'i glog 'phreng /
chos rje lcang lo can pa gsum gas gsan /
gsum ga la rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal gyis gsan pa man gong ltar /
yang na rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal la /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje dang 'phags mchog yon rgyal pos gsan de gnyis la mtshungs med lha dbang 'phrin las /
nyi ma gling pa man 'dra /
yang na shAkya kun dga' nas /
kun bzang rtse pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma gling pa man gong ltar /
yang na kun bzang rtse ba dang /
nyi ma gling pa gnyis la /
kun bzang rtse pa paN chen dpal ldan tshul khrims /
de la khyab bdag zha lu mkhan che /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bla ma ye shes dbang po nas /
byams ba shAkya rdo rje /
mtshungs med dge ba'i dbang po /
zha lu pa chen po /
das bdag la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
brag phug pa /
drung chos rje pa /
sa bzang paN chen /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
gzad pa rin rgyan /
brag thog pa man sngar bzhin no /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
chos rje spang khang pa /
mkhan chen lha dbang pa /
bla ma dpal ldan bsod nams gzang pa rin rgyan pa /
brag thog pa man 'dra /
yang na brag phug pa nas /
chos rje ye shes dpal /
chos rje blo gros bzang po /
mtshungs med chos rje seng ge dpal bzang /
brag thog pa man 'dra /
aSh+Ta'i bzlas lung gi brgyud pa ngor lugs ni /
chos rje rdo rje 'chang yan lam 'bras ltar la /
de nas mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
mus chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
de dbon dkon cog dpal ldan /
shar chen byams pa kun dga' bkra shis /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
rdo rje 'chang mgron po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
rdzong lugs ni /
bla ma dam pa yan gsung ngag ltar la /
de nas sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
mkhas grub bzang po rgyal mtshan /
rje rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
mus srang pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog dpal /
bla ma byams pa chos dpal 'byor /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
rje shAkya kun dga' /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje /
bla ma lha dbang 'phrin las /
rdo rje 'dzin pa tshul khrims bkra shis @# / /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po'i mtshan can /
des bdag la'o / /
gong dkar ba'i lugs ni /
'phags pa yan lam 'bras ltar la /
de nas zhang dkon cog dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma chos sgo ba /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
mkhas grub rig pa'i glog 'phreng /
yangs pa can pa byang chub dpang rgyal man 'dra /
rje btsun rdo rje bdag mad pa lha bco lnga'i ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa'i brgyud pa gsung ngag slob bshad kyi brgyud pa lugs gsum dang 'dra zhing /
yang na rje btsun sa skya pa chen po nas /
ne tse spal ston chos kyi 'byung gnas /
bla ma shes rab grags /
gnam pa r+wa chos kyi shes rab /
mngon pa ba dbang phyug brtson 'grus /
de la 'phags pa rin po che dang paN+Di ta rdo rje shes rab kyis gsan /
de gnyis la zhang dkon cog dpal /
de nas brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
de la bla ma dam pa dang ri khrod pa blo brtan gyis gsan /
gnyis ka la dpal ldan tshul khrims /
de la shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan dang grub chen bud+d+ha shrI sa gnas /
de gnyis ngor chen gyis gsan pa man gsungs ngag slob bshad dang 'dra /
yang na bdag chen rdo rje chang nas /
rje btsun sgo rum pa /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug man sngar ltar /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge /
rje sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas /
rje dkon cog tshul khrims /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa man gong bzhin no / /
yang na 'jam dbyangs mkhyen btses grol mchog la gsan pa'i brgyud dbang skabs bgrangs pa dang gcig / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
'khor lo sdom pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
yab sras gnyis ka la rgyal tshab kun dbang dang kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges gsan /
de gnyis la brten mchog dkon cog 'phel /
rje lha mchog seng ge /
gnyis ka la dkon cog lhun grub /
rim bzhin sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang dang /
mus pa nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khar pa dpal ldan don grub /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na lha mchog seng ge nas /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang man 'dra /
yang na 'bren mchog nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen gnyis ka la sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub man gong ltar /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
sgang ston shes rab 'bum /
dkar po brag pa /
bla ma dpal ldan pa /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI man sngar bzhin no / /
yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas lung gi brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
zhang ston rje /
na bza' pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rdzong cung pa gzung kyi dpal ba /
rje bzang po rgyal mtshan /
rje rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
rdzong chung pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog dpal /
'jam dbyangs chos dpal 'byor /
rgya ston byang chub dbang argyal /
mkhas pa bde ba'i rdo rje /
mtshungs med lha dbang 'phrin las /
mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
@# / /
des bdag la'o / /
rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor du lam dus kyi dbang thob pa'i brgyud pa thun mong ma yin pa kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bka' babs lugs gsum gyi rgyu dbang gi brgyud pa ltar dang /
thun mong ba bdag chan ngag gi dbang phyug /
rje grol mchog /
thar rtse pa /
shar pas dkon cog dpal ldan par zhus pa rnams bzhugs pa'i rgyu dbang gi brgyud pa bzhin yin la /
rje btsun sgo rum pa nas brgyud pa ni /
zhang dkon cog dpal nas /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla chen kun dga' blo gros /
drung chos rje pa /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
bdag chen rin po che /
sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man gsung ngag ltar ro / /
yang rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan la zha lu mkhan chen gyis gsan /
de la bdag gis nos so / /
yang na mus chen nas /
kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ge /
paN chen dbang phyug grub pa 'jam dbyangs ngag gi dbang phyug /
bdag chen kun dga' bsam grub /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
gong dkar ba'i lugs ni /
'phags pa yan rgyu dbang ltar la /
de nas zhang dkon cog dpal /
na bza' pa bsod nams dpal /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma chos dpal shes rab /
brag theg pa man yang rgyu dbang ltar ro / /
yang na zhang dkon cog dpal nas /
slob dpon kun dga' dpal /
lo mchog pa /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
drung chos rje pa /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man rgyu dbang dang 'dra /
yang na bla ma dpal ldan seng ge nas /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man 'gre /
yang na rgyal ba brag phug pa nas /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man 'dra /
lam dus kyi dbang 'bring bsdus kyi brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
zhang ston khu dpon /
bla ma dam pa /
sngags 'chang gzungs pa /
dge lags dpal bzang /
rje A nan+da pa /
byams pa chos kyi rin cen /
dpon brtson 'grus rgya mtshe /
rje sangs rgyas mgon po /
bla ma nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rje sangs rgyas 'od zer /
mkhan chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
de gnyis ka la brtson 'grus 'od zer /
de nas rje sangs rgyas bkra shis /
mkhas grub byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
la ru ba bsod nams seng ge /
nyan chen pa /
gnyis ka la gangs khrod pa /
de nas ma ti paN chen /
theg chen rin po che /
rdzong kha ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
rje dpal ldan chos skyong /
byams pa chos kyi rin cen man 'dra /
yang na gzungs pa nas /
bzang po rgyal mtshan /
sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
bams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rgyud gsum smra ba shes rab rin cen /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan nas /
byams pa dkon cog dpal bzang /
sgye chu ba mkhas grub shes rab legs /
sgye chu ba paN chen bzang bkras /
byams pa yon tan lhun grub /
mkhan byams pa bzang po /
dge steng pa dga' ldan grub chen kun dga' dpal bzang /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga'i sin+d+hu @# / /
ra'i dkyil 'khor du byin rlabs thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
kha'u brag rdzong pa'i brgyud srol lugs gsum gyi brgyud pa dang po gnyis kho na dang /
thun mong ba'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
rdza dkon cog dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla chen kun blo /
bla ma dam pa /
chos rje dpal tshul ba /
rje bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen /
rje dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor phyi ma'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa thun mong ma yin pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag med ma /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po man kha'u brag rdzong pa'i brgyud pa lugs gsum gyi dang po gnyis sor gnas dang /
yang na sa paN nas /
tshogs sgom pa kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen pa bsod nams brtan pa /
rgyal ba brag phug pa man gsung ngag slob bshad sor gnas /
thun mong ba'i brgyud pa chos rje bla ma dam pa nas /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
mkhas grub dpal ldan tshul khrims /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
kun spangs chen po /
rje sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man sngar ltar /
yang na ngor chen nas /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyur ba pu N+ya sid+ha /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na dpal ldan rdo rje nas /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na brag phug pa nas /
brag phug pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
bu ston dbang phyug dar /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
glang thang pa kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
gra thang pa shes rab zla ba /
rje btsun rdo ring pa /
rje sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal chab kun dbang /
rje bsod nams lhun grub /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs ngag gi dbang po /
rje mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
go ram pa bsod nams seng ge /
paN chen dbang phyug grub pa /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang po man 'dra /
yang na kun mkhyen mkhyen brtses rje grol mchog la gsan pa rgyu dbang skabs bgrangs pa dang gcig /
rjes paN gyis mdzad pa'i ling chu ce ? ba thar chags su ston pa'i byin rlabs dang 'khrid nyis chod kyi brgyud pa rdzong lugs ni /
'phags pa yan spyi ltar la /
de nas zhang ston pa /
brag phug pa /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
tshogs nyan gnyis /
brag phug pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
thugs sras bzang po rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
mus srad pa rtsang rus ming /
byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog dpal /
'jam dbyangs chos dpal 'byor /
rje byang chub dbang rgyal /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje /
rje lha dbang 'phrin las /
rje tshul khrims bkra shis /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /

bla ma dpal tshul ba /
@# / /
yang na nyan chen pa /
dkar po brag pa /
bla ma dpal tshul ba /
thugs sras bzang po rgyal mtshan man sngar ltar /
gong dkar ba lugs ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
gangs khrod pa /
de las bzang ma ti dang sa skya bu ston dbang phyug dar kyis zhus /
de gsum ga la theg chen rin po che /
brag thog pa /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal man gong bzhin no / /
bla ma rin 'byung gi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa thun mong ma yin pa kha'u pa'i bka' babs gsum ldan gyi brgyud pa dang po ltar dang /
thun mong ba bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas /
chos rje sangs rgyas dpal /
rje btsun kun dga' lags pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man sngar ltar ro / /
lam zab nang ma'i 'khrid kyi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /

nyan chen pa /

rdo rje rje 'chang /
mus chen sems dpa' chen po| bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rdo ring rin po che /
tshar pa rdo rje 'chang /
thams cad mkhyen pa klu sgrub rgya mtsho /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dpal rdo rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
drin can bla ma khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen dang mus chen gnyis la /
'jam dbyangs shes rgyam /
kun dga' dbang phyug /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
bsod nams seng ge bzhis gsan /
bzhi ga la dkon cog 'phel /
de nas sa lo /
dkon cog lhun grub /
de la dkon cog rgya mtsho dang dkon cog dpal ldan gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la bdag chen bsod nams dbang po /
de nas khri chen kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
yang na spyan snga dkon cog rgya mtsho la /
mus pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
khri chen kun bsod nams 'dra /
bir bsrung phyi ma'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
rje btsun sku mched /
chos rje sa paN /

nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /

chos rje bla ma dam pa /

chos rje rdo rje 'chang man gsung ngag slob bshad ji lta ba'o / /
yang thun mong ba'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun rdo ring pa nas /
rje sgo rum pa| 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rje dpal ldan rdo rje /
de la bya 'gyur ba bsod nams seng ge dang /
chos rje dkon cog tshul khrims kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la rje sgo rum pa man 'dra /
gong dkar lugs kyi bir bsrung phyi ma'i brgyud pa ni rdo rje gdan pa bzhugs pa'i lam dbang dang gcig go /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi bsrung ba nang ma'i byin rlabs rgyas par thob pa'i brgyud pa rdzong lugs ni /

mtshan /

chu gtsang gi bsrung ba /

phyag rgya'i bsrung ba /
sngags rgya'i bsrung ba /
mtheb srin sbyar ba'i bsrung ba /
phyogs mtshams kyi bsrung ba /
thabs shes kyi bsrung ba /
dri chu'i bsrung ba /
lam bsrung /
bug pa dgu bsrung /
