sngon chad yi ger ma 'khod pa'i bir bsrung gi cha lag shin tu zab pa'i brgyud pa ni /

rje btsun grags pa yan gsung ngag ltar la /
de nas dkar shAkya grags /
rje kun bzang dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa man brda don gsal ba'i rdzong lugs kyi brgyud pa bzhin nam /
yang na dbang bzhi ngo sprod kyi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa sor bzhag go /
rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /

sa paN /

rje kun dga' @# / /
bzang po /
sems dpa' chen po dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
gnyis ka la rje mkhyen rab chos rje /
de nas sbyan snga ngag dbang chos grags /
'jam dbyangs kun dga' legs grub /
gsan yig na mi 'dug kyang byin rlabs sbyar byang gi brjod don ltar na chad 'dra snyam bris so / /
rje byams pa kun dga' chos grags /
bco brgyad pa mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
de dbon mkhyen rab byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub /
mang thos 'phrin las rnam rgyal /
rdo rje 'chang rin chen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje btsun grags pa nas /
gan pa ston dar /
gan pa so ston /
gan pa chos rgyal /
gan pa chos rin /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di mi 'dug pa brtag /
gan pa rin rgyan /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na skyo ston dri med nas /
skyo ston dar ma rin cen /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na d+harma ye shes zhes 'dug pa brtag /
bag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims /
bla ma tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
brda tshig brgyud kyi byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa yan gsung ngag bka' babs thog ma gnyis ltar la /
de nas ri khrod pa blo brtan /
chos rje dpal ldan chul khrims man kyang gsung ngag bka' babs thag ma gnyis dang 'dra /
yang na rje btsun kun spangs chen po nas /
rje sgo ram pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
sgrub pa lung sbyin gyi brgyud pa ni gsung ngag gi brgyud pa dang po gnyis ltar ram /
yang na kun spangs chen po nas /

yang nas paN nas /

bla ma dam pa /

yang na rje bka' 'gyur ba nas /

yang na ngor chen dang mus chen gnyis ka la rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
de nas rje dkon cog 'phel /
sa lo /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
spyan snga dkon cog rgya mtsho /

de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /

des bdag la'o / /
yang na kun dga' dbang phyug nas /
kun mkhyen go po /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa la /
gzungs pa dang dpal chul ba gnyis kas gsan /
gnyis ka nas bzang po rgyal mtshan /
rgyal mtshan dkon cog /
rtsang byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
dkon cog dpal /
'jam dbyangs shes rab legs pa /
paN chen bzang po bkra shis /
bla chen chos dpal /
byams pa yon tan lhun grub /
gling stong lha dbang 'phrin las /
nyi ma gling pa /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan nas /
dkon cog dpal /
chos dpal 'byor /
rgya ston byang dbang /
shAkya kun dga' /
ye shes dbang po /
rnam rgyal rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma gling pa man 'dra /
yang na shAkya kun dga' nas /
dpal 'byor gling pa /
nyi ma gling pa man 'dra /
gsang bcu'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
zhang dkon cog dpal yan gsung ngag bka' babs dang po gnyis ltar la /
de nas dga' ldan pa kun @# / /
bsod /
grub chen bsod nams dpal /
drung chos rje pa /
ri khrod pa blo brtan man gsung ngag gi brgyud pa thog ma gnyis ltar ro / /
yang na rje btsun kun spangs chen po nas /
sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba nas /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen dang mus chen gnyis la rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug gis gsan pa'i brgyud pa sgrub pa lung sbyin na yod pa bzhin no / /
lam 'bras kyi chos skyong mgon rkyang gi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa thun mong ma yin pa gsung ngag bka' babs dang po gnyis ltar dang /
thun mong ba kun spangs chen po nas /
sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
yang na chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
chos rje nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa man 'dra /
rtags yod pa'i lung rnams las ra'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mchod dpon drung pa dkon cog /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
zur gyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan yan gsung ngag ltar la /
de nas zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
zha'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po'i mtshan can /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
dbang gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
rtse'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni / /
thar rtse ba nam mkha' dpal bzang nas /
rtse gdong khri chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
lcags zam sprul sku kun dga' bsod nams dbang phyug /
mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
tha'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang pa shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
de dbon nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nam mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
lce'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
ngor chen /
mus chen /
mkhyen rab rin cen mchog grub /
stong ra ba shAkya don grub /
stong rab kun dga' legs grub /
lum pa ba kun dga' chos grags /
mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
dbon ngag dbang bstan 'dzin lhun grub /
bco brgyad pa byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
su'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
'bri gung mkhan chen /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
yangs can shAkya kun dga' /
bla ma rdo rje brag pa /
rje tshul khrims bkra shis /
paN chen bsod nams mchog ldan /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
sa ba'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan ba slob dpon bkra shis rnam rgyal /
rje gu ru chos dbang /
bla ma ayon rgyal po /
gra thang mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal po /
rje nyi ma gling pa /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
nya'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa nas /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
brag phug pa /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa /
mkhas grub gzungs kyi dpal ba /
chos rje bzang po rgyal mtshan /
sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan @# / /
dkon cog /
rdzong chung pa byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med dkon cog dpal /
rje chos dpal 'byor /
yangs pa can pa byang chub dbang rgyal /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje /
mang thos lha dbang 'phrin las /
mkhas mchog tshul khrims bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
mngon rtogs yan lag bzhi pa ma gtogs pa'i nyi'i rtags can gyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
sa paN nas /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
brag phug pa man 'dra /
I rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa nas /
'jam skya pa /
a mo g+ha pa /
mkhan sher rdor ba /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
ku'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa nas /
cog ro ston gzhon /
chos brtson 'grus /
sangs rgyas rin cen /
shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
sbas don gsal ba'i brgyud lugs gcig la /
bla ma dam pa nas /
de las bzang ma ti paN chen dang /
bu ston dbang phyug dar gyis zhus /
de gnyis la theg chen chos rje kun dga' bkra shis /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
rje rig pa'i klog 'phreng /
mkhas pa byang chub dbang rgyal /
yangs can pa shAkya kun dga' /
bla chen ye shes dbang po /
nyi ma gling pa man 'dra /
yang na theg chen pa nas /
mkhan chen dpal 'byor ba /
brag thog pa man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bud+d+ha shrI /
dor chen /
dpal ldan rdo rje /
dkon cog tshul khrims /
sgo rum pa /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man gsung ngag ltar ro / /
lam 'bras chos 'byung ngo mtshar snang ba'i brgyud pa lugs gcig la /
rje nyi ma gling pa nas /
'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa man 'dra /
yang na 'jam mgon bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rtsa ba'i bla ma /
des bdag la'o / /
mai'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
'phags pa rin po che yan lam 'bras ltar la /
de nas zhang dkon cog dpal /
brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
rje dge legs dpal bzang /
chos rje A nan+da pa /
rje byams pa chos kyi rin cen /
dbon chen brtson 'grus rgya mtsho /
rje sangs rgyas mgon po /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bla ma sangs rgyas 'od zer /
mkhan chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
gnyis ka la thugs sras brtson 'grus 'od zer /
de nas mkhas grub sangs rgyas bkra shis /
rigs 'dzin byams pa dag dbang dpal bzang /
la ru ba /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che la /
tshogs sgom pa dang la ru ba bsod nams seng ge gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la nyan chen pa /
la ru ba dang nyan chen pa gnyis la kun mkhyen gangs khrod pa kun dga' dpal bzang /
thar rtse pa'i gsan yig na spang khang pa grags pa dpal ber /
de nas ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
rdzo da chung pa kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs grags pa'ang zer /
bdag chen dpal ldan chos skyong /
byams pa chos kyi rin cen man 'dra /
yang na gzungs kyi dpal ba nas /
mnyam med bzang po rgyal mtshan /
sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dgon cog /
rdzong chung pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rgyud gsum smra ba shes rab rin cen /
rdze nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man gong bzhin no / /
yang na nyan cen @# / /
pa nas /
dkar po brag pa rin cen seng ge /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bzang po rgyal mtshan nam 'dra /
yang nan bza' pa nas /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
rje dpal tshul ba /
bzang po rgyal mtshan /
man 'dra /
sgrub kyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
brgyud pa 'di la pod dmar gyi mchan bu la'ang lung rgyun yod /
ngor chen kun dga' bzang po yan gsung ngag dang 'dra ba la /
de nas mus chen sems dpa' chen po /
yab sras gnyis ka la 'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
mkhas grub dpal rdor /
go ram bsod nams seng ge bzhis gsan /
mus chen sogs lnga ga la yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
de nas 'jam dbyangs skya lo tsA ba /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
rje sangs rgyas seng ge /
de la thar rtse pa nam mkha' dpal bzang dang mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gnyis kyis gsan /
gnyis ka la sgrub khang pa mtshungs med dpal ldan don grub /
de dbon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na kun mkhyen go bo nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na rgyal tshab kun dbang nas /
glo bo mkhan chen /
sa lo man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
dkon cog dpal ldan /
bdag chen bsod nams dbang po /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dkon cog lhun grub nas /
spyan snga dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
brgyud lugs 'di la bod dmar gyi mchan bu la lung med /
bar gyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dmar chos kyi rgyal po /
sgang ston shes rab 'bum /
dkar po brag pa rin cen seng ge /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bzang po rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
dkar gyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun grags pa yan lam 'bras ltar la /
de nas dkar shAkya grags /
slob dpon kun bzang dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
na bza' ba /
chos rje rnam gnyis /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bzang po rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
dz+nyA'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shrI /
shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa /
rin cen rdo rje /
de gsum ga la rje 'brog mi /
gshen sgom se'o /
gyer sgom rog po /
bla ma gnyos /
yer pa sgom seng /
grub thob lha 'bar /
kha rag dgon pa /
lung phu ba /
bkras lung pa /
mkhas pa gzhon nu grub /
zhang ston byang chub shes rab /
bla ma dam pa /
sngags 'chang gzungs pa man 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
dpal tshul ba /
bud+d+ha shrI /
dor chen man 'dra /
nA'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
paN chen nA ro'i zhabs /
'brog mi lo chen /
mnga' ris pa gsal ba'i snying po /
'khon sgye chu ba /
rje sa chen /
rje btsun sku mched /
sa paN /
lung phu ba man gong ltar ro / /
wA'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
paN grub ngag dbang grags pa /
'brog mi lo chen /
'khon dkon cog rgyal po /
bla ma shangs pa /
sa chen /
rtse mo /
grags pa /
sa paN /
lung phu pa man 'dra /
sha'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
paN chen shan+ti pa /
rje 'brog mi /
se mkhar chung ba /
sa chen /
rje btsun sku mched gnyis /
sa paN /
lung phu ba man 'dra /
saM gyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bdag med ma /
bir+wa ba @# / /
Domd+hi he ru ka /
a la la badzra /
nags khrod pa /
gar+b+ha ri pa /
bsod snyoms pa /
mi thub zla ba /
dpa' bo rdo rje /
lo chen 'brog mi /
se ston /
zhang ston /
rje btsun yab sras gsum /
chos rje khu dbon gnyis /
zhang ston khu dbon gnyis /
chos rje rnam gnyis /
de gnyis la dpal ldan tshul khrims /
de nas bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen man 'dra /
Na'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
sa paN nas /
tshogs nyan gnyis /
brag phug pa /
chos rje rnam gnyis /
dpal tshul ba /
bzang po rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na dpal ldan tshul khrims nas /
bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen man 'dra /
pa'i rtags yod pha'i brgyud pa ni /
ngor chen brgyud par bzhugs pa'i bshad ma thag pa ltar ram /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
dkar po brag pa /
dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bud+d+ha shrI man 'dra /
pa'i rtags can 'khrul 'khor so gnyis pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
nyan chen pa nas /
gnyag snying po rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rgyal mtshan 'bum /
bla ma dam pa /
dpal tshul ba /
bud+d+ha shrI man gong bzhin no / /
gu'i rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
sbas don gsal ba'i brgyud pa zur pa theg chen pa bzhugs pa dang gcig /
pi'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje btsun bir+wa pa /
rnal 'byor ba /
dza don badzra /
bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen man 'dra /
stong gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mkhyen rab rje /
stong rang khu dbon /
kun dga' chos grags /
ngag dbang mchog legs rdo rje /
mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po /
rje ngag dbang lhun grub /
sngom brtson 'phrin las rnam rgyal /
zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
b+ho'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang ba sher rgyan /
thar rtse paN chen /
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
de dpon dpal mchog rgyal mtshan /
drin can zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
waM gyi rtags can gyi brgyud pa ni /
rje dpal don ba /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
sa'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
mus chen 'khor lo sdom pa yan gsung ngag brgyud pa dang po ltar la /
de nas zha lu ba sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
paN chen nyi zla seng ge /
grub chen nam mkha' shes rab /
rje zhe dgon pa bsod nams rtse mo /
mtshungs med rin cen chos 'phel /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
de sras ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po /
mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
klu'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa klu sgrub rgya mtsho /
gnas lnga rig pa'i paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams man gong bzhin no / /
brang gi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
sa skya paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog pa /
brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon 'dul 'dzin pa /
chos rje byang seng pa /
shar ba ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rje kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
yongs 'dzin dkon cog 'phel /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
shar khang shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar pa byams pa @# / /
kun dga' bkra shis /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
e'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
'phags pa nas /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang yan gong ltar la /
de nas e waM dpal ldan don grub /
rje nam mkha' sangs rgyas man yang 'dra /
yang brang dang e'i rtags yod pa gnyis ka'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'phags pa nas /
dga' ldan pa bkra shis dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na dkon cog 'phel nas /
lha mchog seng ge /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
shI'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rje sa paN /
zhang mdo sde dpal /
'jam skya nam mkha' dpal /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
mkhan sher rdor ba /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
lung rig rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen seng ge dpal bzang /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal /
'bri gung mkhan chen /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
sngags 'chang tshe dbang bkra shis /
bla ma rnam rgyal bkra shis /
thu bcun kun dga' bsod nams /
dpal 'byor gling pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
bu'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa /
'jam skya ba /
a mo g+ha /
mkhan sher rdor ba /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
cog gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa nas /
cog ro ston gzhon /
chos brtson 'grus /
sangs rgyas rin cen /
shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
dag gi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags man klu'i rtags yod pa dang gcig /
khri'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni lam zab nang ma'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa sor bzhag go /
A'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! paN grub brgyad kyis mdzad pa lam skor brgyad dang chos kyi rnam grangs dgu yod pas lam skor dgur yang grags pa bla chen 'brog mi la bka' babs pa'i chos skor la /
dpal ldan tog co bas sam+bu Ti la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gdams pa mdzad /
de nyams su len pa la bsam mi khyab lnga'am byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rta mchog zhabs /
mda' chen zer /
bi na pA da /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar 'dug kyang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na bi na pa ti dang thar rtse ba'i der bI na pa zhes pi waM 'dzin pa yin zhes snang ngo /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hu ti /
leg mi pA da /
mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na zur chag 'di bzhin 'dug rdo rje gdan pa'i der lak+Shi dang thar rtse ba'i der phun tshogs zhabs zhes bsgyur 'dug go /
lI la badzra /
rdo rje gdan pa dang thar rtse ba'i der sgeg pa'i rdo rjer bsgyur /
gun+d+ha ri pa /
padma badzra /
d+har+m+ma pa /
gong dkar ba dang thar rtse ba'i der chos kyi pa zer ba 'dug /
b+ha dra pA da /
gong dkar ba dang thar rtse ba'i der bzang po'i zhabs su bsgyur 'dug /
grub chen to gtse ba /
sta mo'am 'byor 'dzin pa'i don /
b+hu sha na pa /
gong dkar ba'i deng g+hu sha na dang thar rtse ba'i der b+hU Sha Na 'dug /
d+harma pa /
gong dkar ba'i der padma pa zer ba 'dug /
gah+na pa /
gong dkar ba'i der kar+Na zer /
bi ra badzra /
gong dkar @# / /
pa dang thar rtse pa'i der dpa' bo rdo rjer bsgyur /
'brog mi lo chen /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der g+ha ya d+ha ra la yang bod du gsan zer /
se ston kun rig /
zhang dgon pa ba /
brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
sa paN /
'od shAka pa /
la ru ba /
ye shes mgon /
bag ston gzhon chul /
chul rgyal ba /
bla ma dpal tshul ba /
grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chen kun bzang /
mus chen dkon rgyan /
zha lu pa chos rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
mus chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rje dkon cog lhun grub /
paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtse gdong bdag chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang bo /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas mchog dkon cog blo gros /
mkhas btsun dpal ldan rgyal po /
rje nam mkha'i mtshan can /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
rdo rje 'chang chen pos ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma la brten nas slob dpon dpal ldan rta mchog la dbang bskur zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa lnga'i gdams pa'i lo rgyus lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin du ma la brten nas bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa yi ger bkod pa 'o'i mtha' can /
chos skor 'di la grangs mang nyung sogs glegs bam rnams dang gsan yig rnams mthun mi mthun sna tshogs 'dug pa dpyad /
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba'i gzhung dpal tog rtse'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad brgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na badzra dang dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sa paN yan gong ltar la /
de nas tshogs sgom pa kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen pa bsod nams ba na pa /
rje brag phug pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
grub chen brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
gangs pa /
mkhas grub 'phags pa /
bla ma dam pa /
yang na sa paN nas /
grub thob yon tan dpal /
la ru bsod nams seng ge /
gangs pa /
bla ma dam pa /
de la sa bzang ma ti paN chen dang sa skya bu ston dbang phyug dar gyis gsan /
yang na brag phug pa la /
brag phug pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
de la sa skya bu ston pas gsan /
sa bzang pa dang sa skya bu ston gnyis ga la theg chen kun dga' bkra shis /
de nas brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po /
rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal /
'bri khung mkhan chen /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgya mtsho /
'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
rje tshe dbang kun mkhyen /
bla chen ye shes dbang po /
gser gling pa shAkya bsam grub yongs 'dzin tshul khrims bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen ba chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rje tshul khrims bkra shis dang rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan gnyis ka la zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud dang brtag pa gnyis pa'i dgongs pa dang rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i gsung la brten nas yan lag @# / /
bdun pa dang bzhi pa snang bar byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos mdzad pa'i lam nyams su len pa la phyag rgya chen po'i yi ge med pa'i gdams pa las byung ba'i byin rlabs dang de'i gsal byed rje btsun chen po grags pas dge slong blo gros brtan pa'i don du mdzad pa nos pa las byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
Dom+b+hi he ru ka'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'od kyi snying po nyams su len pa'i ched du'ang yin /
rje btsun sgrol ma /
paN grub ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa /
de wA ka ra tsan+d+ra /
a mo g+ha badzra /
thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na 'dis gong ma gnyis ka la gsan zer ba 'dug /
bla chen 'brog mi nas sa paN yan gong ltar la /
de nas 'phags pa /
zhang ston khu dbon /
bla ma dam pa /
sngags 'chang gzungs dpal /
mnyam med bzang po rgyal mtshan /
sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dkon cag /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rje dkon cog dpal /
mtshungs med chos dpal 'byor /
rgya ston byang dbang /
paN chen bde ba'i rdo rje /
bla ma lha dbang 'phrin las /
mkhas grub tshul khrims bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
lung gi brgyud pa ni bsam mi khyab kyi lung brgyud zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol bzhugs pa sor gnas so / /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis gsang ba 'dus pa la brten nas byang chub sems 'grel mdzad /
de nyams su len pa la mchod rten gyi drung du sems thag bcad pa'i gdams pa'i gsal byed rje btsun chen po grags pas mdzad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
phyag na rdo rje /
bram za sa ra ha /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
slob dpon Ar+ya de wa /
dge slong nag po'i zhabs /
slob dpon tsan+d+ra kIrti /
rdo rje gdan pa dang thar rtse ba'i gsan yig na zla ba grags pa zer /
bram ze dpal 'dzin /
dpa' bo rdo rje /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na g+ha ya d+ha ra zer ba 'dug pa bla chen gyis rgya gar du dpa' po rdo rje dang bod du g+ha ya d+ha ra la gsan pa'i khungs mdzad 'dug /
'phrog mi man gong dkar lugs kyi zur chen brgyud par bzhugs pa de ga'o / /
slob dpon nag po spyod pas sam+pu Ti dang sdom 'byung la sogs pa bad mchog gi rgyud la brten nas nag po'i chos brug mdzad /
de ngag gi nang nas o la pa ti mngon par rtogs pa'i sdom gyi nyams len gsal byed rje btsan chen po grags pas mdzad pa'i gtum mo lam rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma /
rdo rje dril bu pa /
kurma pA da /
thar rtse pa'i der rus spal zhabs su bsgyur /
dza lan+d+ha ra /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der 'dis rdo rje rnal 'byor mar gsan zhes snang /
kah+na pa /
thar rtse pa'i der nag po spyod pa do la zhon pa zer /
bram ze dpal 'dzin /
g+ha ya d+ha ra /
'phrog mi man 'dra /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der rgya gar du dpa' bo rdo rjer yang gsan par bzhed /
slob dpon u tsi ta 'chi ba med pas dpyid kyi thig le'i rtsa'i sdom nyams su len pa la yon po bsrang ba 'khor ba lu gu rgyud du gcod pa'i gdams pa nag po pa'i gsung bzhin rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
lha dbang phyug chen po /
nag po u tsi ta 'chi ba med pa /
grub chen nag po spyod pa /
dpal 'dzin /
g+ha ya d+ha ra /
'brog mi man 'dra /
mi dbang in+d+ra b+hU tis rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud sde mtha' dag la brten nas dbang yon tan gyi rim pa mdzad /
de nyams su len pa la phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs gyi lam 'gor lhas byin gyis ni @# / /
rta byas la zhes pa dang lo rgyus dang bcas pa bstan zin to'i mtha' can rgya gzhung ma'i brgyud pa ni /
dang po dpal sde'i zhal snga nas / /
de bzhin du yang tshangs pa dang / /
bram ze mo ni rdo rje grub / /
shrI badzra rdo rje rgyal / /
de yi slob dpon de'i phyi ma / /
gos bral zhal snga de bzhin no / /
dpal ldan dz+nyA na bo d+hi rgyal / /
de bzhin shrI yo bo d+hi dang /
slob dpon padma badzra dang / /
Dom+b+hi zhal snga de bzhin no / /
yan lag bar pa dpal lha mo / /
bung ba'i padma de bzhin no / /
dur khrod du ni kI lar bzhugs / /
lha lcem lags min de bzhin no / / /
bdag kyang dang po grub pa yin /
zhes pa ltar /
rdo rje 'chang /
dpal bde ba chen po /
rje mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar 'dug kyang rdo rje gdan pa dang thar rtse pa'i der 'di gsham du in+d+ra b+hU ti 'dug pas tshigs bcad ltar na dpal bde ba dang in+d+ra b+hU ti che ba gnyis gcig pa 'dra /
b+ha ma pA da /
gsan yig gzhan gnyis na tshangs pa'i zhabs zhes bsgyur 'dug /
bram ze mo grub pa'i rdo rje /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti bar pa /
slob dpon u pa ma'i zhabs /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na u pa la zer ba 'dug pa dpyad /
ni ut+ta pA da /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na slob dpon gong bral zhabs zhas 'dug pa 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig rgya skad ma dang mthun na'ang thar rtse ba'i der gcer bu'i mchan dang bcas gos bral du bshad 'dug pa dpyad /
rgyal po dz+nyA na b+hU ti /
shrI yo b+hU ti /
slob dpon padma badzra /
Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
a nang+ga an+tar+b+ha /
rdo rje gdan pa dang thar rtse pa'i der yan lag ber ma'i zhabs zhes bsgyur /
lha mo bur ba'i padma /
lcam lak+Sh+mI /
thar rtse pa'i der legs smin zhes zur chag 'dug go /
rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti chung ba /
bram ze rat+na badzra /
kha che shes rab gsang ba'am A tsar+ya dmar por grags pa /
'brog mi lo tsA ba man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
in+d+ra b+hU ti che ba /
lcam legs smin /
paN chen shes rab gsang ba man 'dra /
slob dpon padma badzra gyis rdo rje gur la brten nas sgrub thabs mtsho skyes mdzad pa'i don nyams su len pa la zab mo'i tshul dgu'i lam gyi gsal byed sbal ston dar ma 'byung gnas kyis zhus pa'i ngor rje btsun chen po grags pas mdzad pa /
mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa'i dpal kye rdo rje mar me'i rtse mo lta bu'i man ngag rgya gzhung g+ha ya d+ha ra dang 'brog mi'i 'gyur gnyis thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
grub chen bi lA sya badzra /
a nang+ga badzra /
rdo rje gdan pa dang thar rtse ba'i der yan lag med pa'i rdo rjer bsgyur /
padma badzra /
de gnyis na mtsho skyes rdo rjer bsgyur /
in+d+ra b+hU ti /
lcam yak+Sh+mI ka ra /
nag po spyod pa /
bram ze dpal 'dzin /
rje g+ha ya d+ha ra /
'brog mi man 'dra /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der rgya gar du dpa' bo rdo rjer yang gsen zhes snang /
slob dpon Dom+b+hi he ru kas brtag gnyis la brten nas lhan cig skyes grub mdzad /
de nyams su len pa la lhan cig skyes pa gsum gyi lam nyams len dbu na de la Dom+b+hi he ru kas zhes dang zhag gsum de gnyis kyi bar nas gang tsam la sgom /
gzhan yang shes par bya 'o'i mtha' can gyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
grub chen Dom+b+hi he ru ka /
a la la badzra /
bA na si pa /
thar rtse pa'i der nags khrod par bsgyur /
gar+b+ha ri pa /
pen+d+ha pa /
thar rtse ba'i der bsod snyoms par bsgyur /
durga tsan+d+ra /
thar rtse pa'i der mi thub zla bar bsgyur /
dge slong prany+dza in+d+ra ru tse /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der bI ra badzra dang thar rtse ba'i der dpa' bo rdo rje zhes 'dug pa dpyad /
'brog mi man 'dra /
rdo rje gdan pa'i der bod du yang shes rab gsang bar gsan zer ba 'dug /
! rje btsun sa @# / /
skya pa yab sras la rnal 'byor bla na med pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa rgya mtsho lta bu bzhugs pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur ba sa skya'i lcags ri mi 'da' ba'i gser chos bcu gsum du grags pa'i nang nas mchog bsgrubs pas thun mong zhor la 'byung ba dmar mo skor gsum las /
ji skad du /
rnal 'byor mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i nye ba'i lam / /
sdig can thar bar bgrong pa'i gsang lam mchog / /
nA ro ta pa'i chig brgyud snying gi gtam / /
sa skya'i bla chen brgyud pa'i gser chos 'di / /
snyan brgyud rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang / /
kun spangs chos rje'i zhal las thos gyur nas / /
zhes pa ltar grub pa'i dbang phyug rje btsun nA ro ta pa la /
gnyis skyes mchog gnyis sogs slob ma'i gtso bo paN+Di ta bcu gnyis tsam dang /
mar pa lo tsA ba chos kyi blo gros sogs bod yul gyi slob ma dka' spyad can rnams la ming tsam yang ma gsungs par bal po pham thing pa 'jigs med grags pa dang ngag dbang grags pa mched kho nar gnang ba'i rje btsun nA ro mkha' spyod mar grags pa'i gdams pa zab me /
gang zag rab bde dgyes gang rung gi smin byed sngon du song nas sin+d+hu ra'i byin rlabs nos /
bzlas sgom chag med dang gzhi bsnyen mthar phyin pa tsam gyis gzhan la ma ltos par tshegs chung ngus rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mi mo'i gzugs kyis lag pa'i mkhrig mnas bzung ste lus ma spangs par mkha' spyod du 'khrid pa /
'bring lam ka li ya'i shing la brten nas sin+d+hu ra'i sgrub pas bud med phal ba'i khrod nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ngos zin te des tshe 'dir dngos su mkha' spyod du 'khrid /
tha ma'ang 'chi ba 'od gsal chos sku las par dor langs pa'i dus rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis mkha' spyod du 'khrid par nges pa'i zab pa las kyang ches zab pa snyan brgyud tshad ma bzhi dang ldan pa'i skor la /
tshogs slob gnyis su grags pa'i nang nas ches cher zab pa gsang chen slob bshad pa'i lugs bzhin nos pa la /
sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub cing mchod pa dang bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i nye lam gyi yi ge'i steng nas sin+d+hu ra'i byin rlabs dang /
rtsa dbu ma'i 'khrid kyi chos nyid mngon sum du ston pa de kho na nyid brda sa? chos kyi byin rlabs kyis smin par byas nas /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig chen mo mkha' spyod bgod pa'i nye lam la gzhi mdzad /
gnyis bral 'chang dus zhal shes gsum zhes pa'i dngos bstan dang shugs bstan gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i zhal shes yig chung gis legs par brgyan /
de yang gang zag dbang po rdul ba rnams la sems 'dzin gyi dmigs pa kho nas don 'grub na'ang /
blos 'chun pa rnams la bsgom bya'i don la thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs gcod pa bskyed rim rnam bshad dang /
bcad don nyams su len pa sems 'dzin gyi rim pa gtong lugs sogs kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor ba ltar sngon 'gro'i 'khrid thun mong ma yin pa bzhi /
rnal 'byor bcu gcig gi bskyed rim sems 'dzin zhar byung rdzogs rim dang bcas pa /
dngos gzhi'i rdzogs rim rtsa dbu ma /
bde ba dang 'jal lus sgrub pa /
'pho ba /
nang gi mkha' spyod sgrub pa sogs cha lag tshang ba'i nyams 'khrid /
thams cad @# / /
mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi zin bris chen mo la brten nas mthun rkyen tshogs gsog dang 'gal rkyen sdig sgrib sbyang ba'i sngon 'gro /
bskyed rim bsdus pa ngo sprad pa'i sbyang ba /
bdag byin rlabs /
dbu ma kha 'gyed pa dang gsum gyi dmigs rim rje btsun yab dang thun mong ba'i rtsa dbu ma che ba'i nyams zha? 'khrid shin tu rgyas pa /
'di ni gsol 'debs pad dkar bzhad pa'i dga' ston du /
lte ba'i pad mor rlung lnga'i ti la ka /
rtse gcig bsgoms pas kha sbyor rnal 'byor gyis / /
lus sems rtsa la dri bzhon zhugs pa yi / /
bde ba mchog gis bdag rgyud tshim par shog /
ces sa bon tsam bstan cing rje btsun rin po che'i man ngag rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa'i khyad chos nA ro ta pa'i snyan brgyud slob bshad 'dzin pa rnams kyi thugs kyi nyid khu'o / /
'khon ston bsod nams dbang phyug gi gsung ngag? rgyun gyi yi ger brten nas yab dang thun mong ba'i rtsa ba'i dbu ma'i rlung sbyang ba'i dmigs rim dang yum rkyang gi spyi ba'i yig 'bru lnga la brten nas rlung sems dbu mar 'jug pa'i 'khrid dang bcas pa nyams su legs par bstar nas /
rgyab rten lung la /
rtsa ba rgya gzhung /
gdams skor /
sgrub thabs /
rnam bshad /
byin rlabs /
kha skong gi yi ge /
'khrid yig dang bdun /
dang po ni /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs gong ma'i mchan bu dang bcas pa 'di snying po lta bu med du mi rung ba yin no / /
slob dpon nA ro ta pas mdzad pa rgya gar ?? gyi mkhan po su ma ti dang dge slong pradz+nya kIrtis bsgyur ba /
gnyis pa gdams skor la /
bskyed rim phag mo mkha' spyod /
rdzogs rim rtsa dbu ma /
thun mong gi dngos grub gnod spen po dbang du byed pa /
lam gyi yan lag dang bzhi /
dang po la /
byin rlabs bsdus don na rjes gnang 'er mjug na mkha' spyod sgrub chul kyang cung zad yong /
khyi yi ge bu ?? mo gzhon nu ma la ston mo bya ba dam tshig go'i mtha' can /
don 'grel ?? rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs la don bcu gcig gis nges bar bya ba de ltar don bcu gcig go'i mtha' can /
spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor las 'phros nas phyi ma tshod mdor bsdus ?? byed tshul byang chub sems dpas bkrol ba 'o'i bskyed rim dngos /
mtha' can /
'di'i byang byung byin rlabs shig yod kyang phyag len du mi mdzad ces brag phug pa gsung /
bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cha bzlas sgob gnyis la brten nas mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub sgrub ?? pa bla ma'i zhal gyi gdams pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
tshogs kyi mchod pa /
?? mdor bsdus pa rjes ma mngon par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
ches bcu'i mchod pa ?? yi dam du byang tshul nyes pa thams cad 'dag par gsungs pa'i mtha' can /
rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg rgyas ?? pa bdag nyid la bsdu 'o'i mtha' can /
mar me'i sbyin sreg ?? gzhan la phan pa'i blos yi ger bkod pa'i mtha' can rnams /
gnyis pa rdzogs rim rtsa dbu ma'i zhal shes su la 'phangs /
gsum pa thun mong gi dngos grub gnod sbyin mo dbang du byed pa la gnod sbyin mo'i rtog pa las tshangs pa'i bu mo 'gugs ?? pa man ngag tu byas pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
'di la brgyud kyi dum bu'ang zer /
gnod sbyin mo padma hi'i sgrub thabs ?? yid du 'ong ba padma'i man ngag rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
de'i zhal shes ?? yid du 'ong ba'i gnod sbyin ma sgrub pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'di bag phug pa'i @# / /
bsdus don na mi gsal ba gong gi khongs su gtogs pa'i dbang du btang ba 'dra /
'khol po pa ta na'i sgrub thabs ?? zhes brjod do'i mtha' can rnams /
bzhi pa lam gyi yan leg la /
pra se na dbab ?? pa gdams ngag go'i mtha' can /
sman chen po'i bcud len ?? thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams ngag go'i mtha' can rnams bla ma sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
sa chen gyi yi ge de rnams kyi bsdus don phrag phug pa'i gsung sgros sa gcad bzhir mjad bcung zad kyang snang ngo'i mtha' can rnams /
gsum pa sgrub thabs la /
brgyud 'debs rgyas pa bsod nams ye shes /
(e? )sgo? ma ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i bsdus pa (e? )sgo? rdo rje 'chang chen ma /
tshar pa rdo rje 'chang gis stod lung spar rdzong du mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs /
?? mchog gi padmo bzhad pa'i dga' ston nam rgyal ba rgya mtsho mar grags pa /
dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mkha' la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa rin po ches sa sprul gdu bu'i bla ba la shangs mdor mdzad pa /
des me byin zla ba gnyis pa'i tshes brgyad la mdzad pa'i dpal nA ro ta pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs /
dbu na bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo yod pa'i nA ro mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs e? rjes sangs rgyas dpal bzang gis mdzad pa dam tshig pa rang la bsdu 'o'i mtha' can /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs ?? rgyun du nyams su blang ba'i ngag 'don gyi chul tshar chen gyi gsung rgyun nyams len mthar thug ithi'i mtha' can /
de dang 'dra min a? 'gor nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can zhes yod pa nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang pos mdzad pa'i rgyun gyi nyams lcags? len mdor bsdus pa bsnyel byang du bkod pa rnams /
bzhi pa rnam bshad la /
bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi dgongs pa nA ro ta pa'i man ngag gis bskyed pa'i rim pa phag mo mkha' spyod du bkral ba'i sgrub thabs kyi don rjes chen gyis rnal 'byor bcu gcig tu bsdus nas e? bstan pa'i rnam bshad rje nyi zla seng ges mdzad pa /
rnal 'byor bcu gcig gi rnam bshad sgo? sgo rje btsun byams pa chos legs gyis mdzad pa /
lnga pa byin rlabs la /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang dang dngos grub ma lus pa blang ba'i cho ga 'phags pa rin po ches lcags rta zla ba bdun pa'i tshes bco brgyad la shangs mdor mdzad pa /
'gong ye shes mkha' 'gro ma lus pa'i zhes yod pa'i byin rlabs kyi yi ge rje sangs rgyas (e? )sgo? dpal bzang gis mdzad pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol gyi mtha' can /
byin rlabs e? kyi cho ga rdo rje 'chang chen po A nan+da b+ha dra'i gsung las ji ltar zin pa tsam zhig pradz+nya b+ha dras brjed byang du bris pa /
mkhas grub gung ru /
sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor sgrub cing mchod pa dang bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga ?? mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i nye lam rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes mdzad pa /
rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtsa dbu ma'i de kho na nyid dngos su ston pa'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga (sa? )?? bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi gsung yar klungs pas zin bris su btab pa ltar rjes skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams kyis mdzad pa rnams /
drug pa kha skong @# / /
la| rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga go go can gyis bskul nas 'phags pas lcags rtag tu bu'i zla ba la shangs mdor mdzad pa /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga go go can gyis bskul nas 'phags pas sa sgrul dbyang 'bring shangs mdor mdzad pa /
'gor rje btsun dam pa mi bskyod rdo rje zhes yod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga e? mus chen gyi gsung bzhin chos rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang gis mdzad pa /
rdzong chung pa lugs kyi chos skor sngags 'chang gzungs pas phyogs gcig 'bum? tu bsgrigs pa'i man ngag gter mdzod du grags pa la /
rnal 'byor bcu gcig gi nyams len la brten nas bsnyen pas mnyes par bya ba /
zhar byung gtor ma'i cho ga /
gzhan don slob ma la phan gdags pa /
tshogs mchod dang bcas pa /
slob ma rjes gzung byin rlabs kyi yi ge /
zhar byung sin+d+hu ra'i sgrub pa /
zhi ba'i sbyin sreg /
mar me'i sbyin sreg /
za byed mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg /
khrus chog /
'khor lo'i man ngag /
tshes bcu'i cho ga dang bcas pa rnams /
bdun pa 'khrid yig la /
dngos dang /
khyad par can rtsa dbu ma che ba'i 'khrid gnyis /
dang po la rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi phyag chen gces bsdus nas 'khor lo sdom pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan gyis e? bris pa'i rtsa dbu ma'i 'khrid yig 'gor bla ma dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo zab yangs rgyud rgyal gsang mtha'i don zhes yod pa /
rgyud sde drug pa rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i yang bcud dpal mo mkha' spyod dga' ba'i nye la ma rje btsun sa skya pa'i gser chos kyi nying khu he ru ka dpal tshar pa chos rje'i gsung bzhin 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig ?? mkha' spyod bgrod pa'i nye lam /
'di ni deng sang rnal 'byor bcu gcig gi steng du rtsa dbu ma'i 'khrid tsam bsnan nas nA ro mkha' spyod kyi 'khrid yin no zhes skad gsangs mthon por sgrog pa rnams dang ye mi 'dra ba'i nA ro pa'i gsang chen slob bshad kyi gnad 'gag thams cad tshang ba yin pas 'khrid kyi mjug tu /
grangs med pho nya'i gtso mo kun 'dar ma / /
zag med bde chen mchog gis mchod byas nas / /
brjod med gnas lugs rtogs pa'i nye lam 'di / /
'khrul med bla ma'i gsung gi nying khu yin / /
zhes rang bzo dang 'khrul pa'i dri ma phra mo tsam dang yang bral ba yin la /
'phral gyi tshig bshad tsam ma yin par lam 'di la brten nas grub pa'i rigs 'dzin gyi sa chen po brnyes pa'i ngo mtshar ba'i rnam thar la brten nas tshar chen gyi rtogs brjod du /
dpal mkha' spyod kyi dga' ma yid 'ongs ma / /
dus ring nas bskyangs pa'i ma ma des / /
da rigs 'dzin gyi grub pa ster ba'i brda / /
yongs ngo mtshar gyi zlos gar ci yang brtsen / /
zhes gsungs la'i don snying dbus kyi dpal be'ur bcang ba'i 'os so / /
thun mong ma yin pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor rgyas pa dang nyams len gyi 'khrigs rim yongs grags dang cung zad mi mthun par slob bshad pa'i bzhed pa thun mong ma yin pa (dbang? )?? go rim 'khrul med du rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis bkod pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig gi mtha' can /
mthu stobs kyi dbang phyug dgon gsar ba bsod nams chos 'phel gyi gsung rgyun rnal 'byor bcu gcig nang bskyed rim lus dkyil sgom tshul rdzogs @# / /
rim shin tu zab pa bsam mi khyab kyi zhal shes dang bcas pa mkhas (ngag? )?? grub ngag dbang chos grags kyis zin bris su mdzad pa'i dngos grub myur mgyogs kyi pha nya /
'khrid kyi skabs gnyis bral 'chad dus zhal shes gsum gyi dang po thun mong ma yin pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi yig ?? chung dang gnyis pa bla ma bstim pa'i zhal gdams rdo rje 'chang tshar pa ros rje'i gsungs snying gi dbus su gces par zung gi mtha' can /
rje btsun nA ro mkha' spyod kyi lus dkyil snyan brgyud ?? tshar chen gyi gsung snying ltar gces pa dam du spa bar mdzod kyi mtha' can /
phyag rgya chen po dbu mar 'jug pa'i yig rnying zhugs pa 'o'i mtha' can /
zhal shes gsum pa tshar chen gyi gsung thun mong ma yin pa'i rtsa dbu ma'i rgyun gyi nyams ?? len gsang chen bcud kyi thig le snying dbus padma bzhad par gyur cig gi mtha' can /
mkha' spyod ma'i zhal shes dbang bzhi lus bsgrigs kyi yig chung gong ma'i man ngag gnyis po 'di bla ma'i gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
yang dbang bzhi lus bsgrigs /
mkha' spyod sgrub pa /
'pho ba'i skabs sgo dgag pa gsum gyi zhal shes yig chung rgyud las gsal bar 'byung ngo'i mtha' can /
he ru ka yab yum zhal sbyor dang yum rkyang la brten pa'i 'pho ba gser chos lo tsA ba'i man ngag sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
de'i gsal byed yab dang thun mong ba dang yum dang thun mong min pa'i nyams len ?? tshar pa rdo rje 'chang gi gsung rgyun dbyings rig bsre'o'i mtha' can /
'pho ba 'di gnyis ngang 'og nas 'byung ba'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i nyams len gnyis dus gcig la slob ma gcig las mi ston zhing zhu ba'i tshe gser gyi maN+Dal dang bcas dgos pa deng sang gi bar du phyag len 'phyug med du yod pas gser chos chig brgyud zab chos su ming btags bzhin du khrom chos su 'chad pa rnams dang ye mi 'dra'o / /
thun mong gi rjes 'brang rnams la ming tsam yang ma grags pa'i mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i gser chos chig brgyud ?? ma shin tu zab pa tshar pa rdo rje 'chang gis 'phan yul au Di yA na'i gzhis kar mdzad pa /
'di'i nyams len la brten nas sa skya pa'i sngags 'chang mang po lus ma spangs par mkha' spyod da byon pa'i lo rgyus ngo mtshar pa mtha' klas snang ngo / /
char chan gyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod zhal bzang ?? blta ba'i smon lam rnams /
gnyis pa khyad par can rtsa dbu ma che ba'i 'khrid la /
rje btsun chen pos mdo khams g.yer mo thang gi ston pa gzhon nu'i don du kI? mdzad pa'i nA ro ta pa'i thugs kyi nying khu rtsa dbu ma'i man ngag /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rdzogs rim rtsa dbu ma'i 'khrid kyi gsal byed zhar byung de kho na nyid dngos su ston pa'i byin rlabs kyi lag len bstan pa bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal brag? ? mtshan gyi gsung sgros rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis zin bris su btab pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i rje rgyal? btsun yab dang thun mong ba'i rtsa dbu ma che ba'i 'khrid yig /
yab dang thun mong ba'i rlung dbu mar bsnga ba'i dmigs pa dang rje btsun yum rkyang gi rlung sems dbu mar bsdu tshul gyi dmigs rim (sa? )?? 'jam mgon sa skya pa ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug gi gsung rgyun zin bris /
yum bka' la brten pa'i rlung dbu @# / /
mar sdud pa'i nyams len thun mong ma yin lcags? pa ngag dbang nyi zla bzang pos lha rigs rgyal mo'i thugs dam du mdzad pa rnams legs par thob pa las yi ge'i rtags med pa'i byin rlabs 'khrid lung rdo rje dang g.yung drung khe rkyang gis mtshan pa dang bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma /
grub chen rdo rje dril bu pa /
D+heM ki pa /
in+ta ra ba /
til+lo pa /
grub chen nA ro pa| pham thing pa gcen 'jigs med grags pa /
gcung ngag dbang grags pa /
klog skya shes rab brtsegs /
mal lo tsA ba blo gros grags pa /
sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon rin po che /
rje btsun rin po che /
chos rje sa paN /
chos rgyal 'phags pa /
zheng ston dkon cog dpal /
brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshar /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams rgyal mchog /
bdag chen 'jam dbyangs chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun no ring pa kun bzang chos kyi nyi ma /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po blo gsal rgya mtsho grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'jam pa'i dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rigs kun khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zung thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang gol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang zhal shes gsum sogs ngor ba'i byin rlabs bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid /
rdo rje /
k+Shi /
rgyal /
'bum /
lcags te rtags lnga po med pa'i lung yongs rdzogs bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
chos rje bra ma dam pa nas /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
'khor lo sdom pa dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
ngor chen tshar chen gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i gsol 'debs dang /
rje mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse nas /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel /
rje dbang rab man 'dra /
yang yab bka' yum bka'i 'pho ba ma gtogs pa'i sin+d+hu ra'i byin rlabs bskyed rdzogs gyi nyams 'khrid lugs gnyis dang bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan dang /
rje mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan gnyis ka la /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
sin+d+hu ra'i byin rlabs dang /
de'i yi ge tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig la rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
das bdag la'o / /
yang byin rlabs ni /
rje mgon po'i mtshan can nas /
zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na tshar chen nas /
bong mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
mkhan chen thar pa rgyal mtshan /
zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
yang byin rlabs dang bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid ngor lugs nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang das /
rje sangs rgyas dpal /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na dpal tshul ba nas /
bud+d+ha shrI /
ngor chan man 'dra /
yang sin+d+hu ra'i byin rlabs dang g.yung drung dang sgo'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
brag phug pa la /
gla ma dam pa dang chos rje blo @# / /
gros brtan pas gsan /
da gnyis la chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
de nas ngor chen /
mus chen /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
kun sbangs rje /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na dpal tshul ba nas /
shar chen pa /
ngor chen man 'dra /
'phags pas mdzad pa'i yi ge rnams kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
brag phug pa nas /
bla ma don yod rgyal mtshan /
slob dpon 'dul 'dzin pa /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
shar chen /
ngor chen /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
ngor chen la /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
rje bsod nams dbang phyug /
gung ru shes rab bzang po mkhyen rab rje bzhis gsan /
bzhi ga la kun sbangs rjes gsan ba man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen la /
mus chen dang kun mkhyen bsod nams seng ges gsan /
gnyis ka la rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN chen /
glo bo mkhan po /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
mkhan chen rat+na shI la /
sgo rum pa man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen nas /
rje dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen dang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse gnyis ka la bslab gsum rje /
rta rab /
byang gling rje gsum gyis gsan /
gsum ga la rje dbang rab man 'dra /
yang na rin po che bsod nams chos 'phel nas /
gnas lnga rig pa'i paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
sa skya pa chen po ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sas 'khon ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
zha lu mkhan chen rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na mkhan ngag dbang chos grags nas /
sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
yang na mkhan ngag dbang chos grags nas /
rje snying rje bzang po /
lo pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
sa skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams ma ma 'dra /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
rgyal ba lha mchog seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas seng ge /
brang ti pa nam mkha' dpal bzang /
rtse gdong khri chen kun dga' bsod nams lhun grub /
lo pa spyan snga man 'dra /
yang na rje sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
sangs rgyas seng ge man 'dra /
yang na mus chen nas go ram pa bsod nams seng ge /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
paN chen grags ba rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan po bsod nams lhun grub /
rje lha mchog seng ge man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub nas /
mus chen dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan chen nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
rje dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na mus chen nas /
zha lu pa sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
mang 'dis ba dpal ldan rgyal bo /
rje bzang bo dpal ba /
paN chen nam mkha' dbang phyug /
rje ches dbang phyug /
mus chen @# / /
sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub nas /
rje kun dga' grol mchog /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
'phags pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs /
ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs che chung glo bo bar gsan pa yang brgyud pa 'di nyid do / /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
rje sangs rgyas rin cen /
rje grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
paN chen shAkya mchog ldan /
chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
mang mkhar ba rab gsal zla ba mgon po /
grol mchog man 'dra /
yang na rje grol mchog nas /
lcags zam pa bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang po /
drung ngag dbang nyi ma /
lcags zam pa sprul sku kun dga' bsod nams dbang phyug /
mkhan chen zha lu ba chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rtse gdong khri chen nas /
lcags zam sprul sku man 'dra /
yang na lo ba spyan snga rin po che nas /
lcags zam sprul sku man 'dra /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phel /
rje ra snga rtsa pa /
rdzong dkar ba shes rab rgyal mtshan /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na mus chen sems dpa' chen po nas /
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phel /
mtshungs med bshes gnyen bkra shis /
grub mchog dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
rje mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na glo bo mkhan po bsod nams lhun grub nas /
rje dkon cog skyabs /
rigs 'dzin mnga' ris pa legs ldan rdo rje /
rje mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
dbang gi rtags yod kyi lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab nas /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
ngag gi rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse nas /
rin po che rta ra ba bsod nams chos 'phel /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya khri chen yab sras gnyis /
khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen /
des bdag la'o / /
'bum gyi rtags yod pa'i lung gi brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa yan gong ltar la /
de nas sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
chos rje dge legs bzang po /
bla chen chos dpal bzang po /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sa lu pa shes rab rin cen /
rdo ring kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
mkhas grub byams ba bzang po /
'bum chen kun dga' dpal 'byor /
mkhas grub byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang khyab bdag zha lu mkhan chen pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na dge legs bzang po nas /
A nan+da ma /
ti b+ha dra /
byams pa chos kyi rin cen /
dran mchog sangs rgyas mgon po /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
dge slong nam mkha' rgya mtsho /
'bum chen man 'dra /
yang na sa lung sher rin nas /
rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
brag gi rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
sa paN /
tshogs sgom pa /
nyan chen pa /
brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa /
yar klungs ba man slob bshad ltar ro / /
brgyud pa 'di la nyan chen par brag phug pas gsan pa'i lugs la gtso bor mdzad /
gzhan yangs paN nas /
'phags pa| zhang dkon cog dpal /
brag phug pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
baN+Di ta rdo rje shes rab /
'phags rgyal ba /
bla ma bzang po ba /
bla ma dam ba man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
zhang mdo sde dpal /
'jam dbyangs rin rgyan /
gnyis ka @# / /
la 'jam skya /
dpal ldan pa /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na sa paN /
yar sgom se bo /
do pa ston chu la gsum la rgyal cha lung mang pas gsan /
de nas mkhas pa yon tan khri /
seng ge bzang po yar klungs pa man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
dkar po brag pa /
yar klungs pa man 'dra /
kI'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rin po che rta rab yan slob bshad ltar la /
de nas paN chen ngag dbang chos grags /
khri chen kun dga' bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /

dkon cog rgya mtsho /
sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa skya khri chen man 'dra /
zha'i rtags can gyi 'khrid kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan yan brag gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa nyan chen pa dang zhang dkon cog dpal bzhugs pa ltar la /
de nas khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la nyams 'khrid du stsal to / /
rgyal gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab nas /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
rgyal rtse bdag chen kun dga' bsod nams grags pa /
mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
sa'i rtags yod pa'i byin rlabs dang lung brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse yan brag gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa nyan chen pa dang zhang dkon cog dpal bzhugs pa ltar la /
de nas rje byams pa rab brtan /
rje snying rje bzang po man sngar ltar /
yang na rje mkhyen brtse nas /
rta rab bsod nams chos 'phel /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags man 'dra'o / /
lcags kyi rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
rje grol mchog nas bstan 'dzin nyi zla bzang por brgyud pa dang gcig go /
yang byin rlabs lung 'khrid thams cad kyi nye brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma /

ring brgyud gcig la /
'di thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na snang ngo / /

nA ro pa man 'dra / /
! rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU tis legs par bkral ba'i in+d+ra mkha' spyod dam phag mo zhal gnyis ma dang bcom ldan 'das ma bden gnyis zhal du grags pa'i skor la /
rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa'i yi ge la brgyud pa'i phyag len gyis legs par brgyan te sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor du byin rlabs zab mo smin rgyas su nos /
rgyab rten lung la mi dbang chos gsum gyi dang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma zhal gnyis ma'i sgrub sgo? pa ayon gyi slob dpon chen po mi dbang in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal na lan+da pa dang lo tsA ba pradz+nya kIrtis bsgyur ba /
gnyis ba des mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rang byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa sgo? slob ma ye shes rdo rjes bsgyur ba /
gsum pa phag mo'i las bcu sgo? zhes pa bsnyen pa'i chog /
gzhan don slob ma rjes su gzung ba /
chos bcu dang 'brel ba'i tshogs mchod /
bdag gzhan gnyis ka dang 'brel @# / /
ba gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa /
gnas skabs thams cad dang 'brel ba gtor ma'i chog /
dman pa'i dur khrod dang 'brel ba'i sbyin sreg gi chog /
bu chung gsar bu la phan 'dogs pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lo /
rtsub las gdug pa char gcod pa sum+b+ha ni'i cho ga /
bsgoms pas phyir bzlog pa dang /
bris pas phyir bzlog pa rnams bla ma b+ha len+d+ra ru tses mdzad pa bal po ye shes rdo rje dang bla ma mal lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
mi dbang chos gsum gyi gsal byed rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma zhal gnyis ma'i sgrub thabs lag tu blang ba'i rim pa sgo? tseng ngo ston pas gsol ba btab pa la brten nas rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa /
sngags kyi de nyid byin gyis rlob pa lag tu blang ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgo? tseng nge 'dul 'dzin pas gsol ba btab nas rje btsun rin po ches mdzad pa /
phag mo las bcu'i cho ga'i gsal sgo? byed tseng nge ston pa dge slong shes rab grags kyis gsol ba btab par brten nas rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma zhes yod pa'i gong ma'i gsung rgyun gyi zhal gnyis ma'i sgrub thabs dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro'i mtha' can /
zhal gnyis ma'i sgrub thabs paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa ma ti tsi tras brag dkar chos sdings su sbyar pa'i mtha' can /
'gor phag mo zhal gnyis ma 'di rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa 'dra yang zhes yod pa'i byin rlabs kyi yi ge kun mkhyen gung rus mdzad pa rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po'o'i mtha' can /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs ngag? byin rlabs dang bcas pa'i chog go bde ba blags chog tu bkod pa rnams thob pa las ngag gi rtags can ma gtogs pa'i byin rlabs dang lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
rdo rje phag mo /
sgrub chen la ba pa /
rgyal chen in+d+ra b+hU ti /
lcam lak+Sh+mI ga ra /
zur chag la legs smin zer /
bram ze bir+wa ba /
grub chen sha wa ri pa /
grub chen mi tri pa /
rgya gar phyag na rdo rje /
bal po b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse /
ha du dkar bo yang zer /
bal po ye shes rdo rje /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
rje btsun sku mchad /
chos rje khu dbon /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
grub chen brag phug pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal bo /
kwa n+di nga gu shrI nam mkha' bzang po /
nyi lde ba ngag dbang grags pa /
rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun rdo ring pa /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang byin rlabs dang sgo'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
grub chen brag phug pa nas /
ri khrod pa blo gros brtan pa /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
chos rje rdo rje 'chang /
paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
glo bo mkhan po bsod nams lhun grub /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na chos rje rdo rje 'chang nas /
mus chen 'khor lo sngom pa /
rin cen mkhyen rab mchog grub /
rje btsun dgon cog tshul khrims /
grub chen sangs rgyas @# / /
dbal /
rje sgo rum pa man 'dra /
ngag gi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rtsa ba'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
bram ze bir+wa pa nas /
a b+hi dzu k+ta /
bal po ha du dkar po /
bal skad du sngags pa la 'di ltar zer zhes chag lo gsung /
lo tsA ba ya shes rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na sha wa ri pa nas /
a wa d+hU ti pa a d+h+wa ya badzra /
grub chen badzra pA Ni /
bal po b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse man 'dra /
yang na a wa d+hU ti pa nas /
ldong ngar ba ting nge 'dzin rdo rje /
'di gnyis ngor pa shar pa'i gsan yig na snang /
bsod snyoms pa tshab ma hi badzra /
bsod snyoms pa chung bas ma ti b+ha dra /
'di yang ngor pa shar ba'i gsan yig na snang /
bal po b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse man 'dra /
nye brgyud ni /
rja btsun rdo rje phag mo /
paN grub b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse man 'dra /
bal po thugs rja chen po yang zer /
sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyan brdzes kyi rgyud la brten nas slob dpon mai tri bas legs par bkral ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rig pa 'dzin brtsen ma'am mai tri mkha' spyod du grags pa'i skor la /
spro lung pa kun smon gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge dang brgyud pa'i phyag len la brten nas sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor du byin rlabs legs par nos /
rgyab rten lung la /
sgyu 'phrul chen mo ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud las phyung ba'i rig pa 'dzin ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub sgo? thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dza ya'i zhabs dang sum pa lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur pa /
rdo rje phag mo rig ba 'dzin pa rtsen ma'i sgrub sgo? thabs slob dpon gnyis med rdo rje s mdza da rje btsun dza la sha'i pe na dang sum pa lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
rig pa 'dzin pa rtsen ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su snang ba'i chog sgo? mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sdes mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang btsun pa dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur rje btsun mai tri ba /
ba /
rdo rje 'dzin pa grags pa gzhon nu sogs kyis bskul nas mkha' spyod sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa spro lung ba kun dga' smon lam gyis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i bstod pa yon tan mtha' yas ma /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub ngag? thabs dang byin rlabs kyi cho ga go bde bklags chog tu bkod pa rnams thob pa las ngag gi rtags ma gtogs pa'i byin rlabs dang lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /

mai ti pa /

bla ma a| shAkya rak+Shi ta /
