mkhan chen ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dpal rdo rjes skya pa ngag dbang bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la bka' drin du stsal to / /
! dpal ldan sa skya pa'i gser chos mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyi skor la /
padma rak+ta 'am sin+d+hu rI dkyil 'khor la brten nas seng gdong nag mo'i sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang khyad par can nos nas /
lung la ngor nas brgyud pa dang gong dkar ba nas brgyud pa ste gnyis /
dang po la /
'gor rgya gar skad du cak saM b+ha ram hA ya na sU tra zhes yod pa'i ba ri bas gter bton nas mu stegs skal ldan rgyal po btul ba'i lo rgyus mu stegs bsar pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar rdo rje gdan pas lo tsA ba mjal khar ma btang zer ba 'dug @# / /
bod du byon nas sa chen kun snying la gnang ngo'i mtha' can /
'gro sgrub thabs? ni skyabs 'gro sems bskyed spyi dang 'dra zhes yod pa'i mngon rtogs gnyis su med bar gyur nas sngags bzla ba'i mtha' can /
zlog pa'i dmigs pa dang dus gnad /
gsod pa'i dmigs gnang /
zhar byung sku smad phur bas bgegs bsgral zhing ngag gnon thabs /
mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi bsrung ba mo'i g?las la btags so de ni bsrung ba po'i mtha' can /
seng gdong dkar mo'i tshe sgrub tshe nyi zla dang mnyam mo'i mtha' can /
nor sgrub 'bum tsho gcig bzlas na 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
seng gdong dmar mo'i dbang sdud gser srang do'i bka' rgya yod do'i mtha' can /
sri'u gso ba gser 'bul dgo /
so'i mtha' can /
char 'bebs mtha' ma lnga ma mi 'bab mi srid do'i mtha' can /
mtshan med kyi char gcod ri mgo thams cad me ris khengs par bsgom char gtsong ba'i man ngag go'i mtha' can /
bye ma la brten pa'i 'bu bsrung /
tshul brten pa'i sad bsrung /
mtshan med kyi ser bsrung rnam gzhag zhal las shes so'i mtha' can /
mchan bcas mtshan med kyi thog thub ngas so'i mtha' can /
khar gong la brten nas lug nad gcod pa /
bal skud la brten nas g.yag nad gcod pa /
chu la brten nas lhog ba bsrung ba /
rdzas gnyis kyis dud bas rims bsrung ba /
sran mas 'brum bu bsrung ba /
khyi bal gyis 'khru ba gcong pa /
ma rtsas mgo yor bsrung ba /
'dogs pa'i mtshon bsrung man ngag zhal las shes so'i mtha' can /
gu gul gyis bza' nad 'chos thabs /
dmigs pas jag pa 'ching ba ste las tshogs nyi shu rtsa gsum mkha' 'gro'i gdams brgya mtsho'i nang nas zab mo chu thigs tsam zhig bkod pa /
'gor skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas la zhes yod pa'i byad bar gyi zlog pa bsams pa'i don rnams 'di yis /
'grub bo'i mtha' can /
mkha' 'gro ma shin tu drag mor byed pa'i mngon rtogs yi ge bcu bzhi ba sham bu can /
rtags /
gtor 'bul /
mthe ba mdzub kyi dmigs pa /
kha phyogs /
ma theb skyu la brten nas jag ba chom rkun bsrung ba dang bcas pa bla ma sa skya pa nas brgyud pa'i man ngag ithi'i mtha' can /
mngon rtogs rje rnam rgyal dpal bzang gis chos lung bla ma'i gdan sar sbyar ba rnams /
gnyis pa gong dkar ba nas brgyud pa la /
'gor mkha' 'go ma seng ge'i gdong can la phyag 'tshal lo 'di'i rjes gnang byed bar 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i yi ge mi dag las mang ba la sbyin pa med do zhes dam bcas nas bla ma rdo rje gdan bas ba ri lo tsA bar gdams pa'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo / /
gdams pa 'di'i lo rgyus bla ma ba ri lo tsA ba dang mu stegs skal ldan rgyal po zhes yod pa'i lo rgyus dang sdig sbyongs su gser gyi gsung rab bris gsungs pa'i mtha' can /
mtshan bcas kyi bsrung bas byad kha mkhan po kho rang la zlog pa /
thal rdab kyis dgra 'chi ba /
ting nge 'dzin gyis ngag gnon pa /
sngags kyis phyogs ngan bdud gcod bsrung ba /
bzlas pa'i mchil mas mtshon bsrung ba /
rkang 'og gis sa g.yul gyi rang phyogs kun bsrung ba /
sngags kyis jag pa 'ching ba /
mkha' 'gro ma @# / /
dmar mos nor dang tshe sgrub cing bsod nams spel ba /
rmi lam ngan pa zlog par kha gtod pa'i gnad /
dri chus rims nad bsrung ba /
bsnyen tshad dang sham bu'i zhal shes /
seng gdong dmar mo la brten pa'i khyad par gyi zlog pa bsams pa'i don rnams thams cad 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
phyir zlog man ngag tshigs bcad ma zhal gdams bla ma'i man ngag las byung ngo'i mtha' can /
rdo rje phag mo zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mngon rtogs dang bzlas pas thun mong gi dngos grub mi rtogs pa /
sgrib pa sreg pa /
drod bskyed pa /
gzhan gyi bgegs zlog pa bcas bstan pa mkha' 'gro ma bdag gis dbang du sdud ngo'i mtha' can /
gtor ma gtong ba dang bskul ma mo mkha' 'gro ma zhar byung me mchod dang bcas pa badzra na ki ni ye 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
'gor na mo gu ru bla ma rdo rje gdan ba zhes yod pa'i kha phyogs /
'dug stangs /
mngon rtogs /
mtheb mdzub kyi dmigs pa /
ma gcig ye shes ma'i bstod pa dang bcas pa rnams rdzogs par thob pa las rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma /
grub chen je tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
ba ri lo tsA ba rin cen grags /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rje paN+Di ta /
'phags pa rin po che /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
grub chen brag phug pa /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
rje kun dga' bkra shis /
rje ngang tshul bzang po /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rong po blo bzang pa /
'di skyid shod dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi mkhan thog tu phebs shing gsang sngags kyi bdag po yin kyang mtshan nyid kyi TIk+ka ma byung zhes ma lus? pa byung skad /
sku zhang mkhyen rab chos rje /
mkhan chen dkon cog tshul khrims /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na 'phags ba nas /
dga' ldan pa bkra shis dpal /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
glo bo mkhan po bsod nams lhun grub /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse man 'da? /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
khro phu pa bsod nams seng ge /
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge /
thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che /
khyung lhas pa gzhon nu bsod nams /
mkhan chen bkra shis rin cen /
skal ldan grags pa /
'khrul zhig tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
rje rin cen mchog grub dpal 'bar /
chag la rin cen chos rgyal /
sngags 'chang don yod dpal /
rje bshes gnyen bkra shis /
dge slong ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams nas /
rab 'byams pa rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag khra tshang pa /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan nas /
sa bzang ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
go shrI nam mkha' bzang po /
bdag chen rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
paN chen @# / /
'bum phrag gsum pa /
sngags 'chang yon tan rgya mtsho /
gong dkar zur 'chad pa ayon rgyal po /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal po /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
de gnyis la rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho / /
de nas khyab bdag blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
ngor nas brgyud pa'i lung ni /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod nas bla ma dam par brgyud pa'i glo bo mkhan chen nas /
sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
'jam dbyangs dkon cog rgya mtsho /
mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
mkhyen rab rje /
zha lu lo chen chos skyong bzang po /
sa lo man gcig /
gong dkar ba nas brgyud pa'i lung ni /
brag phug pa nas bla ma dam par brgyud de gong dkar zur 'chad pa rnams las 'ongs pa bshad ma thag pa de'o / /
! dpal ldan sa skya pa'i lcags ri mi 'da' ba'i gser chos bcu gsum gyi steng du gcig bsnan pa'i klu pa'i gser chos bcu bzhir gser chos bcu bzhi'i gras la rdo ring rin po che'i gsan yig na bir+wa pa bdud rtsi 'dul ba'i man ngag rtses dang bsam gtan gling pa'i chos rje zhal bu dbon po la gsan chul 'dug kyang deng sang rgyun med pa 'dra'o / /
grags pa'i ya gyal 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i ngag bsrung 'grol gyi man ngag shin tu zab pa'i mthar thug myong bas thon pa'i lung man ngag nos pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa seng ge'i sgra /
slob dpon dze tA ri /
rdo rje gdan pa che chung /
ba ri lo tsA ba /
rje sa skya pa chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun chen po gags pa /
yar sgom se bo /
rgyal tsha lung mang po /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
mkhan chen seng ge bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs ba seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mchog /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
mchod dpon dkon cog pa /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
de'i cha lag tu gtogs pa seng ge sgra'i rjes gnang bshad ma thag pa'i mngon rtogs dang lung gsum gyi chings la brten nas legs par thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
seng ge sgra /
slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi /
de'i slob ma gcig /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na 'di ltar snang yang /
lo ba spyan snga dang rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams kyi gsan yig na bram ze dpal 'dzin du ngos bzung /
paN grub nA ro pa chen po /
pham thing ba sku mched /
a thu la d+ha sa badzra /
meny+dza gling pa /
lo ba spyan snga dang shar pa'i gsan yig na b+ha ro phyag ram zer ba 'dug pa 'di gnyis 'jigs byed kyi chos 'byung tshor gcig mi gcig sna tshogs yong 'dug pas 'khrul gzhi byung ba 'dra yang 'di ni bal po thugs rje chen po yin pas b+ha ro dang mi gcig par snang ngo / /
mal le blo gros grags /
shar ba'i gsan yig na 'dis gong ma gnyis ka la gsan gsungs /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
gnyan phul byung ba gtsug tor rgyal po /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
rjes paN @# / /
shar pa shar 'byung /
shar pa ye shes rin cen /
dus 'khor ba yang zer /
kun dga' byang chub /
mkhan chen rgyal bzang dpal /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
ma ti paN chen blo gros rgyal mtshan /
sa bzang 'phags pa gzhon nu blo gros /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
bya 'gyung? ba bsod nams seng ge /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
zha lu mkhan chen khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o /
yang na ngor chen nas /
rgyal mtshan kun dbang /
'dren mchog dkon cog 'phel /
ngor chen dkon cog lhun grub /
byang gling? rje /
rdo rje 'chang dbang dab man 'dra /
yang na ngor chen nas /
paN chen grags pa rgyal mtshan /
gla po mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub /
sa lo thams cad mkhyed pa /
dkon cog lhun grub man 'dra /
yang dkon cog lhun grub kyi yi ge ltar nos pa'i brgyud pa ne /
dkon cog lhun grub yan gang ltar la /
brang ti paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang /
sgrab khang pa dpal ldan don grub /
shar chen shes rab 'byung gnas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
! thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sgo nas gdon 'grol ba'i cho ga rin can 'phreng mjes kyi lung phyag bzhes bcas thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
slob dpon shrAd+d+ha ka ra warma /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
brag steng pa yon tan tshul khrims /
mal lo blo gros grags /
brtse chen /
gnyan gtsug tor rgyal po /
rje btsun chen po /
sa paN /
shar ba ye 'byung /
shar pa dus 'khor ba /
kun dga' byang chub /
mkhan po rgyal bzang ba /
bla ma grags pa dpal /
ma ti paN chen /
sa bzang 'phags pa /
chos rje rdo rje 'chang /
rgyal tshab kun dbang /
dkon cog 'phel /
dkon cog lhun grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' dpal bzang /
shar chen kun dga' bkra shis /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
yang na ngor chen nas /
gu ge paN chen /
gro bo mkhan chen /
'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams /
dkon rtsog? lhun grub man 'dra / /
! sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don rgyab kyis go na ba chos rje'i ngon du mdzad pa'i seng ge sgra'i bsnyen thabs kyi brgyud pa ni /
mkhas pa dpal ldan don grub /
thar rtse nam mkha' sangs rgyas drin can zha lu pa chen mo /
nges bdag la'o / /
! 'khon rigs 'jam dpal rdo rje rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras la bstan pa bsrung ba'i chos skyong grangs med pa zhig bka' babs pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa ma gad+ha rdo rje gdan gyi sgo skyong 'phags yul paN grub rnams kyi srung ma'i gtso bo rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po ni /
mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gye rgyud las /
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos nag po chen po 'di nyid gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo zhes pa ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'? sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i sprul par bstan pas phyogs re'i @# / /
sprul pa'i srung ma rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir bstan srung kun gyi gtso bo ste /
tshul de la dgongs nas kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis /
bgrang yas bstan srung kun gyi sde dpon che / /
dran bas snying gi mun sel rdo rje gur / /
zhes ched du brjod pa'ang rang bzhin brjod pa'i rgyan kho na yin la /
'di nyid kyi khungs kyang mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba dang khrag mtsho khol ma sogs bod kyi mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston gyis the tshom gyi gzhir mdzad pa'i rgyud tsam la ltos mi dgos par rtsod bral gyi rgyud mgon po mngon par 'byung ba /
bshad rgyud rdo rje gur lha mo'i khungs 'phags yul na bzhugs pa'i gdan bzhi'i rgyud rgyas pa rnams dang /
gzhan yang bod kyi mkhas pa dag the tshom gyi gzhir mdzad na'ang /
rang lugs rgyud de dag tshad mar bzhed cing /
gal te rgyud dngos min kyang grub thob tshad ldan gyi gsung yin pas rgyud dang phyogs mtshungs pa'i khungs su 'os pa /
mgon po khros rgyud dngos grub 'byung ba /
gsang ba dur khrod nag po /
dur khrod chen po gri gug brtsegs pa /
me lce 'bar ma /
bshan pa nag mo /
ma mo srog gi 'khor lo sogs las gsal bar bstan pa'i gdams skor la /
ma hA kA la'i chos skor gyi brjed byang bsam 'phel nor bu'i 'phred ba las /
khyab bdag gur gyi mgon po'i chos skor ni / /
'phags pa'i yul du paN grub rnams kyis phye / /
rgyud rgyal ma dros chu gter las byung ba'i / /
bka' babs rnam bzhi'i gdams pa'i chu rgyun ni / /
lo tsA rnam bzhi'i gsung gi 'bab stegs las / /
legs 'ongs sa skya'i bla chen thugs mtshor 'khyil / /
gang de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i gzegs ma ni / /
phyogs brgyar 'phros pas kha ba'i sman ljongs 'dir / /
zab ston lbu 'phreng bye pas phyug pa yi / /
rje 'brangs chu klung rnam bzhi ring du 'babs / /
zhes pa ltar rgyud rgyal rnams kyi gdams pa'i snying po 'phags yul paN grub rnams kyis srol rgyas bsdus sna tshogs su btod pa'i nang nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug bir+wa pa las brgyud pa'i lam 'bras pa'i gur mgon lo chen 'brog mis bsgyur ba /
bla ma rdo rje gdan pa las brgyud pa sgrub thabs kun las btus pa lugs kyi mgon po ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
kha che'i bsod snyoms pa chen po paN chen shAkya shrI las brgyud pa'i mgon po sa lo tsA ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba /
slob dpon chen po bram ze mchog sred kyi gdams pa lo chen rin bzang gis bsgyur ba mal lo tsA ba nas brgyud pa ste lo paN bzhi las brgyud pa'i bka' ma chad pa chu bo chen po bzhi'i rgyun ltar babs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis tshar pa rdo rje 'chang gis /
deng nas dus kun rgyud rgyal kai la sha / /
snyan brgyud tsha zer gyis sbran gdams pa'i rgyun / /
ma dros chu klung las 'ongs bka' babs bzhi'i / /
zab don bdud rtsis bdag rgyud tshim par shog /
ces gsungs pa yin zhing /
gyi ljang lugs ni lo chen rin bzang nas mal lor brgyud pa min na'ang /
stod lugs smad lugs gnyis su byung ba'i stod lugs rnams mal lo nas brgyud pa yin pas bka' babs phyi ma'i khongs su don gyis 'du zhing /
lha bcu bdun ma'i dbar la chen nas brgyud pa dang gyi ljang smad lugs kyi gdams skor rnams rje btsun gong ma rnams las ma brgyud @# / /
na'ang /
bzhi thog pa sngags 'chang kun dga' zla ba nas sa lugs su bka' babs pas deng sang man ngag rnams phyogs gcig tu mdzad pa yin no / /
de la thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa zab rgyas kyi dbang gis gdung brgyud kho na'i snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs pa khu dbon nas brgyud pa /
sbas pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rgyal mchan nas brgyud pa /
dor rdzong gong dkar ba gsum so sor brgyud pa gsum las /
yar klungs pa dang bar sdings pa gnyis snyan brgyud kyi khongs su bsdus te gcig tu byas nas zhal ngo brgyud pa dang /
ngor rdzong gong gsum la slob brgyud du byas te gdams ngag gi bka' srol 'dzin pa'i rjes 'brang bzhir mdzad pa'i /
dang po ni /
deng sang kha'u brag rdzong pa 'am tshar lugs su grags pa 'di nyid la bka' babs shing /
'on kyang thun mong ba'i gdams pa rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par mnga' bas kha skong dkar chag zab don gsal sgron las /
kho bos rgyal khams yangs pa'i phyogs kun myul / /
mkhas grub bla ma mang po'i zhabs pad bsten / /
rang gzhan gdams pa zab mo'i gnad kun shes / /
dag dang ma dag 'byed pa'i spobs pa thob / /
khyad par nag po chen po'i man ngag ni / /
brgyud ldan bla ma bcu phrag gcig la zhus / /
'gran zla kun bral drin can rdo ring pa'i / /
snyan brgyud zab mo bum pa gang byor thob / /
e waM pa ni bsdus la spros pa chung / /
mus srad pa ni dkar chag khrigs chags can / /
rdo rje gdan pa 'cham dang nus pa'i bdag /
kho bos thob pa'i thun mong brgyud pa gsum / /
zhes gsungs pas thun mong ba'i brgyud pa gsum las 'ongs pa'i dbang rjes gnang lung man ngag dang /
gtso bor bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i me 'bar dkar chag las /
bdag ni chos skyong man ngag la / /
mkhas grags cung zad yod pa'i phyir / /
khams gtsang dbyas pa'i gra pa sogs / /
ston chad slob ma mang byung yang / /
nges par snod dang ldan pa dang / /
snying nas dad ldan ma gyur phyir / /
snying por gyur pa'i man ngag rnams / /
yang mdzod dmar po thugs dkyil las / /
gzhan nas rnyed par mi 'gyur bas / /
dang ldan yod na blang bar gyis / /
zhes dang /
bsam 'phel nor 'phreng las /
khyad par sa skya'i bla chen thugs kyi bcud / /
mkhas grub gzhan gyis ma thos gsang chen mchog /
gdung brgyud gong ma'i snyan brgyud yid bzhin nor / /
zhal shas phyag 'khrid ma lus legs par snang /
zhes pa ltar 'khon gyi gdung brgyud tshad dang slob ma sa skya tshad kyi rna bar ma grags pa'i rin cen sgang pa sgos kyi zhal ngo nang brgyud snyan brgyud tshad ma bzhi ldan gyi byin rlabs rjes gnang nyams 'khrid man ngag phyag len dmar 'khrid rang thun mong pa nos pa'i skor rnams las /
bka' babs dang po grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba bir+wa pa nas brgyud pa'i nag po chen po dpa' bo gcig pa'i tshom bu dang gtor ma la brten pa'i rjes gnang /
bka' babs gnyis pa bla ma rdo rje gdan pa'i sgrub thabs kun las btus pa'i lugs kyi mgon po dpa' bo gcig pa'i tshom bu'i rjes su gnang ba /
bka' babs gsum pa la rjes gnang med bas 'dir ma smos /
bka' babs bzhi pa slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyi gdams pa snying po'i man ngag zab cing rtogs dka' ba mkhas /
@# / /
rlom phal gyi mig dang rna ba'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa gsang chen gdams pa'i skor la /
tshad ma bzhi dang sbyar na khog 'bubs lo rgyus rnams kyi bla mtshad ma /
nyams 'khrid dang mngon spyod drag po'i las sbyor sogs phyag len dmar 'khrid du bstar ba nyams myong tshad ma /
rgyab rten gyi man ngag be bum rnams kyi bstan bcos tshad ma /
bshad khungs kyi rgyud dang rgya gzhung rnams kyi lung tshad mar 'gyur /
gtso bor snyan brgyud bzhi dang sbyor dgos pa /
de yang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung sgros sogs brgyud ldan gyi yi ge mang por byin rlabs chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i bka' ma nub pa /
gdams ngag gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu'i sarga ma log pa /
mos gus gzhon nu'i dga' ba lta bu'i bsam pa tshim pa /
longs spyod lha 'dod yon la rtse ba lta bu'i dpal 'byor gyi rgyun ma nyams pa 'am /
lhag bsam rab dkar gyi dgongs 'grel paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa sogs bla ma snga phyi mang pa'i gsung sgros su gsum pa dang bzhi pa gnyis go ldog pa dang /
yang na bsam 'phel nor 'phreng las /
phyi nang gsang ba'i man ngag zhu ba'i tshe / /
tshogs dang gtor mas mkha' 'gro mnyes par byas / /
rin cen gser gyi maN+Dal lan gsum phul / /
gsang chen grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i dam bca' byas / /
zhes pa ltar rdo rje'i slob dpon thugs gting nas mnyes par 'gyur ba'i snyan brgyud dang snyan brgyud kyi rgyu la ming btags /
po'i rten 'brel bsgrigs rjes /
snyan brgyud gnyis rdo rje slob dpon la ltos pa'i sngon 'gro'i snyan brgyud /
pa dbang rjes gnang byin rlabs kyi bka' chu bo'i rgyun ma nub pa /
snyan brgyud gsum rdo rje slob dbon la bltas ba'i dngos gzhi'i snyan brgyud /
ba man ngag gser 'gyur gyi rtsi dang 'dra ba gdams pa'i sarka ma log pa thob par brten nas snyan brgyud bzhi snyan brgyud gyi 'bras bu la ming btags /
pa mos gus gzhon nu'i bde ba lta bu shugs la 'byung ba'i go rim mi 'dra ba gnyis snang na'ang don gyi cha la khyad par med cing 'dir snyan brgyud ha la nag po'i sbyar byang gi rjes su 'brangs pa yin la /
de ltar snyan brgyud tshang ma bzhi ldan gyi snyan brgyud gnyis pa la dbang dang rjes gnang gnyis /
dang po dbang gi bka' ma nub pa la /
'jam dbyangs grags pa'am chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mngon par rtogs pa bdud las rnam rgyal dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mgon po rnam rol gnyis la brten nas bla ma'i phyag len bzhin rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du bram ze chen po nas nye bar brgyud pa'i mgon po gri gug lha lnga'i rig pa'i dbang lnga /
sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rjes gnang /
brtan byed du chu'i dbang /
sngags kyi bzlas lung dang bcas pa /
'jam dbyangs grags pas mdzad pa'i mngon dkyil bshad ma thag pa'i steng nas bla ma mal lo'i bzhed pa'i lha brgyad ma'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rig pa'i dbang lnga rjes gnang bzlas lung dang bcas pa /
mngon dkyil de nyid la brten nas bla ma brag steng par bzhad pa lha bcu gnyis ma'i rdul tshan gyi dkyil 'khor du rig pa'i dbang lnga /
sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rjes gnang bzlas lung dang bcas pa /
yig cha de khar brten nas dur khrod nag po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i gyi ljang lugs kyi @# / /
mgon po lha bcu bdun ma'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du chu cod pan /
rdor dril ming dbang bzlas lung dang bcas pa rnams dkyil chog tu lugs gnyis gsungs pa'i rgya gzhung lugs sor gnas /
yang mngon dkyil gong ma la brten nas sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor du gri gug lha lnga'i dbang snyan brgyud lugs ltar bzlas lung yan rgya gzhung bzhin la sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang /
gsang dbang sher dbang bzhi pa dang bcas pa rnams /
gnyis pa rjes gnang gi bka' ma nub pa la /
brgyud ba'i bka' srol yig chung gi tho bcos bslad med pa ltar lo chen gyi bzhed pa gtso bor gyur pa'i thun mong ba lcam dral lha gsum sbags te bsgrub pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i phyag len la gzhi byas rgyal tsha lung mang po dang bla ma zhang ston khu dbon gyi phyag bzhes zin bris kyis brgyan te yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge dang bshom sogs mthong brgyud kyi bka' srol ltar lha brgyad mkha' 'gro sbags sgrub thun mong ba'i rjes gnang /
yar klungs pa'i yi ge dang mgon po rnam rol gyi mngon rtogs ltar mgon po lha bcu gnyis kyi thun mong ba'i rjes gnang /
gtor chog pho nya myur mgyogs dang thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i tho yig bzhin dus gcig la chig brgyud las mi gnang ba'i lha brgyad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang /
mgon po rnam rol gyi mngon rtogs dang kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyi tho yig ltar dus gcig la chig brgyud kho nar gnang ba'i mgon po lha bcu gnyis ma'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje'i blo yig ltar mgon po khro po bcu'i rjes gnang bka' rgya dam pa /
yar klungs pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ger nang gi las mkhan gyi mngon rtogs bsnan pa'i gsang 'khrid kyi smin byed mgon po lha dgu'i rjes gnang bka' rgya dam pa /
yig rnying ltar dbal ldan lha mo dud sol ma'i phyi sgrub thun mong gi rjes gnang /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsan yig na thun mong ma yin pa zhig 'dug pa ma thob /
rngog stod bsod nams bstan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge ltar dpal ldan lha mo dud pa'i sol ba can gyi gsang sgrub thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang bka' rgya dam pa /
tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gi zin tho dang brgyud pa'i gsung sgros ltar nang gi las mkhan yer nag zangs gri can gyi rjes gnang chig brgyud ma /
yang bshad ma thag pa'i yi ge gnyis dang zangs gri skor gsum gyi rjes gnang gi zin bris /
paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad par brten nas gcir bu zangs gi can gyi rjes gnang /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs ba'i yi ge dang gsung rgyun phyag bzhes ltar gsang ba'i las mkhan pu tra ming sring gi rjes gnang chig brgyud ma /
pu tra'i rjes gnang gi chings la gzhi mdzad cung zad mi mthun pa brgyud pa'i gsung sgras kyis brgyan te ru mtshon gyi las mkhan bran bdud gshin rje nag po'i thun mong gi rjes gnang /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i yi ge ltar bran bdud kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang chig brgyud ma rnams legs par nos nas /
snyan brgyud gsum pa gdams pa'i dngos gzhi lag len dmar 'khrid la /
dngos dang rgyab rten lung dang 'brel ba'i sgo nas sgo 'dogs gcod pa gnyis /
dang po la /
@# / /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen pos mdzad pa'i phyi 'khrid rdo rje brag rdzong ma'i yi ge dang /
de'i lhan thabs kyi tshul du thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i yi ge gnyis la gzhi byas yig chung zur 'debs dang brgyud pa'i zhal shes kyis brgyan te sngon 'gro thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa /
dngos gzhi zab pa'i gnad lnga dang khyad par gyi man ngag mde kha btags pa'i sgo nas bsrung ba /
spyi dang bye brag khyad par gsum gyi sgo nas bzlog pa /
bstan pa'i spyi dgra dang rnal 'byor sgos dgra bsgral ba'i sgo nas gsad pa /
rdzas dang re migs pa la brten pa'i mnan pa'i dmigs 'khrid rnams dngos bstan nyams su len dgos pa la nyams 'khrid /
mtshan bcas rdzas dang 'khor lo la brten pa sogs la ngo sprod phyag bzhes /
khyad par thun mong ma yin pa'i man ngag gi mde kha gdags pa la gsum gyi nang dam tshig gi 'khor lo sems nyid ye shes kyi rtsal 'don zhes pa rnam rtog bdud bzhi bcom nas tshe 'di nyid la mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i yang snying ni 'khrid zhu ba 'ga' zhig yod kyang skal ldan gyi slob bu gcig la chig brgyud du ston pa /
gong gi sa gcad kyis ma zin pa'i drag po sngags rgod kyi man ngag gi 'khrid /
'di la brten nas bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis rgya 'dre tshar gcad pa'i lo rgyus ngo mtshar ba yang yod /
phyi nang gsang gsum du dbye na gdams pa dngos gzhi phyi'i brag rdzong /
drag po sngags rgod nang gi brag rdzong /
ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i brag rdzong ste zab 'khrid kha lag tshang ba 'di ni rjes 'brang gi mkhas grub phal cher la ma grags shing gdung brgyud rim par chig brgyud du byon pa'i slob bshad kho na yin pas /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis /
rjes 'brang mkhas dang grub pa re grags rnams la / /
thun mong gdams pa'i dpal 'byor mtha' yas mod /
gsang chen slob bshad bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'di / /
mkhas rlom phal gyi rna ba'i spyod yul min / /
zhes pa ltar zab gnad rnams gab sbas su mdzad pa chos la dpe mkhyud ma yin na'ang /
rdo ring dbon po kun rgyan pas rje btsun kun spangs chen po'i zhabs pad ma bsten par lugs srol 'di la zur za ba'i sgo nas khong rang la kun spangs chos rje'i man ngag zur pa zhig yod khul mdzad pa sogs chos la ras chod 'byung nyen che bar dgongs nas /
ji skad du /
sngon chad yi ge med pa'i snyan brgyud dag /
yi ger bris 'di rnam par 'khyams gyur na / /
hams can sa brdzus 'ga' yis nga mkhas zhes / /
lung med chos kyis rgyal khams 'gengs ta re / /
zhes gsung ba thugs shin tu mad par snang zhing la la dag man ngag 'di 'dra gong ma'i dus med snyam pa'i log lta byed pa ni sa chen gyis mdzad pa'i tshogs bdag ltar bsgrub pa /
sga A nan dam pas mdzad pa'i shog hril drug pa'i nang gi gnyis pa dang rbod gtong bzlog pa'i zhal shes su pho nya'i spro bsdu zur tsam lags /
rgyas pa bla ma'i zhal las dris zhes sogs sa bon tsam yi ger bris nas dngos gzhi thugs la gab pa'i rnam rtog tsam yang ma shar ba'i cal col smra ba ni chu shing lta bu'o / /
chos la bshad sgrub tshul bzhin du byed na /
ji skad du /
skye ba gsum gyi @# / /
gong nas gsol btab cing / /
tshe 'dir longs spyod sgrub pas mnyes par byas / /
dad dang snying rje shes rab mi dman la / /
kun spangs chos rje'i bstan la lhag par dad / /
ston dang bstan pa gzhan nas mi 'tshol bar / /
ci mdzad khyed shes mos gus lde mig gis / /
gsang chen thugs kyi bang mdzod sgo phye nas / /
snyan brgyud yid bzhin nor bu kho bos rnyed / /
bco brgyad lo yi mtha' rum son par / /
dad dang skal ldan gzhan dang gzhan dag la / /
snyan brgyud 'di 'dra'i ming yang ma bshad na / /
yongs rdzogs gdams pa sbyin par ngas ma phod / /
ces gsungs pa las tshar chen rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs par 'khrungs pa'i dus /
rje mkhyen brtse rang nyid nas yar bgrangs pa'i skyes rabs bzhi pa 'jam dbyangs dgag par 'khrungs dus zab chos rnams gnang bar gsol ba btab pa lta bu'i las sad pa ni rang cag mtha' dag la dka' na yang de phyin gyi don rnams gong 'og gi gdams pa mtha' dag gi skabs su dran par byas te snying gi dpal ber 'chang ba'i 'os so / /
rdo rje nag po chen po'i nang 'khrid dam gsang 'khrid du grags pa ni nang rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten nas bsgrubs pas nang sgrub /
gsang ba sems kyi gnad la brten nas bsgrubs pas gsang sgrub tu grags shing /
'di la thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis yod pa las gnyis ka'i rtsa bar gyur pa gong mas mdzad pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus /
de nyid cung zad rgyas su btang ba dam pas mdzad pa dang /
gsang rten lus la sba ba'i yig chung rnams dang zhal shes la brten nas nang 'khrid thun mong ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i bsnyen sgrub thun mong ma yin pa'i man ngag 'di yi ge nag 'gros lta bur bkod pa'i thog ma yin 'dug pas /
gsung las /
gzhan gyis bskul phyir gzhan phan bsam pas bris / /
snyigs dus nub par dogs pas 'dir brjod bya / /
zhes dang /
dpe mkhyud med par ma bris na snyigs dus su song bas brjed pa dang nub kyi dogs nas /
yi ger gsal por 'dri bar srung ma rnams la lo gsum gyi bar gsol ba btab /
ces sogs ltar /
de yan chad du yi ger gsal po med par shes nus /
mal lo'i rjes gnang gi thor /
man ngag phyi sgrub dang nang lus la brten pa rnams sbyin zhes dang /
sa chen gyi 'byung lugs gtor mar rang nang gi rnal 'byor pa yin na bdag nyid kyi lte ba chos 'byung gru gsum nang du bsdus la bzhag ces gsang rten lus sba'i gnad zab mo zur tsam bstan pa sogs cung zad ma dgongs pa 'khrid brgya'i nang du /
skyed cing gsed nas phyag bzhi'i srog thig phyung / /
gur la'ang 'dra cog yar klungs ba yis sbyar / /
zhes zur za mdzad pa ni rje btsun grol mchog mkhas grub chen po yin kyang phyogs 'di la gzigs pa'i dkyus thung bas thugs su ma shong ba'i gsung tsam mo / /
de yang nang 'khrid kyi 'khrid tshul la phyi'i brag rdzong gis bskyed rim dang nang gsang gi brag rdzong gis rdzogs rim byas pa /
yang bskyed rim gong ltar la rdzogs rim yar klangs pa lugs kyi nang 'khrid thun mong bas byas pa /
yang rdzogs rim thun mong ma yin pa gsang 'khrid kyis byas pa sogs lugs gsum tsam las /
@# / /
dang po ni gong du song zin pa dang /
gsum pa song na gnyis pa'ang zhar la 'byung bas rje btsun rdo ring bas mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig dang thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi 'khrid yig yid bzhin nor bu la gzhi byas yig chung zhal shes sogs kyis kha bskangs te /
sngon 'gro skyabs sems /
yig brgya /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor /
dngos gzhi rten bskyed pa'i rim pa 'khrid gzhung du'ang bshad kyang brag rdzong mar rgyas par song bas yang skyor ma dgos /
brten pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa rdo rje'i lus kyi gnad shes pa la brten nas rang sems gsal stong zung 'jug gi mgon po mngon du bya ba'i nye lam rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten nas bsnyen pa'i dmigs rim /
'khor lo lnga ldan dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa 'am rbad pa /
las sbyor thun mong ba bstan pa'i spyi dgra dang rnal 'byor sgos dgra bsgral ba /
thun mong ma yin pa'i 'khor lo lnga ldan gyi 'khrid dang bcas pa nyams myong yid ches su legs par nos /
de yang zab lam 'di la brten nas gnas skabs kyi dngos grub tu ma zad mchog gi dngos grub kyang bde blag tu bsgrub nus pas /
mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyis /
zab las ches zab gsang chen snying po'i bcud / /
dkon las ches dkon yid bzhin rin cen dbang / /
mchog las ches mchog snyan brgyud gdams pa 'di / /
sa skya'i rje btsun thugs kyi nying khu yin / /
'di 'dra rtse gcig bsgoms na lta ci smos / /
thos pa tsam gyis snang srid 'khor 'das chos / /
kun gyi rang mtshang rjen par ston pa'i phyir / /
zab par rlom pa gzhan gyis do zla min / /
zhes gsungs pa don la gnas shing /
dpe 'di rang gi bstan pa 'dzin des las / /
gzhan gyi rna bar ming tsam mi bsgrag cing / /
snying nas dad kyang bstan pa mi zin na / /
chos rgyun shod la dpe rgyun sba bar byos / /
zhes pa shin tu mang par snang bas bla ma dang chos la ci yang mi bsam par chos skyong gnyan pa dang gdams pa zab pa'i grags pa tsam la brten nas chos ci thob tu byed par 'ong bar 'dug pas de 'dra'i rigs la mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs 'chang ba snying la bcang bar bya'o / /
gnyis pa rgyab rten lung dang 'brel ba'i sgo nas sgro 'dogs gcod pa la /
rtsa ba'i yi ge bdag chen rdo rje 'chang chen pos dkar chag bsgrigs par mdzad pa'i mgon pod me 'bar ma'i skor /
der ma 'dus pa'i yan lag gi yi ge'i skor dang gnyis /
dang po ni /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis lcam dral gyi chos skor gsan pa'i yi ge phal cher glegs bam du bsgrigs par mdzad pa dus re zhig na nyang stong rgyal mkhar rtse nas sa skya spyan drangs tshe chom pos khyer bar glo bur du me 'bar zhing sgra chen po sgrog pa dang 'phar ba la sogs byung bas de nas bzung ste bu yig rnams la'ang me 'bar mar grags pa'i chos sde 'di la /
phyi nang gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i skor dang gsum /
dang po la /
yid ches bskyed pa lo rgyus /
snod ldan du bsgrub pa rjes gnang /
gang las byung ba'i gzhi'i rgyud /
rtsa ba'i sgrub yig /
de dag la mkho ba'i las tshogs lhan thabs dang lnga /
dang po la /
rdo rje gdan gyi ka ba nas rgyal rigs padma badzra zhes bya bas spyan (mchod rten? )e? mu? drangs pa'i mgon po 'di nyid gter nas 'byung @# / /
ba'i lo rgyus /
'di las mgon kho na'i lo rgyus su ngor rdzong sogs rjes 'brang phal cher bzhed kyang mgon po rang la rgya gar du bka' gter gnyis byung ba'i bka' mar ma zad gter ma slob dpon chen po padmas shar phyogs pa d+harma pA la la gnang ba lo chen gyis gsan cing ayon chen pos bsam yas su gter du sbas pa lha btsun gyis bton pa rgya gar nas gdan drangs pa'i gtar ma dang zhus dag pher ba las mgon ma gtogs mgon chen gyi skor ma byung /
rgya padma dbang phyug gi gter ma rnams ni rgyal tsha lung mang po nas brgyud pa ma gtogs sa chan yab sras gsum yan la 'ong don med la /
brgyud pa'i skabs gur mgon rang la bka' gtar gnyis 'dren pa dang /
me 'bar dkar chag na mgon po 'di nyid gter nas byung ba'i lo rgyus zhes gsungs pas las mgon kho na'i min par shes nus la /
gser pod na bzhugs pa dang tshig rigs cung zad mi mthun par snang ba der lhad zhugs par mngon zhing rdzong chung pa dam pas mdzad par bzhed do / /
bka' ma'i lo rgyus zhes pa ches skyong gi brgyud pa'i lo rgyus mchod rten? tho tsam bla ma'i gsung bzhin rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug gis sa skya dang yar klungs phyogs su bris pa /
gnyis pa snod ldan du bsgrub pa rjes gnang la /
'gor dpal nag po chen po bsten pa'i gang zag des zhes yod pa'i lcam dral gyi rjes gnang mchod rten? gi tho bla ma mal gyis mdzad pa las mkhan gyi khyad par ni gud na mchis so sa ma pa tha'i mtha' can /
lum dral gyi rjes gnang gi cho (mchod rten? )e? mu? ga nyi mas bskul nas 'phags pa rin po che blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis me yos smin drug zla ba'i tshes bcu dgu'i nyin byang 'dam gyi sa'i char mdzad pa /
ngor rdzong gnyis kyi be bum du 'di dang tshig mi 'dra ba 'ga' de 'dug pa zhus dag ma song ba zhig nas mched dam snyam /
nag po chen po lcam dral gyi rjes gnang mchod rten? bla ma chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che'i gsung zhang dkon cog dpal gyis zin bris su byas pa 'di rnams mi la mi spel ba'i bka' rgya can /
gser bod kyi de lha brgyud dang sbyar ba'i 'di dang zhus dag ye mi pher zhing brjed tho lta bu'i 'dra min gnyis 'dug pa zur pa zhig yin par snang ngo / /
dpal rdo rje nag po chen po lcam dral gyi rjes gnang gi zur 'debs kyi man mchod rten? ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa zur khang pa slob dpon dkon cog 'od kyis yi ger bkod pa /
rdo rje nag po chen po lcam dral gyi rjes gnang gi chings mchod rten? bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis phyag len dus dang mthun par rgyas bsdus ci rigs mdzad kyang lan mang du mdzad par bltas shing drung gi gsung las zin bris su yar klungs pa ldong ston seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub par sug bris mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo dpal ma hA kA la'i rjes gnang gi zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang mchod rten? gi yi ge 'cham sku mi g.yo bar gda'o'i mtha' can /
dngos gzhi lcam dral gyi rjes gnang yin 'dug cing deng sang lha brgyar thun mong ma yin par mdzad pa'i phyag len dang phyogs tsam mthun par tshogs sgom pa nas brgyud pa'ang bris 'dug go /
lcam bral gyi rjes su gnang ba'i rim pa bla ma mchod rten? rnams kyis phyag len ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du dpon shes rab bzang pos bskul nas dam pa kun dga' grags kyis tre stod 'bom dgon par yi ger bkod pa /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags lha brgyad ma'i rjes gnang gi yi ger ngos 'dzin mdzad pa mdun du bka' sdod rnams sam zhes pa la @# / /
dgongs pa 'dra /
'gor khyed rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgor zhugs nas zhes yod pa'i dpal mgon lcam dral gyi rjes (mchod rten? )e? gnang gi brjed byang btsun pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba /
thun mong ma yin pa lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang bya mchod rten? thabs rgyas pa bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi phyag len mang du mtheng? ba la gzhi byas zhad dang brag phug gser pod na lo rgyus 'dra min dang go rim cung zad mi mthun pa snang ba yig skyon du mngon /
pa'i zin bris dang rgyal tsha lung mang po'i phyag len gyis cung zad brgyan nas bdag cag gi bla ma'i gsung gis rjes su gnang zhing bkas bskul ba dang /
bshes gnyen grogs mched dam pas nan gyis bskul nas yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis klu'i dgon pa bde chen du sug bris su mdzad pa rnams /
gsum pa gang las byung ba'i gzhi'i rgyud ni /
'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsdus (mchod rten? )e? pa'i rtog pa'i le'u glogs bam du 'di tsam las mgon po mngon byung nas rigs drug gi rnam gzhag bstan pa yig tshegs dang /
khros rgyud kyi le'u bcu par bshad pa sogs rgyud gzhan rnams dpyad gzhar dgangs nas ma bkod dam snyam /
bco lnga pa las khol du phyung ba paN+Di ta g+ha ya d+ha ra dang lo tsA ba 'brog mi'i 'gyur las bris pa /
bzhi pa rtsa ba'i sgrub yig la /
'phags yul gyi paN grub kyis rgyud la brten pa'i sgrub skor /
gangs khrod kyi skyes chen rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub skor te gnyis /
dang bo la 'di gyi ljang po ti na yang yod /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang /
bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan / /
tshul khrims stsogs ldan bsdu dngos bzhis / /
zhes yod pa'i sgrub (mchod rten? )rdo rje? thabs rgyas sgyur byed kyi lo baN mi gcig tsam ma gtogs gyi ljang po ti na yang yod cing bir+wa pa'i slob ma nag po par bka' sdong /
tshogs bdag /
gshin rje /
gnod sbyin ltar gyi pho rkyang gi sgrub lugs bzhi bram ze chen pos gsan pa yin /
pa bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrAd+d+ha ka ra warma dang lo tsA ba rin cen bzang pos bsgyur ba /
yang mdzad pa po dang sgyur byed kyi lo paN gong ma ltar gyi sgrub thabs (mchod rten? )ye?? bsdus ba 'gor skad shan sbyar dang rdo rje nag bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas zhes yod pa /
dkar chag na chung du zer pa 'dug cing gser bod kyi de yig skyon yin nam dbu nas cung zad ma mthun /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo / /
ji ltar sngon gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la zhes mchod rten? yod pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa lo tsA ba ga rod kyis bsgyur ba /
'gor skad shan sbyar dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo / /
tho rengs mal nas langs nas zhes yod pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub mchod rten? thabs byin gyis brlab pa dang bcas pa slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po sum ti kIrti dang lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nya kIrtis bsgyur ba /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo de kho na bzhin du sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas zhes yod pa'i sgrub mchod rten? mu? thabs bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
'di dang lo chen gyis bsgyur ba'i sgrub thabs chung ba dang klu sgrub kyis mdzad @# / /
pa'i sgrub thabs gsum 'gyur khyad tsam ma gtogs don gcig ces bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gsung /
kha skong bo ti na'ang bzhugs so /
'gor skad shan sbyar yod pa'i dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs dregs pa zil (mchod rten? )rgya? gnon zhes pa slob dpon chen po padma 'byung gnas kyis bsam yas mchims phur mdzad pa /
'di rgya padma dbang phyug gis gter nas sbyan drangs ba rgyal tsha lung mang po nas brgyud pa ma gtogs rje btsun gong ma nas ma brgyud pas bka' gter gnyis med do / /
bram ze chen pos mdzad pa'i mgon po lha lnga'i dkyil (mchod rten? )rdo rje? pa? chog paN+Di ta g+ha yad+ha ra dang 'gos lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang slob dpon sku la sngo byed dang zhes yod pa'i dpal nag po chen po srog gi spu gri'i sgrub mchod rten? thabs bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa mal gyo lo tsA ba blo gros grags kyis bsgyur ba rnams /
'gyur byang tsam ma gtogs gyi ljang na'ang yod /
gnyis pa gangs khrod kyi skyes chen rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub skor la /
rkyang sgrub dang sbags sgrub gnyis /
ma hA kA las bram za chen por gnang ba'i sgrub thabs gsum zhes pa rang lugs la pho rkyang mo rgyang sbags sgrub gsum du bzheng /
dang po la pho rgyang du bsgrub pa /
bka' sdong /
tshogs bdag /
gshin rje /
gnod sbyin ltar sgrub pa bzhi yod pa lha'i rnam pa mi 'dra ba bzhi dang bdag mdun sogs kyi sgo nas dbye ba rang lugs su bzhed cing /
rdzong chung ba gshin rje dang gnod sbyin ltar sgrub pa'i yi ge logs su ma mthong gsung ba brag steng pa'i sgrub lugs bzhi dang bla chen bsod blo'i man ngag tshigs bcad ma dam pa'i gshin rje ltar sgrub pa sogs ma gzigs pa'i skyon no / /
mo rkyang du bsgrub pa /
'khor rkyang du bsgrub pa dang gsum /
dang po la 'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo spyir bram ze mchog sred kyi mgon po lcam bral sgrub lugs 'di la zhes yod pa'i pho rkyang (mchod rten? )e? mu? gi sgrub thabs bod yig mar grags pa rdzong chung pas dgra dang bgegs la bya ba zhes pa las mdzad pa po ngos ma zin par snang ngo / /
mal lo chen pos mdzad pa phyis sa chen gyis zhus dag ma dam tshig bsrung ba dang 'bad ba shin tu gal che'o pho rkyang du bsgrub pa'o'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo brgyud pa bzang ldan mal gyi bu thu bo zhes yod pa'i pho rkyang gi bsnyen sgrub slags (mchod rten? )e? mu? te bsgrub pa 'di'i sbyar byang na buN+ya badzra kyis sbyar zer ba 'dug cig mkhan chen ngag chos pa'i gsan yig na'ang de ltar snang la /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
lo pa spyan snga /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba gsum gyi gsan yig na dkar chag sor gnas bzhin mdzad 'dug pa don la gcig /
ser pod na kha skong nang gi pho rkyang gi sgrub thabs shog sngon can gnyan phul byung pas mdzad par ngos bzung nas 'di la rgyang sgrub kyi bsnyen sgrub sgrags? ma zhes pa las gnyan phul byung pas mdzad pa'i 'phros mi 'dug la /
rdzong chung pa'i der bgegs la bya ba man chad ma tshang zhing slob dpon rtse mos mdzad ces snang ngo / /
sa chen gyi slob ma gnyan phul byung bas mdzad pa /
'gor oM swasti bla ma dang nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo kA la'i man ngag la zhes dang mjug mchod rten? tu sa skya jo sras kyi yi ge man ngag rnying pa snga ma'i 'phros sam pa tha'i mtha' can /
'gor oM swasti dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo rten gyi gang zag dbang bzhis snod du rung bzhes yod pa'i nag po chen po'i 'byung yig rnying snga ma'i 'phros zhes pa dkar chag dang dpe'i zhal byang gnyis kar snang /
lugs bstan mchod rten? cing gtor ma dang bo'i 'phros kyi yi ge @# / /
rnying pa'i cha lag gong mas mdzad pa rje btsun gyi bla dpe las bris pa /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la spyi bos gus pas phyag 'tshal lo b+he dan gyi yul na bram ze mchog sred ces yod pa'i tshogs kyi bdag (mchod rten? )mu? po'i chul du sgrub pa'i u ba /
sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
mgon po khro bcu tshogs bdag ltar sgrub par ngos 'dzin yang /
de'i rjes gnang gis mal lo'i lugs kyi pho rkyang la rjes gnang med par bzhed pa la mi gnod pa 'dra ste /
de ni gtso rkyang la dgongs kyi 'di ni pho rkyang gtso 'khor sbags sgrub yin pas so snyam zhing /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi lhag bsam rab dkar gyi dri lan du sbags sgrub yin pas so rje tshar pa gsung ba'i ngag rgyun de legs po snang zhes pa 'dug kyang /
sa gcad du rkyang sgrub sbags sgrub ces so sor dbye ba'i dbang du song na 'di lugs gnyis gang du'ang ngos 'dzin dka' ba'i dogs gnas che ba zhig 'dug pa 'jam mgon sa skya pa'i bstan 'dzin du khur gyis lca ba rnams ljags kyi dbang po rkyong bar rigs so / /
'gor bla ma dang dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo tshogs kyi bdag po'i tshul du sgrub pa'i bsnyen sgrub gnyis sngon du song nas las (mchod rten? )mu? rdo rje? la sbyar ba zhes yod pa'i man ngag gi yig rnying rdzong chung ba ser ba dbab? pa gzhung gi yig sna'i zhabs na yod ces logs su ngos bzung ba de 'di'i nang gi de'o / /
ser ba bcad pa'i las rnams sgrub thabs nyid las btsal rdzong chung pa gsal zhes sgra bshad dang bcas gsungs /
lo'i mtha' can /
de'i gsad las 'gor dpal (mchod rten? )rdo rje? nag po chen po sgrub par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyi man ngag gsad pa'i las sbyor ro'i mtha' can /
'gor ma hA kA la'i bsnyen pa (mchod rten? )mu? rdo rje? yang dang po lhag pa'i lha gang yang rung ba'i bsnyen pa sngon du 'gro bar bya ste zhes yod pa'i bka' bsgo'i tshul du sgrub pa bla ma gong mas mdzad pa sgra snyan gyi rdzas rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rdzong chung pa 'di'i nang gi sreg rdzas la bal ta ka'i rdzas dang bcas bsad smyo dbye gsum so sor kha bsgyur chog pa sgrub thabs nyid nas gsal zhes zhal 'phangs pa 'dir ngos bzung 'dug /
yang des mdzad pa'i 'gor dang por bdag nyid kyis bsnyen sngags dang sngags ring gnyis kal bsnyen pa (mchod rten? )mu? rdo rje? bskyal ces yod ba'i ling ga bsregs ba'i dum bu lam rgya gram du mnan no'i mtha' can /
rdzong chung pas chos tshan sngon ma dang sprel 'dug /
gong dkar ba 'di la ling ba sreg lugs su chad /
ma'i gdung (mchod rten? )rdo rje? nad kyis gsad pa /
gtor ma (mchod rten? )rdo rje? la brten nas gsad pa /
ting nge 'dzin gyis (mchod rten? )rdo rje? gsad pa ste drag po'i las sbyor gyi man ngag bla ma gong mas mdzad pa /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs ni /
dang por rang nyid lhag pa'i lha'i zhes yod pa'i pho rkyang gi las (mchod rten? )e? mu? byang rje btsun gyis mdzad pa ser pod na lo chen gyis mdzad ces snang zhing rdzong chung bas pho rkyang gi gtor chog tu 'bod cing las byang mi zer bar las spangs te zhes pa dang tshogs bdag gi yig rnying du sgrub thabs gsum gsungs pa'i 'bring por ngos bzung 'dug kyang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang 'bring po zhes pa yig nor yin gsung ngo / /
las byang de rgyun du yi dam bya ba man ngag go'i mtha' can rnams /
gnyis pa mo rkyang bu bsgrub ba la /
zhi drag gnyis las zhi ba nang pa ltar sgrub pa @# / /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo / /
mo rkyang du sgrub pa la gsum ste zhes yod pa'i mo rkyang du sgrub pa'i gsal (mchod rten?)e? byed shAkya'i dge slong pu N+ya badzra gyis mdzad /
gnyan phul byung ba yan /
'gor mkha' 'gro ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhes yod pa'i mo rkyang gi bsnyen (mchod rten?)e?(mu?)rdo rje? sgrub mkha' 'gro dbang du bya ba gong mas mdzad pa kho'i rkyen bzlog tu 'gro bas mi 'bul gsung ba'i mtha' can /
rdo rje gdan pa'i phag dper rang rdzi phyogs su mi sdod zer ba yan las bi? 'dug cing 'di'i mjug na yod pa'i me'i gdung ba zhes pa ser pod na chos tshan logs su ngos bzung yod do / /
'gor skad shan sbyar dang dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la phyag 'tshal lo dpal ldan lha mo nag mo sgrub par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i lha mo drag mo phyi pa mu stegs pa ltar (mchod rten?)e?rdo rje? bsgrub pa 'di la dkar chag tu phyi pa mu stegs pa ltar sgrub pa zhes gsung pa rdzong chung pas phyi sgrub dang nang sgrub kyi khyad par yin zhes zur za dang gyi ljang ma gtogs lugs 'di la med gsungs kyang dam pa kun dga' dpal gyi sgrub yig dang bla ma gzungs kyi dpal bas yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan la gnang ba'i dri lan gyi brjod don me 'bar dkar chag dang mthun zhing lha mo la yang bka' sdod tshogs bdag /
phyi pa /
nang pa ltar sgrub pa ste lags bzhi dang phyi ma gnyis la so sor 'jam rtsub kyi sgrub pa dang /
yang nang pa la /
'jam pa /
cung zad 'jam pa /
shin tu 'jam pa'i rnam gzhag kyang yod cing lha mo bdag skyed du byed pa lo ka shrI'i yi ge 'di ma gtogs med pas tshogs bdag ltar sgrub pa zhal gyis bzhes phyin rang tshig dang yang 'gal bar mngon /
gong dkar ba'i gsan yig na mu stags pa ltar sgrub pa 'di la lha mo'i sgrub thabs zer ba tsam las mi snang ngo /
rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa slob dpon lo ka shrIs bsgyur ba rnams /
gsum pa 'khor rkyad du sgrub pa ni dkar chag tu gtso 'khor gyi khyad nas 'og tu 'chad gsung ba'i rjes su 'brangs te /
gnyis pa sbags sgrub la thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis /
dang po la thun mang ba lcam dral ltar sbags te sgrub pa (mchod rten?)e?(mu?)rdo rje? bla ma'i gsung las ji ltar gyur pa bzhin gzhan gyis gsal ba btab pa'i ngor dge tshul rdo rje 'dzin pa blo gros rgyal mtshan 'phags pa rin po che /
dpal bzang pos chu pho byi ba'i lo gdu bu'i zla ba la byang ngos su sbyar ba rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na lha gsum ma'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum zhes pa snang /
des rgyal bu ji gin gyi don du mdzad (mchod rten?)mu? pa'i lcam dral gyi gtor chog /
gnyis pa mthun mong ma yin pa la /
lha brgyad kyi bsnyen pa byed thabs (mchod rten?)mu?pra? thun mong ma yin pa gsang ba'i man ngag ma lo las mdzad pa /
rdzong chung pa lha brgyad ma'am bcu gnyis ma'i mngon rtogs zhes 'dam khar bzhed cing /
'ga' zhig bu lung kun rdor gyis mdzad gsung yang rang lugs la mi bzhed /
de la nye bar mkho ba 'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa gnyis las mkhan dang bcas pa bka' sdod du sgrub pa'i dus su zhes yod pa'? sgrub pa dang (mchod rten?)mu? las sbyor ston pa'i bka' sdod kyi yi ge dgos shing gces nas btab pa yin sa ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
'di lhag bsam rab dkar gyi dri lan na mal dpon gyis mdzad ces snang zhing rdzong chung pa'i dkar chag na sbags sgrub kyi zin bris zar pa 'dug cing mjug na bod rbad gsad gsum dril ba zhes pa'i yig chung zhig btags 'dug /
dkyil 'khor la brten nas rtsub @# / /
lugs (mchod rten?)rdo rje? su sgrub 'di la rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig tu bod rbad gsad gsum /
thun /
phur ba| ba ngan| dam shing zor| sbyin sreg dang drug gi gsad pa drug la phral nas mdzad 'dug /
pa 'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo mkha' 'gro spags te sgrub pa'i man ngag brjod par ba'o zhes yod pa shAkya'i dge slong theg pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa blo gros seng ges mdzad pa /
mal lo'i dbon po yin /
'di mal dang 'phags pa'i dus gang du byung dpyad dags 'dug go /
'gor na mo gu ru b+h+yaH na mo ma hA kA lA ya spyir bram ze mchog sred kyi mgon po lcam dral bsgrub mchod rten?(mu?)rdo rje? lugs la zhes yod pa'i lha brgyad kyi bsgrub tshul myur bar 'dod pa'i las la rtsub dang bsdos te las la sbyar bas zla ba phyed kyis rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i man ngag gi rje sa chen gyis mdzad pa /
des mdzad (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? pa'i 'gor 'jam zhing zhi ba'i las la yun bsrings te bsgrub pa la yang zhes yod rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na rdzas dang longs spyod bsrung ba /
dngos grub sgrub pa /
'khu ldog spang ba zhes brjod don gsal bar snang zhing gtso 'khor sbags sgrub tu'ang bzhed /
rdzong pa rnams 'di bzhi dril bar yig sna chen mo zhes dpe tshan gcig tu bzhed pa don la gnas so / /
pa'i zhi ba'i las dam pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na 'di la mo rkyang du sgrub pa'i tha snyad mdzad 'dug /
des mdzad pa'i (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? 'gor dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo shin tu myur ba'i las la zhag bdun gyi rtsal chen rdzogs pa ni zhes yod pa bzlog pa'i nyen yod pas zab par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
des mdzad (mchod rten?)mu? pa'i 'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo rgyun du bsten pa'i las la zhi drag phyed mas sgrub pa ni zhes yod pa sgrub lugs 'jam pa dang 'dra'o'i mtha' can /
'gor oM swasti sid+d+haM bla ma rnams dang yi dam lha zhes yod pa'i lha brgyad sbags sgrub rgyas (mchod rten?)e?mu? pa sa paN gyi dngos slob hor dmag bzlog mkhan du grags pa 'od ldan dpal gyis mdzad pa shin tu dag par bris pa yin pa shes par bya'o sa ma pa tha mi thi'i mtha' can /
'di ltar yin tshul bdag chen bzhi thog pa kun dga' dbang phyug gsung la /
mus srad pa sogs la la dam pas mdzad par bzhed cing ser pod na gzungs pas mdzad zer ba 'dug kyang bla chen bsod blo'i man ngag tshigs bcad kyis min par shes nus so / /
'gor na mo gu ru sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir dpal ldan bla ma dam pa zhes yod pa'i lcam dral sbags te sgrub pa'i lag len dpal mchod rten? sa skya pa las brgyud pa'i man ngag dam pa'i dbon po 'ang nam kun dga' dpal gyis mdzad pa /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo spyir 'di la gnyis las 'di ni myur bar 'dod pas rtsub dang bsdos (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? nas las la sbyor ba'o zhes yod pa'i rtsub lugs su sgrub pa bla ma gong mas mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang bskyed pa rten gyi 'khor lo mi dgos par gsad (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? pa las khung la brten nas shin tu rtsub lugs su sgrub pa /
des mdzad (mchod rten?)mu? pa 'gor dkyil 'khor la mi brten pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor la byug pa khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mi brten pa'i lugs /
des mdzad pa 'gor oM swasti nag po chen (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? po'i man ngag ni /
maN+Dal zur drug 'khor lo bri zhes yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la @# / /
brten pa'i 'jam zhing zhi ba'i lugs /
rdzong chung ba'i yi ge dang bzlas dang? kyang 'grub po yan mthun de man mi gcig par 'dug /
ser pod dkar chag gi 'jam zhi'i sgrub pa zer ba'i mo rkyang gi sgrub pa zhig 'dug pa 'di'i mjug gi yang gsum ste rten bca'i a? ba bsnyen sgrub spags ma zhes sogs la ngos bzung ba'i bar skabs su tshig sna cung zad ring ba'i 'dra min phran bu yod pa'i ches tshan zur ba zhig snang la /
dbu nas yig 'phreng gcig tsam ma gtogs zhus dag pher mu? pa rdzong chung ba'i glegs bam du dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i 'jam por sgrub pa'i yi ge chung ngu zhes snang /
rdo rje gdan pa'i phyag dpe dang me 'bar ma zhus dag pher /
lha brgyad thun mong ma yin pa'i gtor chog drung mchod rten? chos rje'i phyag len la gtso bor byas rgyal tsha lung mang po khu dbon gyi man ngag ma sbas par shing po stag lo zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes brgyad la yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa rtses thang dpal gyi sde chen du yi ger mdzad pa rnams /
sa gcad gong ma'i gsum pa 'khor rkyang du bsgrub pa la /
thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang /
thun mong ma yin pa la phyi nang gsang ba /
ru mtshon /
gaN+Di /
srog gi las mkhan te drug yod par bshad cing /
pu tra la yang gsang ba /
bdud /
rgyal 'bud mon bu ste so sor yod do / /
gsang ba'i las mkhan pu tra ming sring gi rjes (mchod rten?)e?mu? gnang bla ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsi snyan nas rim par brgyud pa slob mas bskul ba'i ngor sga A nan dam pas bkod pa /
rjes gnang gi zin bris bsdus pa bla mchod rten? ma'i phyag len phri bsnan spangs te zin bris tsam du seng ge rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ming gis gsar du bris la dag par zhus so'i mtha' can /
rjes gnang gi zin bris mchod rten? rgyas pa dam pa kun dga' grags kyi yi ge'i steng du chos rje bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi phyag len yi ger mi gsal ba'i zin bris logs gcig tu byas pa'i yig rnying dang sbyar nas bshes gnyen grogs dam pa'i gsung gi ngor yar glungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal tsha lung mang po'i dben gnas klu'i dgon pa shug ra bde chen du bris pa /
'gor bsam yas la sogs gtsug lag khang zhes yod pa'i slob dpon padma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i pu tra'i sgrub (mchod rten?)e?(mu?)rdo rje?lha? thabs bsam yas kyi ka ba'i 'og nas lha btsun byang chub 'od kyis gter nas bton pa /
'di dang zhus dag pher ba zhig lo chen gyis rgya gar nas gdan drangs pas bka' gter gnyis su mdzad pa yin /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo dpal nag po lcam dral gyi bka' bran pu tra pho mo zhes yod pa'i sgrub (mchod rten?)mu?rdo rje? thabs bsdus pa sa chen gyis mdzad pa re re la bka' rgyas thob la sbyin no'i mtha' can /
rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na bka' nyan pho mo gser gyi spu gri can gyi man ngag ces snang zhing rdzong chung pa nor bsrung gnad sbyin ngang gsad pa gshin rje'i tshul du sgrub pa'i yig rnying zhes pa tsam las mdzad pa po mi gsal 'dug /
'di la 'dun pa'i slob mas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor dam pa kun dga' grags kyis (mchod rten?)e?(mu?)rdo rje? mdzad pa'i don TIka gsal bar byas pa'i sgrub thabs shin tu rgyas pa /
rdzong chung pa 'di slob dpon rtse mos mdzad par bzhed do / /
des mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'bring po bshan (mchod rten?)e?rdo rje? pa lcam dral gyi cho ga'i gsal byed dbu na lo rgyus yod pa /
des mdzad pa'i pu tra'i bstod pa mchod rten? @# / /
las rnams kun byed ma /
des bla ma'i gsung mchod rten?mu? bzhin sbyar ba'i 'gor slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang zhes pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa /
drag po'i bston bskul mchod rten? mon bu pu tra nag bskyong ma mal lo tsA bas mdzad pa /
'gor ho mon bu pu tra spun gnyis zhes yod pa'i dmod mchod rten? bcol gong mas mdzad pa'i tshig lhug /
pu tra ming sring gi mchod rten? gtor chog rdo rje 'dzin pa dge slong dpal ldan tshul khrims kyis dpal sa skya'i chos grwar sbyar ba /
pu tra ming sring gi bskang mdos dam pa kun mchod rten?(mu?)rdo rje? dga' tre bos mdzad pa /
nang gi las mkhan ber nag zangs gri can gyi sgrub (mchod rten?)e?mu? thabs jo sras thugs rje dpal gyis gsar gyi 'bul ba dang bcas pa'i ngor rnal 'byor ba mal blo gros seng gas mdzad pa /
ser pod kyi der mdzad byang chad 'dug /
rdzong chung pa 'phags pas mdzad par bzhed /
'gor sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du las kyi mgon po zangs (mchod rten?)mu? gri can zhes yod pa'i gsod byed gdug pa can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rdzong chung pa yig rnying du bzhed /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams dang dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo dur khrod na gnas pa'i mgon po gcer bu zangs gri can zhes yod pa'i phyi'i las mkhan gcer bu zangs gri can gyi sgrub mchod rten? thams bla ma mal nas brgyud pa lhag chad dang bral ba yi ger bris pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'di gyi ?ljang na'ang yod /
lnga pa de dag la mkho ba'i las chogs lhan thabs la /
dkar chag tu man ngag shog dril drug pa sogs gtso bor pho rkyang gi las chogs yin mod kyang sbags sgrub dang thun mong du nye bar mkho ba'i phyir 'dir 'og tu bsgrigs nas bzhag pa yin no / /
zhes pa ltar nag po chen po'i sgo nas gtor mar brten pa'i dgra bgags gsad pa'i man ngag /
gzhan gyi rig sngags dang rbod gtong bzlog pa'i man ngag /
rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan bzlog pa /
byad sha spag pa /
gtor ma med par kha zas la brten nas dgra gsad pa /
dgra bgegs tshogs mchod rten?(e?)mu?rdo rje? su za ba ste shin tu zab pa'i shog dril drug dam pas mdzad pa /
chos skyong mi 'khol kha med kyi zab mchod rten?(e?)mu?rdo rje? gtad bram ze mchog sred kyi sbas gter slob dpon ting 'dzin shes rab kyis mdzad pa /
dkar chag dang gsan big na mdzad cas snang yang yi ge na bshus zer ba 'dug /
rdzong chung pas bsnyen pa /
mi 'khu ba /
srog 'phrog pa /

'di rgya'i gter ma yin min khungs ma chod pas dpyad /
bsrung bzlog gsad pa dang rmi lam ngan pa pho zlog pa'i zhal shas zab mo tshigs bcad (mchod rten?)e?(mu?)rdo rje? ma dam pa kun dga' grags kyis mdzad pa /
dkar chag na gzhan gyi rbod gtong bzlog pa tsam las mi 'dug kyang brjod bya la dpags na 'di bzhin tshang ngas snyam zhing /
rdzong chung ba'i dkar chag dang rje rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na yang snang la yig cha na 'phags pas dam pa la gnang zer ba 'dug /

chol mang po smra bar snang ngo / /
nag po chen po lcam dral gyi man ngag zab don thor bu mchod rten?? rnams bla ma chen po bsod nams blo gros kyis shing rta khrums kyi zla ba'i nyer gsum la brjed byang du mdzad pa /
rdo rje 'dzin pa pu N+ya'i ming can gyis bgyis zer ba snang ngo / /
mgon po khro bcu'i bsrung 'khor mchod rten?(e?)mu?rdo rje? bla ma rje btsun chen po'i gsung bzhin ngo pa dkar ston shAkya grags kyis yi ger bkod pa /
rang bsrung 'khor lo chen mo'i bri yig rab gnas dang mchod rten?rdo rje? bcas pa bla ma rje pa grum par bzhugs dus 'di 'dra bdog gsungs par brten dbus thang skyar do pa ston tshul gyis zhus pas ma gnang phyis sa skya'i gzims chung rnying par kye rdor gyi dbang bskur zhig gi dus gtsigs can du byas nas gnang ba /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo chos skyong lcam dral gyi sgrub mchod rten?mu? pa 'di la rten gyi dkyil 'khor zhes yod pa'i dkyil 'khor /

dam rdzas /
mchod rten gsad khung gsham pa /
ting 'dzin sngags kyi bzla thabs te man ngag kun gyi sdom dang mkha' 'gro 'khu ldog spong ba bcas gong mas mdzad pa /
rdzong chung pa rnams mkha' 'gro sbags sgrub kyi yig rnying la chos tshan bcu gcig bshad pa'i gcig la 'di 'dren par snang zhing me'i gdung ba yang 'di la ngos bzung 'dug /
'gor nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo mgon po 'di'i man ngag la mkha' 'gro 'khu ldog spang ba zhes yod pa'i sbags sgrub la nye bar mkho ba'i gnad (mchod rten?)e?mu? dril ba 'da? ldan dpal gyis mdzad ser pod na gzungs kyi dpal bas mdzad cas snang /
pa shin tu gsang bar bya'o sam pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
des mdzod pa'i bod rbad gsad gsum dril ba'i man mchod rten? ngag sa skya pa chen po snying po'i zhabs kyi thugs kyi snying po sa ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo rdo rje nag po chen po'i 'dzin gtor zhes (mchod rten?)mu? yod pa'i 'dzin gtor gyi man ngag bla ma sa chen gyis mdzad pa shin tu zab po sa ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
dkar chag na gnyis yod gsungs kyang gcig ma rnyed mal lo'i dbon pos mdzad zer ba byung 'dug rang de ltar min tshul yar klungs pa gsung /
'gor 'di la spyir pho sgrub sngon du ma song bar mo mi sgrub ces yod pa'i zor gyi sgrub pa dang lha dbye sogs rgyas (mchod rten?)mu? par bstan pa bla ma gong mas mdzad pa mtshams dam pa shin tu gces so'i mtha' can /
