mnga' ris bla chen man 'dra /
yang dbang rkyang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
bram ze mchog sred /
bde ba'i rdo rje /
dad byed go cha /
jo bo @# / /
chen po a ti sha /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
dge tshul pUr+Na /
rgya lcags ri gong pa ba /
rdzing bu kha pa shAkya grags /
spen phug pa dar ma shAkya /
zhang ye shes rgyal mtshan /
gze pa don grub ye shes /
khams pa shAkya rdo rje /
'di gnyis la bar thang pa yab sras zer ba dkar chag dang rdo rje gdan pa'i gsan yig na 'dug bar thang pa chos grags /
slob dpon dar ma shAkya /
spur ston bsod nams dbang phyug /
bla ma mchog ldan pa /
skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan /
bla ma rin cen rdo rje /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
mkhan chen nam mkha' ye shes /
de gsum ga la theg chen chos kyi rgyal bos gsan /
rje 'jam dbyangs glags pa /
mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun bzang /
mus srad pa man sin+d+hu ra'i dbang dang 'dra /
yang na skyi ston grags rgyal nas /
kun mkhyen dol bo shes rab rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen byang chub seng ge /
theg chen ba man 'dra /
yang na slob dpon bsod nams dbang phyug nas /
gan pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
chos rje bla ma dam pa /
ta dben chen po /
lo tsA ba tshul khrims brtan pa /
paN chen byams pa gling pa bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa man sngar bzhin no / /
'khor lo dang lhan cig pa ma gtogs pa'i mchod rten gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
gyi ljang nas /
mal lo tsA ba /
sa chen /
yar sgom se bo /
rgyal tsha lung mang po man zer? bar ma ltar /
yang na sa chen yab sras gsum /
do ba /
rgyal tsha man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun nas /
sa paN yin kyang gong bzhin no / /
mchod rten 'khor lo lhan cig pa'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
sa chen yan gong ltar la /
de nas slob dpon rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa /
sa paN /
'phags pa /
sga A nan dam pa /
phing phag bla ma rdo rje dpal /
mdo khams pa bkra shis seng ge /
bar sdings pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
yab 'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man me 'bar ma bzhin no / /
rjes gnang skor la /
lcam dral lha gsum spags sgrub dang thun mong ma yin pa lha brgyad mkha' 'gro sbags sgrub dang lha bcu gnyis ma gnyis la yang nang gses kyi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin par dbye ba'i rjes gnang bzhi dang bcas pa sga A nan dam pa cam ma gtogs gdung brgyud rim par chig brgyud tu byon pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur /
grub chen bram ze mchog srong /
nor bu gling pa bde ba'i rdo rje /
paN grub dad byed go cha /
lo tsA ba rin cen bzang po /
brag steng pa yon tan tshul khrims /
mal lo tsA ba blo gros grags /
rje btsun brtse ba chen po /
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo /
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan /
chos rje sa skya paN+Di ta /
'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa /
dam pa kun dga' grags /
chos rje khu dbon gnyis kas mdo khams kyi khrom gsab tu mgon por gzigs pas sprul par yang grags so / /
bla ma bdag nyid chen po /
mkhas btsun nam mkha' legs pa /
bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
yab 'jam dbyangs chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
gdugs gnyis la brtag gnyis thugs su chud pas da ltar grags /
rdo rje 'chang blo gros rgyal mtshan /
@# / /
rje btsun rdo ring pa chen po kun bzang chos kyi nyi ma /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje blo gsal grags pa rgyal mtshan /
'jam dpal dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
rjes gnang 'ga' zhig tshar chen rang la'ang gsan 'dug go /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
rtsa ba'i bla ma chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na tshar chen yab sras gnyi ga la /
mkhan chen pha slab gsum rgyal mtshan dang sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyis gsan /
de gnyis la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis gsan pa man 'dra /
phyi 'khrid nang 'khrid nyams 'khrid du thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug nas /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
yang na rdo ring rin po che nas /
sgo rum pa kun legs pa /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
lha| rgya| sdings| yar| 'a| zha rkyang| khra rkyang| kha'i rtags yod pa ma gtogs pa'i me 'bar ma dang kha skong gnyis kyi mchod rten gyi rtags can rnams dang /
rgya| 'a| zha rkyang| pra khra rkyang| ngag| pa| sa| lo'i rtags rnams ma gtogs pa'i snyan brgyud po ti'i rtags yod med yongs pra| rdzogs kyi lung brgyud ni /
pho rkyang gi thog ma'i brgyud rim du rdo rje 'chang /
klu sgrub /
Ar+ya de wa /
bir+wa pa /
nag po pa /
mchog sred ces sgo rum dpe khang gis chen gyi phyag bris ngos ma bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis rnyed pa las byung bar snang ngo / /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug nas /
mthu stobs kyi dbang phyug bsod nams chos 'phel /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab man 'dra /
yang lha brgyad lha bcu gnyis ma'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang dang /
phyi 'khrid gsang 'khrid gnyis /
de las 'phros pa'i yi ge /
me 'bar dkar chag gis gcad gsum pa'i gsang pa thun mong ma yin pa'i yi ge dang /
de'i gsal byed rdzas 'brang gas mdzad pa dang sdings kyi rtags yod pa rnams ma gtogs pa'i mchod rten gyi rtags yod pa'i lung rnams dang rjes gnang gsum nang 'khrid dang bcas pa'i brgyud lugs gcig ni rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan nas /
do pa ston tshul /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
mkhan chen seng ge bzang po /
yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mchog /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man gong ltar /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
yar klungs pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
zhang dkon cog dpal /
brag phug pa bsod nams dpal /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
bran bdud kyi chos tshan gsum po'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
sa chen nas /
zhang mnga' ris pa /
dge bsnyan sras mchog mgon po /
dol po 'byung gnas pa /
bla ma dgon pa rgya /
do pa ston tshul man gong bzhin no / /
me 'bar kha skong snyan brgyud gsum gyi chos skor gter byon gyi brgyud pa ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
'dis rdo rje gdan gyi ka ba la gter du spas /
de nas dpal ayon chen po padma badzra gyis spyan drangs nas rgya gar gyi mkhan chen dpal ldan bkra shis pa'i zin bris na pu tra rkyang pa yin pa 'dra zhig 'dug pa gsung sgros ma zin par mngon @# / /
shar phyogs pa d+harma pA la la gnang /
des te se dang mtsho ma dros pa gzigs pa'i ched du byon pa dang lo tsA ba chen po mjal bar gdams pa rnams gnang /
de man gong bzhin no / /
me 'bar po ti'i phyi sgrub yig sna brgya nyi shu'i brgyud lugs gcig ni /
yab 'jam dbyangs chen po nas /
gcen rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
yab sras gnyi ga la gcung bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
de la rdo ring rin po che dang mkhan chen rat+na shrI las gsan /
gsum ga la rje btsun sgo rum pa /
de nas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse man 'dra /
yang na tshar chen nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba mai tri don grub rgyal mtshan /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
rab 'byams chos rje kun dga' lhun grub /
chos sku rdo rje yang zer /
khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba man 'dra /
rgya'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
klu sgrub /
ayon chen po /
mkha' 'gro ye shes 'tsho rgyal /
mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan /
gter ston rgya padma dbang phyug /
lho pa ston nyi /
rgyal tsha lung mang po chos kyi dbang phyug man 'dra /
yar gyi rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
rje sa chen gter ma 'di phyis kyi bla ma rnams kyis gsan pa lo tsA ba chen por byung ba'i gter mar ngos mi 'dzin /
nas /
bla chen yar sgom se bo /
rgyal tsha lung mang po /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
seng ge bzang po /
yar klungs pa /
mkhan chen bsod rgyal /
yab 'jam dbyangs chos rje /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang /
slob dpon dpal ldan rgyal po /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen dpal bzang po /
bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa man mchod rten gyi rtags yod pa dang 'dra /
sdings kyi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
dam pa kun dga' grags nas bla ma rdo rje dpal /
mtshungs med bkra shis dngos grub /
spas pa'i rnal 'byor pa bar sdings pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang kun dga' zla ba'i man ngag khyad par can yang 'di nas brgyud pa'o / /
yab chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan man zhal ngo nang brgyud bzhin no / /
lcam dral lha gsum gyi thun mong ba'i rjes gnang rjes 'brang gi slob ma nas 'ongs pa'i thor bu'i brgyud pa ni /
rgyal ba brag phug pa nas /
de dpon dkon cog rgyal mtshan /
bu ston dbang phyug dar /
theg chen chos kyi rgyal po /
tA'i gu shrI yon tan /
rgya mtsho /
sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa man gong ltar /
yang na na bza' ba /
ri khrod pa blo brtan /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
dpon po nam mkha' dpal bzang /
grub chen sangs rgyas rin cen /
sgo rum pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
tshogs sgom kun dga' dpal /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
gnyags chen bsod nams 'od zer /
mkhas grub bsod nams bzang po /
chos rje dge ba rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med shes rab zla ba'i dbang po /
rje btsun rdo ring pa man 'dra /
yang na tshogs sgom pa nas /
la ru pa /
nyan chen pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
shar pa kun dga' seng ge /
shar pa kun dga' bsod nams dpal bzang po /
bla ma rdo rje seng ge /
dka' bcu pa chen po /
gung thang pa seng ge dpal ldan 'od mdzes bzang po /
rtses dang dge 'phel ba rigs 'dzin bsod nams blo gros /
rje btsun rdo ring pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
paN+Di ta shes rab rdo rje /
bla ma 'phags @# / /
rgyal ba /
bla ma bzang po ba /
bla ma dam pa man gong bzhin no / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
dga' ldan pa kun bsod /
bla ma dpal ldan seng ge /
chos rje bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang ngor lugs kyi kha dang lha'i rtags yod pa ma gtogs pa'i e'i rtags can gyi lung dang lha gsum ma'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rgyal ba brag phug pa la chos rje bla ma dam pa dang brag phug pa blo gros brtan pas zhus /
de gnyi ga la chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
de nas shar chen ye shes rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
drin can bsod nams dbang phyug /
rje btsun rdo ring po man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po nas /
mkhas grub gung ru sher bzang /
rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug /
mkhas grub don yod dpal ba /
rje rdo ring pa man 'dra /
yang kha dang lha dang mu g.yung drung can ma gtogs pa'i mu'i rtags yod pa'i lung dang lha gsum ma'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
chos rje bla ma dam pa nas /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal pa /
chos rje dge legs bzang po /
chos rje A nan+da ma ti /
rdzong lugs pa rnams rjes gnang gi chings 'di'i yig cha sor bzhag mdzad /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rgyud gsum smra ba shes rab rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje man sngar ltar ro / /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
'phags pa nas /
kha'u pa 'od ldan dpal /
mnyam med grags pa rgyal mtshan /
sngags 'chang gzungs pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
bla ma cha gan pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
bla ma mnyam med pa man 'dra /
yang gong dkar lugs kyi rjes gnang dang rdo rje nor bu lhan cig yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
bla ma dam pa yan gong ltar la /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje /
rje btsun chos sgo ba chen po /
brag thog bsod nams bzang po /
mthu chen 'jigs med dpa' bo /
thugs sras kun dga' rgyal po /
rigs 'dzin tshe dbang bkra shis /
rdo rje 'chang cher pa chos rje man 'dra /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
chos rje sa paN nas /
bla ma khang gsar ba /
blo chen seng ge dpal /
gar thig pa bsod rgyal /
mkhan chen shes rab rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na nyan chen pa nas /
'di gnyis kyi bar du bla ma gcig gnyis shig dgos tshod du 'dug na'ang kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa'i phyag bris dngos la 'di ltar snang ngo / /
ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos rje /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po man gong ltar /
lha brgyad dang bcu gnyis ma'i rjes gnang rjes 'brang nas 'ongs pa'i thor bu'i brgyud pa ni /
'phags pa rin po che nas /
'jam skya ba /
dge sdings pa chen po /
bla ma bkras lung pa /
bla ma bsod nams dpal /
theg chen chos rje /
nyi lde ba gu shrI nam mkha' bzang po /
chos rje dge ba rgyal mtshan /
mtshungs med shes rab zla ba /
rje btsun rdo ring pa man 'dra /
lha brgyad kyi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
'phags pa nas /
bla ma 'phags rgyal ba /
sgro mon can pa rin cen dpal bzang /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa rin po che nas /
shar pa kun dga' seng ge man lha gsum ma ltar ro / /
lha bcu gnyis ma'i brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
dam pa kun dga' grags nas /
dga' ldan pa kun dga' bsod nams /
drung chos rdza pa /
@# / /
bzhi thog pa /
bdag chen kun dga' rin cen /
bdag chen gags pa blo gros /
bdag chen blo gros dbang phyug /
drung btsun rin cen rnam rgyal /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen /
sa lo thams cad mkhyen pa /
rje btsun sgo rum ba man 'dra /
yang na bdag nyid chen po bzang po dpal nas /
drung chos rje pa man gong ltar ro / /
ngor lugs lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang dang gong gi lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims yan lcam dral lha gsum ltar nas grub chen bud+d+ha shrI /
rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang po /
drin can bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo ring rin po che man 'dra /
rdzong lugs lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang dang gong gi lung brgyud gcig ni /
chos rje dge legs bzang po yan lha bcu gsum ma ltar la /
de nas rin po che zur shAkya dpal ba /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan man kyang 'dra /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
bla chen kun dga' rgyal mtshan yan thun mong ma yin pa ltar nas /
chos rje 'jam dbyangs grags pa /
khrom yon pa mkhan chen nam mkha' lhun bzang /
mus srad pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
khams chen byang chub dpal /
'dzims chen rgyal mtshan dpal /
sa bzang ma ti paN chen /
theg chen chos rje /
'jam dbyangs grags pa man 'dra /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
'jam sgya ba /
mnyam med grags pa rgyal mtshan /
gzungs kyi dpal ba /
theg chen chos rje man 'dra /
yang na na bza' pa nas /
brag phug pa dkon rgyan /
bu ston dbang phyug dar /
theg chen man 'dra /
yang na gzungs pa nas /
mkhas grub kun bzang pa /
chos rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
gong dkar lugs kyi lha brgyad dang lha bcu gnyis ma'i brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
bla ma bsod nams 'od zer /
bla ma dpal ldan legs dbang /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po lhan lha gsum ma bzhin no / /
rdo rje dang brag lhan cig yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
brag nag pa ngag dbang grags pa /
gong dkar ba rnams rjes gnang gi chings 'di'i yig cha sor bzhag mdzad /
dpal ldan legs dbang man 'dra /
rgya nor bu brag dpal be'u bzhi dang lhan cig yod pa ma gtogs pa'i rdo rje'i rtags can yongs rdzogs kyi lung brgyud ni /
'jam dbyangs rgyal ba mchog dbyangs nas /
brag thog pa bsod nams bzang po man 'dra /
rdo rje dpal be'u lhan cig yod pa'i lung ni /
yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
bla ma dpal ldan blo gros /
dmar chos kyi rgya mtsho /
paN chen byams pa gling pa /
mthu chen 'jigs med dpa' bo man gong bzhin no / /
yar gyi rtags can dang tshe sgrub ma gtogs pa'i sgo'i rtags can yongs rdzogs kyi lung ni /
rje btsun rdo ring pa nas /
sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs man 'dra /
tshe sgrub kyi brgyud pa ni /
chos rje bla ma dam pa nas /
chos rje dpal ldan tshul khrims /
ngor pa rdo rje 'chang /
grub mchog bsod nams dbang phyug /
rje btsun kun spangs chos rje man 'dra /
yar dang lhan cig pa'i sgo'i rtags can gyi lung ni /
'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas rin cen nas /
rje btsun sgo rum pa chen po /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse yan 'dra /
ru'i rtags yong pa'i lung brgyud ni /
@# / /
rdo rje 'chang /
grub chen bram ze mchog sred /
la lI ta badzra /
nag po ro zan /
lo tsA ba gyi ldang dbu dkar /
gshen rdo rje seng ge /
'brom rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
sgom rin cen seng ge /
seng ge dpal /
chos kyi rin cen /
dmar bsod nams 'phel /
sangs rgyas 'bum /
dga' ldan pa bkra shis dpal /
kun dga' bsod nams /
bag ston /
thog ston shes rab rdo rje /
rin cen 'phel /
rgya ma pa yon tan 'od /
mkhan chen grub pa shes rab /
rgya ston tsan+d+ra de wa /
ri khrod pa bsod nams rgya mtsho /
'jam dbyangs shes rab rgya mtsho /
mkhas grub dpal ldan rdo rje /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsod nams seng ge /
'gos ston rdo rje seng ge /
mnga' ris ru thog pa nam mkha' gzi brjid /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
drung kun dga' legs pa /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan man 'dra /
glegs bam so so'i ra'i rtags yod pa'i lung ni /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
des bdag la'o / /
zha dang zha g.yung drung can gyi lung ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab nas /
khyab bdag mkhan chen zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
pra'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud ni /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan nas /
rab 'byams chos rje rin cen rgya mtsho /
khyab bdag zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
khra dang khra g.yung drung ris kyi brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan nas /
bla ma 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan /
drin can blo mchog rdo rje /
des bdag la'o / /
pha'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
tshar chen nas /
rin po che bod mkhar ba /
thams cad mkhyen ba bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rje drung rin po che dge 'dun bstan pa rgya mtsho /
rdo rje 'chang ba bong kha pa /
des bdag la'o / /
sa'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
khyab bdag dbang phyug rab brtan /
sa chen kun dga' bsod nams /
des sras bsod nams dbang phyug /
rdo rje 'chang zha lu pa /
des bdag la'o / /
ngag gi rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel nas /
mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags /
sa skya khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams /
de sras 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug /
mkhan chen zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
lo'i rtags yod pa'i brgyud pa ni /
rin po che bod mkhar ba nas /
spyan snga mi pham chos kyi rgya mtsho /
lo pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub /
sa skya khri chen man 'dra /
mgon po khro bcu'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa yan zhal ngo nang brgyud ltar nas /
sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal ba /
thugs sras bzang po rgyal mtshan /
r+wa chen gnyis pa dge ba rgyal mtshan /
rje btsun sangs rgyas mchog /
chos rje skyes mchog rgyal mtshan /
grub dbang bkra shis seng ge /
rdo rje 'chang tshan pa chos rje /
kun mkhyen mkhyen brtse'i zhabs /
mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
grub mchog bsod nams chos 'phel /
yab sras bzhi ga la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan gyis gsan /
de nas khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba chen po /
mkhas grub chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
mgon po gsang sgrub lha dgu'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse yan khro bcu ltar la /
de nas mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab @# / /
brtan man gong ltar ro / /
lhag bsam rab dkar gyi di lan du 'di'i brgyud pa 'khrid kyi brgyud pa dang gcig pa'i phyogs mdzad 'dug kyang cung zad thugs snang la ma nges pa zhig byung bar sems so / /
dud sol ma'i phyi sgrub thun mong ba'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang /
gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje /
slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub /
lus med ye shes mkha' 'gro /
grub chen tai lo pa /
paN chen nA ro pa /
mnga' bdag mar pa lo tsA /
rngog chos sku rdo rje /
rngog zhe sdang rdo rje /
rngog thogs med grags /
rgyal tshar mo /
rngog kun dga' rdo rje /
rngog gzi brjid grags /
rngog rin cen bzang po /
rngog chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
rngog don grub dpal /
rngog byang chub dpal /
rngog khra tshang pa bsod nams don grub /
rngog mdo sde yang zer /
shAkya don grub /
rngog thar gling pa bsod nams lhun po /
de sras rngog ston bsod nams bstan 'dzin /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
grub pa mchog gi ded dpon bsod nams chos 'phel /
rigs kun bdag po dbang phyug rab brtan /
mkhan chen zha lu pa khyab bdag rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rin cen bzang po nas /
rin cen dpal /
dpal gyi rdo rje /
slob dpon bzang po dpal /
rngog byang chub dpal man 'dra /
yang na rin cen bzang po nas /
sangs rgyas seng ge /
btsun pa dpal gyi rdo rje man 'dra /
yang na rgyal tshar mo nas /
slob dpon lcam me /
slob dpon nam mkha' dbang phyug /
kun dga' dbang phyug /
rin cen dpal /
grags pa rgyal mtshan /
kun dga' blo gros /
kun dga' bzang po /
rngog bsod nams don grub man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
bram ze chen po sa ra ha pa /
mgon po klu sgrub /
DA ki ma skal pa bzang mo /
slob dpon ba la pa /
bzhi ga la tai lo pas gsan pa man sngar bzhin no / /
gsang sgrub rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa nan chags mar grags pa dang lung yongs rdzogs kyi brgyud pa ni /
rje dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
kun mkhyen mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
'di la gsang sgrub lha mo nyi shu'i rjes gnang zhes pa zhig tshar chen gyis gsan 'dug kyang thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi gsan yig na mi 'dug pa rgyun chad pa yin nam snyam /
slar yang khungs btsun pa zhig rnyed na zhu bar rigs shing la la ngag rngog dkyil bdun gyi nang tshan 'jam dpal gsang ldan gyi tshab tu lha mo 'di la dkyil 'khor sgo rdzogs dang dbang bzhi sogs blos byas kyi cho ga 'dug pa lta bu'i rigs ni ma thob pa rang gan gtsang bar snang ngo / /
phyi'i las mkhan gcer bu zangs gri can gyi rjes gnang ni /
'phags pa rin po che yan zhal ngo nad brgyud la /
de nas do pa ston tshul /
rgyal cha chas kyi dbang phyug /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
drin can seng ge bzang po /
rnal 'byor dbang phyug seng ge rgyal mtshan /
mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal ba mchog dbyangs /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
gcen rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
'bum rab 'byams pa chos kyi don grub /
paN chen 'bum phrag gsum pa'ang zer /
mkhas @# / /
pa'i dbang bo rat+na shI la /
chos rje tshul khrims pa'ang zer /
rje sgo rum pa chen po /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
yab sras gnyis la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
de la rje bslab gsum pa dang rtar ba gnyi gas gsan /
yab sras bzhi ga la rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na rje sa chen nas /
bla chen yar sgom se bo /
rgyal tsha lung mang po man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun sa chen nas /
'gos ston tshar sgang pa /
dge bshes ma g.yo ba /
gshen sgom bla ma dpal /
slob dpon shes rab bla ma /
dam pa kun dga' grags /
dga' ldan pa kun dga' bsod nams /
gan pa rin cen rgyal mtshan /
chos rje bla ma dam pa yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan man 'dra /
yang na rjes paN nas /
mdo khams kyi rta rge bla ma dpal /
slob dpon shes rab bla ma man 'dra /
lugs gcig la rdo rje 'chang /
bram ze mchog sred /
badzra pA Ni /
ku ku ri pa /
nag po ro 'dzin /
gyi ljang lo tsA ba /
mal lo tsA ba /
sa chen man 'dra /
nang gi las mkhan ber nag zangs gri can gyi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
'gos ston tshar sgang pa dang rta rge bla ma yod pa sor gnas kyi /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
kun mkhyen chos dbyings rang grol /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses tshar chen la gsan pa'i brgyud par las mkhan phyi nang gnyis brgyud pa gcig tu bgrangs shing /
sgo rum par gsan pa der mi gcig par bgrangs 'dug pa 'dir gnyi ga'i don la dpyad nas gsal bar bgyis yod do / /
des bdag la'o / /
gsang ba'i las mkhan pu hra ming srid phyi nor srung gnod sbyin pho mo'i tshul dang /
nang gsang pa gshin rje pho mo'i tshul du sgrub ba'i rjes gnang dang lha'i rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud la rgya gar gyi gter ma dang bod kyi gter ma gnyis las dang po ni /
rdo rje 'chang /
'phags pa klu sgrub /
ayon chen po /
paN grub d+harma pA la /
lo chen rin cen bzang po /
brag steng pa yon tan tshul khrims /
lo rgyus na go rub rin cen bsod nams zhes pa sku tshe'i stod rab byung gi mtshan dang sku tshe smad la dkar chas su gyur ba'i mtshan la 'di ltar grags pas tha ngad du mi bzhed do / /
de la mal lo tsA ba dang 'brom rdo sras zhang ges gsan /
gnyi ga la sa skya pa chen po /
de nas rje btsun sku mched /
chos rje khu dpon /
sga A nan dam pa /
dga' ldan ba kun bsod /
gan pa rin rgyan /
bla ma dam pa man zhal ngo brgyud pa sor gnas bzhin rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol la zhus so / /
yang na 'phags pa nas /
zhang ston pa /
brag phug pa /
bla ma dam pa man 'dra /
yang na rje btsun yab sras dang do pa las brgyud nas yar klungs pa'i zhal do nang brgyud kyi yab 'jam dbyangs chen por bka' babs pa yang sngar dang 'dra /
yang na bla ma dam pa nas /
yar klungs pa man 'dra /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan nas /
khyab bdag zha lu pa rin cen bsod nams mchog grub /
des bdag la'o / /
rdzong lugs kyi rjes gnang kho na'i brgyad pa ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
bla ma dpal ldan tshul khrims /
bla ma bud+d+ha shrI /
mkhas grub chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan man gong ltar ro / /
gong @# / /
dkar lugs kyi rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
bla ma dam pa nas /
bla ma bsod nams 'od zer /
bla ma dpal ldan legs dbang /
brag theg pa bsod nams bzang po /
kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa /
rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
yangs pa can pa shAkya kun dga' /
kun bzang rtse ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
nyi ma gling pa tshul khrims bkra shis /
khyab bdag zha lu pa chen po /
des bdag la'o / /
bod kyi gter ma'i brgyud pa ltar na /
ayon chen po nas /
jo mo 'tsho rgyal /
mnga' bdag bri srong lde btsan /
lha btsun byang chub 'od /
lo tsA ba rin can bzang po man sngar bzhin no / /
ru mtshon gyi las mkhan bran bdud gshin rje nag po'i thun mong ba'i rjes gnang gi brgyud pa ni /
sa paN yan zhal ngo nang brgyud ltar la /
de nas do pa ston tshul /
rgyal tsha lung mang po ches kyi dbang phyug /
mkhas pa yon tan khri /
mkhan chen seng ge bzang po /
yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan /
tshem bu ba dpal ldan blo gros /
dmar ston rgyal mtshan 'od zer /
dpal ldan kun bzang rtse ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
te'ur pa chag lo rin cen chos rgyal /
'jam dbyangs sa skya lo tsA ba /
rje btsun sgo rum pa kun dga' legs pa /
rdo rje 'chang 'tshar pa chos rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /
de la bslab gsum rje ngang rta ra ba gnyis kyis gsan gnyis ka la rje dbang rab /
de nas khyab bdag bka' 'gyur ba /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa /
des bdag go /
bran bdud kyi rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa ni /
yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan nas /
'jam dbyangs bsod nams rgyal mchog /
'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
rgya dkar shes rab rgyal mtshan /
'bum phrag gsum pa byams pa chos kyi don grub /
chos rje tshul khrims pa /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa man 'dra /
yang na rdo rje 'chang /
bram ze mchog sred /
badzra pA Ni /
ku ku ri pa /
dur khrod nga po ro 'dzin /
gyi ljang lo tsA ba dbu dkar /
mal lo blo gros grags /
rje btsun sa skya pa chen po /
bla chen yar sgom se bo /
do ba ston tshul man 'dra /
yang na sa chen nas /
zhang mnga' ris pa /
dge bsnyen sras mchog mgon /
dol po 'byung gnas pa /
rgya sgom tshul khrims grags /
bla ma do bsten tshul man 'dra /
de yang gong gi rtsa ba'i rtags bzhi rgyag pa'i dgos pa ni /
ji skad du /
de dag las 'ongs so so'i ngos 'dzin ni / /
dor lugs yi ge e yi rtags kyis mtshan / /
rdo rje gdan pa las byung rdo rje'i rgya / /
mus srad pa ni yi ge mu yi rgya / /
bdag chen rdo rje 'chang dbang las brgyud pa'i / /
rtsa ba'i yi ge mchod rten rgya yis mdzes / /
thor bu gzhan dag mchan bu btab pas shes / /
zhes gsungs pa'i gong du ngos ma zin pa'i me 'bar kha skong gyi ljang gsum la rtags med pa 'ga' zhig byung ba rnams mchan bu 'gro la rgyu yi ge ngos ma ma mthong bas re zhig btang snyoms su bzhag la /
ser pod nas /
shA sa na mchan bus bkral ba dbang po'i zhus dag ma /
nya ga gsum la zor gyi gsad pa zhes yod pa'i nor las /
pu tra'i bstod pa dpal ldan ma hA kA la ma /
'khor bcas kyi rjes gnang zhes pa zhang ge zin bris su grags pa'i 'dra min mjug na kha ru mi dbyung bya ba dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes yod pa'i le tshan gnyis dang bcas pa /
rdzong chung @# / /
pa'i thugs dam man ngag be ti nas /
rdzas dgram bzlas gsad gsum gyi tho /
gong dang gcig pa'i zor las /
'khor gyi ltas ngan dbab pa las byed mon bu'i man ngag /
rdzong pod dkar chag na /
'di las byed mon pu'i man ngag skangs su gsal gsung ba don ni ka ki nang na yod par gsungs kyang der mi g.yal la /
snyan brgyud kyi nor phyir gtong ba dang bshan pa ro 'khur gnyis ni mi 'dug /
gtor ma gsum kyi man ngag bcas pa gsham na dgra nag dang bde mchog nas gsungs pa'i shes byed yod pa gcig rnams rang lugs be'u bum rnams dang ngo ye ma 'phrod pa slar yang dpyad par bya'o / /
! da yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud la'u bcu bdun pa las /
drag po mi sdug khros pa ni / /
ut+pal sngon po'i kha 'og 'dra / /
phyag bzhi pa ni cho ga yi / /
phyag na thod pa bsnams par sgom / /
zhes dngos su bstan cing /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bshad rgyud las kyang gsal bar bstan pa'i stobs 'phrog nag po chen po gdong bzhi pa'am drag po gzi ldan dbang phyug tu grags pa 'di nyid /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes /
de ltar rgyal ba'i dri med rgyud sde las / /
gsungs pa'i bstan srungs kun gyi mchog gyur pa / /
drag shul mthu ldan stobs 'phrog nag po zhes / /
rgya bod mkhas grub kun la rlung ltar grags / /
zhes pa ltar 'phags pa'i yul du sangs rgyas gnyis pa klu sgrub zhabs /
bsod snyoms pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta /
paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa /
ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma ku sA li chen mo sogs paN grub du ma'i chos skyong gi gtso bo mdzad cing /
bod yul 'dir gnyan lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyis gdan drangs srung ba brgya rtsa tsam gyi nang nas gtso bor bzung /
bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras la bka' babs bstan srungs mgon po che chung gnyis su dbye ba'i chung bar grags shing shin tu rtsub 'gyur che zhing gnyan cha chabs bka' ches dam par mdzad /
khyad par sbas pa'i mgon po la rigs mang du yod pa'i nang nas sbas pa'i mgon po'am dam tshig gi mgon po yin pas zhal bzhi yongs rdzogs kyi sku gzugs bris 'bur sogs kyang mi bzhed zhing re gnyis byung ba dag kyang khyab gdal du ye mi ston pa sogs dam tshig che phra kun la gces par mdzad pa smin grol gdams pa'i gnang mtha' dag ma nyams pa snyan brgyud mkha' 'gro'i kha rlang thul le ba thos bsam gyis gtan la 'bebs par snyan brgyud dang bo byin rlabs rjes gnang /
dang sang 'di'i sku ji ba dang ston pa sogs bag med du byed pa rnams ni 'di dag rna bas ma thos shing 'tshub 'gyur mi 'byung ba sogs byang chos skyong ye ma 'khor ba'i rtags so / /
gnyis pa gdams pa dngos gzhi /
gsum pa bla ma dang mkha' 'gro chos skyong longs spyod kyis mnyes par bya ba la brten nas snyan brgyud bzhi pa'i rten 'brel shugs la 'grig pa sogs khungs btsun gyi yig cha mang po las 'byung ba ltar ram /
yang na tshar pa rdo rje 'chang gis /
de yang thog mar tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /
rin cen gser gyi maN+Dal la sogs pa / /
snyan brgyud dang po'i rten 'brel kun bsgrigs nas / /
snyan brgyud gnyis pa byin rlabs rjes gnang sbyin / /
snyan brgyud gsum pa gdams pa'i dngos gzhi 'di / /
bklag lung min par lag len dmar 'khrid du / /
byin pas snyan brgyud bzhi pa @# / /
shugs la 'byung / /
zhes pa ltar rdo rje slob dpon mnyes pa dngos grub rtsa ba dang shin tu bka' gnyan ba'i zab chos rnams la dpon slob gnyis kas tshogs dang bskang ba shugs sogs kyi sgo nas mkha' 'gro srung ma rnams kyi nyams chags skong zhing bka' rgya bkrol te gnang ba zhu ba ma byas na 'phral 'tshub mthar mi shes pa sogs 'byung bas lha 'dod yon la longs spyod pa lta bu snyan brgyud dang por byas te /
gnyis pa chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun lta bu /
gsum pa gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu /
bzhi pa chos la yid ches kyi mos gus rnyed pa gzhon nu'i dga' ba lta bu'i go rim ste /
de yang bshad tshul gnyis po gang byas kyang go rim tsam las don la khyad med na'ang phyi ma'i rjes su 'brangs te snyan brgyud dang po'i rten 'brel bsgrig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i snyan brgyud gnyis pa rjes gnang dang gsum pa gdams pa'i dngos gzhi gnyis /
dang po la /
gnyan lo'i gnad yig dang dga' ldan pa kun bsod kyi yi ge dang tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge dngos grub rgya mtsho dang brgyud pa'i phyag len la brtan nas bsnyen dus kyi mgon po'i rjes gnang /
pho nya myur mgyogs dang rjes gnang gi yi ge gong ma rnams la brten nas sgrub dus thun mong ba'i rjes gnang /
yi ge de gnyis dang rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes mdzad pa'i bka' rgya ma la brten nas sgrub dus kyi rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa /
rjes gnang gi yi ge gong ma dang mthong brgyud kyi phyag len dbri snon ltar las sbyor gyi mgon po'am paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa lugs kyi dpal mgon gdong brnyan can du grags pa'i rjes gnang /
dngos grub rgya mtsho dang gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i des gnang gi yi ge dang phyag len gsung rgyun ltar gsang 'khrid kyi rjes gnang /
las bzhi'i rjes gnang la 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i mi ge la brten nas dkar po che 'phel thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang /
dkar chag na bzhugs pa'i las bzhi'i mngon rtogs rjes gnang yig chung dngos grub rgya mtsho /
gsung rgyun phyag len ltar g.yas zhal dkar po las byung ba'i dkar po chos 'phel thun mong ba'i rjes gnang /
steng zhal dud kha las zung ba'i ser po rgyas byed lha dgu'i rjes gnang /
ser po rgyas byed lha lnga'i rjes gnang /
g.yon zhal dmar po las byung ba'i dmar po dbang sdud kyi rjes gnang /
rtsa zhal mthing nag las byung ba'i nag po dgra bgegs gsol ba'i rjes gnang /
dngos grub rgya mtsho'i yi ge dang mthong brgyud kyi phyag len dbri snon la brten nas shis bstan pa'i rjes gnang /
'di la gdong gsum dang brtsegs zhal mar grags /
yig cha dngos gzhi dang tshar chen gyi zin tho la brten nas gnad dbab kyi mgon po nang gshin rje ltar sgrub pa'i rjes gnang /
thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse'i zin tho ltar khyung zhal can nam dmag dbon mgon po'i rjes gnang /
rje nam mkha' chos dpal gyi yi ge'i steng nas ye shes kyi mgon po seng ge nag po'i rjes gnang /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje'i zin tho la brten nas gsung ngag gser chos bcu gsum /
mgon po sogs slob bshad gdams pa phal cher rdzogs mthar bstan pa gtad pa'i chul gyis bram ze nag po'i sngags gtang dang bcas pa rnams nos /
gnyis pa san brgyud gsum pa gdams @# / /
pa'i dngos gzhi la /
man ngag gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu nyams 'khrid /
phyag bzhes man ngag rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa gnyis /
dang po la /
thog mar rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes mdzad pa'i tshe sgrub bsrung 'khor rgyun gyi nyams len mar grags pa'i yi ge dang zhal shes la brten cing sngon 'gro gsang 'khrid nas kha bskangs te phyi nang gi bsrung 'khor 'chi med sgrub pa zhar byung zlog pa dang bcas pa'i phyi'i nyams 'khrid zab mo /
'di byin rlabs kyi tshan kha shin tu che bas bla ma gnyan lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyis dgung lo brgya dang lnga bcu bzhugs pa'ang man ngag 'di nyid kyi che ba yin par snang ngo / /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes mdzad pa'i 'khrid yig zung 'jug rnam par rol ba bdud sde 'joms pa'i bshan pa chen po la gzhi byas /
lhan thabs yig chung zin bris zhal shes dang bcas pas brgyan nas /
sngon 'gro skyabs sems /
yig brgya /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor /
maN+Dal dang bcas pa'i 'khrid /
dngos gzhi 'khor lo bzhi la brten pa'i bsnyen pa /
'khor lo bzhi ldan gyi sgrub pa /
thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i las sbyor /
zhar byung ma 'grub spogs chog gi ngo sprod dang bcas te sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum chang ba'i nyams len la brten nas rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bsnun pa'i gnad kyis gzung 'dzin gyi rtsa mdud rnams grol nas cir snang bde chen du shar te tshe 'dir zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang mngon du byed nus pa'i gsang 'khrid kyi nyams 'khrid zab mo zhag nyi shu skor gyi bar dang zhing skyong dbang po 'khor bcas byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rang gi snying dbus su 'bral med du bzhugs nas mchog mthun gyi dngos grub ma lus pa stsol ba'i dmar 'khrid dpal ldan sa skya pa'i gdu brgyud kho na la chig brgyud du bzhugs pa'i nyams 'khrid zab mo smin rgyas su legs par nos / /
gnyis pa phyag bzhis man ngag rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa la /
dkar chag gis zin pa'i skor dang /
ma zin pa'i skor te gnyis /
dang po ni /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje nag po chen po gdong bzhi ba'i chos skor gyi dkar chag gsung rgyun padma'i srad bur brgyus pa'i zab don nor bu'i do shal /
de las gsungs pa'i chos sde'i rnam grangs paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa nas brgyud pa /
shrA paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta nas brgyud pa /
khar+sA pA Ni'i ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma ku sA li chen mo nas brgyud pa dang gsum /
dang po la /
'gor skad sha na sbyar dang dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo / /
'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams 'jigs byed pa'i / /
nag po de la phyag 'tshal nas / /
zhes yod pa'i mgon po gdong brnyan can nam las sbyor gyi mgon por grags pa glang gdong phyag drug pa'i sgrub (glo? )pha? nyi? thabs kyi rtsa ba'i rgya gzhung slob dpon klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa dang lo tsA ba gnyan dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba /
rgya gzhung gi 'grel pa dri med don gsal @# / /
dge bshes dge ba rgyal mtshan gyis bskul nas mdo stod pa 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyis nyang brag dga' ldan dgon du mdzad pa /
'gor tA ra na mo dpal gdong bzhi pa'i mngon rtogs kyi man ngag glo? paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum ba'i zhal gdams mthar thug pa ni zhes yod pa'i gtso 'khor lnga'i mngon rtogs gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na don gcig pa tshig 'dra min rgyas bsdus nyi? cung zad yod pa zhig 'dug /
chung du bla ma gong mas mdzad pa der rtogs par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gro dkon cog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo rang skad cig gis hUM mthing nag tu gyur pa las 'od zer 'phros /
zhes yod pa'i gtor chog gi yi ge gong mas mdzad pa de wI sid+d+hi zhes nyer gcig gam gsum la sogs pas dbul lo'i mtha' can /
'gor tshangs pas ser po ngang pa zhon zhes yod pa'i 'khor mang gi mngon rtogs tshigs bcad ma gong mas mdzad pa bka' nyan gsung gtod las byed tshul du bsam gyi mtha' can /
thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtshos zhal bkod gnang nas sman thang blo bzang bas bris pa'i 'khor mang gi zhal thang de yang gzhi 'di la brten nas rgyas su btang bar mngon /
las sbyor gi gsal byed las kyi sham bu brgyad glo? nyi? pa zhes pa gsad pa'i las /
mdze gtong ba /
rabs gcod pa /
zhing la lo mi skye ba /
rims nad gtong ba /
grong khyer dkrugs pa /
grong bshig pa /
bskrad pa /
smyo bar byed pa /
'di gnyis lhag pa 'dra zhig byung kyang gong gi khongs su bsdus sam snyam /
dbang du byed pa rnams gnyan los mdzad pa /
'di yan gyi glang gdong ma'i skor rdzogs nas zhar byung 'gor dpal phyag nar do rje la phyag 'tshal lo / /
sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir / /
dpal ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i / /
gser gyi spu gri'i lag len 'dri / /
zhes yod pa'i dpal mgon khyung zhal can nam dmag dpon mgon po'i sgrub thabs lag lan gzhung nas dril nas btus /
sngags 'chang bstan pa bsrung bar shog gi mtha' can rnams /
gnyis pa shA paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta nas brgyud pa la /
'gor rgya skad dang zhal bzhi pa'i dam tshig dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs zhes yod pa'i rtsa ba'i sgrub (e? )sgo? glo? nyi? thabs rdzong pod na'ang yod /
ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'i bdag mdun mgon po zhal kha can nam sgrub dus kyi mgon por grags shing /
deng sang yongs grags sgrub dus kyi mgon po zhal g.yas g.yon mthing nag tu byed pa'i yi ge 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang tshar lugs la sgrub dus kyang zhal khra can du mdzad pa gzhung 'di'i gnad 'gegs gtso bor ston par snang /
rgya gzhung rtsom pa rang nyid dang gnyan lo tsA ba dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba /
gzhung chung 'di la 'phrin las rnam bzhi bye brag tu sgrub tshul gyis gnang 'gag kyang zur tsam bstan 'dug cing /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rjes gnang sgrub gsal byed snying thig gi skabs rgya gzhung las bshad tshul gyi rtsa ba'ang gzhung 'di la brten pa yin no / /
'gor rgya y+gar gyi yul du chu bo gang+gA dang nyi ma phyed dang gnyis tsam yod pa'i greng chung du'i 'gram zhig na zhes yod pa'i gnyan las mdzad pa'i paN+Di ta mjal tshul gyi lo rgyus nyung du dang sprel ba'i glo? sgrub thabs rdzong dpon na'ang yod /
kyi rim pa bsnyen pa dang @# / /
las sbyor ston pa zla ba gcig gis las rnams 'grub bo ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas gnyan la 'o'i mtha' can rnams /
phal cher snyan brgyud kyi zhal shes la rag las zhes dkar chag na snang bas yi ge 'di las mang ba zhig thog ma nas med tshod du 'dug /
gsum pa khar+sA bA Ni'i ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma ku sA li chen mo las brgyud pa la /
zab cing rgya che ba phyi'i sgrub skor /
rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bsnan pa gsang ba'am nang gi man ngag /
snying nang gi khrag lta bu khyad par gyi man ngag dang gsum /
dang po la /
yid ches shing khungs btsun pa lo rgyus kyi yi ge /
nus ldan du bya ba rjes gnang gi yi ge /
rtsa bar gyur pa bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi yi ge /
gsal byed du gyur pa lhan thabs sam yan lag gi yi ge /
'phral du nye bar mkho ba gtor chog dang bskang ba bstod bskul gyi yi ge dang lnga /
dang po la /
'gor na mo gu ru man ngag 'di'i brgyud pa'i lo rgyus ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang zhes yod pa'i lo rgyus kyi yi ge sa chen gyis mdzad pa bon po pho mo 'dres pa lnga bcu tsam chos skyong gi nus pas bsad zer ro'i mtha' can /
'di'i nang du kha'u par rje btsun sa skya pas zhus zer ba ltar na tshig gcig gnyis slar bsnan pa 'dra'o / /
'gor brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo bka' srungs 'di'i lo rgyus ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pa la zhes yod pa'i lo rgyus nyi? kyi yi ge rgyas pa 'phags pas mdzad pa mnga' bdag kyang de'u grong blon po la la yang shi skad kyi mtha' can zhar byung bla brgyud dang bcas pa /
gnyis pa nus ldan du bya ba rjes gnang gi yi ge la /
'gor oM swasti sid+d+hi nag po chen po'i lung sbyin pa ni 'byor na tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rting la bya sgo? zhes yod pa'i nag po chen po'i rjes gnang gnyan lo tsA bas mdzad pa gdams pa'i'i mtha' can /
rdzong bod na'ang yod /
'gor bla ma dang tA ra lan mo nag po chen po zhal bzhi pa'i rjes gnang la gsum ste zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge kha'u pas mdzad pa smon lam gdab bo zhal bzhi pa'i rjes gnang rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor na mo gu ru dbang thob ring dam tshig ma nyams pas 'di'i rjes gnang dang bka' lung thob cing zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang gi yi ge sa chen gyis mdzad pa smon lam gdab bkra shis bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor tAr la na mo 'di'i rjes gnang la don gsum ste sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes so zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang (e? )sgo? glo ?? gsal ba don du gnyer ba 'gas yang yang gsol ba btab pa'i ngor rnal 'byor pa grags pa rgya mtshan gyis bris pa /
'gor oM swasti sred gsum dbang sgyur dpal ldan nag po che zhes yod pa'i rjes gnang shin tu rgyas pa nag po 'gro rdzong pod na mchan mi 'dug /
shes nyi? zhes pa dpang por nag po chen po bzhugs pa 'di rang gi bla mas rjes su gnang nas bkas bskul zhing grogs mched dam pa'i gsung gi ngor rje btsun pa'i yi ge'i steng du 'phags pa'i phyag len dang zhang khu dbon las brgyud de bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi phyag bzhes ltar yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis glu'i dgon par mdzad pa /
des slob mas bskul ba'i ngor mdzad pa'i 'gor dpal zhal bzhi pa'i rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa la @# / /
zhes yod pa'i gri snying bla rdo srog 'khor phyag mtshan rnams kyi rjes gnang gi yi ge rnams /
gsum pa rtsa bar gyur pa bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi yi ge la /
kun gyi rtsa ba ri sul gyi rnal 'byor mas mdzad pa'i sgrub sgo? (gla? )nyi?? thabs mchan bshad du grags pa'i yi ge /
rdzong chung ba'i der 'gro ba'i lam du an d+ha mu shar bcug la sba'i yan las mi 'dug cing gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na de'i mjug tu grong khyer bskyong pa dang sngags thung bris pa cig dang yang dngos nyis kyus dang mthun pa la ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta'i lugs kyi lo rgyus sgrub thabs gnyan gyis mdzad pa da'i lo rgyus chu bo gang+gA zhes sogs yod pa 'jug na btags nas bsres ba zhig kyang snang ngo / /
gzhung de la brten nas bsnyen sgrub zhar byung mnan pa dang bcas pa 'gor ma hA kA (sgo? )glo? la'i man ngag la bsnyen sgrub gnyis las zhes yod pa gnyan lo'i u pa de sha 'o'i mtha' can /
gnyan los mdzad ba'i chos skyong gi gnad kyi yig chung (sgo? )glo? zhes pa bsnyen pa /
sgrub pa /
gsad pa /
las sbyor dang bcas pa zhal gyi gdams rdzong pod na'ang yod /
pa 'di mi rdzong bod na'ang yod /
la ma spal rnam smin che'o gsung ba'i mtha' can /
mgon po sgrub dus kyi las khrigs sgo? bla ma kha'u pa chen pos mdzad pa snying byung rigs brgyud rtsad nas chod ces brjod do'i mtha' can /
'gor ma hA kA la tsa tu rmu kha u pa de sha zhes yong ba'i mgon po sgrub (e? )sgo? glo? dus kyi las khrigs gsal rdzong bod na'ang yod /
byed sa rdzong bod na'ang yod /
chen gyis mdzad pa de'i snying ga bsnun par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
kha'u pas mdzad pa'i las khrigs kyi gsal e? (sgo? )pha? byed 'gor bla ma mgon po nag pho chen po la phyag 'tshal lo mgon po sgrub dus kyi las khrigs la gsum zhes yod pa'i yi rdzong bod na las khrigs chen po zhes pa las mdzad pa mi gsal ba /
sngags 'chang gzungs pas mdzad pa dgra na ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i las nges par 'grub bo sam pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo dpal ldan nag po chen po gdong bzhi pa bsnyen cing sgrub par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i bsnyen sgrub e? nyi?? las gsum gyi sgrub thabs nag po 'gro shes dga' ldan pa kun bsod kyis mdzad pa sgrub pa dang las sbyor gyi yig chung mi spel gsang bar bya 'o'i mtha' can /
rdzong bod na 'di gzungs pa'i nag 'gros su ngos bzung /
rnam gsum lag len gsal byed zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa'i lag len dmar 'khrid mthong chog bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyi gsung bzhin bsad nams grags pa dpal bzang pos yon tan du mas mngon par mtho ba'i blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis bskul ba la brten nas zin bris su bkod pa /
bsnyen pa'i go rim gnad don snyan brgyud bdud rtsi'i skyes 'phreng rnal 'byor dbang phyug yar klungs bsad dad ldan slob ma'i zhal ngor sbyar ba /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor tA ra na ma dpal mgon can tu rmu kha'i bsnyen ba bya bar 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i bzlas pa dang gegs sel gyi man ngag snyan brgyud gser chos mthar thug /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma mchog dang chos skyong la / /
lus ngag yid gsum gus btud nas zhes yod pa'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum spogs chog shis bstan pa dang bcas pa'i mngon rtogs gsal byed gnad kyi zhal @# / /
gdams mthar thug snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gser chos mchog tu gyur pa'i mkha' 'gro'i snying khrag /
des mdzad pa'i dpal gdong bzhi pa'i gtor ma bca' thabs kyi snyan brgyud snying gi khrag thig lta bu /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma yi dam bstan skyong la / /
sgo gsum gus pas phyag bcal nas zhes yod pa'i las rab 'byams dang gsad bskrad kyi 'khor lo'i zhal gdams tshig brgyud ma snying nang gi khrag lta bu /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor sangs rgyas kun dngos bla ma dang zhes yod pa'i bye brag tu gsad las kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag mkha' 'gro'i kha rlang can du grags pa rno myur spu gri reg chong dang 'ang ba'i man ngag snyan brgyud mthar thug /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma mchog dang lha mchog la zhes yod pa'i 'khrul 'khor bltab cing sba pa sogs mnan pa'i man ngag mthar 'don thabs dang bcas pa snyan brgyud spas don gsal ba /
yar klungs pa'i gsung 'di rnams phyi sgrub la ltos pa'i bka' rgya dam pas mang ba la mi ston pa'i gras /
bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi sgrub thabs rta bdun rgyal po zhes bya ba mdo stong pa 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
de skor gyi yig chang bzhi zhes pa pradz+nya pha la'i gsung bzhin bris pa'i sa chen kun dga' snying po'i man ngag gnad brgyad pa'i ngos 'dzin dang /
chos chan bzhi'i skabs 'di gnyis so sor 'dren ma chag pa'i gnad gnyis ston pa'i zhal bzhi pa'i srog snying gnad kyi man ngag snying dang 'dra ba mdo stong pa 'jam dbyangs kyis dwags lha sgam por sbyar ba /
dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa'i mnan pa dang srog gi zhal gdams ath-ii'i mtha' can /
'gor chos skyong gi rten gyi 'khor lo ni dbang po dar ma grir shi ba zhes yod pa grub pa dpal gyis yi ger bkod pa rnams /
bzhi pa gsal byed du gyur pa lhan thabs sam yan lag gi yi ge la /
spyi'i lhan thabs bye brag gi lhan thabs /
las phran bu'i man ngag dang gsum /
dang po la /
srog 'phrog pa /
bcing ba /
khyi ltar 'khrid pa /
snga phyi gnyis mi 'khren pa rtsal 'gran pa ste zhal gyi gdams (e? )sgo? glo? pa don lnga rdzong bod na yod pa der mi spel ba'i bka' rgya yod da lan las med /
ma shAkya'i dge slong gnyan gyi u pa de sha /
lta ba /
dam tshig /
mthun rdzas sngags /
'khu ldog mi 'byung ba /
shi sa bstan pa ste zab pa'i gnad drug gi gdams pa mchan bu dang bcas pa ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma'i man ngag gnyan gyi gsung /
de'i gsal byed gdams pa 'di la don drug ste zhes rdzong bod na yod pa der skad ngan tse re 'ong ngo yan las mi 'dug /
yod pa'i bla ma (e? )sgo? (glo? )nyi ?? gnyan gyi nye gnas dar ma seng ge la gnang ba srod thun la gtor ma med du mi rung ngo'i mtha' can /
mgon po la pha ltar bkur zhing lha mo la sring ltar dungs pa'i man (e? )sgo? nyi?? ngag blos khel ba ni 'go ba'i gnad yin no'i mtha' can /
khyad par gyi dam tshig glo? gi yi ge shin tu gsang bar bya ba rnams yin no'i mtha' can /
'khon bzas su zas su ba'i gdams ngag (sgo? )nyi?? slob dpon padma 'byung gnas rdzong bod na'ang yod /
kyis mdzad pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
'di rdzong bod na yod ngor pa'i der klu sgrub nas brgyud pa zhig 'dug pa 'di dang mi mthun /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam du rdzong bod na'ang yod /
@# / /
slob dpon padmas mdzad pa'i kha gsal mi 'dug /
'gor dpal ma hA kA la la phyag 'tshal lo nyams chags sam 'chi ltas byung ba'am chags che ba'i dus su gtor skyong byed par 'dod na maN+Dal zhes yod pa'i nyams chags (e? )sgo? glo? bkang ba'i yi ge bsdus rdzong bod na'ang yod /
ba bskang bshags cho ga 'o'i mtha' can gnyan gyis mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i dpal ma hA kA la la phyag 'tshal lo rnal 'byor pa la nyams chags sam 'chi ltas byung ba'am chags che ba'i dus su nyi? gtor skyong byed par 'dod na nang du gtor ma zhes yod pa'i nyams chags bkang ba'i yi ge rgyas pa gdams ngag ath-ii'i mtha' can /
'gor 'di'i dam tshig gso ba ni zhes yod pa'i kha'u pas mdzad pa'i dam tshig gso ba'i padma (e? )sgo? glo? kha sbyor gyi yi ge bsdus rdzong bod na'ang yod /
pa bla ma gnam kha'u pa gsung ath-ii'i mtha' can /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma dam pa dang nag po gdong bzhi pa la na mo chos skyong 'di bsten pa na nyi? zhes yod pa'i padma kha sbyor gyi yi ge rgyas pa gnam kha'u pa'i gdams pa sa ma pa tha'i mtha' can /
'gor nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo mgon po'i gsang ba byed par 'dod pas zhes yod pa (e? )sgo? glo? nyi? gsang ba'i cho ga 'o'i mtha' can rnams /
gnyis pa bye brag gi lhan thabs la /
sngon 'gro rten gyi skabs su 'gor tA ra na mo ma hA kA la'i rten bca' ba ni phyi rten du g.yag nag ces yod pa'i phyi nang (e? )sgo? glo? gsang ba de kho na nyid dang 'di dkar chag na mi gsal rdzong bod na yod /
bcas pa'i rten bca' ba'i li rdzong bod na'ang yod /
ge shAkya'i dge slong gnyan gyis mdzad pa'i u pa de sha su thod thod la bstan par mi bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor ma hA kA la'i rten bca' ba ni rdo nag po smug po'am zhes yod pa'i nang rten bla rdo bca' ba'i yi ge bsdus rdzong pod na'ang yod /
ba gnyan lo'i gsung bcu bzhi la ma chag pa gong bzhin bya 'o'i mtha' can /
de'i gsung 'gor rdo rje nag po chen po'i rten bca' ba ni byang shar ram shar lho nas zhes yod pa'i nang rten bla rdo bca' ba'i yi ge rgyas pa gtor ma'ang grub na bzang ngo / /
bla ma gnyan lo tsA ba'i man ngag ath-ii'i mtha' can /
gsang rten gyi skabs su 'gor rten bca' thabs la gri snying 'khor lo zhes yod pa'i gtum po rang (sgo? )glo? bsrung gi 'khor lo 'dri tshul rten bca' thabs so'i mtha' can /
'di gnyis gcig tu byed na ma gtogs so sor byed tshe dkar chag tu gcig mi gsal bas zhar byung yin nam snyam /
'gor gtum po bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang zhes yod pa'i gsal (sgo? )glo? byed gser srang bzhi phul zhes grags so'i mtha' can /
'gor 'di'i gnad la bla ma chos rje bdag gi bla ma lags na'ang zhes yod pa'i rang (e? )sgo? bsrung 'khor lo thun mong ma yin rdzong bod na'ang yod /
pa'i man ngag dpal mgon khyod la mthol lo bshags kyi mtha' can /
rdzong bod na'ang bzhugs /
de'i bri yig 'gor bsrung 'khor la mu khyud phyi nang sgo? gnyis zhes yod pa'i u pa de sha 'o'i mtha' can /
de'i sngags byang grong khyer bskyod pa dang sngags ring gi mtshams sgo? mchams su 'dri lugs kyi gsal byed rdzong bod na'ang @# / /
yod /
yod pa thams cad g.yas skor du 'dri 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo rten gyi 'khor lo bya bar 'dod na zhes yod pa'i rten 'khor 'dri tshul (e? )sgo? glo? rgyas pa rnam bar brgyan no d+ha ra Ni'i mtha' can /
rten gyi 'khor lo rab tu gnas pa rten 'brel gyis rten la thim par sam mo'i mtha' can /
'gor d+harma pA la ca tu rmu kha'i rten bca' ba ni zhes yod pa'i rten gyi yi ge nyi? rgyal tsha lung mang pos mdzad pa d+harme shwa ras brjed thor bris pa de byung dge ba sangs rgyas bsngo zhes pa'i mtha' can /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na gtor ma phul bas 'grub bo yan dang mngon spyod gsang las sgrub na man so sor byas shing mdzad byang yang mi gsal /
'gor bla ma dang dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo gnod pa bsrung ba dang zhas yod pa'i rang nyi? bsrung chen mo ling che nyi shu pa'i bri yig bla ma chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che nas zhang dkon cog dpal la gnang pa nam mkha'i mtshan can gyi phyag bris las bshus so'i mtha' can /
mchod pa'i skabs su 'gor rten gyi mdun du mchod gtor dang zhes yod pa'i me tog sgo? bzhi sbyor gyi yi ge gnyan los mdzad pa rgyud 'jam bzhi sbyor man ngag go'i mtha' can /
rdzong bod na sha tshil la sogs pa'o yan med cing nir ma phu lan rtsan nas mdun rgyab gnyis su bzhag gsung ba yan sngags thems kyi gsham na bris shing /
bzlas lung gi me tog nas bzhi sbyor man ngag go'i bar chos tshan 'gam 'di'i rjes su chos tshan gcig tu bzhugs 'dug /
des mdzad pa'i gong gi gsal byad 'gor tA ra na ma lung rjes su nod pa'i puSh+pe zhes yod (sgo? )glo? pa'i ba ling gong dkar ba'i glegs bam du dngos gzhi 'di ga la chig zur cung zad mi 'dra nyi? ba mchan rnams dkyus su bcug pa'i sngon du 'og gi spos spyor mi grir she ba'i sha la gzhi byas pa man bsnan pa zhig 'dug pa phan tshun 'dres pa'i yig skyon 'byams pa 'dra /
gi me tog rnying pa'i u pa de sha 'o'i mtha' can /
rdzong bod na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor mchod pa'i spos sbyor cho ga ni zhes yod pa'i mgon po'i spos sbyor gyi man (e? )glo? nyi? ngag lus sbrid pa la sogs ba'i rtags 'byung ngo'i mtha' can /
ngor lugs la la tshan gnyis po go rim slog 'dug cing gong dkar ba'i glegs pam du'ang de ltar snang /
gtor ma'i skabs su das mdzad pa'i 'gor bla ma gnyan lo'i zhal glo? gdams gtor ma gshom dus zhes yod pa'i gtor ma bca' thabs kyi yi ge rgyun gyi thun 'tshams so'i mtha' can /
rdzong bod na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i 'gor yar ngo'i brgyad dang mar ngo'i brgyad la zhes glo? yod pa'i gtor ma gtong thabs kyi yi ge yum la sngags 'og mas dbul la nang bar gtang ngo'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa la na mo rtag gtor man ngag dam pa ni /
zhes yod pa'i rtag gtor gyi man ngag tshigs bcad ma gsang zhing sba ba nyid du bya zhes ba'i mtha' can /
'gor 'di'i mdun na lcags snod gru gsum zhes yod pa'i drag po'i gtor ma'i man ngag gsang ngo ma spel zhig gi mtha' can /
'di dkar chag na mi gsal ba gong gi 'phros yin nam snyam /
dngos gzhi bsnyen pa'i skabs su sngags byang la /
grong khyer bskyod pa /
sngags ring /
sngags thung /
'khor lo'i sngags @# / /
spags sgrub so sor phral ba rnams kyi sngags 'phreng mchan bur bcas pa (sgo?)glo?? sngags btu'i gzhung dang thems yig sa paN gyi phyag bris dang mthun par bla ma'i gsung rgyun bzhin sngags 'chang ma tis zhus dag pa /
sngags ring mchan bur bcas pa (sgo?)nyi? sngar gyi dpe rnying dag pa dang thems yig nas byung ba /
sngags ring mchan bur bcas pa paN chen nags rin gyis zhus dag pa de'i zhal slob puN+ya bi dza ya in+d+ra se nas slar yang zhus dag pa /
paN chen byams pa gling pa'i mtshan /
sngags byang gsum po dkar chag tu sngags byang zhes pa las so so'i gsal kha mi 'dug /
'gor oM swasti sid+d+haM dpal nag po chen po'i sngags thems bstan pa la zhes yod pa'i sngags kyi thems (e?)sgo?(glo??)nyi? yig zhib mo 'di rnams shin tu gces pas mkhas pa gal che sa ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor bla ma la na mo sngags kyi thems yig la 'bru bya ba cheg par bgrang zhes yong pa'i sngags kyi thems yig gsal byed 'di ngor lugs la stod smad gnyis yod pa'i dkyil ma tshang ba zhig 'dug /
bdag chen rin po che blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa bla ma'i man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba gal che'o'i mtha' can /
gnyan los mdzad pa'i sngags kyi (e?)sgo?(glo?)nyi?? gnad las sa so'i sngags dag par bzlas so'i mtha' can /
ngor lugs la shis bstan pa dang sbrel 'dug rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor rdo rje 'chang dbar dpal ldan he ru ka zhes yod pa'i sngags kyi thems yig dang spel tshig thor bu ba dar nag la btags te g.yab bo' mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo dpal mgon po gdong bzhi pa'i bsnyen sgrub ces yod pa'i thun mong gi bsnyen pa'i yi ge 'phags pas mdzad pa dbang du 'dus pa rdo rje gur las gsungs so'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bsnyen pa'i yi ge shog dril bka' rgya ma'i gdams pa /
'di la gsang sgrub kyang zer /
sgrub pa'i skabs su 'gar rje btsun gyi zhal nas spyir sgrub pa mi dgos gsung zhes yod pa'i sgrub pa'i (glo??)nyi?? gnad rje btsun gsung rgyun shin tu bka' dam par mdzad do'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na 'di'i nang gi glo bur las bcol de chos tshan logs su mdzad cing gong dkar gyi glegs bam na ling tshe nyi shu pa'i bri yig gcig dang sbrel pa glo bur las bcol man med pa zhig 'dug /
'gor las sbyor ling ga la thun rnams zhe sdang 'bar ba'i zhes yod e? pa'i sgrub pa'i rtags kyi yi ge gos rdeb dmod mo brjod pa'i mtha' can /
rdzong yod na'ang yod /
ngor lugs la 'di sa chen gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub khrigs dang sbrel 'dug /
'gor bya rog me 'khor nyams grib che zhes yod (e?)nyi?? pa'i gtor len bya rog brtag pa tshig rkang drug ma sgrub pa bskyar gyi mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
ngor lugs la 'di gong gi rtags yig dang mnyam du bris shing /
gong dkar gyi glegs bam du cung zad 'dra min snang /
'gor tA ra na mo sgrub pa po dag gi zhal bzhi pa'i 'khu ldog dang zhes yod pa'i 'khu (sgo?)glo? ldog dang cho 'phrul mi 'byung zhing las myur du sgrub pa'i yi ge bsams pa ni man ngag dam par gsungs so 'di spel ba ni nyin mo'i skar ma tsam @# / /
mo'i mtha' can /
'gor rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ni rtsibs drug ces yod pa'i rtsa ba (e?)sgo? dang gnad 'bebs dang las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i zhal gdams sdig pa'i sa bon byed pas gsang ngo'i mtha' can /
'di rdzong pod na'ang yod ngor lugs la 'di kha'i nang gi rab gnas de zur du ngos 'dzin mdzad pa yin /
'gor thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams pa 'di yin te zhes yod pa'i 'khor lo dang ling tshe dang ling ga'i (sgo?)glo?? zhal shes rnam smin che bas gzhan la ma spel gsang par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'di rdzong pod na'ang bzhugs shing 'khor lo dang ling ga'i zhal gdams chos tshan logs su mjad 'dug /
'gor man ngag 'di'i 'khor lo bri bar 'dod na zhes yod pa'i 'khor lo'i bri thabs (sgo?)nyi?? gang bsgo ba de nges bar 'grub gsung ba'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yong /
'gor sa i yaM yod pa'i 'khor lo'i sngags byang sgo? tsakra la bri gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
'gor 'khor lo'i skabs su rtsibs drug dang zhes yod sgo? pa'i 'di gong dkar ba'i glegs bam du nyis ldab 'dug /
'khor lo'i sngags bkod tshul sngags ring rdzogs par bri gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
bsnyen sgrub /
sri'u /
shwa bzlog /
gtad ying /
gtor ling /
rta phyugs gsod pa sogs las tshogs 'ga' zung gi 'khor lo'i man ngag de rjes ling ga la 'o'i mtha' can /
'di rdzong pod na'ang bzhugs shing yang gsang thugs kyi nyid khu zer /
las sbyor skabs su 'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo ma hA kA la'i gsang sngags (e?)sgo?nyi?? thung ba zhes yod pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor gsang sngags ring ba ni zhes yod (e?)sgo?nyi?? pa tsa turmu kha sa ma ya hUM phaT bka' rgyas gdab bo'i mtha' can /
'gor kha sbyor dbye ba'i man ngag ni rang yi dam lha zhes yod pa'i kha sbyor dbye ba bzhi'i man ngag (e?)sgo?glo? zab mo dam du snga'o 'di ni rab tu gsang ba'i gnas so'i mtha' can /
'gor las sbyor gyi tshe ling gzhes yod pa'i las sbyor gyi yig chung glo? ling tshe bco lnga pa sngags can bcug par bya 'o'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor mngon spyod gsad las sgrub na 'khor lo zhes yod pa'i mngon spyod gsad rdzong pod na'ang yod las kyi yig chung gsang sngags rnam pa gcig pas zab bo'i mtha' can /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam du mi ma yin dbang nyi? du bya ba yod gsung ba yan mthun pa la de nas mjug mi gcig pa mthar nus mthu mi yong the tshom med do zer ba snang /
'gor nag po chen po'i sgong zor zhes yod pa'i sgong zor gyi yi ge bsdus (e?)sgo?(gro?)nyi?? pa las kyi mthar thug bla ma gnyan gyi man ngag ithi'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na mtshan dkyus la shong 'dug /
sgong zor gyi yi ge rgyas pa ldong ston thig le 'bar nas brgyud pa'i man ngag dmod mo bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor 'phang ba khyu mchog ces yod pa'i r+wa zor gyi yi ge 'bring po yin bla ma (e?)sgo?(glo??)nyi?? gnyan gyi u pa de sha bo'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor tA ra lan mo las sbyor gyi mthar sbyin sreg byed par 'dod na thab khru gang brus nyi?? pa'am zhes yod pa'i las mtha'i sbyin sreg gi yi ge rgyas pa gong mas mdzad pa drag po'i las mthar bya 'o'i mtha' can /
'gor las mtha'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pas 'brub khung khru gang pa brtsigs pa'i @# / /
phyi zhes yod pa'i sbyin sreg gi yi ge bsdus (e?)sgo?glo?? pa sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal bas mdzad pa nag po chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga ithi'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor ho dpal nag po chen po gdong bzhi pa'i mgon po gtsug lag khang gi srung ma zhes yod pa'i kha sbyor dbye ba'i dmod bskul (e?)sgo? dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa'i dmod bskul ithi'i mtha' can /
ngor rdzong mthun par 'gor yon tan myur rdzogs dngos grub mnga' ba'i lha zhes pa'i sh+lo ka gsum dang tshig gcig rnams 'thol 'dug /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na stod med pa'i smad nyi?? kyi khyad par kha sbyor dbye ba'i dus zhes pa man snang /
spogs chog gi skabs su 'gor ma hA kA la la na mo dang por chos thams cad stong par bsgom zhes yod pa'i ma 'chun na rang nyid zhal bzhi par bskyed pa'i man ngag ak+Sho b+h+yas dbu brgyan no'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'ger bdag nyid ye shes kyi mgon po gdong bzhi pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgom zhes yod pa'i rtsa dbu ma chos 'byung dang bcas (e?)nyi?? pa'i gnad dbab rtsub pas tshod blang gin bya'o gar thong thod du mi bya gdams ngag yin no'i mtha' can /
gong dkar pa'i glegs bam du mgon po mdun dang rtsa nang du bsgom pa man ngag tshan pa gnyis su bris 'dug /
'gor las mi byed na shis bstan pa ni zhes yod pa'i shis bstan pa'i man (e?)sgo?glo? ngag 'di shin tu rdugs na gra zhing gar thod thong du mi rung ngo'i mtha' can rnams /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
gsum pa phran bu'i skor la /
'gor dpal gdong bzhi pa la phyag 'tshal lo chos skyong la gtsug lag khang zhes yod pa'i mgon po la gtsug (e?)sgo?(glo??)nyi?? lag khang gtod ba 'chog rdzong pod ca'ang yod /
gtor ma lnga la sogs pa rgyas par bya 'o'i mtha' can /

rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo mgon po la rang dang slob ma zhes yod pa'i rang dang slob (e?)sgo?glo?? ma gtod pa'i yi ge thugs dam ma g.yel cig ces gsol ba gdab bo'i mtha' can /

rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor nor la ngan gyi gdams pa ni zhes yod pa'i nor sgo? gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i man ngag mis mi mthong bar spas na 'grub bo'i mtha' can /
'gor sri'u gso na kham phor so ma gtang ba zhes yod pa'i sri'u gso ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag (e?)sgo?nyi?? ma hA kA la'a las kyi man ngag go'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor 'di'i thun mong ma yin pa'i las kha char zhig bstan te zhes yod pa'i sri'u gso ba bram ze kha spu can gyi gdams pa thugs dam dpang du bzhag ste dam bcas pa 'o'i @# / /
mtha' can /

rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i las zhes yod pa'i dbang sdud gri lag (e? )sgo? (glo? )nyi?? g.yob pa dar thogs kyi man ngag rjes la sngags thung nyer gcig bzlas so shin tu gsang ba gal che 'o'i mtha' can /
'gong nag po chen pos bsgrub bya zhes yod pa'i rdzas rnams skad shan sbyar ba'i bsgrub bya dbang (e?)sgo?(glo?)nyi?? du bya ba nges par 'ang ngo bla ma gnyan gyi man ngag ithi'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'dod yon lnga la brten nas spyod lam (e?)sgo?glo?? dbang du bya ba'i chog rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /

rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor ma hA kA la tsa turmu kha ye zhing skyong 'di'i sgo nas zhes yod pa'i dgra (e?)sgo?(glo?)nyi?? la ltas ngan gtong ba'i man ngag chig brgyud ma bka' rgya 'o'i mtha' can /
bya 'ug rta nag gi rdzas dang phag thod la brten nas cho 'phrul sgo? dbab pa'i man ngag a mu ka'i thems 'og tu gzhug go bla ma gnyan gyi gdams ngag ithi'i mtha' can /
'gor dpal mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo nag po'i las gang gi zhes yod pa'i dgra po cham la 'bebs pa'i rdzas sbyor gyi man ngag gzhan las khyad 'phags ithi'i rdzong pod na'ang yod /
mtha' can /
'gor tA ra na mo grong khyer bskyod pa'i sngags la zhes yod pa'i bskad pa'i las mthar (e?)sgo?(glo?)nyi?? thug yin gyi mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
de'i zhal shes (e?)sgo?glo? dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dri mar bcas sogs tshig rkang drug pa dang /

'gor ngag gnon par 'dod na zhes yod ba'i ngag mnan (e?)sgo?nyi? ba'i las mthar thug gnyan gyi gdams chos tshan 'di gnyis dkar chag na gcig tu bsdoms /

ngag ithi'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /

ngor lugs la sgab 'dre gnon thabs zhes snang ba nor bar 'dug go /
de'i gsal byed nyi?? 'gor tsa turmu kha la na mo de'i bka' sdod ma hA bA la zhes yod pa sngags bzla zhing sa bcag go'i mtha' can rnams /
'di dkar chag na mi gsal bas gong gi 'phros su gtogs sam snyam /
lnga pa 'phral du nye bar mkho ba gtor chog dang bkang pa bstod bskul kyi skor la /
gtor chog /
bkang ba /
bstod bskul dang gsum /
dang po la /
'gor tA ra na mo dpal gdong bzhi pa'i mgon po mchod pa ni lcags kyi snod du zhes yod pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga gnyan gyis nye gnas dar ma seng ge la byon pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
de'i kha skong 'gor 'di sgrub gang zag des zhes yod pa'i mchod gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na bla ma gnyan la dbus phrug phur pa dar gyis zhus zer ba snang /
chul nyi?? dang bstod pa mi rtog dbyings @# / /
las ma dang bcas pa gtor ma dgra phyogs su gtang ngo dge slong gnyan gyi gdams ngag go'i mtha' can /
'gor na mo gu ru yi dam gang byed du bsams la mdun du rdo'i maN+Dal zhes yod pa'i mngon rtogs dang sngags ring bstan pa d+harma pA la u pa de sha ithi'i mtha' can /
'di dkar chag na mi gsal rdzong pod na gtso 'khor gsum pa'i sgrub thabs zer /
'gor oM swasti sid+d+haM bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa yab yum gyi zhes yod pa'i gtor chog bla ma kha'u pas mdzad pa mgon po zhal gzigs nas bstod pa 'o'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'gor bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo 'di bsgrub par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i gtor chog nyi?? sa chen gyis mdzad pa dngos grub ci 'dod kyi 'phrin las bcol gsung bo'i mtha' can /
dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i cho ga rdo rje 'dzin pa 'phags pas dpal sa skyar bris pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'di gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na dngos gzhi 'di kha yin pa la sla bcos kyi mngon nyi? rtogs sogs zhes sogs las tshang bar ma bris shing gtor ma gcang sar gtong ngo yan las mdzad byang med pa mjug tu gtor ma bca' gtong bkra rtags sngags ring gi 'dor len sogs bris pa zhig snang ngo /
stobs 'phrog nag po mnyes par byed pa'i mngon rtogs sam gtor chog bla ma'i gsung bzhin dmar chos kyi rgyal pos bsdebs pa /
'gor bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa'i gtor chen byed par 'dod pas zhes yod pa'i drag nyi?? po'i gtor chen gyi man ngag yar klungs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa su la yang mi sbyin no zhes brgyud pa rnams gsung ngo'i mtha' can /
'di'i gsham na seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis glu'i dgon par zhus dag bgyis zer ba las 'ang? dbyang mi 'dug /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na tshang ba gcig dang bskal mem man med pa zhig dang bcas 'dug /
de'i phyag len gtor zlog lhan thabs bdag chen ngag gi dbang phyug gi bkas bskul ba la brten nas rje btsun rdo ring pa chen pos kha'u brag rdzong nga mdzad pa rnams /
gnyis pa bkang ba la /
dam rdzas kyi bkang ba khyed mthun ma (e?)sgo?(glo??)nyi? spyan 'dren lha mchog ma dang bcas pa gnyan los mdzad pa /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i phyag mtshan bca' thabs e? (go?)glo??nyi?? dang 'bul ba'i tshigs bcad stobs chan shugs drag ma /
kha'u pas mdzad pa'i gtor (e?)glo?nyi? bkang gong dkar ba'i glegs bam du tshig zur mi 'dra ba cung zad snang zhing lha mchog mahA kA la man gyi spyad 'dren rnams lhag por 'dug go /
dur khrod gnas brgyad ma /
stobs 'phrog nag po'i gsang (sgo? )glo? nyi? mdos mgon po nyid kyis bla ma kha'u pa la dngos su gnang ba rnams /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
gsum pa bstod bskul la /
slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa srin gzugs ma /
sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa srin po'i gzugs can ma /
bram ze rin cen rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bstod pa (sgo?)nyi? dpal ldan mgon po sh+lo ka nyi shu pa gnyan lo tsA bas bsgyur ba /
ri sul gyi rnal 'byor mas mdzad pa'i bstod @# / /
pa sgo? mi rtog dbyings las ma /
bla ma gnyan lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i bstod pa paM (e?)sgo?nyi? pad raM nyi ma /
dang sang 'di dang yum gyi bstod pa g.yas phyogs ma gnyis sor sor bris pa mang yang 'di kha'i mur 'thud nas mdzad byang bris 'dug go /
kha'u pas mgon po zhal dngos su gzigs (e?)sgo?nyi? dus bstod pa rdo rje 'chang dbang ma /
bkang bstod la lar 'ang dang khyad bzhugs ma gnyis kha phral nas bris pa yong 'dug kyang don du 'di kha'i 'phros yin /
mal lo tsA bas rmi lam du mgon po zhal gzigs dus bstod pa zhi rgyas dbang drag ma /
sa chen gyis bstod pa (sgo?)nyi? 'jigs byed dpa' bo ma /
sa paN gyis sa skyar mdzad pa'i bstod pa (sgo?)nyi? dpal ldan dbang ldan ma /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
'phags pa rin po ches shing kun tu mdzad pa'i bstod pa (sgo?)nyi? sangs rgyas gcig bsdus ma /
'di'i rjes su dam pa kun dga' grags kyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa zhig yod 'dug pa ma thob /
chos rje bla ma dam pas mdzad pa'i bstod pa nyi? stong nyid snying rje ma /
des mdzad pa'i bstod pa srid gsum (sgo?)nyi? dbang sgyur ma /
gtor chog bstod bskul dang bcas pa zhes mdzad byang na 'dug /
'jam dbyangs grags pas mdzad pa'i bstod pa bde chen dur khrod ma /
dmar chos kyi rgyal pos bstod pa dpal ldan ma hA kA la ma /
'jam dbyangs 'khon ston gyis chu bzang dben gnas su mdzad pa'i bstod pa rgyal ba kun gyi ma /
bkra shis don grub kyis bstod pa'i dus gsum sangs rgyas ma /
d+harma shrI b+ha dras sron lung bsam gtan rdzong du sbyar ba'i bstod pa khyod thugs zhi ba ma /
mkhan chen gnas drug bas mdzad pa'i bstod pa mthu chen (glo?)nyi? sdang dgra ma /
b+h+ya wan yon tan blo gros kyis mdzad pa'i rtsa sngags kyi don bstod dus mtshan chen po ma /
sngags 'chang gzungs pas sa skyar mdzad pa'i bstod pa sku (sgo?)nyi? gsum mngon gyur ba /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
des mdzad pa'i thun sgo? gsum bsten cing ma /
chos rje bzang po rgyal mtshan par chos skyong gis rmi lam du bskul nas kha'u skyes lhas su mdzad pa'i bstod pa ha ha dgod pa ma /
shrI mA na b+ha dras rtsa sngags dang mthun par rin cen sgang mgon khang du bstod pa chos dbyings mthing nag ma /
bzang po'i mtha' can gyis rin cen sgang bla brang du bstod pa'i lha chen thugs kyi ma /
zhal bzhi pas bskul nas sbas pa'i rnal 'byor zur shAkya dpal gyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa rab 'jigs dur khrod ma /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
gnyan los mdzad pa'i rtsa sngags kyi drag nyi? bskul nag po chen po ma /
des mdzad pa'i bstod bskul /
(sgo?)glo? mngon spyod rol pa lo rgyus dang bcas pa /
des mdzad pa'i bstod bskul sgo? las kyi rgyal po chig bcad dpal ldan mgon po ma lo rgyus dang bcas pa /
das mdzad pa'i bskul nyi? legs ldan nag po ma /
'di dkar chag na mi gsal ba gong gi bstod bskul gyi sdebs su 'gro rgyu yin nam brtag /
des mdzad pa'i dmod bskul las kyi rgyal po zhes pa tshig lhug dpal ldan nag po ma /
kha'u pas mdzad pa'i dmod bskul lo ston thig le la gnang ba tshig lhug dpal ldan ma hA kA la ma rnams /
dkar chag tu /
snyan brgyud khrag mtsho'i ljongs nas 'ong / /
mngon spyod sprul gdug kha rlang can / /
srog gi mthar byad 'di @# / /
mthong tshe / /
bstan dang bstan 'dzin la 'khu ba'i / /
mi dang mi min gang ci mang rung / /
bag yod dus la bab min nam / /
zhas gsungs par dpags na phyi sgrub yin pa rgyu mtshan du byas nas snod ma brtags par bab col du 'chad pa'ang mi rung bar mngon no / /
gnyis pa nang rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bsnun pa gsang ba'i man ngag la /
rtsa ba'i yi ge tshigs bcad ma glo? bla ma'i man ngag bzhin gab dkrugs med par dam pa kun dga' grags kyis mdzad pa /
yig rnying 'di lta bu yod pa mig dang rna ba'i yul du ma gyur par rtag brtan sprul sku kun dga' snying pos tshar chen gyi gur mgon gyi 'khrid la dpe blangs pa'i rang bzo yin zhes ngan smras kyi than skad phyogs brgyar sgrog pa ni rang gi nang cha gsal bar ston pa'o / /
gsang sgrub kyi 'khrid gzhung dam man ngag thun mong ma yin pa snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa ka zhang dka' bcu dang rong po dka' bcu sogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas bskul pa la brten nas mchungs med skyes mchog rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa /
gsang ba'i 'khrid yig zung 'jug rnam par rol pa bdud sde 'joms pa'i bshan pa chen po zhes bya ba mdo khams lho phyogs pa dbon chen chos rgyal mtshan dang bla ma grags pa rgyal mtshan sogs kyis bskul nas rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rjes dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du mngad pa /
des kha'u brag rdzong nag po'i ru 'dren gyi pho brang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bsam gtan khang bur mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa rgyal ba kun dngas ma rnams 'di skor ni gtso bor mchog gi dngos grub zung 'jug gi go 'phang sgrub pa'i gsang lam zab mo yin pas /
dkar chag tu /
lhan skyes rdo rje lus kyi zhing skyong che / /
bad chen 'od stong 'bar ba'i 'dzum zhal la / /
rnal 'byor yid kyi dga' ma ji bzhin du / /
'bral med rtse dags rol 'di ngo mtshar rmad / /
e ma tshe 'di'i chos brgyad kun dor nas / /
gcig pur dben pa'i nags kyi sman ljangs su / /
rgyal ba'i thugs bcud rim gnyis bdud rtsi'i ro / /
myang ba'i spyod tshul de la snying nas spo / /
zhes pa rdo rje'i gsung bla na mad pa yin la /
zhar byung du las bzhi ga dang khyad par mngon spyod kyi las spros pa la ma bltos par 'bad med du 'grub pas /
e dbyings sde brgyad dbus su bsgrub bya'i gzugs / /
lus la zhing skyong bkod pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis / /
rtsa 'bral khams gsol rnam shes 'phrog pa yi / /
zhes dgra bo rnams ring por mi thogs par mi bskyod pa'i zhing du skyel ba'i zab gnad kyang shin tu che'o / /
gsum pa snying nang gi khrag lta bu khyad par gyi man ngag la /
ri sul gyi rnal 'byor mas bla ma gnyan la gdams pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i shog dril nyer gcig /
de las zab pa'i yig chung dang gnyis /
dang po la /
'gor bla ma rdo rje 'chang dbang dang zhes yod pa'i bsrung bzlog gsad mnan tshe sgrub dang bcas /
ldong? pa'i shog dril gtor mdos man ngag rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dang zhes yod pa'i rten gsum /
gnad 'bebs /
bsnyen pa /
zas sbyor /
rtags /
sreg mnan (e?)sgo? rnams ston pa sbas te 'dzam gling du ma grags pa @# / /
snying nang gi khrag lta bu'i shog dril /
'gor chos skyong zhi bar zhes yod pa'i bsnyen dus kyi mgon po la brten pa'i chos skyong ni ba nor du sgrub pa'i shog dril sgrub lugs yin no rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor bud+d+ha ya shrI pa shaM ku ru zhes yod pa'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ma he'i gdan la bzhugs pa nang tsit+ta la brten nas zhal dngos su blta ba'i shog dril rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor dpal mgon po gdong bzhi pa bsgrub pa la zhes yod pa'i phyi'i sgab 'dre bdud mo shin+taM ro zan ma gnon pa 'brug mgo can gyi shog dril /
'gor byad ma'i ngag mnan pa ni zhes yod pa'i nang gi mal 'og bsrung ba byang ma'i ngag gnon pa'i shog dril /
'gor man ngag 'di'i zhal gang mas ni zhes yod pa'i gsang ba rang srog rten gyi 'khor lo kha sbyor shog dril zhar byung du dam tshig /
'khu ldog /
'ching ba /
gnyen po /
rig sngags go ldog rnams kyang zur tsam bstan pa tsakra'i gdams pa ithi'i mtha' can /
'khor bsrung zhing mi 'khu mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i shog dril ithi'i mtha' can /
'gor yum chen khros ma'i zhal gdams la dang po rdzas gsag pa ni zhes yod pa'i yum chen khros ma'i shog dril (e?)sgo? dam tshig mad pa la gsang bar bya 'o'i mtha' can /
rdzong pod na'ang yod /
bum pa la brten nas nag po chen po'i 'chi med glo? tshe sgrub kyi shog dril bla ma pen ta pas lung bstan thob nas bsgrubs pas lo phyed dang nyis brgya bzhugs pa'i che ba can /
rdzas sngags 'khor lo gsum la brten pa'i nag po chen po'i dgos 'dod nor bu sgrub pa'i shog dri las ma pa tha'i mtha' can /
rdzas sngags srog 'khor gsum la brten pa'i sku dngos su blta ba'i shog dril ithi'i mtha' rten snying gi rgya can /
rdzas sngags lha sgom pa gsum la brten pa'i glo? nag po chen po'i cho 'phrul ltas ngan dbab pa'i shog dril gtang ba ithi'i mtha' can /
rdzas sngags 'khor lo gsum la brten nas nag po chen pos dgra srog myur du gcod pa'i srog rtsa rnon po'i shog dril gzhan la spel na bka' chad 'byungs ma pa tha mo'i mtha' can /
rdzas sngags bca' gzhi gsum la brten nas nag po chen pos dgra mkhar rmad nas sgyel rdo rje? ba nag po mkhar sgyel gyi shog dril mkhar bshig pa'i spu gri nag po zhes bya ba sa ma pa tha'i mtha' can /
rdzas dang sngags kyi bzla thabs la brten nas ser pa dbab pa gdong bzhi pa'i spu gri ngar ma'i shog dril bcol bskul gzhung dang mthun no'i mtha' can /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo nag po 'jigs par byed pa ye zhes yod pa'i rdzas sngags gnyis la brten nas zhing sel 'jug pa spu gri so 'debs so'i mtha' can gyi shog dril /
'gor bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo chos skyong gi bsnyen ba byas pas cung zhig rtsub nas zhes yod pa'i tsa tu rmu kha bcun thabs nyi zla can gyi shog dril gnad la dbab pa'i gdams pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
'gor lha mo nag mo'i zhal gdams zhes yod pa'i gnad la (ldong?)sgo?glo? dbab pa lha mo nag mo'i shog dril ting 'dzin zhal shes legs par thugs la chongs kyi mtha' can /
'di la dpal mgon gdong bzhi pa'i man ngag ces pa gong gi gsal byed 'dra ba gcig na mo gu @# / /
ru gnyis pa bgyis so zhes dang /
a ma ra zhes pa yod pa gcig dang bcas pa'i nang gses chos tshan bzhir dbye ba 'dra zhig 'dug kyang dkar chag tu bsdoms par snang ngo /
rdzong bod na'ang bzhugs /
gong dkar ba'i glegs bam na nang gses bzhi'i gnyis pa 'gor tA ra na ma dpal nyi? mgon gdong bzhi ba zhes dang mjug tu chas rje rin po che bsod nams la brgyud zer ba de snang /
'gor dpal mgon nag po chen po ma 'chun na zhes yod pa'i ma 'chun 'khu ldog byed na mnan pa'i shog dril sa ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
'gor dpal nag po chen po gdong bzhi pa dgra bo la 'gro ma nyan cing zhes yod pa'i las byed glo? du mi 'dod na ar gtad kyi shog dril shin tu sbas pa 'o'i mtha' can rnams dus gcig la mang por mi spel ba'i chig brgyud gras /
shog dril dang po'i gsal byed 'gor bla ma dang dpal ldan mgan po la phyag 'tshal lo rje bcun ku sA li zhes yod pa rje btsun (dbang?)khra? rdo ring pa ched pos mdzad pa zlog pa sogs gzhan du shes so'i mtha' can /
shog dril dang po'i rgyun gyi nyams len ngag 'don gsal bar bkod pa rdo rje 'chang char pa chos rjes mdzad pa rnams /
gnyis pa de las zab pa'i yig chung la /
tsa turmu kha dkar po tshe 'phel gyi sgrub (ldong?)rdo rje? thabs zhar byung rjes gnang gi yig chung dang bcas pa snyan brgyud yi ger bkod pa bka' rgya athi'i'i mtha' can /
'gor gnyis pa rnal 'byor pa nor spel (ldong?)rdo rje? na zhes yod pa'i ser po rgyas pa'i yi ge /
'gor gsum pa dgra bgegs sgrol na zhes yod pa'i nag po dgra bgegs sgol ba'i yi ge zhal du (ldong?)rdo rje? gsol bar bsam mo'i mtha' can /
'gor bzhi pa dmigs bya dbang du bsdu (ldong?)rdo rje? na zhes yod pa'i dmar po dbang sdud kyi yi ge /
'gor tA ra la na mo mgon po dkar ser dmar nag ces yod pa'i las /
(ldong?)rdo rje? bzhi mgon po'i mngon rtogs kyi gsal byed u pa de sha gsang bar bya'o'i mtha' can /
mgon po ser po'i byin rlabs kyi yig /
(ldong?)rdo rje? chung tsit+ta'i dkyil du sbas sos ma pa tha mi'i mtha' can /
las bzhi mgon po'i sgrub thabs tA ming rgyal po chen po'i bkas bskul ba ltar theg chen chos kyi rgyal pos pho brang gra'i tu'i hwo'i sde chen por sbyar ba /
mgon po zhal bzhi pa dkar po'i tshe sgrub zla ba'i chu rgyun ldong? rdo rje 'chang char pa chos rjes mdzad pa /
des mdzad pa'i brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs rdo rje 'chang dbang ma /
ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma ku sA li chen mos gnyan lo bod du 'byon khar 'gro chos su gnang ba'i bram rdo rje? zed mod pa'i srog mtha' 'di phyi bram ze ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag yin nam snyam /
dag bo'i srog gi bshan pa dmar po snying khrag thang la 'pho zhig sa mA ya na ra skan gyi mtha' can /
ngan sngags dgra srog gi spu gri dmang po yang zher /
lam bar gyi chom rkun brtag pa'i phyir du gdong bzhi pa'i bka' sdong drang srong nag po'i pra se na dbab pa'i man ngag mkhar nag dge bshes nas brgyud pa shin tu gsang ba gal che 'o'i mtha' can /
de'i zha'ang shes snying gi dkyil du chongs kyi mtha' can /
bla ma gnyen bod du byon khar mgon pos lung bstan pa la brten nas zhus pa'i tsa turmu kha'i cho 'phrul rdo rje? than 'gyed gnyan gyi mgul khug mar grags pa chig brgyud snying gi dum bu bka' rgya dang bcas pa ithi'i'i mtha' can /
'gor DA ki ma bzhi zhes yod pa'i @# / /
yum chen bzhi'i than rdo rje? 'gyed gnyan gyi mgul khug bka' rgya ma sa ma pa tha mi thi'i mtha' can /
'gor ta ra na mo rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob nas zhes yod pa'i gnyan rdo rje? mgon gyi bar pu'i cho ga'i man ngag zhal gdams bka' rgya ma ithi'i mtha' can /
'gor tA ra na ma mgon po'i nor sgrub ni zhes yod pa'i gnyan mgon lha dgu'i sgrub rdo rje? thabs thun mong ma yin bsnyan brgyud kun la ma grags pa'i snying nang gi khrag lta bu shin tu gsang rgya'i mtha' can /
'gor tA ra na mo rdzas kyi sbyor ba zhes yod pa'i rdzas kyi sgo nas dgra gsod pa'i las sbyor bla ma'i zhal las shes so sa ma pa tha'i mtha' can /
'gor tAr na mo gtad bya ba ni zhes yod pa'i rdo nag rdo rje? yig dmar gyi sgrub mthu gser zho re'i bka' rgya yod sa ma pa tha mi thi'i mtha' can /
