sa bcu'i dbang phyug grub thob 'dar phya ru pa rin cen bzang po /
chos rgyal bo dong brtson 'grus rdo rje /
jo sras sangs rgyas rin cen /
slob dpon shes rab mtsho /
bla ma bsod nams dbang phyug /
lcang spe ba seng ge 'bum /
@# / /
kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge bzang po /
chos rje rin cen bkra shis /
rtogs ldan yon tan mgon po /
bla ma gzhon nu dpal ba /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
rgyud gsum smra ba shes rab rin cen /
rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug /
rin po che rta ra ba bsod nams chos 'phel /
grub pa mchog gi ded dbon dbang phyug rab brtan /
rdo rje 'chang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan /
zur thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du stsal to / /
nye brgyud ni slob dpon chen po padmas grub thob 'dar phyar la dbang dang gdams pa gnang ba yin no / /
rjes gnang dang lung gdams skor rags rim gyi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rtogs ldan yon tan mgon po nas /
bla chen chos dpal bzang po /
mus srad pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
mus chen rnam rgyal dbang bzang /
'khrul zhig dkon cog bzang po /
tshar chen man 'dra /
yang rjes gnang gi brgyud pa lugs gcig ni /
bo dong brtson 'grus rdo rje nas /
nyan chen bsod nams brtan pa /
mkhan chen chos rgyal dpal bzang /
mus srad pa dpal ldan seng ge man 'dra /
yang na mus srad pa dpal ldan seng ge nas /
tshal min bsod nams bzang po /
rtogs ldan yon tan mgon po man 'dra /
yang na kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge nas /
dpal ldan rat+na kIrti /
gu ru dug gsum nang sel /
mtshungs med rin cen bkra shis man 'dra /
yang na rtogs ldan yon tan mgon po nas /
ston pa chos dpal ba /
dam pa seng ge /
grub chin be phug pa bde legs rgyal mtshan /
glo bo dzar ba sngags 'chang chos rgyal bsod nams /
de sras chos skyong bsod nams /
'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyag man 'dra /
gnubs lugs gter ma'i lung brgyud ni /
chos sku snang ba mtha' yas /
longs sku padma dbang chen /
sprul sku padma 'byung gnas /
gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes /
gnubs pa chur ston pa /
gnubs sten phug pa 'bar /
de nas rim par sngags 'chang sangs rgyas 'phal /
tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po brgyud par bzhugs pa bzhin no / /
nyang gter gyi lung brgyud ni /
slob dpon chen po padma nas /
mkha' 'gro ye shes 'tsho rgyal /
mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan /
lha sras mu tig btsan po /
nyang nyi ma 'od zer nas rim par brgyud de /
tshar pa rdo rje 'chang man 'dra /
yang rin pa 'dar gsum gyi rtags yod pa'i lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ge nas /
mkhas grub rin cen dpal bzang /
grus ston kun dga' bzang po /
dran mchog don yod rgyal mtshan /
de sras rdo rje 'chang kun dga' rgyal mtshan /
de sras thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho /
sa ra rje bcun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
chos rje ba de legs nyi ma /
shar chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan /
chos rje rin cen bshes gnyen /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub /
des bdag za hor ban+de la stsal to / /
yang na rtogs ldan yon tan mgon po @# / /
nas /
de sras kun mkhyen blo gros rin cen seng ge /
gnyal ston dpal 'byor lhun grub /
se ra rje btsun pa man 'dra /
rdzas gnang gi brgyud lugs gcig ni /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa nas /
khyab bdag chos dbyings rang grol /
des bdag la'o / /
yang rdzas gnang 'dar dang su'i rtags yod pa'i lung 'khor lo'i phyag bzhas bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni /
'khrul zheg dkon cog bzang po nas /
de sras sngags 'chang gzhon nu stobs ldan /
rin cen rdo rje yang zer /
sngags 'chang phyag na rdo rje /
pha rgan gu ru rin cen /
snying ri ba rgyal sras bde ba bzang po /
yi dam gyi lhas btags pa la rig pa'i ye shes zer /
des bdag za hor ban+de la'o / /
yang na gab chag pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan nas /
mnyam med dkon cog dpal bzang /
nub dgon pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan /
thugs sras blo gros rgyal mtshan /
mkhas grub byams pa bzang po /
nub dgon sprul sku shAkya rgyal mtshan /
rgyal sras bde ba bzang po man 'dra /
yang na grub thob 'dar phyar nas /
'dar dgon pa chos kyi 'byung gnas /
sngags 'chang chos skyong mgon ne /
yar 'dran nam mkha'i mtshan can /
rigs 'dzin tshe dbang rgyal po /
rigs 'dzin grags pa rdo rje /
pha rgan gu ru rin cen man 'dra / /
spyi lo lo la grangs sheng song /
